engChrName: I think I'll try writing some music here for once.
engSearchText: I think I'll try writing some music here for once.
jpnChrName: 折角だからここで作曲していこうかな。
jpnSearchText: 折角だからここで作曲していこうかな。

engChrName: I mainly settled on this place because the other two hardly come here as far as I know.
engSearchText:
I mainly settled on this place because the other two
hardly come here as far as I know.
jpnChrName: この店ならあの２人は滅多に 来ないだろうと思って選んだんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
この店ならあの２人は滅多に
来ないだろうと思って選んだんだけど……

engChrName: But it's actually pretty relaxing here, so I think I'll just keep hanging out here for a while.
engSearchText:
But it's actually pretty relaxing here, so I think I'll just
keep hanging out here for a while.

jpnSearchText:
意外と落ち着けるし、
このまま待たせてもらうよ。

engSearchText:
Anyway, thanks for handling my request. I, uhh...
really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 依頼の件……どうかよろしく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText: 依頼の件……どうかよろしく頼んだよ。

engSearchText: Huh? Hey, are you guys...?
jpnChrName: ん……？　君たちは……？
jpnSearchText: ん……？　君たちは……？

engChrName: Oh, sorry, mister! Don't mind us. We're just wandering around here.
engSearchText:
Oh, sorry, mister! Don't mind us. We're just
wandering around here.
jpnChrName: あっすみません、 お店の中をウロウロしちゃってました。
jpnSearchText:
あっすみません、
お店の中をウロウロしちゃってました。

engChrName: Oh, I see! No worries. I get why you're curious. There aren't many places like this here in Edith for sure.
engSearchText:
Oh, I see! No worries. I get why you're curious.
There aren't many places like this here in Edith
for sure.
jpnChrName: はは、首都じゃ珍しいお店だもんね。 気持ちは分かるよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、首都じゃ珍しいお店だもんね。
気持ちは分かるよ。

engSearchText:
(I thought it might be 'them,' but it seems not.
Guess I'm just going to have to wait around a while
until they show up.)

jpnSearchText:
（……もしかしてと思ったけど。
気長に待つしかないのかな……）

engSearchText:
(Is it just me, or does this guy not seem like he's just
here for a bite to eat?)

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: (Maybe he's waiting for someone. Who knows?)

jpnSearchText: （誰かを待ってるんでしょうか……？）

engSearchText: (No way do I have time to catch another movie.)

jpnSearchText:
ＢＧＭはどうします？
オープニングはしっとり目から入るんですよね？

engSearchText:
After inviting some company to tag along with him,
they made their way to the theater.
jpnChrName: あ、それなら私いい曲知っていますよ～！ 最近ちょっと流行ってる……あれ何でしたっけ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、それなら私いい曲知っていますよ～！
最近ちょっと流行ってる……あれ何でしたっけ？

engChrName: (Let's grab a seat.)
engSearchText: (Let's grab a seat.)
jpnChrName: ああ、あのメロディアスなやつだろ？ 確か歌手の名は──ジェス・ブランソンだったか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あのメロディアスなやつだろ？
確か歌手の名は──ジェス・ブランソンだったか。

engChrName: (...Oh, crap. Wallet's empty. So much for that.)
engSearchText: (...Oh, crap. Wallet's empty. So much for that.)
jpnChrName: ……ぶふぇっ！？！？

engChrName: Hmm... I have no way of knowing if my request will reach that spriggan in time.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I have no way of knowing if my request will
reach that spriggan in time.
jpnChrName: キャ、キャロルさん、どうかしました？
jpnSearchText: キャ、キャロルさん、どうかしました？

engChrName: For now, all I can do is cross my fingers and hope for the best, I guess.
engSearchText:
For now, all I can do is cross my fingers and hope for
the best, I guess.
jpnChrName: ななななななんでもっ！？
jpnSearchText: ななななななんでもっ！？

engChrName: (Oh, damn. She a client of mine? Better check the bulletin board to see if anything new's been posted.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, damn. She a client of mine? Better check the
bulletin board to see if anything new's been posted.)
jpnChrName: （なんでジェスの名前が出てくるのよ～！！   ……そ、そりゃあ広まってて嬉しいけどっ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（なんでジェスの名前が出てくるのよ～！！
……そ、そりゃあ広まってて嬉しいけどっ！！）

engChrName: I know you can't really say how long your investigation is going to take...
engSearchText:
I know you can't really say how long your
investigation is going to take...
jpnChrName: ジェス・ブランソン、いいんじゃないか？ 事務所に打診してみるか！
jpnSearchText:
ジェス・ブランソン、いいんじゃないか？
事務所に打診してみるか！

engChrName: ...but that's okay. I'll stick around here for the time being. Any information on my boyfriend is absolutely worth the wait.
engSearchText:
...but that's okay. I'll stick around here for the
time being. Any information on my boyfriend is
absolutely worth the wait.
jpnChrName: あ、社長さんがウチの常連なので 私聞いてみますよ～！
jpnSearchText:
あ、社長さんがウチの常連なので
私聞いてみますよ～！

engChrName: It's amazing we're broadcasting this year's EGC over the orbal net. We've got to nail the production and get every detail right!
engSearchText:
It's amazing we're broadcasting this year's EGC over
the orbal net. We've got to nail the production and
get every detail right!
jpnChrName: （あわわわ……なんか話が進んでる……   嬉しいけど……ど、どうすればいいのっ！？）
jpnSearchText:
（あわわわ……なんか話が進んでる……
嬉しいけど……ど、どうすればいいのっ！？）

engChrName: Right! We're going to make this the best EGC by a selge! But it's going to take all of us working as a team to make it happen.
engSearchText:
Right! We're going to make this the best EGC by
a selge! But it's going to take all of us working as a
team to make it happen.
jpnChrName: えっへん、エルメスさんと一緒に あちこちで困ってる人を運んでたんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
えっへん、エルメスさんと一緒に
あちこちで困ってる人を運んでたんだ～！

engChrName: I've got new lighting gear all ready to go on my end.
engSearchText: I've got new lighting gear all ready to go on my end.
jpnChrName: 大体落ち着いたけど、補給が済んだら もう一度回ってみないとね！
jpnSearchText:
大体落ち着いたけど、補給が済んだら
もう一度回ってみないとね！

engChrName: But what are we going to do for the background music? We want to start with something nice and subdued, don't we?
engSearchText:
But what are we going to do for the background
music? We want to start with something nice and
subdued, don't we?
jpnChrName: みんなも……その、気をつけて！ 力になれることがあったら声かけてよね！
jpnSearchText:
みんなも……その、気をつけて！
力になれることがあったら声かけてよね！

engChrName: I've got an idea! What about that song that's been kind of popular lately? What was it called again...?
engSearchText:
I've got an idea! What about that song that's been
kind of popular lately? What was it called again...?
jpnChrName: 正直無我夢中だが、俺たちも 最後まで協力させてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
正直無我夢中だが、俺たちも
最後まで協力させてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Oh, I know the one. You mean that one with the really nice melody? I remember the singer. I think his name was Jess Branson.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know the one. You mean that one with the
really nice melody? I remember the singer. I think his
name was Jess Branson.
jpnChrName: 足でも整備でも、必要なら言ってくれ！ でもって絶対に成功させて戻ってきてくれよな！
jpnSearchText:
足でも整備でも、必要なら言ってくれ！
でもって絶対に成功させて戻ってきてくれよな！

engChrName: PFFFFFT!
engSearchText: PFFFFFT!
jpnChrName: ふふ、こちらのお二人は アニエスさんの同級生だったのですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こちらのお二人は
アニエスさんの同級生だったのですね。

engChrName: C-Carol?! Is something wrong?
engSearchText: C-Carol?! Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: カフェ巡りがお好きとの事で 今日はカプチーノをお出ししています。
jpnSearchText:
カフェ巡りがお好きとの事で
今日はカプチーノをお出ししています。

engChrName: N-NO, NOTHING AT ALL! DON'T MIND ME!
engSearchText:
N-NO, NOTHING AT ALL! DON'T
MIND ME!
jpnChrName: 生徒会の仕事もお忙しそうですし、 ゆっくり息抜きしてほしいですね。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会の仕事もお忙しそうですし、
ゆっくり息抜きしてほしいですね。

engChrName: (Of all the people, why'd it have to be him?! ARGH! I mean, I'm glad he's getting noticed, of course, but still!)
engSearchText:
(Of all the people, why'd it have to be him?! ARGH!
I mean, I'm glad he's getting noticed, of course,
but still!)
jpnChrName: シノさんのお店ならきっと。 ふふっ、二人をよろしくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText:
シノさんのお店ならきっと。
ふふっ、二人をよろしくお願いしますね！

engChrName: Jess Branson, you said, right? That could work. I'll get in touch with his agency and see what they have to say.
engSearchText:
Jess Branson, you said, right? That could work. I'll get
in touch with his agency and see what they have
to say.
jpnChrName: ええ、精一杯 おもてなしさせていただきます♪
jpnSearchText:
ええ、精一杯
おもてなしさせていただきます♪

engChrName: I know the president there. He's a regular of mine. I'll just ask him!
engSearchText:
I know the president there. He's a regular of mine.
I'll just ask him!
jpnChrName: 夜の繁華街は賑わいますね。 この独特の雰囲気、私も好きです。
jpnSearchText:
夜の繁華街は賑わいますね。
この独特の雰囲気、私も好きです。

engChrName: (AAAH! They're doing it! They're really doing it! Wh-What do I do?! I'm happy, but at the same time...what do I do?!)
engSearchText:
(AAAH! They're doing it! They're really doing it!
Wh-What do I do?! I'm happy, but at the same
time...what do I do?!)
jpnChrName: こちらのお二人は映画を楽しんでこられたようで。
jpnSearchText: こちらのお二人は映画を楽しんでこられたようで。

engChrName: You're going to be so proud of me! Hermès and I went around and we picked up as many people in trouble as we could find.
engSearchText:
You're going to be so proud of me! Hermès and I
went around and we picked up as many people in
trouble as we could find.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ゆっくり語り合えるよう 美味しい一杯をお出ししていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ゆっくり語り合えるよう
美味しい一杯をお出ししていますよ。

engChrName: Things have calmed down a lot, but I'm still going to do another run just to be sure once we're resupplied.
engSearchText:
Things have calmed down a lot, but I'm still going to
do another run just to be sure once we're resupplied.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。 SHINO's・BARにようこそです。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ。
SHINO's・BARにようこそです。

engChrName: As for you guys, just...be careful, okay? If there's anything I can do to help, don't hesitate to ask!
engSearchText:
As for you guys, just...be careful, okay? If there's
anything I can do to help, don't hesitate to ask!
jpnChrName: へえ？　移動式のバーか。 煌都じゃ見かけた事はねえな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ？　移動式のバーか。
煌都じゃ見かけた事はねえな。

engChrName: We'll keep helping until the very end! At this point, we're in the zone!
engSearchText:
We'll keep helping until the very end! At this point,
we're in the zone!
jpnChrName: だが東方系がやってんなら いい白酒なんかも置いてんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
だが東方系がやってんなら
いい白酒なんかも置いてんじゃねえか？

engChrName: If you need more boots on the ground or maintenance or whatever, hit me up!
engSearchText:
If you need more boots on the ground or maintenance
or whatever, hit me up!
jpnChrName: がっつくなっつの…… 悪いなシノ、コイツ二十歳になったばかりでよ。
jpnSearchText:
がっつくなっつの……
悪いなシノ、コイツ二十歳になったばかりでよ。

engChrName: It turns out these two are Agnès' classmates.
engSearchText: It turns out these two are Agnès' classmates.
jpnChrName: って俺がイキってるみてえに 言うんじゃねーよ、オッサン！
jpnSearchText:
って俺がイキってるみてえに
言うんじゃねーよ、オッサン！

engChrName: They mentioned that they enjoy visiting cafés, so today, I'm doing something a little different and serving up cappuccinos for a change of pace.
engSearchText:
They mentioned that they enjoy visiting cafés, so
today, I'm doing something a little different and
serving up cappuccinos for a change of pace.
jpnChrName: クスクス……白酒を使ったカクテルなら いくつかお出ししていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……白酒を使ったカクテルなら
いくつかお出ししていますよ。

engChrName: I can only imagine how busy Student Council work must get. Hopefully they're able to relax and unwind a little while they're here.
engSearchText:
I can only imagine how busy Student Council work
must get. Hopefully they're able to relax and unwind
a little while they're here.
jpnChrName: 煌都の方ならこちらがオススメです♪
jpnSearchText: 煌都の方ならこちらがオススメです♪

engChrName: Oh, I'm sure they will. Nothing beats your place when it comes to that. Take good care of them for me, all right, Shino?
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm sure they will. Nothing beats your place
when it comes to that. Take good care of them for
me, all right, Shino?
jpnChrName: へえ、マジで美味そうだな。 そんじゃ早速──
jpnSearchText:
へえ、マジで美味そうだな。
そんじゃ早速──

engChrName: Absolutely. I promise they'll get my absolute best service and then some. ♪
engSearchText:
Absolutely. I promise they'll get my absolute best
service and then some. ♪
jpnChrName: 仕事中だぞ。 分かってんのか？　ったく……
jpnSearchText:
仕事中だぞ。
分かってんのか？　ったく……

engChrName: The shopping center here is always so busy at night. It has this unique atmosphere that I'm very fond of.
engSearchText:
The shopping center here is always so busy at night.
It has this unique atmosphere that I'm very fond of.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。 SHINO's・BARにようこそです。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ。
SHINO's・BARにようこそです。

engChrName: It seems these two were enjoying a movie together before they came here.
engSearchText:
It seems these two were enjoying a movie together
before they came here.
jpnChrName: シノ、今日はここに来てたのか。
jpnSearchText: シノ、今日はここに来てたのか。

engChrName: I'll have to serve up some of my tastiest drinks to keep the conversation flowing for them.
engSearchText:
I'll have to serve up some of my tastiest drinks to keep
the conversation flowing for them.
jpnChrName: はい、この街区はやっぱり 色々な人が立ち寄ってくれますね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、この街区はやっぱり
色々な人が立ち寄ってくれますね。

engChrName: Welcome to my humble little bar. What can I get you?
engSearchText:
Welcome to my humble little bar. What can I
get you?
jpnChrName: 映画や音楽……好きな事や趣味について 語ってくれる方も多いです。
jpnSearchText:
映画や音楽……好きな事や趣味について
語ってくれる方も多いです。

engChrName: Damn. Is that a straight up bar truck? We've got nothing that fun back in Langport, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Damn. Is that a straight up bar truck? We've got
nothing that fun back in Langport, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: バーテンダーは肌感覚が大切なので── 私もよい刺激をもらっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
バーテンダーは肌感覚が大切なので──
私もよい刺激をもらっていますね。

engChrName: AND it's run by an Eastern chick? No wonder this place is stocked with such good baijiu. Talk about perfect!
engSearchText:
AND it's run by an Eastern chick? No wonder this
place is stocked with such good baijiu. Talk
about perfect!
jpnChrName: バーテンダーは肌感覚が大切── これは私の先輩の教えなのですが。
jpnSearchText:
バーテンダーは肌感覚が大切──
これは私の先輩の教えなのですが。

engChrName: Calm down. You're embarrassin' me! ...Sorry about him, Shino. Kid's a little full of himself now that he's turned twenty and can legally drink.
engSearchText:
Calm down. You're embarrassin' me! ...Sorry about
him, Shino. Kid's a little full of himself now that he's
turned twenty and can legally drink.
jpnChrName: このタイレル地区は色々な人がいらして 私もよい刺激をもらっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
このタイレル地区は色々な人がいらして
私もよい刺激をもらっていますね。

engChrName: Shut up! Better to be young and hot than someone so crusty and old you forgot how to have some fun.
engSearchText:
Shut up! Better to be young and hot than
someone so crusty and old you forgot how to
have some fun.
jpnChrName: よりお客様にくつろいで いただけるよう、私も精進します♪
jpnSearchText:
よりお客様にくつろいで
いただけるよう、私も精進します♪

engChrName: You two are quite the funny pair. Well, if you're looking for a baijiu cocktail, my menu has more than a few.
engSearchText:
You two are quite the funny pair. Well, if you're looking
for a baijiu cocktail, my menu has more than a few.
jpnChrName: アンタは……無事だったのかよ。
jpnSearchText: アンタは……無事だったのかよ。

engChrName: This one in particular would be perfect for someone from Langport.
engSearchText:
This one in particular would be perfect for someone
from Langport.
jpnChrName: ようブラザー、そっちこそ無事で何よりだぜ。 仲間とも合流できたようだな？
jpnSearchText:
ようブラザー、そっちこそ無事で何よりだぜ。
仲間とも合流できたようだな？

engChrName: Oh, HELL yeah! That looks bomb as f—
engSearchText: Oh, HELL yeah! That looks bomb as f—
jpnChrName: オレも仕事をさせてもらっているぜ。 離れ離れになった市民や学生を送ったりな。
jpnSearchText:
オレも仕事をさせてもらっているぜ。
離れ離れになった市民や学生を送ったりな。

engChrName: Forget it. No. Drinking. We're on the clock, remember? Sheesh...
engSearchText:
Forget it. No. Drinking. We're on the
clock, remember? Sheesh...
jpnChrName: このヤマには最後まで付き合うつもりだ。 ──フフ、ディンゴに報いるためにもな。
jpnSearchText:
このヤマには最後まで付き合うつもりだ。
──フフ、ディンゴに報いるためにもな。

engChrName: Welcome to my humble little bar. What can I get you?
engSearchText:
Welcome to my humble little bar. What can I
get you?
jpnChrName: そうか…… ああ、どうかよろしく頼むぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
ああ、どうかよろしく頼むぜ！

engChrName: Heya, Shino. Workin' out here today, it looks like?
engSearchText: Heya, Shino. Workin' out here today, it looks like?
jpnChrName: ＨＡＨＡ、任せときなブラザー！
jpnSearchText: ＨＡＨＡ、任せときなブラザー！

engChrName: That's right. I can always count on a variety of people stopping by in this district.
engSearchText:
That's right. I can always count on a variety of people
stopping by in this district.
jpnChrName: オレのアクティスなら、化け物どもを 避けて走るくらい朝飯前だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オレのアクティスなら、化け物どもを
避けて走るくらい朝飯前だぜ。

engChrName: Many of them like to tell me about their hobbies and interests. What movies and music they enjoy, for instance.
engSearchText:
Many of them like to tell me about their hobbies and
interests. What movies and music they enjoy,
for instance.
jpnChrName: まだまだ手助けが必要な連中がいるようだしな、 ドライバーなら務めてやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
まだまだ手助けが必要な連中がいるようだしな、
ドライバーなら務めてやるさ。

engChrName: I learn a lot from talking to my customers here. Getting in practical experience like that is everything to a bartender.
engSearchText:
I learn a lot from talking to my customers here.
Getting in practical experience like that is everything
to a bartender.
jpnChrName: フフ、ブラザーたちもしっかりな。 また酒でも酌み交わそうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ブラザーたちもしっかりな。
また酒でも酌み交わそうぜ。

engChrName: Getting in practical experience with customers is everything as a bartender. Someone I used to work with taught me as much.
engSearchText:
Getting in practical experience with customers is
everything as a bartender. Someone I used to work
with taught me as much.
jpnChrName: このよだれ鶏と老酒の組み合わせがまた…… ふぅむ、客を連れてくるのも良さそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
このよだれ鶏と老酒の組み合わせがまた……
ふぅむ、客を連れてくるのも良さそうだな。

engChrName: Thankfully, Tyrell's the perfect place for that. I get all kinds of people coming up here for a drink.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, Tyrell's the perfect place for that. I get all
kinds of people coming up here for a drink.
jpnChrName: エステルたちにアガットたち、 クロスベルの面々にケビンたち……
jpnSearchText:
エステルたちにアガットたち、
クロスベルの面々にケビンたち……

engChrName: It always motivates me to make their visits more comfortable. ♪
engSearchText:
It always motivates me to make their visits
more comfortable. ♪
jpnChrName: フフ、何ならカシウスの旦那に オリビエたちなんかもアリかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、何ならカシウスの旦那に
オリビエたちなんかもアリかもしれん。

engChrName: Well, would you look at that? Good to see you're doing okay.
engSearchText:
Well, would you look at that? Good to see you're
doing okay.
jpnChrName: ってさすがに最後の面々は ヤバイんじゃねえのか……？
jpnSearchText:
ってさすがに最後の面々は
ヤバイんじゃねえのか……？

engChrName: My MAN! It's good to see you, brother! Looks like you got your posse all back together.
engSearchText:
My MAN! It's good to see you, brother! Looks like
you got your posse all back together.
jpnChrName: あら、アークライド所長。 また会ったわね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、アークライド所長。
また会ったわね。

engChrName: I'm still out here workin', shuttling people around who got separated from one and another.
engSearchText:
I'm still out here workin', shuttling people around
who got separated from one and another.
jpnChrName: ハハ、いつものそぞろ歩きか？
jpnSearchText: ハハ、いつものそぞろ歩きか？

engChrName: It ain't easy, I tell ya, but I'll see this job through to the end one way or another. My little way of repaying Dingo, you could say.
engSearchText:
It ain't easy, I tell ya, but I'll see this job through to
the end one way or another. My little way of repaying
Dingo, you could say.
jpnChrName: ま、そんな所だ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そんな所だ。

engChrName: I hear you. Good to have you around! Thanks for hanging in there.
engSearchText:
I hear you. Good to have you around! Thanks for
hanging in there.
jpnChrName: そっちはそっちでまた妙な場所で 二次会をやってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そっちはそっちでまた妙な場所で
二次会をやってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: HA HA! You bet! I got this aaall under control.
engSearchText: HA HA! You bet! I got this aaall under control.
jpnChrName: つーかそれぞれ支部やら本部に 戻ったんじゃなかったのか？
jpnSearchText:
つーかそれぞれ支部やら本部に
戻ったんじゃなかったのか？

engChrName: Just watch. With a car like this, I can steer around those monsters like nobody's business.
engSearchText:
Just watch. With a car like this, I can steer around
those monsters like nobody's business.
jpnChrName: ああ、それが珍しく追加依頼も 出ていなかったからすぐに解散してな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それが珍しく追加依頼も
出ていなかったからすぐに解散してな。

engChrName: We got plenty of people out there who still need help. If they need a driver, I'll be there.
engSearchText:
We got plenty of people out there who still need help.
If they need a driver, I'll be there.
jpnChrName: 私も同じくね。 それでお互い声を掛けたってわけ。
jpnSearchText:
私も同じくね。
それでお互い声を掛けたってわけ。

engChrName: Hang in there, brother! You and the rest of your posse. Once this is all over, we got to sit down for some drinks. Deal?
engSearchText:
Hang in there, brother! You and the rest of
your posse. Once this is all over, we got to sit down
for some drinks. Deal?
jpnChrName: さすが同門、仲が良いこった。 （実際どうなのかは今一判らんが……）
jpnSearchText:
さすが同門、仲が良いこった。
（実際どうなのかは今一判らんが……）

engChrName: Phew, this koushuiji together with this laojiu are something else. I'm going to have to start bringing clients over to this place.
engSearchText:
Phew, this koushuiji together with this laojiu are
something else. I'm going to have to start bringing
clients over to this place.
jpnChrName: まあ場所については、バックはともあれ、 料理（ツマミ）自体は絶品だからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ場所については、バックはともあれ、
料理（ツマミ）自体は絶品だからなぁ。

engChrName: Not to mention Estelle and Joshua, Agate and Tita, everyone in Crossbell. And, of course, Kevin and Ries.
engSearchText:
Not to mention Estelle and Joshua, Agate and Tita,
everyone in Crossbell. And, of course, Kevin
and Ries.
jpnChrName: ま、確かにバックはバックだが 料理（ツマミ）自体は絶品だからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、確かにバックはバックだが
料理（ツマミ）自体は絶品だからなぁ。

engChrName: Hell, I bet even Cassius, Olivier, and Schera would take a liking to this place.
engSearchText:
Hell, I bet even Cassius, Olivier, and Schera would
take a liking to this place.
jpnChrName: 龍來料理よりちょいとばかり、 味付けが濃いのはさておき。
jpnSearchText:
龍來料理よりちょいとばかり、
味付けが濃いのはさておき。

engChrName: I don't know if you're exactly gonna be able to invite those last three here...
engSearchText:
I don't know if you're exactly gonna be able to invite
those last three here...
jpnChrName: たまには麻辣を効かせた 煌都料理も悪くないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
たまには麻辣を効かせた
煌都料理も悪くないでしょう。

engChrName: Well, Mr. Arkride. I see we meet again.
engSearchText: Well, Mr. Arkride. I see we meet again.
jpnChrName: お互いの立場から距離があって、 黒月の動静も探れるという意味でも。
jpnSearchText:
お互いの立場から距離があって、
黒月の動静も探れるという意味でも。

engChrName: Out on another one of your famous strolls?
engSearchText: Out on another one of your famous strolls?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ室長と準Ｓ級…… マウオーナーもとんだ災難っつーか。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤ室長と準Ｓ級……
マウオーナーもとんだ災難っつーか。

engChrName: Yeah, you could say that.
engSearchText: Yeah, you could say that.
jpnChrName: アンタら、一人でも圧が強ぇんだから 揃っての来店は程々にしとけよ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタら、一人でも圧が強ぇんだから
揃っての来店は程々にしとけよ？

engChrName: You two picked an interesting place to have yourselves a little afterparty.
engSearchText:
You two picked an interesting place to have
yourselves a little afterparty.
jpnChrName: わはは、確かにそうだな。
jpnSearchText: わはは、確かにそうだな。

engChrName: I thought you were both reporting back to your workplaces.
engSearchText:
I thought you were both reporting back to
your workplaces.
jpnChrName: まあ、アルマータ消滅後の協定のためにも “威力偵察”は程々にしておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アルマータ消滅後の協定のためにも
“威力偵察”は程々にしておきましょうか。

engChrName: I did, but for once, there weren't any new jobs posted, so we all decided to call it a day—and now, here I am.
engSearchText:
I did, but for once, there weren't any new jobs posted,
so we all decided to call it a day—and now, here I am.
jpnChrName: （……ハッキリ言いやがったな。）
jpnSearchText: （……ハッキリ言いやがったな。）

engChrName: That's what happened to me as well. Then we reached out to one another and, as he put it, 'here we are.'
engSearchText:
That's what happened to me as well. Then we
reached out to one another and, as he put it, 'here
we are.'
jpnChrName: （しかし痩せ狼の言う通り   どうも色気はなさそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（しかし痩せ狼の言う通り
どうも色気はなさそうだが……）

engChrName: Fair enough. Guess I shouldn't be that shocked knowing your shared history. (Even if I have to wonder if there's more to it...)
engSearchText:
Fair enough. Guess I shouldn't be that shocked
knowing your shared history.
(Even if I have to wonder if there's more to it...)
jpnChrName: （ま、首を突っ込むだけ野暮か。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、首を突っ込むだけ野暮か。）

engChrName: What can I say? Much as I might not be a fan of its 'affiliations,' the food itself's to die for. I love everything about it.
engSearchText:
What can I say? Much as I might not be a fan of its
'affiliations,' the food itself's to die for. I love
everything about it.
jpnChrName: そういえば近いうちに外国の“弟子”が 首都（イーディス）を訪ねてくる予定があってね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば近いうちに外国の“弟子”が
首都（イーディス）を訪ねてくる予定があってね。

engChrName: What can I say? Much as I might not be a fan of its 'affiliations,' the food itself's to die for. I love everything about it.
engSearchText:
What can I say? Much as I might not be a fan of its
'affiliations,' the food itself's to die for. I love
everything about it.
jpnChrName: 食べることに目がない連れがいるそうだから 連れてきたら喜ぶかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
食べることに目がない連れがいるそうだから
連れてきたら喜ぶかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Well, almost everything. They season their stuff a little stronger compared to what you'll find in Longlai, but other than that, no complaints.
engSearchText:
Well, almost everything. They season their stuff a
little stronger compared to what you'll find in
Longlai, but other than that, no complaints.
jpnChrName: （ハン……？　そういや帝国やリベールに   しばらく滞在してたみてぇだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……？　そういや帝国やリベールに
しばらく滞在してたみてぇだが。）

engChrName: That's Langport-style cuisine for you. They like their mala. Sometimes it's good for a change of pace.
engSearchText:
That's Langport-style cuisine for you. They like
their mala. Sometimes it's good for a change of pace.
jpnChrName: ユリアンは可愛い後輩だし 稽古くらいはつけてあげないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ユリアンは可愛い後輩だし
稽古くらいはつけてあげないとね。

engChrName: The restaurant allows us to detach ourselves from our positions, too. It doesn't hurt that it's also a good place to monitor Heiyue's movements.
engSearchText:
The restaurant allows us to detach ourselves from our
positions, too. It doesn't hurt that it's also a good
place to monitor Heiyue's movements.
jpnChrName: せっかくだからエレインとかラハド、 アルヴィスやレジーナも誘ってみよっかな？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだからエレインとかラハド、
アルヴィスやレジーナも誘ってみよっかな？

engChrName: Gotta say, I feel real bad for Mau as the owner, havin' a CID chief and what's effectively an S-rank bracer under the same roof.
engSearchText:
Gotta say, I feel real bad for Mau as the owner, havin'
a CID chief and what's effectively an S-rank bracer
under the same roof.
jpnChrName: 手分けして一通りの街区は回った。 “停まってない”住民は保護できたはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
手分けして一通りの街区は回った。
“停まってない”住民は保護できたはずだ。

engChrName: Just one of you in a room puts out a strong presence. Have some sympathy for the woman and try not to get in the habit of comin' too often.
engSearchText:
Just one of you in a room puts out a strong presence.
Have some sympathy for the woman and try not to
get in the habit of comin' too often.
jpnChrName: あとは例の作戦だが──
jpnSearchText: あとは例の作戦だが──

engChrName: Hahaha! You got me there. I guess we are a little imposing in a place like this.
engSearchText:
Hahaha! You got me there. I guess we are a little
imposing in a place like this.
jpnChrName: 空振りに終わる可能性もあるからな。 俺たちはそちらに備えておくつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
空振りに終わる可能性もあるからな。
俺たちはそちらに備えておくつもりだ。

engChrName: I suppose we can tone down these reconnaissance missions of ours in the interest of securing any future pacts once Almata is out of the picture.
engSearchText:
I suppose we can tone down these reconnaissance
missions of ours in the interest of securing any future
pacts once Almata is out of the picture.
jpnChrName: 無論アルマータを止められるのが最善ではある。 ……どうか任せたぞ、裏解決屋！
jpnSearchText:
無論アルマータを止められるのが最善ではある。
……どうか任せたぞ、裏解決屋！

engChrName: (Heh. Just gonna come out and say it, is she?)
engSearchText: (Heh. Just gonna come out and say it, is she?)
jpnChrName: ああ、全力は尽くさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、全力は尽くさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: (I agree with Direwolf on this one. Whatever she's up to seems like serious business, but...)
engSearchText:
(I agree with Direwolf on this one. Whatever she's up
to seems like serious business, but...)
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、アルヴィスさん。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます、アルヴィスさん。

engChrName: (...I won't poke my nose where it ain't wanted in this instance.)
engSearchText:
(...I won't poke my nose where it ain't wanted in
this instance.)
jpnChrName: クク、つーかお前も 大分丸くなったんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
クク、つーかお前も
大分丸くなったんじゃね？

engChrName: Oh, before I forget—you might be interested to hear that a certain disciple of mine from abroad should be stopping by Edith before long.
engSearchText:
Oh, before I forget—you might be interested to hear
that a certain disciple of mine from abroad should be
stopping by Edith before long.
jpnChrName: ええい、余計な茶々を入れるんじゃない！ いいか、真面目にやれよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ええい、余計な茶々を入れるんじゃない！
いいか、真面目にやれよ！？

engChrName: Apparently, she's bringing along a friend with quite the appetite. Maybe he'll get something out of this place if I take them here.
engSearchText:
Apparently, she's bringing along a friend with quite
the appetite. Maybe he'll get something out of this
place if I take them here.
jpnChrName: （ま、僕らもいつの間にか   それなりに信頼されてるみたいだね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、僕らもいつの間にか
それなりに信頼されてるみたいだね。）

engChrName: (Huh? I guess Kilika has spent her fair share of time in Erebonia and Liberl. Must've been how she landed herself that pupil, whoever she is.)
engSearchText:
(Huh? I guess Kilika has spent her fair share of time
in Erebonia and Liberl. Must've been how she landed
herself that pupil, whoever she is.)
jpnChrName: （えへへ、はいっ！）
jpnSearchText: （えへへ、はいっ！）

engChrName: I've got a soft spot for Julian since we come from the same school and all, so I suppose I can give him a little coaching.
engSearchText:
I've got a soft spot for Julian since we come from the
same school and all, so I suppose I can give him a
little coaching.
jpnChrName: （これも皆さんが   培ってきたものなのでしょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（これも皆さんが
培ってきたものなのでしょう。）

engChrName: Maybe I'll see if I can get Elaine, Lahad, Alvis, and Regina to join me. Make it a whole get-together.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll see if I can get Elaine, Lahad, Alvis, and
Regina to join me. Make it a whole get-together.
jpnChrName: ジンさんとも連絡が取れてね。 他の街区を回ってもらっているわ。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんとも連絡が取れてね。
他の街区を回ってもらっているわ。

engChrName: We split up and combed through all of the districts. Any civilians not frozen already should be under our protection now.
engSearchText:
We split up and combed through all of the districts.
Any civilians not frozen already should be under our
protection now.
jpnChrName: 少しは希望が見えてきたけど…… メルキオルという青年、やはり底が知れない。
jpnSearchText:
少しは希望が見えてきたけど……
メルキオルという青年、やはり底が知れない。

engChrName: Now we've just got the big operation coming up.
engSearchText: Now we've just got the big operation coming up.
jpnChrName: 突破できたとしても油断はしないでね。 お互い手を尽くしましょ！
jpnSearchText:
突破できたとしても油断はしないでね。
お互い手を尽くしましょ！

engChrName: Best case scenario, you guys are able to stop Almata. But we don't know what'll happen out there.
engSearchText:
Best case scenario, you guys are able to stop Almata.
But we don't know what'll happen out there.
jpnChrName: エレインさんとはまだ 連絡が取れないけど……
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんとはまだ
連絡が取れないけど……

engChrName: It's possible it could all be for nothing. We'll do our best to prepare for the worst. Either way...good luck, guys!
engSearchText:
It's possible it could all be for nothing. We'll do our
best to prepare for the worst. Either way...good
luck, guys!
jpnChrName: きっと無事でいるはず。 私たちは信じて動くだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
きっと無事でいるはず。
私たちは信じて動くだけよ。

engChrName: Thanks, Alvis. We'll give it everything we've got and then some, trust us.
engSearchText:
Thanks, Alvis. We'll give it everything we've got and
then some, trust us.
jpnChrName: 突破できたとしても油断はしないでね。 お互い手を尽くしましょ！
jpnSearchText:
突破できたとしても油断はしないでね。
お互い手を尽くしましょ！

engChrName: What he said. We appreciate your support.
engSearchText: What he said. We appreciate your support.
jpnChrName: ハハ、警察と連携ってのも たまには悪くねえよなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、警察と連携ってのも
たまには悪くねえよなァ。

engChrName: Would you look at that? Dude finally learned how to chill out. Guess miracles do happen.
engSearchText:
Would you look at that? Dude finally learned how to
chill out. Guess miracles do happen.
jpnChrName: さて、そろそろ昼時── 人の流れも変わりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そろそろ昼時──
人の流れも変わりそうだな。

engChrName: I didn't ask for your opinion! Look, you've got a big job ahead of you. Just promise you'll take it seriously, all right?
engSearchText:
I didn't ask for your opinion! Look, you've got a big
job ahead of you. Just promise you'll take it seriously,
all right?
jpnChrName: こういう祭りごとは潮目が大事ってな。 他のメンツと連携しつつ、移動を始めるかね！
jpnSearchText:
こういう祭りごとは潮目が大事ってな。
他のメンツと連携しつつ、移動を始めるかね！

engChrName: (He might not admit it, but I suppose that's his way of showing he trusts us.)
engSearchText:
(He might not admit it, but I suppose that's his way
of showing he trusts us.)
jpnChrName: 心配すんな、連中は手なんざ出してこねえよ！
jpnSearchText: 心配すんな、連中は手なんざ出してこねえよ！

engChrName: (Yep! Let's take what we can get, heehee.)
engSearchText: (Yep! Let's take what we can get, heehee.)
jpnChrName: まァこういうのも社会勉強だよな。 クック、次はもうちょい刺激の強い所に行くかよ？
jpnSearchText:
まァこういうのも社会勉強だよな。
クック、次はもうちょい刺激の強い所に行くかよ？

engChrName: (It goes to show how much of a reputation you all have built for yourselves. You've earned it.)
engSearchText:
(It goes to show how much of a reputation you all
have built for yourselves. You've earned it.)
jpnChrName: そらよっ、こいつらがさっきの ひったくり犯と車泥棒だ。
jpnSearchText:
そらよっ、こいつらがさっきの
ひったくり犯と車泥棒だ。

engChrName: I managed to get in touch with Zin. I'm having him go around to the other districts as we speak.
engSearchText:
I managed to get in touch with Zin. I'm having him
go around to the other districts as we speak.
jpnChrName: あと迷子を母親ントコに返しといたぜ。 残りは何だ？　落とし物だったか？
jpnSearchText:
あと迷子を母親ントコに返しといたぜ。
残りは何だ？　落とし物だったか？

engChrName: Things are starting to look up just a little. Unfortunately, we can't put it past that Melchior to pull just about anything.
engSearchText:
Things are starting to look up just a little.
Unfortunately, we can't put it past that Melchior to
pull just about anything.
jpnChrName: す、凄すぎる…… ……じゃなくて、協力感謝します！！
jpnSearchText:
す、凄すぎる……
……じゃなくて、協力感謝します！！

engChrName: Even if you manage to succeed, don't think you can relax. Anything could still happen. Pull whatever stops you have to. I know I will!
engSearchText:
Even if you manage to succeed, don't think you
can relax. Anything could still happen. Pull whatever
stops you have to. I know I will!
jpnChrName: いや～どこぞの捜査官とは大違いや～！ なんなんこれ、シビれるわ～！
jpnSearchText:
いや～どこぞの捜査官とは大違いや～！
なんなんこれ、シビれるわ～！

engChrName: I still haven't been able to contact Elaine.
engSearchText: I still haven't been able to contact Elaine.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ結果発表だ、カルバード共和国 準遊撃士グレイ・アーノルド──
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ結果発表だ、カルバード共和国
準遊撃士グレイ・アーノルド──

engChrName: I'm sure she's all right. We just have to have faith and keep moving.
engSearchText:
I'm sure she's all right. We just have to have faith and
keep moving.
jpnChrName: ここに貴殿を正遊撃士に相応しいと認める。 ……おめでとう、試験は合格だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ここに貴殿を正遊撃士に相応しいと認める。
……おめでとう、試験は合格だぜ！

engChrName: Even if you manage to succeed, don't think you can relax. Anything could still happen. Pull whatever stops you have to. I know I will!
engSearchText:
Even if you manage to succeed, don't think you
can relax. Anything could still happen. Pull whatever
stops you have to. I know I will!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、先輩！！ ふぅ、最後はどうなる事かと思いましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、先輩！！
ふぅ、最後はどうなる事かと思いましたけど……

engChrName: You know, it's not the worst thing, teaming up with the cops on something like this.
engSearchText:
You know, it's not the worst thing, teaming up with
the cops on something like this.
jpnChrName: クハハ！　ラストに試験官が 殴り込んでくんのは定番だろうが！
jpnSearchText:
クハハ！　ラストに試験官が
殴り込んでくんのは定番だろうが！

engChrName: It's almost noon now. The flow of people's probably going to shift.
engSearchText:
It's almost noon now. The flow of people's probably
going to shift.
jpnChrName: まァだがよく凌いだ。 甘い所もあるが、今後の精進次第だな！
jpnSearchText:
まァだがよく凌いだ。
甘い所もあるが、今後の精進次第だな！

engChrName: When it comes to festivals like this, it's those junctions that can make or break things. Time to link up with the others and start moving!
engSearchText:
When it comes to festivals like this, it's those
junctions that can make or break things. Time to link
up with the others and start moving!
jpnChrName: ええ、本当に── 次は負けませんよ、ラハド先輩！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、本当に──
次は負けませんよ、ラハド先輩！

engChrName: Don't worry. Those guys won't harm a thing!
engSearchText: Don't worry. Those guys won't harm a thing!
jpnChrName: ハハッ、その意気だ！ 精々優秀な遊撃士になってくれよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ハハッ、その意気だ！
精々優秀な遊撃士になってくれよ！？

engChrName: This is all pretty educational in its own way, heh. Think I'm ready to turn the heat up and go somewhere a little hotter now.
engSearchText:
This is all pretty educational in its own way, heh.
Think I'm ready to turn the heat up and go
somewhere a little hotter now.
jpnChrName: さあ食えグレイ！　今日は奢りだぜ！！
jpnSearchText: さあ食えグレイ！　今日は奢りだぜ！！

engChrName: Here you are. I've got you that purse-snatcher and carjacker who were causing problems.
engSearchText:
Here you are. I've got you that purse-snatcher and
carjacker who were causing problems.
jpnChrName: それは嬉しいんですけど、先輩。 一つ引っかかってたんですが……
jpnSearchText:
それは嬉しいんですけど、先輩。
一つ引っかかってたんですが……

engChrName: Now to get that lost kid back to their mother. I know I'm forgetting something else, though... Did someone drop something? Was that it?
engSearchText:
Now to get that lost kid back to their mother. I know
I'm forgetting something else, though... Did someone
drop something? Was that it?
jpnChrName: （ここって黒月系列、ですよね……   僕たちが堂々としてていいんでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ここって黒月系列、ですよね……
僕たちが堂々としてていいんでしょうか……？）

engChrName: Incredible... Just incredible... Ack! Where are my manners? Thank you for all of your help! We sincerely appreciate it!
engSearchText:
Incredible... Just incredible... Ack! Where are
my manners? Thank you for all of your help!
We sincerely appreciate it!
jpnChrName: イマサラ何言ってんだテメー…… 入店した時点でチェックされてるに決まってんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
イマサラ何言ってんだテメー……
入店した時点でチェックされてるに決まってんだろ。

engChrName: Oooh! Seein' that kind of skill gives me goosebumps! He's nothin' like the investigators we're used to dealing with!
engSearchText:
Oooh! Seein' that kind of skill gives me goosebumps!
He's nothin' like the investigators we're used to
dealing with!
jpnChrName: だからこそじゃねえか。 クック、こいつは敵情視察も兼ねてるってワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそじゃねえか。
クック、こいつは敵情視察も兼ねてるってワケだ。

engChrName: It's time to announce the results. Junior bracer, Gray Arnold from the Republic of Calvard...
engSearchText:
It's time to announce the results. Junior bracer, Gray
Arnold from the Republic of Calvard...
jpnChrName: え……ええええっ──！？
jpnSearchText: え……ええええっ──！？

engChrName: Congratulations! You passed the test! We hereby recognize you as being qualified to serve as a senior bracer.
engSearchText:
Congratulations! You passed the test! We hereby
recognize you as being qualified to serve as a
senior bracer.
jpnChrName: ま、参ったなぁ…… 先輩も人が悪いんですから……！！
jpnSearchText:
ま、参ったなぁ……
先輩も人が悪いんですから……！！

engChrName: Thank you! Man, am I relieved... I was worried what was going to happen at the end there.
engSearchText:
Thank you! Man, am I relieved... I was worried what
was going to happen at the end there.
jpnChrName: 正遊撃士になるには 各支部の推薦状を集める必要があって……
jpnSearchText:
正遊撃士になるには
各支部の推薦状を集める必要があって……

engChrName: Gahaha! You shouldn't have! It's tradition for the instructor to wrap things up with a good, hard punch for the examinee.
engSearchText:
Gahaha! You shouldn't have! It's tradition for the
instructor to wrap things up with a good, hard punch
for the examinee.
jpnChrName: ようやく１つ認められたけど、 先は長そうです、ははは……
jpnSearchText:
ようやく１つ認められたけど、
先は長そうです、ははは……

engChrName: You sure took it like a champ, I'll give you that. You've got some growing to do still, so keep working at it! Got it?
engSearchText:
You sure took it like a champ, I'll give you that.
You've got some growing to do still, so keep working
at it! Got it?
jpnChrName: でもこの道を進んでいけば、必ず── ……ふう、気合を入れて行かないとな……！
jpnSearchText:
でもこの道を進んでいけば、必ず──
……ふう、気合を入れて行かないとな……！

engChrName: Right! I won't let you down, Lahad!
engSearchText: Right! I won't let you down, Lahad!
jpnChrName: 私は外交官として働いているのですが、 家族と会う機会も貴重なものでしてね……
jpnSearchText:
私は外交官として働いているのですが、
家族と会う機会も貴重なものでしてね……

engChrName: That's the spirit! Keep up that attitude and you'll turn out to be a fine bracer one day.
engSearchText:
That's the spirit! Keep up that attitude and you'll turn
out to be a fine bracer one day.
jpnChrName: その分、帰国する度に娘の成長を 一層実感できるという楽しみもありますが。
jpnSearchText:
その分、帰国する度に娘の成長を
一層実感できるという楽しみもありますが。

engChrName: Eat up, Gray! Today's on me!
engSearchText: Eat up, Gray! Today's on me!
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、こうして会える機会は ずっと大切にしていきたいものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、こうして会える機会は
ずっと大切にしていきたいものですよ。

engChrName: That's really nice of you. I appreciate it! But there's one thing that's bothering me a little...
engSearchText:
That's really nice of you. I appreciate it! But there's
one thing that's bothering me a little...
jpnChrName: こうして頻繁に帰ってきてくれるのは嬉しいけど 夫も行ったり来たりで疲れないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
こうして頻繁に帰ってきてくれるのは嬉しいけど
夫も行ったり来たりで疲れないかしら。

engChrName: (This is a Heiyue restaurant, isn't it? Is it really such a good idea for people like us to be here so out in the open?)
engSearchText:
(This is a Heiyue restaurant, isn't it? Is it really such a
good idea for people like us to be here so out in
the open?)
jpnChrName: エレボニア帝国に赴任していた頃は 全然会えなかったのもあるのでしょうけど……
jpnSearchText:
エレボニア帝国に赴任していた頃は
全然会えなかったのもあるのでしょうけど……

engChrName: What're you talking about? You're still worried about THAT? Don't you realize they already vetted us as soon as we walked through the door?
engSearchText:
What're you talking about? You're still worried
about THAT? Don't you realize they already vetted
us as soon as we walked through the door?
jpnChrName: 妻として家族として 無理だけはしないで欲しいわね。
jpnSearchText:
妻として家族として
無理だけはしないで欲しいわね。

engChrName: 'Sides, who's to say we didn't also come here to do a little espionage and see what the other guys are up to, hmm?
engSearchText:
'Sides, who's to say we didn't also come here to do a
little espionage and see what the other guys are up
to, hmm?
jpnChrName: パパが帝国にいってた時のことは あんまりおぼえてないけど……
jpnSearchText:
パパが帝国にいってた時のことは
あんまりおぼえてないけど……

engChrName: What...? What?! WHAAAT?!
engSearchText: What...? What?! WHAAAT?!
jpnChrName: アミア、パパのために 絵を描いたのはおぼえてるわ。
jpnSearchText:
アミア、パパのために
絵を描いたのはおぼえてるわ。

engChrName: Y-You've got to be kidding me! I had no idea that's what you had in mind. You play a lot dirtier than I thought!
engSearchText:
Y-You've got to be kidding me! I had no idea that's
what you had in mind. You play a lot dirtier than
I thought!
jpnChrName: パパが帰って来たら、ママも一緒に 家族で遊びに行きたいなって思ってたっけ……
jpnSearchText:
パパが帰って来たら、ママも一緒に
家族で遊びに行きたいなって思ってたっけ……

engChrName: In order to become a senior bracer, you have to get recommendations from every branch.
engSearchText:
In order to become a senior bracer, you have to get
recommendations from every branch.
jpnChrName: さあ、今日は一日付き合うよ、 アミアにナディア。
jpnSearchText:
さあ、今日は一日付き合うよ、
アミアにナディア。

engChrName: I finally got my first one! I have a long road ahead of me before I get the rest, though. Ahaha...ha.
engSearchText:
I finally got my first one! I have a long road ahead of
me before I get the rest, though. Ahaha...ha.
jpnChrName: 前よりは帰国しやすくなったとはいえ、 三人で休日を過ごせる機会は大切にしたいしね。
jpnSearchText:
前よりは帰国しやすくなったとはいえ、
三人で休日を過ごせる機会は大切にしたいしね。

engChrName: Still, as long as I keep at it, I know I'll become a senior bracer one day! Just have to stay energized and keep on trucking!
engSearchText:
Still, as long as I keep at it, I know I'll become a
senior bracer one day! Just have to stay energized and
keep on trucking!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうねクレオさん。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとうねクレオさん。

engChrName: I work as a diplomat, so it's rare for me to get any time to see my family.
engSearchText:
I work as a diplomat, so it's rare for me to get any
time to see my family.
jpnChrName: でも、頻繁に行き来するのも疲れるだろうし 気は使いすぎなくて大丈夫よ？
jpnSearchText:
でも、頻繁に行き来するのも疲れるだろうし
気は使いすぎなくて大丈夫よ？

engChrName: On the flip side, it's fun to discover just how much my daughter has grown since I last saw her whenever I come home.
engSearchText:
On the flip side, it's fun to discover just how much
my daughter has grown since I last saw her whenever
I come home.
jpnChrName: ほら、アミアももう６歳になったし……
jpnSearchText: ほら、アミアももう６歳になったし……

engChrName: Either way, it goes without saying, I'll always cherish these chances we have to get together and be whole.
engSearchText:
Either way, it goes without saying, I'll always cherish
these chances we have to get together and be whole.
jpnChrName: いやいや、別に気なんか使っていないよ。
jpnSearchText: いやいや、別に気なんか使っていないよ。

engChrName: I really appreciate my husband coming back home to see us more frequently, but I worry the constant back and forth is wearing him out.
engSearchText:
I really appreciate my husband coming back home to
see us more frequently, but I worry the constant back
and forth is wearing him out.
jpnChrName: クロスベルの領事館配属になってから、 本当に出入国の手間も減ったし……
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルの領事館配属になってから、
本当に出入国の手間も減ったし……

engChrName: Don't get me wrong—it's absolutely better than when he was stationed in Erebonia. We couldn't see him at all while he was out there.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong—it's absolutely better than when
he was stationed in Erebonia. We couldn't see him at
all while he was out there.
jpnChrName: 何より、育ち盛りだからこそ小まめに アミアの顔を見ておきたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
何より、育ち盛りだからこそ小まめに
アミアの顔を見ておきたいんだ。

engChrName: I just don't want him to push himself too hard as his wife, that's all.
engSearchText:
I just don't want him to push himself too hard as his
wife, that's all.
jpnChrName: パパ！　アミア、映画みたーい！
jpnSearchText: パパ！　アミア、映画みたーい！

engChrName: I don't really remember when Daddy went to Erebonia.
engSearchText:
I don't really remember when Daddy went
to Erebonia.
jpnChrName: はは、良いとも。 食事がすんだら一緒に行こうか！
jpnSearchText:
はは、良いとも。
食事がすんだら一緒に行こうか！

engChrName: But I remember drawing him a picture!
engSearchText: But I remember drawing him a picture!
jpnChrName: あのお二人は、一見対照的ですが── とても素敵なペアですね……！
jpnSearchText:
あのお二人は、一見対照的ですが──
とても素敵なペアですね……！

engChrName: I think all I wanted was to play together as a family once he came back. Him, me, and Mommy.
engSearchText:
I think all I wanted was to play together as a family
once he came back. Him, me, and Mommy.
jpnChrName: 一体どちらがどちらを…… うーん、想像が捗りますけど……
jpnSearchText:
一体どちらがどちらを……
うーん、想像が捗りますけど……

engChrName: Well, you're stuck with me all day, ladies.
engSearchText: Well, you're stuck with me all day, ladies.
jpnChrName: ……といけません、つい悪い癖が……！
jpnSearchText: ……といけません、つい悪い癖が……！

engChrName: I know I've been able to come home more lately, but I still want to make every minute of this holiday count! So I'm spending it all with you two.
engSearchText:
I know I've been able to come home more lately,
but I still want to make every minute of this holiday
count! So I'm spending it all with you two.
jpnChrName: 空の女神よ、罪深き私を どうかお許しください……
jpnSearchText:
空の女神よ、罪深き私を
どうかお許しください……

engChrName: Heehee. Aww, that's so sweet, Culleo.
engSearchText: Heehee. Aww, that's so sweet, Culleo.
jpnChrName: ああ、お二人は一体どちらがどちらを…… うーん、想像が捗りますけど……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お二人は一体どちらがどちらを……
うーん、想像が捗りますけど……

engChrName: You really don't have to fret so much about us, really. All that constant traveling to and from here must be getting to you.
engSearchText:
You really don't have to fret so much about us, really.
All that constant traveling to and from here must be
getting to you.
jpnChrName: ……それだけに……たまにいる、 あの空気を読んでいない方の存在はどうにも……
jpnSearchText:
……それだけに……たまにいる、
あの空気を読んでいない方の存在はどうにも……

engChrName: Look at Amia. She's six now. She's doing okay.
engSearchText: Look at Amia. She's six now. She's doing okay.
jpnChrName: っていけません！　このような考え、 シスターとしてあるまじき事です──！
jpnSearchText:
っていけません！　このような考え、
シスターとしてあるまじき事です──！

engChrName: No, no, no! This is about me fretting over you two! I wouldn't have it any other way.
engSearchText:
No, no, no! This is about me fretting over you two!
I wouldn't have it any other way.
jpnChrName: フィー先輩を始め、《Ⅶ組》の先輩たちには 本当にお世話になっていて。
jpnSearchText:
フィー先輩を始め、《Ⅶ組》の先輩たちには
本当にお世話になっていて。

engChrName: The nice thing about getting assigned to the Crossbell Consulate is that it's much easier for me to travel in and out. Much less paperwork.
engSearchText:
The nice thing about getting assigned to the
Crossbell Consulate is that it's much easier for me to
travel in and out. Much less paperwork.
jpnChrName: 共和国に留学する際にも 沢山の助言をいただきました。
jpnSearchText:
共和国に留学する際にも
沢山の助言をいただきました。

engChrName: Plus you're right! Amia is six! How could I not come and see my daughter's beautiful little face now that she's growing up fast?
engSearchText:
Plus you're right! Amia is six! How could I not come
and see my daughter's beautiful little face now that
she's growing up fast?
jpnChrName: リィン教官の後押しもあって実現した形ですね。 期待に応えられるよう、精一杯頑張ります！
jpnSearchText:
リィン教官の後押しもあって実現した形ですね。
期待に応えられるよう、精一杯頑張ります！

engChrName: Daddy! I wanna see a movie!
engSearchText: Daddy! I wanna see a movie!
jpnChrName: 同窓生の皆さんも親切ですし、 カルバードに留学して良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
同窓生の皆さんも親切ですし、
カルバードに留学して良かったです。

engChrName: Haha, okay, sweetheart. Once we're done eating, we'll all go see a movie together.
engSearchText:
Haha, okay, sweetheart. Once we're done eating,
we'll all go see a movie together.
jpnChrName: 国交が正常化したとはいえ時期尚早…… そんな意見もありましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
国交が正常化したとはいえ時期尚早……
そんな意見もありましたけど。

engChrName: Those two might look like polar opposites at first glance, but they actually make for an amazing pair!
engSearchText:
Those two might look like polar opposites at first
glance, but they actually make for an amazing pair!
jpnChrName: こうして同級生たちと 有意義な時間が過ごせる事に感謝ですね。
jpnSearchText:
こうして同級生たちと
有意義な時間が過ごせる事に感謝ですね。

engChrName: Now who's going to make the first move, huh? Oooh, my imagination is already running wild with the possibilities!
engSearchText:
Now who's going to make the first move, huh?
Oooh, my imagination is already running wild with
the possibilities!
jpnChrName: （国交が正常化……か。   なるほど、この金髪君ってのは……）
jpnSearchText:
（国交が正常化……か。
なるほど、この金髪君ってのは……）

engChrName: ...No! Bad Philia! Bad Philia! I almost fell back into my bad habit!
engSearchText:
...No! Bad Philia! Bad Philia! I almost fell back into
my bad habit!
jpnChrName: （はい、ユリアン君は今年から始まった   エレボニア帝国との交換留学生なんです。）
jpnSearchText:
（はい、ユリアン君は今年から始まった
エレボニア帝国との交換留学生なんです。）

engChrName: Goddess, I beg of you, forgive this wretched, sinful soul...
engSearchText:
Goddess, I beg of you, forgive this wretched,
sinful soul...
jpnChrName: （難しい立場でもあると思いますけど……   私たちとはいつも仲良くしていますね。）
jpnSearchText:
（難しい立場でもあると思いますけど……
私たちとはいつも仲良くしていますね。）

engChrName: *sigh* Which one is going to make the first move? I can imagine how this might play out, but the suspense is killing me!
engSearchText:
*sigh* Which one is going to make the first move?
I can imagine how this might play out, but the
suspense is killing me!
jpnChrName: ユリアンも元気そうで安心した。 学校生活、順調みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
ユリアンも元気そうで安心した。
学校生活、順調みたいだね。

engChrName: That being said, people like that who are so oblivious drive me completely up...
engSearchText:
That being said, people like that who are so oblivious
drive me completely up...
jpnChrName: ええ、フィー先輩もお変わりなく。
jpnSearchText: ええ、フィー先輩もお変わりなく。

engChrName: No, I mustn't say it! It's wrong for a sister to even think like that! Bad Philia! Bad Philia!
engSearchText:
No, I mustn't say it! It's wrong for a sister to even
think like that! Bad Philia! Bad Philia!
jpnChrName: いつもお忙しそうですけど、またそのうち 稽古の方も付けてくださいね？
jpnSearchText:
いつもお忙しそうですけど、またそのうち
稽古の方も付けてくださいね？

engChrName: I really owe a lot to the older members of Class VII— especially Fie.
engSearchText:
I really owe a lot to the older members of Class VII—
especially Fie.
jpnChrName: ん、ユリアンのおねだりなら仕方ない。
jpnSearchText: ん、ユリアンのおねだりなら仕方ない。

engChrName: She gave me a ton of useful advice when I first came to the Republic to study abroad.
engSearchText:
She gave me a ton of useful advice when I first came
to the Republic to study abroad.
jpnChrName: どうせならエレインとかラハド、 アルヴィスやレジーナも誘ってみよっかな？
jpnSearchText:
どうせならエレインとかラハド、
アルヴィスやレジーナも誘ってみよっかな？

engChrName: Instructor Rean pushed me to come, too. I wouldn't be here without him. All the more reason for me to succeed so I don't let people like him down!
engSearchText:
Instructor Rean pushed me to come, too. I wouldn't
be here without him. All the more reason for me to
succeed so I don't let people like him down!
jpnChrName: 物騒な方向に 話が膨らんでるみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
物騒な方向に
話が膨らんでるみたいだが……

engChrName: I'm really glad I decided to study abroad in Calvard. All the alumni I've met have been really kind people.
engSearchText:
I'm really glad I decided to study abroad in Calvard.
All the alumni I've met have been really kind people.
jpnChrName: というか、お二人は お知り合いだったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
というか、お二人は
お知り合いだったんですか？

engChrName: Some people thought this trip was a little premature just because diplomatic relations are only normalized again on paper, but I don't care.
engSearchText:
Some people thought this trip was a little premature
just because diplomatic relations are only normalized
again on paper, but I don't care.
jpnChrName: ん、実はわたしの後輩にあたる。
jpnSearchText: ん、実はわたしの後輩にあたる。

engChrName: I'm just grateful I have this opportunity to spend meaningful time with other students like this at all.
engSearchText:
I'm just grateful I have this opportunity to spend
meaningful time with other students like this at all.
jpnChrName: 帝国の《トールズ士官学院》…… その現《Ⅶ組》の一人だね。
jpnSearchText:
帝国の《トールズ士官学院》……
その現《Ⅶ組》の一人だね。

engChrName: (Hmm... If he's talkin' about diplomatic relations, I'd put my money on him bein' Erebonian.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... If he's talkin' about diplomatic relations, I'd
put my money on him bein' Erebonian.)
jpnChrName: 在学時期は被ってないんですが フィー先輩たちにもお世話になっていて。
jpnSearchText:
在学時期は被ってないんですが
フィー先輩たちにもお世話になっていて。

engChrName: (Yes, he is. He's an exchange student who just came to our school this year.)
engSearchText:
(Yes, he is. He's an exchange student who just came
to our school this year.)
jpnChrName: 今の僕があるのは、教官と先輩たちの 数々の薫陶のお陰ですね♪
jpnSearchText:
今の僕があるのは、教官と先輩たちの
数々の薫陶のお陰ですね♪

engChrName: (It can't always be easy living here, but otherwise, we all get along with him great.)
engSearchText:
(It can't always be easy living here, but otherwise, we
all get along with him great.)
jpnChrName: そ、そうだったんですね…… しかも“教官”ってまさか……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだったんですね……
しかも“教官”ってまさか……

engChrName: Good to see you're doing great, Julian. Sounds like things are going well over at Aramis, too.
engSearchText:
Good to see you're doing great, Julian. Sounds like
things are going well over at Aramis, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、大戦時の英雄みてえだな。 そりゃまたとびきり濃い話だぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、大戦時の英雄みてえだな。
そりゃまたとびきり濃い話だぜ……

engChrName: Yep! I see you haven't changed a bit, either.
engSearchText: Yep! I see you haven't changed a bit, either.
jpnChrName: 卒業生も曲者揃いだもんね。 わたしが言うのもなんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
卒業生も曲者揃いだもんね。
わたしが言うのもなんだけど。

engChrName: I know you're always busy, but I hope you have time to coach me again sometime soon! That'd be really great!
engSearchText:
I know you're always busy, but I hope you have time
to coach me again sometime soon! That'd be
really great!
jpnChrName: ま、こっちにいる間は ちょくちょく会えると思うし。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こっちにいる間は
ちょくちょく会えると思うし。

engChrName: Sure, I can do that. Can't really say no when it's you.
engSearchText: Sure, I can do that. Can't really say no when it's you.
jpnChrName: また何かあったら連絡して。
jpnSearchText: また何かあったら連絡して。

engChrName: Maybe I'll see if I can get Elaine, Lahad, Alvis, and Regina to join us. Make it a whole get-together.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll see if I can get Elaine, Lahad, Alvis, and
Regina to join us. Make it a whole get-together.
jpnChrName: はい、引き続きよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: はい、引き続きよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: That sounds less like a get-together and more like a recipe for an incident, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
That sounds less like a get-together and more like a
recipe for an incident, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: オレもこの後はバイト入ってるが…… 母ちゃんも心配してっし、早めに上がるつもりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オレもこの後はバイト入ってるが……
母ちゃんも心配してっし、早めに上がるつもりだぜ。

engChrName: Not to change the subject, but you two know each other? I didn't realize that!
engSearchText:
Not to change the subject, but you two know
each other? I didn't realize that!
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、アニエスちゃんも気を付けてくれよ。 心配してんのはアルベールだけじゃないからな。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、アニエスちゃんも気を付けてくれよ。
心配してんのはアルベールだけじゃないからな。

engChrName: Yep. He goes to Thors Military Academy.
engSearchText: Yep. He goes to Thors Military Academy.
jpnChrName: この前映画の編集がしたくて レン先輩に教わってたのが役に立つなんて！
jpnSearchText:
この前映画の編集がしたくて
レン先輩に教わってたのが役に立つなんて！

engChrName: He's a member of Class VII there, to be exact, just like I was.
engSearchText:
He's a member of Class VII there, to be exact, just
like I was.
jpnChrName: 言われた通りにやれば、ちゃんと 通信の繋ぎくらいはできそうだよ！
jpnSearchText:
言われた通りにやれば、ちゃんと
通信の繋ぎくらいはできそうだよ！

engChrName: She went before I attended, but she and the other members have still done so much for me.
engSearchText:
She went before I attended, but she and the other
members have still done so much for me.
jpnChrName: 各街区から情報とか救援要請が来てるみたいだし ……頑張ってオペレーションしないと！！
jpnSearchText:
各街区から情報とか救援要請が来てるみたいだし
……頑張ってオペレーションしないと！！

engChrName: I wouldn't be the man I am today without all of the guidance of my awesome instructor and the other graduates!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be the man I am today without all of the
guidance of my awesome instructor and the
other graduates!
jpnChrName: ア、アニエス～っ！！ 良かった、無事だったんだ！！
jpnSearchText:
ア、アニエス～っ！！
良かった、無事だったんだ！！

engChrName: W-Wow, that's amazing! When you say 'instructor,' you don't happen to mean...?
engSearchText:
W-Wow, that's amazing! When you say 'instructor,'
you don't happen to mean...?
jpnChrName: 大変な事になってるって聞いて、あたし──
jpnSearchText: 大変な事になってるって聞いて、あたし──

engChrName: Oh, I'm sure he does mean the big hero of the war. This kid just gets more and more intriguing the longer we talk to him.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm sure he does mean the big hero of the war.
This kid just gets more and more intriguing the
longer we talk to him.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、シニョン。 でももう大丈夫、ヴァンさん達も来てくれたから。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、シニョン。
でももう大丈夫、ヴァンさん達も来てくれたから。

engChrName: I know I'm not one to talk, but it's safe to say everybody who comes out of Class VII is...unique, to say the least.
engSearchText:
I know I'm not one to talk, but it's safe to say
everybody who comes out of Class VII is...unique, to
say the least.
jpnChrName: とはいえ化け物共が消えたわけじゃねえ。 危険だから外には出ないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ化け物共が消えたわけじゃねえ。
危険だから外には出ないようにな。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm sure we'll run into each other a lot while you're here.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm sure we'll run into each other a lot while
you're here.
jpnChrName: は、はい……！ 分かりました、ここに居ます！！
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……！
分かりました、ここに居ます！！

engChrName: If anything comes up, feel free to hit me up. I'll be happy to listen.
engSearchText:
If anything comes up, feel free to hit me up. I'll be
happy to listen.
jpnChrName: スタッフさんが休める所を用意してる みたいだし……あたしも何か手伝おうかな。
jpnSearchText:
スタッフさんが休める所を用意してる
みたいだし……あたしも何か手伝おうかな。

engChrName: All right, I will! Thanks, Fie! Good to see you!
engSearchText: All right, I will! Thanks, Fie! Good to see you!
jpnChrName: ええ、それがよろしいかと。 皆様の事、よろしくお願いいたしますね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それがよろしいかと。
皆様の事、よろしくお願いいたしますね。

engChrName: I've got to go to my job after this, but I'm going to try and wrap things up there as quickly as I can. I'm too worried about my mom right now.
engSearchText:
I've got to go to my job after this, but I'm going to
try and wrap things up there as quickly as I can. I'm
too worried about my mom right now.
jpnChrName: 映画を見てたら突然映像が止まって── 周りの人たちまで“停まって”て……
jpnSearchText:
映画を見てたら突然映像が止まって──
周りの人たちまで“停まって”て……

engChrName: You be careful, too, all right, Agnès? Albert's not the only one who thinks about you, you know.
engSearchText:
You be careful, too, all right, Agnès? Albert's not the
only one who thinks about you, you know.
jpnChrName: も、もう何が何だかだけど とにかく無事で良かったよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
も、もう何が何だかだけど
とにかく無事で良かったよ～っ！！

engChrName: I never thought what Renne taught me when I wanted to edit my movie would come in handy here!
engSearchText:
I never thought what Renne taught me when I
wanted to edit my movie would come in handy here!
jpnChrName: あたしも動ける人とここで頑張るから……！ アニエスたちも、無事でいてね！！
jpnSearchText:
あたしも動ける人とここで頑張るから……！
アニエスたちも、無事でいてね！！

engChrName: As long as I do exactly what she said, I'm confident I can establish a communication connection!
engSearchText:
As long as I do exactly what she said, I'm confident I
can establish a communication connection!
jpnChrName: あれ、ライエルじゃん！？ こんな所で何してんの～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、ライエルじゃん！？
こんな所で何してんの～っ！？

engChrName: I've got information coming in from various districts and requests for help. Time to strap in and put this thing to work!
engSearchText:
I've got information coming in from various districts
and requests for help. Time to strap in and put this
thing to work!
jpnChrName: べ、べつにイカガワシイ理由じゃねーぞ？ バイトだバイト！　帰るトコなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
べ、べつにイカガワシイ理由じゃねーぞ？
バイトだバイト！　帰るトコなんだよ。

engChrName: Agnès! You're okay! Oh, I'm so relieved!
engSearchText: Agnès! You're okay! Oh, I'm so relieved!
jpnChrName: そこの楽器屋で週３働いてんのと、 ビルの清掃とか新聞配達もやってるしな。
jpnSearchText:
そこの楽器屋で週３働いてんのと、
ビルの清掃とか新聞配達もやってるしな。

engChrName: When I heard how bad things were, I was so scared for you!
engSearchText:
When I heard how bad things were, I was so scared
for you!
jpnChrName: へへ、この辺りはケッコー詳しいんだぜ？ シニョンも何度か見かけてるしよ！
jpnSearchText:
へへ、この辺りはケッコー詳しいんだぜ？
シニョンも何度か見かけてるしよ！

engChrName: Aww. Thanks, Chignon. I'm okay. I've got Van and everyone else with me now.
engSearchText:
Aww. Thanks, Chignon. I'm okay. I've got Van and
everyone else with me now.
jpnChrName: ええ～っ、そうだったんだ！ てかバイト掛け持ちしすぎじゃない！？
jpnSearchText:
ええ～っ、そうだったんだ！
てかバイト掛け持ちしすぎじゃない！？

engChrName: Don't think we're in the clear, though. Those monsters are still roaming out there. So stay inside for now, all right? It's too dangerous.
engSearchText:
Don't think we're in the clear, though.
Those monsters are still roaming out there. So stay
inside for now, all right? It's too dangerous.
jpnChrName: おう、学費も生活費も 自分で稼いでっからな！
jpnSearchText:
おう、学費も生活費も
自分で稼いでっからな！

engChrName: R-Right, okay! I won't move a single rege from this spot!
engSearchText:
R-Right, okay! I won't move a single rege from
this spot!
jpnChrName: プロバイターのライエルとは オレの事だぜい！！
jpnSearchText:
プロバイターのライエルとは
オレの事だぜい！！

engChrName: It looks like the staff here are setting up places for people to rest, too. Maybe I should go give them a hand.
engSearchText:
It looks like the staff here are setting up places for
people to rest, too. Maybe I should go give them
a hand.
jpnChrName: （……ん～、一瞬尊敬しかけたけど   やっぱりライエルはライエルだよね～。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ん～、一瞬尊敬しかけたけど
やっぱりライエルはライエルだよね～。）

engChrName: Yes, I think that would be an excellent idea. Please lend them whatever assistance they need. I'm certain they'll appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Yes, I think that would be an excellent idea.
Please lend them whatever assistance they need.
I'm certain they'll appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ライエルってそんなにバイトしてたんだね。 一瞬尊敬したけど……
jpnSearchText:
ライエルってそんなにバイトしてたんだね。
一瞬尊敬したけど……

engChrName: I was watching a movie when suddenly the screen stopped. In fact, it wasn't just the screen. The people around me were frozen, too!
engSearchText:
I was watching a movie when suddenly the
screen stopped. In fact, it wasn't just the screen.
The people around me were frozen, too!
jpnChrName: やっぱりライエルはライエルだねぇ。
jpnSearchText: やっぱりライエルはライエルだねぇ。

engChrName: I... I have no idea what's going on, but I'm so glad you're all okay!
engSearchText:
I... I have no idea what's going on, but I'm so glad
you're all okay!
jpnChrName: ってどーいう意味だよっ！？
jpnSearchText: ってどーいう意味だよっ！？

engChrName: I'm going to do whatever I can to help along with everybody else who can move. Stay safe out there, you guys!
engSearchText:
I'm going to do whatever I can to help along with
everybody else who can move. Stay safe out there,
you guys!
jpnChrName: ユリアン君の相談に乗りつつ あたしの行き先も決めないとね～！
jpnSearchText:
ユリアン君の相談に乗りつつ
あたしの行き先も決めないとね～！

engChrName: Lyle?! What are you doing in a place like this?!
engSearchText: Lyle?! What are you doing in a place like this?!
jpnChrName: 先月のサルバッド映画祭も行けなかったし、 どこか映画に関係した場所にしたいけど……
jpnSearchText:
先月のサルバッド映画祭も行けなかったし、
どこか映画に関係した場所にしたいけど……

engChrName: D-Don't get any funny ideas! I'm not trying to do anything weird! I'm just on my way home from work!
engSearchText:
D-Don't get any funny ideas! I'm not trying to do
anything weird! I'm just on my way home from work!
jpnChrName: う～ん、よく考えると これといって行きたい所も……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、よく考えると
これといって行きたい所も……

engChrName: I work at that instrument store three times a week, plus I clean buildings and deliver newspapers to people.
engSearchText:
I work at that instrument store three times a week,
plus I clean buildings and deliver newspapers
to people.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村なんかは好きな映画の舞台なんだけど 今回の候補地には入ってないんだよねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村なんかは好きな映画の舞台なんだけど
今回の候補地には入ってないんだよねぇ～。

engChrName: As a result, I know this area like the back of my hand these days, haha. I've even seen you around here a couple times!
engSearchText:
As a result, I know this area like the back of my hand
these days, haha. I've even seen you around here a
couple times!
jpnChrName: む、無念……サルバッドの映画祭こそは 絶対行こうと思ってたのに……
jpnSearchText:
む、無念……サルバッドの映画祭こそは
絶対行こうと思ってたのに……

engChrName: Really?! I never realized you were here so much! Wait, that's a lot of jobs to juggle! Isn't that too much to handle?
engSearchText:
Really?! I never realized you were here so much!
Wait, that's a lot of jobs to juggle! Isn't that too much
to handle?
jpnChrName: お父さんとお母さんが遠すぎるから ダメだって、許してくれなかったんだよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
お父さんとお母さんが遠すぎるから
ダメだって、許してくれなかったんだよ～！！

engChrName: Well, my tuition and room and board aren't going to pay for themselves. I do what I have to!
engSearchText:
Well, my tuition and room and board aren't going to
pay for themselves. I do what I have to!
jpnChrName: ふぇぇ……こうなったら 導力ネットの“実況”に期待するしか……！
jpnSearchText:
ふぇぇ……こうなったら
導力ネットの“実況”に期待するしか……！

engChrName: They call me the part-time pro for a reason, you know!
engSearchText:
They call me the part-time pro for a reason,
you know!
jpnChrName: お願いっ、全国の映画ファンのみんな！ どうかネットの掲示板に実況を書き込んで！！
jpnSearchText:
お願いっ、全国の映画ファンのみんな！
どうかネットの掲示板に実況を書き込んで！！

engChrName: (*sigh* And here I almost found myself respecting him a little for once. Turns out he's the same guy as ever.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* And here I almost found myself respecting
him a little for once. Turns out he's the same guy
as ever.)
jpnChrName: あはは……Ｚ１グランプリとかなら ネット中継されるのにね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……Ｚ１グランプリとかなら
ネット中継されるのにね。

engChrName: That's a lot of jobs you have, Lyle. At first, I was almost impressed, but...
engSearchText:
That's a lot of jobs you have, Lyle. At first, I was
almost impressed, but...
jpnChrName: うん、サルバッドの映画祭は今年からだから 中継されるか分からないんだよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
うん、サルバッドの映画祭は今年からだから
中継されるか分からないんだよ～っ！

engChrName: You're the same old Lyle as ever, it seems.
engSearchText: You're the same old Lyle as ever, it seems.
jpnChrName: いっけない、結局３本も観ちゃって 寮の門限ギリギリじゃ～ん！？
jpnSearchText:
いっけない、結局３本も観ちゃって
寮の門限ギリギリじゃ～ん！？

engChrName: Huh? Hey, what's that supposed to mean?!
engSearchText: Huh? Hey, what's that supposed to mean?!
jpnChrName: でもでも、やっぱりゴッチ作品は 何度見ても完成度が高いし……
jpnSearchText:
でもでも、やっぱりゴッチ作品は
何度見ても完成度が高いし……

engChrName: I'm going to ask Julian for some advice to see if he can help me figure out where to go next.
engSearchText:
I'm going to ask Julian for some advice to see if he
can help me figure out where to go next.
jpnChrName: ソバーキュリアスのニケ・マルソーも もはや怪演の域っていうか……！
jpnSearchText:
ソバーキュリアスのニケ・マルソーも
もはや怪演の域っていうか……！

engChrName: I wasn't able to go to Tharbad to see the film festival, so I want to visit some place that's movie-related.
engSearchText:
I wasn't able to go to Tharbad to see the film festival,
so I want to visit some place that's movie-related.
jpnChrName: むふー！　明日も休みだし 朝から映画館に入り浸るしか！！
jpnSearchText:
むふー！　明日も休みだし
朝から映画館に入り浸るしか！！

engChrName: Hmm... I can't really think of anywhere in particular no matter how hard I try.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I can't really think of anywhere in particular
no matter how hard I try.
jpnChrName: あ、アニエスじゃない、やっほー！ あれ、その人たちは？
jpnSearchText:
あ、アニエスじゃない、やっほー！
あれ、その人たちは？

engChrName: One of my favorite movies takes place in Creil, but that's not really somewhere I have in mind this time.
engSearchText:
One of my favorite movies takes place in Creil,
but that's not really somewhere I have in
mind this time.
jpnChrName: こんにちは、シニョン。 こちらはバイト関係の人たちで。
jpnSearchText:
こんにちは、シニョン。
こちらはバイト関係の人たちで。

engChrName: *sigh* It's no use. I had my heart so set on going to the Tharbad Film Festival after what happened with the one in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's no use. I had my heart so set on going to
the Tharbad Film Festival after what happened with
the one in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: シニョンは今日も 映画を観に来たんですか？
jpnSearchText:
シニョンは今日も
映画を観に来たんですか？

engChrName: But my mom and dad won't let me go to it! They say it's too far away!
engSearchText:
But my mom and dad won't let me go to it! They say
it's too far away!
jpnChrName: うんうん！　今日公開のタイトルが あるから見逃せなくってね！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん！　今日公開のタイトルが
あるから見逃せなくってね！

engChrName: *sob* This sucks! I guess I'll have to rely on people posting their impressions online about it to get anything fun out of it.
engSearchText:
*sob* This sucks! I guess I'll have to rely on people
posting their impressions online about it to get
anything fun out of it.
jpnChrName: でも上演時間が遅めだったんだよね～！
jpnSearchText: でも上演時間が遅めだったんだよね～！

engChrName: Please! To any Calvard cinephiles going to the festival! I'm begging you! Post about it on message bulletins so everyone can read what it's like!
engSearchText:
Please! To any Calvard cinephiles going to
the festival! I'm begging you! Post about it on
message bulletins so everyone can read what it's like!
jpnChrName: どーしよ、時間まで『ゴールデンブラッド』の ５周目を観るのもアリかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
どーしよ、時間まで『ゴールデンブラッド』の
５周目を観るのもアリかなぁ？

engChrName: Aww. That's a shame you can't go. Can't they broadcast the festival online like what they do for the Z1 Grand Prix?
engSearchText:
Aww. That's a shame you can't go. Can't they
broadcast the festival online like what they do for the
Z1 Grand Prix?
jpnChrName: でもでも、どうせなら噂の “ノーカット版”公開まで待つべきかも……
jpnSearchText:
でもでも、どうせなら噂の
“ノーカット版”公開まで待つべきかも……

engChrName: Maybe! I don't know if they're going to since it's their first year running the festival. It's pure agony not knowing these things! AUGH!
engSearchText:
Maybe! I don't know if they're going to since it's their
first year running the festival. It's pure agony not
knowing these things! AUGH!
jpnChrName: アニエス、どう思うっ！？
jpnSearchText: アニエス、どう思うっ！？

engChrName: Oh, crap! I've seen three movies tonight and it's almost curfew back at the dorm!
engSearchText:
Oh, crap! I've seen three movies tonight and it's
almost curfew back at the dorm!
jpnChrName: ふふ……シニョンの好きなようにで いいと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……シニョンの好きなようにで
いいと思うけど。

engChrName: But I can't help myself! Salvatore Gotti's movies are all just so perfect! I never get tired of watching them!
engSearchText:
But I can't help myself! Salvatore Gotti's movies are
all just so perfect! I never get tired of watching them!
jpnChrName: （う～ん、映画って人気があるんですね！）
jpnSearchText: （う～ん、映画って人気があるんですね！）

engChrName: And Nike Marceau's performance is so eerie, yet captivating in Sober Curious!
engSearchText:
And Nike Marceau's performance is so eerie, yet
captivating in Sober Curious!
jpnChrName: （まあ好きで好きで仕方ないって連中もいるな。   いわゆる映画通（シネフィル）ってヤツだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ好きで好きで仕方ないって連中もいるな。
いわゆる映画通（シネフィル）ってヤツだ。）

engChrName: Argh, SCREW IT! I've got nothing to do tomorrow! I'll come back to the theater tomorrow morning and hang out for as long as I can!
engSearchText:
Argh, SCREW IT! I've got nothing to do tomorrow!
I'll come back to the theater tomorrow morning and
hang out for as long as I can!
jpnChrName: そういえばアニエス、聞いた！？ メッセルダム映画祭は中止になっちゃったけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえばアニエス、聞いた！？
メッセルダム映画祭は中止になっちゃったけど……

engChrName: Hey, Agnès! Didn't expect to see you here! Who are those two?
engSearchText:
Hey, Agnès! Didn't expect to see you here! Who are
those two?
jpnChrName: 南のサルバッド市でも 別の映画祭が計画されてるんだって！
jpnSearchText:
南のサルバッド市でも
別の映画祭が計画されてるんだって！

engChrName: Hi, Chignon. This is my boss, Van, and my coworker, Feri.
engSearchText:
Hi, Chignon. This is my boss, Van, and my
coworker, Feri.
jpnChrName: くぅぅ～っ、そっちは 中止にならないといいよね～！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ～っ、そっちは
中止にならないといいよね～！！

engChrName: Are you here to watch another movie?
engSearchText: Are you here to watch another movie?
jpnChrName: サルバッドの方でも…… そうだったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの方でも……
そうだったんだ。

engChrName: You bet! There's a new movie coming out today and I wouldn't miss its premiere for the WORLD!
engSearchText:
You bet! There's a new movie coming out today and I
wouldn't miss its premiere for the WORLD!
jpnChrName: 少し先の話だったハズだが…… ま、無事開催されりゃいいがな。
jpnSearchText:
少し先の話だったハズだが……
ま、無事開催されりゃいいがな。

engChrName: The only problem is it starts really, really late.
engSearchText: The only problem is it starts really, really late.
jpnChrName: （えへへ、映画かぁ……   やっぱり面白そうかもっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（えへへ、映画かぁ……
やっぱり面白そうかもっ！）

engChrName: I'm not sure what I'll do to pass the time. Maybe I should watch Golden Blood for the fifth time?
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what I'll do to pass the time. Maybe I
should watch Golden Blood for the fifth time?
jpnChrName: 今日はお上りさんも沢山おって、 ええね、ええね～！！
jpnSearchText:
今日はお上りさんも沢山おって、
ええね、ええね～！！

engChrName: Or maybe I should just wait for the uncut version everyone's been raving about to come out. Hmm...
engSearchText:
Or maybe I should just wait for the uncut version
everyone's been raving about to come out. Hmm...
jpnChrName: どっかにエエお客さんはおらんかな～と。
jpnSearchText: どっかにエエお客さんはおらんかな～と。

engChrName: What do you think, Agnès? What's your opinion?!
engSearchText: What do you think, Agnès? What's your opinion?!
jpnChrName: 今日は記念祭サービスで 緊縛プレイが無料なんやで、皆楽しんでや～っ♪
jpnSearchText:
今日は記念祭サービスで
緊縛プレイが無料なんやで、皆楽しんでや～っ♪

engChrName: Ahaha... I don't think you can go wrong either way. You should do whatever you think will be most fun.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I don't think you can go wrong either way.
You should do whatever you think will be most fun.
jpnChrName: あれっ！？　こんな所に ダンディなお兄さんがおるやん～！
jpnSearchText:
あれっ！？　こんな所に
ダンディなお兄さんがおるやん～！

engChrName: (People really do like movies, huh?)
engSearchText: (People really do like movies, huh?)
jpnChrName: ええねええね♪　きっとウチの オンナノコたちも大喜びやでーっ！
jpnSearchText:
ええねええね♪　きっとウチの
オンナノコたちも大喜びやでーっ！

engChrName: (For some people, it's more than just like. They outright love 'em. Those sorts of diehards are called 'cinephiles.')
engSearchText:
(For some people, it's more than just like.
They outright love 'em. Those sorts of diehards are
called 'cinephiles.')
jpnChrName: ん？　ああ客引きか……
jpnSearchText: ん？　ああ客引きか……

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Did you hear the big news, Agnès?! The Messeldam Film Festival got canceled.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! Did you hear the big news, Agnès?!
The Messeldam Film Festival got canceled.
jpnChrName: 悪ィが気分じゃねえんだ。 他を当たってくれるか？
jpnSearchText:
悪ィが気分じゃねえんだ。
他を当たってくれるか？

engChrName: But they're planning a different one down south over in Tharbad! Isn't that great?!
engSearchText:
But they're planning a different one down south over
in Tharbad! Isn't that great?!
jpnChrName: なんや断り方もスマートやなぁ！ ええね、ますます気に入ったわ～っ♪
jpnSearchText:
なんや断り方もスマートやなぁ！
ええね、ますます気に入ったわ～っ♪

engChrName: Aaaah, I'm so EXCITED for it! I hope that one actually works out! I'm dying for something, anything over here!
engSearchText:
Aaaah, I'm so EXCITED for it! I hope that one
actually works out! I'm dying for something, anything
over here!
jpnChrName: せやったら気分の時に声かけてや。 兄さんには特別サービス、色々計らうで～！
jpnSearchText:
せやったら気分の時に声かけてや。
兄さんには特別サービス、色々計らうで～！

engChrName: Wow. They're doing something all the way down there, too? Huh... I had no idea.
engSearchText:
Wow. They're doing something all the way down
there, too? Huh... I had no idea.
jpnChrName: （この辺りに風俗店は出せないはずだが   ……違法営業の店でもあんのかねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（この辺りに風俗店は出せないはずだが
……違法営業の店でもあんのかねぇ。）

engChrName: It's not supposed to be for a little while yet. But yeah, fingers crossed it goes off without a hitch.
engSearchText:
It's not supposed to be for a little while yet. But yeah,
fingers crossed it goes off without a hitch.
jpnChrName: ウチのオンナノコたちね、 何がええって腰なんよ、腰！
jpnSearchText:
ウチのオンナノコたちね、
何がええって腰なんよ、腰！

engChrName: (Heehee. The more you guys talk about movies, the more curious you're making me! I've gotta see one!)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. The more you guys talk about movies, the
more curious you're making me! I've gotta see one!)
jpnChrName: クネクネ艶めかしゅう動くんや～！ ものごっつうエエ声で鳴きながらなぁ♪
jpnSearchText:
クネクネ艶めかしゅう動くんや～！
ものごっつうエエ声で鳴きながらなぁ♪

engChrName: So many people from out of town today! I love it!
engSearchText: So many people from out of town today! I love it!
jpnChrName: 兄さんにもぜひ堪能して欲しい！ これ本心やで～？
jpnSearchText:
兄さんにもぜひ堪能して欲しい！
これ本心やで～？

engChrName: Now to just find some folks who'll appreciate our kind of a fun time.
engSearchText:
Now to just find some folks who'll appreciate our
kind of a fun time.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、流石はヴァンさんです。 どれも本当に美味しそうですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、流石はヴァンさんです。
どれも本当に美味しそうですよね。

engChrName: Don't be shy, everyone! Bondage sessions are free for the festival! No better way to enjoy today than with some tight ropes, if you ask me!
engSearchText:
Don't be shy, everyone! Bondage sessions are free for
the festival! No better way to enjoy today than with
some tight ropes, if you ask me!
jpnChrName: あっ、他に急を要する依頼があれば そちらに当たって下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、他に急を要する依頼があれば
そちらに当たって下さいね。

engChrName: Well, look at you! I'm sure a good-looking guy like yourself could use some equally-attractive company!
engSearchText:
Well, look at you! I'm sure a good-looking guy like
yourself could use some equally-attractive company!
jpnChrName: でもスイーツ集めに関して ヴァンさん以上に適任の方はいないと思いますから。
jpnSearchText:
でもスイーツ集めに関して
ヴァンさん以上に適任の方はいないと思いますから。

engChrName: Hear me out! I can take you somewhere with a lot of gorgeous girls! They'd absolutely love to have you! You in, pal?
engSearchText:
Hear me out! I can take you somewhere with a lot of
gorgeous girls! They'd absolutely love to have you!
You in, pal?
jpnChrName: ふふ、どんなスイーツが揃うか 楽しみにさせて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どんなスイーツが揃うか
楽しみにさせて頂きますね。

engChrName: Oh, you must be a barker.
engSearchText: Oh, you must be a barker.
jpnChrName: ふふ、街中が活気にあふれていて 生徒の見回りも楽しかったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、街中が活気にあふれていて
生徒の見回りも楽しかったですよ。

engChrName: Sorry—I ain't in the mood for anything like that. Go try your luck on someone else.
engSearchText:
Sorry—I ain't in the mood for anything like that.
Go try your luck on someone else.
jpnChrName: 勿論、ヴァンさん達のお仕事の お手伝いもさせてもらいますから。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、ヴァンさん達のお仕事の
お手伝いもさせてもらいますから。

engChrName: Wow! Cool as a cucumber, even when he's shooting me down. The girls'd go crazy over you!
engSearchText:
Wow! Cool as a cucumber, even when he's shooting
me down. The girls'd go crazy over you!
jpnChrName: 交替する時は遠慮なく声をかけて下さいね。
jpnSearchText: 交替する時は遠慮なく声をかけて下さいね。

engChrName: Well, when you are in the mood, come talk to me, my man. I can set you up with our VIP package!
engSearchText:
Well, when you are in the mood, come talk to me,
my man. I can set you up with our VIP package!
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ。

engChrName: (There aren't supposed to be any adult businesses around here, but I guess that doesn't mean there can't be some operatin' under the radar.)
engSearchText:
(There aren't supposed to be any adult businesses
around here, but I guess that doesn't mean there can't
be some operatin' under the radar.)
jpnChrName: よう、見回りゴクローサン。
jpnSearchText: よう、見回りゴクローサン。

engChrName: If there's one thing our girls have got, it's amazing hips!
engSearchText:
If there's one thing our girls have got, it's
amazing hips!
jpnChrName: ハッ、そう言うお前さんは一人酒か？ さっそく黒芒街に行ってるかとも思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そう言うお前さんは一人酒か？
さっそく黒芒街に行ってるかとも思ってたが。

engChrName: They know how to twist and move them juuust right! And the sounds that they make with those silky smooth voices of theirs... Mm-mm!
engSearchText:
They know how to twist and move them juuust right!
And the sounds that they make with those silky
smooth voices of theirs... Mm-mm!
jpnChrName: クク、分かってるじゃねーか。 だが今日はツァオ達の話が引っかかってな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、分かってるじゃねーか。
だが今日はツァオ達の話が引っかかってな。

engChrName: You've gotta experience it for yourself, my man! And I'm not just saying that to get you in the door—I mean it!
engSearchText:
You've gotta experience it for yourself, my man!
And I'm not just saying that to get you in the door—I
mean it!
jpnChrName: ……これで《Ａ》を取り巻いてやがる 状況は見えて来た。
jpnSearchText:
……これで《Ａ》を取り巻いてやがる
状況は見えて来た。

engChrName: Everything looks so delicious! I knew you wouldn't let us down, Van.
engSearchText:
Everything looks so delicious! I knew you wouldn't let
us down, Van.
jpnChrName: 後は目的さえ分かりゃ、 ぶっ潰してやるだけなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
後は目的さえ分かりゃ、
ぶっ潰してやるだけなんだが。

engChrName: If there's anything urgent you have to take care of first, don't worry about me! You can focus on that.
engSearchText:
If there's anything urgent you have to take care of
first, don't worry about me! You can focus on that.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、勝手に先走んなよ？
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、勝手に先走んなよ？

engChrName: I'm excited to go sweets hunting with you around town, though.
engSearchText:
I'm excited to go sweets hunting with you around
town, though.
jpnChrName: 何か分かればこっちにも連絡が来るだろ。 面倒事を押し付けられた感じも否めねえがな。
jpnSearchText:
何か分かればこっちにも連絡が来るだろ。
面倒事を押し付けられた感じも否めねえがな。

engChrName: After all, I can't imagine there's anyone better at it in all of Edith than you, Van, heehee.
engSearchText:
After all, I can't imagine there's anyone better at it in
all of Edith than you, Van, heehee.
jpnChrName: そいつは違いねえ。
jpnSearchText: そいつは違いねえ。

engChrName: I had a lot of fun checking in on the other students earlier. The city is so alive today!
engSearchText:
I had a lot of fun checking in on the other
students earlier. The city is so alive today!
jpnChrName: ……ま、焦ったって仕方ねえって事は分かってる。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、焦ったって仕方ねえって事は分かってる。

engChrName: Of course, I'm here to help you and everyone else with any work that comes up, too.
engSearchText:
Of course, I'm here to help you and everyone else
with any work that comes up, too.
