jpnChrName: 次に《Ａ》やら《庭園（ガーデン）》とやりあう時の為に 美味いモンでも食って英気を養っておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次に《Ａ》やら《庭園（ガーデン）》とやりあう時の為に
美味いモンでも食って英気を養っておくとするか。

engChrName: If you need to bring me in, that's okay. Just come talk to me anytime.
engSearchText:
If you need to bring me in, that's okay. Just come talk
to me anytime.
jpnChrName: 奢ってくれてもいいんだぜ？
jpnSearchText: 奢ってくれてもいいんだぜ？

engChrName: Got'cha. Will do. Thanks for being so flexible, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Will do. Thanks for being so
flexible, Agnès.
jpnChrName: 自分の給料で払いやがれ。
jpnSearchText: 自分の給料で払いやがれ。

engChrName: Hey. Been keeping busy with those patrols?
engSearchText: Hey. Been keeping busy with those patrols?
jpnChrName: 今日は色々カオスだったが 見合うだけの収穫もあったしな。
jpnSearchText:
今日は色々カオスだったが
見合うだけの収穫もあったしな。

engChrName: About as busy as you've been with that drinking, it seems. I thought you would've made a beeline for the Blacklight District or something.
engSearchText:
About as busy as you've been with that drinking,
it seems. I thought you would've made a beeline for
the Blacklight District or something.
jpnChrName: せいぜい美味いモンでも食って 英気を養っておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい美味いモンでも食って
英気を養っておくとするか。

engChrName: You know me too damn well at this point. Yeah, I'd be down there right now if it weren't for what Cao and the rest said earlier.
engSearchText:
You know me too damn well at this point. Yeah, I'd
be down there right now if it weren't for what Cao
and the rest said earlier.
jpnChrName: マジで終わった……あたしの記念祭にＥＧＣ…… もうどうしようもないっしょ、これ……
jpnSearchText:
マジで終わった……あたしの記念祭にＥＧＣ……
もうどうしようもないっしょ、これ……

engChrName: We're finally about to close in on A after all this time, the bastards.
engSearchText:
We're finally about to close in on A after all this
time, the bastards.
jpnChrName: 何とかしようとして頑張ってる人もいるけど、 あたしに何かできるでもないし……
jpnSearchText:
何とかしようとして頑張ってる人もいるけど、
あたしに何かできるでもないし……

engChrName: Once we know what their end-game is, all we have to do is move in and crush 'em.
engSearchText:
Once we know what their end-game is, all we have to
do is move in and crush 'em.
jpnChrName: はぁ……どうして、せっかくＥＧＣに当たったと 思ってたのにこんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……どうして、せっかくＥＧＣに当たったと
思ってたのにこんな事に……

engChrName: Hey now. Don't get too ahead of yourself, all right?
engSearchText: Hey now. Don't get too ahead of yourself, all right?
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……よ、ようやく 頭の中整理できてきたかも……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、はぁ……よ、ようやく
頭の中整理できてきたかも……

engChrName: Once they know somethin', I'm sure they'll be in touch. I know we don't have the most fun job in the meantime, but it is what it is.
engSearchText:
Once they know somethin', I'm sure they'll be
in touch. I know we don't have the most fun job in
the meantime, but it is what it is.
jpnChrName: ってあれ、でも窓の外見たら…… さっきより何か落ち着いてるっぽい？
jpnSearchText:
ってあれ、でも窓の外見たら……
さっきより何か落ち着いてるっぽい？

engChrName: You've got that right.
engSearchText: You've got that right.
jpnChrName: せ、せっかく状況が飲み込めそうだったのに、 何かまた変わっちゃうの～！？
jpnSearchText:
せ、せっかく状況が飲み込めそうだったのに、
何かまた変わっちゃうの～！？

engChrName: ...Don't get me wrong, chief. I know trying to rush things is just asking for trouble. I can be hotheaded, but I'm not an idiot.
engSearchText:
...Don't get me wrong, chief. I know trying to rush
things is just asking for trouble. I can be hotheaded,
but I'm not an idiot.
jpnChrName: ひ、ひぃぃいいい……！ なに、何なのあの怪物は！？
jpnSearchText:
ひ、ひぃぃいいい……！
なに、何なのあの怪物は！？

engChrName: Think I'm gonna order some food, too. Make sure I'm recharged when it's time for us to go in and kick A's and the Gardens' asses.
engSearchText:
Think I'm gonna order some food, too. Make sure
I'm recharged when it's time for us to go in and kick
A's and the Gardens' asses.
jpnChrName: 何か動かなくなっちゃった人もいるし、 何が何だか……
jpnSearchText:
何か動かなくなっちゃった人もいるし、
何が何だか……

engChrName: What do you say? Any way I can get you to treat your lackey to a little something extra? Promise I won't call you an old man for five minutes.
engSearchText:
What do you say? Any way I can get you to treat your
lackey to a little something extra? Promise I won't call
you an old man for five minutes.
jpnChrName: あ、ＥＧＣ……！　ＥＧＣ、ちゃんと 開催されるのこれでぇぇええ！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ＥＧＣ……！　ＥＧＣ、ちゃんと
開催されるのこれでぇぇええ！？

engChrName: Sorry, punk. I ain't made of money. You'll have to pay for whatever you want on your own mira.
engSearchText:
Sorry, punk. I ain't made of money. You'll have to pay
for whatever you want on your own mira.
jpnChrName: ～♪ 今夜は待ちに待ったＥＧＣ！
jpnSearchText:
～♪
今夜は待ちに待ったＥＧＣ！

engChrName: Today's been a hell of a crazy day, but at least we got enough out of it to make all that bullshit worth it.
engSearchText:
Today's been a hell of a crazy day, but at least we got
enough out of it to make all that bullshit worth it.
jpnChrName: 記念祭の締め括りと言えば、 あたし的にはやっぱりコレよね～♪
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の締め括りと言えば、
あたし的にはやっぱりコレよね～♪

engChrName: Think I'm gonna order some food. Make sure I'm really recharged for whatever's coming up next.
engSearchText:
Think I'm gonna order some food. Make sure I'm
really recharged for whatever's coming up next.
jpnChrName: 何といっても今年は現地で見れるし、 この目に焼き付けて来ないと！
jpnSearchText:
何といっても今年は現地で見れるし、
この目に焼き付けて来ないと！

engChrName: It's over. Everything's ruined. The festival, the EGC, everything...
engSearchText:
It's over. Everything's ruined. The festival, the
EGC, everything...
jpnChrName: いやあ、今までは中継でガマンしてたけど、 本当にまさか抽選に当たるなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、今までは中継でガマンしてたけど、
本当にまさか抽選に当たるなんて……！

engChrName: I wish I could help like some of the others, but it's not like I have anything to offer at a time like this.
engSearchText:
I wish I could help like some of the others, but it's not
like I have anything to offer at a time like this.
jpnChrName: うそ……ＥＧＣの抽選、当たってるじゃん…… 倍率凄いし、ダメ元って思って応募したのに……
jpnSearchText:
うそ……ＥＧＣの抽選、当たってるじゃん……
倍率凄いし、ダメ元って思って応募したのに……

engChrName: *sigh* Just when I thought my luck was turning up with that lottery, this had to happen.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Just when I thought my luck was turning up
with that lottery, this had to happen.
jpnChrName: いやー、まさかあのＥＧＣを生で見に行けるなんて！ アタシ、結構運いい方なんじゃない！？
jpnSearchText:
いやー、まさかあのＥＧＣを生で見に行けるなんて！
アタシ、結構運いい方なんじゃない！？

engChrName: *pant* *pant* I... I think I'm finally starting to make sense of everything.
engSearchText:
*pant* *pant* I... I think I'm finally starting to make
sense of everything.
jpnChrName: スカウト待ちでダメだった分、女神様が 運をこっちに振り分けてくれたのかしらね、きっと！
jpnSearchText:
スカウト待ちでダメだった分、女神様が
運をこっちに振り分けてくれたのかしらね、きっと！

engChrName: Wait. Now that I'm looking at things outside, doesn't it seem like things have calmed down? Or am I imagining things?
engSearchText:
Wait. Now that I'm looking at things outside, doesn't
it seem like things have calmed down? Or am I
imagining things?
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言が解除されたのは良いけど…… まさかクインシー社の社長が絡んでたなんて！
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言が解除されたのは良いけど……
まさかクインシー社の社長が絡んでたなんて！

engChrName: Just when I thought things were finally starting to make sense, more crazy stuff happens?! Give a girl a break!
engSearchText:
Just when I thought things were finally starting to
make sense, more crazy stuff happens?! Give a girl
a break!
jpnChrName: あそこの高級なお菓子、一度食べてみたかったのに ……これじゃあ気まずくて食べれないわ！
jpnSearchText:
あそこの高級なお菓子、一度食べてみたかったのに
……これじゃあ気まずくて食べれないわ！

engChrName: EEEEEEK! Wh-What are those monsters?!
engSearchText: EEEEEEK! Wh-What are those monsters?!
jpnChrName: しかも、あのエレインがあの会社の…… そういえば前にも何かに書いてあったかも……
jpnSearchText:
しかも、あのエレインがあの会社の……
そういえば前にも何かに書いてあったかも……

engChrName: I don't get what's going on. Some people can't seem to move at all.
engSearchText:
I don't get what's going on. Some people can't seem
to move at all.
jpnChrName: いや……マジで無いでしょ、村一つ消えるとか…… え、映画の宣伝か何かだよね……？
jpnSearchText:
いや……マジで無いでしょ、村一つ消えるとか……
え、映画の宣伝か何かだよね……？

engChrName: Oh, no! I forgot! The EGC! Are they still gonna be able to hold it this year after all this? Is that even possible?!
engSearchText:
Oh, no! I forgot! The EGC! Are they still gonna be
able to hold it this year after all this? Is that
even possible?!
jpnChrName: マジで冗談だって言ってよ誰か…… アタシが生きてるうちにこんな事があるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
マジで冗談だって言ってよ誰か……
アタシが生きてるうちにこんな事があるなんて……

engSearchText:
Heehee! Tonight's the EGC! I've been so excited
for it!
jpnChrName: なんてこと、マクシムがあの ジュディス・ランスターをどうにかしたって！？
jpnSearchText:
なんてこと、マクシムがあの
ジュディス・ランスターをどうにかしたって！？

engSearchText:
No Revolution Festival's complete without
that show to cap things off, if you ask me!
jpnChrName: 女にだらしないってウワサは聞いてたけど…… 良いオトコだっただけに残念なんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
女にだらしないってウワサは聞いてたけど……
良いオトコだっただけに残念なんですけど。

engChrName: And I get to see it in person this year, too! Isn't that amazing?! I'm gonna pay attention to everything and sear it into my brain so I don't forget!
engSearchText:
And I get to see it in person this year, too! Isn't
that amazing?! I'm gonna pay attention to everything
and sear it into my brain so I don't forget!
jpnChrName: てか、ウワサもアンチが言ってるだけだと…… いやマジで幻滅したわ～。
jpnSearchText:
てか、ウワサもアンチが言ってるだけだと……
いやマジで幻滅したわ～。

engChrName: I still can't believe I won the lottery to visit the EGC. I've only ever been able to watch the live broadcasts. This is a dream come true!
engSearchText:
I still can't believe I won the lottery to visit the EGC.
I've only ever been able to watch the live broadcasts.
This is a dream come true!
jpnChrName: そういえば最近、アイドルグループも 新しいのが出てきたんだって？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば最近、アイドルグループも
新しいのが出てきたんだって？

engChrName: No way... I won the lottery to go see the EGC. The odds are so low, I only entered for fun. I didn't think I was going to win it!
engSearchText:
No way... I won the lottery to go see the EGC.
The odds are so low, I only entered for fun. I didn't
think I was going to win it!
jpnChrName: リバーサイドでもやってるらしいけど、 何だか如何にもイマドキ感あるわよね。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドでもやってるらしいけど、
何だか如何にもイマドキ感あるわよね。

engChrName: Aaah, I'm gonna get to see the EGC live and in person! Maybe my luck's not so rotten after all!
engSearchText:
Aaah, I'm gonna get to see the EGC live and
in person! Maybe my luck's not so rotten after all!
jpnChrName: 今アイドルがアツいっていうなら、モデルより アイドルのスカウト待った方が良い系？
jpnSearchText:
今アイドルがアツいっていうなら、モデルより
アイドルのスカウト待った方が良い系？

engChrName: Aidios must've decided to show me a little mercy after not getting anywhere with attracting scouts! Oh, thank you, Goddess! Thank you!
engSearchText:
Aidios must've decided to show me a little mercy after
not getting anywhere with attracting scouts!
Oh, thank you, Goddess! Thank you!

jpnSearchText:
映画祭で改めて注目されてるスターって
いったら、やっぱりニナ・フェンリィよねぇ。

engChrName: I'm glad they lifted the state of emergency. I can't believe the president of the Quincy Company was behind everything, though!
engSearchText:
I'm glad they lifted the state of emergency. I can't
believe the president of the Quincy Company was
behind everything, though!
jpnChrName: 何せ、先輩の役者さんたちをどんどん追い抜いてる とかって芸能誌に書いてあったもん！
jpnSearchText:
何せ、先輩の役者さんたちをどんどん追い抜いてる

once, but now the thought of them just makes

jpnChrName: オトコの方は『狼達の鎮魂歌』主演のラファルが 話題だけど、アタシはレーサーのマクシムが好み！

オトコの方は『狼達の鎮魂歌』主演のラファルが

engChrName: Also, isn't Elaine Auclair related to them somehow? I think I remember reading something about it before, but I forget what.
engSearchText:
Also, isn't Elaine Auclair related to them somehow?
I think I remember reading something about it
before, but I forget what.
jpnChrName: アレ、そういやマクシムも一応ゲストだかで 映画に出たんだっけ？　それなら観なくちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
アレ、そういやマクシムも一応ゲストだかで
映画に出たんだっけ？　それなら観なくちゃ！

engSearchText:
How...? How can a whole village just...vanish?
S-Someone tell me it's all just some elaborate ad
campaign for a movie. It has to be, right?

jpnSearchText:
芸能ってのもどんどん変わっていってるわよねー。
役者だけじゃなく、アイドルとかモデルも。

engSearchText:
Come on... Somebody tell me it's all just a bad

jpnSearchText:
ジュディス・ランスターみたいな、アイドル的な

これだけ色々あるんなら、アタシもどれかしらに

jpnSearchText: 本来なら、私も駆けつけたいが……

If there's one movie star continuing to get attention at

仕事柄目には自信があるしな、遠くを見張って

He starred in Wolves' Requiem. But me? I love that
racecar driver Maxim Lugan!
jpnChrName: この分では仮に事態が終息したとしても、 ＥＧＣの方はどうなるか……許せないな。
jpnSearchText:
この分では仮に事態が終息したとしても、
ＥＧＣの方はどうなるか……許せないな。

engChrName: Speaking of him, didn't he make a guest appearance in some movie? I've gotta go see it! I can never get enough of him in my life!
engSearchText:
Speaking of him, didn't he make a guest appearance
in some movie? I've gotta go see it! I can never get
enough of him in my life!
jpnChrName: ……関係者の方々も心配だし……今夜 約束していた子達も大丈夫だろうか。
jpnSearchText:
……関係者の方々も心配だし……今夜
約束していた子達も大丈夫だろうか。

engChrName: The entertainment industry's changing so much! It's not just made up of actors these days. Now even idols and fashion models are part of it!
engSearchText:
The entertainment industry's changing so much!
It's not just made up of actors these days. Now even
idols and fashion models are part of it!
jpnChrName: 記念祭も盛り上がってきたね。 そして今夜はＥＧＣもある。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭も盛り上がってきたね。
そして今夜はＥＧＣもある。

engChrName: The lines are blurring, too. Just look at trendy actresses like Judith Lanster. She's so popular, she's practically an idol in her own right!
engSearchText:
The lines are blurring, too. Just look at trendy
actresses like Judith Lanster. She's so popular, she's
practically an idol in her own right!
jpnChrName: 今年はＥＧＣも他国の業界人が例年以上に 招待されているらしい、期待できそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
今年はＥＧＣも他国の業界人が例年以上に
招待されているらしい、期待できそうだ。

engChrName: It takes all kinds these days. If I can just find something that works for me and make it stick, maybe, just maybe, I can break in, too!
engSearchText:
It takes all kinds these days. If I can just find
something that works for me and make it stick,
maybe, just maybe, I can break in, too!
jpnChrName: 今ではファッションと芸能文化においても 共和国が他を牽引する立場になりつつあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
今ではファッションと芸能文化においても
共和国が他を牽引する立場になりつつあるからな。

engChrName: (Come on, mister! You've gotta be a scout! Notice me, already!)
engSearchText:
(Come on, mister! You've gotta be a scout!
Notice me, already!)
jpnChrName: まあ、その意味でも今年はこの業界も 一つの節目を迎えそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その意味でも今年はこの業界も
一つの節目を迎えそうだ。

engChrName: (You can't ignore such hotness when it's right in front of you! I've been walking past you for three weeks now! MAKE YOUR MOVE, ALREADY!)
engSearchText:
(You can't ignore such hotness when it's right in front
of you! I've been walking past you for three
weeks now! MAKE YOUR MOVE, ALREADY!)
jpnChrName: しかし……私に関しては、ＥＧＣの後、 もう一つ楽しみもできた事だしね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……私に関しては、ＥＧＣの後、
もう一つ楽しみもできた事だしね。

engChrName: I'm so relieved. I've been able to confirm that everyone's safe. My coworkers, the EGC stuff, San, Marilyn, everyone.
engSearchText:
I'm so relieved. I've been able to confirm that
everyone's safe. My coworkers, the EGC stuff, San,
Marilyn, everyone.
jpnChrName: ＥＧＣを拝見した上での、あのサンという子と 話す場を持てるとは、色々発見もありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ＥＧＣを拝見した上での、あのサンという子と
話す場を持てるとは、色々発見もありそうだ。

engChrName: I'd run over to all of them right now if I could, but I don't want to get in the way of the police and the bracers. That's the last thing I want.
engSearchText:
I'd run over to all of them right now if I could, but I
don't want to get in the way of the police and
the bracers. That's the last thing I want.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あの友達想いの子には 私も感謝しないといけないな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あの友達想いの子には
私も感謝しないといけないな。

engChrName: So instead, for now, I think I'll try and focus on what I can do to help around here.
engSearchText:
So instead, for now, I think I'll try and focus on what
I can do to help around here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私は確かに市井の子からモデルを探す際も 出自より個性を見ているつもりだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私は確かに市井の子からモデルを探す際も
出自より個性を見ているつもりだが……

engChrName: I've got a trained eye thanks to my job. I'll keep a lookout for anything fishy coming in from afar and if I find anything, I'll let the cops know.
engSearchText:
I've got a trained eye thanks to my job. I'll keep a
lookout for anything fishy coming in from afar and if
I find anything, I'll let the cops know.
jpnChrName: それで、まさか目をつけていた子の 友人からお願いされるとはね……
jpnSearchText:
それで、まさか目をつけていた子の
友人からお願いされるとはね……

engChrName: I'm... I'm speechless. Who would ever imagine that the Revolution Festival would go so terribly wrong?
engSearchText:
I'm... I'm speechless. Who would ever imagine that
the Revolution Festival would go so terribly wrong?
jpnChrName: ここは私なりにやってみようじゃないか、 あのサンという子を“活かす”挑戦を。
jpnSearchText:
ここは私なりにやってみようじゃないか、
あのサンという子を“活かす”挑戦を。

engChrName: Even if we're past the worst of it now, I can't help but worry what's going to happen with the EGC. What's happened here is a travesty.
engSearchText:
Even if we're past the worst of it now, I can't help but
worry what's going to happen with the EGC.
What's happened here is a travesty.
jpnChrName: 事態が記念祭前に収束して何よりだ、年末の ＥＧＣも予定通り開催できることになったしな。
jpnSearchText:
事態が記念祭前に収束して何よりだ、年末の
ＥＧＣも予定通り開催できることになったしな。

engChrName: I'm worried about all of the staff, too—not to mention the girls I'm supposed to meet tonight. Hopefully everyone's hanging in there.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about all of the staff, too—not to
mention the girls I'm supposed to meet tonight.
Hopefully everyone's hanging in there.
jpnChrName: となれば、改めてより良いモデルを探すとしようか。
jpnSearchText: となれば、改めてより良いモデルを探すとしようか。

engChrName: Another year, another lively Revolution Festival! Doesn't hurt that the EGC is coming up tonight, too.
engSearchText:
Another year, another lively Revolution Festival!
Doesn't hurt that the EGC is coming up tonight, too.
jpnChrName: 来年、今年のＥＧＣで示された流行の道の 一端を担えるだけの新たなモデルをね。
jpnSearchText:
来年、今年のＥＧＣで示された流行の道の
一端を担えるだけの新たなモデルをね。

engChrName: It seems even more industry insiders from abroad are being invited to this year's event than usual. That should make it a treat.
engSearchText:
It seems even more industry insiders from abroad are
being invited to this year's event than usual.
That should make it a treat.
jpnChrName: ……今なら、案外見落としていたところから 原石を見出す事も出来そうな気がするしな。
jpnSearchText:
……今なら、案外見落としていたところから
原石を見出す事も出来そうな気がするしな。

engSearchText:
Another sign that this country is leading the pack

jpnChrName: 向こうの像の前でよく集まっている子たち、 インパクトが足りないと思い保留にしていたが……
jpnSearchText:
向こうの像の前でよく集まっている子たち、
インパクトが足りないと思い保留にしていたが……

engSearchText:
Really, it feels like this industry is entering a big
turning point in general—one we'll be feeling the

jpnSearchText:
今の冴えた目で改めて見ると、特に東方系の子は、

engSearchText:
There's something else I'm looking forward to
enjoying once this year's EGC is wrapped up.

jpnSearchText:
今まで見過ごしていたのが悔やまれるが……
私もまだまだという事かな。

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

業界ではチャリティの呼びかけも始まっている。

jpnSearchText:
生存者がいるかも、村が再建できるかも不明だが……

ジュディス・ランスターとマクシム・ルーガンの

jpnChrName: だから、会うのは難しいんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText: だから、会うのは難しいんじゃないかな。

engChrName: The thing is, I strongly prefer models who have a natural charm and attractiveness that can be refined. I think they have more to offer overall.
engSearchText:
The thing is, I strongly prefer models who have a
natural charm and attractiveness that can be refined.
I think they have more to offer overall.
jpnChrName: まあ、私が避けられてる可能性も ゼロじゃないけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、私が避けられてる可能性も
ゼロじゃないけど……

engChrName: Not that their advice is bad. Some people can and absolutely do recruit models at film festivals. Different strokes for different folks.
engSearchText:
Not that their advice is bad. Some people can and
absolutely do recruit models at film festivals.
Different strokes for different folks.
jpnChrName: うーん……そうなると困りましたね。 折角の手掛かりだったのに……
jpnSearchText:
うーん……そうなると困りましたね。
折角の手掛かりだったのに……

engChrName: I just know from experience the real gems that shine the brightest are the ones out there walking the street, living normal lives like you and me.
engSearchText:
I just know from experience the real gems that shine
the brightest are the ones out there walking the street,
living normal lives like you and me.
jpnChrName: ああでも、彼女はカフェの店員と 随分と仲が良さそうだったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああでも、彼女はカフェの店員と
随分と仲が良さそうだったよ。

engChrName: Hot damn! The local spriggan's got business with someone like me? Never imagined I'd cross paths with you guys. What can I do for you?
engSearchText:
Hot damn! The local spriggan's got business with
someone like me? Never imagined I'd cross paths
with you guys. What can I do for you?
jpnChrName: 彼女と直接会えなくても、 その店員から話を聞く事は出来るんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女と直接会えなくても、
その店員から話を聞く事は出来るんじゃないかな。

engChrName: Hmm... Oh, yeah. I recognize this woman.
engSearchText: Hmm... Oh, yeah. I recognize this woman.
jpnChrName: 例のカフェの場所は、 すぐそこの《マクミラン・カフェ》だよ。
jpnSearchText:
例のカフェの場所は、
すぐそこの《マクミラン・カフェ》だよ。

engChrName: Nice. What can you tell us about her?
engSearchText: Nice. What can you tell us about her?
jpnChrName: なるほど、分かりました。 教えて頂きありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、分かりました。
教えて頂きありがとうございます。

engChrName: I work as a talent scout. She's someone I had my eye on for some time.
engSearchText:
I work as a talent scout. She's someone I had my eye
on for some time.
jpnChrName: じゃ、早速行ってみるとすっか。
jpnSearchText: じゃ、早速行ってみるとすっか。

engChrName: She used to be a fellow regular at my favorite café and we'd run into each other there often.
engSearchText:
She used to be a fellow regular at my favorite café and
we'd run into each other there often.
jpnChrName: 写真の女性は私と同じで 《マクミラン・カフェ》の常連客だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
写真の女性は私と同じで
《マクミラン・カフェ》の常連客だったんだ。

engChrName: I tried recruiting her twice, but she turned me down both times. Said she wasn't interested.
engSearchText:
I tried recruiting her twice, but she turned me down
both times. Said she wasn't interested.
jpnChrName: 店員とも仲が良かったようだし、 店員に話を聞いてみたらいいと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
店員とも仲が良かったようだし、
店員に話を聞いてみたらいいと思うよ。

engChrName: I see. Does that mean if we go to the café, we should find her?
engSearchText:
I see. Does that mean if we go to the café, we should
find her?
jpnChrName: やはりそこでコーヒーを飲んだ後だと、 審美眼も冴えわたるというものだな。
jpnSearchText:
やはりそこでコーヒーを飲んだ後だと、
審美眼も冴えわたるというものだな。

engChrName: Probably not. She stopped coming about a month ago.
engSearchText:
Probably not. She stopped coming about a
month ago.
jpnChrName: ファッションモデル、ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）までに 新たに光る原石を発掘したいが……
jpnSearchText:
ファッションモデル、ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）までに
新たに光る原石を発掘したいが……

engChrName: I wouldn't pin your hopes on finding her there, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't pin your hopes on finding her
there, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: どうにも皆、あと一押しが足りないな…… 何か個性があってピンとくる子がいれば……
jpnSearchText:
どうにも皆、あと一押しが足りないな……
何か個性があってピンとくる子がいれば……

engChrName: Although in her defense, it's entirely possible she stopped going because of me. Maybe she just wanted to get me out of her hair.
engSearchText:
Although in her defense, it's entirely possible she
stopped going because of me. Maybe she just wanted
to get me out of her hair.
jpnChrName: ふふ、まさか君の方から声を かけてくれるとはね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、まさか君の方から声を
かけてくれるとはね……

engChrName: Dang! I thought we had a good lead. What are we gonna do?
engSearchText:
Dang! I thought we had a good lead. What are we
gonna do?
jpnChrName: 確かに少し前から目は付けていたが…… 気づかれていたなら、それもまた運命。
jpnSearchText:
確かに少し前から目は付けていたが……
気づかれていたなら、それもまた運命。

engChrName: You might still want to talk to one of the servers there. They seemed like pretty good friends.
engSearchText:
You might still want to talk to one of the
servers there. They seemed like pretty good friends.
jpnChrName: うふふ、それはありがとうね、 読者モデルのプロデューサーさん。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それはありがとうね、
読者モデルのプロデューサーさん。

engChrName: Who knows? Maybe she'll be able to fill you in on whatever happened to her.
engSearchText:
Who knows? Maybe she'll be able to fill you in on
whatever happened to her.
jpnChrName: まあ、あなたが本当に着目してるのは、 私よりサンちゃんの方でしょうけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あなたが本当に着目してるのは、
私よりサンちゃんの方でしょうけどねぇ。

engChrName: If you're interested, it's the McMillan Café, just over there.
engSearchText:
If you're interested, it's the McMillan Café, just
over there.
jpnChrName: そこまで気づいていたとは……いやはや、 君は侮れない娘だね。
jpnSearchText:
そこまで気づいていたとは……いやはや、
君は侮れない娘だね。

engChrName: I think we'll take you up on that. Thank you for sharing! Have a good rest of your day.
engSearchText:
I think we'll take you up on that. Thank you
for sharing! Have a good rest of your day.
jpnChrName: それで、自分からコンタクトしてきたのは…… 自分の方もスカウトして欲しいからかい？
jpnSearchText:
それで、自分からコンタクトしてきたのは……
自分の方もスカウトして欲しいからかい？

engChrName: Least we came away with something. On to that café.
engSearchText: Least we came away with something. On to that café.
jpnChrName: いえ、逆かしらね……もしあなたが、 サンちゃんのスタイルを活かせるなら……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、逆かしらね……もしあなたが、
サンちゃんのスタイルを活かせるなら……

engChrName: The woman in your photo looks just like this regular I used to see at the McMillan Café over there.
engSearchText:
The woman in your photo looks just like this regular I
used to see at the McMillan Café over there.
jpnChrName: 是非あの子に一緒に、自分のスタイルを 誇るチャンスをあげたくてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
是非あの子に一緒に、自分のスタイルを
誇るチャンスをあげたくてねぇ……

engChrName: She seemed pretty friendly with one of the servers there. Maybe she'll be able to fill you in on whatever happened to her.
engSearchText:
She seemed pretty friendly with one of the
servers there. Maybe she'll be able to fill you in on
whatever happened to her.
jpnChrName: なるほど……東方系である事に囚われない、 その事に自信を持てるように……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……東方系である事に囚われない、
その事に自信を持てるように……

engChrName: *sigh* I feel like I have a sharper eye for beauty after a good cup of coffee at the café.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I feel like I have a sharper eye for beauty after a
good cup of coffee at the café.
jpnChrName: といったところかな？
jpnSearchText: といったところかな？

engChrName: I'm trying to find some new fashion talent, maybe even someone for the Edith Girls' Collection. A diamond in the rough who just needs polishing...
engSearchText:
I'm trying to find some new fashion talent, maybe
even someone for the Edith Girls' Collection.
A diamond in the rough who just needs polishing...
jpnChrName: うふふ、そちらも随分と鋭いみたいねぇ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、そちらも随分と鋭いみたいねぇ。

engChrName: But everyone I've approached has been missing that 'special something.' If I could just find someone with a unique edge, then I'd be in business! Alas.
engSearchText:
But everyone I've approached has been missing that
'special something.' If I could just find someone with
a unique edge, then I'd be in business! Alas.
jpnChrName: あの子も色々と抱えちゃってるし、もしあなたが、 あの子のありのままに注目したなら……
jpnSearchText:
あの子も色々と抱えちゃってるし、もしあなたが、
あの子のありのままに注目したなら……

engChrName: Heh. You know, normally, it's my job to approach someone like you—not the other way around.
engSearchText:
Heh. You know, normally, it's my job to approach
someone like you—not the other way around.
jpnChrName: 一つ相談、というのもあの子にとって 良い経験になるかなって思って。
jpnSearchText:
一つ相談、というのもあの子にとって
良い経験になるかなって思って。

engChrName: I did have my eye on you already, I'll admit. The fact you noticed must be a sign that Aidios Herself wanted us to meet.
engSearchText:
I did have my eye on you already, I'll admit. The fact
you noticed must be a sign that Aidios Herself
wanted us to meet.
jpnChrName: ふふ、良いだろう……私も、あの子については 出自に囚われない魅力を感じていたものでね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、良いだろう……私も、あの子については
出自に囚われない魅力を感じていたものでね。

engChrName: Heehee. You're too kind, Mister Producer.
engSearchText: Heehee. You're too kind, Mister Producer.
jpnChrName: 役者で言えばニナ・フェンリィにも近いか…… 何にせよ、個性を活かす余地はありそうな子だ。
jpnSearchText:
役者で言えばニナ・フェンリィにも近いか……
何にせよ、個性を活かす余地はありそうな子だ。

engChrName: But you don't have to pretend. I know you're more interested in San than me, aren't you?
engSearchText:
But you don't have to pretend. I know you're more
interested in San than me, aren't you?
jpnChrName: 尤も、最終的に決めるのはあの子自身だが…… とりあえず、一回三人で話してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
尤も、最終的に決めるのはあの子自身だが……
とりあえず、一回三人で話してみるか。

engChrName: Damn... You're perceptive. Definitely a sharp one, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Damn... You're perceptive. Definitely a sharp one,
that's for sure.
jpnChrName: 話が早くて有難いわぁ……それじゃあ、記念祭の日、 この時間にここに連れてくるのはどうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
話が早くて有難いわぁ……それじゃあ、記念祭の日、
この時間にここに連れてくるのはどうかしら？

engChrName: Then did you contact me because you want me to recruit you along with her?
engSearchText:
Then did you contact me because you want me to
recruit you along with her?
jpnChrName: ＥＧＣが終わったタイミングか……ふふ、 面白いじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
ＥＧＣが終わったタイミングか……ふふ、
面白いじゃないか。

engChrName: Actually, no. If anything, I'd prefer you to focus your efforts on San alone.
engSearchText:
Actually, no. If anything, I'd prefer you to focus your
efforts on San alone.
jpnChrName: それでは、記念祭の日の夜にここで会おう。 是非、お互い良い答えを──
jpnSearchText:
それでは、記念祭の日の夜にここで会おう。
是非、お互い良い答えを──

engChrName: She deserves a chance to be proud of herself and what she does. So, please... If you could give her the opportunity...
engSearchText:
She deserves a chance to be proud of herself and
what she does. So, please... If you could give her
the opportunity...
jpnChrName: ……お兄ちゃん、仮に生きてるとしても どこで何してるのかな……
jpnSearchText:
……お兄ちゃん、仮に生きてるとしても
どこで何してるのかな……

engChrName: Hmm... I see. You're thinking this is what she needs to gain more confidence to step away from what's expected of her as an Easterner.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I see. You're thinking this is what she needs
to gain more confidence to step away from what's
expected of her as an Easterner.
jpnChrName: 正直お兄ちゃん、不運体質だし生きてても 微妙な災難に遭ってる気もするんですケド。
jpnSearchText:
正直お兄ちゃん、不運体質だし生きてても
微妙な災難に遭ってる気もするんですケド。

engChrName: Is that what you're getting at here?
engSearchText: Is that what you're getting at here?
jpnChrName: お、お兄ちゃんと合流できるかもって 思ってここに避難してきたのに……
jpnSearchText:
お、お兄ちゃんと合流できるかもって
思ってここに避難してきたのに……

engChrName: Heehee, exactly. Seems you've not only got a good eye, but a good ear as well.
engSearchText:
Heehee, exactly. Seems you've not only got a good
eye, but a good ear as well.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんも、お兄ちゃんの後輩のマリエルさんも まだ取材から戻っていないっていうし……
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃんも、お兄ちゃんの後輩のマリエルさんも
まだ取材から戻っていないっていうし……

engChrName: I wanted to speak with you in order to make sure you were actually interested in San for who she is. She's got a lot on her plate, after all.
engSearchText:
I wanted to speak with you in order to make sure you
were actually interested in San for who she is. She's
got a lot on her plate, after all.
jpnChrName: どうしよう……マジわかんないよ……
jpnSearchText: どうしよう……マジわかんないよ……

engChrName: But, I know this will be good for her. An opportunity like this will mean more to her than you'll ever know.
engSearchText:
But, I know this will be good for her. An opportunity
like this will mean more to her than you'll ever know.
jpnChrName: 外は落ち着いたみたいだけど…… お兄ちゃん達も戻ってこないし……
jpnSearchText:
外は落ち着いたみたいだけど……
お兄ちゃん達も戻ってこないし……

engChrName: Well, you're not wrong. I've caught myself thinking that she has a certain beauty that transcends her background.
engSearchText:
Well, you're not wrong. I've caught myself thinking
that she has a certain beauty that transcends
her background.
jpnChrName: ふーん、マリリンの言うサプライズって何だろ？ ま、何にせよ前向きに捉えないと損よね！
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、マリリンの言うサプライズって何だろ？
ま、何にせよ前向きに捉えないと損よね！

engChrName: If I were to compare her to an actress, I'd say she's not unlike Nina Fenly. In any case, I think she's someone with a lot to uniquely offer.
engSearchText:
If I were to compare her to an actress, I'd say she's not
unlike Nina Fenly. In any case, I think she's someone
with a lot to uniquely offer.
jpnChrName: せっかく色々乗り越えての記念祭なんだし、 不完全とか言ってる場合じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく色々乗り越えての記念祭なんだし、
不完全とか言ってる場合じゃないわ。

engChrName: Tell you what: why don't we sit down and talk sometime soon, all three of us? It'll be her call in the end, of course. But how does that sound?
engSearchText:
Tell you what: why don't we sit down and talk
sometime soon, all three of us? It'll be her call in the
end, of course. But how does that sound?
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんも色々と中途半端だよねー そんなんだから手伝い押し付けられるんでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃんも色々と中途半端だよねー
そんなんだから手伝い押し付けられるんでしょ。

engChrName: I was just about to suggest that myself. How about I bring her around and we take it from there?
engSearchText:
I was just about to suggest that myself. How about I
bring her around and we take it from there?
jpnChrName: ま、お兄ちゃんもこう見えてしぶといし、繁忙期 乗り越えたら何か変わったりするんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ま、お兄ちゃんもこう見えてしぶといし、繁忙期
乗り越えたら何か変わったりするんじゃない？

engChrName: You mean after the EGC is over? Ha! I like the way you think.
engSearchText:
You mean after the EGC is over? Ha! I like the way
you think.
jpnChrName: ま、何やかんや言って、あたしはあたしらしく しないでも全然意味無いんだろうねー。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何やかんや言って、あたしはあたしらしく
しないでも全然意味無いんだろうねー。

engChrName: It's a deal. We'll meet right here on the night of the festival. Looking forward to good news from the two of you!
engSearchText:
It's a deal. We'll meet right here on the night of
the festival. Looking forward to good news from the
two of you!
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんと民族問題云々でクヨクヨしてたのも 今となっちゃ、ハズいくらいだわ。
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃんと民族問題云々でクヨクヨしてたのも
今となっちゃ、ハズいくらいだわ。

engChrName: I-I guess Chen could still be alive. But who knows where he is or what he's doing?
engSearchText:
I-I guess Chen could still be alive. But who knows
where he is or what he's doing?
jpnChrName: 意地張って、勝手に不安になってたあたしも…… 受け入れてくれる友達がいて本当に……
jpnSearchText:
意地張って、勝手に不安になってたあたしも……
受け入れてくれる友達がいて本当に……

engChrName: He's a pretty unlucky guy, to be honest. If he's out there, I kinda think he might be in some kind of trouble...
engSearchText:
He's a pretty unlucky guy, to be honest. If he's out
there, I kinda think he might be in some kind
of trouble...
jpnChrName: 自分の家系に関係無く…… 本当に縁ってあるものなんだなって……
jpnSearchText:
自分の家系に関係無く……
本当に縁ってあるものなんだなって……

engChrName: I fled here hoping I'd maybe run into my brother.
engSearchText: I fled here hoping I'd maybe run into my brother.
jpnChrName: ピーターが芸能会社の社長の息子なんて、 イメージと全然違ってウケるんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ピーターが芸能会社の社長の息子なんて、
イメージと全然違ってウケるんですけど。

engChrName: But I haven't seen him or his coworker Marielle. They haven't gotten back from their interviews they were doing.
engSearchText:
But I haven't seen him or his coworker Marielle.
They haven't gotten back from their interviews they
were doing.
jpnChrName: でもまあ、考えてみれば妙にリアルっつーか、 生々しい事情知ってたのも、そういう事なんだね。
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、考えてみれば妙にリアルっつーか、
生々しい事情知ってたのも、そういう事なんだね。

engChrName: I'm so lost. I dunno what to do...
engSearchText: I'm so lost. I dunno what to do...
jpnChrName: でもその割にあんまり自慢とかしてないし…… 結構殊勝なヤツじゃん、ピーター。
jpnSearchText:
でもその割にあんまり自慢とかしてないし……
結構殊勝なヤツじゃん、ピーター。

engChrName: I think things have calmed down outside. But Chen and Marielle are still nowhere to be found...
engSearchText:
I think things have calmed down outside. But Chen
and Marielle are still nowhere to be found...
jpnChrName: 流行も色々変わってるのに、お兄ちゃんは あんまりそういう話してくれないんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
流行も色々変わってるのに、お兄ちゃんは
あんまりそういう話してくれないんだよね～。

engChrName: I wish I knew what Marilyn's big surprise is. Oh, well! Whatever she has in mind, I'm sure it'll be fun!
engSearchText:
I wish I knew what Marilyn's big surprise is. Oh, well!
Whatever she has in mind, I'm sure it'll be fun!
jpnChrName: どーせ他部署手伝うってんなら、芸能部とか そーゆー面白いところ手伝えばいいのにさー。
jpnSearchText:
どーせ他部署手伝うってんなら、芸能部とか
そーゆー面白いところ手伝えばいいのにさー。

engChrName: After everything that's happened recently, nobody can complain if this year's festival is a little lacking. We're lucky to still even have one!
engSearchText:
After everything that's happened recently, nobody
can complain if this year's festival is a little lacking.
We're lucky to still even have one!
jpnChrName: まあ、ニナ・フェンリィも好きなんだけどね。 ジュディスの方がよりイカすっていうかー。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ニナ・フェンリィも好きなんだけどね。
ジュディスの方がよりイカすっていうかー。

engChrName: My brother can be so noncommittal. I think that's why people push him around and are always trying to mooch off him for help.
engSearchText:
My brother can be so noncommittal. I think that's
why people push him around and are always trying to
mooch off him for help.
jpnChrName: そういやうちの兄貴、一応記者だけど 映画祭の取材とかは無いってねー。
jpnSearchText:
そういやうちの兄貴、一応記者だけど
映画祭の取材とかは無いってねー。

engChrName: He can be pretty stubborn when he wants to be, though. Maybe once things calm down with work, he'll start to change. We'll see.
engSearchText:
He can be pretty stubborn when he wants to
be, though. Maybe once things calm down with work,
he'll start to change. We'll see.
jpnChrName: いつも他部署手伝わされてるけど、こんな時に限って マジメ系に回されたらしくて流石に同情だわ。
jpnSearchText:
いつも他部署手伝わされてるけど、こんな時に限って
マジメ系に回されたらしくて流石に同情だわ。

engChrName: The others are right. Whatever anyone else has to say, there's no point in me doing or thinking anything different if I'm not being true to myself.
engSearchText:
The others are right. Whatever anyone else has to say,
there's no point in me doing or thinking anything
different if I'm not being true to myself.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん、文芸部の担当なのに 何でこんなに手伝わされるんだろうね？
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃん、文芸部の担当なのに
何でこんなに手伝わされるんだろうね？

engChrName: I feel so silly letting myself get so worked up after my brother mentioned what happened in Creil was possibly racially driven.
engSearchText:
I feel so silly letting myself get so worked up after my
brother mentioned what happened in Creil
was possibly racially driven.
jpnChrName: 民族問題とか社会部以外に、経済部にも 駆り出されるって言ってた気もするし……
jpnSearchText:
民族問題とか社会部以外に、経済部にも
駆り出されるって言ってた気もするし……

engChrName: It was really getting me down and I refused to let myself snap out of it and let go. I'm so glad I have Peter and Marilyn in my life.
engSearchText:
It was really getting me down and I refused to let
myself snap out of it and let go. I'm so glad I have
Peter and Marilyn in my life.
jpnChrName: やっぱり断れそうにない顔してるからかな？
jpnSearchText: やっぱり断れそうにない顔してるからかな？

engChrName: They don't care about my background. They just care about ME. That's... That's what I call a couple of true friends. *sniffle*
engSearchText:
They don't care about my background. They just care
about ME. That's... That's what I call a couple of
true friends. *sniffle*
jpnChrName: やっぱりさぁ、アタシも首都生まれ首都育ちだし、 普通に好き放題やっていきたいわけ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりさぁ、アタシも首都生まれ首都育ちだし、
普通に好き放題やっていきたいわけ。

engChrName: I had no idea Peter was the son of an entertainment company president! That's so hilarious! I don't get that vibe from him at all!
engSearchText:
I had no idea Peter was the son of an entertainment
company president! That's so hilarious! I don't get
that vibe from him at all!
jpnChrName: 東方系だからって遠慮するのとかウザいし、 今の友達はそういうの無くてマジ助かるわー。
jpnSearchText:
東方系だからって遠慮するのとかウザいし、
今の友達はそういうの無くてマジ助かるわー。

engChrName: But I guess it kinda makes sense the more I think about it. That'd explain why he knows such specific stuff.
engSearchText:
But I guess it kinda makes sense the more I think
about it. That'd explain why he knows such
specific stuff.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん……色々と情けないとか お節介とか言ってたけど、結構好きだったよ……
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃん……色々と情けないとか
お節介とか言ってたけど、結構好きだったよ……

engChrName: I've gotta give him credit, though. He doesn't really brag about it or anything at all! He's a pretty good guy.
engSearchText:
I've gotta give him credit, though. He doesn't really
brag about it or anything at all! He's a pretty
good guy.
jpnChrName: ピーター……せめて最後はＫＹ直して 欲しかったけど、お父さんと分かり合えたのは……
jpnSearchText:
ピーター……せめて最後はＫＹ直して
欲しかったけど、お父さんと分かり合えたのは……

engChrName: My brother hardly ever talks about any trends with me, despite the fact that they're always changing.
engSearchText:
My brother hardly ever talks about any trends with
me, despite the fact that they're always changing.
jpnChrName: サンちゃ～ん？　別に二人とも死んだとは 決まってないからねぇ～？
jpnSearchText:
サンちゃ～ん？　別に二人とも死んだとは
決まってないからねぇ～？

engChrName: If he's gonna write for other sections of the paper, he could at least write about fun stuff for the entertainment section or something, you know?
engSearchText:
If he's gonna write for other sections of the paper, he
could at least write about fun stuff for the
entertainment section or something, you know?
jpnChrName: ほら、それっぽい目撃情報入ったらしいし、 記者さん達もお兄さん探しに行くみたいだし？
jpnSearchText:
ほら、それっぽい目撃情報入ったらしいし、
記者さん達もお兄さん探しに行くみたいだし？

engChrName: I like Nina Fenly, too, of course! I just think Judith Lanster is cooler, that's all.
engSearchText:
I like Nina Fenly, too, of course! I just think Judith
Lanster is cooler, that's all.
jpnChrName: な、なにコレ……マジ！？　記念祭の 演出とかじゃないんだよね！？
jpnSearchText:
な、なにコレ……マジ！？　記念祭の
演出とかじゃないんだよね！？

engChrName: My brother, Chen, works as a newspaper reporter, but he never gets to do any interviews at film festivals or stuff like that.
engSearchText:
My brother, Chen, works as a newspaper reporter, but
he never gets to do any interviews at film festivals or
stuff like that.
jpnChrName: サンちゃん落ち着いて、それは当然よぉ。 あと、私の言ってたサプライズでもないから～。
jpnSearchText:
サンちゃん落ち着いて、それは当然よぉ。
あと、私の言ってたサプライズでもないから～。

engChrName: The other sections drag him in to help all the time, but he tells me it's always serious stuff! I feel really sorry for him.
engSearchText:
The other sections drag him in to help all the time,
but he tells me it's always serious stuff! I feel really
sorry for him.
jpnChrName: う、うん……と、とりあえず 深呼吸でも……
jpnSearchText:
う、うん……と、とりあえず
深呼吸でも……

engChrName: Why do people make my brother write for other sections of the newspaper so much?
engSearchText:
Why do people make my brother write for other
sections of the newspaper so much?
jpnChrName: スーッ……ハーッ……ふう……。
jpnSearchText: スーッ……ハーッ……ふう……。

engChrName: He's supposed to be in charge of the book section, but he says they have him writing about racial tensions and stuff for the news desk, too.
engSearchText:
He's supposed to be in charge of the book section,
but he says they have him writing about racial
tensions and stuff for the news desk, too.
jpnChrName: す、少し落ち着いたかも……あれ、 そういえばお兄ちゃんは！？
jpnSearchText:
す、少し落ち着いたかも……あれ、
そういえばお兄ちゃんは！？

engChrName: Even the economy section bugs him for work! I feel so bad for him. Maybe it's because he looks like a guy who's too polite to say no to anyone.
engSearchText:
Even the economy section bugs him for work! I feel
so bad for him. Maybe it's because he looks like a guy
who's too polite to say no to anyone.
jpnChrName: あら、確かに姿が見えないわね、 サンちゃんのお兄さん……
jpnSearchText:
あら、確かに姿が見えないわね、
サンちゃんのお兄さん……

engChrName: I was born and raised here in Edith, so I'm used to doing whatever I want without always asking other people for permission.
engSearchText:
I was born and raised here in Edith, so I'm used to
doing whatever I want without always asking other
people for permission.
jpnChrName: 記念祭の取材中とはいえ、 戻っててくれればよかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の取材中とはいえ、
戻っててくれればよかったけど……

engChrName: People think just because I'm Eastern, I'm supposed to be 'modest' or whatever. It sucks! I'm so glad my friends these days don't think like that.
engSearchText:
People think just because I'm Eastern, I'm supposed
to be 'modest' or whatever. It sucks! I'm so glad my
friends these days don't think like that.
jpnChrName: どどど、どうしよう……まさかお兄ちゃん、 どこかで死んじゃってるんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
どどど、どうしよう……まさかお兄ちゃん、
どこかで死んじゃってるんじゃ……

engChrName: Chen, I'm so sorry... I know I called you pathetic and nosy, but I really do love you...
engSearchText:
Chen, I'm so sorry... I know I called you pathetic and
nosy, but I really do love you...
jpnChrName: ハッ……そういえばさっき別れた ピーターも……！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……そういえばさっき別れた
ピーターも……！

engChrName: And Peter...you were never the best at reading other people's feelings. But I'm so glad you and your dad finally understood each other.
engSearchText:
And Peter...you were never the best at reading other
people's feelings. But I'm so glad you and your dad
finally understood each other.
jpnChrName: サンちゃん、もう一回深呼吸ね。 まずは改めて落ち着きましょう？
jpnSearchText:
サンちゃん、もう一回深呼吸ね。
まずは改めて落ち着きましょう？

engChrName: San, hold on a second. We don't know for sure what's happened to them yet. They could still be alive.
engSearchText:
San, hold on a second. We don't know for sure what's
happened to them yet. They could still be alive.
jpnChrName: う～ん、色々回ってきたけど やっぱ不完全燃焼かも？
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、色々回ってきたけど
やっぱ不完全燃焼かも？

engChrName: Actually, it sounds like there are a few people who have seen them recently. And those reporters even said they'd send a search party out for Chen.
engSearchText:
Actually, it sounds like there are a few people who
have seen them recently. And those reporters even
said they'd send a search party out for Chen.
jpnChrName: 午前中でアガって来た分、 普通に遊ぶだけじゃ物足りないっていうか？
jpnSearchText:
午前中でアガって来た分、
普通に遊ぶだけじゃ物足りないっていうか？

engChrName: Wh-What's happening? There's no way this is part of the festival, is it?!
engSearchText:
Wh-What's happening? There's no way this is part of
the festival, is it?!
jpnChrName: うふふ、それならサンちゃん。 今夜、８時過ぎくらいに時間取れるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それならサンちゃん。
今夜、８時過ぎくらいに時間取れるかしら？

engChrName: San, I need you to calm down for a moment. Something's wrong. Darn, this is NOT the surprise I had in mind for you...
engSearchText:
San, I need you to calm down for a moment.
Something's wrong. Darn, this is NOT the surprise I
had in mind for you...
jpnChrName: ちょっとしたサプライズが あるのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとしたサプライズが
あるのよねぇ。

engChrName: R-Right. Good to know... Okay... Deep breaths...
engSearchText: R-Right. Good to know... Okay... Deep breaths...
jpnChrName: え、時間なら取れるけど……今夜は お兄ちゃんも遅いだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
え、時間なら取れるけど……今夜は
お兄ちゃんも遅いだろうし。

engChrName: In... Out... *sigh*...
engSearchText: In... Out... *sigh*...
jpnChrName: なになにマリリン？ そうもったいぶらないでよ～。
jpnSearchText:
なになにマリリン？
そうもったいぶらないでよ～。

engChrName: I think I feel a little better now... Wait! What about my brother? What about Chen?!
engSearchText:
I think I feel a little better now... Wait! What about
my brother? What about Chen?!
jpnChrName: うふふ、それは良かったわぁ。 でも、今は教えてあげないわ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それは良かったわぁ。
でも、今は教えてあげないわ。

engChrName: Now that you mention it, I don't see him anywhere...
engSearchText: Now that you mention it, I don't see him anywhere...
jpnChrName: だって、それだとサプライズにならないし。
jpnSearchText: だって、それだとサプライズにならないし。

engChrName: It'd be nice if he came back, even if he wasn't done getting interviews. Hmm...
engSearchText:
It'd be nice if he came back, even if he wasn't done
getting interviews. Hmm...
jpnChrName: え、なになに何の話だ？ 面白そうだな、オレにも教えてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
え、なになに何の話だ？
面白そうだな、オレにも教えてくれよ。

engChrName: I-I-I don't know what to do! Could he be dead?!
engSearchText: I-I-I don't know what to do! Could he be dead?!
jpnChrName: ……ピーター、あんたも調子戻ったと 思ったら、まーたこのパターン～？
jpnSearchText:
……ピーター、あんたも調子戻ったと
思ったら、まーたこのパターン～？

engChrName: Not just him! Peter could be, too! He's not here anymore, either!
engSearchText:
Not just him! Peter could be, too! He's not here
anymore, either!
jpnChrName: ふう、ピーターも相変わらず……というか、 あなたは変わっても良いのだけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ピーターも相変わらず……というか、
あなたは変わっても良いのだけどねぇ……

engChrName: Take some deep breaths with me, San. You need to get yourself under control.
engSearchText:
Take some deep breaths with me, San. You need to
get yourself under control.
jpnChrName: うう……ま、またそんな目で……
jpnSearchText: うう……ま、またそんな目で……

engChrName: Hmm... We've been all over the place, but it doesn't feel like we've done enough.
engSearchText:
Hmm... We've been all over the place, but it doesn't
feel like we've done enough.
jpnChrName: ちくしょう、親父との事で吹っ切れたら また悪い癖が出ちまったよ……
jpnSearchText:
ちくしょう、親父との事で吹っ切れたら
また悪い癖が出ちまったよ……

engChrName: Even after being here all day, something's missing. We should be having more fun than this.
engSearchText:
Even after being here all day, something's missing.
We should be having more fun than this.
jpnChrName: 今日はサンも普段通りに遊んできたのか、 ほんと、日常が戻ってきたって感じだな……
jpnSearchText:
今日はサンも普段通りに遊んできたのか、
ほんと、日常が戻ってきたって感じだな……

engChrName: Heehee, don't worry. I have just the thing. You're free after eight, right?
engSearchText:
Heehee, don't worry. I have just the thing. You're free
after eight, right?
jpnChrName: だがサン、僕の方からはちょっと 悲しいお知らせがあるんだ……
jpnSearchText:
だがサン、僕の方からはちょっと
悲しいお知らせがあるんだ……

engChrName: I've got a surprise waiting for you.
engSearchText: I've got a surprise waiting for you.
jpnChrName: え、何よ悲しいお知らせとか？ もったいぶらないでくんない？
jpnSearchText:
え、何よ悲しいお知らせとか？
もったいぶらないでくんない？

engChrName: Uhh, yeah, I can hang out then. It sounds like Chen's gonna be out late tonight anyway.
engSearchText:
Uhh, yeah, I can hang out then. It sounds like Chen's
gonna be out late tonight anyway.
jpnChrName: ……実は明日から、記念祭の取材で あちこちを走り回る事になりそうでね……
jpnSearchText:
……実は明日から、記念祭の取材で
あちこちを走り回る事になりそうでね……

engChrName: What's the surprise, Marilyn? Tell me, tell me! Don't keep me in suspense!
engSearchText:
What's the surprise, Marilyn? Tell me, tell me!
Don't keep me in suspense!
jpnChrName: 手伝いや編集もあるから、年末までは ほぼ仕事につきっきりになるんだ……
jpnSearchText:
手伝いや編集もあるから、年末までは
ほぼ仕事につきっきりになるんだ……

engChrName: My lips are sealed.
engSearchText: My lips are sealed.
jpnChrName: おまけに今度の新節も、ラングポートに 泊まり込みで仕事に行く事になって……
jpnSearchText:
おまけに今度の新節も、ラングポートに
泊まり込みで仕事に行く事になって……

engChrName: If I told you, then it wouldn't be a surprise anymore.
engSearchText: If I told you, then it wouldn't be a surprise anymore.
jpnChrName: なーんだ、そんな事か。
jpnSearchText: なーんだ、そんな事か。

engChrName: Huh? What are you girls talking about? It sounds fun, whatever it is. Fill me in!
engSearchText:
Huh? What are you girls talking about? It sounds fun,
whatever it is. Fill me in!
jpnChrName: （ガクッ……）
jpnSearchText: （ガクッ……）

engChrName: *sigh* Just when I thought you were back to normal, you're doing THAT again.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Just when I thought you were back to normal,
you're doing THAT again.
jpnChrName: おいおい、去年までの様に兄妹水入らずで 祝日を過ごせないって事なんだけど……？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、去年までの様に兄妹水入らずで
祝日を過ごせないって事なんだけど……？

engChrName: You really never change, Peter. And I definitely don't mean that as a compliment.
engSearchText:
You really never change, Peter. And I definitely don't
mean that as a compliment.
jpnChrName: 別に良いんじゃね、あたしはもう 一緒に過ごす友達決まってるしー。
jpnSearchText:
別に良いんじゃね、あたしはもう
一緒に過ごす友達決まってるしー。

engChrName: Aww, you guys! Don't give me that look again!
engSearchText: Aww, you guys! Don't give me that look again!
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんこそ、仕事かあたしかでそんなに 悩んでないで、いい加減カノジョでも探したらー？
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃんこそ、仕事かあたしかでそんなに
悩んでないで、いい加減カノジョでも探したらー？

engChrName: Man, I thought I was all over that after taking care of things with my dad. Guess old habits really do die hard.
engSearchText:
Man, I thought I was all over that after taking care of
things with my dad. Guess old habits really do
die hard.
jpnChrName: くっ……さ、サンも言うようになったな…… 妹の成長、悲しいやら嬉しいやら……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……さ、サンも言うようになったな……
妹の成長、悲しいやら嬉しいやら……

engChrName: Hey, San. Came out here to hang out? Guess things really are getting back to normal if you're doing that.
engSearchText:
Hey, San. Came out here to hang out? Guess things
really are getting back to normal if you're doing that.
jpnChrName: うーん、街もなかなか活気づいてきたじゃん。 うちらも何か一発盛り上がっちゃいたくね？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、街もなかなか活気づいてきたじゃん。
うちらも何か一発盛り上がっちゃいたくね？

engChrName: I hate to do this, but I have some kind of depressing news to share with you.
engSearchText:
I hate to do this, but I have some kind of depressing
news to share with you.
jpnChrName: ほら、周りがこれだと自分まで元気持て余す 感じってゆーかさぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ほら、周りがこれだと自分まで元気持て余す
感じってゆーかさぁ……

engChrName: Huh? What is it? Don't beat around the bush. Spit it out!
engSearchText:
Huh? What is it? Don't beat around the bush. Spit
it out!
jpnChrName: ふふ、サンちゃんもすっかり元通りの調子ね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、サンちゃんもすっかり元通りの調子ね。

engChrName: Well...starting tomorrow, I'm going to be running all over the place, getting interviews for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Well...starting tomorrow, I'm going to be running all
over the place, getting interviews for the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: まあ、いざ終わってみれば、やっぱ人種とかに 縛られんのもあたしらしくないなってねー。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、いざ終わってみれば、やっぱ人種とかに
縛られんのもあたしらしくないなってねー。

engChrName: Then after that, I'm pretty much going to be working constantly until the end of the year because they need me to edit and help with other stuff.
engSearchText:
Then after that, I'm pretty much going to be working
constantly until the end of the year because they need
me to edit and help with other stuff.
jpnChrName: 二人もいるし、お兄ちゃんも立ち直って お兄ちゃんなりに頑張ってるしさー。
jpnSearchText:
二人もいるし、お兄ちゃんも立ち直って
お兄ちゃんなりに頑張ってるしさー。

engChrName: And as if that wasn't enough, I'm going to be stuck in Langport working even more during the Lunar New Year. It just never ends...
engSearchText:
And as if that wasn't enough, I'm going to be stuck in
Langport working even more during the Lunar
New Year. It just never ends...
jpnChrName: ま、いつまでもあんなんじゃ、二人にも お兄ちゃんにも悪いっつーかさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、いつまでもあんなんじゃ、二人にも
お兄ちゃんにも悪いっつーかさ。

engChrName: Oh, that's it? I was expecting something worse.
engSearchText: Oh, that's it? I was expecting something worse.
jpnChrName: 良いわねぇ、それでこそのサンちゃんよ。
jpnSearchText: 良いわねぇ、それでこそのサンちゃんよ。

engChrName: (Ouch. You could sound at least a little bummed!)
engSearchText: (Ouch. You could sound at least a little bummed!)
jpnChrName: やっぱりサンちゃんは、そのありのままな 元気があってこそ“らしい”からねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりサンちゃんは、そのありのままな
元気があってこそ“らしい”からねぇ……

engChrName: 'That's it'? You know that means we won't be able to spend the holidays together like we always have, right?
engSearchText:
'That's it'? You know that means we won't be able to
spend the holidays together like we always
have, right?
jpnChrName: はは、変に傷跡が残らなくて 良かったってもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、変に傷跡が残らなくて
良かったってもんだな。

engChrName: Yeah, so? I was already planning on spending that time with my friends anyway!
engSearchText:
Yeah, so? I was already planning on spending that
time with my friends anyway!
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、ボウリングでもやりに行くか、サン？ ああいうスカッとするのやりたい気分だろ？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ、ボウリングでもやりに行くか、サン？
ああいうスカッとするのやりたい気分だろ？

engChrName: Seriously, Chen. You should hurry up and find yourself a girlfriend. There's more to life than just work and your little sister!
engSearchText:
Seriously, Chen. You should hurry up and find
yourself a girlfriend. There's more to life than just
work and your little sister!
jpnChrName: 賛成ー！
jpnSearchText: 賛成ー！

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe I've got you telling me that now, too... I don't know if I should be happy or sad that you're so grown up now...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't believe I've got you telling me that
now, too... I don't know if I should be happy or sad
that you're so grown up now...
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいんじゃないの？ たまには身体も動かしたいしね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいんじゃないの？
たまには身体も動かしたいしね。

engChrName: Edith's so lively today! We've gotta get in there and live it up, too! We can't be missing out on all the fun!
engSearchText:
Edith's so lively today! We've gotta get in there and
live it up, too! We can't be missing out on all the fun!
jpnChrName: ……っておい、サンはともかくマリリンまで 俺のアイデアに一発賛成しただと……！？
jpnSearchText:
……っておい、サンはともかくマリリンまで
俺のアイデアに一発賛成しただと……！？

engChrName: I don't know about you guys, but when I'm around this kind of atmosphere, it gets me so pumped!
engSearchText:
I don't know about you guys, but when I'm around
this kind of atmosphere, it gets me so pumped!
jpnChrName: 一年の締めになんてこった、 異変の前触れじゃねぇだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
一年の締めになんてこった、
異変の前触れじゃねぇだろうな？

engChrName: Heehee. I'm glad to see you're back to your usual self, San.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm glad to see you're back to your usual
self, San.

engChrName: I mean, when you get down to it, letting my race and stuff hold me back just isn't my style, you know?
engSearchText:
I mean, when you get down to it, letting my race and
stuff hold me back just isn't my style, you know?
jpnChrName: どうしたサン、らしくねぇぞ？ 例の事件についてショックなのはわかるが……
jpnSearchText:
どうしたサン、らしくねぇぞ？
例の事件についてショックなのはわかるが……

engChrName: Besides, I've got you and Peter. And Chen's back on his feet, doing what he does best.
engSearchText:
Besides, I've got you and Peter. And Chen's back on
his feet, doing what he does best.
jpnChrName: いや……その、通信社のお兄ちゃんから 聞いちゃってさ……
jpnSearchText:
いや……その、通信社のお兄ちゃんから
聞いちゃってさ……

engChrName: I feel like I'd be an awful friend to you guys and him if I let myself stay down in the dumps forever like that.
engSearchText:
I feel like I'd be an awful friend to you guys and him
if I let myself stay down in the dumps forever
like that.
jpnChrName: あの事件、民族問題が絡んでるかもって…… あたし、極力気にしないようにしてたのに……
jpnSearchText:
あの事件、民族問題が絡んでるかもって……
あたし、極力気にしないようにしてたのに……

engChrName: There's the San we know and love.
engSearchText: There's the San we know and love.
jpnChrName: あ……す、すまねぇ。
jpnSearchText: あ……す、すまねぇ。

engChrName: Things just aren't the same without you being all happy and full of life.
engSearchText:
Things just aren't the same without you being all
happy and full of life.

jpnSearchText:
確かにありゃ……意識すんなって言われても
難しいレベルだわな……

engChrName: Yeah, I'm glad none of that has left any scars on you or anything.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'm glad none of that has left any scars on you
or anything.

jpnSearchText: 辛いわよね……せっかく自然に馴染めてたのに……

engChrName: But enough serious talk! Who wants to go bowling, huh? Nothing more refreshing than knocking down some pins at a time like this, am I right?
engSearchText:
But enough serious talk! Who wants to go bowling,
huh? Nothing more refreshing than knocking
down some pins at a time like this, am I right?
jpnChrName: ……無理に向き合えなんて言わないわ。 でも、私達は頼っていいのよ。
jpnSearchText:
……無理に向き合えなんて言わないわ。
でも、私達は頼っていいのよ。

engChrName: I'm in! Let's go!
engSearchText: I'm in! Let's go!
jpnChrName: 民族問題を意識してもしなくても、私達が “サンちゃん”の友達なのは変わらないから。
jpnSearchText:
民族問題を意識してもしなくても、私達が
“サンちゃん”の友達なのは変わらないから。

engSearchText:
Heehee, sure. I could probably use the
exercise, honestly.

jpnSearchText: お、おう！　マリリンの言う通りだぜ。

engSearchText:
Huh?! I knew San would be game, but you're actually
agreeing with one of my ideas just like that?!
jpnChrName: オレらの前でなら好きなだけ本音を吐き出せばいい、 難しい事は落ち着いてから考えればいいぜ！
jpnSearchText:
オレらの前でなら好きなだけ本音を吐き出せばいい、

engChrName: I don't even know what's happening anymore. This better not be an omen that something weird's going to happen!
engSearchText:
I don't even know what's happening anymore.
This better not be an omen that something weird's
going to happen!

jpnSearchText:
それまでの居場所は、オレやマリリンが
どうにかしてやるからさ！

jpnSearchText:

ごめんね、あたしの意地で心配かけて……

engSearchText:
Hey, San, what's wrong? You're being really quiet.
I know you're probably shocked about what
happened, but this isn't like you.
jpnChrName: ジュディス・ランスターとマクシム何とかって レーサーがデキてたとかってマジ？
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス・ランスターとマクシム何とかって
レーサーがデキてたとかってマジ？

engSearchText:
It's just...you know how my brother works for the
Tyrell Times? He told me something.

jpnSearchText:
流石にビビったわ～最優秀女優賞逃がして
泣いてるところを食われたとかってカンジ？

engChrName: He said it might've been...racially driven. I've... I've always tried to not get wrapped up in that kind of stuff. But now...
engSearchText:
He said it might've been...racially driven. I've...
I've always tried to not get wrapped up in that kind
of stuff. But now...

jpnSearchText:
いやまぁ、驚く気持ちはわかるが……
あんまり早とちりすると恥をかくぜ？

engChrName: O-Oh... Oh. I'm so sorry.
engSearchText: O-Oh... Oh. I'm so sorry.

jpnSearchText:
今回報道したバズレイダーって雑誌は悪質で、
各芸能事務所でもブラックリスト扱いだ。

engSearchText:
Yeah, I...guess I get what you mean. Might be a little
tough to just ignore it and move on this time.
jpnChrName: そうでなくとも、有名人のプライベートと表舞台の 境界は曖昧で、それなりにデリケートなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうでなくとも、有名人のプライベートと表舞台の
境界は曖昧で、それなりにデリケートなんだよ。

engSearchText:
I feel so bad for you. You've fit in so perfectly here,
and then to have to feel that...

jpnSearchText:
え、なになに？　あのピーターがマジメで

engChrName: ...I'll say this. It's okay to confront that stuff if and only if you're ready to. Just know you can always come to Peter and me. We're here for you.
engSearchText:
...I'll say this. It's okay to confront that stuff if and
only if you're ready to. Just know you can always
come to Peter and me. We're here for you.

jpnSearchText: ナニナニ、何か変なものでも食べた？

engSearchText:
Whether or not you choose to do anything about
these issues, you'll always be our friend. And nothing
will ever change that, all right?

jpnSearchText:
あら、サンちゃん知らなかったかしら？
まあ、ピーター君回りくどくしか言わないしねぇ。

engSearchText: Yeah! What she said! I agree a hundred percent.

jpnSearchText:
ピーター君はこんな顔して、芸能事務所の社長の
ご子息、芸能御曹司なのよーこんな顔してね～。

engSearchText:
If you ever need to just get something off your chest,
we're here! It's easy to think about stuff once you've
gotten it out and cooled your head.

jpnSearchText:

We're more than happy to give you that space, San.
We'll figure it out with you! It's the least we can do.

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

thinking, letting myself get so hung up like that.

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

engSearchText:

engSearchText: What gives? Did you eat something weird today?

jpnChrName: まあ、差し入れは何にせよありがたく頂くよ。 それとは別に何か食べて帰ろうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、差し入れは何にせよありがたく頂くよ。
それとは別に何か食べて帰ろうか。

engChrName: Not that I think you're wrong. I like Golden Blood, too. How could I not as a Judith Lanster fan?
engSearchText:
Not that I think you're wrong. I like Golden
Blood, too. How could I not as a Judith Lanster fan?
jpnChrName: いやぁ、最近は他部署の手伝いが忙しくてね。 民族問題の記事がまた需要が高まってきて……
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、最近は他部署の手伝いが忙しくてね。
民族問題の記事がまた需要が高まってきて……

engChrName: You like Judith more than Nina even though she isn't Eastern? I guess she was in the running for best lead actress at the awards, but still.
engSearchText:
You like Judith more than Nina even though she
isn't Eastern? I guess she was in the running for best
lead actress at the awards, but still.
jpnChrName: あー、そういう話は良いから。 とにかく今は、さっさと食べて帰ろ？
jpnSearchText:
あー、そういう話は良いから。
とにかく今は、さっさと食べて帰ろ？

engChrName: You know San's allowed to have tastes in people and things that AREN'T Eastern, right?
engSearchText:
You know San's allowed to have tastes in people and
things that AREN'T Eastern, right?
jpnChrName: んでさぁ、親までは東方服も着てたけど、やっぱ ウチらは今風が馴染むっていうか～。
jpnSearchText:
んでさぁ、親までは東方服も着てたけど、やっぱ
ウチらは今風が馴染むっていうか～。

engChrName: She just said she preferred Judith over Nina. What's wrong with that?
engSearchText:
She just said she preferred Judith over Nina.
What's wrong with that?
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんは会社で色々民族云々の話聞くけど、 正直面倒っていうかー。
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃんは会社で色々民族云々の話聞くけど、
正直面倒っていうかー。

engChrName: Ack! I didn't mean it like that, I swear! But...yeah, that was pretty stupid of me. Sorry.
engSearchText:
Ack! I didn't mean it like that, I swear! But...yeah,
that was pretty stupid of me. Sorry.
jpnChrName: そうよねぇ、結局自分が何が好きかが一番よねぇ。 サンちゃん、先週のスタイルもイカしてたわよぉ。
jpnSearchText:
そうよねぇ、結局自分が何が好きかが一番よねぇ。
サンちゃん、先週のスタイルもイカしてたわよぉ。

engChrName: Anyway, on a different note, I heard through my dad that for the actors going to the festival—
engSearchText:
Anyway, on a different note, I heard through my dad
that for the actors going to the festival—
jpnChrName: えへへ、ありがとー。 アタシは自由よねぇ、お兄ちゃんと違ってさ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ありがとー。
アタシは自由よねぇ、お兄ちゃんと違ってさ。

engChrName: Oh, San. Are you up for some ice cream? I think they're supposed to have their seasonal flavors out now.
engSearchText:
Oh, San. Are you up for some ice cream? I think
they're supposed to have their seasonal flavors
out now.
jpnChrName: うんうん……ところでピーター君？ 遅れてきた事について何かないかしらぁ？
jpnSearchText:
うんうん……ところでピーター君？
遅れてきた事について何かないかしらぁ？

engChrName: Yeah, let's do it! Oh, and then after that, we should catch a movie!
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's do it! Oh, and then after that, we should
catch a movie!
jpnChrName: い、いやぁ本当に悪ぃって！ ちょっと寝過ごしちゃったけど反省は……
jpnSearchText:
い、いやぁ本当に悪ぃって！
ちょっと寝過ごしちゃったけど反省は……

engChrName: Hey! I'm still here, you know!
engSearchText: Hey! I'm still here, you know!
jpnChrName: ……あらぁ、さっき『何の話だ？』って遅刻早々に 空気を読まず女の子特有の話に首突っ込んで……
jpnSearchText:
……あらぁ、さっき『何の話だ？』って遅刻早々に
空気を読まず女の子特有の話に首突っ込んで……

engChrName: Chen! Why'd you have to finish your work so soon? I thought you were gonna be late, so I brought you some food to surprise you. What a waste...
engSearchText:
Chen! Why'd you have to finish your work so soon?
I thought you were gonna be late, so I brought you
some food to surprise you. What a waste...
jpnChrName: その事スルーして反省って言えるなんて、 私の知らないうちに世の中変わったのねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
その事スルーして反省って言えるなんて、
私の知らないうちに世の中変わったのねぇ。

engChrName: Hey, that stings a little. I worked really hard to get out early so we could sit down and have dinner together, you know.
engSearchText:
Hey, that stings a little. I worked really hard to get
out early so we could sit down and have dinner
together, you know.
jpnChrName: ……さっきのはマジでデリカシー無かったからね？
jpnSearchText: ……さっきのはマジでデリカシー無かったからね？

engChrName: Not that I don't appreciate what you did. Thanks, San. Wanna grab something else on the way back?
engSearchText:
Not that I don't appreciate what you did.
Thanks, San. Wanna grab something else on the
way back?
jpnChrName: うう……スミマセンデシタ。
jpnSearchText: うう……スミマセンデシタ。

engChrName: Ugh. I've been so busy pitching in with the other sections in the paper. The demand for stories about ethnic tensions in Calvard is through the roof.
engSearchText:
Ugh. I've been so busy pitching in with the other
sections in the paper. The demand for stories about
ethnic tensions in Calvard is through the roof.
jpnChrName: ただまあ、記者さん達から聞いたけど、 色々な人が街を救おうと頑張ってるらしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ、記者さん達から聞いたけど、
色々な人が街を救おうと頑張ってるらしいわね。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, that's enough of that. Come on, Chen. Let's eat somewhere and go home.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, that's enough of that. Come on, Chen.
Let's eat somewhere and go home.
jpnChrName: 今は信じて待ちましょう、またいつもの日々は 絶対に戻ってくるはずだからぁ。
jpnSearchText:
今は信じて待ちましょう、またいつもの日々は
絶対に戻ってくるはずだからぁ。

engChrName: ...Even my parents were wearing Eastern outfits. But like, we're all so much more comfortable wearing modern stuff, you know?
engSearchText:
...Even my parents were wearing Eastern outfits.
But like, we're all so much more comfortable wearing
modern stuff, you know?
jpnChrName: その時には改めて、サンちゃんのために あの話を再開したいわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
その時には改めて、サンちゃんのために
あの話を再開したいわねぇ。

engChrName: And then my brother asks me about ethnic-related stuff because of his job all the time and, honestly, thinking about all that gets old.
engSearchText:
And then my brother asks me about ethnic-related
stuff because of his job all the time and, honestly,
thinking about all that gets old.
jpnChrName: まあ……ある程度は外も落ち着いてはきた ようには見えるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……ある程度は外も落ち着いてはきた
ようには見えるけれど……

engChrName: I think you should just keep doing and wearing what you like, San. Like that one look from last week. You looked AMAZING.
engSearchText:
I think you should just keep doing and wearing what
you like, San. Like that one look from last week. You
looked AMAZING.
jpnChrName: この分じゃあ、流石にサンちゃんへの サプライズは無理ね、残念だわ～。
jpnSearchText:
この分じゃあ、流石にサンちゃんへの
サプライズは無理ね、残念だわ～。

engChrName: Aww. Thanks, Marilyn. Yeah, I like to think of myself as a pretty free spirit—unlike my brother, heehee.
engSearchText:
Aww. Thanks, Marilyn. Yeah, I like to think of
myself as a pretty free spirit—unlike my
brother, heehee.
jpnChrName: まあ、命あっての物種だし、シャッカルさんの 無事も祈って、またの機会という事で。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、命あっての物種だし、シャッカルさんの
無事も祈って、またの機会という事で。

engChrName: Yeah, you really are. And as for you, Peter, don't you have anything to say about running late? Hmm?
engSearchText:
Yeah, you really are. And as for you, Peter, don't you
have anything to say about running late? Hmm?
jpnChrName: うふふ、ピーターのＫＹっぷりは おいおいどうにかしてあげるとして……
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ピーターのＫＹっぷりは
おいおいどうにかしてあげるとして……

engChrName: I told you, I didn't mean to! I just slept in a bit too much. I promise, I won't let any of that happen again!
engSearchText:
I told you, I didn't mean to! I just slept in a bit
too much. I promise, I won't let any of that
happen again!
jpnChrName: まあ、今日も夜の約束までまだまだ時間あるし、 ３人でちゃ～んと楽しまないとねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今日も夜の約束までまだまだ時間あるし、
３人でちゃ～んと楽しまないとねぇ。

engChrName: The problem isn't just that you were late, you know. It's that you were also trying to butt into girl talk.
engSearchText:
The problem isn't just that you were late, you know.
It's that you were also trying to butt into girl talk.
jpnChrName: サンちゃんもピーターも色々乗り越えた後だし、 その意味でもお祝いしたい気分だしねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
サンちゃんもピーターも色々乗り越えた後だし、
その意味でもお祝いしたい気分だしねぇ～。

engChrName: Do you have anything to say for yourself? Or is it suddenly all right for men to barge into conversations whenever they like?
engSearchText:
Do you have anything to say for yourself? Or is it
suddenly all right for men to barge into conversations
whenever they like?
jpnChrName: うふふ、まあ最後に決めるのは サンちゃん自身だけど……
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、まあ最後に決めるのは
サンちゃん自身だけど……

engChrName: ...Yeah. She's right, Peter. You were pretty insensitive.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. She's right, Peter. You were
pretty insensitive.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの子が自分らしく生きてて良かったって 思える機会になれば嬉しいわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの子が自分らしく生きてて良かったって
思える機会になれば嬉しいわねぇ。

engChrName: G-Gah! You've... You've got me there. I'm sorry, girls. Seriously, I am.
engSearchText:
G-Gah! You've... You've got me there. I'm
sorry, girls. Seriously, I am.
jpnChrName: さて、サンちゃんはひとまず元気に なってくれて何よりだけど……
jpnSearchText:
さて、サンちゃんはひとまず元気に
なってくれて何よりだけど……

engChrName: The news reporter said there's lots of people out there trying to save the city right now.
engSearchText:
The news reporter said there's lots of people out
there trying to save the city right now.
jpnChrName: ま、いつまでも私達も不変という訳にも いかないのも事実なのよね……
jpnSearchText:
ま、いつまでも私達も不変という訳にも
いかないのも事実なのよね……

engChrName: As long as we hang in there, everything will go back to the way it was sooner or later.
engSearchText:
As long as we hang in there, everything will go back
to the way it was sooner or later.
jpnChrName: そろそろ、私もサンちゃんのために ちょっとばかり……ね。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ、私もサンちゃんのために
ちょっとばかり……ね。

engChrName: And when it does, we're all going to sit down and have that talk with San we've been planning on for real.
engSearchText:
And when it does, we're all going to sit down and
have that talk with San we've been planning on
for real.
jpnChrName: サンちゃんの自分らしく生きたいから民族の事を 意識しないってスタイル、別に変じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
サンちゃんの自分らしく生きたいから民族の事を
意識しないってスタイル、別に変じゃないわ。

engChrName: Hmm... It seems like things have managed to calm down outside.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It seems like things have managed to calm
down outside.
jpnChrName: でも、そうやって生きるなら、自分が作った 友達にはもっと甘えても良いと思うの。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そうやって生きるなら、自分が作った
友達にはもっと甘えても良いと思うの。

engChrName: But I don't think we're going to be able to give San her big surprise today, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
But I don't think we're going to be able to give San
her big surprise today, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: だって、そうやって自分らしくしてきたからこそ 出会えた仲なんだものー。
jpnSearchText:
だって、そうやって自分らしくしてきたからこそ
出会えた仲なんだものー。

engChrName: Oh, well. Making sure everyone's all right comes first. Hopefully Shakar will be okay so we can still have that conversation later.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Making sure everyone's all right comes first.
Hopefully Shakar will be okay so we can still have
that conversation later.
jpnChrName: ピーター君、こうはっきりできない性分だから 遅刻するわ父親と仲違いするわなのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ピーター君、こうはっきりできない性分だから
遅刻するわ父親と仲違いするわなのよねぇ。

engChrName: Heehee. We're going to make absolute sure Peter learns to read delicate situations better.
engSearchText:
Heehee. We're going to make absolute sure Peter
learns to read delicate situations better.
jpnChrName: 私達にも、早めに割り切ってはっきり言っちゃえば 何かと神経使わなくて楽だったかもしれないのに。
jpnSearchText:
私達にも、早めに割り切ってはっきり言っちゃえば
何かと神経使わなくて楽だったかもしれないのに。

engChrName: Anyhow, it seems like we still have a few hours before our meeting with Shakar tonight. I plan on spending that time with these two.
engSearchText:
Anyhow, it seems like we still have a few hours
before our meeting with Shakar tonight. I plan on
spending that time with these two.
jpnChrName: ほんと、こういう難儀なところは顔の通りよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ほんと、こういう難儀なところは顔の通りよねぇ。

engChrName: I'd like to celebrate both San and Peter's recent growth soon. They deserve it.
engSearchText:
I'd like to celebrate both San and Peter's recent
growth soon. They deserve it.
jpnChrName: ピーター君なら知らないけど、 たまにはいなくなって良いんじゃないかしら～？
jpnSearchText:
ピーター君なら知らないけど、
たまにはいなくなって良いんじゃないかしら～？

engChrName: At the end of the day, it'll be up to San whether to pursue this modeling opportunity or not.
engSearchText:
At the end of the day, it'll be up to San whether to
pursue this modeling opportunity or not.
jpnChrName: ほら、あんなのでも黄昏たくなる 時くらいはあるんじゃあないの～？
jpnSearchText:
ほら、あんなのでも黄昏たくなる
時くらいはあるんじゃあないの～？

engChrName: But I hope she does. She'll finally get recognition for living by nobody's rules but her own.
engSearchText:
But I hope she does. She'll finally get recognition for
living by nobody's rules but her own.
jpnChrName: ピーター君、スルーされてしおれちゃったわねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ピーター君、スルーされてしおれちゃったわねぇ。

engChrName: I'm relieved to see San's feeling better.
engSearchText: I'm relieved to see San's feeling better.
jpnChrName: まあ、ピーター君は空気読まれない側の 気持ち、もう少し判った方が良いしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ピーター君は空気読まれない側の
気持ち、もう少し判った方が良いしねぇ。

engChrName: But I suppose it is true that things aren't always going to stay the same between us three. That's just not how life works.
engSearchText:
But I suppose it is true that things aren't always going
to stay the same between us three. That's just not
how life works.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今日は三人でどこに行って 遊ぶとしようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今日は三人でどこに行って
遊ぶとしようかしら。

engChrName: I need to start making more of an effort to understand where she's coming from. As her friend, it's the least I could do.
engSearchText:
I need to start making more of an effort to understand
where she's coming from. As her friend, it's the least I
could do.
jpnChrName: どうせピーターに奢らせるし、 たまには贅沢したいわよねー。
jpnSearchText:
どうせピーターに奢らせるし、
たまには贅沢したいわよねー。

engChrName: I don't think it's strange for San to wear things that aren't associated with her heritage. She just wants to walk to the beat of her own drum.
engSearchText:
I don't think it's strange for San to wear things that
aren't associated with her heritage. She just wants
to walk to the beat of her own drum.
jpnChrName: はは、せっかくの１年の締め括りだってのに、 気抜けてたのかな、悪い癖出ちゃったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、せっかくの１年の締め括りだってのに、
気抜けてたのかな、悪い癖出ちゃったぜ。

engChrName: I just wish she would realize that it's okay for her to rely on us sometimes.
engSearchText:
I just wish she would realize that it's okay for her to
rely on us sometimes.
jpnChrName: ま、どの道俺は今夜は親父と飯食うしな、 二人について行くのは出来ねぇけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、どの道俺は今夜は親父と飯食うしな、
二人について行くのは出来ねぇけどさ。

engChrName: I mean, we're her friends BECAUSE of how unique she is. That's why we were able to meet in the first place.
engSearchText:
I mean, we're her friends BECAUSE of how unique
she is. That's why we were able to meet in the
first place.
jpnChrName: 親父の経営者気質な考え方の押し付け…… 少しだけ話してみりゃ、よくある理屈だったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
親父の経営者気質な考え方の押し付け……
少しだけ話してみりゃ、よくある理屈だったぜ。

engChrName: Peter's so bad at being direct that it always gets him into trouble. When it's not making him late, it's causing problems with his dad.
engSearchText:
Peter's so bad at being direct that it always gets him
into trouble. When it's not making him late, it's
causing problems with his dad.
jpnChrName: 一応は俺のためっていうが……まあ、 親父に教えられるのもアレだけなんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
一応は俺のためっていうが……まあ、
親父に教えられるのもアレだけなんだろうな。

engChrName: We could've put this behind us a lot sooner if he had just come out and told us what he needed to.
engSearchText:
We could've put this behind us a lot sooner if he had
just come out and told us what he needed to.
jpnChrName: 結局のところ、自分が何したいかもはっきり させない俺を見かねてたって事か。
jpnSearchText:
結局のところ、自分が何したいかもはっきり
させない俺を見かねてたって事か。

engChrName: Instead, he gets all sheepish and makes everything worse... *sigh*
engSearchText:
Instead, he gets all sheepish and makes
everything worse... *sigh*
jpnChrName: ……ったく、だからってあんな風に威圧しなくても。 ま、不器用なのはお互い様って事か……
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、だからってあんな風に威圧しなくても。
ま、不器用なのはお互い様って事か……

engChrName: Honestly, it might be better to NOT have Peter around sometimes.
engSearchText:
Honestly, it might be better to NOT have Peter
around sometimes.
jpnChrName: 考えてみりゃ、親父からはこういう話をするのも 最近はめっきり無くなってたよな。
jpnSearchText:
考えてみりゃ、親父からはこういう話をするのも
最近はめっきり無くなってたよな。

engChrName: I mean, he can kill the mood with even the littlest things. I like him, but having to deal with the guy can be a little much.
engSearchText:
I mean, he can kill the mood with even the littlest
things. I like him, but having to deal with the guy can
be a little much.
jpnChrName: ったく、親父も本当に不器用だ……まあ不器用同士、 またチビチビ口喧嘩していくしかないわな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、親父も本当に不器用だ……まあ不器用同士、
またチビチビ口喧嘩していくしかないわな。

engChrName: Peter looked so dejected once he realized he was being ignored.
engSearchText:
Peter looked so dejected once he realized he was
being ignored.
jpnChrName: さて、サンもこの通り持ち直したし…… 俺もいい加減、親父と話してみるかな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、サンもこの通り持ち直したし……
俺もいい加減、親父と話してみるかな。

engChrName: Maybe that'll give him a little idea of what it's like to deal with someone who's insensitive and doesn't pay attention to how you're feeling.
engSearchText:
Maybe that'll give him a little idea of what it's like to
deal with someone who's insensitive and doesn't pay
attention to how you're feeling.
jpnChrName: あまりに自然だからたまに忘れるが…… サンもこういう境遇抱えてんだよな……
jpnSearchText:
あまりに自然だからたまに忘れるが……
サンもこういう境遇抱えてんだよな……

engChrName: Now, where should we hang out today?
engSearchText: Now, where should we hang out today?
jpnChrName: それを意識しないで、自然にオレらに 馴染んで明るくして……
jpnSearchText:
それを意識しないで、自然にオレらに
馴染んで明るくして……

engChrName: I'm going to make Peter spoil us real good for being such a jerk earlier. So, let's be sure to pick somewhere nice to eat.
engSearchText:
I'm going to make Peter spoil us real good for being
such a jerk earlier. So, let's be sure to pick
somewhere nice to eat.
jpnChrName: ……それに比べちゃ、オレの家の事情なんて 大した事もねぇ、いい加減ちゃんと向き合うか。
jpnSearchText:
……それに比べちゃ、オレの家の事情なんて
大した事もねぇ、いい加減ちゃんと向き合うか。

engChrName: Man, I can't believe I let my guard down and slipped back into that old habit right as the year's about to end...
engSearchText:
Man, I can't believe I let my guard down and slipped
back into that old habit right as the year's about
to end...
jpnChrName: そもそもサンは俺ん家の事知らなかったのかよ…… 一応それとなく言ってた気がするんだがなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
そもそもサンは俺ん家の事知らなかったのかよ……
一応それとなく言ってた気がするんだがなぁ……

engChrName: Oh, well. I'm having dinner tonight with my dad anyway, so I won't be able to tag along with the girls on whatever they're doing.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I'm having dinner tonight with my dad
anyway, so I won't be able to tag along with the girls
on whatever they're doing.
jpnChrName: ……映画祭で色々あったって話聞いて、 初めて親父の心配しちまったよ……
jpnSearchText:
……映画祭で色々あったって話聞いて、
初めて親父の心配しちまったよ……

engChrName: Once I sat down and talked with my dad, his reasons for trying to push his business-oriented thinking onto me started to make a lot more sense.
engSearchText:
Once I sat down and talked with my dad, his reasons
for trying to push his business-oriented thinking onto
me started to make a lot more sense.
jpnChrName: まあ、そうだよなぁ……親父に聞いた事を 話したくなる段階で反抗しきれてないっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そうだよなぁ……親父に聞いた事を
話したくなる段階で反抗しきれてないっつーか……

engChrName: It's supposed to be 'for my own good.' Really, I think that might be all that my dad really has to share with me when you get down to it.
engSearchText:
It's supposed to be 'for my own good.' Really, I think
that might be all that my dad really has to share with
me when you get down to it.
jpnChrName: 何つーか、情けねぇよなぁ……女友達相手にも 空気読めねぇし……器用になりてぇよ……
jpnSearchText:
何つーか、情けねぇよなぁ……女友達相手にも
空気読めねぇし……器用になりてぇよ……

engChrName: Really, when you get down to it, I guess he just felt like he had to do something about me not knowing what I really want to do with myself.
engSearchText:
Really, when you get down to it, I guess he just felt
like he had to do something about me not knowing
what I really want to do with myself.
jpnChrName: 俺だって親父と色々あるってマリリンも 知っているだろうに……
jpnSearchText:
俺だって親父と色々あるってマリリンも
知っているだろうに……

engChrName: He could've tried to be a little less...overbearing about it. Sheesh. But I guess he's not the only one in the family who's clumsy like that. *sigh*
engSearchText:
He could've tried to be a little less...overbearing
about it. Sheesh. But I guess he's not the only one in
the family who's clumsy like that. *sigh*
jpnChrName: それなのに二人が喜びそうな話持ってきて このザマになるなんて……辛ェなァ……
jpnSearchText:
それなのに二人が喜びそうな話持ってきて
このザマになるなんて……辛ェなァ……

engChrName: In hindsight, my dad and I haven't had any conversations like that recently at all.
engSearchText:
In hindsight, my dad and I haven't had any
conversations like that recently at all.
jpnChrName: ……うわ、また親父の会社の 名前が雑誌に載ってやがるよ……
jpnSearchText:
……うわ、また親父の会社の
名前が雑誌に載ってやがるよ……

engChrName: Man, my dad can be so awkward at times. Not that he's the only one. We've probably still got a lot of arguing in our future. Ugh...
engSearchText:
Man, my dad can be so awkward at times. Not that
he's the only one. We've probably still got a lot of
arguing in our future. Ugh...
jpnChrName: こんなイケイケな雑誌に載りやがって…… 家での態度とギャップあり過ぎんだろ……
jpnSearchText:
こんなイケイケな雑誌に載りやがって……
家での態度とギャップあり過ぎんだろ……

engChrName: Well, if San's doing better now, maybe it's about time I sucked it up and tried to talk to my dad.
engSearchText:
Well, if San's doing better now, maybe it's about time
I sucked it up and tried to talk to my dad.
jpnChrName: 芸能系っつっても経営者肌なのは判るが…… その観点とか押し付けないで欲しいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
芸能系っつっても経営者肌なのは判るが……
その観点とか押し付けないで欲しいなぁ……

engChrName: We all get along so naturally with San, it's easy to forget sometimes what sort of position she's in within society.
engSearchText:
We all get along so naturally with San, it's easy to
forget sometimes what sort of position she's in
within society.
jpnChrName: ちきしょう……マリリンの目線が ぶっ刺さってくるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ちきしょう……マリリンの目線が
ぶっ刺さってくるんだが……

engChrName: But she tries not to let any of that bother her and happily embraces people like us. It's pretty amazing when you think about it.
engSearchText:
But she tries not to let any of that bother her and
happily embraces people like us. It's pretty amazing
when you think about it.
jpnChrName: そりゃ着いた時、まさかあんな生々しい女子トーク してると思わず首突っ込んだのは悪かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ着いた時、まさかあんな生々しい女子トーク
してると思わず首突っ込んだのは悪かったけど……

engChrName: ...When it comes down to it, my problems pale in comparison to hers. Maybe it's time I sat down and really settled the score back home.
engSearchText:
...When it comes down to it, my problems pale in
comparison to hers. Maybe it's time I sat down and
really settled the score back home.
jpnChrName: マリリン、遅刻したり空気読み違えたりした時、 いっつも俺にミラ出させやがって……
jpnSearchText:
マリリン、遅刻したり空気読み違えたりした時、
いっつも俺にミラ出させやがって……

engChrName: Did San really not know about it? I could've sworn I at least told her once before... Huh.
engSearchText:
Did San really not know about it? I could've sworn I
at least told her once before... Huh.
jpnChrName: 何か大きな作戦が始まるらしいわね。 ……それで元に戻ればいいけど……
jpnSearchText:
何か大きな作戦が始まるらしいわね。
……それで元に戻ればいいけど……

engChrName: I heard a lot of crazy stuff went down at the film festival. It was the first time I ever felt worried about my dad...
