engSearchText:
I heard a lot of crazy stuff went down at the
film festival. It was the first time I ever felt worried
about my dad...
jpnChrName: ともかく、サイデン本署とも連絡が取れたし 私たちも全力で支えるだけよ！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、サイデン本署とも連絡が取れたし
私たちも全力で支えるだけよ！

engChrName: For all the bad blood there is between us, I guess I'm not against at least sitting down and asking him about what happened. Hmm...
engSearchText:
For all the bad blood there is between us, I guess I'm
not against at least sitting down and asking him about
what happened. Hmm...
jpnChrName: 貴方達は重要な役を担ってるとか── 詳しい事情は知らないけど、どうか応援させて！
jpnSearchText:
貴方達は重要な役を担ってるとか──
詳しい事情は知らないけど、どうか応援させて！

engChrName: Ugh! Man, I am so pathetic... How can I be friends with those two girls and yet so bad at reading their minds? I'm such a doofus.
engSearchText:
Ugh! Man, I am so pathetic... How can I be friends
with those two girls and yet so bad at reading
their minds? I'm such a doofus.
jpnChrName: みんなでもう一度、あの日常を取り戻すために！
jpnSearchText: みんなでもう一度、あの日常を取り戻すために！

engChrName: Marilyn knows I'm dealing with a lot of stuff when it comes to my dad.
engSearchText:
Marilyn knows I'm dealing with a lot of stuff when it
comes to my dad.
jpnChrName: 頭の中が混乱しまくってて 正直何が起きてるのかサッパリだけど……
jpnSearchText:
頭の中が混乱しまくってて
正直何が起きてるのかサッパリだけど……

engChrName: Yet here I am, being left out in the cold while she apparently has something happy and exciting to share just with San. It sucks.
engSearchText:
Yet here I am, being left out in the cold while she
apparently has something happy and exciting to share
just with San. It sucks.
jpnChrName: 警察として、この場は任されたわ！ 貴方達は先に向かって頂戴！！
jpnSearchText:
警察として、この場は任されたわ！
貴方達は先に向かって頂戴！！

engChrName: Ack... My dad's company is being featured in a magazine again.
engSearchText:
Ack... My dad's company is being featured in a
magazine again.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに見たけど、やっぱり凄いわね ラハドさんの体術は……！
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりに見たけど、やっぱり凄いわね
ラハドさんの体術は……！

engChrName: It's such a peppy magazine, too. He looks completely different from the way he really acts at home. It's insane!
engSearchText:
It's such a peppy magazine, too. He looks
completely different from the way he really acts
at home. It's insane!
jpnChrName: 正直、私もこういうの見てると 憧れちゃうっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
正直、私もこういうの見てると
憧れちゃうっていうか……

engChrName: Not saying there's anything wrong with acting more like a businessman when you're in entertainment. I just wish he didn't push his views onto me.
engSearchText:
Not saying there's anything wrong with acting more
like a businessman when you're in entertainment.
I just wish he didn't push his views onto me.
jpnChrName: う～ん、負けてられないわ！ 私たちも気合を入れていかないと！！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、負けてられないわ！
私たちも気合を入れていかないと！！

engChrName: ...Marilyn's shooting some serious daggers at me.
engSearchText: ...Marilyn's shooting some serious daggers at me.
jpnChrName: ちょうど年末だし、記念祭が終わったら 休みを取るのもアリかもね……
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど年末だし、記念祭が終わったら
休みを取るのもアリかもね……

engChrName: Look, I'll cop up to the fact that I messed up. I didn't think those two were having such an intense conversation and thought I could just join in.
engSearchText:
Look, I'll cop up to the fact that I messed up. I didn't
think those two were having such an intense
conversation and thought I could just join in.
jpnChrName: これも全力で仕事をするため、 年末に向けて英気を養うってことで！
jpnSearchText:
これも全力で仕事をするため、
年末に向けて英気を養うってことで！

engChrName: But does Marilyn really have to make me literally pay for it every time I'm a little late or I misinterpret something? I mean, come on!
engSearchText:
But does Marilyn really have to make me literally pay
for it every time I'm a little late or I misinterpret
something? I mean, come on!
jpnChrName: マフィアの摘発も落ち着いてきたし、 そろそろ革命記念祭に軸足が移ってきてるわね。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの摘発も落ち着いてきたし、
そろそろ革命記念祭に軸足が移ってきてるわね。

engChrName: I guess some big operation is about to get underway. I hope it works and everything goes back to the way it was before, but...we'll see.
engSearchText:
I guess some big operation is about to get underway.
I hope it works and everything goes back to the way it
was before, but...we'll see.
jpnChrName: 今年は事件も多かったし……市民が安心して 楽しめるよう、私たちも頑張らないと！
jpnSearchText:
今年は事件も多かったし……市民が安心して
楽しめるよう、私たちも頑張らないと！

engChrName: Anyway, I've made contact with HQ over in Seiden, so we're here to offer our full support!
engSearchText:
Anyway, I've made contact with HQ over in Seiden,
so we're here to offer our full support!
jpnChrName: はあ、今朝は妙に騒がしいと思ったら、 どこぞの有名人のスキャンダルだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
はあ、今朝は妙に騒がしいと思ったら、
どこぞの有名人のスキャンダルだなんて……

engChrName: I don't know the details about what you guys are up to, but I'm rooting for you all! Whatever it is, it sounds like you've got an enormous job.
engSearchText:
I don't know the details about what you guys are up
to, but I'm rooting for you all! Whatever it is, it
sounds like you've got an enormous job.
jpnChrName: 正直くだらないって言いたいけど……首都警察（うち）にも プレイボーイな捜査官がいるからねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
正直くだらないって言いたいけど……首都警察（うち）にも
プレイボーイな捜査官がいるからねぇ……

engChrName: We're all in this together! We can't lose what we had!
engSearchText: We're all in this together! We can't lose what we had!
jpnChrName: 正直、もし警察がゴシップ誌に目をつけられたらって 思うと微妙に他人事じゃない気がするわ……
jpnSearchText:
正直、もし警察がゴシップ誌に目をつけられたらって
思うと微妙に他人事じゃない気がするわ……

engChrName: My head is spinning so much trying to process everything. I have no idea what in the world is even going on right now.
engSearchText:
My head is spinning so much trying to
process everything. I have no idea what in the world
is even going on right now.
jpnChrName: ていうかあのバズレイダー、こんな事で 恨み買いまくっていいのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ていうかあのバズレイダー、こんな事で
恨み買いまくっていいのかしら？

engChrName: But that's okay. Don't worry about me. You guys go on ahead! I've got this area under control!
engSearchText:
But that's okay. Don't worry about me. You guys go
on ahead! I've got this area under control!
jpnChrName: 正直、こんなくだらない事で通信社が 襲われたりしても関わりたくないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
正直、こんなくだらない事で通信社が
襲われたりしても関わりたくないんだけど……

engChrName: Lahad's moves are always so impressive! I hadn't seen him do martial arts for a while.
engSearchText:
Lahad's moves are always so impressive! I hadn't seen
him do martial arts for a while.
jpnChrName: さーて、夜の巡回もきっちりやらないとね！
jpnSearchText: さーて、夜の巡回もきっちりやらないとね！

engChrName: Truth be told, I can't help but look up to someone like that when I see they're so talented...
engSearchText:
Truth be told, I can't help but look up to someone
like that when I see they're so talented...
jpnChrName: 最近は悪質な連中もいるみたいだし…… 警察も目を光らせておかないと！
jpnSearchText:
最近は悪質な連中もいるみたいだし……
警察も目を光らせておかないと！

engChrName: Gah! We police have GOT to get it together! We can't have a bracer outshining us!
engSearchText:
Gah! We police have GOT to get it together!
We can't have a bracer outshining us!
jpnChrName: メッセルダムの方であった一件で、首都警察も 不審者や不審物への警戒を強めているんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムの方であった一件で、首都警察も
不審者や不審物への警戒を強めているんだけど……

engChrName: Seeing as New Year's is just around the corner, once the Revolution Festival's behind us, I'm thinking I might be due for a little vacation.
engSearchText:
Seeing as New Year's is just around the corner, once
the Revolution Festival's behind us, I'm thinking I
might be due for a little vacation.
jpnChrName: 貴方達も、一応何か見つけたら とりあえず警察に一報するようにね？
jpnSearchText:
貴方達も、一応何か見つけたら
とりあえず警察に一報するようにね？

engChrName: Can't stay on top of my game as an officer for the end of the year unless I take time off to recharge while I can!
engSearchText:
Can't stay on top of my game as an officer for the end
of the year unless I take time off to recharge while
I can!
jpnChrName: テロ対策なんてのはそれこそ警察の領分でしょ、 あんまり先走って首突っ込み過ぎないように。
jpnSearchText:
テロ対策なんてのはそれこそ警察の領分でしょ、
あんまり先走って首突っ込み過ぎないように。

engChrName: Now that the mafia crackdown's mostly behind us, our attention's finally starting to turn towards the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Now that the mafia crackdown's mostly behind us,
our attention's finally starting to turn towards the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: （前から軽そうな人だと思ってたけど……   ………うん、ないわね………）
jpnSearchText:
（前から軽そうな人だと思ってたけど……
………うん、ないわね………）

engChrName: This country's been through a lot this year. We've got to do everything we can to ensure the people of this city can enjoy themselves safely!
engSearchText:
This country's been through a lot this year. We've got
to do everything we can to ensure the people of this
city can enjoy themselves safely!
jpnChrName: 一応、貴方のお陰で あの当たり屋を逮捕できたけど……
jpnSearchText:
一応、貴方のお陰で
あの当たり屋を逮捕できたけど……

engChrName: *sigh* I had a feeling people were in a weird frenzy this morning, but I didn't think the reason was because of some celebrity scandal.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I had a feeling people were in a weird frenzy
this morning, but I didn't think the reason was
because of some celebrity scandal.
jpnChrName: いかがわしい商売も程々にしなさいよ？ 警察としても対応に困るんだから。
jpnSearchText:
いかがわしい商売も程々にしなさいよ？
警察としても対応に困るんだから。

engChrName: Part of me wants to write all that off as just dumb noise, but...between you and me, we do have some investigators in our ranks who are playboys.
engSearchText:
Part of me wants to write all that off as just dumb
noise, but...between you and me, we do have some
investigators in our ranks who are playboys.
jpnChrName: ……貴方達があの、元凶だっていう “球”を壊してくれたんだってね？
jpnSearchText:
……貴方達があの、元凶だっていう
“球”を壊してくれたんだってね？

engChrName: If someone on the force ended up on a tabloid, I'd probably take it a little more personally. We are talking about colleagues here, after all.
engSearchText:
If someone on the force ended up on a tabloid, I'd
probably take it a little more personally. We are
talking about colleagues here, after all.
jpnChrName: 黒月とも共同になりそうなのは複雑だけど…… この機会、無駄にはしないわ！
jpnSearchText:
黒月とも共同になりそうなのは複雑だけど……
この機会、無駄にはしないわ！

engChrName: Still, I don't know if Buzzraider's doing themselves any favors by attracting so much ire. They're playing with fire, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
Still, I don't know if Buzzraider's doing themselves
any favors by attracting so much ire. They're playing
with fire, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: うふふ、うちらも一応警官、 最低限は戦えるしなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、うちらも一応警官、
最低限は戦えるしなぁ！

engChrName: If they end up getting raided because of something dumb they did, I hope I don't get roped into it, but knowing my luck...
engSearchText:
If they end up getting raided because of something
dumb they did, I hope I don't get roped into it, but
knowing my luck...
jpnChrName: ……ホンマ言うとおっかなくて 膝頭ガックガクやけど、本分は果たすで！
jpnSearchText:
……ホンマ言うとおっかなくて
膝頭ガックガクやけど、本分は果たすで！

engChrName: Well, let's get this show on the road! This city isn't going to patrol itself at night!
engSearchText:
Well, let's get this show on the road! This city isn't
going to patrol itself at night!
jpnChrName: 市民が逃げ込んどる建物は守りぬくさかい、 あんたらは振り向かへんことや……！
jpnSearchText:
市民が逃げ込んどる建物は守りぬくさかい、
あんたらは振り向かへんことや……！

engChrName: We seem to be having some unsavory characters prowling around lately, but I've got them in my sight! Nothing escapes this officer's watch!
engSearchText:
We seem to be having some unsavory characters
prowling around lately, but I've got them in my sight!
Nothing escapes this officer's watch!
jpnChrName: ハッ、あのお節介な婦警さん達も随分と 頼もしくなりやがって……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あのお節介な婦警さん達も随分と
頼もしくなりやがって……

engChrName: After what happened in Messeldam, the Edith police are on high alert for any suspicious people or objects.
engSearchText:
After what happened in Messeldam, the Edith police
are on high alert for any suspicious people or objects.
jpnChrName: わかった、この場はあんた達に任せて 俺達は先に進ませてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
わかった、この場はあんた達に任せて
俺達は先に進ませてもらうぜ。

engChrName: If you guys uncover anything like that, make sure to at least report it to us. Understand?
engSearchText:
If you guys uncover anything like that, make sure to
at least report it to us. Understand?
jpnChrName: うん、どうか気を付けて……！ 無茶だけはしないのよ！？
jpnSearchText:
うん、どうか気を付けて……！
無茶だけはしないのよ！？

engChrName: Don't just jump the gun and try to take care of it yourselves. Terror threats are within our jurisdiction, too, you know.
engSearchText:
Don't just jump the gun and try to take care of
it yourselves. Terror threats are within our
jurisdiction, too, you know.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、市民が協力的でよかったとはいえ、 非常事態宣言から記念祭って続くと疲れるわね。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、市民が協力的でよかったとはいえ、
非常事態宣言から記念祭って続くと疲れるわね。

engChrName: (I always thought this guy was a gross playboy. Now that I've talked to him...it turns out he is a gross playboy. Shocking.)
engSearchText:
(I always thought this guy was a gross playboy.
Now that I've talked to him...it turns out he is a
gross playboy. Shocking.)
jpnChrName: 今年の記念祭、地方や外国から来る人も 例年の比じゃないって予想されてるんでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
今年の記念祭、地方や外国から来る人も
例年の比じゃないって予想されてるんでしょ？

engChrName: Listen: you have our thanks for helping us arrest that scammer. We couldn't have caught him without you.
engSearchText:
Listen: you have our thanks for helping us arrest
that scammer. We couldn't have caught him
without you.
jpnChrName: せやねぇ、せめて一ヶ月くらい 空いてれば休みも取れるっちゅーのに……
jpnSearchText:
せやねぇ、せめて一ヶ月くらい
空いてれば休みも取れるっちゅーのに……

engChrName: But try to keep yourselves out of any shady business from now on, all right? It only makes more trouble for us police in the long run.
engSearchText:
But try to keep yourselves out of any shady business
from now on, all right? It only makes more trouble for
us police in the long run.
jpnChrName: せや！　記念祭が終わったら 二人で休みとって、旅行でも行かへん！？
jpnSearchText:
せや！　記念祭が終わったら
二人で休みとって、旅行でも行かへん！？

engChrName: It sounds like you guys are the ones who broke those spheres causing all the trouble, right?
engSearchText:
It sounds like you guys are the ones who broke those
spheres causing all the trouble, right?
jpnChrName: 女二人でぶらり旅、ええやんええやん～！ 癒しスポットを巡ってストレス発散やー！！
jpnSearchText:
女二人でぶらり旅、ええやんええやん～！
癒しスポットを巡ってストレス発散やー！！

engChrName: I've got really mixed feelings about teaming up with Heiyue, of all groups, but...we have to make the most of what we have right now!
engSearchText:
I've got really mixed feelings about teaming up with
Heiyue, of all groups, but...we have to make the most
of what we have right now!
jpnChrName: も、もうナンシーったら…… まだ仕事だって色々あるのに……
jpnSearchText:
も、もうナンシーったら……
まだ仕事だって色々あるのに……

engChrName: Exactly. We're police officers! We can fight, too!
engSearchText: Exactly. We're police officers! We can fight, too!
jpnChrName: ……でもまあ、たまの息抜きくらいなら…… 最近潤いもないし……
jpnSearchText:
……でもまあ、たまの息抜きくらいなら……
最近潤いもないし……

engChrName: I may be scared out of my mind and my legs are shakin' like crazy right now, but I've got a job to do and I'll do it, darn it!
engSearchText:
I may be scared out of my mind and my legs are
shakin' like crazy right now, but I've got a job to do
and I'll do it, darn it!
jpnChrName: やろやろ～？　休養は必要やで！ バリバリ仕事するためにもなぁ～！
jpnSearchText:
やろやろ～？　休養は必要やで！
バリバリ仕事するためにもなぁ～！

engChrName: So all of you keep movin' forward and don't look back! We'll protect the buildings the civilians are sheltering in—no matter what it takes.
engSearchText:
So all of you keep movin' forward and don't
look back! We'll protect the buildings the civilians
are sheltering in—no matter what it takes.
jpnChrName: 解決屋、あんたが何をしていたのか知らないけど、 お互い困難は乗り越えられたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
解決屋、あんたが何をしていたのか知らないけど、
お互い困難は乗り越えられたみたいだね。

engChrName: Well, I'll be damned. I always thought you ladies were just nosey busybodies, but you're actually makin' yourselves useful.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll be damned. I always thought you ladies were
just nosey busybodies, but you're actually makin'
yourselves useful.
jpnChrName: こっちもまあ、警察もアルマータの関係者の 捜索に駆り出されてたけど、ひと段落したしね。
jpnSearchText:
こっちもまあ、警察もアルマータの関係者の
捜索に駆り出されてたけど、ひと段落したしね。

engChrName: Anyway, that all works for us. We'll keep movin' while you two hold down the fort here. 'Preciate it.
engSearchText:
Anyway, that all works for us. We'll keep movin'
while you two hold down the fort here. 'Preciate it.
jpnChrName: そういえば、あの状況下であんたらの姿が 見えへんな～ってカリンも心配しとったで。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、あの状況下であんたらの姿が
見えへんな～ってカリンも心配しとったで。

engChrName: No problem! Just take care out there. Don't do anything too crazy if you can help it!
engSearchText:
No problem! Just take care out there. Don't do
anything too crazy if you can help it!
jpnChrName: いや、だから別に心配って言っても、 面倒事に繋がらないかってだけで……
jpnSearchText:
いや、だから別に心配って言っても、
面倒事に繋がらないかってだけで……

engChrName: I'm glad the civilians are being so cooperative and all, but let me tell you, going from the emergency declaration to the festival's got me worn out.
engSearchText:
I'm glad the civilians are being so cooperative and all,
but let me tell you, going from the emergency
declaration to the festival's got me worn out.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの状況なりに解決依頼ってのはある。 ま、そいつを片付けてきたってところだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの状況なりに解決依頼ってのはある。
ま、そいつを片付けてきたってところだ。

engChrName: And that's BEFORE getting into how a greater proportion are expected to be coming in from out of town. Even out of the country!
engSearchText:
And that's BEFORE getting into how a greater
proportion are expected to be coming in from out
of town. Even out of the country!
jpnChrName: そっちも非常事態宣言の次は 残党狩りの手伝いとはな、ご苦労なこった。
jpnSearchText:
そっちも非常事態宣言の次は
残党狩りの手伝いとはな、ご苦労なこった。

engChrName: Right? I wish we could get a month in between so we can catch our breath a little.
engSearchText:
Right? I wish we could get a month in between so we
can catch our breath a little.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アルマータの摘発言うても、 うちらは本当に大した事はしてへんで。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アルマータの摘発言うても、
うちらは本当に大した事はしてへんで。

engChrName: I know! Once the festival's all wrapped up, do you wanna go on a vacation somewhere together?
engSearchText:
I know! Once the festival's all wrapped up, do you
wanna go on a vacation somewhere together?
jpnChrName: せいぜいが家宅捜索の時に野次馬を追い払ったり、 市民に協力を呼び掛けたりってくらいやー。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜいが家宅捜索の時に野次馬を追い払ったり、
市民に協力を呼び掛けたりってくらいやー。

engChrName: Sounds nice, huh? Just us gals wanderin' around, relaxing and shakin' off all that pent-up stress! Oh, how I need it!
engSearchText:
Sounds nice, huh? Just us gals wanderin' around,
relaxing and shakin' off all that pent-up stress!
Oh, how I need it!
jpnChrName: まあ、基本はＣＩＤが中心って事に 変わりは無いしね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、基本はＣＩＤが中心って事に
変わりは無いしね。

engChrName: Ugh! Don't make me think about it! Not when we've still got so much work to do...
engSearchText:
Ugh! Don't make me think about it! Not when we've
still got so much work to do...
jpnChrName: 情勢も落ち着いたし、むしろ記念祭の方が 忙しくなりそうかも。
jpnSearchText:
情勢も落ち着いたし、むしろ記念祭の方が
忙しくなりそうかも。

engChrName: But...you have a point. I could at least use a little breather. I haven't had any time to unwind lately.
engSearchText:
But...you have a point. I could at least use a
little breather. I haven't had any time to
unwind lately.
jpnChrName: んー、今日も疲れた……最近何だか、 他の地区の応援多くないかな？
jpnSearchText:
んー、今日も疲れた……最近何だか、
他の地区の応援多くないかな？

engChrName: Then let's do it! There's no harm in a breather. Can't stay on top of our work if we don't stay on top of our zzz's!
engSearchText:
Then let's do it! There's no harm in a breather. Can't
stay on top of our work if we don't stay on top of
our zzz's!
jpnChrName: だいぶ肩と腰とか凝ってきたような 気もするんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
だいぶ肩と腰とか凝ってきたような
気もするんだけど……

engChrName: I don't know what you and your agency have been up to, but it looks like the worst is behind both of us, knock on wood.
engSearchText:
I don't know what you and your agency have been up
to, but it looks like the worst is behind both of us,
knock on wood.
jpnChrName: なんやカリン、若いのに随分と ジジ臭い事言うやん～。
jpnSearchText:
なんやカリン、若いのに随分と
ジジ臭い事言うやん～。

engChrName: For our part, the police was tasked with tracking down associates of Almata—although that part's wrapped up for the time being.
engSearchText:
For our part, the police was tasked with tracking
down associates of Almata—although that part's
wrapped up for the time being.
jpnChrName: ウチが揉み解してあげよか～？ オカンにはゴッドハンドと呼ばれてんねんで～！
jpnSearchText:
ウチが揉み解してあげよか～？
オカンにはゴッドハンドと呼ばれてんねんで～！

engChrName: Y'know, Karen was startin' to worry about you when she didn't see you 'round here.
engSearchText:
Y'know, Karen was startin' to worry about you
when she didn't see you 'round here.
jpnChrName: いや、そこまでじゃ……
jpnSearchText: いや、そこまでじゃ……

engChrName: Hey, I wouldn't say I was worried about them. Just concerned about any complications it could've led to... That's all.
engSearchText:
Hey, I wouldn't say I was worried about them.
Just concerned about any complications it could've
led to... That's all.
jpnChrName: （というかナンシーってほんとユルイわよね。   ……話してるだけで解（ほぐ）れてきたような……）
jpnSearchText:
（というかナンシーってほんとユルイわよね。
……話してるだけで解（ほぐ）れてきたような……）

engChrName: I'll put it like this: we certainly had our own work to do in that whole situation, too, which we've now sorted out.
engSearchText:
I'll put it like this: we certainly had our own work to
do in that whole situation, too, which we've now
sorted out.
jpnChrName: ん？　どしたん？ ウチの顔になんかついとる～？
jpnSearchText:
ん？　どしたん？
ウチの顔になんかついとる～？

engChrName: That said, can't say I envy you guys havin' to jump straight to hunting down the remnants of those goons right after dealing with the declaration.
engSearchText:
That said, can't say I envy you guys havin' to jump
straight to hunting down the remnants of those goons
right after dealing with the declaration.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……なんでもない。 ありがとね、ちょっと気が楽になったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……なんでもない。
ありがとね、ちょっと気が楽になったわ。

engChrName: Well, we mighta been part of the crackdown, but we didn't do all that much, ourselves.
engSearchText:
Well, we mighta been part of the crackdown, but
we didn't do all that much, ourselves.
jpnChrName: あら、確かアークライド解決事務所とかいう…… 若い子連れて……まだ例の稼業やってるの？
jpnSearchText:
あら、確かアークライド解決事務所とかいう……
若い子連れて……まだ例の稼業やってるの？

engChrName: We mostly shooed off onlookers and asked locals for their cooperation when we went and searched through citizens' homes.
engSearchText:
We mostly shooed off onlookers and asked locals for
their cooperation when we went and searched through
citizens' homes.
jpnChrName: ふう、いかがわしい商売も程々にしなさいよ？ 警察としても対応に困るんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、いかがわしい商売も程々にしなさいよ？
警察としても対応に困るんだから。

engChrName: Yeah. It was the CID who handled the lion's share of things, as usual.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It was the CID who handled the lion's share of
things, as usual.
jpnChrName: アンタとは例の当たり屋を懲らしめて以来か。 あの時の後始末は助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタとは例の当たり屋を懲らしめて以来か。
あの時の後始末は助かったぜ。

engChrName: If anything, now that things have settled down, the Revolution Festival might turn out to be more hectic for us when it's all said and done.
engSearchText:
If anything, now that things have settled down, the
Revolution Festival might turn out to be more hectic
for us when it's all said and done.
jpnChrName: まったく……あの時は一応協力したけど 当て馬に使われた気もするし……
jpnSearchText:
まったく……あの時は一応協力したけど
当て馬に使われた気もするし……

engChrName: Oof... I'm beat today. Is it just me, or have the other districts been calling in help more often lately?
engSearchText:
Oof... I'm beat today. Is it just me, or have the other
districts been calling in help more often lately?
jpnChrName: と、ともかく風紀を乱すような真似はしない事！ いいわね！？
jpnSearchText:
と、ともかく風紀を乱すような真似はしない事！
いいわね！？

engChrName: Because I swear, my shoulders and back are KILLING me more than usual.
engSearchText:
Because I swear, my shoulders and back are
KILLING me more than usual.
jpnChrName: ふふ、カリンってばあれからずっと 気にしとったもんなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、カリンってばあれからずっと
気にしとったもんなぁ～。

engChrName: Oh, Karen! Just how old are you? You're startin' to sound like an old man, goin' on like that.
engSearchText:
Oh, Karen! Just how old are you? You're startin' to
sound like an old man, goin' on like that.
jpnChrName: 警察よりうまい事やられた気がするとか、 そのうち危ない事になるんやないかっちゅうて……
jpnSearchText:
警察よりうまい事やられた気がするとか、
そのうち危ない事になるんやないかっちゅうて……

engChrName: Howsabout I give you a little massage, hmm? My ma tells me I've got the hands of an angel!
engSearchText:
Howsabout I give you a little massage, hmm? My ma
tells me I've got the hands of an angel!
jpnChrName: あっ、あれは……！ ってナンシーも余計な事言わないの！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、あれは……！
ってナンシーも余計な事言わないの！

engChrName: Th-That's okay, Nancy! You don't have to do all that...
engSearchText:
Th-That's okay, Nancy! You don't have to do
all that...
jpnChrName: ハハ、まあせいぜいあんたらの首が飛ばない 程度には気をつけさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、まあせいぜいあんたらの首が飛ばない
程度には気をつけさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: (She sure is soothing to be around, though. I can feel my muscles loosening up already just from talking to her. *sigh*...)
engSearchText:
(She sure is soothing to be around, though. I can feel
my muscles loosening up already just from talking
to her. *sigh*...)
jpnChrName: サイデン地区とも連絡できて、 警察も持ち直しつつある状況やなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区とも連絡できて、
警察も持ち直しつつある状況やなぁ。

engChrName: Hmm? What's wrong? I got somethin' on my face?
engSearchText:
Hmm? What's wrong? I got somethin' on
my face?
jpnChrName: この異変がいつまで続くにせよ、うちらは 秩序と人命を守るのがお仕事や、シンプルやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この異変がいつまで続くにせよ、うちらは
秩序と人命を守るのがお仕事や、シンプルやねぇ。

engChrName: Haha, no, you don't. It's nothing. Thanks for the offer. I feel a little more relaxed already.
engSearchText:
Haha, no, you don't. It's nothing. Thanks for
the offer. I feel a little more relaxed already.
jpnChrName: ま、アークライドはんも今まで上手くやって来た ようやし、今回も改めて期待してるで～。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アークライドはんも今まで上手くやって来た
ようやし、今回も改めて期待してるで～。

engChrName: You're the guy who runs Arkride Solutions, huh? What do you think you're doing, dragging such a young kid around? Are you up to more 'business'?
engSearchText:
You're the guy who runs Arkride Solutions, huh?
What do you think you're doing, dragging such a
young kid around? Are you up to more 'business'?
jpnChrName: あら、そういえば年明けにカリンと 遊びに行くって約束しとったなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
あら、そういえば年明けにカリンと
遊びに行くって約束しとったなぁ～。

engChrName: *sigh* Try to keep yourselves out of anything too shady, all right? It only makes more trouble for us police in the long run.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Try to keep yourselves out of anything too
shady, all right? It only makes more trouble for us
police in the long run.
jpnChrName: ほんなら、そのためにも 元の日常取り戻さなあかんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ほんなら、そのためにも
元の日常取り戻さなあかんねぇ。

engChrName: I remember you. We met when we dealt with that scammer. 'Preciate you folks takin' care of things after we were done.
engSearchText:
I remember you. We met when we dealt with
that scammer. 'Preciate you folks takin' care of
things after we were done.
jpnChrName: ま、何度も苦難を乗り越えたこの国や、 きっと皆で乗り越えられると信じるで。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何度も苦難を乗り越えたこの国や、
きっと皆で乗り越えられると信じるで。

engChrName: Yeah, well, whatever. You're welcome, I guess. It didn't feel like we were helping so much as getting dumped with the cleanup.
engSearchText:
Yeah, well, whatever. You're welcome, I guess.
It didn't feel like we were helping so much as getting
dumped with the cleanup.
jpnChrName: ふふ、本屋はんの方ではアラミスの子らも 頑張ってるいうしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、本屋はんの方ではアラミスの子らも
頑張ってるいうしなぁ。

engChrName: Just don't do anything to disturb the peace, got it? We've got enough headaches to deal with without you taking matters into your own hands!
engSearchText:
Just don't do anything to disturb the peace, got it?
We've got enough headaches to deal with without
you taking matters into your own hands!
jpnChrName: ほんなら、うちらも学生はん達が作業に集中 できるように、しっかりやらんとやねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
ほんなら、うちらも学生はん達が作業に集中
できるように、しっかりやらんとやねぇ～。

engChrName: Haha! Karen's held a bit of a grudge since all that happened.
engSearchText:
Haha! Karen's held a bit of a grudge since all
that happened.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、ラハドはんのアレ、 見れなかったなら残念やねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、ラハドはんのアレ、
見れなかったなら残念やねぇ～。

engChrName: She went on about how you outdid the police and how we on the force could end up in trouble before long. Ahh, it never ends.
engSearchText:
She went on about how you outdid the police and
how we on the force could end up in trouble
before long. Ahh, it never ends.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、そこのチンピラみたいなのも、 今年の記念祭では意外と珍しくてなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、そこのチンピラみたいなのも、
今年の記念祭では意外と珍しくてなぁ。

engChrName: NANCY! You can't just tell them that! I said all of that to you in confidence!
engSearchText:
NANCY! You can't just tell them that! I said all of
that to you in confidence!
jpnChrName: やっぱり今年は非常事態宣言とかもあって 皆、引き締められたんかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり今年は非常事態宣言とかもあって
皆、引き締められたんかなぁ。

engChrName: Hey, don't worry, ladies. We'll be careful not to get either of you fired. We're not lookin' to put anyone outta business here.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't worry, ladies. We'll be careful not to get
either of you fired. We're not lookin' to put anyone
outta business here.
jpnChrName: 例年より、市民の皆がしっかり 節度を持って楽しんどるんよなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
例年より、市民の皆がしっかり
節度を持って楽しんどるんよなぁ～。

engChrName: I managed to get in touch with district HQ. It sounds like they're startin' to bounce back and recover, which is good to hear.
engSearchText:
I managed to get in touch with district HQ. It sounds
like they're startin' to bounce back and recover, which
is good to hear.
jpnChrName: 龍來も良いけど、カリンの事はいつか他の 観光地にも連れていきたいわなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
龍來も良いけど、カリンの事はいつか他の
観光地にも連れていきたいわなぁ。

engChrName: 'Cause at the end of the day, we have one job and one job only: to maintain order and protect human lives no matter how long this madness goes on.
engSearchText:
'Cause at the end of the day, we have one job and one
job only: to maintain order and protect human lives no
matter how long this madness goes on.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムも安全になったさかい、 あそこを経由してレミフェリアもアリやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムも安全になったさかい、
あそこを経由してレミフェリアもアリやねぇ。

engChrName: Anyway, I have faith in you! You've managed to accomplish a lot since we first met, and I'm sure you'll come out on top again. Good luck!
engSearchText:
Anyway, I have faith in you! You've managed to
accomplish a lot since we first met, and I'm sure
you'll come out on top again. Good luck!
jpnChrName: ふふ、あっちはあっちで本場のロウリュも あるさかい、うちも行きたいでんなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あっちはあっちで本場のロウリュも
あるさかい、うちも行きたいでんなぁ。

engChrName: I can't forget that Karen and I made a promise to get out and have some fun together for New Year's, too!
engSearchText:
I can't forget that Karen and I made a promise to get
out and have some fun together for New Year's, too!
jpnChrName: でもまあ、警戒中もこの地区の人たちも しっかり秩序を守って行動していたし……
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、警戒中もこの地区の人たちも
しっかり秩序を守って行動していたし……

engChrName: That's yet another reason we've gotta get this city back to normal! We all got living to do!
engSearchText:
That's yet another reason we've gotta get this city
back to normal! We all got living to do!
jpnChrName: この分なら記念祭でも協力してくれそうやね、 となると旅行者を中心に注意せぇへんとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
この分なら記念祭でも協力してくれそうやね、
となると旅行者を中心に注意せぇへんとなぁ。

engChrName: There's no doubt in my mind we'll all get through this together. We've done it countless times before as a country, and we'll do it again!
engSearchText:
There's no doubt in my mind we'll all get through
this together. We've done it countless times before as a
country, and we'll do it again!
jpnChrName: アハハ！　カリンったら興味無いとか下らないとか 言っとってめっちゃ気にしとるやん～！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ！　カリンったら興味無いとか下らないとか
言っとってめっちゃ気にしとるやん～！

engChrName: It always makes me smile seeing so many Aramis students visit the bookstore for their studies.
engSearchText:
It always makes me smile seeing so many Aramis
students visit the bookstore for their studies.
jpnChrName: まあ、別にええけど流石に巡回中まで 気にするのは勘弁して欲しいで。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、別にええけど流石に巡回中まで
気にするのは勘弁して欲しいで。

engChrName: Yet another reason to make sure I do my job as an officer: so those students can concentrate on their work and get done what they need to get done.
engSearchText:
Yet another reason to make sure I do my job as an
officer: so those students can concentrate on their work
and get done what they need to get done.
jpnChrName: ま、うちらはせいぜい、トラブル起きんように 目を光らせとくくらいやろなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、うちらはせいぜい、トラブル起きんように
目を光らせとくくらいやろなぁ。

engChrName: A real shame you missed out on seeing Lahad work. It's an impressive sight!
engSearchText:
A real shame you missed out on seeing Lahad work.
It's an impressive sight!
jpnChrName: カリンは真面目やし、 きっと普段から気ぃ張ってるんやろなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
カリンは真面目やし、
きっと普段から気ぃ張ってるんやろなぁ。

engChrName: Y'know, there seem to be fewer low-time thugs lurkin' around the Revolution Festival this year.
engSearchText:
Y'know, there seem to be fewer low-time thugs
lurkin' around the Revolution Festival this year.
jpnChrName: ウチで良かったら、いつでも肩揉むで～！ オカンやオトンにも好評やし！
jpnSearchText:
ウチで良かったら、いつでも肩揉むで～！
オカンやオトンにも好評やし！

engChrName: Perhaps they decided to hold back a little this year after the emergency declaration we had. I certainly won't complain.
engSearchText:
Perhaps they decided to hold back a little this year after
the emergency declaration we had. I certainly
won't complain.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が中止になる程やさかい、メッセルダム警察も テロ警戒でぎょうさん神経使ってるみたいや……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が中止になる程やさかい、メッセルダム警察も
テロ警戒でぎょうさん神経使ってるみたいや……

engChrName: You can tell everyone's holdin' back this year after what happened, but people still seem to be having a good time today. I'm glad for that!
engSearchText:
You can tell everyone's holdin' back this year
after what happened, but people still seem to be having
a good time today. I'm glad for that!
jpnChrName: 一方、南部のサルバッド警察も大変らしいで。 経験した事の無い規模のイベント警備で……
jpnSearchText:
一方、南部のサルバッド警察も大変らしいで。
経験した事の無い規模のイベント警備で……

engChrName: Longlai is nice, yeah, but I'd prefer to take Karen to some other tourist spots.
engSearchText:
Longlai is nice, yeah, but I'd prefer to take Karen
to some other tourist spots.
jpnChrName: ただでさえ観光客が増えてきてトラブルも多いし、 色々と手が回っとらん言うで。
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ観光客が増えてきてトラブルも多いし、
色々と手が回っとらん言うで。

engChrName: We could go to Remiferia now that the situation in Messeldam's under control again.
engSearchText:
We could go to Remiferia now that the situation in
Messeldam's under control again.
jpnChrName: （彼女をとっかえひっかえしとるって   聞いとったけど……ホンマ大丈夫かいな～？）
jpnSearchText:
（彼女をとっかえひっかえしとるって
聞いとったけど……ホンマ大丈夫かいな～？）

engChrName: Plus they've got real löylys out there! I'm dyin' to try one for myself! What other reason do we need to go, right?
engSearchText:
Plus they've got real löylys out there! I'm dyin' to try
one for myself! What other reason do we need to
go, right?
jpnChrName: ふふ、カリンも相変わらずやでホンマ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、カリンも相変わらずやでホンマ。

engChrName: During the alert, the locals here were all good about maintaining order and followin' the rules.
engSearchText:
During the alert, the locals here were all good about
maintaining order and followin' the rules.
jpnChrName: まあええわ、ウチら巡回中やから、 何か気ぃついた事があったら知らせてな～！
jpnSearchText:
まあええわ、ウチら巡回中やから、
何か気ぃついた事があったら知らせてな～！

engChrName: I'm sure we'll count on them to help us out durin' the festival, too. Which means our main focus ought to be on the tourists coming to town.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll count on them to help us out durin'
the festival, too. Which means our main focus ought
to be on the tourists coming to town.
jpnChrName: ひ、非常事態だからというのはあるけど…… 映画館の人たちにもポップコーン食べてもらえた！
jpnSearchText:
ひ、非常事態だからというのはあるけど……
映画館の人たちにもポップコーン食べてもらえた！

engChrName: Haha! Karen tries to act like she isn't bothered, but she is! It's written all over her face!
engSearchText:
Haha! Karen tries to act like she isn't bothered, but
she is! It's written all over her face!
jpnChrName: 他にも、普段は来ないような人も皆 美味しいって言ってくれたよ！
jpnSearchText:
他にも、普段は来ないような人も皆
美味しいって言ってくれたよ！

engChrName: Not that I mind if she is. I just wish she'd put it off to the side while we're supposed to be out patrolling.
engSearchText:
Not that I mind if she is. I just wish she'd put it
off to the side while we're supposed to be
out patrolling.
jpnChrName: はは、こんな時に何だが……映画館の中で 人を喜ばせる事が出来て光栄というか……
jpnSearchText:
はは、こんな時に何だが……映画館の中で
人を喜ばせる事が出来て光栄というか……

engChrName: Anyway, you can be sure we'll be keeping a sharp eye out so no trouble slips past us on our watch. Can't have you guys hoggin' all the glory!
engSearchText:
Anyway, you can be sure we'll be keeping a sharp eye
out so no trouble slips past us on our watch.
Can't have you guys hoggin' all the glory!
jpnChrName: 夢の一部が叶ったような気分だよ。 役にも立てているようだし……！
jpnSearchText:
夢の一部が叶ったような気分だよ。
役にも立てているようだし……！

engChrName: You're far too serious all the time, Karen. Always so uptight! Always on high alert!
engSearchText:
You're far too serious all the time, Karen. Always
so uptight! Always on high alert!
jpnChrName: ひぃぃいい……せっかくの記念祭なのに どうしてこんな事に……！
jpnSearchText:
ひぃぃいい……せっかくの記念祭なのに
どうしてこんな事に……！

engChrName: How 'bout I give you a shoulder rub, hmm? Ma and Pa say I'm a real natural at it! ㈱
engSearchText:
How 'bout I give you a shoulder rub, hmm? Ma and
Pa say I'm a real natural at it! ㈱
jpnChrName: 何とか僕は映画館に逃げ込めたけど、 止まっちゃった人はどうなるんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
何とか僕は映画館に逃げ込めたけど、
止まっちゃった人はどうなるんだろう……？

engChrName: Messeldam's police must be worried about potential terrorism if they decided to pull the plug on the film festival outright.
engSearchText:
Messeldam's police must be worried about potential
terrorism if they decided to pull the plug on the film
festival outright.
jpnChrName: ともかく……映画館に避難させてもらった以上、 僕も映画館の役に立たないとね！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく……映画館に避難させてもらった以上、
僕も映画館の役に立たないとね！

engChrName: It doesn't sound like Tharbad's force has it any easier, either, trying to provide security for it on an unprecedented scale out there.
engSearchText:
It doesn't sound like Tharbad's force has it any easier,
either, trying to provide security for it on an
unprecedented scale out there.
jpnChrName: ──そうすれば、あとで映画館と色々と 深い縁も作れるかもしれないし……！
jpnSearchText:
──そうすれば、あとで映画館と色々と
深い縁も作れるかもしれないし……！

engChrName: And that's on top of the spike in incidents they're seein' from the greater influx of tourists. Those poor officers can't catch a break.
engSearchText:
And that's on top of the spike in incidents they're seein'
from the greater influx of tourists. Those poor officers
can't catch a break.
jpnChrName: ……いつまで籠城するか判らないしね、 屋台から食べ物は取ってきたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……いつまで籠城するか判らないしね、
屋台から食べ物は取ってきたんだ。

engChrName: (I hear this guy's got a new girlfriend every month or so... Definitely somethin' wrong with him.)
engSearchText:
(I hear this guy's got a new girlfriend every month
or so... Definitely somethin' wrong with him.)
jpnChrName: まあ、今の僕に出来る事は少ないしね。 食料方面で力にならせてもらうよ！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今の僕に出来る事は少ないしね。
食料方面で力にならせてもらうよ！

engChrName: Heehee! Karen is nothin' if not consistent.
engSearchText: Heehee! Karen is nothin' if not consistent.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に際しての新メニューも準備中だよ！ コーンじゃないけど是非期待してくれ！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に際しての新メニューも準備中だよ！
コーンじゃないけど是非期待してくれ！

engChrName: In any case, we're out on patrol for the time bein', so if you see anything suspicious, let us know. We'll be right on top of it!
engSearchText:
In any case, we're out on patrol for the time bein', so
if you see anything suspicious, let us know. We'll be
right on top of it!
jpnChrName: でもやっぱりイチオシはポップコーンだ、 ついでにこっちも買って欲しいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
でもやっぱりイチオシはポップコーンだ、
ついでにこっちも買って欲しいなぁ……

engChrName: This emergency hasn't been all bad. I got some people working for the theater to taste my popcorn!
engSearchText:
This emergency hasn't been all bad. I got some
people working for the theater to taste my popcorn!
jpnChrName: ──ところで、外国の人たちなら 案外信じてくれたりするかな？
jpnSearchText:
──ところで、外国の人たちなら
案外信じてくれたりするかな？

engChrName: Not just them, either! Even people who don't usually come to my stand have been eating it and they all say they love it!
engSearchText:
Not just them, either! Even people who don't usually
come to my stand have been eating it and they all say
they love it!
jpnChrName: 映画のお供はポップコーン！ その第一人者がこの僕なんだってさ！
jpnSearchText:
映画のお供はポップコーン！
その第一人者がこの僕なんだってさ！

engChrName: I... I don't even know how to describe it. I just feel so honored to be able to bring happiness to people like this inside the theater itself.
engSearchText:
I... I don't even know how to describe it. I just feel so
honored to be able to bring happiness to people like
this inside the theater itself.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、本当に色んな事があった一年だったよ、 映画関係だけでも色々挙げられるくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、本当に色んな事があった一年だったよ、
映画関係だけでも色々挙げられるくらいだ。

engChrName: I feel like part of my dream has finally come true. I'm actually helping people with what I do!
engSearchText:
I feel like part of my dream has finally come true.
I'm actually helping people with what I do!
jpnChrName: 新しい映画祭に、ギャスパー氏の急死に、 ジュディス・ランスターのスキャンダル……
jpnSearchText:
新しい映画祭に、ギャスパー氏の急死に、
ジュディス・ランスターのスキャンダル……

engChrName: Eeek! How could this have happened in the middle of the Revolution Festival?!
engSearchText:
Eeek! How could this have happened in the middle of
the Revolution Festival?!
jpnChrName: こうも色々あると、今年が後々の映画業界にとって 転換点になったりしてもおかしくないかもな？
jpnSearchText:
こうも色々あると、今年が後々の映画業界にとって
転換点になったりしてもおかしくないかもな？

engChrName: I luckily managed to flee into the movie theater when all hell broke loose. But what's going to happen to everyone who's frozen outside?
engSearchText:
I luckily managed to flee into the movie theater when
all hell broke loose. But what's going to happen to
everyone who's frozen outside?
jpnChrName: よし、街も活気が戻った事だし記念祭も近い！ 僕も張り切っていこうじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
よし、街も活気が戻った事だし記念祭も近い！
僕も張り切っていこうじゃないか！

engChrName: Who knows...? Anyway, now that I'm inside the theater, I've got to make myself useful!
engSearchText:
Who knows...? Anyway, now that I'm inside the
theater, I've got to make myself useful!
jpnChrName: 記念祭と言えば一大イベントだ、業界人や 有名人もこの辺りに来るって聞く！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭と言えば一大イベントだ、業界人や
有名人もこの辺りに来るって聞く！

engChrName: With any luck, this might be my opportunity to start forging a deep, lasting relationship with it! Then who knows what'll happen?!
engSearchText:
With any luck, this might be my opportunity to start
forging a deep, lasting relationship with it! Then who
knows what'll happen?!
jpnChrName: これを機に、僕のポップコーンか映画愛か、 できれば両方売り込めないものか！
jpnSearchText:
これを機に、僕のポップコーンか映画愛か、
できれば両方売り込めないものか！

engChrName: Who knows how long we'll have to stay put here, so I took the initiative to grab the food from my stand and bring it in.
engSearchText:
Who knows how long we'll have to stay put here, so I
took the initiative to grab the food from my stand and
bring it in.
jpnChrName: 村が一つ消えて非常事態宣言になっても…… 僕は日銭のためにコーンを売るしかできない……
jpnSearchText:
村が一つ消えて非常事態宣言になっても……
僕は日銭のためにコーンを売るしかできない……

engChrName: There's not a lot I can do in here. But if there's one thing I know how to do, it's keep people fed, and that's exactly what I'm going to do!
engSearchText:
There's not a lot I can do in here. But if there's one
thing I know how to do, it's keep people fed, and
that's exactly what I'm going to do!
jpnChrName: わかってる……わかってるさ、僕は映画関係者に なれなかったから自己満足でやってるだけさ……
jpnSearchText:
わかってる……わかってるさ、僕は映画関係者に
なれなかったから自己満足でやってるだけさ……

engChrName: I'm whipping up some brand new menu items for the film festival. They might not involve popcorn, but that doesn't mean they won't be great!
engSearchText:
I'm whipping up some brand new menu items for the
film festival. They might not involve popcorn, but
that doesn't mean they won't be great!
jpnChrName: 僕は何者でもないんだ……
jpnSearchText: 僕は何者でもないんだ……

engChrName: ...Although, let's be real. Nothing beats my popcorn. I still want people to buy some when they visit me.
engSearchText:
...Although, let's be real. Nothing beats my popcorn.
I still want people to buy some when they visit me.
jpnChrName: い〝、い〝らっじゃい〝……ぐふ、げばっ！
jpnSearchText: い〝、い〝らっじゃい〝……ぐふ、げばっ！

engChrName: Movies and popcorn go together like bread and butter! But nobody knew that until I came along and showed everyone the light!
engSearchText:
Movies and popcorn go together like bread
and butter! But nobody knew that until I came along
and showed everyone the light!
jpnChrName: だ、だめだ……気管にポッブゴーンが 入っだ痛みが取れない〝……
jpnSearchText:
だ、だめだ……気管にポッブゴーンが
入っだ痛みが取れない〝……

engChrName: Hardly anyone believes me when I say that, but maybe once the foreign tourists are in town, I'll finally find some people who do. I can hope!
engSearchText:
Hardly anyone believes me when I say that, but
maybe once the foreign tourists are in town, I'll finally
find some people who do. I can hope!
jpnChrName: そ、そりゃ……あ〝ん〝な〝スキャンダル〝 聞いたら咽るわ〝……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そりゃ……あ〝ん〝な〝スキャンダル〝
聞いたら咽るわ〝……

engChrName: We've seen a lot happen this past year. Even when it comes to just movies, it was an eventful year.
engSearchText:
We've seen a lot happen this past year. Even when it
comes to just movies, it was an eventful year.
jpnChrName: き、聞いたんだけど“エスプリ”で 『ゴールデンブラッド』完全版上映再開だって！？
jpnSearchText:
き、聞いたんだけど“エスプリ”で
『ゴールデンブラッド』完全版上映再開だって！？

engChrName: We got a new film festival. Gaspard Dillon passed away all of a sudden. Judith Lanster had that big scandal... The list goes on and on.
engSearchText:
We got a new film festival. Gaspard Dillon passed
away all of a sudden. Judith Lanster had that
big scandal... The list goes on and on.
jpnChrName: こ、これは映画ファンとして観に行くしかないよ、 前に見逃してずっと後悔してたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
こ、これは映画ファンとして観に行くしかないよ、
前に見逃してずっと後悔してたんだ！

engChrName: I think when people look back on this year, they might think of it as a big turning point for the industry. I know I sure will!
engSearchText:
I think when people look back on this year, they
might think of it as a big turning point for
the industry. I know I sure will!
jpnChrName: あの完全版……このまま幻に消えないか 不安だったけど、復活できたんだな……
jpnSearchText:
あの完全版……このまま幻に消えないか
不安だったけど、復活できたんだな……

engChrName: It's good to see the city full of life again! And not a minute too soon with the Revolution Festival coming up! I've got to hunker down and get ready!
engSearchText:
It's good to see the city full of life again! And not a
minute too soon with the Revolution Festival
coming up! I've got to hunker down and get ready!
jpnChrName: 何故だ、何で向こうのアイス屋の方が 圧倒的に売り上げが上なんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
何故だ、何で向こうのアイス屋の方が
圧倒的に売り上げが上なんだ！？

engChrName: The Revolution Festival this year is going to be so big, I hear celebrities and movie industry bigwigs are going to be in this area!
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival this year is going to be so
big, I hear celebrities and movie industry bigwigs are
going to be in this area!
jpnChrName: 映画館前で買うならポップコーンなのに！
jpnSearchText: 映画館前で買うならポップコーンなのに！

engChrName: And when they come through here, you bet I'm going to try to sell them not just my popcorn, but how much I love the movies they all make!
engSearchText:
And when they come through here, you bet I'm going
to try to sell them not just my popcorn, but how
much I love the movies they all make!
jpnChrName: ポップコーンを食べながら映画鑑賞する 習慣のオリジンだって主張しているのに！
jpnSearchText:
ポップコーンを食べながら映画鑑賞する
習慣のオリジンだって主張しているのに！

engChrName: There might be an emergency declaration going on, but...if I don't go out and sell my popcorn, I don't make any money today. I have no choice.
engSearchText:
There might be an emergency declaration going on,
but...if I don't go out and sell my popcorn, I don't
make any money today. I have no choice.
jpnChrName: （そういう事言ってるから   胡散臭がられてるんだと思うけどな……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういう事言ってるから
胡散臭がられてるんだと思うけどな……）

engChrName: I'm a total nobody. Worthless, good for nothing...
engSearchText: I'm a total nobody. Worthless, good for nothing...
jpnChrName: やあお兄さん、初めて見る顔だね。 映画のお供にポップコーンはどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
やあお兄さん、初めて見る顔だね。
映画のお供にポップコーンはどうだい？

engChrName: The only reason I'm here is because I couldn't hack it when I tried to break into the movie industry and settled on this as a compromise... *sigh*
engSearchText:
The only reason I'm here is because I couldn't hack it
when I tried to break into the movie industry and
settled on this as a compromise... *sigh*
jpnChrName: 何を隠そう、映画を観ながらポップコーンを 食べる習慣は僕が考えたものでね！
jpnSearchText:
何を隠そう、映画を観ながらポップコーンを
食べる習慣は僕が考えたものでね！

engChrName: W-Welcome to—*cough* *cough*
engSearchText: W-Welcome to—*cough* *cough*
jpnChrName: 今はここで売っているけど、いつかは各地に 店舗を持ってこの習慣も広めていきたいね！
jpnSearchText:
今はここで売っているけど、いつかは各地に
店舗を持ってこの習慣も広めていきたいね！

engChrName: Dang it... I choked on some popcorn and my throat still hurts.
engSearchText:
Dang it... I choked on some popcorn and my throat
still hurts.
jpnChrName: へぇ……なるほど、そいつは面白ェじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: へぇ……なるほど、そいつは面白ェじゃねぇか。

engChrName: S-Sorry about that. But...*cough*...who wouldn't choke after hearing about such a big scandal?
engSearchText:
S-Sorry about that. But...*cough*...who wouldn't
choke after hearing about such a big scandal?
jpnChrName: で……アンタが発案者でこれから広めるってのが 本当ならの話だが……
jpnSearchText:
で……アンタが発案者でこれから広めるってのが
本当ならの話だが……

engChrName: I heard they're going to be playing Golden Blood Director's Cut again at the theater!
engSearchText:
I heard they're going to be playing Golden Blood
Director's Cut again at the theater!
jpnChrName: それなら何で煌都にもコーン食いながら 映画観るのが既に根付いてんだ？
jpnSearchText:
それなら何で煌都にもコーン食いながら
映画観るのが既に根付いてんだ？

engChrName: I missed my opportunity to see it last time and I've been regretting it ever since! Now I HAVE to see it! It's my duty as a movie buff!
engSearchText:
I missed my opportunity to see it last time and I've
been regretting it ever since! Now I HAVE to see it!
It's my duty as a movie buff!
jpnChrName: ……フュヒュ～……
jpnSearchText: ……フュヒュ～……

engChrName: I was so worried that the director's cut was just going to vanish into thin air after it left the theater. I'm so glad to be proven wrong. So glad...
engSearchText:
I was so worried that the director's cut was just going
to vanish into thin air after it left the theater. I'm so
glad to be proven wrong. So glad...
jpnChrName: ……口笛下手だな、アンタ。
jpnSearchText: ……口笛下手だな、アンタ。

engChrName: How? How is the ice cream lady over there doing so much better than me?!
engSearchText:
How? How is the ice cream lady over there doing so
much better than me?!
jpnChrName: いよいよ映画祭か……本当は僕も現地に行って ポップコーンを売りたかったんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ映画祭か……本当は僕も現地に行って
ポップコーンを売りたかったんだけどな。

engChrName: If you're going to buy anything before going into the theater, why wouldn't you make it popcorn?!
engSearchText:
If you're going to buy anything before going into the
theater, why wouldn't you make it popcorn?!
jpnChrName: 気づいたら僕の所持ミラで泊れる宿は どこも満室になってしまってたよ！
jpnSearchText:
気づいたら僕の所持ミラで泊れる宿は
どこも満室になってしまってたよ！

engChrName: Everybody knows that I'm the guy who came up with the idea of eating popcorn while you watch movies in the first place! It's just not right!
engSearchText:
Everybody knows that I'm the guy who came up with
the idea of eating popcorn while you watch movies in
the first place! It's just not right!
jpnChrName: まあ、気分だけでも共有したいね。 映画好きとしちゃあ、思い出の作りどころだ！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、気分だけでも共有したいね。
映画好きとしちゃあ、思い出の作りどころだ！

engChrName: (Maybe it's 'cause you keep tryin' to bullshit your customers. Ever think of that?)
engSearchText:
(Maybe it's 'cause you keep tryin' to bullshit
your customers. Ever think of that?)
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、映画祭なのに現地に行けないとなると 映画関係者になれなかったのが悔やまれるね。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、映画祭なのに現地に行けないとなると
映画関係者になれなかったのが悔やまれるね。

engChrName: Don't think I've seen you before. Can I convince you to get a tub of popcorn with your ticket?
engSearchText:
Don't think I've seen you before. Can I convince you
to get a tub of popcorn with your ticket?
jpnChrName: 一応、少しでも映画に近い仕事をしたくて 映画のお供の軽食を売り始めたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
一応、少しでも映画に近い仕事をしたくて
映画のお供の軽食を売り始めたんだけど……

engChrName: You should really try it! Because believe it or not, I'm the guy who came up with the whole idea of bringing popcorn to a movie.
engSearchText:
You should really try it! Because believe it or not, I'm
the guy who came up with the whole idea of bringing
popcorn to a movie.
jpnChrName: ポップコーンの味が業界人の目に留まって、 連れて行ってもらえたりしないかな～。
jpnSearchText:
ポップコーンの味が業界人の目に留まって、
連れて行ってもらえたりしないかな～。

engChrName: I might just be a humble vendor right now, but one day, I'm going to up my own stores all over and spread the joys of popcorn far and wide!
engSearchText:
I might just be a humble vendor right now, but one
day, I'm going to up my own stores all over and
spread the joys of popcorn far and wide!
jpnChrName: そういえば、映画館のレイトショーには 行ったことはあるかい？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、映画館のレイトショーには
行ったことはあるかい？

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Interesting dream you've got there. Can't say I've met anyone else like that before.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? Interesting dream you've got there.
Can't say I've met anyone else like that before.
jpnChrName: 昼とは違うディープな作品も上映してるし、 客層も違うから一度は観に行くと良いよ。
jpnSearchText:
昼とは違うディープな作品も上映してるし、
客層も違うから一度は観に行くと良いよ。

engChrName: Know what else is interesting? You being the guy who came up with that in the first place.
engSearchText:
Know what else is interesting? You being the guy who
came up with that in the first place.
jpnChrName: ついでに、うちのポップコーンを お供にしてくれたら嬉しいね！
jpnSearchText:
ついでに、うちのポップコーンを
お供にしてくれたら嬉しいね！

engChrName: Because I'm from Langport and we've always a had tradition of chomping on some corn as we watch our movies. Funny coincidence, huh?
engSearchText:
Because I'm from Langport and we've always a had
tradition of chomping on some corn as we watch
our movies. Funny coincidence, huh?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい！　ポップコーンや ホットドッグはどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい！　ポップコーンや
ホットドッグはどうだい？

engChrName: *whistle*
engSearchText: *whistle*
jpnChrName: 映画鑑賞ってのは、ポップコーンをお供に しなきゃ始まらないもんだしね！
jpnSearchText:
映画鑑賞ってのは、ポップコーンをお供に
しなきゃ始まらないもんだしね！

engChrName: If you're gonna try and whistle your way out of this, at least be a good whistler, dude. You suck.
engSearchText:
If you're gonna try and whistle your way out of this, at
least be a good whistler, dude. You suck.
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか？ 共和国ではそんな風習が……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですか？
共和国ではそんな風習が……

engChrName: It's almost time for the film festival. I was really hoping to go down to Tharbad and sell some of my own popcorn there in person.
engSearchText:
It's almost time for the film festival. I was really
hoping to go down to Tharbad and sell some of my
own popcorn there in person.
jpnChrName: そうさ！　そして何を隠そう、 この習慣はまさに僕が発案者でね！
jpnSearchText:
そうさ！　そして何を隠そう、
この習慣はまさに僕が発案者でね！

engChrName: But I guess I decided too late because all the inns that I could afford to stay at are completely booked. What are the odds, right?
engSearchText:
But I guess I decided too late because all the inns that
I could afford to stay at are completely booked.
What are the odds, right?
jpnChrName: ポップコーンはチップスに比べて音も小さいし、 劇場内で食べやすいって業界に売り込んで……
jpnSearchText:
ポップコーンはチップスに比べて音も小さいし、
劇場内で食べやすいって業界に売り込んで……

engChrName: Argh! I just want to at least take in the festivities with other movie lovers. I'm sure it's going to be one to remember for guys like me!
engSearchText:
Argh! I just want to at least take in the festivities with
other movie lovers. I'm sure it's going to be one to
remember for guys like me!
jpnChrName: そうなんですか！？ 発案者だなんて……すごいですね！
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですか！？
発案者だなんて……すごいですね！

engChrName: Not being able to go to the film festival makes me hate not being an industry insider.
engSearchText:
Not being able to go to the film festival makes me
hate not being an industry insider.
jpnChrName: いや、そんな訳ねぇだろ……
jpnSearchText: いや、そんな訳ねぇだろ……

engChrName: I started selling these snacks so that I could at least have a job that had me around movies, but look at what it's gotten me so far.
engSearchText:
I started selling these snacks so that I could at least
have a job that had me around movies, but look at
what it's gotten me so far.
jpnChrName: 俺がガキの頃から普通にあったぞ、 ポップコーン食べながら映画見る習慣。
jpnSearchText:
俺がガキの頃から普通にあったぞ、
ポップコーン食べながら映画見る習慣。

engChrName: Maybe if I get somebody actually in the film business addicted to popcorn, I can convince them to take me with them. I just might try that.
engSearchText:
Maybe if I get somebody actually in the film business
addicted to popcorn, I can convince them to take me
with them. I just might try that.
jpnChrName: まあ、ポップコーンを映画のお供にする 習慣の起源なんてこの際どうでもいいさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ポップコーンを映画のお供にする
習慣の起源なんてこの際どうでもいいさ。

engChrName: You ever taken in a late-night show here, by any chance?
engSearchText:
You ever taken in a late-night show here, by
any chance?
jpnChrName: ポップコーンを食べながら観ると楽しさ倍増、 それだけは事実だしね。
jpnSearchText:
ポップコーンを食べながら観ると楽しさ倍増、
それだけは事実だしね。

engChrName: The theater likes to put on deeper movies that you won't find during the day. It attracts a different crowd. You should try it sometime!
engSearchText:
The theater likes to put on deeper movies that you
won't find during the day. It attracts a
different crowd. You should try it sometime!
jpnChrName: ふう、避難民の人たちの気分を和らげるのにも 役に立てそうで何よりですよー。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、避難民の人たちの気分を和らげるのにも
役に立てそうで何よりですよー。

engChrName: And if you do, make sure to take some popcorn with you! That always goes best with movies no matter what time of day you see them, day or night!
engSearchText:
And if you do, make sure to take some popcorn
with you! That always goes best with movies no
matter what time of day you see them, day or night!
jpnChrName: アイス屋してきて、こういう時でも 貢献できるって初めてわかって……
jpnSearchText:
アイス屋してきて、こういう時でも
貢献できるって初めてわかって……

engChrName: Welcome! Any chance I can interest you in some popcorn? What about a hot dog?
engSearchText:
Welcome! Any chance I can interest you in
some popcorn? What about a hot dog?
jpnChrName: ふっふー、新しい甲斐を見つけた気分です。
jpnSearchText: ふっふー、新しい甲斐を見つけた気分です。

engChrName: You've gotta at least get some popcorn. You know they won't even start the movie until everyone has some, right?
engSearchText:
You've gotta at least get some popcorn. You know
they won't even start the movie until everyone has
some, right?
jpnChrName: ……あっちのポップコーン屋の舞い上がりっぷりは 何だかイマイチわからないですけど。
jpnSearchText:
……あっちのポップコーン屋の舞い上がりっぷりは
何だかイマイチわからないですけど。

engChrName: Wow, really? I had no idea Calvardians did anything like that.
engSearchText:
Wow, really? I had no idea Calvardians did anything
like that.
jpnChrName: うう……何という事でしょう……アイス食べてる 人が凍り付いたと思ったらこれですよ……
jpnSearchText:
うう……何という事でしょう……アイス食べてる
人が凍り付いたと思ったらこれですよ……

engChrName: It's true! In fact, I'll fill you in on a little secret: I'm the one who came up with it in the first place! That's right! ME!
engSearchText:
It's true! In fact, I'll fill you in on a little secret: I'm
the one who came up with it in the first place!
That's right! ME!
jpnChrName: せっかく記念祭で、色々な人とアイス交流に 甘味談議ができると思っていたのに……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく記念祭で、色々な人とアイス交流に
甘味談議ができると思っていたのに……

engChrName: The great thing about popcorn is it's easy to eat and makes less noise than stuff like chips. Ever since I started it, it's taken off like wildfire!
engSearchText:
The great thing about popcorn is it's easy to eat and
makes less noise than stuff like chips. Ever since I
started it, it's taken off like wildfire!
jpnChrName: ちゃんと……戻ると良いのですけど…… うう、何も出来ない自分が情けないです！
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと……戻ると良いのですけど……
うう、何も出来ない自分が情けないです！

engChrName: That's amazing! I can't believe I'm talking to the man behind all that!
engSearchText:
That's amazing! I can't believe I'm talking to the man
behind all that!
jpnChrName: そういえば、何故か不思議な事にあれから アイスが溶ける気配も無いのです！
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、何故か不思議な事にあれから
アイスが溶ける気配も無いのです！

engChrName: Hate to burst your bubble, kiddo, but you can't believe everything you hear.
engSearchText:
Hate to burst your bubble, kiddo, but you can't
believe everything you hear.
jpnChrName: そうだ、頑張ってる人たちの糖分補給…… せめてこれくらいはお役に立たないと！
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、頑張ってる人たちの糖分補給……
せめてこれくらいはお役に立たないと！

engChrName: 'Cause I always ate popcorn ever since I started comin' to movies as a little brat, and I sure didn't come up with it.
engSearchText:
'Cause I always ate popcorn ever since I started
comin' to movies as a little brat, and I sure didn't
come up with it.
jpnChrName: 熱気、１２月なのに凄いですねぇ。 それならアイスで冷ましましょう！
jpnSearchText:
熱気、１２月なのに凄いですねぇ。
それならアイスで冷ましましょう！

engChrName: Bah! Okay, so WHAT if I wasn't the first guy to put popcorn and movies together? Who cares?!
engSearchText:
Bah! Okay, so WHAT if I wasn't the first guy to put
popcorn and movies together? Who cares?!
jpnChrName: ふっふー、今日はいつも以上に色々な人が あちこちから来る日なのです！
jpnSearchText:
ふっふー、今日はいつも以上に色々な人が
あちこちから来る日なのです！

engChrName: It doesn't change the fact that popcorn makes any movie you watch at least twice as good. That's not just my opinion, either. That's just science!
engSearchText:
It doesn't change the fact that popcorn makes any
movie you watch at least twice as good. That's not
just my opinion, either. That's just science!
jpnChrName: それなら私も、お客の甘味の好みを見定めて、 反応を楽しむ甲斐が一層あるものですよ！
jpnSearchText:
それなら私も、お客の甘味の好みを見定めて、
反応を楽しむ甲斐が一層あるものですよ！

engChrName: I'm glad my ice cream can help calm people's nerves as they're evacuating.
engSearchText:
I'm glad my ice cream can help calm people's nerves
as they're evacuating.
jpnChrName: それにしても、記念祭には各地から 旅行者が来るわけですが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、記念祭には各地から
旅行者が来るわけですが……

engChrName: I never thought as an ice cream vendor that I could ever contribute in a situation like this, but it goes to show we can all make a difference.
engSearchText:
I never thought as an ice cream vendor that I could
ever contribute in a situation like this, but it goes to
show we can all make a difference.
jpnChrName: アイスや甘味は、改めて首都らしいものを 推し出して売った方が良いですかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アイスや甘味は、改めて首都らしいものを
推し出して売った方が良いですかねぇ。

engChrName: I feel like I've learned something new about myself after this whole experience.
engSearchText:
I feel like I've learned something new about myself
after this whole experience.
jpnChrName: でも、共和国の一体感を演出する意味でも、 たまにはご当地アイスの再現とかも良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
でも、共和国の一体感を演出する意味でも、
たまにはご当地アイスの再現とかも良いかも。

engChrName: ...Can't say I understand what's got the popcorn guy so excited, though. That man remains a total mystery to me.
engSearchText:
...Can't say I understand what's got the popcorn guy
so excited, though. That man remains a total mystery
to me.
jpnChrName: 今年は間に合わないですけど、いずれは 地元の人とかにも食べてもらったりして。
jpnSearchText:
今年は間に合わないですけど、いずれは
地元の人とかにも食べてもらったりして。

engChrName: What in the world is going on? It looked like some customers eating my ice cream were frozen, and it turns out they actually are!
engSearchText:
What in the world is going on? It looked like some
customers eating my ice cream were frozen, and it
turns out they actually are!
jpnChrName: 状況が落ち着いたのは何よりですが、 まさかあのクインシー社の社長がですか……
jpnSearchText:
状況が落ち着いたのは何よりですが、
まさかあのクインシー社の社長がですか……

engChrName: I was so looking forward to bonding with people over my ice cream during the festival and talking shop about sweets. Guess that's off the table...
engSearchText:
I was so looking forward to bonding with people over
my ice cream during the festival and talking shop
about sweets. Guess that's off the table...
jpnChrName: まあ、歴史のあるメーカーですし、民族主義と 結びつくのは判るにしても……マフィアと……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、歴史のあるメーカーですし、民族主義と
結びつくのは判るにしても……マフィアと……

engChrName: I really hope this all goes away soon, but... Argh! I hate not being able to do anything to help!
engSearchText:
I really hope this all goes away soon, but... Argh!
I hate not being able to do anything to help!
jpnChrName: あ、でもあの会社、経営と製造はある程度 切り離していますし、どうかお菓子は責めないで！
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもあの会社、経営と製造はある程度
切り離していますし、どうかお菓子は責めないで！

engChrName: Actually, you know something weird I just noticed? My ice cream doesn't melt now after what happened! Wait... That gives me an idea!
engSearchText:
Actually, you know something weird I just noticed?
My ice cream doesn't melt now after what happened!
Wait... That gives me an idea!
jpnChrName: お菓子に罪は無いですし、一流の職人が作った お菓子が美味しい事実は変わらないはずですから！
jpnSearchText:
お菓子に罪は無いですし、一流の職人が作った
お菓子が美味しい事実は変わらないはずですから！

engChrName: Everybody's out there working so hard right now. They need to keep their sugar levels up, and I've got just the thing that'll help!
engSearchText:
Everybody's out there working so hard right now.
They need to keep their sugar levels up, and I've got
just the thing that'll help!
jpnChrName: とはいえ私も、クインシーのお菓子もたまに食べて、 参考にしていただけに残念この上ないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ私も、クインシーのお菓子もたまに食べて、
参考にしていただけに残念この上ないですよ。

engChrName: This is some crazy heat we're having for the middle of December, isn't it? Better cool off with some of my amazing ice cream!
engSearchText:
This is some crazy heat we're having for the middle of
December, isn't it? Better cool off with some of my
amazing ice cream!
jpnChrName: 人気な事に変わりはないですし……社長一族とは 別に、何とか再出発して欲しいですよね。
jpnSearchText:
人気な事に変わりはないですし……社長一族とは
別に、何とか再出発して欲しいですよね。

engChrName: This is great! There are so many people roaming around here today, even more so than usual!
engSearchText:
This is great! There are so many people roaming
around here today, even more so than usual!
jpnChrName: お菓子にも、実際にお菓子を作る 担当の人にも罪は無かったはずですから……
jpnSearchText:
お菓子にも、実際にお菓子を作る
担当の人にも罪は無かったはずですから……

engChrName: Makes it even more fulfilling figuring out what sweets everyone likes and then seeing the looks on their faces when I choose right and they enjoy it.
engSearchText:
Makes it even more fulfilling figuring out what sweets
everyone likes and then seeing the looks on their faces
when I choose right and they enjoy it.
jpnChrName: こ、こんな時こそ適度に糖分を 補給して落ち着きましょう……
jpnSearchText:
こ、こんな時こそ適度に糖分を
補給して落ち着きましょう……

engChrName: The Revolution Festival coming up is sure to attract tourists from all over Zemuria.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival coming up is sure to attract
tourists from all over Zemuria.
jpnChrName: 他にもチョコは心を落ち着ける効果もあると 言いますす……って、噛んじゃった……
jpnSearchText:
他にもチョコは心を落ち着ける効果もあると
言いますす……って、噛んじゃった……

engChrName: Part of me wonders if I should tweak my lineup of ice cream and other sweets for the event to skew towards stuff that represents this city.
engSearchText:
Part of me wonders if I should tweak my lineup of ice
cream and other sweets for the event to skew towards
stuff that represents this city.
jpnChrName: あはは……私がまだ落ち着けてなくて、 これじゃあ説得力無いかもですね……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……私がまだ落ち着けてなくて、
これじゃあ説得力無いかもですね……

engChrName: Actually, maybe I should try and recreate different regional flavors of ice cream from around Calvard sometime, too, to promote unity and stuff.
engSearchText:
Actually, maybe I should try and recreate different
regional flavors of ice cream from around Calvard
sometime, too, to promote unity and stuff.
jpnChrName: 恋愛とは……甘味に似ているもの…… そして今話題のジュディス＆マクシム……
jpnSearchText:
恋愛とは……甘味に似ているもの……
そして今話題のジュディス＆マクシム……

engChrName: I won't have enough time for this year, but it'd be fun to get people from those areas to try them and tell me how good it lives up to the real thing.
engSearchText:
I won't have enough time for this year, but it'd be fun
to get people from those areas to try them and tell me
how good it lives up to the real thing.
jpnChrName: あれは両方ともルックス良いし、傍から見れば 甘々でスィーティに見えるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
あれは両方ともルックス良いし、傍から見れば
甘々でスィーティに見えるかもしれません。

engChrName: I'm glad things have settled down now. I still can't believe it was the Quincy Company president behind all that...
engSearchText:
I'm glad things have settled down now. I still can't
believe it was the Quincy Company president behind
all that...
jpnChrName: ですが……私の勘では、アレはただ砂糖を大量に 盛っただけのような甘さに過ぎないです！
jpnSearchText:
ですが……私の勘では、アレはただ砂糖を大量に
盛っただけのような甘さに過ぎないです！

engChrName: That company has so much history behind it! I knew he personally had ties to nationalists and stuff, but to be in bed with the mafia...
engSearchText:
That company has so much history behind it! I knew
he personally had ties to nationalists and stuff, but to
be in bed with the mafia...
jpnChrName: あの手の組み合わせは、絶対にいつか飽きたり お腹を壊して破局するものです！
jpnSearchText:
あの手の組み合わせは、絶対にいつか飽きたり
お腹を壊して破局するものです！

engChrName: But don't let that ruin their sweets for you! It's important to remember that Quincy's management and manufacturing are somewhat separated.
engSearchText:
But don't let that ruin their sweets for you! It's
important to remember that Quincy's management
and manufacturing are somewhat separated.
jpnChrName: せっかくこっちがやる気になったのに…… あっちの屋台の人、映画の方に目移りしましたね。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくこっちがやる気になったのに……
あっちの屋台の人、映画の方に目移りしましたね。

engChrName: The president might suck, but their sweets did nothing wrong. None of this changes the fact that they're amazing and made by true artisans!
engSearchText:
The president might suck, but their sweets did
nothing wrong. None of this changes the fact that
they're amazing and made by true artisans!
jpnChrName: 空回りさせやがってです。 彼も熱しやすく冷めやすい男みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
空回りさせやがってです。
彼も熱しやすく冷めやすい男みたいですね。

engChrName: Even so, I can't help but feel regret over what's happened. I ate their sweets on occasion and learned plenty of stuff for my own work.
engSearchText:
Even so, I can't help but feel regret over
what's happened. I ate their sweets on occasion and
learned plenty of stuff for my own work.
jpnChrName: まあ、どうあってもうちの方がお客さん多いですし、 別にどうでもいいですけどねー。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、どうあってもうちの方がお客さん多いですし、
別にどうでもいいですけどねー。

engChrName: I really hope the Quincy Company is able to turn things around and get away from the president and his family. Their sweets are as popular as ever.
engSearchText:
I really hope the Quincy Company is able to turn
things around and get away from the president and
his family. Their sweets are as popular as ever.
jpnChrName: 空回っちゃったけど、たまには夜の 営業も悪くはなさそうですしね。
jpnSearchText:
空回っちゃったけど、たまには夜の
営業も悪くはなさそうですしね。

engChrName: Nobody should blame the sweets for what happened—or the people involved with actually making them. They were just doing their jobs...
engSearchText:
Nobody should blame the sweets for what
happened—or the people involved with actually
making them. They were just doing their jobs...
jpnChrName: あの二人、よく《マクミラン・カフェ》にも 行ってたみたいなんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの二人、よく《マクミラン・カフェ》にも
行ってたみたいなんですよ。

engChrName: I-In times like these, a little sugar can help calm the nerves.
engSearchText:
I-In times like these, a little sugar can help calm
the nerves.
jpnChrName: もっと知りたいなら、 あっちで聞き込みをしてみたらどうですか？
jpnSearchText:
もっと知りたいなら、
あっちで聞き込みをしてみたらどうですか？

engChrName: Chocolate can also have a...a soothing effect, to—oww! I bit my tongue...
engSearchText:
Chocolate can also have a...a soothing effect,
to—oww! I bit my tongue...
jpnChrName: ああでもっ、その前にウチのアイスを 食べて行ってくれると嬉しいです！
jpnSearchText:
ああでもっ、その前にウチのアイスを
食べて行ってくれると嬉しいです！

engChrName: Ahaha... So much for that sales pitch, I guess. Can't exactly sell anyone on it if I can't even keep my own head cool right now.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... So much for that sales pitch, I guess.
Can't exactly sell anyone on it if I can't even keep my
own head cool right now.
jpnChrName: なーんか最近、あっちのポップコーン売りの 人に目を付けられてる気がするんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
なーんか最近、あっちのポップコーン売りの
人に目を付けられてる気がするんですけど……

engChrName: Love is a lot like sweets when you think about it. It comes in all kinds of different shapes and flavors.
engSearchText:
Love is a lot like sweets when you think about it.
It comes in all kinds of different shapes and flavors.
jpnChrName: はっ、これはもしや……ライバル的な 挑戦的な何か……！？
jpnSearchText:
はっ、これはもしや……ライバル的な
挑戦的な何か……！？

engChrName: Take Judith and Maxim, or 'Maxith,' as people call them. On the outside, they might look like a really sweet, lovey-dovey sort of couple.
engSearchText:
Take Judith and Maxim, or 'Maxith,' as people
call them. On the outside, they might look like a
really sweet, lovey-dovey sort of couple.
jpnChrName: ふっふー、そういう事なら受けて立ちます。 私の研究しきった甘味が負ける道理など無いです！
jpnSearchText:
ふっふー、そういう事なら受けて立ちます。
私の研究しきった甘味が負ける道理など無いです！

engChrName: But you can't just make a good sweet by piling sugar on top of more sugar, and my gut tells me that's exactly what those two have going on.
engSearchText:
But you can't just make a good sweet by piling sugar
on top of more sugar, and my gut tells me that's
exactly what those two have going on.
jpnChrName: ラングポートには東方由来の珍しめの 甘味もあると聞きますね。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートには東方由来の珍しめの
甘味もあると聞きますね。

engChrName: It might give you a sugar rush at first. But sooner or later, you'll get tired of it and it'll all come crashing down with a nasty stomachache!
engSearchText:
It might give you a sugar rush at first. But sooner or
later, you'll get tired of it and it'll all come crashing
down with a nasty stomachache!
jpnChrName: 自分が東方系の血を継いでいる事に関わらず、 一度研究に行きたいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
自分が東方系の血を継いでいる事に関わらず、
一度研究に行きたいですねぇ。

engChrName: I was so fired up to take that popcorn seller head on, but it looks like he's mostly got his eye on the movie theater and what they're playing.
engSearchText:
I was so fired up to take that popcorn seller head on,
but it looks like he's mostly got his eye on the movie
theater and what they're playing.
jpnChrName: サルバッドや龍來にも異国情緒あふれる甘味が あるとの事、何なら外国にも甘味巡りに行きたいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドや龍來にも異国情緒あふれる甘味が
あるとの事、何なら外国にも甘味巡りに行きたいですよ。

engChrName: *sigh* He got me all revved up for nothing. Guess he's the type of guy who can cool off as quickly as he gets fired up.
engSearchText:
*sigh* He got me all revved up for nothing.
Guess he's the type of guy who can cool off as quickly
as he gets fired up.
jpnChrName: ここでアイスやジュースを作って売るにしても、 各地の色合いは色々と参考にしたいですしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ここでアイスやジュースを作って売るにしても、
各地の色合いは色々と参考にしたいですしねぇ。

engChrName: Not that I can complain too much when I'm clearly attracting more customers than him, so I'd still say I'm getting the last laugh.
engSearchText:
Not that I can complain too much when I'm clearly
attracting more customers than him, so I'd still say
I'm getting the last laugh.
jpnChrName: 国境の町《龍來》には何でも、名産品を使った ご当地アイスもあると聞きます……！
jpnSearchText:
国境の町《龍來》には何でも、名産品を使った
ご当地アイスもあると聞きます……！

engChrName: Our little competition might've turned out to be a whole lot of nothing, but putting that aside, it's actually not so bad selling out here at night.
engSearchText:
Our little competition might've turned out to be a
whole lot of nothing, but putting that aside, it's
actually not so bad selling out here at night.
jpnChrName: そういうものを一通り網羅してみれば、 何か見えてくるかもだし、見えてこないかもです。
jpnSearchText:
そういうものを一通り網羅してみれば、
何か見えてくるかもだし、見えてこないかもです。

engChrName: Yeah, I think I know who you're talking about. I've seen them go to McMillan Café a lot.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I think I know who you're talking about.
I've seen them go to McMillan Café a lot.
jpnChrName: タイレル地区はやっぱりイマドキな雰囲気ですしね、 甘味にも“映え”が求められるのです。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区はやっぱりイマドキな雰囲気ですしね、
甘味にも“映え”が求められるのです。

engChrName: That's about all I know, though. You're probably better off talking to the staff over there, in my opinion.
engSearchText:
That's about all I know, though. You're probably
better off talking to the staff over there, in
my opinion.
jpnChrName: うちで扱ってるのだと、ジェラート系は 映えると話題なのです！
jpnSearchText:
うちで扱ってるのだと、ジェラート系は
映えると話題なのです！

engChrName: Oh, but before you go! Don't you guys think you should treat yourselves to some ice creeeam? I promise you won't regret it! ㈱
engSearchText:
Oh, but before you go! Don't you guys think you
should treat yourselves to some ice creeeam?
I promise you won't regret it! ㈱
jpnChrName: ふっふー、きっかけは映えでも何でもいいのです。 とにかく甘味の魅力を伝えられればなのです。
jpnSearchText:
ふっふー、きっかけは映えでも何でもいいのです。
とにかく甘味の魅力を伝えられればなのです。

engChrName: Maybe it's just me, but I feel like that popcorn seller's been staring at me a whole lot lately. I wonder what his deal is?
engSearchText:
Maybe it's just me, but I feel like that popcorn seller's
been staring at me a whole lot lately. I wonder what
his deal is?
jpnChrName: （じーっ……）
jpnSearchText: （じーっ……）

engChrName: Wait a minute... Does he think of me as a rival? Is he challenging me to a vend-off?!
engSearchText:
Wait a minute... Does he think of me as a rival? Is he
challenging me to a vend-off?!
jpnChrName: ……あなた、甘味がお好きですね？
jpnSearchText: ……あなた、甘味がお好きですね？

engChrName: Well, if THAT'S the case, challenge accepted! I've put so much research and effort into my sweets, there's no way I'll lose to some popcorn!
engSearchText:
Well, if THAT'S the case, challenge accepted!
I've put so much research and effort into my sweets,
there's no way I'll lose to some popcorn!
jpnChrName: そしておそらくアイスだと、 ストロベリー・チョコレート系が好み！
jpnSearchText:
そしておそらくアイスだと、
ストロベリー・チョコレート系が好み！

engChrName: I hear Langport's home to some rare and unusual sweets that originate from the East.
engSearchText:
I hear Langport's home to some rare and unusual
sweets that originate from the East.
jpnChrName: ……甘味が欲しくて見てたのは認めるが…… 何でそんなに好みが細かく分かるんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
……甘味が欲しくて見てたのは認めるが……
何でそんなに好みが細かく分かるんだよ？

engChrName: I'd love to see them sometime, and not just because I'm Eastern myself. I genuinely want to go over there and research them.
engSearchText:
I'd love to see them sometime, and not just because
I'm Eastern myself. I genuinely want to go over there
and research them.
jpnChrName: しかも見てみりゃ実際……好みの奴じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: しかも見てみりゃ実際……好みの奴じゃねぇか。

engChrName: They say Tharbad and Longlai's sweets are super unique and exotic, too. Really, I just want to travel and go on one sweet journey. Literally!
engSearchText:
They say Tharbad and Longlai's sweets are super
unique and exotic, too. Really, I just want to travel
and go on one sweet journey. Literally!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、誰が普段どんな甘味を嗜んでいるか。 心を研ぎ澄ませればわかる、甘味の神秘です！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、誰が普段どんな甘味を嗜んでいるか。
心を研ぎ澄ませればわかる、甘味の神秘です！

engChrName: I might only sell ice cream and juice here, but I'm sure the colors and whatnot I'd see in different places would give me a ton of inspiration.
engSearchText:
I might only sell ice cream and juice here, but I'm
sure the colors and whatnot I'd see in different places
would give me a ton of inspiration.
jpnChrName: あっ、そっちの金髪のお姉さんは多分、 バニラ系やココナッツ系がお好きですね！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そっちの金髪のお姉さんは多分、
バニラ系やココナッツ系がお好きですね！

engChrName: I've heard there're these ice creams they make over by the border in Longlai that incorporate their local specialties. Doesn't that sound incredible?!
engSearchText:
I've heard there're these ice creams they make over by
the border in Longlai that incorporate their
local specialties. Doesn't that sound incredible?!
jpnChrName: そちらの中東系のお嬢さんは──
jpnSearchText: そちらの中東系のお嬢さんは──

engChrName: If I could just find a way to try them all, maybe I'd learn some hidden secret to them I could use here! Or maybe not. But that wouldn't be so bad!
engSearchText:
If I could just find a way to try them all, maybe I'd
learn some hidden secret to them I could use here!
Or maybe not. But that wouldn't be so bad!
jpnChrName: と、都会って凄いんですねーっ！
jpnSearchText: と、都会って凄いんですねーっ！

engChrName: Tyrell's one of the more hip and modern parts of the city, so naturally people who visit want their sweets to look 'aesthetic.'
engSearchText:
Tyrell's one of the more hip and modern parts of the
city, so naturally people who visit want their sweets to
look 'aesthetic.'
jpnChrName: いやぁ……これはこの人が凄いだけかと……
jpnSearchText: いやぁ……これはこの人が凄いだけかと……

engChrName: When it comes to what I sell, people say my gelato looks great on camera!
engSearchText:
When it comes to what I sell, people say my gelato
looks great on camera!
jpnChrName: 甘味は他の食べ物と比べて特別なのです！ 甘味を愛する人は独特のオーラを纏うのです！
jpnSearchText:
甘味は他の食べ物と比べて特別なのです！
甘味を愛する人は独特のオーラを纏うのです！

engChrName: As long as people come to see the charm in well-made sweets, I don't care what brings them in. Take all the pics you want!
engSearchText:
As long as people come to see the charm in
well-made sweets, I don't care what brings them in.
Take all the pics you want!
jpnChrName: そればかりは完全に同意見だな。
jpnSearchText: そればかりは完全に同意見だな。

jpnChrName: まだ目立った成果は無いとはいえ、 スロースも導力ネットの掲示板を当たっている。
jpnSearchText:
まだ目立った成果は無いとはいえ、
スロースも導力ネットの掲示板を当たっている。

engChrName: Hey. You there! I know a person with a sweet tooth when I see one.
engSearchText:
Hey. You there! I know a person with a sweet tooth
when I see one.
jpnChrName: 僕もどこかのタイミングで警察官か遊撃士に 協力できたらと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
僕もどこかのタイミングで警察官か遊撃士に
協力できたらと思うんだ。

engChrName: Let me guess: when you order ice cream, you're the kind of man who can't decide, so he gets both strawberry AND chocolate. Am I right?
engSearchText:
Let me guess: when you order ice cream, you're the
kind of man who can't decide, so he gets both
strawberry AND chocolate. Am I right?
jpnChrName: まあ、これでも首都のあちこちを走ってるし、 管轄外を捜索する警官の道案内くらいなら……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、これでも首都のあちこちを走ってるし、
管轄外を捜索する警官の道案内くらいなら……

engChrName: ...That's some scary intuition you got. You're right—I was checking your place out 'cause I was in the mood for somethin' sweet.
engSearchText:
...That's some scary intuition you got. You're right—I
was checking your place out 'cause I was in the mood
for somethin' sweet.
jpnChrName: この近辺は落ち着いてきたようだけど……
jpnSearchText: この近辺は落ち着いてきたようだけど……

engChrName: But to be able to tell exactly what I like... In fact, now that I'm takin' a closer look, your place is exactly what I'm into. How the hell do you do it?
engSearchText:
But to be able to tell exactly what I like... In fact,
now that I'm takin' a closer look, your place is exactly
what I'm into. How the hell do you do it?
jpnChrName: やっぱりまだ僕らが出るのは やめた方が良いってね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりまだ僕らが出るのは
やめた方が良いってね。

engChrName: Heehee! That's what happens when you gain true enlightenment in all things sweet! You get a nose for exactly the kinds of things people like.
engSearchText:
Heehee! That's what happens when you gain true
enlightenment in all things sweet! You get a nose for
exactly the kinds of things people like.
jpnChrName: 出来る事なら、自転車で情報収集するくらいの お役立ちは出来たらと思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
出来る事なら、自転車で情報収集するくらいの
お役立ちは出来たらと思うけど……

engChrName: Take your blonde-haired friend there. I've got a hunch she's into vanilla and coconut!
engSearchText:
Take your blonde-haired friend there. I've got a
hunch she's into vanilla and coconut!
jpnChrName: ……ふう、咄嗟にこの店に逃げ込んで 助かったよ……
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、咄嗟にこの店に逃げ込んで
助かったよ……

engChrName: And as for the little one...
engSearchText: And as for the little one...
jpnChrName: ……ていうかこのお店、 噂の黒月って組織が経営してたんだ……
jpnSearchText:
……ていうかこのお店、
噂の黒月って組織が経営してたんだ……

engChrName: Wow! Is everyone in the city psychic like her?! That's amazing!
engSearchText:
Wow! Is everyone in the city psychic like her?!
That's amazing!
jpnChrName: いやまあ、お陰で命は助かったけど…… 今日初めて知ったよ……
jpnSearchText:
いやまあ、お陰で命は助かったけど……
今日初めて知ったよ……

engChrName: ...I think it's just her special talent. Most people here don't have her intuition.
engSearchText:
...I think it's just her special talent. Most people here
don't have her intuition.
jpnChrName: そういえば、今日はＥＧＣっていう ファッションショーもあるんだったっけ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、今日はＥＧＣっていう
ファッションショーもあるんだったっけ。

engChrName: What can I say? When it comes to what we eat, there's nothing more special than sweets. And people who love them have an aura I can't miss!
engSearchText:
What can I say? When it comes to what we eat,
there's nothing more special than sweets. And people
who love them have an aura I can't miss!
