jpnChrName: ３区にあるトリオンホールの方は 早くも賑わってたよ。
jpnSearchText:
３区にあるトリオンホールの方は
早くも賑わってたよ。

engChrName: You got that right. Sweet stuff is what makes life worth living.
engSearchText:
You got that right. Sweet stuff is what makes life
worth living.
jpnChrName: エレインさん、一度は遊撃士を辞めようと していたとかって話も小耳に挟んだよ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさん、一度は遊撃士を辞めようと
していたとかって話も小耳に挟んだよ。

engChrName: We don't really have anything to show for it yet, but Sloth's hitting up bulletin boards on the orbal net.
engSearchText:
We don't really have anything to show for it yet, but
Sloth's hitting up bulletin boards on the orbal net.
jpnChrName: まあ、そりゃあ責任も感じるんだろうけど…… 今じゃファンも多い人だしねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そりゃあ責任も感じるんだろうけど……
今じゃファンも多い人だしねぇ……

engChrName: As for me, I'm hoping to help the police or bracers somehow with whatever they need if an opportunity presents itself.
engSearchText:
As for me, I'm hoping to help the police or bracers
somehow with whatever they need if an opportunity
presents itself.
jpnChrName: まあ、バズレイダーあたりが彼女まで悪者扱いの 報道をしなかったのは不幸中の幸いなのかな？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、バズレイダーあたりが彼女まで悪者扱いの
報道をしなかったのは不幸中の幸いなのかな？

engChrName: I might not look like much, but I've gone all over Edith on my bike. I'm sure I can show any officers around if they don't know this area.
engSearchText:
I might not look like much, but I've gone all over
Edith on my bike. I'm sure I can show any officers
around if they don't know this area.
jpnChrName: 最初は非常事態宣言と言われても ピンとこなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
最初は非常事態宣言と言われても
ピンとこなかったけど……

engChrName: I think things have calmed down around here.
engSearchText: I think things have calmed down around here.
jpnChrName: 気持ちを落ち着けようとサイクリングしてたら お巡りさんに注意されて、ようやく実感できたよ。
jpnSearchText:
気持ちを落ち着けようとサイクリングしてたら
お巡りさんに注意されて、ようやく実感できたよ。

engChrName: They told us to stay inside for the time being, though.
engSearchText: They told us to stay inside for the time being, though.
jpnChrName: 自分の住んでる国が大変で、 決して他人事なんかじゃないんだって……
jpnSearchText:
自分の住んでる国が大変で、
決して他人事なんかじゃないんだって……

engChrName: I was hoping maybe I could hop on my bicycle and gather some information or something, but I don't know if I'll get to at this rate... *sigh*
engSearchText:
I was hoping maybe I could hop on my bicycle and
gather some information or something, but I don't
know if I'll get to at this rate... *sigh*
jpnChrName: そういやそうだったな……スロースはもともと スキャンダルとかも好きだったよな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやそうだったな……スロースはもともと
スキャンダルとかも好きだったよな。

engChrName: Whew! That was a good call, dashing into this restaurant. I'd have been in big trouble if I didn't.
engSearchText:
Whew! That was a good call, dashing into
this restaurant. I'd have been in big trouble if I didn't.

jpnSearchText: 僕は普通に自転車が好きなだけなんだ。

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

engSearchText:

engSearchText:

stuff for some weird reason. I remember when some

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:
He kept going on and ON about it being the 'dark

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:
例のマフィア、クレイユ村やオラシオン以外にも

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:
不動産屋の胃痛は想像したくもないが……それ以上に

jpnSearchText:

jpnChrName: ウェンデル、サイクリング中に変なものと 出くわす体質だろ、キャッツ何とかは見てないか？
jpnSearchText:
ウェンデル、サイクリング中に変なものと
出くわす体質だろ、キャッツ何とかは見てないか？

engChrName: I heard something interesting while I was biking past the Elsaim embassy in Auber earlier.
engSearchText:
I heard something interesting while I was biking past
the Elsaim embassy in Auber earlier.
jpnChrName: いや勝手にそんな体質に 期待されても困るんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
いや勝手にそんな体質に
期待されても困るんだけど……

engChrName: They say Crown Prince Sherid likes to go out and talk with the general public. That's pretty unusual for someone of his upbringing.
engSearchText:
They say Crown Prince Sherid likes to go out and
talk with the general public. That's pretty unusual for
someone of his upbringing.
jpnChrName: まあ、こないだ夜のサイクリング中に 上見たら、ビルの間を駆ける人影が見えた気も……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、こないだ夜のサイクリング中に
上見たら、ビルの間を駆ける人影が見えた気も……

engChrName: Doubt he hangs out much with ordinary people like you or me, of course. I'd guess he's more interested in people rolling in mira like him.
engSearchText:
Doubt he hangs out much with ordinary people like
you or me, of course. I'd guess he's more interested in
people rolling in mira like him.
jpnChrName: まあ、すぐ見えなくなったし、 多分逃げだしたサルか何かの見間違いさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、すぐ見えなくなったし、
多分逃げだしたサルか何かの見間違いさ。

engChrName: Huh? What's the matter, Sloth? You look bored. I thought you'd totally be interested to hear something like that.
engSearchText:
Huh? What's the matter, Sloth? You look bored.
I thought you'd totally be interested to hear
something like that.
jpnChrName: うーん、通信が多少回復したって聞いて 掲示板もチェックしてるがダメだな……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、通信が多少回復したって聞いて
掲示板もチェックしてるがダメだな……

engChrName: I mean, good for him. He's broadened his horizons. We're still talking about some schmuck... I'm only interested in rumors with some spice to them.
engSearchText:
I mean, good for him. He's broadened his horizons.
We're still talking about some schmuck... I'm only
interested in rumors with some spice to them.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、ユーザーも皆固まっちゃって いるんだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、ユーザーも皆固まっちゃって
いるんだろうなぁ……

engChrName: All right, fine. You want to discuss the women they had at the film festival or something?
engSearchText:
All right, fine. You want to discuss the women they
had at the film festival or something?
jpnChrName: でも、どっかに固まってないユーザーがいれば 情報交換できるだろうし、粘ってみるか……！
jpnSearchText:
でも、どっかに固まってないユーザーがいれば
情報交換できるだろうし、粘ってみるか……！

engChrName: Not that I've really heard all that much, actually.
engSearchText: Not that I've really heard all that much, actually.
jpnChrName: 俺達も何かできる事ってねぇのかな……
jpnSearchText: 俺達も何かできる事ってねぇのかな……

engChrName: Ehh, there's nothing wrong with that. But that's not the only spice I like, you know! Sometimes I enjoy grittier material, too.
engSearchText:
Ehh, there's nothing wrong with that. But that's not
the only spice I like, you know! Sometimes I enjoy
grittier material, too.
jpnChrName: でも、俺らなんて噂が好きなだけの一般人だし、 黒月に気づけもしなかったし……
jpnSearchText:
でも、俺らなんて噂が好きなだけの一般人だし、
黒月に気づけもしなかったし……

engChrName: Like this back-alley business. I don't know the details, but if you leave some sorta code on a bulletin board, they clean up your problems!
engSearchText:
Like this back-alley business. I don't know the details,
but if you leave some sorta code on a bulletin board,
they clean up your problems!
jpnChrName: おいおい……助けてもらって何だが、 この店が黒月の拠点だったとは……！
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……助けてもらって何だが、
この店が黒月の拠点だったとは……！

engChrName: Wendell, guess what?! The cops put out more wanted posters for that cat thief woman again!
engSearchText:
Wendell, guess what?! The cops put out more wanted
posters for that cat thief woman again!
jpnChrName: くぅ、噂好きを気取っておきながら 気づけなかったのが情けないぜ！
jpnSearchText:
くぅ、噂好きを気取っておきながら
気づけなかったのが情けないぜ！

engChrName: There's all sorts of rumors about her. Like how she's got a heart of gold, or how it's actually a team of thieves and whatnot. The list goes on.
engSearchText:
There's all sorts of rumors about her. Like how she's
got a heart of gold, or how it's actually a team of
thieves and whatnot. The list goes on.
jpnChrName: まあ、それだけ彼らの情報統制も 一流って事なのかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それだけ彼らの情報統制も
一流って事なのかもしれないが……

engChrName: Dude, I know you run into some crazy stuff while you're out bicycling. You're like a magnet for it! You ever see her around town?!
engSearchText:
Dude, I know you run into some crazy stuff while
you're out bicycling. You're like a magnet for it!
You ever see her around town?!
jpnChrName: これだけの記念祭だしな、絶対に意外な人が 意外なところで羽目外してたりするだろ！
jpnSearchText:
これだけの記念祭だしな、絶対に意外な人が
意外なところで羽目外してたりするだろ！

engChrName: Do you have to put it like that? You make it sound like I go out of my way to attract weird things to me when I really, really don't.
engSearchText:
Do you have to put it like that? You make it sound
like I go out of my way to attract weird things to me
when I really, really don't.
jpnChrName: ウェンデルにはそういうのに遭遇して 欲しかったんだけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ウェンデルにはそういうのに遭遇して
欲しかったんだけどなぁ……

engChrName: But since you asked, I was out riding a couple of nights ago when I just happened to look up. I think I might've seen someone running across rooftops.
engSearchText:
But since you asked, I was out riding a couple of
nights ago when I just happened to look up. I think I
might've seen someone running across rooftops.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの資産家に貴族気取りが多いって 噂は前から聞いちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの資産家に貴族気取りが多いって
噂は前から聞いちゃいたが……

engChrName: I lost sight of them immediately, though, so who knows what it was? Might've just been some monkey that got out of its cage or something.
engSearchText:
I lost sight of them immediately, though, so who
knows what it was? Might've just been some monkey
that got out of its cage or something.
jpnChrName: 連中にとっては菓子やら車のメーカー経営も、 一族を繁栄させる手段に過ぎなかったのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
連中にとっては菓子やら車のメーカー経営も、
一族を繁栄させる手段に過ぎなかったのかもな。

engChrName: I heard the lines are somewhat up and running again, so I checked the message boards online to see if there was anything, but it's no use.
engSearchText:
I heard the lines are somewhat up and running again,
so I checked the message boards online to see if there
was anything, but it's no use.
jpnChrName: 土地と資産があっても、事業自体への関心は薄い、 そんなんだから弱み握られるんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
土地と資産があっても、事業自体への関心は薄い、
そんなんだから弱み握られるんだろうな。

engChrName: Most of the other users are probably frozen right now...
engSearchText:
Most of the other users are probably frozen
right now...
jpnChrName: 普段は噂話は何でも面白がってきたが…… 流石に今回はデマとか注意しないとだな。
jpnSearchText:
普段は噂話は何でも面白がってきたが……
流石に今回はデマとか注意しないとだな。

engChrName: ...but I'm not going nowhere! Somebody else out there might still be able to connect and if they do, we can trade info! Only one way to find out!
engSearchText:
...but I'm not going nowhere! Somebody else out
there might still be able to connect and if they do, we
can trade info! Only one way to find out!
jpnChrName: ネットの掲示板にも、変な事が書き込まれてたら 指摘するなり、最悪通報するなりしとくか……
jpnSearchText:
ネットの掲示板にも、変な事が書き込まれてたら
指摘するなり、最悪通報するなりしとくか……

engChrName: Is there nothing we can do to help? I'm trying to think of something, but...
engSearchText:
Is there nothing we can do to help? I'm trying to
think of something, but...
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに有名人のスキャンダルで 面白いのが来た！
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりに有名人のスキャンダルで
面白いのが来た！

engChrName: We're just a couple of regular guys who enjoy rumors. If we couldn't even notice we were in Heiyue turf, what good are we to anybody? *sigh*
engSearchText:
We're just a couple of regular guys who enjoy rumors.
If we couldn't even notice we were in Heiyue turf,
what good are we to anybody? *sigh*
jpnChrName: これに他の噂を組み合わせて検証すると…… 謎が解けるかのようだ！
jpnSearchText:
これに他の噂を組み合わせて検証すると……
謎が解けるかのようだ！

engChrName: W-We're in Heiyue territory here...? Holy crap! Not that I'm complaining, mind you. I'll take it if it means staying alive, but...
engSearchText:
W-We're in Heiyue territory here...? Holy crap!
Not that I'm complaining, mind you. I'll take it if it
means staying alive, but...
jpnChrName: ウェンデル、お前ならあるいは……！
jpnSearchText: ウェンデル、お前ならあるいは……！

engChrName: Gah! How could I fail to notice when I'm supposed to be Edith's biggest rumormonger?! Oh, I tell you, I'm getting rusty.
engSearchText:
Gah! How could I fail to notice when I'm supposed
to be Edith's biggest rumormonger?! Oh, I tell you,
I'm getting rusty.
jpnChrName: くっ、その体質が羨ましいぜ！！
jpnSearchText: くっ、その体質が羨ましいぜ！！

engChrName: You could say it's a sign of just how much they have their information control on lock, but still, I should've known...
engSearchText:
You could say it's a sign of just how much they have
their information control on lock, but still, I
should've known...
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋やグリムキャッツに限らず、 裏稼業系の噂って結構あるよな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋やグリムキャッツに限らず、
裏稼業系の噂って結構あるよな。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival's the perfect place to find lots of weird people letting loose and doing weird stuff in weird places when you least expect it!
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival's the perfect place to find
lots of weird people letting loose and doing weird
stuff in weird places when you least expect it!
jpnChrName: 怪盗なら“怪盗Ｂ”ってのも一時流行ったし、 東方人街の暗殺者やら何やら都市伝説も多いしな。
jpnSearchText:
怪盗なら“怪盗Ｂ”ってのも一時流行ったし、
東方人街の暗殺者やら何やら都市伝説も多いしな。

engChrName: The least Wendell could've done was run into a couple of them and report back so we'd have something interesting to talk about... *sigh*
engSearchText:
The least Wendell could've done was run into a
couple of them and report back so we'd have
something interesting to talk about... *sigh*
jpnChrName: そういうのに比べたら、裏解決屋って圧倒的に 現実的というか、荒唐無稽な感じは無いよな。
jpnSearchText:
そういうのに比べたら、裏解決屋って圧倒的に
現実的というか、荒唐無稽な感じは無いよな。

engChrName: I'd heard rumors before about just how pompous a lotta the rich in Oración are.
engSearchText:
I'd heard rumors before about just how pompous a
lotta the rich in Oración are.
jpnChrName: 超人的な身のこなしで飛び回る系の怪盗か…… 定番の説のやつだな、ウェンデルが見たのも。
jpnSearchText:
超人的な身のこなしで飛び回る系の怪盗か……
定番の説のやつだな、ウェンデルが見たのも。

engChrName: They might have businesses making sweets or cars or whatever, but to them, they're nothing more than a way to get themselves and their family wealthy.
engSearchText:
They might have businesses making sweets or cars or
whatever, but to them, they're nothing more than a
way to get themselves and their family wealthy.
jpnChrName: ちぇっ、もっと予想外な感じの、定説ひっくり返す ようなのに遭遇しないか期待してたのに。
jpnSearchText:
ちぇっ、もっと予想外な感じの、定説ひっくり返す
ようなのに遭遇しないか期待してたのに。

engChrName: Even with land and assets behind them, they couldn't care less about the businesses. That's how their weaknesses get preyed on, I bet.
engSearchText:
Even with land and assets behind them, they couldn't
care less about the businesses. That's how their
weaknesses get preyed on, I bet.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ……何やら、事態の打開に向けて 動きがあると警官の方よりお聞きしました。
jpnSearchText:
……何やら、事態の打開に向けて
動きがあると警官の方よりお聞きしました。

engChrName: I used to be interested in just about any rumors I came across, but I guess I need to start being more careful about false info floating around.
engSearchText:
I used to be interested in just about any rumors I
came across, but I guess I need to start being more
careful about false info floating around.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 皆さまもどうやら……よほどの覚悟の 面持ちのようですが……
jpnSearchText:
皆さまもどうやら……よほどの覚悟の
面持ちのようですが……

engChrName: Maybe if I see anything weird on message boards online, I'll start to either point it out or, worse comes to worst, report it. Hate to do it, but...
engSearchText:
Maybe if I see anything weird on message boards
online, I'll start to either point it out or, worse comes
to worst, report it. Hate to do it, but...
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: どうか、ご無事に帰ってきて、 またこのカフェで寛いでください。
jpnSearchText:
どうか、ご無事に帰ってきて、
またこのカフェで寛いでください。

engChrName: Man, it's been a while since we had a celebrity scandal happen that was this wild!
engSearchText:
Man, it's been a while since we had a celebrity
scandal happen that was this wild!
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: このカフェは不滅です、時代と共にありました。 今回の異変でも、また……
jpnSearchText:
このカフェは不滅です、時代と共にありました。
今回の異変でも、また……

engChrName: If we combine that with all of the other rumors, I've gotta feeling the truth will reveal itself!
engSearchText:
If we combine that with all of the other rumors, I've
gotta feeling the truth will reveal itself!
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: あ、アニエスさんにアークライドさん…… ご無事で本当に良かった……
jpnSearchText:
あ、アニエスさんにアークライドさん……
ご無事で本当に良かった……

engChrName: Wendell, maybe you...
engSearchText: Wendell, maybe you...
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: アニエスさんは、随分と怖ろしい目に 遭われてしまったと聞きますが……
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんは、随分と怖ろしい目に
遭われてしまったと聞きますが……

engChrName: Gah! I wish I had your luck running into exciting stuff! Lemme have some of it!
engSearchText:
Gah! I wish I had your luck running into
exciting stuff! Lemme have some of it!
jpnChrName: チャールズさん……心配していただき ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
チャールズさん……心配していただき
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I hear plenty of rumors about people who work underground, not just Grimcat and that spriggan.
engSearchText:
I hear plenty of rumors about people who work
underground, not just Grimcat and that spriggan.
jpnChrName: でも、私でしたらこの通り大丈夫ですから。 ヴァンさんが助けてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
でも、私でしたらこの通り大丈夫ですから。
ヴァンさんが助けてくれて……

engChrName: Phantom Thief B was popular for a while, plus there are all kindsa urban legends about assassins from Langport's Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
Phantom Thief B was popular for a while, plus there
are all kindsa urban legends about assassins from
Langport's Eastern Quarter.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: そうですか……それなら何よりです。 それにしても……大変な事になったようで……
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……それなら何よりです。
それにしても……大変な事になったようで……

engChrName: Compared to people like them, the spriggan's too grounded for my taste. They're not larger than life in a way that makes them fun or nothing.
engSearchText:
Compared to people like them, the spriggan's too
grounded for my taste. They're not larger than life in
a way that makes them fun or nothing.
jpnChrName: 一応、あの悪魔共の司令塔みてぇなモンは 破壊したからタイレルは落ち着いてきたが……
jpnSearchText:
一応、あの悪魔共の司令塔みてぇなモンは
破壊したからタイレルは落ち着いてきたが……

engChrName: It sounds like what Wendell saw was a more average phantom thief—jumping and flying around with superhuman skill. The kind we've all heard before.
engSearchText:
It sounds like what Wendell saw was a more average
phantom thief—jumping and flying around with
superhuman skill. The kind we've all heard before.
jpnChrName: それでも幾らか悪魔はうろついてる状況だ、 外に出るのはよした方が良いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも幾らか悪魔はうろついてる状況だ、
外に出るのはよした方が良いぜ。

engChrName: What a letdown! I was hoping he saw something so unusual it would turn everyone's conventional thinking the hell upside down. Damn!
engSearchText:
What a letdown! I was hoping he saw something
so unusual it would turn everyone's conventional
thinking the hell upside down. Damn!
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: わかりました……でしたら私は、避難民の他、 戦っている方々の休息の場を整えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
わかりました……でしたら私は、避難民の他、
戦っている方々の休息の場を整えましょう。

engChrName: A police officer has informed me that attention is shifting towards bringing an end to this situation.
engSearchText:
A police officer has informed me that attention is
shifting towards bringing an end to this situation.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 憩いの場を預かる者として、 その程度であっても助けになれれば幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
憩いの場を預かる者として、
その程度であっても助けになれれば幸いです。

engChrName: I can tell simply by looking that you all are determined to make that happen.
engSearchText:
I can tell simply by looking that you all are
determined to make that happen.
jpnChrName: ええ、お願いします。 きっと市民の方たちも安心できますし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、お願いします。
きっと市民の方たちも安心できますし。

engChrName: Whatever you do, please, come back alive. I wish to see you all at my café again once this is all over.
engSearchText:
Whatever you do, please, come back alive. I wish to
see you all at my café again once this is all over.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 避難してきた方を安心させるため、外で頑張っている 警官や遊撃士の方々に休息していただくため……
jpnSearchText:
避難してきた方を安心させるため、外で頑張っている
警官や遊撃士の方々に休息していただくため……

engChrName: This café is eternal. It has survived much since its initial founding—and one way or another, it shall survive this as well. Good luck, everyone.
engSearchText:
This café is eternal. It has survived much since its
initial founding—and one way or another, it shall
survive this as well. Good luck, everyone.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 私も、このカフェでできる事を可能な限り させていただきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
私も、このカフェでできる事を可能な限り
させていただきましょう。

engChrName: A-Agnès! Mr. Arkride! I am truly relieved to see you are both all right.
engSearchText:
A-Agnès! Mr. Arkride! I am truly relieved to see you
are both all right.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 再び、皆さんの笑顔を見れる日々が 戻る事を信じて……
jpnSearchText:
再び、皆さんの笑顔を見れる日々が
戻る事を信じて……

engChrName: Especially you, Agnès. I heard you found yourself in a rather dreadful situation.
engSearchText:
Especially you, Agnès. I heard you found yourself in a
rather dreadful situation.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 記念祭をこうして迎えられた事、 今年は一層女神に感謝せざるを得ません。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭をこうして迎えられた事、
今年は一層女神に感謝せざるを得ません。

engChrName: Oh, I'm sorry, Mr. McMillan. Thank you so much for keeping me in your thoughts. That means a lot.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm sorry, Mr. McMillan. Thank you so much for
keeping me in your thoughts. That means a lot.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 忙しくなるとは言え、記念祭の日のお客さんの 笑顔は普段以上に輝かしいものですからな。
jpnSearchText:
忙しくなるとは言え、記念祭の日のお客さんの
笑顔は普段以上に輝かしいものですからな。

engChrName: I'm doing okay now, I promise. I have Van to thank for that.
engSearchText:
I'm doing okay now, I promise. I have Van to thank
for that.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 何といいますか、この地でカフェを 経営している甲斐を最も感じる時です。
jpnSearchText:
何といいますか、この地でカフェを
経営している甲斐を最も感じる時です。

engChrName: Do you, now? Well, I'm glad to hear that. This is certainly quite the calamity that has befallen Edith, though, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
Do you, now? Well, I'm glad to hear that. This is
certainly quite the calamity that has befallen Edith,
though, hasn't it?
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 地方や外国のお客さんももてなせますしな、 新しい発見も毎年ありますし……
jpnSearchText:
地方や外国のお客さんももてなせますしな、
新しい発見も毎年ありますし……

engChrName: It could be worse. With that demon sphere out of the way, the situation here in Tyrell should be pretty calm.
engSearchText:
It could be worse. With that demon sphere out of
the way, the situation here in Tyrell should be
pretty calm.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ……それに、今年はあの凄惨な事件を 経た後の記念祭ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
……それに、今年はあの凄惨な事件を
経た後の記念祭ですしね。

engChrName: But there are still monsters wandering around, so I'd strongly advise staying inside for the time being. All right?
engSearchText:
But there are still monsters wandering around, so I'd
strongly advise staying inside for the time being.
All right?
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 正直に言えば私も、昨晩まではやや不安も 残っていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
正直に言えば私も、昨晩まではやや不安も
残っていたのですが……

engChrName: Yes, I understand. In that case, I'll work on making this a place of refuge where people can rest. For evacuees and those fighting.
engSearchText:
Yes, I understand. In that case, I'll work on making
this a place of refuge where people can rest.
For evacuees and those fighting.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: こうして多くのお客さんの笑顔を見ると、 平和が戻ったのだと改めて実感できます。
jpnSearchText:
こうして多くのお客さんの笑顔を見ると、
平和が戻ったのだと改めて実感できます。

engChrName: It may not be much, but if it's a way for me to help others during this terrible nightmare, I'm honored to do it.
engSearchText:
It may not be much, but if it's a way for me to help
others during this terrible nightmare, I'm honored to
do it.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 来年こそは……何事も無い、 良い一年になると良いですなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
来年こそは……何事も無い、
良い一年になると良いですなぁ……

engChrName: That sounds wonderful, Mr. McMillan. I'm sure everybody will be happy to know they can still come to your café for a little refuge.
engSearchText:
That sounds wonderful, Mr. McMillan. I'm sure
everybody will be happy to know they can still come
to your café for a little refuge.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: それにしても、記念祭が近づくと…… この店の歴史が話題になる事もありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、記念祭が近づくと……
この店の歴史が話題になる事もありましてね。

engChrName: I'm going to do whatever I can within the bounds of this café to provide help and support to the community during this time of crisis.
engSearchText:
I'm going to do whatever I can within the bounds of
this café to provide help and support to the
community during this time of crisis.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: あの窓辺の席でシーナ達が国の未来を語らって いたと思うと、込み上げてくるものがあります。
jpnSearchText:
あの窓辺の席でシーナ達が国の未来を語らって
いたと思うと、込み上げてくるものがあります。

engChrName: Whether that means giving evacuees safety and comfort, or simply offering the police and bracers working and fighting so hard a place to rest.
engSearchText:
Whether that means giving evacuees safety and
comfort, or simply offering the police and bracers
working and fighting so hard a place to rest.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 例の『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』を観てからは、当時の情景も イメージできて……感慨深いものです。
jpnSearchText:
例の『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』を観てからは、当時の情景も
イメージできて……感慨深いものです。

engChrName: In the meantime, all I can do is trust that this nightmare won't last forever...that a day will come when everyone can smile again.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, all I can do is trust that this
nightmare won't last forever...that a day will come
when everyone can smile again.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 改めて……この店を譲り受けた事の 意味を噛み締めて頑張らねば……
jpnSearchText:
改めて……この店を譲り受けた事の
意味を噛み締めて頑張らねば……

engChrName: Now that the Revolution Festival is upon us, I can't help but feel especially grateful to the Goddess this year.
engSearchText:
Now that the Revolution Festival is upon us, I can't
help but feel especially grateful to the Goddess
this year.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 再び平和な日常が戻り、記念祭を皆で 迎えることが出来そうで何よりです……
jpnSearchText:
再び平和な日常が戻り、記念祭を皆で
迎えることが出来そうで何よりです……

engChrName: Busy as the café may be, our customers' smiles always shine brightest today more than any other day.
engSearchText:
Busy as the café may be, our customers' smiles always
shine brightest today more than any other day.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 失われた命は戻りませんが……せめて私達は、 穏やかに過ごせるようこの平穏に感謝しなければ。
jpnSearchText:
失われた命は戻りませんが……せめて私達は、
穏やかに過ごせるようこの平穏に感謝しなければ。

engChrName: Every day running this business is fulfilling, but it's this time of year that gives me the most satisfaction and makes me glad to be here.
engSearchText:
Every day running this business is fulfilling, but it's
this time of year that gives me the most satisfaction
and makes me glad to be here.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 私も……皆さんが改めて平穏を享受できる場を、 提供できるよう、力になりたいものです……
jpnSearchText:
私も……皆さんが改めて平穏を享受できる場を、
提供できるよう、力になりたいものです……

engChrName: With all the customers from the countryside and abroad that we serve, I always learn new and interesting things during the festival every year.
engSearchText:
With all the customers from the countryside and
abroad that we serve, I always learn new and
interesting things during the festival every year.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー

engChrName: And...after such an appalling tragedy, those sentiments are only stronger this year.
engSearchText:
And...after such an appalling tragedy, those
sentiments are only stronger this year.
jpnChrName: チャールズさん……
jpnSearchText: チャールズさん……

engChrName: I must confess. Until today, I felt somewhat apprehensive going into this festival, wondering how things were going to fare.
engSearchText:
I must confess. Until today, I felt somewhat
apprehensive going into this festival, wondering how
things were going to fare.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ……ああ、アニエスさん。 すみません、目を瞑っておりまして……
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、アニエスさん。
すみません、目を瞑っておりまして……

engChrName: However, seeing all of these customers come in with smiling faces, it reassures me that peace has indeed returned after all.
engSearchText:
However, seeing all of these customers come in with
smiling faces, it reassures me that peace has indeed
returned after all.
jpnChrName: 例の……クレイユ村の事ですね？
jpnSearchText: 例の……クレイユ村の事ですね？

engChrName: I only pray that next year is...a good year. One free of any terrible incidents.
engSearchText:
I only pray that next year is...a good year. One free of
any terrible incidents.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ええ……私も以前に訪れた事はありましたが、 あのような温かい村がこのような事に……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……私も以前に訪れた事はありましたが、
あのような温かい村がこのような事に……

engChrName: Whenever the festival draws near, people tend to find themselves more interested in the history of this café. Certainly, I myself ponder it.
engSearchText:
Whenever the festival draws near, people tend to find
themselves more interested in the history of this café.
Certainly, I myself ponder it.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言下でもカフェを続ける他無い身ですが せめて少しでも祈らせて頂こうと……
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言下でもカフェを続ける他無い身ですが
せめて少しでも祈らせて頂こうと……

engChrName: When I think about how Sheena Dirke and her companions used to talk about Calvard's future right by that window, I feel overcome with emotion.
engSearchText:
When I think about how Sheena Dirke and her
companions used to talk about Calvard's future right
by that window, I feel overcome with emotion.
jpnChrName: （落ち着いているように見えて……   何かしらの形で堪えた者も多いみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（落ち着いているように見えて……
何かしらの形で堪えた者も多いみたいだな。）

engChrName: I ended up viewing that film, Gloria, as well. Ever since then, I find I am better able to picture how this place looked and felt in those days.
engSearchText:
I ended up viewing that film, Gloria, as well.
Ever since then, I find I am better able to picture how
this place looked and felt in those days.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: とはいえ……こういう時こそ、私達が 皆の安心できる空間を作らねばなりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……こういう時こそ、私達が
皆の安心できる空間を作らねばなりませんね。

engChrName: It's given me a renewed understanding of just how privileged I am to inherit this café. I have a duty to uphold that legacy as best I can.
engSearchText:
It's given me a renewed understanding of just how
privileged I am to inherit this café. I have a duty to
uphold that legacy as best I can.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の皆さまの冥福を祈りつつ…… 皆さまの不安を取り除く助けになりたいですな。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の皆さまの冥福を祈りつつ……
皆さまの不安を取り除く助けになりたいですな。

engChrName: Nothing makes me happier than to see peace return to this city so that everyone can enjoy the Revolution Festival in peace.
engSearchText:
Nothing makes me happier than to see peace return
to this city so that everyone can enjoy the Revolution
Festival in peace.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 有名人というのは、大変ですなぁ…… 件の記事の真偽は分かりかねますが……
jpnSearchText:
有名人というのは、大変ですなぁ……
件の記事の真偽は分かりかねますが……

engChrName: We must not take this tranquility with which we're blessed for granted. After all, we can never get back the lives that were lost in this tragedy.
engSearchText:
We must not take this tranquility with which we're
blessed for granted. After all, we can never get back
the lives that were lost in this tragedy.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんもだいぶ前に来店してくれて、 普通に良い方、一人の人間でしたのに……
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさんもだいぶ前に来店してくれて、
普通に良い方、一人の人間でしたのに……

engChrName: Certainly, it's renewed my commitment to offering the people of this city a place where...where they can truly feel safe, comfortable...and content...
engSearchText:
Certainly, it's renewed my commitment to offering
the people of this city a place where...where they can
truly feel safe, comfortable...and content...
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 名を上げたばかりに槍玉にも上げられる…… 普通に生活できないなら可哀想なものです。
jpnSearchText:
名を上げたばかりに槍玉にも上げられる……
普通に生活できないなら可哀想なものです。

engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: おや、こんな時間にどうも。 今夜は何をお飲みになりますか？
jpnSearchText:
おや、こんな時間にどうも。
今夜は何をお飲みになりますか？

engChrName: ...Mr. McMillan?
engSearchText: ...Mr. McMillan?
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: しかし、昼に来て下さっているエルザイムの親子も 今は随分と慣れてきたようで……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、昼に来て下さっているエルザイムの親子も
今は随分と慣れてきたようで……

engChrName: O-Oh, Agnès! Forgive me. I was simply...closing my eyes for a moment.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, Agnès! Forgive me. I was simply...closing my
eyes for a moment.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 学生さんらの視察研修の件など、色々な事を 気軽に聞いてくださるようになりましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
学生さんらの視察研修の件など、色々な事を
気軽に聞いてくださるようになりましたよ。

engChrName: Were you thinking about...what happened in Creil?
engSearchText: Were you thinking about...what happened in Creil?
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 最初は新しい環境に慣れるのにいっぱいの ようでしたが……今では余裕も出来たようで。
jpnSearchText:
最初は新しい環境に慣れるのにいっぱいの
ようでしたが……今では余裕も出来たようで。

engChrName: Yes. I've had the pleasure of visiting there. To think such tragedy could befall such a warm and welcoming village...
engSearchText:
Yes. I've had the pleasure of visiting there. To think
such tragedy could befall such a warm and
welcoming village...
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: アラミスの学生のお客さんが視察研修のお話を しているのを聞くと、秋の訪れを感じますな。
jpnSearchText:
アラミスの学生のお客さんが視察研修のお話を
しているのを聞くと、秋の訪れを感じますな。

engChrName: I have to carry on. Even under this declaration, I have no choice but to continue running the café. Still, I feel compelled to pray for those souls...
engSearchText:
I have to carry on. Even under this declaration, I have
no choice but to continue running the café. Still, I
feel compelled to pray for those souls...
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 毎年、情勢や評判によって行き先の人気も変わると 言いますが、今年もどうなるか楽しみです。
jpnSearchText:
毎年、情勢や評判によって行き先の人気も変わると
言いますが、今年もどうなるか楽しみです。

engChrName: (You can tell he's trying his best to stay calm. Probably lots of people out there who've had to hold on and keep themselves together how they can.)
engSearchText:
(You can tell he's trying his best to stay calm.
Probably lots of people out there who've had to hold
on and keep themselves together how they can.)
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ……そして、冬には学藝祭の話題で 盛り上がる事でしょうしな。
jpnSearchText:
……そして、冬には学藝祭の話題で
盛り上がる事でしょうしな。

engChrName: These are not easy times, which is why it is all the more important for us to continue to offer a space where people can relax and feel safe.
engSearchText:
These are not easy times, which is why it is all the
more important for us to continue to offer a space
where people can relax and feel safe.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: いやはや、アラミスの行事が、一つの風物詩の ように思えて面白いですなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、アラミスの行事が、一つの風物詩の
ように思えて面白いですなぁ。

engChrName: I simply want to ease my customer's worries. I'll be continuing to pray for the souls of those we lost in Creil as well. May they rest in peace...
engSearchText:
I simply want to ease my customer's worries. I'll be
continuing to pray for the souls of those we lost in
Creil as well. May they rest in peace...
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: お客さんたちも、随分と映画祭の話題で 盛り上がっているようですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お客さんたちも、随分と映画祭の話題で
盛り上がっているようですねぇ。

engChrName: It can't be easy being famous. I couldn't say whether or not that article has any merit.
engSearchText:
It can't be easy being famous. I couldn't say whether
or not that article has any merit.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 恥ずかしながら私、最近は映画をそれほど 見ておらず……何本かお客さんに勧められました。
jpnSearchText:
恥ずかしながら私、最近は映画をそれほど
見ておらず……何本かお客さんに勧められました。

engChrName: However, what I can say is that when Judith visited our café some time ago, she was pleasant to serve. A perfectly normal woman.
engSearchText:
However, what I can say is that when Judith visited
our café some time ago, she was pleasant to serve.
A perfectly normal woman.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: お客さんとの交流も円滑になるでしょうし、 久しぶりに何か観てみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
お客さんとの交流も円滑になるでしょうし、
久しぶりに何か観てみましょうか。

engChrName: Fame certainly has a way of making a victim of one's own success. It's unfortunate when it means someone can't carry on a normal life, truly.
engSearchText:
Fame certainly has a way of making a victim of one's
own success. It's unfortunate when it means someone
can't carry on a normal life, truly.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: そういえば大分前ですが、うちのカフェで 映画のロケもしていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば大分前ですが、うちのカフェで
映画のロケもしていましたね。

engChrName: Oh, you're here late. What can I serve you this evening?
engSearchText:
Oh, you're here late. What can I serve you
this evening?
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 確か民主革命のお話で、是非とも現存する カフェを映したいとか何とか……
jpnSearchText:
確か民主革命のお話で、是非とも現存する
カフェを映したいとか何とか……

engChrName: There's a family from Elsaim that often comes to the café in the afternoon. They appear to have finally settled into the city at long last.
engSearchText:
There's a family from Elsaim that often comes to the
café in the afternoon. They appear to have finally
settled into the city at long last.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: でしたら自分の店の歴史を今一度噛み締める ためにも『グロリア』は観てみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら自分の店の歴史を今一度噛み締める
ためにも『グロリア』は観てみましょうか。

engChrName: They've started telling me all sorts of things about their lives, such as Aramis' educational outing, which is nice to hear.
engSearchText:
They've started telling me all sorts of things about
their lives, such as Aramis' educational outing, which
is nice to hear.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: こんばんは、ラストオーダーはもう少し 先ですので、寛いでいただいて結構ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
こんばんは、ラストオーダーはもう少し
先ですので、寛いでいただいて結構ですよ。

engChrName: It seemed to be quite the struggle for them to get acclimated to their new environment, but these days they sound much more relaxed. I'm relieved.
engSearchText:
It seemed to be quite the struggle for them to get
acclimated to their new environment, but these days
they sound much more relaxed. I'm relieved.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 仕事や学業を終えたあと一息入れたい方もいます、 それなりに遅くまで店を開けておりまして。
jpnSearchText:
仕事や学業を終えたあと一息入れたい方もいます、
それなりに遅くまで店を開けておりまして。

engChrName: I overheard an Aramis student discussing an upcoming educational visitation being put on by the school. I suspect that's the annual autumn trip.
engSearchText:
I overheard an Aramis student discussing an
upcoming educational visitation being put on by
the school. I suspect that's the annual autumn trip.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: そろそろ冷える季節ですしね、皆様に 温かいコーヒーを振る舞いたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ冷える季節ですしね、皆様に
温かいコーヒーを振る舞いたいものです。

engChrName: The reception to their destination varies depending on its reputation and general circumstances. I'm looking forward to hearing how this year's fares.
engSearchText:
The reception to their destination varies depending
on its reputation and general circumstances.
I'm looking forward to hearing how this year's fares.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはチャールズ・オーナーに名刺を渡した。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンはチャールズ・オーナーに名刺を渡した。

engChrName: I'm sure that come wintertime, the students will be buzzing about the school festival as well.
engSearchText:
I'm sure that come wintertime, the students will be
buzzing about the school festival as well.
jpnChrName: 突然声をかけて悪いな、 俺達はアークライド解決事務所っつう者だ。
jpnSearchText:
突然声をかけて悪いな、
俺達はアークライド解決事務所っつう者だ。

engChrName: Aramis' events are always entertaining, worthwhile affairs. They're something of a seasonal institution in these parts.
engSearchText:
Aramis' events are always entertaining,
worthwhile affairs. They're something of a seasonal
institution in these parts.
jpnChrName: 追ってる案件の聞き込みを させてもらいたいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
追ってる案件の聞き込みを
させてもらいたいんだが。

engChrName: My customers lately can't seem to stop talking about the film festival.
engSearchText:
My customers lately can't seem to stop talking about
the film festival.
jpnChrName: 生き別れのお兄さんからの依頼で、 写真の妹さんを探しているんです。
jpnSearchText:
生き別れのお兄さんからの依頼で、
写真の妹さんを探しているんです。

engChrName: I haven't seen very many films, much to my embarrassment, so one of them ended up recommending a handful for me to view.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen very many films, much to my
embarrassment, so one of them ended up
recommending a handful for me to view.
jpnChrName: この女性に見覚えはありませんか？
jpnSearchText: この女性に見覚えはありませんか？

engChrName: I'm thinking of watching them soon. After all, it's important to be able to carry on a good conversation with whatever interests my customers.
engSearchText:
I'm thinking of watching them soon. After all, it's
important to be able to carry on a good conversation
with whatever interests my customers.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: これはこれは、 ご丁寧にありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
これはこれは、
ご丁寧にありがとうございます。

engChrName: Speaking of films, we actually had a film crew come here some time ago to do some on-location shooting. 'Gloria,' I believe is the title.
engSearchText:
Speaking of films, we actually had a film crew come
here some time ago to do some on-location shooting.
'Gloria,' I believe is the title.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ふむ……確かに 見覚えのあるお嬢さんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……確かに
見覚えのあるお嬢さんですね。

engChrName: As I recall, they were working on something about the revolution and wanted to capture the real café, given its place in local history.
engSearchText:
As I recall, they were working on something about
the revolution and wanted to capture the real café,
given its place in local history.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ですが私よりもこのお嬢さんと 親しくしていた従業員が居ましてな。
jpnSearchText:
ですが私よりもこのお嬢さんと
親しくしていた従業員が居ましてな。

engChrName: Perhaps I'll watch it for myself. It could make for a nice opportunity to reflect on just how much this place has seen over the years.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I'll watch it for myself. It could make for a
nice opportunity to reflect on just how much this
place has seen over the years.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ルチアさんという方に 話を聞かれた方がよろしいかと。
jpnSearchText:
ルチアさんという方に
話を聞かれた方がよろしいかと。

engChrName: Good evening! We still have a little time before our last call, so please, feel free to take a seat and relax.
engSearchText:
Good evening! We still have a little time before our
last call, so please, feel free to take a seat and relax.
jpnChrName: 分かった、情報提供助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: 分かった、情報提供助かったぜ。

engChrName: I try to stay open late so that those customers who need a place to unwind after work or school can come here should they please.
engSearchText:
I try to stay open late so that those customers who
need a place to unwind after work or school can come
here should they please.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: おや、アニエスさんいらっしゃい。 やや久しぶりかな。
jpnSearchText:
おや、アニエスさんいらっしゃい。
やや久しぶりかな。

engChrName: Now that the weather is starting to turn cold, I'm looking forward to serving my customers warm, soothing cups of coffee.
engSearchText:
Now that the weather is starting to turn cold, I'm
looking forward to serving my customers warm,
soothing cups of coffee.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: そして、そちらのお二人さんは……？
jpnSearchText: そして、そちらのお二人さんは……？

engChrName: Van handed the owner his business card.
engSearchText: Van handed the owner his business card.
jpnChrName: お久しぶりです、チャールズさん。 二人はその、バイト先の上司と後輩と言うか……
jpnSearchText:
お久しぶりです、チャールズさん。
二人はその、バイト先の上司と後輩と言うか……

engChrName: Sorry to bug you when you're probably busy. We're with Arkride Solutions. Maybe you've heard of us.
engSearchText:
Sorry to bug you when you're probably busy.
We're with Arkride Solutions. Maybe you've heard
of us.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ほほう、バイトを始められたのですか。 何事も経験ですしね、頑張ってください。
jpnSearchText:
ほほう、バイトを始められたのですか。
何事も経験ですしね、頑張ってください。

engChrName: We wanted to ask you something about a case we're workin' on right now.
engSearchText:
We wanted to ask you something about a case we're
workin' on right now.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: そちらのお嬢さんは中東系の方のようですね。 当店のコーヒーなどいかがでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そちらのお嬢さんは中東系の方のようですね。
当店のコーヒーなどいかがでしょう。

engChrName: We're looking for the woman in this photo. The client is her estranged older brother.
engSearchText:
We're looking for the woman in this photo.
The client is her estranged older brother.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 本場中東で人気の豆も扱っておりますので。
jpnSearchText: 本場中東で人気の豆も扱っておりますので。

engChrName: Is there any chance you recognize her?
engSearchText: Is there any chance you recognize her?
jpnChrName: へぇ、そうなんですか……！
jpnSearchText: へぇ、そうなんですか……！

engChrName: Oh, no need to apologize. I appreciate you all being so polite.
engSearchText:
Oh, no need to apologize. I appreciate you all being
so polite.
jpnChrName: そういえばお父さん（アブ）もコーヒー好きで…… えへへ、実家のものと飲み比べてみますね！
jpnSearchText:
そういえばお父さん（アブ）もコーヒー好きで……
えへへ、実家のものと飲み比べてみますね！

engChrName: Hmm... Yes, I do recognize this woman, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Yes, I do recognize this woman, as a matter
of fact.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: お探しのお嬢さんの事でしたら、 私よりも詳しい従業員がいるのです。
jpnSearchText:
お探しのお嬢さんの事でしたら、
私よりも詳しい従業員がいるのです。

engChrName: One of my workers could tell you more about her, however. The two of them were good friends.
engSearchText:
One of my workers could tell you more about
her, however. The two of them were good friends.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ルチアさんという方なので、 彼女から話を聞いてみてはいかがでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ルチアさんという方なので、
彼女から話を聞いてみてはいかがでしょう。

engChrName: Look for a waitress named Lucia. Hopefully she can point you in the right direction.
engSearchText:
Look for a waitress named Lucia. Hopefully she can
point you in the right direction.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: いやはや、このカフェも今は色々な層の方々の 憩いの場になってもらえて、感慨深いものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、このカフェも今は色々な層の方々の
憩いの場になってもらえて、感慨深いものですよ。

engChrName: Got'cha. Will do. Thanks for the tip.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Will do. Thanks for the tip.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 初代オーナーの時代にはここでシーナ・ディルクと 同志達が革命と理想を語り合っていたと言います。
jpnSearchText:
初代オーナーの時代にはここでシーナ・ディルクと
同志達が革命と理想を語り合っていたと言います。

engChrName: Oh, why hello there, Agnès! It's good to see you again.
engSearchText:
Oh, why hello there, Agnès! It's good to see
you again.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: 平和な世で、多くの方々が安らぐ場になり、 彼女らも女神様の元で喜んでいるでしょうなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
平和な世で、多くの方々が安らぐ場になり、
彼女らも女神様の元で喜んでいるでしょうなぁ。

engChrName: And who do we have here with you today?
engSearchText: And who do we have here with you today?

engChrName: It's good to see you, too, Mr. McMillan! These two people are from my workplace. He's my boss, and she's, ah...my coworker, I guess you could say.
engSearchText:
It's good to see you, too, Mr. McMillan! These two
people are from my workplace. He's my boss, and
she's, ah...my coworker, I guess you could say.
jpnChrName: （さっき以上に神妙な表情だ…… 状況の移り変わりも感じてやがるのかねぇ……）
jpnSearchText:
（さっき以上に神妙な表情だ……
状況の移り変わりも感じてやがるのかねぇ……）

engChrName: Oh, you've started working, have you? Good for you! I'm sure it'll make for a wonderful experience for you.
engSearchText:
Oh, you've started working, have you? Good for you!
I'm sure it'll make for a wonderful experience for you.

engChrName: Your coworker looks like she's from the Central East, yes? You should try some of our coffee.
engSearchText:
Your coworker looks like she's from the Central
East, yes? You should try some of our coffee.

engChrName: The beans we roast are quite popular and come straight from there. They're the real deal.
engSearchText:
The beans we roast are quite popular and come
straight from there. They're the real deal.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: その子もさっきからずっと……外を 見張っていてくれているんですよ……
jpnSearchText:
その子もさっきからずっと……外を
見張っていてくれているんですよ……

engChrName: Wow! That's awesome!
engSearchText: Wow! That's awesome!
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: やはりその子も……その子なりに お店を守ってくれているのでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
やはりその子も……その子なりに
お店を守ってくれているのでしょうな……

engChrName: Abi loves his coffee back home. I'll have to taste some of yours and see how it compares, heehee.
engSearchText:
Abi loves his coffee back home. I'll have to taste some
of yours and see how it compares, heehee.
jpnChrName: ………ニャンゴ。
jpnSearchText: ………ニャンゴ。

engChrName: If you're looking for more information about that young woman, you'd be best served talking to one of my waitresses.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for more information about that
young woman, you'd be best served talking to one of
my waitresses.

engChrName: Lucia is her name. I'm sure she'll be able to tell you more about her than I could.
engSearchText:
Lucia is her name. I'm sure she'll be able to tell you
more about her than I could.
jpnChrName: 街が浮かれてる中で……こいつは何か 考えこんでるみたいに見えるな。
jpnSearchText:
街が浮かれてる中で……こいつは何か
考えこんでるみたいに見えるな。

engChrName: It's deeply humbling having so many people from all different walks of life come to this café for rest and relaxation.
engSearchText:
It's deeply humbling having so many people from all
different walks of life come to this café for rest
and relaxation.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ええ、その子は賢い猫ですから、 きっと何か思案すべきことがあるのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その子は賢い猫ですから、
きっと何か思案すべきことがあるのでしょう。

engChrName: In fact, when the original owner still ran it, they say Sheena Dirke and her compatriots used to come here to discuss the revolution and their ideals.
engSearchText:
In fact, when the original owner still ran it, they say
Sheena Dirke and her compatriots used to come here
to discuss the revolution and their ideals.
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: うちの猫は、無愛想さを埋めて余りあるほど 天才猫なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちの猫は、無愛想さを埋めて余りあるほど
天才猫なんですよ。

engChrName: Hopefully they're all resting by the Goddess' side these days, knowing their country is much more peaceful and her people can live at ease.
engSearchText:
Hopefully they're all resting by the Goddess' side
these days, knowing their country is much more
peaceful and her people can live at ease.
jpnChrName: 前から思ってたが……あんたも結構な 親馬鹿だよな……
jpnSearchText:
前から思ってたが……あんたも結構な
親馬鹿だよな……

jpnChrName: ……（チラッ）
jpnSearchText: ……（チラッ）

engChrName: (He looks more subdued than before. Maybe the furball can sense things are changing outside.)
engSearchText:
(He looks more subdued than before. Maybe the
furball can sense things are changing outside.)

jpnChrName: ふふ、この子も普段通りの調子に 戻ったんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、この子も普段通りの調子に
戻ったんでしょうか……？

engChrName: ...*HISS*
engSearchText: ...*HISS*
jpnChrName: （……一応、落ち着いてはいるようだが……）
jpnSearchText: （……一応、落ち着いてはいるようだが……）

engChrName: He's been agitated for some time now. He refuses to take his eyes off what's happening outside.
engSearchText:
He's been agitated for some time now. He refuses to
take his eyes off what's happening outside.
jpnChrName: （どうにもまだどこか……   何か警戒してる気もするな……）
jpnSearchText:
（どうにもまだどこか……
何か警戒してる気もするな……）

engChrName: I suppose that's his way of trying to protect our humble café. He's a good boy.
engSearchText:
I suppose that's his way of trying to protect our
humble café. He's a good boy.

engChrName: ...Mraowr.
engSearchText: ...Mraowr.
jpnChrName: ……フシューッ……！
jpnSearchText: ……フシューッ……！

jpnChrName: 流石にこの子も…… 警戒しているようですね……
jpnSearchText:
流石にこの子も……
警戒しているようですね……

engChrName: Looks like he's deep in thought about somethin' in the middle of all this excitement.
engSearchText:
Looks like he's deep in thought about somethin' in
the middle of all this excitement.
jpnChrName: やはり……旧市街の猫もそうだったが 判るものなんだろうな……
jpnSearchText:
やはり……旧市街の猫もそうだったが
判るものなんだろうな……

engChrName: I wouldn't put it past him. Standoffish though he may be, I would say his intelligence more than makes up for it.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't put it past him. Standoffish though he may
be, I would say his intelligence more than makes up
for it.

engChrName: In fact, I regard him as something of a genius. Yes, I'm quite certain he's ruminating about something or other.
engSearchText:
In fact, I regard him as something of a genius.
Yes, I'm quite certain he's ruminating about
something or other.
jpnChrName: 昼とは打って変わって、 何やら随分難しい顔してんな……
jpnSearchText:
昼とは打って変わって、
何やら随分難しい顔してんな……

engChrName: Spoken like a true cat dad. You sure do love that little furball, huh?
engSearchText:
Spoken like a true cat dad. You sure do love that little
furball, huh?
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ふむ、何かの予感を感じ取ったのかも、 知れませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、何かの予感を感じ取ったのかも、
知れませんね。

engChrName: ...*glance*
engSearchText: ...*glance*
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: その子、こう見えて勘は鋭くて、普通の動物以上に、 災害の予期が早かったりするんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
その子、こう見えて勘は鋭くて、普通の動物以上に、
災害の予期が早かったりするんですよ。

jpnChrName: そ、そうか……まあ、そういう事なら 一応気に留めておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうか……まあ、そういう事なら
一応気に留めておくとするか。

engChrName: Heehee. Looks like he's back to his normal self? Maybe?
engSearchText:
Heehee. Looks like he's back to his normal self?
Maybe?

engChrName: (Hmm... He does look like he's mellowed out.)
engSearchText: (Hmm... He does look like he's mellowed out.)
jpnChrName: この猫が窓辺にいるのは珍しいな。
jpnSearchText: この猫が窓辺にいるのは珍しいな。

engChrName: (But I can tell that part of him's still keepin' his guard up.)
engSearchText:
(But I can tell that part of him's still keepin' his
guard up.)
jpnChrName: しかも、どこかご機嫌みたいです！
jpnSearchText: しかも、どこかご機嫌みたいです！

engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ふふ、実際今日は機嫌が良いみたいですね。 まあ、猫ですしもとより気まぐれですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、実際今日は機嫌が良いみたいですね。
まあ、猫ですしもとより気まぐれですが……

engChrName: *HISS*
engSearchText: *HISS*
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: この子がご機嫌であれば 私も気分が良くなるものです。
jpnSearchText:
この子がご機嫌であれば
私も気分が良くなるものです。

engChrName: Looks like he's feeling tense, too. Not that I'm surprised.
engSearchText:
Looks like he's feeling tense, too. Not that
I'm surprised.

engChrName: Yeah. Just like the cats in our neck of the woods. They can definitely sense things.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Just like the cats in our neck of the woods.
They can definitely sense things.
jpnChrName: （随分と空を真剣に見てるな……   何かあるようにも見えないが……）
jpnSearchText:
（随分と空を真剣に見てるな……
何かあるようにも見えないが……）

engChrName: He looks real stern this afternoon for some reason. What gives?
engSearchText:
He looks real stern this afternoon for some reason.
What gives?

engChrName: Frankly, I'm uncertain. Perhaps he senses something coming that we don't.
engSearchText:
Frankly, I'm uncertain. Perhaps he senses something
coming that we don't.
jpnChrName: （寝てるか……鳴かないから   見ないとわからねぇもんだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（寝てるか……鳴かないから
見ないとわからねぇもんだな。）

engChrName: Believe it or not, he has a rather sharp intuition. Many times, he can sense trouble coming even sooner than other animals.
engSearchText:
Believe it or not, he has a rather sharp intuition.
Many times, he can sense trouble coming even sooner
than other animals.

engChrName: Huh... No kidding, huh? Guess it wouldn't hurt for us to stay alert, then, just in case. Thanks for the heads up.
engSearchText:
Huh... No kidding, huh? Guess it wouldn't hurt for us
to stay alert, then, just in case. Thanks for the
heads up.
jpnChrName: 相変わらず無口というか何というか……。
jpnSearchText: 相変わらず無口というか何というか……。

engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: はは、まあそれがこの子の持ち味です。 それも含めて可愛がってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、まあそれがこの子の持ち味です。
それも含めて可愛がってくださいね。

engChrName: That's interesting. Not used to seeing him hang out by the window all that much.
engSearchText:
That's interesting. Not used to seeing him hang out
by the window all that much.
jpnChrName: へぇ、ここのカフェ、猫ちゃんも いるんですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、ここのカフェ、猫ちゃんも
いるんですねっ。

engChrName: He seems really happy today, too!
engSearchText: He seems really happy today, too!
jpnChrName: ……ブニャー。
jpnSearchText: ……ブニャー。

engChrName: Haha! Indeed, he does—though cats can be such fickle creatures by nature, as I'm sure you all know.
engSearchText:
Haha! Indeed, he does—though cats can be such
fickle creatures by nature, as I'm sure you all know.
jpnChrName: ん？　なんつーか微妙な鳴き声だな。
jpnSearchText: ん？　なんつーか微妙な鳴き声だな。

engChrName: Nevertheless, seeing him in such high spirits always puts me in a good mood as well. I'm happy when he's happy.
engSearchText:
Nevertheless, seeing him in such high spirits always
puts me in a good mood as well. I'm happy when
he's happy.
jpnChrName: あはは……やっぱりあの小説に 出てくる猫に、どこか似ているような……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……やっぱりあの小説に
出てくる猫に、どこか似ているような……

engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: ええ、『カゲヨシ』という名も あやかって付けたものですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、『カゲヨシ』という名も
あやかって付けたものですね。

engChrName: (Sure is fixated on the sky for some reason. Can't see anything myself, but who knows?)
engSearchText:
(Sure is fixated on the sky for some reason. Can't see
anything myself, but who knows?)
engHtmlText: チャールズ・オーナー
jpnChrName: この通り変わった猫ですが、一応は 看板猫なので可愛がってあげてください。
jpnSearchText:
この通り変わった猫ですが、一応は
看板猫なので可愛がってあげてください。

jpnChrName: ……ブニャー。
jpnSearchText: ……ブニャー。

jpnChrName: 他の街区の状況とかも判ってきたし…… 弟や友達の無事も期待できそう！
jpnSearchText:
他の街区の状況とかも判ってきたし……
弟や友達の無事も期待できそう！

engChrName: (Guess he's asleep. He's so quiet, you have to get up close and personal to even tell.)
engSearchText:
(Guess he's asleep. He's so quiet, you have to get up
close and personal to even tell.)
jpnChrName: それなら一層、気合入れて頑張らないと！ 皆のためにも、オーナーと一緒に！
jpnSearchText:
それなら一層、気合入れて頑張らないと！
皆のためにも、オーナーと一緒に！

jpnChrName: 弟は大丈夫かな……いや、 あの子は強いし、きっと大丈夫なはず……！
jpnSearchText:
弟は大丈夫かな……いや、
あの子は強いし、きっと大丈夫なはず……！

engChrName: Well, aren't you a talkative one?
engSearchText: Well, aren't you a talkative one?
jpnChrName: オーナーも街の人達のために力になるって 決めたし、私も今はそれを手伝うわ！
jpnSearchText:
オーナーも街の人達のために力になるって
決めたし、私も今はそれを手伝うわ！

engChrName: Haha. That is simply his disposition. I prefer to think of it as one of his unique charms.
engSearchText:
Haha. That is simply his disposition. I prefer to think
of it as one of his unique charms.
jpnChrName: ふーっ、忙しい忙しい！
jpnSearchText: ふーっ、忙しい忙しい！

engChrName: Oh, wow! I didn't realize this café had its own cat! That's cool!
engSearchText:
Oh, wow! I didn't realize this café had its own cat!
That's cool!
jpnChrName: でも、それで張り切ってこその プロのバイトというもの！
jpnSearchText:
でも、それで張り切ってこその
プロのバイトというもの！

engChrName: ...Mrraaah.
engSearchText: ...Mrraaah.
jpnChrName: こうやって記念祭が賑わってるのも、 平和が戻ってきた証拠でもあるしねっ！
jpnSearchText:
こうやって記念祭が賑わってるのも、
平和が戻ってきた証拠でもあるしねっ！

engChrName: That's a funky meow. Can't say I've ever heard that come out of a cat before.
engSearchText:
That's a funky meow. Can't say I've ever heard that
come out of a cat before.
jpnChrName: それにしてももう記念祭か……今年は 良くも悪くもあっという間だったね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてももう記念祭か……今年は
良くも悪くもあっという間だったね。

engChrName: Heehee. He kind of reminds me of the cat from that one novel, now that I think about it.
engSearchText:
Heehee. He kind of reminds me of the cat from that
one novel, now that I think about it.
jpnChrName: 来年も私はこのカフェで働き続けるけど、 弟もどこかでバイトする機会はあるかな。
jpnSearchText:
来年も私はこのカフェで働き続けるけど、
弟もどこかでバイトする機会はあるかな。

engChrName: Actually, as it so happens, I named him Kageyoshi after that very same cat.
engSearchText:
Actually, as it so happens, I named him Kageyoshi
after that very same cat.
jpnChrName: ま、何にせよ来年は良い一年になりそうだしね、 弟に色々教えるのも含めて一層頑張らないと！
jpnSearchText:
ま、何にせよ来年は良い一年になりそうだしね、
弟に色々教えるのも含めて一層頑張らないと！

engChrName: He can be a peculiar feline, but he means well and serves as the mascot of our café, so please be nice to him.
engSearchText:
He can be a peculiar feline, but he means well and
serves as the mascot of our café, so please be nice
to him.
jpnChrName: 街も落ち着きを取り戻してきたけど…… 次は記念祭だから良い意味で慌ただしくなるね！
jpnSearchText:
街も落ち着きを取り戻してきたけど……
次は記念祭だから良い意味で慌ただしくなるね！

engChrName: ...Mrrah.
engSearchText: ...Mrrah.
jpnChrName: オーナーが言うには、毎年このカフェも忙しく なるって事だし、ここぞバイトの腕の見せ所！
jpnSearchText:
オーナーが言うには、毎年このカフェも忙しく
なるって事だし、ここぞバイトの腕の見せ所！

engChrName: Now that I know how the other districts are doing, I feel confident believing that my friends and little brother are going to be just fine.
engSearchText:
Now that I know how the other districts are doing, I
feel confident believing that my friends and little
brother are going to be just fine.
jpnChrName: いくつものお店で繁忙期を乗り越えてきたんだもん、 記念祭中のカフェもしっかり回していくわよ！
jpnSearchText:
いくつものお店で繁忙期を乗り越えてきたんだもん、
記念祭中のカフェもしっかり回していくわよ！

engChrName: Which means I've gotta focus my energy on the task at hand! Charles and everyone else are depending on me!
engSearchText:
Which means I've gotta focus my energy on the task
at hand! Charles and everyone else are depending
on me!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ……暗いニュースばかりだけど どうかゆっくりしていってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ……暗いニュースばかりだけど
どうかゆっくりしていってくださいね。

engChrName: I hope my brother's okay... What am I saying? He's tough! He's all right! He's gotta be!
engSearchText:
I hope my brother's okay... What am I saying?
He's tough! He's all right! He's gotta be!
jpnChrName: せめてお客さんに笑顔になってもらえたら 私もほっとするっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
せめてお客さんに笑顔になってもらえたら
私もほっとするっていうか……

engChrName: Charles is determined to help everyone around here, and I'm going to be right there with him, doing whatever he and anyone else needs!
engSearchText:
Charles is determined to help everyone around here,
and I'm going to be right there with him, doing
whatever he and anyone else needs!
jpnChrName: ふふ……ごめんなさい。 私もあんまり冷静じゃないみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……ごめんなさい。
私もあんまり冷静じゃないみたいで。

engChrName: *sigh* It just never ends. There's always more work to do!
engSearchText:
*sigh* It just never ends. There's always more work
to do!
jpnChrName: 例の件、最初は全然現実感が無かったんだけど、 今朝からだんだんじわじわ怖くなってきて……
jpnSearchText:
例の件、最初は全然現実感が無かったんだけど、
今朝からだんだんじわじわ怖くなってきて……

engChrName: But they wouldn't call me the part-time pro if I couldn't power through it, and power through it I will!
engSearchText:
But they wouldn't call me the part-time pro if I
couldn't power through it, and power through it
I will!
jpnChrName: でも、くじけてばかりじゃダメね。 怖がってばかりじゃ、テロリストの思う壺だもん。
jpnSearchText:
でも、くじけてばかりじゃダメね。
怖がってばかりじゃ、テロリストの思う壺だもん。

engChrName: Besides, I'll gladly take a busy café during the festival if that means Edith is at peace again!
engSearchText:
Besides, I'll gladly take a busy café during the festival
if that means Edith is at peace again!
jpnChrName: へぇ、あのジュディス・ランスターと マクシム・ルーガンが……ってマジ！？
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、あのジュディス・ランスターと
マクシム・ルーガンが……ってマジ！？

engChrName: Already festival time again, huh? This past year has definitely been...a mixed bag, you could say.
engSearchText:
Already festival time again, huh? This past year has
definitely been...a mixed bag, you could say.
jpnChrName: ……っていやいや、今は仕事中！ お客さんに迷惑かけちゃいけないし！
jpnSearchText:
……っていやいや、今は仕事中！
お客さんに迷惑かけちゃいけないし！

engChrName: Either way, I still plan on working here next year. Hopefully, my little brother will find someplace to start working, too.
engSearchText:
Either way, I still plan on working here next year.
Hopefully, my little brother will find someplace to
start working, too.
jpnChrName: ……上がったらバズレイダー買って帰るかな。
jpnSearchText: ……上がったらバズレイダー買って帰るかな。

engChrName: I'm hopeful next year will be good. I'll have to keep working my butt off, especially so I can teach my little brother everything he needs to know!
engSearchText:
I'm hopeful next year will be good. I'll have to keep
working my butt off, especially so I can teach my little
brother everything he needs to know!
jpnChrName: ま、視察研修も楽しそうだけど、こうして色々な人の 楽しそうなのを見れるのもこの仕事の長所よね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、視察研修も楽しそうだけど、こうして色々な人の
楽しそうなのを見れるのもこの仕事の長所よね。

engChrName: The city might be calm again, but it won't be for long—in a good way! That's because the Revolution Festival's right around the corner!
engSearchText:
The city might be calm again, but it won't be for
long—in a good way! That's because the Revolution
Festival's right around the corner!
jpnChrName: アラミスの子以外にも、外国の人とか 音楽やっている人とかの話も聞けるし……
jpnSearchText:
アラミスの子以外にも、外国の人とか
音楽やっている人とかの話も聞けるし……

engChrName: Charles told me that the café gets hectic every year. I say bring it on! I'll show our customers what I'm made of as a part-time pro!
engSearchText:
Charles told me that the café gets hectic every year.
I say bring it on! I'll show our customers what I'm
made of as a part-time pro!
jpnChrName: ま、これだからやめられないのよね。 この手のアルバイトって。
jpnSearchText:
ま、これだからやめられないのよね。
この手のアルバイトって。

engChrName: I've survived my fair share of busy periods at other places before. Nothing scares me! This café will be just fine on my watch come festival time!
engSearchText:
I've survived my fair share of busy periods at other
places before. Nothing scares me! This café will be
just fine on my watch come festival time!
jpnChrName: ここのカフェはオーナーの人柄もあって、 一層色々な人が自然体で来てくれるし。
jpnSearchText:
ここのカフェはオーナーの人柄もあって、
一層色々な人が自然体で来てくれるし。

engChrName: Oh, hello. Welcome... I know these aren't exactly happy times, but feel free to stay and relax.
engSearchText:
Oh, hello. Welcome... I know these aren't exactly
happy times, but feel free to stay and relax.
jpnChrName: えっ、なに視察研修って…… アラミスってそんな事もやってるんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
えっ、なに視察研修って……
アラミスってそんな事もやってるんだ！？

engChrName: If nothing else, seeing our customers smile brings me a little comfort, too, which I can definitely use right about now...
engSearchText:
If nothing else, seeing our customers smile brings me
a little comfort, too, which I can definitely use right
about now...
jpnChrName: うー……面白そう……私も一度、 そういう青春も経験したかったなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
うー……面白そう……私も一度、
そういう青春も経験したかったなぁ……

engChrName: *sigh* Haha... I'm sorry. It's hard for me to stay calm in this situation.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Haha... I'm sorry. It's hard for me to stay calm
in this situation.
jpnChrName: ……いや、でも今の私はプロバイト！ 後ろ髪ばかり引っ張られてる場合じゃないわ！
jpnSearchText:
……いや、でも今の私はプロバイト！
後ろ髪ばかり引っ張られてる場合じゃないわ！

engChrName: When I first heard, none of it felt real. But then this morning, it started hitting me and I started getting more and more scared.
engSearchText:
When I first heard, none of it felt real. But then this
morning, it started hitting me and I started getting
more and more scared.
jpnChrName: 弟のためにも、未来を見て前向きに お仕事を頑張らないと！
jpnSearchText:
弟のためにも、未来を見て前向きに
お仕事を頑張らないと！

engChrName: But we can't let them break our spirits. Those terrorists want us to be afraid. Remember that.
engSearchText:
But we can't let them break our spirits.
Those terrorists want us to be afraid. Remember that.
jpnChrName: うーん、弟も一回くらい どこかでバイトしたらいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、弟も一回くらい
どこかでバイトしたらいいのに。

engChrName: Whoa! Did Judith Lanster and Maxim Lugan really...? Really?!
engSearchText:
Whoa! Did Judith Lanster and Maxim Lugan
really...? Really?!
jpnChrName: あのチームが悪くないというのも、 何か成し遂げたいってのも分かるけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
あのチームが悪くないというのも、
何か成し遂げたいってのも分かるけどさ。

engChrName: Augh! No, no, no! What am I doing?! I can't be bothering customers like this! They're here to relax!
engSearchText:
Augh! No, no, no! What am I doing?! I can't be
bothering customers like this! They're here to relax!
jpnChrName: 別に並行して備えて悪い事は無いんだけどね、 私だって似たようなもんだったし。
jpnSearchText:
別に並行して備えて悪い事は無いんだけどね、
私だって似たようなもんだったし。

engChrName: ...Maybe I'll buy a copy of Buzzraider on my way home, though.
engSearchText:
...Maybe I'll buy a copy of Buzzraider on my way
home, though.
jpnChrName: ま、そう簡単に割り切れないのも 思春期の難しいところか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そう簡単に割り切れないのも
思春期の難しいところか。

engChrName: Aramis' educational visitation sounds awesome and all, but I like working here, too. You get to see all kinds of people doing fun and cool things.
engSearchText:
Aramis' educational visitation sounds awesome and
all, but I like working here, too. You get to see all
kinds of people doing fun and cool things.
jpnChrName: バイトって軽く見られがちだけど、 やっぱり色々な事を学べると思うのよね。
jpnSearchText:
バイトって軽く見られがちだけど、
やっぱり色々な事を学べると思うのよね。

engChrName: And when I say 'all kinds,' I mean all kinds. We get Aramis students, foreigners, musicians. A little of everything!
engSearchText:
And when I say 'all kinds,' I mean all kinds. We get
Aramis students, foreigners, musicians. A little
of everything!
jpnChrName: まあ、私みたいなプロバイトになる 必要はないけど、弟にも少し考えて欲しいなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、私みたいなプロバイトになる
必要はないけど、弟にも少し考えて欲しいなぁ。

engChrName: That's why I can't bring myself to quit doing work like this.
engSearchText:
That's why I can't bring myself to quit doing work
like this.
jpnChrName: 弟も思春期だし、ここら辺の捉え方が ちょっとひねくれちゃっててねー。
jpnSearchText:
弟も思春期だし、ここら辺の捉え方が
ちょっとひねくれちゃっててねー。

engChrName: It doesn't hurt that Charles, the owner, has a personality that really invites everyone to just come in and be themselves, too.
engSearchText:
It doesn't hurt that Charles, the owner, has a
personality that really invites everyone to just come in
and be themselves, too.
jpnChrName: 写真の女性について聞きたいのね。
jpnSearchText: 写真の女性について聞きたいのね。

engChrName: Wait! What's this about an educational visitation? They do that kind of stuff over at Aramis?!
engSearchText:
Wait! What's this about an educational visitation?
They do that kind of stuff over at Aramis?!
jpnChrName: ってやだ──ジェシカじゃない。
jpnSearchText: ってやだ──ジェシカじゃない。

engChrName: Aww, that sounds like so much fun... I would've loved to do something like that when I was younger. *sigh*...
engSearchText:
Aww, that sounds like so much fun... I would've loved
to do something like that when I was younger.
*sigh*...
jpnChrName: 知ってんなら話は早え。
jpnSearchText: 知ってんなら話は早え。

engChrName: Ack! What am I thinking? I'm a part-time pro! That's my reality! I can't let myself get hung up on what could've been when I have stuff to do!
engSearchText:
Ack! What am I thinking? I'm a part-time pro!
That's my reality! I can't let myself get hung up on
what could've been when I have stuff to do!
jpnChrName: 実は生き別れのお兄さんからの依頼で、 彼女を探しているんです。
jpnSearchText:
実は生き別れのお兄さんからの依頼で、
彼女を探しているんです。

engChrName: I've gotta focus on my job and keep my eyes on the future, especially for my little brother!
engSearchText:
I've gotta focus on my job and keep my eyes on the
future, especially for my little brother!
jpnChrName: い、生き別れのお兄さん！？
jpnSearchText: い、生き別れのお兄さん！？

engChrName: *sigh* I wish my little brother would try having a part-time job at least once.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I wish my little brother would try having a
part-time job at least once.
jpnChrName: まさかそんな複雑な家庭の事情が あったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかそんな複雑な家庭の事情が
あったなんて……

engChrName: I know his gang's not so bad or anything. But I can also tell that he wants to make something of himself, too.
engSearchText:
I know his gang's not so bad or anything. But I can
also tell that he wants to make something of
himself, too.
jpnChrName: ジェシカさんとはどのくらい 親しくされていたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ジェシカさんとはどのくらい
親しくされていたんですか？

engChrName: I just don't see the harm in getting a job and doing both anyway. I did something pretty similar, too.
engSearchText:
I just don't see the harm in getting a job and doing
both anyway. I did something pretty similar, too.
jpnChrName: 実は私、前に別の場所で バイトしていたことがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
実は私、前に別の場所で
バイトしていたことがあってね。

engChrName: But that's puberty for you. It's hard to get kids to see eye to eye on these things.
engSearchText:
But that's puberty for you. It's hard to get kids to see
eye to eye on these things.
jpnChrName: ジェシカとはそこでバイト仲間として 知り合って仲良くなったの。
jpnSearchText:
ジェシカとはそこでバイト仲間として
知り合って仲良くなったの。

engChrName: People tend to look down on part-time jobs, but you can actually learn a ton from them, in my opinion.
engSearchText:
People tend to look down on part-time jobs, but you
can actually learn a ton from them, in my opinion.
jpnChrName: 駅前のオーバルカフェなんだけど。
jpnSearchText: 駅前のオーバルカフェなんだけど。

engChrName: I hope my brother considers it one of these days. He doesn't have to become a part-time pro like his big sister or anything.
engSearchText:
I hope my brother considers it one of these days.
He doesn't have to become a part-time pro like his
big sister or anything.
jpnChrName: そうだったのか。 オーバルカフェに行けば彼女と会えるのか？
jpnSearchText:
そうだったのか。
オーバルカフェに行けば彼女と会えるのか？

engChrName: His perspective on things could just use a little tweaking, that's all. He's going through puberty, so I can sympathize.
engSearchText:
His perspective on things could just use a little
tweaking, that's all. He's going through puberty, so
I can sympathize.
jpnChrName: ううん……それが１か月近く前に ジェシカは辞めちゃったのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ううん……それが１か月近く前に
ジェシカは辞めちゃったのよ。

engChrName: You're asking if I know anything about the woman in that photo?
engSearchText:
You're asking if I know anything about the woman in
that photo?
jpnChrName: なんでも、首都内ではあるけど 遠い場所に引っ越しする事にしたんだって。
jpnSearchText:
なんでも、首都内ではあるけど
遠い場所に引っ越しする事にしたんだって。

engChrName: Wait a minute! That's Jessica!
engSearchText: Wait a minute! That's Jessica!
jpnChrName: 『仕方なく引っ越す』って言ってたから、 何か理由があるんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
『仕方なく引っ越す』って言ってたから、
何か理由があるんじゃないかな。

engChrName: You know her? Awesome. That saves us some trouble having to explain things.
engSearchText:
You know her? Awesome. That saves us some trouble
having to explain things.
jpnChrName: それと、彼女はこのカフェの常連さんでね。 前はよく顔を出してくれてたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それと、彼女はこのカフェの常連さんでね。
前はよく顔を出してくれてたんだけど……

engChrName: We've been looking for her. Her older brother who's estranged hired us to find her.
engSearchText:
We've been looking for her. Her older brother who's
estranged hired us to find her.
jpnChrName: 引っ越しと同時に、カフェには 『二度と行けなくなった』って言われたわ。
jpnSearchText:
引っ越しと同時に、カフェには
『二度と行けなくなった』って言われたわ。

engChrName: She has an older brother?!
engSearchText: She has an older brother?!
jpnChrName: 二度と行けなくなった、か。 随分と意味ありげな言い方だな。
jpnSearchText:
二度と行けなくなった、か。
随分と意味ありげな言い方だな。

engChrName: I had no idea she had such a complicated family life...
engSearchText: I had no idea she had such a complicated family life...
jpnChrName: それに、本当なら引越したく なかったかのようにも受け取れますね。
jpnSearchText:
それに、本当なら引越したく
なかったかのようにも受け取れますね。

engChrName: How close would you say the two of you are?
engSearchText: How close would you say the two of you are?
jpnChrName: うん……私も色々引っかかったんだけど、 笑ってごまかされちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
うん……私も色々引っかかったんだけど、
笑ってごまかされちゃった。

engChrName: Pretty close, I'd say.
engSearchText: Pretty close, I'd say.
jpnChrName: 思い返せば、私に余計な心配を かけたくなかったのかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
思い返せば、私に余計な心配を
かけたくなかったのかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Before I came here, I actually used to work at the orbal café over by the train station.
engSearchText:
Before I came here, I actually used to work at the
orbal café over by the train station.
jpnChrName: うーん……色々とややこしいですけど。 その引っ越し先は知っていますか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん……色々とややこしいですけど。
その引っ越し先は知っていますか？

engChrName: That's where we first met. We were coworkers and became friends through that.
engSearchText:
That's where we first met. We were coworkers and
became friends through that.
jpnChrName: ごめんね、首都内っていう事しか知らないの。
jpnSearchText: ごめんね、首都内っていう事しか知らないの。

engChrName: Makes sense. Think we'd maybe find her there if we paid a visit?
engSearchText:
Makes sense. Think we'd maybe find her there if we
paid a visit?
jpnChrName: あ……でもオーバルカフェのイルハンさんなら ジェシカの事情を知ってるかも！
jpnSearchText:
あ……でもオーバルカフェのイルハンさんなら
ジェシカの事情を知ってるかも！

engChrName: I doubt it. She quit working there about a month ago.
engSearchText: I doubt it. She quit working there about a month ago.
jpnChrName: バイトを辞める前に 色々と相談していたみたいだから。
jpnSearchText:
バイトを辞める前に
色々と相談していたみたいだから。

engChrName: She said she was staying within the city, but it sounded like she decided to move somewhere pretty far.
engSearchText:
She said she was staying within the city, but it
sounded like she decided to move somewhere
pretty far.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェのイルハンか…… 情報提供助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェのイルハンか……
情報提供助かるぜ。

engChrName: I don't know why, but she must've had some reason for doing it. The way she described it, it seemed like her hands were pretty tied.
engSearchText:
I don't know why, but she must've had some reason
for doing it. The way she described it, it seemed like
her hands were pretty tied.
jpnChrName: それでは、駅前通りに行ってみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでは、駅前通りに行ってみましょうか。

engChrName: She was actually a regular here at this café. I used to see her here all the time.
engSearchText:
She was actually a regular here at this café. I used to
see her here all the time.
jpnChrName: ジェシカはバイトを辞める前、 オーナーによく相談してるのを見たわ。
jpnSearchText:
ジェシカはバイトを辞める前、
オーナーによく相談してるのを見たわ。

engChrName: But once it was time to move, she said she wouldn't be able to come back here any longer. I haven't seen her since.
engSearchText:
But once it was time to move, she said she wouldn't
be able to come back here any longer. I haven't seen
her since.
jpnChrName: イルハンさんならきっと 私より詳しい事を知ってるかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンさんならきっと
私より詳しい事を知ってるかもしれないわね。

engChrName: And that was that, huh? With talk like that, definitely sounds to me like she had somethin' going on.
engSearchText:
And that was that, huh? With talk like that, definitely
sounds to me like she had somethin' going on.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、お好きなお席にご案内します！ お煙草や日当たりなどの拘りはありますか？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、お好きなお席にご案内します！
お煙草や日当たりなどの拘りはありますか？

engChrName: Yeah—like she wouldn't have moved if she didn't have to leave.
engSearchText:
Yeah—like she wouldn't have moved if she didn't
have to leave.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、私接客って結構好きなのよね。 バイト歴が長いってのもあるけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、私接客って結構好きなのよね。
バイト歴が長いってのもあるけど。

engChrName: That's what I felt. The whole thing really bothered me, but she just smiled and brushed it off, so I chose to let it slide.
engSearchText:
That's what I felt. The whole thing really bothered
me, but she just smiled and brushed it off, so I chose
to let it slide.
jpnChrName: チャールズ・オーナーもよく褒めてくれるし、 今日も張り切っていきますか！
jpnSearchText:
チャールズ・オーナーもよく褒めてくれるし、
今日も張り切っていきますか！

engChrName: Looking back on it, I think she tried to do that so I wouldn't worry about her after she left.
engSearchText:
Looking back on it, I think she tried to do that so I
wouldn't worry about her after she left.
jpnChrName: バイトは色々やって来たけど、やっぱり ここのが一番ね、オーナーも優しいし。
jpnSearchText:
バイトは色々やって来たけど、やっぱり
ここのが一番ね、オーナーも優しいし。

engChrName: Hmm... This is getting pretty complicated. Do you know where she moved to?
engSearchText:
Hmm... This is getting pretty complicated. Do you
know where she moved to?
jpnChrName: 弟も来年から働くとは思うけど、 今は私が頑張らなくっちゃ。
jpnSearchText:
弟も来年から働くとは思うけど、
今は私が頑張らなくっちゃ。

engChrName: No, I don't, sorry. I wish I did! All I know is that she's still somewhere in Edith.
engSearchText:
No, I don't, sorry. I wish I did! All I know is that
she's still somewhere in Edith.
jpnChrName: ふう……落ち着いてきたわ…… このカフェのお陰ね、本当に……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……落ち着いてきたわ……
このカフェのお陰ね、本当に……

engChrName: Actually... You know something? I bet Ilhan over at my old orbal café might be able to tell you what's going on with her!
engSearchText:
Actually... You know something? I bet Ilhan over at
my old orbal café might be able to tell you what's
going on with her!
jpnChrName: オーナーさんも、私達のために 励ましてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
オーナーさんも、私達のために
励ましてくれて……

engChrName: He's the person who owns it. I think she went to him for advice a lot before she quit.
engSearchText:
He's the person who owns it. I think she went to him
for advice a lot before she quit.
jpnChrName: 安心できるカフェだったけど、こんな事になっても 落ち着かせてくれるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
安心できるカフェだったけど、こんな事になっても
落ち着かせてくれるなんて……

engChrName: You said his name's Ilhan and he's at the orbal café...? Got it. Thanks for the tip.
engSearchText:
You said his name's Ilhan and he's at the orbal café...?
Got it. Thanks for the tip.
jpnChrName: 有難くて……本当に、ぐすっ……
jpnSearchText: 有難くて……本当に、ぐすっ……

engChrName: I guess we should go to Station Street next, then. Ready to go?
engSearchText:
I guess we should go to Station Street next, then.
Ready to go?
jpnChrName: あ……な、泣いてしまったら オーナーさんにも失礼よね。
jpnSearchText:
あ……な、泣いてしまったら
オーナーさんにも失礼よね。

engChrName: I used to see Jessica get advice from the owner of the orbal café I worked at before this job.
engSearchText:
I used to see Jessica get advice from the owner of the
orbal café I worked at before this job.
jpnChrName: せっかく落ち着かせてくれたのに……
jpnSearchText: せっかく落ち着かせてくれたのに……

engChrName: His name is Ilhan. He might know more about how Jessica is doing than me.
engSearchText:
His name is Ilhan. He might know more about how
Jessica is doing than me.
jpnChrName: とにかく今は、息子と一緒に……いつもの日々が 戻る事を信じて、女神様に祈るわ……
jpnSearchText:
とにかく今は、息子と一緒に……いつもの日々が
戻る事を信じて、女神様に祈るわ……

engChrName: Welcome to McMillan Café! I'll be happy to get you seated wherever you like. Are you sensitive to smoke or sunlight?
engSearchText:
Welcome to McMillan Café! I'll be happy to get you
seated wherever you like. Are you sensitive to smoke
or sunlight?
jpnChrName: それにしても……あの悪魔も怖ろしいけど、 街の人達が止まってしまうだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……あの悪魔も怖ろしいけど、
街の人達が止まってしまうだなんて……

engChrName: Heehee. I like interacting with customers. Probably comes from doing a lot of part-time jobs up until this point.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I like interacting with customers.
Probably comes from doing a lot of part-time jobs up
until this point.
jpnChrName: あまりに得体が知れなくて…… 本当にどうすればいいのか……
jpnSearchText:
あまりに得体が知れなくて……
本当にどうすればいいのか……

engChrName: The owner here, Charles, often tells me what a good job I do. Gotta keep it up so I maintain that winning streak!
engSearchText:
The owner here, Charles, often tells me what a good
job I do. Gotta keep it up so I maintain that
winning streak!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ロロも楽しそうで何よりね。 午前中はお友達とも会っていてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ロロも楽しそうで何よりね。
午前中はお友達とも会っていてねぇ。

engChrName: I've worked at my fair share of places part time, but this has definitely been the best one to work at. The owner here is so nice!
engSearchText:
I've worked at my fair share of places part time, but
this has definitely been the best one to work at.
The owner here is so nice!
jpnChrName: この記念祭の雰囲気も楽しめるし、 私達も結構慣れてきたのかもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この記念祭の雰囲気も楽しめるし、
私達も結構慣れてきたのかもねぇ。

engChrName: I think my little brother is gonna join me here next year. Until then, I've gotta keep holding down the fort!
engSearchText:
I think my little brother is gonna join me here
next year. Until then, I've gotta keep holding down
the fort!
jpnChrName: 夜は夫と合流して、寺院の方でも お祝いをするんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
夜は夫と合流して、寺院の方でも
お祝いをするんだけど……

engChrName: *sigh* I finally feel calm. I'd be a real mess without this café.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I finally feel calm. I'd be a real mess without
this café.
jpnChrName: それまでの間も、しっかり この雰囲気を味わいたいものね。
jpnSearchText:
それまでの間も、しっかり
この雰囲気を味わいたいものね。

engChrName: The owner is so sweet. He went to the trouble of cheering us up.
engSearchText:
The owner is so sweet. He went to the trouble of
cheering us up.
jpnChrName: 私や息子にも何事も無く、無事に平和が 戻ってきて……女神様に改めて感謝しないと。
jpnSearchText:
私や息子にも何事も無く、無事に平和が
戻ってきて……女神様に改めて感謝しないと。

engChrName: I've always come to this café because it felt safe. But to know that I can come to it when I need to soothe my mind at times like this means...
engSearchText:
I've always come to this café because it felt safe.
But to know that I can come to it when I need to
soothe my mind at times like this means...
jpnChrName: 私も不安でいっぱいだったけど…… 平静を保てたのもこのカフェのお陰だったわ。
jpnSearchText:
私も不安でいっぱいだったけど……
平静を保てたのもこのカフェのお陰だったわ。

engChrName: It means a lot. I'm so, so grateful... *sniffle*
engSearchText: It means a lot. I'm so, so grateful... *sniffle*
jpnChrName: 慣れない土地でも、落ち着ける場所が一つでもあると やっぱり違うというか何というか……
jpnSearchText:
慣れない土地でも、落ち着ける場所が一つでもあると
やっぱり違うというか何というか……

engChrName: Oh, no! I don't want to cry! Not after all of that!
engSearchText: Oh, no! I don't want to cry! Not after all of that!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかあのようなはしたない ニュースでこんなに大騒ぎになるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさかあのようなはしたない
ニュースでこんなに大騒ぎになるなんて……

engChrName: The owner did so much to help us feel better. I don't want to ruin such kindness...
engSearchText:
The owner did so much to help us feel better. I don't
want to ruin such kindness...
jpnChrName: 中東ではあまり考えられない事だわ、息子が 日曜学校の方に行ってる日で良かった……
jpnSearchText:
中東ではあまり考えられない事だわ、息子が
日曜学校の方に行ってる日で良かった……

engChrName: For now, I'm going to stay here with my son and pray... Pray that everything will go back to the way they were before.
engSearchText:
For now, I'm going to stay here with my son
and pray... Pray that everything will go back to the
way they were before.
jpnChrName: 周りの下世話な話、間違ってもあの子には 聞かせたくないもの……
jpnSearchText:
周りの下世話な話、間違ってもあの子には
聞かせたくないもの……
