engChrName: Those monsters out there are really scary. But I don't understand why some people across the city are completely frozen.
engSearchText:
Those monsters out there are really scary. But I don't
understand why some people across the city are
completely frozen.
jpnChrName: たまに見る制服姿の学生さんたち、旅行か何かの 話をしてると思ったら、視察研修って行事なのね。
jpnSearchText:
たまに見る制服姿の学生さんたち、旅行か何かの
話をしてると思ったら、視察研修って行事なのね。

engChrName: None of this makes sense. I... I don't know what to do...
engSearchText:
None of this makes sense. I... I don't know what
to do...
jpnChrName: 学生だけで遠出なんて、少し心配だけど興味深いわ。 中東じゃあまり聞かないしね、そういうやり方。
jpnSearchText:
学生だけで遠出なんて、少し心配だけど興味深いわ。
中東じゃあまり聞かないしね、そういうやり方。

engChrName: I'm so glad to see Lolo look so happy. He got to see his friends earlier this morning, so he's on top of the world right now.
engSearchText:
I'm so glad to see Lolo look so happy. He got to see
his friends earlier this morning, so he's on top of the
world right now.
jpnChrName: ふう……しかし、夫の方は大丈夫かしらね。 最近忙しいみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……しかし、夫の方は大丈夫かしらね。
最近忙しいみたいだけど……

engChrName: The fact we're able to walk through this festival and simply enjoy it must be a sign that we're finally adjusting to life in this city.
engSearchText:
The fact we're able to walk through this festival and
simply enjoy it must be a sign that we're finally
adjusting to life in this city.
jpnChrName: 私や息子みたいにこうして落ち着く余裕が無くて…… ちゃんと新しい環境に慣れられてるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
私や息子みたいにこうして落ち着く余裕が無くて……
ちゃんと新しい環境に慣れられてるかしら？

engChrName: Once my husband and I meet up later tonight, we plan to celebrate some more at our temple.
engSearchText:
Once my husband and I meet up later tonight, we
plan to celebrate some more at our temple.
jpnChrName: 一応週末は一緒にいるようにしているけど…… 家族で出かけてみたりした方が良いのかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
一応週末は一緒にいるようにしているけど……
家族で出かけてみたりした方が良いのかしらねぇ。

engChrName: But in the meantime, until then, I'm simply going to keep taking all of this in with our son.
engSearchText:
But in the meantime, until then, I'm simply going to
keep taking all of this in with our son.
jpnChrName: ここのコーヒーは良いわねぇ、故郷の コーヒーに似たブレンドのもあって……
jpnSearchText:
ここのコーヒーは良いわねぇ、故郷の
コーヒーに似たブレンドのもあって……

engChrName: We really have to give thanks to Arusha for keeping our son and me safe, as well as bringing peace back to the city.
engSearchText:
We really have to give thanks to Arusha for keeping
our son and me safe, as well as bringing peace back to
the city.
jpnChrName: マスターも良い方で雰囲気も落ち着けるし…… ここで焦らず少しずつ環境に慣れていこうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
マスターも良い方で雰囲気も落ち着けるし……
ここで焦らず少しずつ環境に慣れていこうかしら。

engChrName: I was so scared and full of worry for a while there. The only thing that helped me keep everything together was this wonderful café.
engSearchText:
I was so scared and full of worry for a while there.
The only thing that helped me keep everything
together was this wonderful café.
jpnChrName: 夫に転勤でエルザイム公国を出るって 言われた時は不安だったけれど……
jpnSearchText:
夫に転勤でエルザイム公国を出るって
言われた時は不安だったけれど……

engChrName: When you're somewhere unfamiliar, having even just one place where you can calm down and relax when you need it makes all the difference.
engSearchText:
When you're somewhere unfamiliar, having even just
one place where you can calm down and relax when
you need it makes all the difference.
jpnChrName: 寺院もあって、息子も日曜学校に 馴染めたっていうし、何とかやっていけそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
寺院もあって、息子も日曜学校に
馴染めたっていうし、何とかやっていけそうだわ。

engChrName: I can't believe how worked up everybody in this city is getting over such salacious news!
engSearchText:
I can't believe how worked up everybody in this city is
getting over such salacious news!
jpnChrName: まさか、せっかくの記念祭でこんな事が…… ああ、先日のテロも思い出して頭が……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、せっかくの記念祭でこんな事が……
ああ、先日のテロも思い出して頭が……

engChrName: Something like that would be inconceivable back in the Central East. I'm glad my son is at Sunday School at least so he isn't exposed to any of this.
engSearchText:
Something like that would be inconceivable back in
the Central East. I'm glad my son is at Sunday School
at least so he isn't exposed to any of this.
jpnChrName: ママ！？　ダイジョウブ？ しっかりして、ボクがいるから！
jpnSearchText:
ママ！？　ダイジョウブ？
しっかりして、ボクがいるから！

engChrName: I really don't want our son hearing such lowbrow talk from other people. It just wouldn't be good for him.
engSearchText:
I really don't want our son hearing such lowbrow talk
from other people. It just wouldn't be good for him.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうねロロ…… ロロも強くなって嬉しいわ……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ありがとうねロロ……
ロロも強くなって嬉しいわ……

engChrName: I've seen students in those uniforms before. I was trying to figure out if they were going on a trip, but it sounds like some sort of special visit.
engSearchText:
I've seen students in those uniforms before. I was
trying to figure out if they were going on a trip, but it
sounds like some sort of special visit.
jpnChrName: でも……夫の方は大丈夫かしら？ トリオンタワーの方のはずだけど……
jpnSearchText:
でも……夫の方は大丈夫かしら？
トリオンタワーの方のはずだけど……

engChrName: I do worry about sending students off by themselves, but I must admit, I'm intrigued. We don't do things like that in the Central East.
engSearchText:
I do worry about sending students off by themselves,
but I must admit, I'm intrigued. We don't do things
like that in the Central East.
jpnChrName: ママがゲンキになってきてよかった…… このカフェのおかげなんだって。
jpnSearchText:
ママがゲンキになってきてよかった……
このカフェのおかげなんだって。

engChrName: *sigh* I'm concerned about my husband. He seems incredibly busy lately.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm concerned about my husband. He seems
incredibly busy lately.
jpnChrName: でも……たしかにボクも、このカフェに いたからこわくなかったのかも！
jpnSearchText:
でも……たしかにボクも、このカフェに
いたからこわくなかったのかも！

engChrName: Unlike me and our son, he doesn't really get any chances to relax. I have to wonder if he's really adjusting to the new environment at all.
engSearchText:
Unlike me and our son, he doesn't really get any
chances to relax. I have to wonder if he's really
adjusting to the new environment at all.
jpnChrName: すごいねっ、このカフェ……！
jpnSearchText: すごいねっ、このカフェ……！

engChrName: Thankfully we're able to be together on weekends, at least. But it'd be good if we were able to actually go out and do things together as a family.
engSearchText:
Thankfully we're able to be together on weekends,
at least. But it'd be good if we were able to actually go
out and do things together as a family.
jpnChrName: ママ、ダイジョーブだよ……こないだだって、 みんなゲンキにもどれたんだし……
jpnSearchText:
ママ、ダイジョーブだよ……こないだだって、
みんなゲンキにもどれたんだし……

engChrName: The coffee they serve here is really good. They have blends that are just like what they have back home.
engSearchText:
The coffee they serve here is really good. They have
blends that are just like what they have back home.
jpnChrName: このおみせのなかにも、オバケはいってこないし、 きっとパパにもすぐにあえるよ！
jpnSearchText:
このおみせのなかにも、オバケはいってこないし、
きっとパパにもすぐにあえるよ！

engChrName: Really, the whole atmosphere here is soothing, and the owner's a nice man, too. I feel like I can come here to slowly acclimate to life here in Edith.
engSearchText:
Really, the whole atmosphere here is soothing, and
the owner's a nice man, too. I feel like I can come
here to slowly acclimate to life here in Edith.
jpnChrName: キネンサイ……すごいねっ、エルザイムの おまつりともゼンゼンちがって……
jpnSearchText:
キネンサイ……すごいねっ、エルザイムの
おまつりともゼンゼンちがって……

engChrName: When my husband said we were going to have to leave Elsaim because of a job transfer, at first, I was really worried if it was a good idea.
engSearchText:
When my husband said we were going to have to
leave Elsaim because of a job transfer, at first, I
was really worried if it was a good idea.
jpnChrName: でも、いろんなヒトがいろんなところからきて、 おなじおまつりしてるのがオモシロい！
jpnSearchText:
でも、いろんなヒトがいろんなところからきて、
おなじおまつりしてるのがオモシロい！

engChrName: But I think we can make this work. We found a temple, and our son's come to like the local Sunday School as well. It's hard to complain.
engSearchText:
But I think we can make this work. We found a
temple, and our son's come to like the local Sunday
School as well. It's hard to complain.
jpnChrName: ママ、なんだかゲンキもどってよかった。 まちのヒトたちもゲンキになったね！
jpnSearchText:
ママ、なんだかゲンキもどってよかった。
まちのヒトたちもゲンキになったね！

engChrName: How could this happen on the day of the festival...? This feels just like that terrorist attack again. My head, it's...it's...
engSearchText:
How could this happen on the day of the festival...?
This feels just like that terrorist attack again.
My head, it's...it's...
jpnChrName: 日曜学校のおねえちゃんたちも、もうすぐ キネンサイなんだってうれしそうだった！
jpnSearchText:
日曜学校のおねえちゃんたちも、もうすぐ
キネンサイなんだってうれしそうだった！

engChrName: Mommy! Mommy, are you okay?! It's okay! I'm right here!
engSearchText:
Mommy! Mommy, are you okay?! It's okay! I'm
right here!
jpnChrName: おまつりならエルザイムでもやってたしだいすき！ カルバードのおまつりってどんなだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
おまつりならエルザイムでもやってたしだいすき！
カルバードのおまつりってどんなだろう……？

engChrName: Aww. Thank you, sweetheart. You're so sweet and strong, son...
engSearchText:
Aww. Thank you, sweetheart. You're so sweet and
strong, son...
jpnChrName: セーフク着てるお兄ちゃんお姉ちゃんたち、 たまにエルザイムとかのお話するけどなんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
セーフク着てるお兄ちゃんお姉ちゃんたち、
たまにエルザイムとかのお話するけどなんだろう？

engChrName: I'm worried about my husband. He's supposed to be in Trion Tower. I hope nothing's happened...
engSearchText:
I'm worried about my husband. He's supposed to be
in Trion Tower. I hope nothing's happened...
jpnChrName: ほかのクニとかマチの話もしてるし、 みんなでどこかにいくのかな？
jpnSearchText:
ほかのクニとかマチの話もしてるし、
みんなでどこかにいくのかな？

engChrName: I'm so happy Mommy's feeling better. She says it's thanks to this café.
engSearchText:
I'm so happy Mommy's feeling better. She says it's
thanks to this café.
jpnChrName: ママもカフェのおかげで、キョーワコクに なじめそうなんだって、ボクとイッショ！
jpnSearchText:
ママもカフェのおかげで、キョーワコクに
なじめそうなんだって、ボクとイッショ！

engChrName: You know... I feel better, too! I'm not scared now that I'm here!
engSearchText:
You know... I feel better, too! I'm not scared now that
I'm here!
jpnChrName: ボクも、日曜学校でイッショの子とか 司祭さんがやさしいからなれたもん。
jpnSearchText:
ボクも、日曜学校でイッショの子とか
司祭さんがやさしいからなれたもん。

engChrName: Wooow! This café is amazing!
engSearchText: Wooow! This café is amazing!
jpnChrName: カフェのオーナーさんがやさしいなら、 ママもすぐになれるよ！
jpnSearchText:
カフェのオーナーさんがやさしいなら、
ママもすぐになれるよ！

engChrName: It's okay, Mommy. Everything's going to be better, just like before. Remember?
engSearchText:
It's okay, Mommy. Everything's going to be better,
just like before. Remember?
jpnChrName: オーナーが軽食を配ってくれて ちょっと落ち着いたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
オーナーが軽食を配ってくれて
ちょっと落ち着いたのだけど……

engChrName: Those scary monsters can't come in here. Daddy's gonna be here at any time!
engSearchText:
Those scary monsters can't come in here.
Daddy's gonna be here at any time!
jpnChrName: お腹が満ちたら腹が立ってきたわ。 おのれ、よく分からない状況──！
jpnSearchText:
お腹が満ちたら腹が立ってきたわ。
おのれ、よく分からない状況──！

engChrName: This festival is awesome... There weren't festivals like this in Elsaim...
engSearchText:
This festival is awesome... There weren't festivals like
this in Elsaim...
jpnChrName: これが“犯罪”なのかは分からないけど 私がこの手で記録してやるわ、フフフ……！
jpnSearchText:
これが“犯罪”なのかは分からないけど
私がこの手で記録してやるわ、フフフ……！

engChrName: There are so many people from all over the world! It's fun!
engSearchText:
There are so many people from all over the world!
It's fun!
jpnChrName: うううっ、怖すぎる…… あの不気味な球が急に現れて──
jpnSearchText:
うううっ、怖すぎる……
あの不気味な球が急に現れて──

engChrName: I think my Mommy's feeling better now. And so is everyone else in the city!
engSearchText:
I think my Mommy's feeling better now. And so is
everyone else in the city!
jpnChrName: まだ化物もうろついてるみたいだし ……しかもマフィアの仕業だとかって……
jpnSearchText:
まだ化物もうろついてるみたいだし
……しかもマフィアの仕業だとかって……

engChrName: The lady and the priest at my Sunday School, they're so happy about the 'revo-lotion festival' that's about to happen!
engSearchText:
The lady and the priest at my Sunday School, they're
so happy about the 'revo-lotion festival' that's about
to happen!
jpnChrName: さ、さすがに嘘よね…… こんなの人間にできる話を越えてるわよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
さ、さすがに嘘よね……
こんなの人間にできる話を越えてるわよっ！！

engChrName: We have festivals in Elsaim, too! I love them! I wonder what festivals are like in this country...?
engSearchText:
We have festivals in Elsaim, too! I love them!
I wonder what festivals are like in this country...?
jpnChrName: （かかかカワイイ……   これぞ犯罪級の可愛さ～～っ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（かかかカワイイ……
これぞ犯罪級の可愛さ～～っ！！）

engChrName: Sometimes I hear those older kids in the uniforms say something about Elsaim. Why? What are they talking about?
engSearchText:
Sometimes I hear those older kids in the uniforms say
something about Elsaim. Why? What are they
talking about?
jpnChrName: ふう、もうすぐ記念祭か…… 世間の人間は楽しそうよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、もうすぐ記念祭か……
世間の人間は楽しそうよね。

engChrName: Are they going somewhere? They talk about other cities and countries, too. Hmm...
engSearchText:
Are they going somewhere? They talk about other
cities and countries, too. Hmm...
jpnChrName: ………私は別に……… こんな趣味だし、友達いないし……
jpnSearchText:
………私は別に………
こんな趣味だし、友達いないし……

engChrName: Mommy says the café helps her 'add-just' to our new country. That's just like me!
engSearchText:
Mommy says the café helps her 'add-just' to our
new country. That's just like me!
jpnChrName: はぁ、逆に憂鬱かも…… ……何か事件でも起きないかしら……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、逆に憂鬱かも……
……何か事件でも起きないかしら……

engChrName: Everyone's so nice to me at Sunday School! This place feels just like home now!
engSearchText:
Everyone's so nice to me at Sunday School! This
place feels just like home now!
jpnChrName: って、こんな事不謹慎よね。 あんな大事件があった後で……
jpnSearchText:
って、こんな事不謹慎よね。
あんな大事件があった後で……

engChrName: If the boss of this place is nice to my mommy, this will feel like home to her, too!
engSearchText:
If the boss of this place is nice to my mommy, this
will feel like home to her, too!
jpnChrName: でも記念祭は楽しめなさそうっていうか…… また犯罪系の読み物でも買い漁ろうかしら……
jpnSearchText:
でも記念祭は楽しめなさそうっていうか……
また犯罪系の読み物でも買い漁ろうかしら……

engChrName: The owner was nice enough to share some snacks with me, which helped relax me a little.
engSearchText:
The owner was nice enough to share some snacks
with me, which helped relax me a little.
jpnChrName: ふう、またこうして本を 読み耽れるって幸せね……♪
jpnSearchText:
ふう、またこうして本を
読み耽れるって幸せね……♪

engChrName: But then once I stopped being hungry, I started getting angry. Angry about the perpetrators making this whole situation so indecipherable!
engSearchText:
But then once I stopped being hungry, I started
getting angry. Angry about the perpetrators making
this whole situation so indecipherable!
jpnChrName: それにしても、クインシー社とエトワス社が マフィアに肩入れしていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、クインシー社とエトワス社が
マフィアに肩入れしていたなんて……

engChrName: I mean, how am I supposed to tell if any of this is a crime?! In any case, I'm on top of it and I'll be recording everything that happens! Mwahaha!
engSearchText:
I mean, how am I supposed to tell if any of this is
a crime?! In any case, I'm on top of it and I'll be
recording everything that happens! Mwahaha!
jpnChrName: どっちもめちゃくちゃ大企業じゃない！ 裏社会と繋がってたなんて信じられないわ！
jpnSearchText:
どっちもめちゃくちゃ大企業じゃない！
裏社会と繋がってたなんて信じられないわ！

engChrName: Gah! This is all so scary! That eerie-looking orb just appeared out of nowhere.
engSearchText:
Gah! This is all so scary! That eerie-looking orb just
appeared out of nowhere.
jpnChrName: でもそういうギャップこそ 犯罪話の魅力よね、フフフ……
jpnSearchText:
でもそういうギャップこそ
犯罪話の魅力よね、フフフ……

engChrName: Those monsters are still roaming around, too. And they say this is all the mafia's doing somehow?
engSearchText:
Those monsters are still roaming around, too.
And they say this is all the mafia's doing somehow?
jpnChrName: あ、ちなみにこの本は、毎年警察が 発表している犯罪白書をまとめたものよ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ちなみにこの本は、毎年警察が
発表している犯罪白書をまとめたものよ。

engChrName: N-No way! That can't be true! No human could possibly pull off anything as bonkers as this!
engSearchText:
N-No way! That can't be true! No human could
possibly pull off anything as bonkers as this!
jpnChrName: すぐに読み終わっちゃいそうだけど これはこれで悪くないわね、フフフ……
jpnSearchText:
すぐに読み終わっちゃいそうだけど
これはこれで悪くないわね、フフフ……

engChrName: (EEEK! Look at him! He's so cute, it's criminal! ㈱)
engSearchText: (EEEK! Look at him! He's so cute, it's criminal! ㈱)
jpnChrName: む、村を丸ごと消し飛ばすなんて…… いくら何でもヤバすぎよ……！！
jpnSearchText:
む、村を丸ごと消し飛ばすなんて……
いくら何でもヤバすぎよ……！！

engChrName: *sigh* Guess the festival's almost here. Everybody else seems to be excited about it.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Guess the festival's almost here. Everybody else
seems to be excited about it.
jpnChrName: 犯罪の話とかはゾクゾクするし好きだけど そ、そういう感覚じゃないわね、もう……
jpnSearchText:
犯罪の話とかはゾクゾクするし好きだけど
そ、そういう感覚じゃないわね、もう……

engChrName: As for me, I...can't say I'm really looking forward to it. When you're into the sort of things I am, you don't exactly have friends...
engSearchText:
As for me, I...can't say I'm really looking forward
to it. When you're into the sort of things I am, you
don't exactly have friends...
jpnChrName: なんていうか、単純に怖いかも…… いつになったら日常が戻るのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
なんていうか、単純に怖いかも……
いつになったら日常が戻るのかしら……

engChrName: I think I'm starting to feel depressed. Maybe something big will happen during the festival.
engSearchText:
I think I'm starting to feel depressed.
Maybe something big will happen during the festival.
jpnChrName: 『アルマータ』、ここまでの事を やらかすだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
『アルマータ』、ここまでの事を
やらかすだなんて……

engChrName: Is that too soon for me to say after what happened? Yeah, it's probably too soon, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Is that too soon for me to say after what happened?
Yeah, it's probably too soon, isn't it?
jpnChrName: 知識としては知ってるつもりだったけど…… ……今は単純に怖いかも……
jpnSearchText:
知識としては知ってるつもりだったけど……
……今は単純に怖いかも……

engChrName: If I can't bring myself to enjoy the festival, then I guess I'll just go around and buy up as many books and magazines on crime as I can find.
engSearchText:
If I can't bring myself to enjoy the festival, then I
guess I'll just go around and buy up as many books
and magazines on crime as I can find.
jpnChrName: ふう、この『完全犯罪読本』も ついに読み終わってしまったわ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、この『完全犯罪読本』も
ついに読み終わってしまったわ……

engChrName: *sigh* Nothing like a good book on crimes to sink my teeth into! ㈱
engSearchText:
*sigh* Nothing like a good book on crimes to sink my
teeth into! ㈱
jpnChrName: ………くっ、なんなのこの喪失感………！
jpnSearchText: ………くっ、なんなのこの喪失感………！

engChrName: I almost can't believe the Quincy Company and ETWS had ties to the mafia.
engSearchText:
I almost can't believe the Quincy Company and
ETWS had ties to the mafia.
jpnChrName: 新刊とか出ないのかしら…… これは出版社に問い合わせてみるしか……！
jpnSearchText:
新刊とか出ないのかしら……
これは出版社に問い合わせてみるしか……！

engChrName: I mean, they're enormous companies! How could organizations as big as them have such deep ties to the underworld, right? That's crazy!
engSearchText:
I mean, they're enormous companies! How could
organizations as big as them have such deep ties to
the underworld, right? That's crazy!
jpnChrName: 世間じゃスキャンダルが騒がれてるようだけど 私が興味あるのは大犯罪だけよ……！
jpnSearchText:
世間じゃスキャンダルが騒がれてるようだけど
私が興味あるのは大犯罪だけよ……！

engChrName: Heehee! But that's one of the fun things about reading crime stories. The best ones always have a little dissonance that betray your expectations.
engSearchText:
Heehee! But that's one of the fun things about
reading crime stories. The best ones always have a
little dissonance that betray your expectations.
jpnChrName: 新刊とか出ないのかしら…… これは出版社に問い合わせてみるしか……！
jpnSearchText:
新刊とか出ないのかしら……
これは出版社に問い合わせてみるしか……！

engChrName: Oh, in case you were wondering, the book I'm reading now is a summary of all the white papers on crime that the police put out every year.
engSearchText:
Oh, in case you were wondering, the book I'm
reading now is a summary of all the white papers on
crime that the police put out every year.
jpnChrName: そういえばあったわね、共和国最悪の事件── その名も『悪魔崇拝の教団事件』！！
jpnSearchText:
そういえばあったわね、共和国最悪の事件──
その名も『悪魔崇拝の教団事件』！！

engChrName: I'm breezing straight through it, but it's still a pretty fun read, heehee.
engSearchText:
I'm breezing straight through it, but it's still a pretty
fun read, heehee.
jpnChrName: もう十年くらい前だっけ、空の女神を否定して 悪魔を奉る連中が子供を誘拐して……
jpnSearchText:
もう十年くらい前だっけ、空の女神を否定して
悪魔を奉る連中が子供を誘拐して……

engChrName: H-How could anyone wipe out an entire village off the face of the map? That's going way, way too far!
engSearchText:
H-How could anyone wipe out an entire village off
the face of the map? That's going way, way too far!
jpnChrName: 私もまだ子供だったから、身の毛がよだつ 想いだったのをよく覚えてるわ……
jpnSearchText:
私もまだ子供だったから、身の毛がよだつ
想いだったのをよく覚えてるわ……

engChrName: I like spine-tingling crime stories as much as the next girl, but this doesn't give me that sensation at all.
engSearchText:
I like spine-tingling crime stories as much as the next
girl, but this doesn't give me that sensation at all.
jpnChrName: う～ん、久々に思い出してゾクゾクする…… でもこれが癖になるのよね………
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、久々に思い出してゾクゾクする……
でもこれが癖になるのよね………

engChrName: It's hard to put it into words. I guess I'm...scared. Just scared. I wonder when things will go back to normal...
engSearchText:
It's hard to put it into words. I guess I'm...scared.
Just scared. I wonder when things will go back
to normal...
jpnChrName: あの教団事件が報道された時は 共和国中に衝撃が走ったそうよ……
jpnSearchText:
あの教団事件が報道された時は
共和国中に衝撃が走ったそうよ……

engChrName: I can't believe Almata would go so far...
engSearchText: I can't believe Almata would go so far...
jpnChrName: 私も久々に思い出してゾクゾクしちゃった。 『完全犯罪読本』……やっぱりいいわね……
jpnSearchText:
私も久々に思い出してゾクゾクしちゃった。
『完全犯罪読本』……やっぱりいいわね……

engChrName: I thought I understood what they were capable of, but... I guess not. All I feel right now is...scared. I'm just scared...
engSearchText:
I thought I understood what they were capable
of, but... I guess not. All I feel right now is...scared.
I'm just scared...
jpnChrName: フフフ、《ディザイア》には 気を付けた方がいいわよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフフ、《ディザイア》には
気を付けた方がいいわよ。

engChrName: Phew. I finally finished reading my copy of Perfect Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators.
engSearchText:
Phew. I finally finished reading my copy of Perfect
Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators.
jpnChrName: それと、利用されている様子の あの不良の彼についてもね。
jpnSearchText:
それと、利用されている様子の
あの不良の彼についてもね。

engChrName: Ugh, I feel so strange. Why do I have this sense of... loss now that it's all over?
engSearchText:
Ugh, I feel so strange. Why do I have this sense of...
loss now that it's all over?
jpnChrName: この『完全犯罪読本』に書かれてる中でも 一番ヤバいのが、『謎の結社』ってやつね……
jpnSearchText:
この『完全犯罪読本』に書かれてる中でも
一番ヤバいのが、『謎の結社』ってやつね……

engChrName: I wonder if they're going to put out a new edition sometime. I need to contact the publisher and find out!
engSearchText:
I wonder if they're going to put out a new
edition sometime. I need to contact the publisher and
find out!
jpnChrName: ゼムリア大陸を股にかけて あらゆる陰謀を裏から操ってるって話も──！
jpnSearchText:
ゼムリア大陸を股にかけて
あらゆる陰謀を裏から操ってるって話も──！

engChrName: All the normies are getting up in arms about some scandal going on, but me? All I care about are crimes! The bigger, the better!
engSearchText:
All the normies are getting up in arms about some
scandal going on, but me? All I care about are crimes!
The bigger, the better!
jpnChrName: ５～６年前に起きた《リベールの異変》で 初めて存在が確認されたって書いてあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
５～６年前に起きた《リベールの異変》で
初めて存在が確認されたって書いてあるわ。

engChrName: I wonder if they're going to put out a new edition of Perfect Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators sometime. I should contact the publisher about it!
engSearchText:
I wonder if they're going to put out a new edition of
Perfect Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators sometime.
I should contact the publisher about it!
jpnChrName: うーん、ロマンはあるけど情報が少なすぎて これじゃ妄想も捗らないわね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ロマンはあるけど情報が少なすぎて
これじゃ妄想も捗らないわね……

engChrName: When it comes to heinous crimes in Calvard, they don't get much bigger than the whole devil-worshipping cult!
engSearchText:
When it comes to heinous crimes in Calvard, they
don't get much bigger than the whole
devil-worshipping cult!
jpnChrName: 共和国のマフィアといえば昔から 『ドゥールファミリー』が有名だけど……
jpnSearchText:
共和国のマフィアといえば昔から
『ドゥールファミリー』が有名だけど……

engChrName: They denied Aidios' existence and about a decade ago, they were going around and kidnapping kids.
engSearchText:
They denied Aidios' existence and about a decade
ago, they were going around and kidnapping kids.
jpnChrName: 最近は『アルマータ』っていう組織が 勢力を伸ばしてるらしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
最近は『アルマータ』っていう組織が
勢力を伸ばしてるらしいわね。

engChrName: I was still just a little kid myself back then, and I remember them giving me the absolute creeps.
engSearchText:
I was still just a little kid myself back then, and I
remember them giving me the absolute creeps.
jpnChrName: 元々白人系の組織だし、東方人系の『黒月』に 対抗するために民族テロを扇動してるって噂も……
jpnSearchText:
元々白人系の組織だし、東方人系の『黒月』に
対抗するために民族テロを扇動してるって噂も……

engChrName: Just thinking about them gives me chills all over again... The kind of chills a girl can't get enough of!
engSearchText:
Just thinking about them gives me chills all
over again... The kind of chills a girl can't get
enough of!
jpnChrName: ……テロは時々あるから、正直怖いわよね。 う～ん、関わりたくないわ……
jpnSearchText:
……テロは時々あるから、正直怖いわよね。
う～ん、関わりたくないわ……

engChrName: When word got out about that whole cult, it sent shockwaves across the entire country.
engSearchText:
When word got out about that whole cult, it sent
shockwaves across the entire country.
jpnChrName: そういえば去年だったかしら。 結構ヤバい連中が捕まったのって……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば去年だったかしら。
結構ヤバい連中が捕まったのって……

engChrName: *sigh* This book of mine really is the best. Just thinking about them gives me chills all over again...
engSearchText:
*sigh* This book of mine really is the best.
Just thinking about them gives me chills all
over again...
jpnChrName: 誘拐した子供を殺し屋に仕立てようとしてた 組織があって、ギルドが制圧したのよね。
jpnSearchText:
誘拐した子供を殺し屋に仕立てようとしてた
組織があって、ギルドが制圧したのよね。

engChrName: I'd be careful if I were you. You guys are stepping into Desire territory with what you're doing.
engSearchText:
I'd be careful if I were you. You guys are stepping into
Desire territory with what you're doing.
jpnChrName: あれもマフィアの下部組織だったって噂よ…… やっぱり怖いわよね～。
jpnSearchText:
あれもマフィアの下部組織だったって噂よ……
やっぱり怖いわよね～。

engChrName: Of course, you're not the only ones stepping into trouble. They sure seem to be using her friend who's with them as well.
engSearchText:
Of course, you're not the only ones stepping
into trouble. They sure seem to be using her friend
who's with them as well.
jpnChrName: 近頃首都を騒がせている犯罪者といえば 『怪盗グリムキャッツ』よね……！
jpnSearchText:
近頃首都を騒がせている犯罪者といえば
『怪盗グリムキャッツ』よね……！

engChrName: The most infamous people mentioned in Perfect Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators have got to be this 'mysterious society' it mentions.
engSearchText:
The most infamous people mentioned in Perfect
Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators have got to be this
'mysterious society' it mentions.
jpnChrName: 狙うのは悪徳企業や汚職役人…… しかもいつも予告状を出す不敵っぷり！
jpnSearchText:
狙うのは悪徳企業や汚職役人……
しかもいつも予告状を出す不敵っぷり！

engChrName: They travel across the continent, masterminding all manner of schemes and conspiracies!
engSearchText:
They travel across the continent, masterminding all
manner of schemes and conspiracies!
jpnChrName: 悪事を暴露したり、困っている人を救ったり してるから、ミラ目的じゃないと言われてるわ。
jpnSearchText:
悪事を暴露したり、困っている人を救ったり
してるから、ミラ目的じゃないと言われてるわ。

engChrName: It says that their existence was first confirmed with the incidents that took place in Liberl about five-ish years ago.
engSearchText:
It says that their existence was first confirmed with
the incidents that took place in Liberl about five-ish
years ago.
jpnChrName: そういえばいつだったかゴシップ誌に “挑戦声明”が載った事もあったわね……
jpnSearchText:
そういえばいつだったかゴシップ誌に
“挑戦声明”が載った事もあったわね……

engChrName: *sigh* They sound amazing, but so little is known about them, it's hard to even fantasize about them. What a shame...
engSearchText:
*sigh* They sound amazing, but so little is known
about them, it's hard to even fantasize about them.
What a shame...
jpnChrName: 本物が出したのかは定かじゃないけど、 ……実は目立ちたがり屋なのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
本物が出したのかは定かじゃないけど、
……実は目立ちたがり屋なのかしら……？

engChrName: When people talk about the mafia in Calvard, they often used to mean the Dolor Family. They've been infamous for ages.
engSearchText:
When people talk about the mafia in Calvard, they
often used to mean the Dolor Family. They've been
infamous for ages.
jpnChrName: 『怪盗グリムキャッツ』は義賊とされているけど 鮮やかすぎる手並みも特徴よね。
jpnSearchText:
『怪盗グリムキャッツ』は義賊とされているけど
鮮やかすぎる手並みも特徴よね。

engChrName: But lately, it seems another organization known as Almata has been extending its reach, too.
engSearchText:
But lately, it seems another organization known as
Almata has been extending its reach, too.
jpnChrName: あとこの本によると、２４～５年前や、 約５０年前にも世間を騒がせたとあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
あとこの本によると、２４～５年前や、
約５０年前にも世間を騒がせたとあるわ。

engChrName: They were once mostly made up of white people. I hear they incite ethnic terrorism to antagonize Heiyue—since they're Eastern.
engSearchText:
They were once mostly made up of white people.
I hear they incite ethnic terrorism to antagonize
Heiyue—since they're Eastern.
jpnChrName: 『実は代替わりしている！？』って書いてあるけど コミックじゃないんだし……流石に荒唐無稽かもね。
jpnSearchText:
『実は代替わりしている！？』って書いてあるけど
コミックじゃないんだし……流石に荒唐無稽かもね。

engChrName: It's...honestly scary stuff. That sort of thing happens from time to time. Ugh, keep that stuff far away from me, thank you.
engSearchText:
It's...honestly scary stuff. That sort of thing happens
from time to time. Ugh, keep that stuff far away from
me, thank you.
jpnChrName: フフ……あなたたち知ってる？ 世の中にはとんでもない犯罪者もいるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……あなたたち知ってる？
世の中にはとんでもない犯罪者もいるのよ。

engChrName: I just remembered there was a group of bad guys that got arrested a while ago. I want to say sometime last year, maybe?
engSearchText:
I just remembered there was a group of bad
guys that got arrested a while ago. I want
to say sometime last year, maybe?
jpnChrName: 例えば『東方人街の魔人』──！
jpnSearchText: 例えば『東方人街の魔人』──！

engChrName: They belonged to this organization that captured children to raise them as assassins. The guild ultimately snuffed that out.
engSearchText:
They belonged to this organization that captured
children to raise them as assassins. The guild
ultimately snuffed that out.
jpnChrName: １３０年以上前からいて、民主主義革命にも 関わった伝説的暗殺者らしいけど……
jpnSearchText:
１３０年以上前からいて、民主主義革命にも
関わった伝説的暗殺者らしいけど……

engChrName: There are rumors that they were actually a subsidiary to the mafia. Can you imagine that? Pretty eerie stuff!
engSearchText:
There are rumors that they were actually a subsidiary
to the mafia. Can you imagine that? Pretty eerie stuff!
jpnChrName: なんとまだ生きていて、未だに暗黒街で 非情な暗殺を請け負っているらしいわ──！
jpnSearchText:
なんとまだ生きていて、未だに暗黒街で
非情な暗殺を請け負っているらしいわ──！

engChrName: When it comes to criminals who've been making a splash around Edith lately, the first one that comes to mind has GOT to be Grimcat!
engSearchText:
When it comes to criminals who've been making a
splash around Edith lately, the first one that comes to
mind has GOT to be Grimcat!
jpnChrName: そんな人が実在するのか怪しいものだけど…… ウフフ、ロマンはあるわよね……！
jpnSearchText:
そんな人が実在するのか怪しいものだけど……
ウフフ、ロマンはあるわよね……！

engChrName: She targets evil corporations and corrupt officials. And she's daring, too! She sends a calling card to all her targets.
engSearchText:
She targets evil corporations and corrupt officials.
And she's daring, too! She sends a calling card to all
her targets.
jpnChrName: ちなみに『東方人街の魔人』は普段 コードネームで呼ばれているそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに『東方人街の魔人』は普段
コードネームで呼ばれているそうだけど……

engChrName: The most interesting part? They say she's not even in it for the money. She's just out to expose wrongdoing and save people who are in trouble!
engSearchText:
The most interesting part? They say she's not even in
it for the money. She's just out to expose wrongdoing
and save people who are in trouble!
jpnChrName: この本には書かれてなかったわ、残念ね……
jpnSearchText: この本には書かれてなかったわ、残念ね……

engChrName: Another thing about Grimcat: she had a so-called declaration published inside a tabloid at one point.
engSearchText:
Another thing about Grimcat: she had a so-called
declaration published inside a tabloid at one point.
jpnChrName: 『完全犯罪読本』、私的には超お気に入りで 読み応えあるんだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
『完全犯罪読本』、私的には超お気に入りで
読み応えあるんだけどね……

engChrName: We can't know for sure if it was written by the real deal, but...maybe she's nothing more than attention seeking? Always possible, I guess.
engSearchText:
We can't know for sure if it was written by the real
deal, but...maybe she's nothing more than
attention seeking? Always possible, I guess.
jpnChrName: （くぅぅぅぅ～～～っ！！！   何なのこの子、癒し～～～っ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（くぅぅぅぅ～～～っ！！！
何なのこの子、癒し～～～っ！！）

engChrName: For someone who's supposed to be a well-intended thief, Grimcat can be on the showy side, but that's all part of her charm.
engSearchText:
For someone who's supposed to be a well-intended
thief, Grimcat can be on the showy side, but that's all
part of her charm.
jpnChrName: （もしかして一人寂しい私を   慰めてくれようと……！？）
jpnSearchText:
（もしかして一人寂しい私を
慰めてくれようと……！？）

engChrName: According to my book, she also stirred up trouble during two other periods: about 24 or 25 years ago, as well as around half a century ago.
engSearchText:
According to my book, she also stirred up trouble
during two other periods: about 24 or 25 years ago, as
well as around half a century ago.
jpnChrName: ………ニャンゴ。
jpnSearchText: ………ニャンゴ。

engChrName: The author theorizes that maybe it's a title that's been passed down, but that sounds kinda ridiculous. It's not like we live in some comic book.
engSearchText:
The author theorizes that maybe it's a title that's been
passed down, but that sounds kinda ridiculous.
It's not like we live in some comic book.
jpnChrName: （鳴き方ちょっとヘンなのも   キュンキュンする～～～っ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（鳴き方ちょっとヘンなのも
キュンキュンする～～～っ！！）

engChrName: Heehee! Do you ever find yourselves wondering about some of the most heinous criminals to ever live on this continent?
engSearchText:
Heehee! Do you ever find yourselves wondering
about some of the most heinous criminals to ever live
on this continent?
jpnChrName: レンさんは大切な用事があるとかで アラミスの方に戻ったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
レンさんは大切な用事があるとかで
アラミスの方に戻ったみたいね。

engChrName: Like, take the demon of the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText: Like, take the demon of the Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: ──私に出来る事は少ないけど、それでも 最後まで力にならせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
──私に出来る事は少ないけど、それでも
最後まで力にならせてもらうわ。

engChrName: They're a legendary assassin whose activities date back over 130 years. They were even involved in Calvard's democratic revolution.
engSearchText:
They're a legendary assassin whose activities date
back over 130 years. They were even involved in
Calvard's democratic revolution.
jpnChrName: だから……絶対に無事に帰ってきて、 またうちで本を買って行って頂戴ね……！
jpnSearchText:
だから……絶対に無事に帰ってきて、
またうちで本を買って行って頂戴ね……！

engChrName: But get this: they say the demon still lives—and that they're committing gruesome murders in the underworld to this very day!
engSearchText:
But get this: they say the demon still lives—and that
they're committing gruesome murders in the
underworld to this very day!
jpnChrName: はい……必ず、日常を取り戻してきます！
jpnSearchText: はい……必ず、日常を取り戻してきます！

engChrName: Now, I'm not sure if that's all hogwash or not, but it's fun to think about, don't you think?! ㈱
engSearchText:
Now, I'm not sure if that's all hogwash or not, but it's
fun to think about, don't you think?! ㈱
jpnChrName: レンさんは離れてしまったけど、学生の皆さんと 協力して端末は運用出来ている状況よ。
jpnSearchText:
レンさんは離れてしまったけど、学生の皆さんと
協力して端末は運用出来ている状況よ。

engChrName: Speaking of the demon, apparently they normally go by a codename.
engSearchText:
Speaking of the demon, apparently they normally go
by a codename.
jpnChrName: 私もやり方は一通り把握したし、 一緒に全力でサポートさせてもらうわ！
jpnSearchText:
私もやり方は一通り把握したし、
一緒に全力でサポートさせてもらうわ！

engChrName: I couldn't tell you what it is, though. They don't talk about that in this book, which is a shame.
engSearchText:
I couldn't tell you what it is, though. They don't talk
about that in this book, which is a shame.
jpnChrName: サービス向上のために導入した端末が、 こんな形でお役に立てることになるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
サービス向上のために導入した端末が、
こんな形でお役に立てることになるなんて……

engChrName: By the way, the book's called 'Perfect Crimes by Perfect Perpetrators.' It's the best! You learn all sorts of neat little tidbits about crime.
engSearchText:
By the way, the book's called 'Perfect Crimes by
Perfect Perpetrators.' It's the best! You learn all sorts
of neat little tidbits about crime.
jpnChrName: 思い切って取り寄せたものだったけど、 やっぱり投資はしておくものね……
jpnSearchText:
思い切って取り寄せたものだったけど、
やっぱり投資はしておくものね……

engChrName: (Gaaah! This little guy is SO soothing!)
engSearchText: (Gaaah! This little guy is SO soothing!)
jpnChrName: それにしても、レンさんは凄いわね…… 何をやっているのか私にはさっぱり……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、レンさんは凄いわね……
何をやっているのか私にはさっぱり……

engChrName: (Did he come here to comfort me? How did he know I was lonely?!)
engSearchText:
(Did he come here to comfort me? How did he know
I was lonely?!)
jpnChrName: でも私も……一応、端末の事は勉強したし できる範囲でサポートさせてもらうわ！
jpnSearchText:
でも私も……一応、端末の事は勉強したし
できる範囲でサポートさせてもらうわ！

engChrName: ...Mraowr.
engSearchText: ...Mraowr.
jpnChrName: もともと革命記念祭には、革命の歴史を学び直そうと 思う人も増えて伝記は売れていたものだけど……
jpnSearchText:
もともと革命記念祭には、革命の歴史を学び直そうと
思う人も増えて伝記は売れていたものだけど……

engChrName: (Okay, the way he meows is a little weird, but that doesn't matter. I'm officially in love!)
engSearchText:
(Okay, the way he meows is a little weird, but that
doesn't matter. I'm officially in love!)
jpnChrName: 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』の人気もあって、今年は 例年以上にシーナの伝記が人気ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』の人気もあって、今年は
例年以上にシーナの伝記が人気ねぇ。

engChrName: Renne went back to Aramis. She said she had something important she needed to take care of over there.
engSearchText:
Renne went back to Aramis. She said she had
something important she needed to take care of
over there.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、新しい導力端末のお陰で 在庫管理もよりスムーズになったし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、新しい導力端末のお陰で
在庫管理もよりスムーズになったし。

engChrName: There's not a lot I can do in this situation, but I'm still going to try my best to help everyone out however I can.
engSearchText:
There's not a lot I can do in this situation, but I'm
still going to try my best to help everyone out
however I can.
jpnChrName: 今年も残り一月弱…… 最後まで好調な売り上げをキープできそうね。
jpnSearchText:
今年も残り一月弱……
最後まで好調な売り上げをキープできそうね。

engChrName: As for you guys, come back in one piece, okay? I want to keep selling more books to you all for a long time to come! Got it?
engSearchText:
As for you guys, come back in one piece, okay? I want
to keep selling more books to you all for a long time
to come! Got it?
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭の最中はキャンペーンも予定していてね、 映画『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』も上映中だし丁度いいわよね。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭の最中はキャンペーンも予定していてね、
映画『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』も上映中だし丁度いいわよね。

engChrName: Of course. Whatever it takes, we're going to make everything right.
engSearchText:
Of course. Whatever it takes, we're going to make
everything right.
jpnChrName: それと、今日は届いた 最新の導力端末のセットアップをしないと。
jpnSearchText:
それと、今日は届いた
最新の導力端末のセットアップをしないと。

engChrName: Renne had to take off, but the other students and I are putting my store's orbal computer system to good use.
engSearchText:
Renne had to take off, but the other students and I
are putting my store's orbal computer system to
good use.
jpnChrName: 記念祭は忙しくなるでしょうし その前に片付けておかないとね♪
jpnSearchText:
記念祭は忙しくなるでしょうし
その前に片付けておかないとね♪

engChrName: I've got a solid grasp of the basics myself, so I'm more than capable of backing you up!
engSearchText:
I've got a solid grasp of the basics myself, so I'm more
than capable of backing you up!
jpnChrName: 先程はお世話になりました。 あの後アルベール君から話を聞きましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
先程はお世話になりました。
あの後アルベール君から話を聞きましたよ。

engChrName: I ordered my orbal computer with the goal of improving service at the store. I never pictured it'd come in handy in situations like this.
engSearchText:
I ordered my orbal computer with the goal of
improving service at the store. I never pictured it'd
come in handy in situations like this.
jpnChrName: カーチスさんが抱えていた問題も ひとまずは解決の兆しが見えて来たと思います。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスさんが抱えていた問題も
ひとまずは解決の兆しが見えて来たと思います。

engChrName: This investment's definitely paying off, that's for sure.
engSearchText: This investment's definitely paying off, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: そう、それならよかったわ……！
jpnSearchText: そう、それならよかったわ……！

engChrName: That Renne girl sure is amazing, isn't she? I have no idea what she's doing, but I can tell it's impressive.
engSearchText:
That Renne girl sure is amazing, isn't she? I have no
idea what she's doing, but I can tell it's impressive.
jpnChrName: また店に来てくれた時は 私も気にかけておこうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
また店に来てくれた時は
私も気にかけておこうかしら。

engChrName: I did try to study up on how to operate a computer, at least, so I should be able to help her with the basics.
engSearchText:
I did try to study up on how to operate a computer, at
least, so I should be able to help her with the basics.
jpnChrName: カーチス君に何があったのか心配ね……
jpnSearchText: カーチス君に何があったのか心配ね……

engChrName: The Revolution Festival always inspires people to buy biographies because they want to refresh their knowledge of what happened in the revolution.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival always inspires people to buy
biographies because they want to refresh their
knowledge of what happened in the revolution.
jpnChrName: 彼の事ならアルベール君の方が詳しいはずよ。
jpnSearchText: 彼の事ならアルベール君の方が詳しいはずよ。

engChrName: But this year, biographies on Sheena Dirke have been flying off the shelves. I think it's because that Gloria movie was such a hit.
engSearchText:
But this year, biographies on Sheena Dirke have been
flying off the shelves. I think it's because that Gloria
movie was such a hit.
jpnChrName: 今日はバイトはオフなんだけど…… 会えるなら話を聞いてみたらどうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
今日はバイトはオフなんだけど……
会えるなら話を聞いてみたらどうかしら。

engChrName: It also doesn't hurt that inventory management is now smoother than ever thanks to the new orbal computer I bought.
engSearchText:
It also doesn't hurt that inventory management is now
smoother than ever thanks to the new orbal computer
I bought.
jpnChrName: ここ数日は、記念祭が近いという事で シーナの伝記とか革命関連の本が売れているわ。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日は、記念祭が近いという事で
シーナの伝記とか革命関連の本が売れているわ。

engChrName: With a little less than a month left, I'm optimistic we can maintain our positive sales trajectory through New Year's.
engSearchText:
With a little less than a month left, I'm optimistic we
can maintain our positive sales trajectory through
New Year's.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、皆前向きに記念祭を 楽しみにできているようで何よりね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、皆前向きに記念祭を
楽しみにできているようで何よりね。

engChrName: We've got a campaign that's set to launch during the Revolution Festival. With Gloria in theaters right now, the timing couldn't be better.
engSearchText:
We've got a campaign that's set to launch during the
Revolution Festival. With Gloria in theaters right
now, the timing couldn't be better.
jpnChrName: あの事件のムードをいつまでも引っ張る訳にも いかないわ、少しでも前に進まないとね。
jpnSearchText:
あの事件のムードをいつまでも引っ張る訳にも
いかないわ、少しでも前に進まないとね。

engChrName: The new orbal computer I bought arrived today. After I get it all set up, we can hit the ground running.
engSearchText:
The new orbal computer I bought arrived today.
After I get it all set up, we can hit the
ground running.
jpnChrName: そうそう、うちも導力ネットに 本格的に対応したいと思っていて──
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、うちも導力ネットに
本格的に対応したいと思っていて──

engChrName: The Revolution Festival's going to be a busy period for us, so the more ducks we have in a row beforehand, the better.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival's going to be a busy period
for us, so the more ducks we have in a row
beforehand, the better.
jpnChrName: 《スチュアート》のサイトを立ち上げたり 新刊情報をメールで知らせるサービスを検討中よ。
jpnSearchText:
《スチュアート》のサイトを立ち上げたり
新刊情報をメールで知らせるサービスを検討中よ。

engChrName: Thanks for all of your help earlier! We ended up talking to Albert later like you suggested.
engSearchText:
Thanks for all of your help earlier! We ended up
talking to Albert later like you suggested.
jpnChrName: そのために最新の導力端末も導入したの。 早く使いこなせるようにならなくちゃ♪
jpnSearchText:
そのために最新の導力端末も導入したの。
早く使いこなせるようにならなくちゃ♪

engChrName: It looks like Curtis' problems are going to be resolved eventually, so you don't have to worry about him anymore.
engSearchText:
It looks like Curtis' problems are going to be resolved
eventually, so you don't have to worry about
him anymore.
jpnChrName: あんな事件があったら……やっぱり皆、 背景も気になるのね。
jpnSearchText:
あんな事件があったら……やっぱり皆、
背景も気になるのね。

engChrName: Oh, I'm so relieved to hear that! Thank you for giving me that update. I really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm so relieved to hear that! Thank you for giving
me that update. I really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の事が書いてある観光関係や農業関係の 本を買う人もいれば、兵器の本を買う人もいて……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の事が書いてある観光関係や農業関係の
本を買う人もいれば、兵器の本を買う人もいて……

engChrName: Next time he comes into the store, I think I'll check in on him, too.
engSearchText:
Next time he comes into the store, I think I'll check
in on him, too.
jpnChrName: 皆、各々で少しでも知れることを知って、恐怖を 薄めたいのよ……未知ほど怖い物は無いもの。
jpnSearchText:
皆、各々で少しでも知れることを知って、恐怖を
薄めたいのよ……未知ほど怖い物は無いもの。

engChrName: I wonder what's going to happen to Curtis. I'm worried about him.
engSearchText:
I wonder what's going to happen to Curtis.
I'm worried about him.
jpnChrName: ふう、見ての通りゴシップ誌が飛ぶように 売れている状況でね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、見ての通りゴシップ誌が飛ぶように
売れている状況でね……

engChrName: I wish I could tell you more. Albert might be able to, though.
engSearchText:
I wish I could tell you more. Albert might be able
to, though.
jpnChrName: バズレイダー、普段の３倍は 売れてるんじゃないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
バズレイダー、普段の３倍は
売れてるんじゃないかしら。

engChrName: Today's his day off, but if you happen to run into him, I'd suggest talking to him.
engSearchText:
Today's his day off, but if you happen to run into
him, I'd suggest talking to him.
jpnChrName: 店としてはありがたいけど…… 下世話な話だし、ちょっと複雑ね。
jpnSearchText:
店としてはありがたいけど……
下世話な話だし、ちょっと複雑ね。

engChrName: Books on Sheena Dirke and the revolution have been selling like gangbusters the last couple of days.
engSearchText:
Books on Sheena Dirke and the revolution have been
selling like gangbusters the last couple of days.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進めるには、ショップで バズレイダーを購入してください。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進めるには、ショップで
バズレイダーを購入してください。

engChrName: I'm taking it as a sign that people are staying positive and trying to look forward to the festival after everything that's happened.
engSearchText:
I'm taking it as a sign that people are staying positive
and trying to look forward to the festival after
everything that's happened.
jpnChrName: アルベール君ならもう上がったわ。 あの子も大変ね、生徒会の仕事もあるのに……
jpnSearchText:
アルベール君ならもう上がったわ。
あの子も大変ね、生徒会の仕事もあるのに……

engChrName: As tragic as the incident in Creil was, we can't stay down in the dumps forever. We have to keep moving forward, little by little.
engSearchText:
As tragic as the incident in Creil was, we can't stay
down in the dumps forever. We have to keep moving
forward, little by little.
jpnChrName: それに“視察研修”の行き先を 随分気にしていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
それに“視察研修”の行き先を
随分気にしていたわ。

engChrName: So, I've decided it's high time that this store goes all in on this orbal net thing.
engSearchText:
So, I've decided it's high time that this store goes all
in on this orbal net thing.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、どうやら青春してるみたいね。 ちょっと応援したくなっちゃうかも。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、どうやら青春してるみたいね。
ちょっと応援したくなっちゃうかも。

engChrName: Maybe I'll open up a website for us. I could even set up a newsletter so people can keep tabs on all the latest happenings.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll open up a website for us. I could even set
up a newsletter so people can keep tabs on all the
latest happenings.
jpnChrName: アルベール君は真面目だし ちょっと応援したくなっちゃうかも。
jpnSearchText:
アルベール君は真面目だし
ちょっと応援したくなっちゃうかも。

engChrName: In fact, I went ahead and bought the newest orbal computer model. Now I just need to master it ASAP so I can make the most of it!
engSearchText:
In fact, I went ahead and bought the newest orbal
computer model. Now I just need to master it ASAP
so I can make the most of it!
jpnChrName: 青春って、後になって貴重さが判るものだし 今は何事も全力で当たって欲しいものよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
青春って、後になって貴重さが判るものだし
今は何事も全力で当たって欲しいものよねぇ。

engChrName: I've noticed that whenever a major tragedy happens, people always want to learn all about it.
engSearchText:
I've noticed that whenever a major tragedy happens,
people always want to learn all about it.
jpnChrName: あちらのアラミスの男の子、 今年の夏から入ってくれた子でね。
jpnSearchText:
あちらのアラミスの男の子、
今年の夏から入ってくれた子でね。

engChrName: I've had people coming in to buy tour and farming guides about Creil. Some people are even purchasing books about weaponry...
engSearchText:
I've had people coming in to buy tour and farming
guides about Creil. Some people are even purchasing
books about weaponry...
jpnChrName: 生徒会の一員らしくて、手際は そこそこだけど真面目で良い子よ。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会の一員らしくて、手際は
そこそこだけど真面目で良い子よ。

engChrName: And you know what? More power to them. There's nothing more scary than the unknown, and knowledge can help mitigate that fear.
engSearchText:
And you know what? More power to them.
There's nothing more scary than the unknown, and
knowledge can help mitigate that fear.
jpnChrName: まあ、生徒会が忙しいらしくて あまり入ってくれないのが残念だけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、生徒会が忙しいらしくて
あまり入ってくれないのが残念だけど……

engChrName: The tabloids are selling like hotcakes here.
engSearchText: The tabloids are selling like hotcakes here.
jpnChrName: ──あと、お年頃の少年らしいところも あって中々可愛らしいものね。
jpnSearchText:
──あと、お年頃の少年らしいところも
あって中々可愛らしいものね。

engChrName: I'm just about to run out of Buzzraider copies. It's craziness!
engSearchText:
I'm just about to run out of Buzzraider copies.
It's craziness!
jpnChrName: ふふ、アルバイトも青春も…… 彼は健気に頑張っているみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アルバイトも青春も……
彼は健気に頑張っているみたいね。

engChrName: Though I'm feeling a little conflicted about it, given the unseemly reasons behind the increase in demand.
engSearchText:
Though I'm feeling a little conflicted about it, given
the unseemly reasons behind the increase in demand.
jpnChrName: 空回りする事もあるかもしれないけど 年長者として応援したくなるわ。
jpnSearchText:
空回りする事もあるかもしれないけど
年長者として応援したくなるわ。

engChrName: When you purchase a copy of Buzzraider at the book store, the main story will advance.
engSearchText:
When you purchase a copy of Buzzraider at the book
store, the main story will advance.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、今ウチは 映画館の方とタイアップしててね。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、今ウチは
映画館の方とタイアップしててね。

engChrName: If you're looking for Albert, he just went home. I still don't know how he juggles his Student Council duties and his job here.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Albert, he just went home. I still
don't know how he juggles his Student Council
duties and his job here.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの映画祭もあるし、 映画の関連書籍なんかを押し出してる所よ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの映画祭もあるし、
映画の関連書籍なんかを押し出してる所よ。

engChrName: I overheard him talk about a school outing he'll be doing. He sounded a little concerned about it.
engSearchText:
I overheard him talk about a school outing he'll
be doing. He sounded a little concerned about it.
jpnChrName: 映画や芸能雑誌も売れれば、映画館も 来客数が増えるから喜んでもらえてて。
jpnSearchText:
映画や芸能雑誌も売れれば、映画館も
来客数が増えるから喜んでもらえてて。

engChrName: Heehee. I'm guessing it's because of teenager things. Hang in there, kiddo. Your boss is in your corner.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm guessing it's because of teenager things.
Hang in there, kiddo. Your boss is in your corner.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、こういうのは 持ちつ持たれつの宣伝効果よね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、こういうのは
持ちつ持たれつの宣伝効果よね。

engChrName: Albert's such a sweetheart. I can't not want him to succeed with whatever he's got going on.
engSearchText:
Albert's such a sweetheart. I can't not want him to
succeed with whatever he's got going on.
jpnChrName: うちは古くから商売人の家系でね。 ここもその昔は商館だったらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
うちは古くから商売人の家系でね。
ここもその昔は商館だったらしいわ。

engChrName: I hope he doesn't take his youth for granted. You never realize how precious those early years are until they're over.
engSearchText:
I hope he doesn't take his youth for granted.
You never realize how precious those early years are
until they're over.
jpnChrName: 本好きな人が多かったこともあって 祖父母の代から書店を始めたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
本好きな人が多かったこともあって
祖父母の代から書店を始めたみたいね。

engChrName: That young boy from Aramis started working here this summer. I think he's on their Student Council.
engSearchText:
That young boy from Aramis started working here
this summer. I think he's on their Student Council.
jpnChrName: ちなみにウチの２階から４階は かなりの床面積を誇る蔵書庫になってるの。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにウチの２階から４階は
かなりの床面積を誇る蔵書庫になってるの。

engChrName: He's not the handiest member on staff, but he's a diligent kid with a good head on his shoulders.
engSearchText:
He's not the handiest member on staff, but he's a
diligent kid with a good head on his shoulders.
jpnChrName: 導力端末を使っているから 膨大な書籍数も管理できているのよね♪
jpnSearchText:
導力端末を使っているから
膨大な書籍数も管理できているのよね♪

engChrName: Although, I haven't seen him much lately, sad to say. I guess the council's got their hands full at the moment.
engSearchText:
Although, I haven't seen him much lately, sad to say.
I guess the council's got their hands full at
the moment.
jpnChrName: ウチの祖先は商才のある人たちだったし、 私も負けてられないわ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチの祖先は商才のある人たちだったし、
私も負けてられないわ。

engChrName: Regardless, he's still a bit wet behind the ears. ...Oh, but I mean that in a nice way.
engSearchText:
Regardless, he's still a bit wet behind the ears.
...Oh, but I mean that in a nice way.
jpnChrName: 蔵書の管理は導力端末を導入しているし 著者とのコラボ企画なんかも──
jpnSearchText:
蔵書の管理は導力端末を導入しているし
著者とのコラボ企画なんかも──

engChrName: Albert's clearly living his life to the fullest, even if some days are probably better than others.
engSearchText:
Albert's clearly living his life to the fullest, even if
some days are probably better than others.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、書店としてできる限り 攻めていかないとね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、書店としてできる限り
攻めていかないとね！

engChrName: It's fun to watch him do his thing. I can't help but root for him.
engSearchText:
It's fun to watch him do his thing. I can't help but
root for him.
jpnChrName: あらいらっしゃい。 ブックストア《スチュアート》へようこそ。
jpnSearchText:
あらいらっしゃい。
ブックストア《スチュアート》へようこそ。

engChrName: Hey there! We're doing a promotional tie-in with the movie theater right now.
engSearchText:
Hey there! We're doing a promotional tie-in with the
movie theater right now.
jpnChrName: うちはコミック雑誌とか、映画との タイアップ商品なんかも扱ってるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちはコミック雑誌とか、映画との
タイアップ商品なんかも扱ってるわよ。

engChrName: Seeing as everyone's talking about the film festival in Tharbad, we're highlighting all the books and magazines we have on film.
engSearchText:
Seeing as everyone's talking about the film festival in
Tharbad, we're highlighting all the books and
magazines we have on film.
jpnChrName: もちろん小説や経済誌、参考書まで 一般書籍も網羅してるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん小説や経済誌、参考書まで
一般書籍も網羅してるけどね。

engChrName: It's a mutually beneficial situation. We sell what customers want to read, and the movie theater gets more viewers.
engSearchText:
It's a mutually beneficial situation. We sell what
customers want to read, and the movie theater gets
more viewers.
jpnChrName: お探しの本があれば声を掛けて頂戴。 蔵書数には自信があるつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
お探しの本があれば声を掛けて頂戴。
蔵書数には自信があるつもりよ。

engChrName: Everybody wins! This is the best kind of ad campaign, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
Everybody wins! This is the best kind of ad campaign,
if you ask me.
jpnChrName: バズレイダーを購入しますか？ １００ミラ必要です。
jpnSearchText:
バズレイダーを購入しますか？
１００ミラ必要です。

engChrName: I come from a long line of merchants. Supposedly, this place used to be a trading company a long time ago.
engSearchText:
I come from a long line of merchants.
Supposedly, this place used to be a trading company a
long time ago.
jpnChrName: （……手持ちが無かったな。）
jpnSearchText: （……手持ちが無かったな。）

engChrName: But my grandparents converted it into a bookstore after they saw the number of book lovers in Edith. And, well, here I am, still selling books.
engSearchText:
But my grandparents converted it into a bookstore
after they saw the number of book lovers in Edith.
And, well, here I am, still selling books.
jpnChrName: 一応会社からザイファという 通信端末を支給されていてね。
jpnSearchText:
一応会社からザイファという
通信端末を支給されていてね。

engChrName: If you've ever wondered what we do with the other floors of this building, floors two through four constitute our enormous storehouse.
engSearchText:
If you've ever wondered what we do with the other
floors of this building, floors two through four
constitute our enormous storehouse.
jpnChrName: 手分けして、あちこち掛けたから 各所の被害状況もある程度把握できたぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
手分けして、あちこち掛けたから
各所の被害状況もある程度把握できたぞ……！

engChrName: Thanks to the wonders of orbal computers, we can manage an enormous inventory, which means even more books for our customers. ㈱
engSearchText:
Thanks to the wonders of orbal computers, we can
manage an enormous inventory, which means even
more books for our customers. ㈱
jpnChrName: 主要企業や銀行への被害は今のところ無いようだが 通信に出ない企業も多いな……
jpnSearchText:
主要企業や銀行への被害は今のところ無いようだが
通信に出ない企業も多いな……

engChrName: My ancestors were all talented businesspeople in their own right, and I, for one, intend to maintain that legacy.
engSearchText:
My ancestors were all talented businesspeople in their
own right, and I, for one, intend to maintain
that legacy.
jpnChrName: な、なんにせよ孤立している人を放っておけない。 救助に向かえるよう手配しないとな……！
jpnSearchText:
な、なんにせよ孤立している人を放っておけない。
救助に向かえるよう手配しないとな……！

engChrName: I'll do whatever it takes to stay one step ahead, whether that's managing our inventory with computers or collaborating with authors.
engSearchText:
I'll do whatever it takes to stay one step ahead,
whether that's managing our inventory with
computers or collaborating with authors.
jpnChrName: ま、まさかこんなコミックのような事が 現実に起きるとは……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさかこんなコミックのような事が
現実に起きるとは……

engChrName: I want this store at the head of the pack.
engSearchText: I want this store at the head of the pack.
jpnChrName: あの不気味な空に化物、 それに動かない人たち……
jpnSearchText:
あの不気味な空に化物、
それに動かない人たち……

engChrName: Hi there! Welcome to Stuart Bookstore.
engSearchText: Hi there! Welcome to Stuart Bookstore.
jpnChrName: ううっ、会社の方も気になるが 今は動けそうにないぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、会社の方も気になるが
今は動けそうにないぞ……！

engChrName: Whether you're shopping for novels, business magazines, or reference books, we've got all your reading needs covered.
engSearchText:
Whether you're shopping for novels, business
magazines, or reference books, we've got all your
reading needs covered.
jpnChrName: ……しかしなんだ、店長さん達や 学生たちが何かを始めるのか……？
jpnSearchText:
……しかしなんだ、店長さん達や
学生たちが何かを始めるのか……？

engChrName: And we sell more than just books. We also have comic magazines, promotional merchandise for movies, and plenty more.
engSearchText:
And we sell more than just books. We also have
comic magazines, promotional merchandise for
movies, and plenty more.
jpnChrName: うーん、学生でも頑張っているのに 大人の私が何もしないのは流石にな……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、学生でも頑張っているのに
大人の私が何もしないのは流石にな……

engChrName: If there's anything you're looking for in particular, let me know.
engSearchText:
If there's anything you're looking for in particular, let
me know.
jpnChrName: ここは何か、手伝った方がいいのか……？
jpnSearchText: ここは何か、手伝った方がいいのか……？

engChrName: Purchase a copy of Buzzraider for 100 mira?
engSearchText: Purchase a copy of Buzzraider for 100 mira?
jpnChrName: 思った通り今年の記念祭は例年の比じゃない 盛り上がりだ、経済効果も期待できそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
思った通り今年の記念祭は例年の比じゃない
盛り上がりだ、経済効果も期待できそうだな。

engChrName: (Whoops. I'm broke as hell.)
engSearchText: (Whoops. I'm broke as hell.)
jpnChrName: 直前にはあんな事件もあって景気も落ち込み そうだったが……その分、振れ幅も大きいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
直前にはあんな事件もあって景気も落ち込み
そうだったが……その分、振れ幅も大きいだろう。

engChrName: Our company supplied us with Xiphas. They're like mobile communication devices.
engSearchText:
Our company supplied us with Xiphas. They're like
mobile communication devices.
jpnChrName: 特にさっきの大統領演説は来年以降に期待を持たせて くれるものだったし、景気は心配無さそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
特にさっきの大統領演説は来年以降に期待を持たせて
くれるものだったし、景気は心配無さそうだ。

engChrName: Everyone split up and went to various parts of the city to survey the damage. We now have a rough idea of how things are looking.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up and went to various parts of the city
to survey the damage. We now have a rough idea of
how things are looking.
jpnChrName: ……そうと決まれば私も、堅い事は一旦 忘れて楽しむ事とするか！
jpnSearchText:
……そうと決まれば私も、堅い事は一旦
忘れて楽しむ事とするか！

engChrName: Thankfully, all the big businesses and banks are untouched for now.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, all the big businesses and banks are
untouched for now.
jpnChrName: 飾りつけも始まって、いよいよ記念祭の 雰囲気が出てきたな……
jpnSearchText:
飾りつけも始まって、いよいよ記念祭の
雰囲気が出てきたな……

engChrName: However, a lot of companies aren't responding to our calls. They might need help, so I'm going to make arrangements so they can get it!
engSearchText:
However, a lot of companies aren't responding to
our calls. They might need help, so I'm going to make
arrangements so they can get it!
jpnChrName: 今年は困難を乗り越えた後だって事もあってか どこも一層に気合が入っているように見えるね。
jpnSearchText:
今年は困難を乗り越えた後だって事もあってか
どこも一層に気合が入っているように見えるね。

engChrName: How... How can this be real? This feels like something ripped straight out of a comic book!
engSearchText:
How... How can this be real? This feels like
something ripped straight out of a comic book!
jpnChrName: さて、私もひと頑張り……と行きたいが、 今夜は読書に洒落込むか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、私もひと頑張り……と行きたいが、
今夜は読書に洒落込むか。

engChrName: The sky looks all ominous, terrifying monsters are out and about, and then there's all those people who are frozen solid... It's insanity!
engSearchText:
The sky looks all ominous, terrifying monsters are out
and about, and then there's all those people who are
frozen solid... It's insanity!
jpnChrName: ほら、このお祭りムードを見ながら 仕事関係の本っていうのも、何だしな……？
jpnSearchText:
ほら、このお祭りムードを見ながら
仕事関係の本っていうのも、何だしな……？

engChrName: I'm worried about my company, but there's no way I can leave here right now. Things are too dangerous out there!
engSearchText:
I'm worried about my company, but there's no way I
can leave here right now. Things are too dangerous
out there!
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言が解除されて、 株価も順調に持ち直してきているな……
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言が解除されて、
株価も順調に持ち直してきているな……

engChrName: What are the manager and those students trying to do over there?
engSearchText:
What are the manager and those students trying to do
over there?
jpnChrName: 事件の黒幕を公表するタイミングと言い 企業への根回しと言い、流石は大統領だよ……
jpnSearchText:
事件の黒幕を公表するタイミングと言い
企業への根回しと言い、流石は大統領だよ……

engChrName: Ugh. I'm so embarrassed. Those kids are trying their best to help, and yet here I am doing diddly squat.
engSearchText:
Ugh. I'm so embarrassed. Those kids are trying their
best to help, and yet here I am doing diddly squat.
jpnChrName: 賠償金が終わる件も懸念されてきたが…… この分なら大統領も、何か対策がありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
賠償金が終わる件も懸念されてきたが……
この分なら大統領も、何か対策がありそうだな。

engChrName: I guess I should find a way to pitch in around here. But how...?
engSearchText:
I guess I should find a way to pitch in around here.
But how...?
jpnChrName: 件のテロ事件、正直今までにあったテロとは 規模が違い過ぎて……実感が湧かなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
件のテロ事件、正直今までにあったテロとは
規模が違い過ぎて……実感が湧かなかったが……

engChrName: This year's festival is looking even more active than your average year. This is bound to do good things for the economy.
engSearchText:
This year's festival is looking even more active than
your average year. This is bound to do good things for
the economy.
jpnChrName: 金融屋の性かな、株が暴落しているのを見ると…… ううっ、寒気が引かないぞ………
jpnSearchText:
金融屋の性かな、株が暴落しているのを見ると……
ううっ、寒気が引かないぞ………

engChrName: I was certain we were in for a downturn after the Creil tragedy, but if anything, the opposite has happened.
engSearchText:
I was certain we were in for a downturn after the
Creil tragedy, but if anything, the opposite
has happened.
jpnChrName: 本を買いに来てみれば……ジュディス・ランスターと マクシム・ルーガンの熱愛発覚だって！？
jpnSearchText:
本を買いに来てみれば……ジュディス・ランスターと
マクシム・ルーガンの熱愛発覚だって！？

engChrName: Maybe President Gramheart's speech had something to do with that. That helped me feel much more optimistic about the future.
engSearchText:
Maybe President Gramheart's speech had something
to do with that. That helped me feel much more
optimistic about the future.
jpnChrName: 芸能もＺ１も特段に嗜まないが…… 流石に有名どころがダブルで来たら気になるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
芸能もＺ１も特段に嗜まないが……
流石に有名どころがダブルで来たら気になるぞ。

engChrName: All right. I think I've done enough talking. Time to party like there's no tomorrow!
engSearchText:
All right. I think I've done enough talking. Time to
party like there's no tomorrow!
jpnChrName: ……予定外だが買ってみるか、バズレイダー。 正直気になって仕事に集中できる気がしないし……
jpnSearchText:
……予定外だが買ってみるか、バズレイダー。
正直気になって仕事に集中できる気がしないし……

engChrName: Now that they're putting decorations out, it's really sinking in that the Revolution Festival's almost here.
engSearchText:
Now that they're putting decorations out, it's really
sinking in that the Revolution Festival's almost here.
jpnChrName: ふう……最近はどうにもヴェルヌ関連の 仕事が一層忙しくなりつつあるな……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……最近はどうにもヴェルヌ関連の
仕事が一層忙しくなりつつあるな……

engChrName: It feels like people are more energized for it than usual. I think everyone's ready for some relief after everything that's gone down this year.
engSearchText:
It feels like people are more energized for it
than usual. I think everyone's ready for some relief
after everything that's gone down this year.
jpnChrName: やはり、賠償金でついた勢いもじきに限界が…… ともあれ、やる事はやったし……読書しよう。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、賠償金でついた勢いもじきに限界が……
ともあれ、やる事はやったし……読書しよう。

engChrName: As for me, I should probably do some more work, but I feel like treating myself to some reading tonight.
engSearchText:
As for me, I should probably do some more work, but
I feel like treating myself to some reading tonight.
jpnChrName: 今朝買った『オラシオン信用金庫没落の真実』…… いや、こんな暗いのは読む気分じゃないな。
jpnSearchText:
今朝買った『オラシオン信用金庫没落の真実』……
いや、こんな暗いのは読む気分じゃないな。

engChrName: I'm in a festive mood—not a work-until-I-drop one, so I'm gonna kick back and relax.
engSearchText:
I'm in a festive mood—not a work-until-I-drop one,
so I'm gonna kick back and relax.
jpnChrName: 大人しく小説でも読むか…… 何かいい本は……
jpnSearchText:
大人しく小説でも読むか……
何かいい本は……

engChrName: Now that the state of emergency's been lifted, stock prices are rebounding. I think we have our president to thank for that.
engSearchText:
Now that the state of emergency's been lifted, stock
prices are rebounding. I think we have our president
to thank for that.
jpnChrName: 映画祭を記念してのタイアップ…… また面白そうな事をしているな。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭を記念してのタイアップ……
また面白そうな事をしているな。

engChrName: He's been doing some wheeling and dealing with businesses—and he announced the culprit behind the attack on Creil.
engSearchText:
He's been doing some wheeling and dealing with
businesses—and he announced the culprit behind the
attack on Creil.
jpnChrName: まあ、今日の本題はヴェルヌ・グループの 投資状況の資料だが……少しは息抜きしてもいいか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今日の本題はヴェルヌ・グループの
投資状況の資料だが……少しは息抜きしてもいいか。

engChrName: I don't know what'll happen to this country once the reparation money stops coming in, but I have a feeling he's got a plan for that.
engSearchText:
I don't know what'll happen to this country once the
reparation money stops coming in, but I have a
feeling he's got a plan for that.
jpnChrName: 映画祭には行けないが、こういう時くらい 本で気分を味わってもバチは当たるまい……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭には行けないが、こういう時くらい
本で気分を味わってもバチは当たるまい……

engChrName: That terror attack was so much bigger than the ones that came before it. It didn't feel real to me when it happened...
engSearchText:
That terror attack was so much bigger than the ones
that came before it. It didn't feel real to me when
it happened...
jpnChrName: ふう、仕事終わりに一服しながら 読むならやっぱりコミックだな……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、仕事終わりに一服しながら
読むならやっぱりコミックだな……

engChrName: Watching those stock prices fall sent some serious chills down my spine. Brr...
engSearchText:
Watching those stock prices fall sent some serious
chills down my spine. Brr...
jpnChrName: 経済誌だと、どうしても仕事の事を 意識して、心が休まらん。
jpnSearchText:
経済誌だと、どうしても仕事の事を
意識して、心が休まらん。

engChrName: I just found out that Judith Lanster and Maxim Lugan are madly in love right now... How scandalous!
engSearchText:
I just found out that Judith Lanster and Maxim
Lugan are madly in love right now... How scandalous!
jpnChrName: さて、そろそろ帰るか…… ってもうこんな時間か！？
jpnSearchText:
さて、そろそろ帰るか……
ってもうこんな時間か！？

engChrName: I'm not into movies or Z1 racing, but even I've heard of those two.
engSearchText:
I'm not into movies or Z1 racing, but even I've heard
of those two.
jpnChrName: うーむ、やはりコミックを読んでいると いつの間にか時間が……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、やはりコミックを読んでいると
いつの間にか時間が……

engChrName: I think I'll pick up a copy of Buzzraider. It wasn't on my to-buy list, but I'm just dying of curiosity.
engSearchText:
I think I'll pick up a copy of Buzzraider. It wasn't on
my to-buy list, but I'm just dying of curiosity.
jpnChrName: さて、金融動向を把握するために経済誌を…… 今週は確かハックベリー氏の論評が……
jpnSearchText:
さて、金融動向を把握するために経済誌を……
今週は確かハックベリー氏の論評が……

engChrName: *sigh* My Verne Company work has really been piling up lately.
engSearchText:
*sigh* My Verne Company work has really been
piling up lately.
jpnChrName: ……ん？　あっちにあるのは…… 『ブレイブリー・ストーリーズ』新刊じゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
……ん？　あっちにあるのは……
『ブレイブリー・ストーリーズ』新刊じゃないか！

engChrName: I'm worried about the company. The financial boost they get from reparations is bound to peter out soon...
engSearchText:
I'm worried about the company. The financial boost
they get from reparations is bound to peter out soon...
jpnChrName: いやぁ、前に読んだのは随分前だったが…… いつの間にか新刊が出ていたとは。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、前に読んだのは随分前だったが……
いつの間にか新刊が出ていたとは。

engChrName: Oh, well. Nothing I can do about that, so I'll just destress with some reading.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Nothing I can do about that, so I'll just
destress with some reading.
jpnChrName: 今は１０巻まで出ているのか…… キリも良いしせっかくだから全部買うとするか。
jpnSearchText:
今は１０巻まで出ているのか……
キリも良いしせっかくだから全部買うとするか。

engChrName: I bought a book titled 'Oración Credit Union's Bankruptcy: The Truth,' but I think I'm in the mood for a novel. Now, what to buy...?
engSearchText:
I bought a book titled 'Oración Credit Union's
Bankruptcy: The Truth,' but I think I'm in the mood
for a novel. Now, what to buy...?
jpnChrName: ……おっと、いかんいかん。 経済誌を買うのが本題だった……
jpnSearchText:
……おっと、いかんいかん。
経済誌を買うのが本題だった……

engChrName: So they're promoting the film festival here, huh? This store's always got something interesting going on.
engSearchText:
So they're promoting the film festival here, huh?
This store's always got something interesting
going on.
jpnChrName: まあ、両方買っても問題無いだろう。 コミックは週末にでもまとめて読めば……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、両方買っても問題無いだろう。
コミックは週末にでもまとめて読めば……

engChrName: I'm supposed to be researching material for today's investment briefing at the Verne Company, but I can afford to take a quick breather.
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to be researching material for today's
investment briefing at the Verne Company, but I can
afford to take a quick breather.
jpnChrName: 何やら事態を打破するための動きがあると聞きます、 避難民はこちらでお任せください。
jpnSearchText:
何やら事態を打破するための動きがあると聞きます、
避難民はこちらでお任せください。

engChrName: No harm in taking in a little of the festival vibe with some light reading since I can't enjoy it in person.
engSearchText:
No harm in taking in a little of the festival vibe with
some light reading since I can't enjoy it in person.
jpnChrName: 場所を提供できるだけでも、 お役に立てるなら光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
場所を提供できるだけでも、
お役に立てるなら光栄です。

engChrName: Nothing like having a smoke while reading some comics after a long day at work.
engSearchText:
Nothing like having a smoke while reading some
comics after a long day at work.
jpnChrName: ただ、今回の事件で心に傷を負った方も いるでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、今回の事件で心に傷を負った方も
いるでしょうし……

engChrName: I never buy business magazines because they make me think about work. I read to unwind.
engSearchText:
I never buy business magazines because they make me
think about work. I read to unwind.
jpnChrName: 事態が終息したら、改めて映画の特別上映で 皆さんを慰めたいですね……！
jpnSearchText:
事態が終息したら、改めて映画の特別上映で
皆さんを慰めたいですね……！

engChrName: All right. It's time for me to head home... Wait, what? It's already THAT late?!
engSearchText:
All right. It's time for me to head home...
Wait, what? It's already THAT late?!
jpnChrName: あまりに想定外の事が多過ぎて、私もまだ 頭が混乱していますが……
jpnSearchText:
あまりに想定外の事が多過ぎて、私もまだ
頭が混乱していますが……

engChrName: Ugh. I always lose track of time when I get invested in a good comic magazine...
engSearchText:
Ugh. I always lose track of time when I get invested
in a good comic magazine...
jpnChrName: 映画館の広いスペースを避難所として 提供できて幸いです……
jpnSearchText:
映画館の広いスペースを避難所として
提供できて幸いです……

engChrName: I should buy a business magazine to see what's going on with the economy. I heard there's an op-ed from Walter Huckberry this week in—
engSearchText:
I should buy a business magazine to see what's going
on with the economy. I heard there's an op-ed from
Walter Huckberry this week in—
jpnChrName: それにしても……まさかこんな、ホラー映画より 怖ろしい事が現実になるだなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……まさかこんな、ホラー映画より
怖ろしい事が現実になるだなんて……！

engChrName: Wait. Is that a new volume of 'Tales of Bravery'?!
engSearchText: Wait. Is that a new volume of 'Tales of Bravery'?!
jpnChrName: にわかには信じ難いですが……今は状況を 受け入れるしかないのでしょうね……
jpnSearchText:
にわかには信じ難いですが……今は状況を
受け入れるしかないのでしょうね……

engChrName: I haven't kept up with that series lately. I wonder how long this new one's been out?
engSearchText:
I haven't kept up with that series lately. I wonder how
long this new one's been out?
jpnChrName: 記念祭のイベント上映という事で、 多くの映画を改めて上映しています。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭のイベント上映という事で、
多くの映画を改めて上映しています。

engChrName: Looks like they've put out ten volumes so far. I think I'll buy the full set.
engSearchText:
Looks like they've put out ten volumes so far. I think
I'll buy the full set.
jpnChrName: いかがですか？　街を回るついでに 映画を見ていかれるのは。
jpnSearchText:
いかがですか？　街を回るついでに
映画を見ていかれるのは。

engChrName: Crap. What am I saying? I came here to buy a business magazine!
engSearchText:
Crap. What am I saying? I came here to buy a
business magazine!
jpnChrName: 大切な人と盛り上がるのも 一興だと思いますよ？
jpnSearchText:
大切な人と盛り上がるのも
一興だと思いますよ？

engChrName: But who says I can't buy both? I'll just pick up these comics and blast through them this weekend.
engSearchText:
But who says I can't buy both? I'll just pick up these
comics and blast through them this weekend.
jpnChrName: それにしても、革命記念祭が近いからか…… 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』の人気が改めて凄いですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、革命記念祭が近いからか……
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』の人気が改めて凄いですね。

engChrName: I've heard that people are working to resolve the present crisis. We'll do our part by looking after the evacuees.
engSearchText:
I've heard that people are working to resolve the
present crisis. We'll do our part by looking after
the evacuees.
jpnChrName: 公開直後に迫る動員数だったんですよ、 今日なんて……
jpnSearchText:
公開直後に迫る動員数だったんですよ、
今日なんて……

engChrName: We're just happy that we can offer refuge to people who need it.
engSearchText:
We're just happy that we can offer refuge to people
who need it.
jpnChrName: やっぱり皆さん、これを機に自分の国について 詳しく知りたいと思ったという事でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり皆さん、これを機に自分の国について
詳しく知りたいと思ったという事でしょうか。

engChrName: That being said, I know there are people out there who are hurting as a result of what's happening.
engSearchText:
That being said, I know there are people out there
who are hurting as a result of what's happening.
jpnChrName: 公開前は議論もありましたが、今では歴史考証や 政治的テーマのバランスも評価されていますし。
jpnSearchText:
公開前は議論もありましたが、今では歴史考証や
政治的テーマのバランスも評価されていますし。

engChrName: Once this is all over, I'd like to put on a special showing for them. I think that'll help everyone feel better.
engSearchText:
Once this is all over, I'd like to put on a special
showing for them. I think that'll help everyone
feel better.
jpnChrName: 平穏な日常が……心置きなく映画を楽しめる 日常が戻ってきて本当に良かったですね……！
jpnSearchText:
平穏な日常が……心置きなく映画を楽しめる
日常が戻ってきて本当に良かったですね……！

engChrName: My mind is in a frenzy right now. There's so much going on, and I'm totally overwhelmed...
engSearchText:
My mind is in a frenzy right now. There's so much
going on, and I'm totally overwhelmed...
jpnChrName: 『雨と僕の物語』も、予定通りに今週の 封切りをする事が出来ました！
jpnSearchText:
『雨と僕の物語』も、予定通りに今週の
封切りをする事が出来ました！

engChrName: But at least we can all use this place as a safe haven from the current crisis.
engSearchText:
But at least we can all use this place as a safe haven
from the current crisis.
jpnChrName: 映画業界も、あの状況で新作を発表するのは 自粛すべきかと揉めていたらしいですが……
jpnSearchText:
映画業界も、あの状況で新作を発表するのは
自粛すべきかと揉めていたらしいですが……

engChrName: It's like we're all in a horror movie... No, this is FAR more terrifying than any horror film I've seen!
engSearchText:
It's like we're all in a horror movie... No, this is FAR
more terrifying than any horror film I've seen!
jpnChrName: これで今まで通りに、新しい作品を 楽しめる日々に戻ったという事でしょうか！
jpnSearchText:
これで今まで通りに、新しい作品を
楽しめる日々に戻ったという事でしょうか！

engChrName: I'm scared, but...we'll just have to tough it out and make the best of the situation.
engSearchText:
I'm scared, but...we'll just have to tough it out and
make the best of the situation.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村……映画でも撮影に何度か使われていて、 その筋では有名なんですが……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村……映画でも撮影に何度か使われていて、
その筋では有名なんですが……

engChrName: We're showing a wide array of movies to commemorate the festival.
engSearchText:
We're showing a wide array of movies to
commemorate the festival.
jpnChrName: まさかあんな事になるなんて…… 詳しい事は分からないけど、とにかく許せません！
jpnSearchText:
まさかあんな事になるなんて……
詳しい事は分からないけど、とにかく許せません！

engChrName: Why not stay and enjoy one yourself? Or you could enjoy one with that special someone.
engSearchText:
Why not stay and enjoy one yourself? Or you could
enjoy one with that special someone.
jpnChrName: せめてもの救いは……あの村の美しさが、 映像に残っている事でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
せめてもの救いは……あの村の美しさが、
映像に残っている事でしょうか……

engChrName: After all, there's nothing like taking in a good movie with equally good company!
engSearchText:
After all, there's nothing like taking in a good movie
with equally good company!
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに非常事態宣言が出ていますが 映画は平常通りに上映しております。
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに非常事態宣言が出ていますが
映画は平常通りに上映しております。

engChrName: Ticket sales for Gloria: Dawn of the Revolution have been through the roof lately.
engSearchText:
Ticket sales for Gloria: Dawn of the Revolution have
been through the roof lately.
jpnChrName: 不謹慎ではないかという意見もありましたが、 やはり人々を元気づけるためという事で……
jpnSearchText:
不謹慎ではないかという意見もありましたが、
やはり人々を元気づけるためという事で……

engChrName: They're almost as high as the opening weekend numbers, which is kind of insane.
engSearchText:
They're almost as high as the opening weekend
numbers, which is kind of insane.
jpnChrName: 不安な方も多いですが、少しでも映画を通じて 前向きに持ち直して頂ければ幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
不安な方も多いですが、少しでも映画を通じて
前向きに持ち直して頂ければ幸いです。

engChrName: It's probably because of the festival. People must want to learn more about their country and its history.
engSearchText:
It's probably because of the festival. People must want
to learn more about their country and its history.
jpnChrName: 今週より封切りの夜間上映作品は 『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』です。
jpnSearchText:
今週より封切りの夜間上映作品は
『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』です。

engChrName: Despite the controversy prior to its premiere, it's well regarded for its historical authenticity and political theming.
engSearchText:
Despite the controversy prior to its premiere, it's well
regarded for its historical authenticity and
political theming.
jpnChrName: ある登山家の手記が元になったノンフィクションで、 実際に山で再現映像を撮ったらしいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ある登山家の手記が元になったノンフィクションで、
実際に山で再現映像を撮ったらしいですね。

engChrName: It's a relief that Edith's back to its peaceful self. People can now enjoy our movies without fear and anxiety weighing on their minds!
engSearchText:
It's a relief that Edith's back to its peaceful self.
People can now enjoy our movies without fear and
anxiety weighing on their minds!
jpnChrName: 登山家さんのナレーションも入っていて、 リアリティというか生々しさが凄くて……！
jpnSearchText:
登山家さんのナレーションも入っていて、
リアリティというか生々しさが凄くて……！

engChrName: In fact, we were able to premiere Rainfall this week like we had originally planned. I'm so glad we were able to make that work.
engSearchText:
In fact, we were able to premiere Rainfall this week
like we had originally planned. I'm so glad we were
able to make that work.
jpnChrName: ただまあ、命がけの厳しい山が舞台なので…… ハイキング感覚で真似するのはお勧めしませんが。
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ、命がけの厳しい山が舞台なので……
ハイキング感覚で真似するのはお勧めしませんが。

engChrName: I hear there's been debate within the film industry as to whether studios should hold off on announcing new releases.
engSearchText:
I hear there's been debate within the film industry as
to whether studios should hold off on announcing
new releases.
jpnChrName: こほん、例の噂…… 世間では大分騒がれているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
こほん、例の噂……
世間では大分騒がれているようですね。

engChrName: But with that whole thing behind us, I hope more films will be hitting theaters before long.
engSearchText:
But with that whole thing behind us, I hope more
films will be hitting theaters before long.
jpnChrName: ですが私たちは何も── 舞台挨拶などでいらっしゃる事はありますが。
jpnSearchText:
ですが私たちは何も──
舞台挨拶などでいらっしゃる事はありますが。

engChrName: Creil Village was a common shooting location for films. And now it's gone...
engSearchText:
Creil Village was a common shooting location
for films. And now it's gone...
jpnChrName: 女優さんと直接の面識が あるわけでもありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
女優さんと直接の面識が
あるわけでもありませんしね。

engChrName: We might not have all the facts, but one thing's for certain: it's absolutely despicable!
engSearchText:
We might not have all the facts, but one thing's for
certain: it's absolutely despicable!
jpnChrName: 所属事務所でもないですし 正直答えようがありませんよ……
jpnSearchText:
所属事務所でもないですし
正直答えようがありませんよ……

engChrName: At least its beauty has been preserved in film...but I know that can't replace what's been lost.
engSearchText:
At least its beauty has been preserved in film...but I
know that can't replace what's been lost.
jpnChrName: ちなみに今週の上映作品で話題なのはやはり、 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ～運命の五月革命～』ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに今週の上映作品で話題なのはやはり、
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ～運命の五月革命～』ですね。

engChrName: I should mention that despite the state of emergency, we're continuing to show movies as usual.
engSearchText:
I should mention that despite the state of emergency,
we're continuing to show movies as usual.
jpnChrName: まあ、シーナ役を東方系の方が演じる事には 当初は賛否両論があったようではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、シーナ役を東方系の方が演じる事には
当初は賛否両論があったようではありますが……

engChrName: Some have argued that doing so is in poor taste, but we want to help keep people's spirits up in these difficult times.
engSearchText:
Some have argued that doing so is in poor taste, but
we want to help keep people's spirits up in these
difficult times.
jpnChrName: 流石は最優秀女優賞受賞者のニナ・フェンリィです、 その演技力で今では総じて高評価なようですね。
jpnSearchText:
流石は最優秀女優賞受賞者のニナ・フェンリィです、
その演技力で今では総じて高評価なようですね。

engChrName: People are scared out of their minds right now. If they can come away from one of our movies with a better outlook, then we've done our job.
engSearchText:
People are scared out of their minds right now.
If they can come away from one of our movies with a
better outlook, then we've done our job.
jpnChrName: 私も観ましたが、役に入り切って彼女自身が どうであるとか全く感じないほどでしたよ！
jpnSearchText:
私も観ましたが、役に入り切って彼女自身が
どうであるとか全く感じないほどでしたよ！

engChrName: This week, the film that we're premiering for our nighttime showings is Climber's Story.
engSearchText:
This week, the film that we're premiering for our
nighttime showings is Climber's Story.
jpnChrName: 『ゴールデンブラッド』の『完全版』…… 改めて上映開始となります。
jpnSearchText:
『ゴールデンブラッド』の『完全版』……
改めて上映開始となります。

engChrName: It's a documentary that recreates the events of a mountain climber's memoir.
engSearchText:
It's a documentary that recreates the events of a
mountain climber's memoir.
jpnChrName: 一時は過激すぎるとの苦情も入り上映を見合わせて おりましたが……表現の自由最優先と言う事で。
jpnSearchText:
一時は過激すぎるとの苦情も入り上映を見合わせて
おりましたが……表現の自由最優先と言う事で。
