engChrName: It was filmed on a real mountain and also features narration from the mountaineer who wrote the original story. Isn't that cool?!
engSearchText:
It was filmed on a real mountain and also features
narration from the mountaineer who wrote the
original story. Isn't that cool?!
jpnChrName: ちなみに、本来ゴッチ監督はこれ以上の過激さを 目指していたとの話で……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、本来ゴッチ監督はこれ以上の過激さを
目指していたとの話で……

engChrName: However, given that it takes place on such a dangerous mountain, I wouldn't recommend trying to replicate any of the feats captured in the movie.
engSearchText:
However, given that it takes place on such a
dangerous mountain, I wouldn't recommend trying to
replicate any of the feats captured in the movie.
jpnChrName: 配給会社とジュディス・ランスター所属事務所の 説得によって、この水準に落ち着いたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
配給会社とジュディス・ランスター所属事務所の
説得によって、この水準に落ち着いたそうですね。

engChrName: There's a rumor going around about a particular actress. It's caused quite the stir around the city.
engSearchText:
There's a rumor going around about a
particular actress. It's caused quite the stir around
the city.
jpnChrName: 他には一部のホラー好きの間で話題になっていた 『ミッドナイト・メモリーズ』も今週からですね。
jpnSearchText:
他には一部のホラー好きの間で話題になっていた
『ミッドナイト・メモリーズ』も今週からですね。

engChrName: I don't really know much about the situation.
engSearchText: I don't really know much about the situation.
jpnChrName: 低予算ですが、所謂“モキュメンタリー”ならではの 臨場感がなかなか凄くてですね……
jpnSearchText:
低予算ですが、所謂“モキュメンタリー”ならではの
臨場感がなかなか凄くてですね……

engChrName: We do sometimes greet the actress in question, but it's not as though we're acquainted with her.
engSearchText:
We do sometimes greet the actress in question, but
it's not as though we're acquainted with her.
jpnChrName: 中には本当の心霊記録映像じゃないかなんて 言い出す人もちらほらいるくらいで。
jpnSearchText:
中には本当の心霊記録映像じゃないかなんて
言い出す人もちらほらいるくらいで。

engChrName: So I can't say whether it's true or not. We just don't know any of the facts.
engSearchText:
So I can't say whether it's true or not. We just don't
know any of the facts.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の裏でギャスパー氏が亡くなられていた件、 改めて情報が少しずつ出てきたようですね……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の裏でギャスパー氏が亡くなられていた件、
改めて情報が少しずつ出てきたようですね……

engChrName: On another note, we're showing Gloria: Dawn of the Revolution this week. Shocker, I know.
engSearchText:
On another note, we're showing Gloria: Dawn of the
Revolution this week. Shocker, I know.
jpnChrName: あの直後は情報が伏せられていて、業界も幾分かは 混乱しましたが……今は落ち着きつつあります。
jpnSearchText:
あの直後は情報が伏せられていて、業界も幾分かは
混乱しましたが……今は落ち着きつつあります。

engChrName: The casting of Sheena Dirke was controversial when it was announced. Some weren't keen on an Eastern woman playing the lead role.
engSearchText:
The casting of Sheena Dirke was controversial when
it was announced. Some weren't keen on an Eastern
woman playing the lead role.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムも、今こそ活動を停止していますが 近々新しい社長を迎えて再出発できるようで。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムも、今こそ活動を停止していますが
近々新しい社長を迎えて再出発できるようで。

engChrName: But any doubts were firmly laid to rest in light of Nina Fenly's acclaimed performance.
engSearchText:
But any doubts were firmly laid to rest in light of
Nina Fenly's acclaimed performance.
jpnChrName: やはりゴッチ監督の人気もあるのでしょうね、 再建のための支援もそれなりに集まったとか。
jpnSearchText:
やはりゴッチ監督の人気もあるのでしょうね、
再建のための支援もそれなりに集まったとか。

engChrName: She immersed herself in that role so thoroughly. It's little wonder she won best actress!
engSearchText:
She immersed herself in that role so thoroughly.
It's little wonder she won best actress!
jpnChrName: ところで『パーフェクト・ドライバー２』が いよいよ封切りされましたね、早くも大人気です！
jpnSearchText:
ところで『パーフェクト・ドライバー２』が
いよいよ封切りされましたね、早くも大人気です！

engChrName: We've decided to once again screen Golden Blood... Director's Cut.
engSearchText:
We've decided to once again screen Golden Blood...
Director's Cut.
jpnChrName: 前作の人気もあるのでしょうが、ゲスト出演者の 人気も影響しているのでしょうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
前作の人気もあるのでしょうが、ゲスト出演者の
人気も影響しているのでしょうねぇ。

engChrName: After receiving complaints about its...content, we initially put it on hold. However, we believe in freedom of expression, so it's back now.
engSearchText:
After receiving complaints about its...content, we
initially put it on hold. However, we believe in
freedom of expression, so it's back now.
jpnChrName: それに、最優秀監督賞受賞作品の『狼達の鎮魂歌』！ あの作品もいよいよリバイバル上映開始です！
jpnSearchText:
それに、最優秀監督賞受賞作品の『狼達の鎮魂歌』！
あの作品もいよいよリバイバル上映開始です！

engChrName: As the story goes, Director Salvatore Gotti sought to make a more extreme film than what ultimately came out.
engSearchText:
As the story goes, Director Salvatore Gotti sought to
make a more extreme film than what ultimately
came out.
jpnChrName: 夜限定にはなりますが、日中上映の作品にも 劣らない客入りは流石ですねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
夜限定にはなりますが、日中上映の作品にも
劣らない客入りは流石ですねぇ！

engChrName: However, after some persuasion from the film's distributor and Judith Lanster's talent agency, he dialed it back for the original release.
engSearchText:
However, after some persuasion from the film's
distributor and Judith Lanster's talent agency, he
dialed it back for the original release.
jpnChrName: こんばんは、レイトショーの映画ですが、 残念ながら今週は新作はありません。
jpnSearchText:
こんばんは、レイトショーの映画ですが、
残念ながら今週は新作はありません。

engChrName: We've also begun to show Midnight Memories as of this week. That film has attracted some attention among a subset of horror fans.
engSearchText:
We've also begun to show Midnight Memories as of
this week. That film has attracted some attention
among a subset of horror fans.
jpnChrName: ですが、映画祭の各賞を記念してのリバイバル上映も 夜間に行う予定ですので、ご期待いただければと。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、映画祭の各賞を記念してのリバイバル上映も
夜間に行う予定ですので、ご期待いただければと。

engChrName: I must say, in spite of its low budget, the sense of immersion that comes from its mockumentary framing is rather incredible.
engSearchText:
I must say, in spite of its low budget, the sense of
immersion that comes from its mockumentary
framing is rather incredible.
jpnChrName: どの映画が受賞するにせよ、受賞するだけの映画です。 是非とも夜間のリバイバル上映を観て下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
どの映画が受賞するにせよ、受賞するだけの映画です。
是非とも夜間のリバイバル上映を観て下さいね。

engChrName: Some viewers have even asked if it was a recording of actual spirits that were found in the real world.
engSearchText:
Some viewers have even asked if it was a recording of
actual spirits that were found in the real world.
jpnChrName: もうすぐ映画祭ですね、やはりと言うべきか 『ゴールデンブラッド』は注目されています。
jpnSearchText:
もうすぐ映画祭ですね、やはりと言うべきか
『ゴールデンブラッド』は注目されています。

engChrName: More and more information is beginning to trickle out about the death of President Gaspard Dillon before the Tharbad Film Festival.
engSearchText:
More and more information is beginning to trickle
out about the death of President Gaspard Dillon
before the Tharbad Film Festival.
jpnChrName: 他には対抗馬の『狼達の鎮魂歌』や、ゲストが 話題の『パーフェクトドライバー２』も……
jpnSearchText:
他には対抗馬の『狼達の鎮魂歌』や、ゲストが
話題の『パーフェクトドライバー２』も……

engChrName: In the immediate aftermath, details about it were suppressed, which sent the industry into disarray. Thankfully, things are subsiding now.
engSearchText:
In the immediate aftermath, details about it were
suppressed, which sent the industry into disarray.
Thankfully, things are subsiding now.
jpnChrName: これは接戦になりそうですね、やはりメッセルダムの 映画祭とは違った傾向の作品が受賞するのか……
jpnSearchText:
これは接戦になりそうですね、やはりメッセルダムの
映画祭とは違った傾向の作品が受賞するのか……

engChrName: Although Vegas Films continues to be shut down for now, it looks to be only a matter of time before they bring on a new president and resume work.
engSearchText:
Although Vegas Films continues to be shut down for
now, it looks to be only a matter of time before they
bring on a new president and resume work.
jpnChrName: 映画祭ノミネート作品ではないですが、 今週から公開の『百花王』もお勧めですよ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭ノミネート作品ではないですが、
今週から公開の『百花王』もお勧めですよ。

engChrName: I imagine Salvatore Gotti's popularity as a director went a long way toward garnering the support needed to rebuild the company.
engSearchText:
I imagine Salvatore Gotti's popularity as a director
went a long way toward garnering the support needed
to rebuild the company.
jpnChrName: 東方の古い国をモチーフにした武侠アクションで、 エキゾチックな雰囲気が好みな方も多いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
東方の古い国をモチーフにした武侠アクションで、
エキゾチックな雰囲気が好みな方も多いですよ。

engChrName: At long last, Perfect Driver 2 had its big premiere, and it's already a hit.
engSearchText:
At long last, Perfect Driver 2 had its big premiere,
and it's already a hit.
jpnChrName: 東方人の知人が言うには、不快になるような 変な偏見も特に入っていないそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
東方人の知人が言うには、不快になるような
変な偏見も特に入っていないそうですね。

engChrName: The previous movie was certainly popular as well, but a certain guest appearance in this new one is probably to thank for its big reception.
engSearchText:
The previous movie was certainly popular as well, but
a certain guest appearance in this new one is probably
to thank for its big reception.
jpnChrName: あら……そのお客様でしたら、 確かに先程いらっしゃいましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
あら……そのお客様でしたら、
確かに先程いらっしゃいましたよ。

engChrName: I should also mention we're now re-running Wolves' Requiem as well. That's the movie that won the award for best direction.
engSearchText:
I should also mention we're now re-running Wolves'
Requiem as well. That's the movie that won the
award for best direction.
jpnChrName: ですが、どうやら観たい映画の上映時間が 終わってしまっていたようでして……
jpnSearchText:
ですが、どうやら観たい映画の上映時間が
終わってしまっていたようでして……

engChrName: Despite only being shown at night, it is drawing in audiences as large as our daytime showings, which speaks volumes about its quality.
engSearchText:
Despite only being shown at night, it is drawing in
audiences as large as our daytime showings, which
speaks volumes about its quality.
jpnChrName: 肩を落として、帰ってしまわれました。
jpnSearchText: 肩を落として、帰ってしまわれました。

engChrName: Good evening! If you're wondering about our late-night showings, I'm sorry to say that we don't have any new additions for this week.
engSearchText:
Good evening! If you're wondering about our
late-night showings, I'm sorry to say that we don't
have any new additions for this week.
jpnChrName: なんつうか、ツイてねえ奴だな……
jpnSearchText: なんつうか、ツイてねえ奴だな……

engChrName: However, you can look forward to us re-running any award winners that emerge from the Tharbad Film Festival. We'll be playing those at night.
engSearchText:
However, you can look forward to us re-running any
award winners that emerge from the Tharbad
Film Festival. We'll be playing those at night.
jpnChrName: お客様もそんな事を仰っていましたよ。 『俺ってヤツはいつもこうだ』と……
jpnSearchText:
お客様もそんな事を仰っていましたよ。
『俺ってヤツはいつもこうだ』と……

engChrName: Simply receiving an award is monumental for a film in and of itself, let alone what kind. We hope you'll watch them once they're available.
engSearchText:
Simply receiving an award is monumental for a film
in and of itself, let alone what kind. We hope you'll
watch them once they're available.
jpnChrName: 後それに、少し気になる事も 呟いていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
後それに、少し気になる事も
呟いていましたね。

engChrName: The Tharbad Film Festival is almost here! When it comes to award nominees, all eyes are on Salvatore Gotti's Golden Blood at the moment.
engSearchText:
The Tharbad Film Festival is almost here! When it
comes to award nominees, all eyes are on Salvatore
Gotti's Golden Blood at the moment.
jpnChrName: 気になる事っつうとなんだ？
jpnSearchText: 気になる事っつうとなんだ？

engChrName: However, Wolves' Requiem and Perfect Driver 2 are major contenders as well. The latter's guest appearance had audiences buzzing.
engSearchText:
However, Wolves' Requiem and Perfect Driver 2 are
major contenders as well. The latter's guest
appearance had audiences buzzing.
jpnChrName: ええと、それが……苦労して 手に入れたヤツを無くしてしまった、と。
jpnSearchText:
ええと、それが……苦労して
手に入れたヤツを無くしてしまった、と。

engChrName: It's shaping up to be a close competition, albeit one skewing differently compared to what dominates Messeldam's festival.
engSearchText:
It's shaping up to be a close competition, albeit one
skewing differently compared to what dominates
Messeldam's festival.
jpnChrName: こうなったら、もう手っ取り早く 楽に終わらせちまおう、と言ってました。
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら、もう手っ取り早く
楽に終わらせちまおう、と言ってました。

engChrName: Although it's not up for any nominations, I'd also highly recommend The Peony Blade, which started showing this week.
engSearchText:
Although it's not up for any nominations, I'd also
highly recommend The Peony Blade, which started
showing this week.
jpnChrName: ははあ……なるほどな。 ありがとな、助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ははあ……なるほどな。
ありがとな、助かったぜ。

engChrName: It's a martial arts film set in an old Eastern country. That movie has attracted a large swath of fans thanks to its exotic atmosphere.
engSearchText:
It's a martial arts film set in an old Eastern country.
That movie has attracted a large swath of fans thanks
to its exotic atmosphere.
jpnChrName: （何となく予想しちゃいたが……   これで奴さんの目的が見えて来たな。）
jpnSearchText:
（何となく予想しちゃいたが……
これで奴さんの目的が見えて来たな。）

engChrName: And, in case you were wondering, an Eastern acquaintance assures me that it doesn't have any uncomfortable, prejudicial content, either.
engSearchText:
And, in case you were wondering, an Eastern
acquaintance assures me that it doesn't have any
uncomfortable, prejudicial content, either.
jpnChrName: （ここまで来たら、尚更先を急いだほうが良いか。）
jpnSearchText: （ここまで来たら、尚更先を急いだほうが良いか。）

engChrName: Oh, yes, I remember him. He was here earlier.
engSearchText: Oh, yes, I remember him. He was here earlier.
jpnChrName: （しかし、手っ取り早く   楽に終わらせる方法ねえ……）
jpnSearchText:
（しかし、手っ取り早く
楽に終わらせる方法ねえ……）

engChrName: Unfortunately, he's gone now.
engSearchText: Unfortunately, he's gone now.
jpnChrName: （今の時間ならアレの本数も増えてるはずだ。   それを狙ってる可能性は高そうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（今の時間ならアレの本数も増えてるはずだ。
それを狙ってる可能性は高そうだな。）

engChrName: The movie he wanted to see was no longer playing today, so he left. He appeared rather dejected.
engSearchText:
The movie he wanted to see was no longer playing
today, so he left. He appeared rather dejected.
jpnChrName: （ちょうどカフェの前から地下に降りれたはずだ。   急いで向かってみるかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ちょうどカフェの前から地下に降りれたはずだ。
急いで向かってみるかね。）

engChrName: Got'cha. This guy's a hard one to track down. Anything else you can tell me about him?
engSearchText:
Got'cha. This guy's a hard one to track down.
Anything else you can tell me about him?
jpnChrName: こんばんは、夜の時間帯には日中とは また違った作品を上映しております。
jpnSearchText:
こんばんは、夜の時間帯には日中とは
また違った作品を上映しております。

engChrName: Certainly. Before he left, I remember him saying something like, 'This always happens to me...'
engSearchText:
Certainly. Before he left, I remember him saying
something like, 'This always happens to me...'
jpnChrName: 上映中の作品ですと、映画祭にもノミネートされた 『ソバーキュリアス』が一番のお勧めですが……
jpnSearchText:
上映中の作品ですと、映画祭にもノミネートされた
『ソバーキュリアス』が一番のお勧めですが……

engChrName: I also heard him mutter something that sounded somewhat...concerning.
engSearchText:
I also heard him mutter something that sounded
somewhat...concerning.
jpnChrName: 『天国のこちら側』も低予算ながら、医療従事者の 葛藤が綿密に描かれ、人気があるようですね。
jpnSearchText:
『天国のこちら側』も低予算ながら、医療従事者の
葛藤が綿密に描かれ、人気があるようですね。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? What'd he say?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? What'd he say?
jpnChrName: シネマ・エスプリへご来場ありがとうございます。 映画チケットの発券はこちらで承っています。
jpnSearchText:
シネマ・エスプリへご来場ありがとうございます。
映画チケットの発券はこちらで承っています。

engChrName: I believe he mentioned feeling frustrated about losing something he'd gone to great lengths to attain.
engSearchText:
I believe he mentioned feeling frustrated about losing
something he'd gone to great lengths to attain.
jpnChrName: へぇ……先にここでチケットを買って 映像を観るんですか……！
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……先にここでチケットを買って
映像を観るんですか……！

engChrName: And that...he'd be better off putting an end to everything as soon as possible so he could finally be at ease.
engSearchText:
And that...he'd be better off putting an end to
everything as soon as possible so he could finally be
at ease.
jpnChrName: ああ、座席指定と入場確認のためにな。 列車のチケットと同じと思っていい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、座席指定と入場確認のためにな。
列車のチケットと同じと思っていい。

engChrName: Ah. Yeah, that definitely qualifies as concerning. Thanks for fillin' me in.
engSearchText:
Ah. Yeah, that definitely qualifies as concerning.
Thanks for fillin' me in.
jpnChrName: おや、そちらのお嬢さんは映画館は初めてですか？ 最近は中東でも普及していると聞きますが……
jpnSearchText:
おや、そちらのお嬢さんは映画館は初めてですか？
最近は中東でも普及していると聞きますが……

engChrName: (That just about confirms my suspicions.)
engSearchText: (That just about confirms my suspicions.)
jpnChrName: 故郷が辺境の方で……あ、でも作戦の 記録映像みたいなものだと聞きました！
jpnSearchText:
故郷が辺境の方で……あ、でも作戦の
記録映像みたいなものだと聞きました！

engChrName: (All the more reason to hurry up and find him.)
engSearchText: (All the more reason to hurry up and find him.)
jpnChrName: そ、そうですねぇ、それを言うなら演劇の 記録映像と言ったところでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですねぇ、それを言うなら演劇の
記録映像と言ったところでしょうか。

engChrName: (Only question is how exactly does he plan to put an end to things? I guess there's always THAT...)
engSearchText:
(Only question is how exactly does he plan to put an
end to things? I guess there's always THAT...)
jpnChrName: お嬢さんくらいの方に人気の作品もありますし 初心者向けの作品もご案内出来ますよ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんくらいの方に人気の作品もありますし
初心者向けの作品もご案内出来ますよ。

engChrName: (Those things should be running at this hour. I'd say chances are good that's what he's gonna try for.)
engSearchText:
(Those things should be running at this hour. I'd say
chances are good that's what he's gonna try for.)
jpnChrName: もし観る映画に迷われたら、お勧め作品も お教えできますので遠慮なくご相談くださいね。
jpnSearchText:
もし観る映画に迷われたら、お勧め作品も
お教えできますので遠慮なくご相談くださいね。

engChrName: (Most likely, he headed straight underground after leaving the theater. Better make a beeline for it.)
engSearchText:
(Most likely, he headed straight underground after
leaving the theater. Better make a beeline for it.)
jpnChrName: はいっ、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Good evening! You might be interested to hear that we show different movies here during the day and at night.
engSearchText:
Good evening! You might be interested to hear that
we show different movies here during the day and
at night.
jpnChrName: ただいま上映中の作品ですと、やはり 『ゴールデンブラッド』が特に人気ですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ただいま上映中の作品ですと、やはり
『ゴールデンブラッド』が特に人気ですねぇ。

engChrName: My top recommendation would be Sober Curious, which received a nomination at the Tharbad Film Festival.
engSearchText:
My top recommendation would be Sober Curious,
which received a nomination at the Tharbad
Film Festival.
jpnChrName: 派手なシーンも多いですが、アクションの迫力や 話のテンポの良さは多くの方に好評なようで。
jpnSearchText:
派手なシーンも多いですが、アクションの迫力や
話のテンポの良さは多くの方に好評なようで。

engChrName: This Side of Heaven has also found a large audience despite its small budget. People love its intricate portrayal of a medical intern's struggles.
engSearchText:
This Side of Heaven has also found a large audience
despite its small budget. People love its intricate
portrayal of a medical intern's struggles.
jpnChrName: 他ですと……『ソバーキュリアス』の複雑な 内面描写に引き込まれる方も多いようですね。
jpnSearchText:
他ですと……『ソバーキュリアス』の複雑な
内面描写に引き込まれる方も多いようですね。

engChrName: Welcome to Esprit Cinema. If you're looking to purchase tickets, I'd be more than happy to help you.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Esprit Cinema. If you're looking to
purchase tickets, I'd be more than happy to help you.
jpnChrName: ……多くの方が、何か事態の打開に向けて 動いていると聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
……多くの方が、何か事態の打開に向けて
動いていると聞きます。

engChrName: Wait, so you buy your tickets first and then you watch the movie? I never would've guessed!
engSearchText:
Wait, so you buy your tickets first and then you watch
the movie? I never would've guessed!
jpnChrName: 彼らの成功を信じたいですが……やはり、 何があるかわからないのも事実ですしな。
jpnSearchText:
彼らの成功を信じたいですが……やはり、
何があるかわからないのも事実ですしな。

engChrName: They do that so you can reserve a seat and also know which auditorium your movie will be playing in. Pretty much like hoppin' on a train.
engSearchText:
They do that so you can reserve a seat and also know
which auditorium your movie will be playing in.
Pretty much like hoppin' on a train.
jpnChrName: 通信が回復し、各所の状況も掴めてきたところです、 必要に応じて更に避難者を受け入れます。
jpnSearchText:
通信が回復し、各所の状況も掴めてきたところです、
必要に応じて更に避難者を受け入れます。

engChrName: Oh, is this your first time coming to a movie theater, miss? Interesting. I thought films were becoming more common in the Central East.
engSearchText:
Oh, is this your first time coming to a movie
theater, miss? Interesting. I thought films were
becoming more common in the Central East.
jpnChrName: この映画館は広いだけでなく頑丈です、 少しでも多くの方を収容できれば……
jpnSearchText:
この映画館は広いだけでなく頑丈です、
少しでも多くの方を収容できれば……

engChrName: Well, I grew up in a pretty remote place, so I haven't seen any movies before. I heard they're like combat recordings.
engSearchText:
Well, I grew up in a pretty remote place, so I haven't
seen any movies before. I heard they're like
combat recordings.
jpnChrName: ……多くの方々を収容できた事は 幸いですがこの先どうなるか……
jpnSearchText:
……多くの方々を収容できた事は
幸いですがこの先どうなるか……

engChrName: O-Oh, that's a...unique comparison. I suppose that's true, in a way. You can think of films as theatrical plays in recorded form.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, that's a...unique comparison. I suppose that's
true, in a way. You can think of films as theatrical
plays in recorded form.
jpnChrName: いえ、我々が不安がっていてはなりませんな。
jpnSearchText: いえ、我々が不安がっていてはなりませんな。

engChrName: Regardless, we certainly have films that are popular with girls your age, as well as ones that are perfect for first-time moviegoers.
engSearchText:
Regardless, we certainly have films that are popular
with girls your age, as well as ones that are perfect for
first-time moviegoers.
jpnChrName: 幸い避難所として映画館は申し分ないはず。 積極的に活用していきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
幸い避難所として映画館は申し分ないはず。
積極的に活用していきましょう。

engChrName: If you're not sure what you'd like to watch, please, don't hesitate to ask me. I'll be more than happy to give you a recommendation.
engSearchText:
If you're not sure what you'd like to watch, please,
don't hesitate to ask me. I'll be more than happy to
give you a recommendation.
jpnChrName: 館内のドリンクスタンドは無料開放致しました。 少しでも皆様の助けになれば……
jpnSearchText:
館内のドリンクスタンドは無料開放致しました。
少しでも皆様の助けになれば……

engChrName: Awesome! Thanks a bunch, ma'am.
engSearchText: Awesome! Thanks a bunch, ma'am.
jpnChrName: 当映画館では毎年、記念祭の日には その年の人気作品を再上映していましてな。
jpnSearchText:
当映画館では毎年、記念祭の日には
その年の人気作品を再上映していましてな。

engChrName: Golden Blood has proven to be an especially big hit with audiences.
engSearchText:
Golden Blood has proven to be an especially big hit
with audiences.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の結果を知った後に改めて観ても 新たな発見があるというものです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の結果を知った後に改めて観ても
新たな発見があるというものです。

engChrName: It has more than its fair share of racy scenes, but the hard-hitting action and lightning-fast pacing of the story have won scores of people over.
engSearchText:
It has more than its fair share of racy scenes, but the
hard-hitting action and lightning-fast pacing of the
story have won scores of people over.
jpnChrName: しかも、今年は例年以上に記念祭を見に いらした外国の方も多い模様。
jpnSearchText:
しかも、今年は例年以上に記念祭を見に
いらした外国の方も多い模様。

engChrName: Many people have also found themselves drawn to Sober Curious due to the complex inner workings of its main character.
engSearchText:
Many people have also found themselves drawn to
Sober Curious due to the complex inner workings of
its main character.
jpnChrName: これを機に、共和国の映画文化に より親しんで欲しいものですな。
jpnSearchText:
これを機に、共和国の映画文化に
より親しんで欲しいものですな。

engChrName: I hear that a number of people are working tirelessly to resolve the ongoing situation.
engSearchText:
I hear that a number of people are working tirelessly
to resolve the ongoing situation.
jpnChrName: そういえば現在、『ゴールデンブラッド』も 通常版・完全版共に再上映をしていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば現在、『ゴールデンブラッド』も
通常版・完全版共に再上映をしていましてね。

engChrName: I really, truly want to believe in their success. However, the truth of the matter is, anything could happen.
engSearchText:
I really, truly want to believe in their success.
However, the truth of the matter is, anything
could happen.
jpnChrName: 今年公開された映画の中でも特に盛り上がった 作品ですしね、一年の締めくくりに良いかと。
jpnSearchText:
今年公開された映画の中でも特に盛り上がった
作品ですしね、一年の締めくくりに良いかと。

engChrName: Still, now that communications are restored, we're prepared to help as many evacuees as we can.
engSearchText:
Still, now that communications are restored, we're
prepared to help as many evacuees as we can.
jpnChrName: 記念祭にはゴッチ監督もいらっしゃると聞きます。 イベントの演出を政府より依頼されたそうで。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭にはゴッチ監督もいらっしゃると聞きます。
イベントの演出を政府より依頼されたそうで。

engChrName: This theater is as sturdy as it is big, thankfully. The more people we can take in, the more lives we can save.
engSearchText:
This theater is as sturdy as it is big, thankfully.
The more people we can take in, the more lives we
can save.
jpnChrName: 監督さえ都合がつけば、当館でも記念祭後の夜に 改めて舞台挨拶などを願いたいものですな。
jpnSearchText:
監督さえ都合がつけば、当館でも記念祭後の夜に
改めて舞台挨拶などを願いたいものですな。

engChrName: I'm glad we've been able to take in as many people as we have. However, I'm worried about what's going to happen—
engSearchText:
I'm glad we've been able to take in as many people as
we have. However, I'm worried about what's going to
happen—
jpnChrName: あれから一週間ですか…… しかしまさかこれほどの寄付が集まるとは。
jpnSearchText:
あれから一週間ですか……
しかしまさかこれほどの寄付が集まるとは。

engChrName: No, I mustn't talk like that. I've got to put on a brave face for everyone here.
engSearchText:
No, I mustn't talk like that. I've got to put on a brave
face for everyone here.
jpnChrName: 当館でも、売り上げを義援金に回すと公表したところ、 結構な数の観客が来て下さって……
jpnSearchText:
当館でも、売り上げを義援金に回すと公表したところ、
結構な数の観客が来て下さって……

engChrName: It's our privilege and honor to serve as an evacuation hub. We'll make the most of our resources so we can all get through this together.
engSearchText:
It's our privilege and honor to serve as an
evacuation hub. We'll make the most of our resources
so we can all get through this together.
jpnChrName: こうした人の強さや思いやりを目の当たりにすると この業界で働いてきて良かったと心底思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
こうした人の強さや思いやりを目の当たりにすると
この業界で働いてきて良かったと心底思いますよ。

engChrName: For the time being, we won't charge anyone for drinks at our stand. Hopefully that'll help put everyone at ease.
engSearchText:
For the time being, we won't charge anyone for
drinks at our stand. Hopefully that'll help put
everyone at ease.
jpnChrName: ところで『雨と僕の物語』も予定通りに 公開できた事ですし、どうぞご覧ください。
jpnSearchText:
ところで『雨と僕の物語』も予定通りに
公開できた事ですし、どうぞご覧ください。

engChrName: Every year, on the day of the Revolution Festival, we have a custom of screening that year's most popular films.
engSearchText:
Every year, on the day of the Revolution Festival, we
have a custom of screening that year's most
popular films.
jpnChrName: 大人になりたての二人の関係を描いた恋愛ドラマで、 心理描写や情景描写がかなり繊細なものでして……
jpnSearchText:
大人になりたての二人の関係を描いた恋愛ドラマで、
心理描写や情景描写がかなり繊細なものでして……

engChrName: It's an opportunity for audiences to gain new insights into these movies, particularly in light of any awards they may have received.
engSearchText:
It's an opportunity for audiences to gain new insights
into these movies, particularly in light of any awards
they may have received.
jpnChrName: 他のいわゆるメロドラマとは一線を画した、 本格的なロマンスの傑作になります。
jpnSearchText:
他のいわゆるメロドラマとは一線を画した、
本格的なロマンスの傑作になります。

engChrName: This year's festival is slated to welcome more visitors from abroad than ever before.
engSearchText:
This year's festival is slated to welcome more visitors
from abroad than ever before.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の事件を受け……映画業界でも、 チャリティなどの動きがありましてな。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の事件を受け……映画業界でも、
チャリティなどの動きがありましてな。

engChrName: I hope that means many more people will learn about Calvard and its cinematic culture.
engSearchText:
I hope that means many more people will learn about
Calvard and its cinematic culture.
jpnChrName: 当館でも、当面の間は売上の一部を 義援金に回す事を決定いたしました。
jpnSearchText:
当館でも、当面の間は売上の一部を
義援金に回す事を決定いたしました。

engChrName: I should mention, we're rescreening Golden Blood. You can watch either the standard release or the director's cut.
engSearchText:
I should mention, we're rescreening Golden Blood.
You can watch either the standard release or the
director's cut.
jpnChrName: 他にも、記憶から消えないよう、クレイユ村の歴史を 綴る映画の企画も提案されているようでして……
jpnSearchText:
他にも、記憶から消えないよう、クレイユ村の歴史を
綴る映画の企画も提案されているようでして……

engChrName: Since it made such an enormous stir, we figured it'd make for a fine way to end this year.
engSearchText:
Since it made such an enormous stir, we figured it'd
make for a fine way to end this year.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村は、黎明期の映画にてある名作の 純愛映画にて舞台になりましてね……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村は、黎明期の映画にてある名作の
純愛映画にて舞台になりましてね……

engChrName: I hear that Salvatore Gotti is going to be at the Revolution Festival. Apparently, the government requested that he personally oversee the event.
engSearchText:
I hear that Salvatore Gotti is going to be at the
Revolution Festival. Apparently, the government
requested that he personally oversee the event.
jpnChrName: あの映画を通じてクレイユ村を知った方もいれば、 映画関係の道に進んだ方も多いもので……
jpnSearchText:
あの映画を通じてクレイユ村を知った方もいれば、
映画関係の道に進んだ方も多いもので……

engChrName: If the circumstances permit, I hope he can pay us and our viewers another visit once the festival is over.
engSearchText:
If the circumstances permit, I hope he can pay us and
our viewers another visit once the festival is over.
jpnChrName: 映画史の視点からしても……多くの方の人生に、 影響を与えた村でした……
jpnSearchText:
映画史の視点からしても……多くの方の人生に、
影響を与えた村でした……

engChrName: Only a week has passed since that horrible event, and we've already amassed an astonishing amount of donations.
engSearchText:
Only a week has passed since that horrible event, and
we've already amassed an astonishing amount
of donations.
jpnChrName: 昼間は例の件への対応もあり、満足に ご案内出来ませんでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
昼間は例の件への対応もあり、満足に
ご案内出来ませんでしたが……

engChrName: As soon as we announced that we'd be donating a portion of our revenue, a good number of people came to visit.
engSearchText:
As soon as we announced that we'd be donating a
portion of our revenue, a good number of people
came to visit.
jpnChrName: 夜ですと、今週の新作は 『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』ですね。
jpnSearchText:
夜ですと、今週の新作は
『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』ですね。

engChrName: Witnessing this level of generosity makes me feel truly grateful that I get to be a part of this industry, humble as it is.
engSearchText:
Witnessing this level of generosity makes me feel
truly grateful that I get to be a part of this industry,
humble as it is.
jpnChrName: こちらは手記を元にした半ドキュメンタリー作品で、 他の映画とは違った雰囲気や見方が楽しめるかと。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは手記を元にした半ドキュメンタリー作品で、
他の映画とは違った雰囲気や見方が楽しめるかと。

engChrName: On another note, Rainfall is premiering on schedule. I'd highly recommend watching that.
engSearchText:
On another note, Rainfall is premiering on schedule.
I'd highly recommend watching that.
jpnChrName: リバイバルの『狼達の鎮魂歌』もまだ上映して おりますので、まだご覧になっていなければ是非。
jpnSearchText:
リバイバルの『狼達の鎮魂歌』もまだ上映して
おりますので、まだご覧になっていなければ是非。

engChrName: It's a heart-wrenching romantic drama with elaborate set designs and nuanced character portrayals.
engSearchText:
It's a heart-wrenching romantic drama with elaborate
set designs and nuanced character portrayals.
jpnChrName: ふう……ジュディス・ランスターさんとは 舞台挨拶の際などにお話はしましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……ジュディス・ランスターさんとは
舞台挨拶の際などにお話はしましたが……

engChrName: Trust me when I say it's nothing short of a masterpiece. I cannot sing its praises enough!
engSearchText:
Trust me when I say it's nothing short of
a masterpiece. I cannot sing its praises enough!
jpnChrName: よもやこのようなスキャンダルになるとは…… 正直、気の毒と言うかなんというか……
jpnSearchText:
よもやこのようなスキャンダルになるとは……
正直、気の毒と言うかなんというか……

engChrName: In light of what happened in Creil Village, the film industry will be doing charity drives to offer support.
engSearchText:
In light of what happened in Creil Village, the film
industry will be doing charity drives to offer support.
jpnChrName: まあ、芸能人の難しいところではありますがね…… 楽屋でお話して人柄を知っていると、どうにも……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、芸能人の難しいところではありますがね……
楽屋でお話して人柄を知っていると、どうにも……

engChrName: For our part, we've decided to donate a portion of our proceeds to the cause.
engSearchText:
For our part, we've decided to donate a portion of our
proceeds to the cause.
jpnChrName: まして当館スタッフにまで問い合わせる方が いるとなると……頭が痛いものです。
jpnSearchText:
まして当館スタッフにまで問い合わせる方が
いるとなると……頭が痛いものです。

engChrName: There are also proposals to memorialize the history of the village on film so that its legacy is never forgotten.
engSearchText:
There are also proposals to memorialize the history of
the village on film so that its legacy is never forgotten.
jpnChrName: まあ、それはそうと今週のイチオシ作品は 何と言っても、『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』が一番ですな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それはそうと今週のイチオシ作品は
何と言っても、『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』が一番ですな。

engChrName: Creil Village served as the backdrop for a famous romantic film produced during the early years of film.
engSearchText:
Creil Village served as the backdrop for a famous
romantic film produced during the early years of film.
jpnChrName: かのシーナ・ディルクの伝記映画なのですが、 シーナ役が今話題のニナ・フェンリィでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
かのシーナ・ディルクの伝記映画なのですが、
シーナ役が今話題のニナ・フェンリィでしてね。

engChrName: Not only did that movie spread awareness of the village, it also inspired many people to enter the industry outright.
engSearchText:
Not only did that movie spread awareness of the
village, it also inspired many people to enter the
industry outright.
jpnChrName: 東方系の役者が演じる事には異論もありましたが…… 流石は実力派、全く違和感の無い仕上がりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
東方系の役者が演じる事には異論もありましたが……
流石は実力派、全く違和感の無い仕上がりですよ。

engChrName: Suffice it to say, that village left an enormous mark on a number of people. It pains me to see what's become of it.
engSearchText:
Suffice it to say, that village left an enormous mark on
a number of people. It pains me to see what's become
of it.
jpnChrName: 今週より開始した夜間上映作品、『狼達の鎮魂歌』の 人気は言うまでもないですが……
jpnSearchText:
今週より開始した夜間上映作品、『狼達の鎮魂歌』の
人気は言うまでもないですが……

engChrName: In light of everything going on, I, unfortunately, wasn't able to offer much assistance earlier in the day.
engSearchText:
In light of everything going on, I, unfortunately,
wasn't able to offer much assistance earlier in the day.
jpnChrName: 何と、それに対抗する形で『ゴールデンブラッド』の 年齢制限つきの完全版を上映開始いたしましてね。
jpnSearchText:
何と、それに対抗する形で『ゴールデンブラッド』の
年齢制限つきの完全版を上映開始いたしましてね。

engChrName: Be that as it may, I'm happy to inform you that this week's new film is Climber's Story.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, I'm happy to inform you that this
week's new film is Climber's Story.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督ご自身が『全て見せている』こちらを 対抗馬として上映したいと希望された事もありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督ご自身が『全て見せている』こちらを
対抗馬として上映したいと希望された事もありましてね。

engChrName: It's a quasi-documentary based on real world writings, offering a unique perspective and atmosphere you won't find in other films.
engSearchText:
It's a quasi-documentary based on real world writings,
offering a unique perspective and atmosphere you
won't find in other films.
jpnChrName: 前から観たいという要望も多かったため、当館でも ベガスフィルム応援の意味でも公開いたしました。
jpnSearchText:
前から観たいという要望も多かったため、当館でも
ベガスフィルム応援の意味でも公開いたしました。

engChrName: We're also continuing our re-run of Wolves' Requiem as well. If you still have yet to see it, then by all means, please do so!
engSearchText:
We're also continuing our re-run of Wolves' Requiem
as well. If you still have yet to see it, then by all
means, please do so!
jpnChrName: ギャスパー氏の死が公表されて十日ですが…… 我々としてもショックな出来事でした。
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー氏の死が公表されて十日ですが……
我々としてもショックな出来事でした。

engChrName: *sigh* I've had a handful of chances to talk to Judith Lanster, including when she came to our theater to promote Golden Blood.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I've had a handful of chances to talk to Judith
Lanster, including when she came to our theater to
promote Golden Blood.
jpnChrName: その上、氏の黒い噂まで報道されるとは……
jpnSearchText: その上、氏の黒い噂まで報道されるとは……

engChrName: Though I may not know her well, it saddens me to see her go through such a tremendous scandal.
engSearchText:
Though I may not know her well, it saddens me to
see her go through such a tremendous scandal.
jpnChrName: ですが、彼の映画祭への気持ちは本物だったはず。
jpnSearchText: ですが、彼の映画祭への気持ちは本物だったはず。

engChrName: I suppose these moments come with fame such as hers...
engSearchText:
I suppose these moments come with fame such
as hers...
jpnChrName: 彼と話をした事がありますが……ああ見えて、 新機軸の映画祭の企画を語る際は目が輝いていた。
jpnSearchText:
彼と話をした事がありますが……ああ見えて、
新機軸の映画祭の企画を語る際は目が輝いていた。

engChrName: It's becoming quite the headache for us, too. We now have people inquiring about the matter to us.
engSearchText:
It's becoming quite the headache for us, too. We now
have people inquiring about the matter to us.
jpnChrName: その意味では、あの状況下で開催を決行した事を…… きっと女神様のもとで喜んでいるでしょうなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味では、あの状況下で開催を決行した事を……
きっと女神様のもとで喜んでいるでしょうなぁ。

engChrName: Putting all of that nonsense aside, this week's top recommendation has to be, without a doubt, Gloria: Dawn of the Revolution.
engSearchText:
Putting all of that nonsense aside, this week's top
recommendation has to be, without a doubt, Gloria:
Dawn of the Revolution.
jpnChrName: 今のように映画スターが人気となったのも ここ十数年の事──
jpnSearchText:
今のように映画スターが人気となったのも
ここ十数年の事──

engChrName: It's a biographical film about Sheena Dirke, portrayed by none other than Nina Fenly, who's sort of at the center of attention these days.
engSearchText:
It's a biographical film about Sheena Dirke, portrayed
by none other than Nina Fenly, who's sort of at the
center of attention these days.
jpnChrName: 芸能誌の表紙を当たり前に飾るように なったのを見ると、感慨深い物がありますな。
jpnSearchText:
芸能誌の表紙を当たり前に飾るように
なったのを見ると、感慨深い物がありますな。

engChrName: Although some objected to a person of Eastern heritage playing such a role, I'd say she was born for the part.
engSearchText:
Although some objected to a person of Eastern
heritage playing such a role, I'd say she was born for
the part.
jpnChrName: これもひとえに、映画関係者の 努力の賜物でありましょう。
jpnSearchText:
これもひとえに、映画関係者の
努力の賜物でありましょう。

engChrName: I'm sure you don't need me to tell you how popular Wolves' Requiem is.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you don't need me to tell you how popular
Wolves' Requiem is.
jpnChrName: 無論、華やかな舞台裏ほど苦労があるものですが 今後も共に盛り上げていきたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
無論、華やかな舞台裏ほど苦労があるものですが
今後も共に盛り上げていきたいものです。

engChrName: We started screening that at night alongside the director's cut of Golden Blood. Though the latter has an age restriction in place.
engSearchText:
We started screening that at night alongside the
director's cut of Golden Blood. Though the latter has
an age restriction in place.
jpnChrName: 当映画館も、映画スターたちの登壇や ブックストア《スチュアート》とのタイアップ……
jpnSearchText:
当映画館も、映画スターたちの登壇や
ブックストア《スチュアート》とのタイアップ……

engChrName: Director Gotti wanted that version to be screened because—in his words—it leaves nothing on the table.
engSearchText:
Director Gotti wanted that version to be screened
because—in his words—it leaves nothing on
the table.
jpnChrName: オリジナルグッズやパンフレット製作など 工夫を凝らしておりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
オリジナルグッズやパンフレット製作など
工夫を凝らしておりますよ。

engChrName: Many moviegoers also expressed interest, so in the spirit of supporting Vegas Films, we ultimately decided to show it.
engSearchText:
Many moviegoers also expressed interest, so in the
spirit of supporting Vegas Films, we ultimately
decided to show it.
jpnChrName: 映画祭効果にも期待しつつ 我々も盛り上げていきたいですな。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭効果にも期待しつつ
我々も盛り上げていきたいですな。

engChrName: I must say, when the death of Vegas Film's President Gaspard Dillon was announced, we were all in complete shock.
engSearchText:
I must say, when the death of Vegas Film's President
Gaspard Dillon was announced, we were all in
complete shock.
jpnChrName: 連休末にはいよいよ サルバッドで映画祭が開かれますな。
jpnSearchText:
連休末にはいよいよ
サルバッドで映画祭が開かれますな。

engChrName: And that's without going into the rather dark, unfortunate rumors being reported on him as well...
engSearchText:
And that's without going into the rather dark,
unfortunate rumors being reported on him as well...
jpnChrName: 定番のメッセルダム映画祭に《ベガスフィルム》が 対抗、独自に企画した新映画祭──
jpnSearchText:
定番のメッセルダム映画祭に《ベガスフィルム》が
対抗、独自に企画した新映画祭──

engChrName: Even if his legacy is an imperfect one, I know for a fact that his passion for the Tharbad Film Festival was genuine.
engSearchText:
Even if his legacy is an imperfect one, I know for a
fact that his passion for the Tharbad Film Festival
was genuine.
jpnChrName: しかしメッセルダム映画祭が中止になって しまいましたし、受け皿として期待したい所です。
jpnSearchText:
しかしメッセルダム映画祭が中止になって
しまいましたし、受け皿として期待したい所です。

engChrName: I had the chance to speak with him before he passed. His eyes lit up as he described how novel and groundbreaking the festival was going to be.
engSearchText:
I had the chance to speak with him before he passed.
His eyes lit up as he described how novel and
groundbreaking the festival was going to be.
jpnChrName: エルザイム公国がスポンサーとなった事も 目新しいですし、映画ファンも注目しておりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイム公国がスポンサーとなった事も
目新しいですし、映画ファンも注目しておりますよ。

engChrName: It's a miracle that the film festival was still able to proceed under such trying circumstances. I'm sure he must be pleased up there in heaven.
engSearchText:
It's a miracle that the film festival was still able to
proceed under such trying circumstances. I'm sure he
must be pleased up there in heaven.
jpnChrName: メッセルダム映画祭は基本的に、映画の芸術性を 重視した伝統的な催しでしてな。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダム映画祭は基本的に、映画の芸術性を
重視した伝統的な催しでしてな。

engChrName: Film stars have only really enjoyed this level of notoriety for a little over ten years now.
engSearchText:
Film stars have only really enjoyed this level of
notoriety for a little over ten years now.
jpnChrName: 映画賞についても、選考員に芸術家や文学者が多く、 心理描写や高尚なテーマ性で選ばれていました。
jpnSearchText:
映画賞についても、選考員に芸術家や文学者が多く、
心理描写や高尚なテーマ性で選ばれていました。

engChrName: When I see them grace the covers of entertainment magazines, they look so in their element.
engSearchText:
When I see them grace the covers of entertainment
magazines, they look so in their element.
jpnChrName: 対して、今回の映画祭はエンタメ性で攻めていくと 聞きますし、いかなる結果になるか見物ですな。
jpnSearchText:
対して、今回の映画祭はエンタメ性で攻めていくと
聞きますし、いかなる結果になるか見物ですな。

engChrName: Those who have poured their hearts and souls into this industry are really being rewarded for all their efforts.
engSearchText:
Those who have poured their hearts and souls into
this industry are really being rewarded for all
their efforts.
jpnChrName: こんばんは、夜間上映作品をご覧になりますか。 映画と言うのは、今では実に多様ですからね。
jpnSearchText:
こんばんは、夜間上映作品をご覧になりますか。
映画と言うのは、今では実に多様ですからね。

engChrName: Of course, that fortune doesn't come without its share of problems, but I still hope we can realize even greater success in time.
engSearchText:
Of course, that fortune doesn't come without its share
of problems, but I still hope we can realize even
greater success in time.
jpnChrName: 夜間には、コアなファンの多いマニアックな作品や 名作のリバイバルなどを中心に上映しています。
jpnSearchText:
夜間には、コアなファンの多いマニアックな作品や
名作のリバイバルなどを中心に上映しています。

engChrName: At this theater, we never rest on our laurels. We're always devising new, interesting ways to promote this place and films as a whole.
engSearchText:
At this theater, we never rest on our laurels.
We're always devising new, interesting ways to
promote this place and films as a whole.
jpnChrName: 一部には、年齢制限つきの過激な作品もあり…… そういった上映も夜間に行う事がございますな。
jpnSearchText:
一部には、年齢制限つきの過激な作品もあり……
そういった上映も夜間に行う事がございますな。

engChrName: Whether it's actors giving talks, collaborating with Stuart Bookstore, or producing pamphlets and merchandise, we're always doing something.
engSearchText:
Whether it's actors giving talks, collaborating with
Stuart Bookstore, or producing pamphlets and
merchandise, we're always doing something.
jpnChrName: 《シネマ・エスプリ》へようこそ。 ご案内は私が承りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
《シネマ・エスプリ》へようこそ。
ご案内は私が承りましょう。

engChrName: We have high hopes that the Tharbad Film Festival will help give this industry some momentum.
engSearchText:
We have high hopes that the Tharbad Film Festival
will help give this industry some momentum.
jpnChrName: この道２０年になりますので、 それなりに詳しいお話もできましょう。
jpnSearchText:
この道２０年になりますので、
それなりに詳しいお話もできましょう。

engChrName: The Tharbad Film Festival is nearly upon us. It'll take place at the end of the holiday weekend.
engSearchText:
The Tharbad Film Festival is nearly upon us. It'll take
place at the end of the holiday weekend.
jpnChrName: ２０年ですか……ちょうど導力映画が 広まり始めた頃ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
２０年ですか……ちょうど導力映画が
広まり始めた頃ですよね。

engChrName: Vegas Films originally conceived it independently as something of a rival festival to the Messeldam one.
engSearchText:
Vegas Films originally conceived it independently as
something of a rival festival to the Messeldam one.
jpnChrName: ええ、この映画館ができた頃からの 古株でございまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この映画館ができた頃からの
古株でございまして。

engChrName: Everyone's eyes are on it now, especially since the Messeldam Film Festival was canceled.
engSearchText:
Everyone's eyes are on it now, especially since the
Messeldam Film Festival was canceled.
jpnChrName: 当時は舞台演劇に近い映画が主流でしたが 今や独自の文化と言えるでしょうな。
jpnSearchText:
当時は舞台演劇に近い映画が主流でしたが
今や独自の文化と言えるでしょうな。

engChrName: Having Elsaim on board as a sponsor should help freshen things up as well.
engSearchText:
Having Elsaim on board as a sponsor should help
freshen things up as well.
jpnChrName: 大手配給会社も『ユナイテッドスター』 『オリヲンフィルム』に『九龍映像』……
jpnSearchText:
大手配給会社も『ユナイテッドスター』
『オリヲンフィルム』に『九龍映像』……

engChrName: The Messeldam Film Festival places great emphasis on the artistry of filmmaking.
engSearchText:
The Messeldam Film Festival places great emphasis
on the artistry of filmmaking.
jpnChrName: 最近では『ベガスフィルム』なども現れ、 多彩な作品を世に送り出しておりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近では『ベガスフィルム』なども現れ、
多彩な作品を世に送り出しておりますよ。

engChrName: As such, its judges are mainly artists and literary figures, and they award movies based on their psychological depictions and refined theming.
engSearchText:
As such, its judges are mainly artists and literary
figures, and they award movies based on their
psychological depictions and refined theming.
jpnChrName: そんなに沢山……！ ますます興味が湧いてきましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
そんなに沢山……！
ますます興味が湧いてきましたっ！

engChrName: In contrast, I hear that Tharbad's festival values entertainment and spectacle above all else. It'll be very interesting to see how that plays out.
engSearchText:
In contrast, I hear that Tharbad's festival values
entertainment and spectacle above all else. It'll be very
interesting to see how that plays out.
jpnChrName: ふふ、共和国以外の方には まだまだ馴染みが薄いかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、共和国以外の方には
まだまだ馴染みが薄いかもしれませんが。

engChrName: Good evening. Thinking of taking in a movie tonight? You should! You'd be surprised just how varied they can be these days.
engSearchText:
Good evening. Thinking of taking in a
movie tonight? You should! You'd be surprised just
how varied they can be these days.
jpnChrName: 機会があればぜひ当映画館で 鑑賞なさっていって下さいませ。
jpnSearchText:
機会があればぜひ当映画館で
鑑賞なさっていって下さいませ。

engChrName: At night, we mainly show movies that cater to more dedicated cinephiles, as well as re-runs of famous films.
engSearchText:
At night, we mainly show movies that cater to more
dedicated cinephiles, as well as re-runs of
famous films.
jpnChrName: 共和国では毎年『映画祭』なる催しも 開催されるほど人気なのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国では毎年『映画祭』なる催しも
開催されるほど人気なのですよ。

engChrName: Some are rather mature and require an age restriction. Those are often shown during our nighttime screenings.
engSearchText:
Some are rather mature and require an age restriction.
Those are often shown during our
nighttime screenings.
jpnChrName: もっとも今年のメッセルダム映画祭は 諸事情から中止となってしまったそうですが──
jpnSearchText:
もっとも今年のメッセルダム映画祭は
諸事情から中止となってしまったそうですが──

engChrName: Welcome to Esprit Cinema! It's my great pleasure to serve as your guide.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Esprit Cinema! It's my great pleasure
to serve as your guide.
jpnChrName: 別の映画祭も企画されているとか。 そちらには期待したいものですな。
jpnSearchText:
別の映画祭も企画されているとか。
そちらには期待したいものですな。

engChrName: I've been working here for twenty years, so I can go into considerable detail about almost anything film-related.
engSearchText:
I've been working here for twenty years, so I can go
into considerable detail about almost
anything film-related.
jpnChrName: 物資の仕分けと配給を手伝って おったところだ。
jpnSearchText:
物資の仕分けと配給を手伝って
おったところだ。

engChrName: You've been working here for that long? So you must've started around when orbal films first started showing.
engSearchText:
You've been working here for that long? So you
must've started around when orbal films first
started showing.
jpnChrName: この映画館には長いこと世話になっとるし、 こういう時にこそ役に立たんとな。
jpnSearchText:
この映画館には長いこと世話になっとるし、
こういう時にこそ役に立たんとな。

engChrName: That's right. As a matter of fact, I've been here since the theater itself was first constructed.
engSearchText:
That's right. As a matter of fact, I've been here since
the theater itself was first constructed.
jpnChrName: いつまで状況が続くにせよ……ここに籠るからには 各々が出来る事をしていくほか無いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いつまで状況が続くにせよ……ここに籠るからには
各々が出来る事をしていくほか無いだろう。

engChrName: In those days, films were largely similar to traditional theater, but they now possess a culture of their own.
engSearchText:
In those days, films were largely similar to traditional
theater, but they now possess a culture of their own.
jpnChrName: ううむ……まさか年の終わりに こんな事が起きようとは……！
jpnSearchText:
ううむ……まさか年の終わりに
こんな事が起きようとは……！

engChrName: The landscape has changed, too. The big three distributors used to just be United Star, Orion Films, and Kowloon Pictures.
engSearchText:
The landscape has changed, too. The big three
distributors used to just be United Star, Orion Films,
and Kowloon Pictures.
jpnChrName: だが、映画館に人々を受け入れたのは英断だ、 儂は昔からこの映画館に来ておるが……
jpnSearchText:
だが、映画館に人々を受け入れたのは英断だ、
儂は昔からこの映画館に来ておるが……

engChrName: But along the way, Vegas Films entered the ring, and since then, we've had a wider variety of films to watch than ever before.
engSearchText:
But along the way, Vegas Films entered the ring, and
since then, we've had a wider variety of films to watch
than ever before.
jpnChrName: この建物は広いだけでなく頑丈な構造で、 最近は災害対策もしておると聞く。
jpnSearchText:
この建物は広いだけでなく頑丈な構造で、
最近は災害対策もしておると聞く。

engChrName: Huh. Well, thanks for the crash course in film history, mister. Now I really wanna learn more about movies!
engSearchText:
Huh. Well, thanks for the crash course in film
history, mister. Now I really wanna learn more
about movies!
jpnChrName: あの禍々しい“球”も消えたし……きっと 持ちこたえる事が出来るだろう！
jpnSearchText:
あの禍々しい“球”も消えたし……きっと
持ちこたえる事が出来るだろう！

engChrName: Haha. I admire your spirit. I suppose they must still feel novel to someone who's not from the Republic.
engSearchText:
Haha. I admire your spirit. I suppose they must still
feel novel to someone who's not from the Republic.
jpnChrName: この映画館は記念祭の時には、その年の 名作のリバイバル上映をしているのだが……
jpnSearchText:
この映画館は記念祭の時には、その年の
名作のリバイバル上映をしているのだが……

engChrName: Well, I hope you enjoy the movies. I think you'll find them more than worth your while.
engSearchText:
Well, I hope you enjoy the movies. I think you'll find
them more than worth your while.
jpnChrName: どうせリバイバル上映をするのなら、 往年の名作もやって欲しいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
どうせリバイバル上映をするのなら、
往年の名作もやって欲しいものだな。

engChrName: The popularity of films has led the industry to hold annual festivals dedicated to them.
engSearchText:
The popularity of films has led the industry to hold
annual festivals dedicated to them.
jpnChrName: 記念祭の日は国外からの客も増える、共和国の 歴史的な映画こそ彼らに知ってもらうべきだ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の日は国外からの客も増える、共和国の
歴史的な映画こそ彼らに知ってもらうべきだ。

engChrName: Sadly, this year's film festival in Messeldam has been canceled due to extenuating circumstances.
engSearchText:
Sadly, this year's film festival in Messeldam has been
canceled due to extenuating circumstances.
jpnChrName: 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』……やはり役者の 人選自体には幾分かの違和感はあるが……
jpnSearchText:
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』……やはり役者の
人選自体には幾分かの違和感はあるが……

engChrName: However, there's another one in the works, which I'm certainly looking forward to seeing.
engSearchText:
However, there's another one in the works, which I'm
certainly looking forward to seeing.
jpnChrName: まあニナ・フェンリィの演技力もあって、途中から 違和感も幾らか減り、思ったより観れたな。
jpnSearchText:
まあニナ・フェンリィの演技力もあって、途中から
違和感も幾らか減り、思ったより観れたな。

engChrName: I've been assisting with sorting and distributing supplies.
engSearchText:
I've been assisting with sorting and
distributing supplies.
jpnChrName: 主演女優賞というのは伊達ではないという事か。 最近の役者にしては骨のある実力派のようだ。
jpnSearchText:
主演女優賞というのは伊達ではないという事か。
最近の役者にしては骨のある実力派のようだ。

engChrName: This movie theater has been good to me for so long, so it's high time I repaid the favor by making myself useful!
engSearchText:
This movie theater has been good to me for so long,
so it's high time I repaid the favor by making
myself useful!
jpnChrName: あとはそうだな、時代考証がしっかりしていて、 小物のセットまで凝っていたのは良かったな。
jpnSearchText:
あとはそうだな、時代考証がしっかりしていて、
小物のセットまで凝っていたのは良かったな。

engChrName: We don't know how long we're going to be stuck here, so it's up to each of us to do whatever we can to contribute.
engSearchText:
We don't know how long we're going to be stuck
here, so it's up to each of us to do whatever we can
to contribute.
jpnChrName: 先週の嘆かわしい事件と言い、今年は本当に 色々あったが……無事に記念祭を迎えられるか。
jpnSearchText:
先週の嘆かわしい事件と言い、今年は本当に
色々あったが……無事に記念祭を迎えられるか。

engChrName: How could such a catastrophe befall us right at the end of the year?! It's unimaginable!
engSearchText:
How could such a catastrophe befall us right at the
end of the year?! It's unimaginable!
jpnChrName: 今年は事件のこの季節までがあっという間 だったようにも感じられるな……
jpnSearchText:
今年は事件のこの季節までがあっという間
だったようにも感じられるな……

engChrName: Still, I commend the movie theater for taking people in. For as long as I've been coming here, I've always known it as a big, sturdy building.
engSearchText:
Still, I commend the movie theater for taking
people in. For as long as I've been coming here, I've
always known it as a big, sturdy building.
jpnChrName: さて、今日は何を観るか……今年はいくらか、 多少の観ごたえのある映画も出てきた事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日は何を観るか……今年はいくらか、
多少の観ごたえのある映画も出てきた事だしな。

engChrName: And from what I hear, they recently reinforced it in preparation for disaster situations such as this.
engSearchText:
And from what I hear, they recently reinforced it in
preparation for disaster situations such as this.
jpnChrName: 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』……革命記念祭を前に、 改めて盛り上がっているのか……
jpnSearchText:
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』……革命記念祭を前に、
改めて盛り上がっているのか……

engChrName: Now that those sinister spheres are no more, we should be able to hold down the fort!
engSearchText:
Now that those sinister spheres are no more, we
should be able to hold down the fort!
jpnChrName: 正直、東方系の役者にシーナ役をさせる事には どうしても違和感しか感じないが……
jpnSearchText:
正直、東方系の役者にシーナ役をさせる事には
どうしても違和感しか感じないが……

engChrName: When the Revolution Festival comes around, this theater likes to rerun that year's most popular films.
engSearchText:
When the Revolution Festival comes around, this
theater likes to rerun that year's most popular films.
jpnChrName: 同年代の映画ファンも意外にも誉めておったし まあ、せいぜい粗探しがてら観てみるか。
jpnSearchText:
同年代の映画ファンも意外にも誉めておったし
まあ、せいぜい粗探しがてら観てみるか。

engChrName: But I don't understand why they show all this contemporary crap when they could be playing the classics.
engSearchText:
But I don't understand why they show all this
contemporary crap when they could be playing
the classics.
jpnChrName: よもや生きているうちに、こんな怖ろしい 事件が共和国で起こるとは……
jpnSearchText:
よもや生きているうちに、こんな怖ろしい
事件が共和国で起こるとは……

engChrName: With so many tourists in town, it's a waste not to educate them on the history of our country's fine film industry.
engSearchText:
With so many tourists in town, it's a waste not to
educate them on the history of our country's fine
film industry.
jpnChrName: 十数年前、悪質なカルト教団が各地で 猛威を振るっていた時を思い出すな……
jpnSearchText:
十数年前、悪質なカルト教団が各地で
猛威を振るっていた時を思い出すな……

engChrName: Before I watched that Gloria film, I had my reservations about Nina Fenly being cast as the lead.
engSearchText:
Before I watched that Gloria film, I had my
reservations about Nina Fenly being cast as the lead.
jpnChrName: それにしても、非常事態宣言に若者たちも しっかりと従い秩序を守っているのは感心した。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、非常事態宣言に若者たちも
しっかりと従い秩序を守っているのは感心した。

engChrName: But midway through the movie, my misgivings faded somewhat. I can see how she won the award for best actress.
engSearchText:
But midway through the movie, my misgivings
faded somewhat. I can see how she won the award for
best actress.
jpnChrName: 今の若者は空気が読めないものと思っていたが…… これは少し見る目を変えないといかんかもな。
jpnSearchText:
今の若者は空気が読めないものと思っていたが……
これは少し見る目を変えないといかんかもな。

engChrName: For a newbie, she's definitely got some serious acting chops, I'll give her that much.
engSearchText:
For a newbie, she's definitely got some serious acting
chops, I'll give her that much.
jpnChrName: 『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』。 実際の登山家の語りだけあって、説得力はあるな。
jpnSearchText:
『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』。
実際の登山家の語りだけあって、説得力はあるな。

engChrName: Beyond that, the crew clearly did their research. I was impressed at their attention to detail—even down to the characters' accessories.
engSearchText:
Beyond that, the crew clearly did their research. I was
impressed at their attention to detail—even down to
the characters' accessories.
jpnChrName: この映画にはそういう雰囲気は無かったが、 最近では実録映画でも“やらせ”があると聞く。
jpnSearchText:
この映画にはそういう雰囲気は無かったが、
最近では実録映画でも“やらせ”があると聞く。

engChrName: This has been a rather...eventful year, to be certain, especially with last week's tragedy.
engSearchText:
This has been a rather...eventful year, to be certain,
especially with last week's tragedy.
jpnChrName: それを見抜くだけのリテラシーが、 観る側にも求められておるという事だな。
jpnSearchText:
それを見抜くだけのリテラシーが、
観る側にも求められておるという事だな。

engChrName: Yet somehow, the festival will carry on, it seems...
engSearchText: Yet somehow, the festival will carry on, it seems...

jpnSearchText:
まったく、若い者はジュディス・ランスターの
スキャンダルで散々騒ぎおって……

engChrName: Now, then. What should I watch today? This year has seen its fair share of worthwhile films, so picking one won't be easy.
engSearchText:
Now, then. What should I watch today? This year has
seen its fair share of worthwhile films, so picking one
won't be easy.
jpnChrName: 役者というのは、物語を演じる事こそ本分、 それを中心に評価されてこそというものだろう。
jpnSearchText:
役者というのは、物語を演じる事こそ本分、
それを中心に評価されてこそというものだろう。

engChrName: That Gloria film is all the rage again now that the Revolution Festival is almost here.
engSearchText:
That Gloria film is all the rage again now that the
Revolution Festival is almost here.
jpnChrName: 最近の若者はどうにも、女優に純潔性か何かを 求めて変な夢を見ておるんじゃないかね？
jpnSearchText:
最近の若者はどうにも、女優に純潔性か何かを
求めて変な夢を見ておるんじゃないかね？

engChrName: Frankly, I still can't help but feel that it's wrong to have an Easterner playing Sheena Dirke.
engSearchText:
Frankly, I still can't help but feel that it's wrong to
have an Easterner playing Sheena Dirke.

jpnSearchText:
聞けば、最近はアイドルなる、理想化された
純潔性を売りにする芸人もいるというし……

engChrName: Although, people my age have had good things to say about her performance. Maybe I'll go see the movie so I can pick it apart.
engSearchText:
Although, people my age have had good things to say
about her performance. Maybe I'll go see the movie
so I can pick it apart.

jpnSearchText:
もうすぐ公開の『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』はシーナ役が
東方系のニナ・フェンリィである事が話題だが……

engChrName: In all my many years of living, I've never seen anything so horrifying befall our Republic...
engSearchText:
In all my many years of living, I've never seen
anything so horrifying befall our Republic...
jpnChrName: 何でも民族問題に配慮すればいい訳でもなかろう、 特にあれは史実を元にした伝記映画だろう？
jpnSearchText:
何でも民族問題に配慮すればいい訳でもなかろう、
特にあれは史実を元にした伝記映画だろう？

engChrName: It reminds me of when that cult went on their rampage a decade ago.
engSearchText:
It reminds me of when that cult went on their
rampage a decade ago.
jpnChrName: シーナが白人という事実を捻じ曲げてまで、 東方系の役者を主演に添えるなど、わざとらしい。
jpnSearchText:
シーナが白人という事実を捻じ曲げてまで、
東方系の役者を主演に添えるなど、わざとらしい。

engChrName: I must say, I'm impressed just how much the young people are obeying the state of emergency and maintaining order.
engSearchText:
I must say, I'm impressed just how much the young
people are obeying the state of emergency and
maintaining order.
jpnChrName: 東方系の役者を起用するなら、史実でも混血だった アトキンソン将軍役にする方が自然だろうに。
jpnSearchText:
東方系の役者を起用するなら、史実でも混血だった
アトキンソン将軍役にする方が自然だろうに。

engChrName: I always thought that generation was completely insensitive about such things. I suppose I have to start changing my tune.
engSearchText:
I always thought that generation was completely
insensitive about such things. I suppose I have to start
changing my tune.
jpnChrName: しかし……よもやゴッチの問題作が 今更上映再開になっていたとはな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……よもやゴッチの問題作が
今更上映再開になっていたとはな。

engChrName: I'm glad that Climber's Story movie was narrated by an actual mountaineer. It gave an authentic touch to that film.
engSearchText:
I'm glad that Climber's Story movie was narrated by
an actual mountaineer. It gave an authentic touch to
that film.

jpnSearchText:
一度は上映を中断したはずだろうに……
優秀監督賞で箔が付いたとでも思ったのか。

engSearchText:
I've heard that some movies filmed out in the real
world have staged scenes in them.

jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、あの映画館も昔に比べれば
堕ちたという事だな……

engChrName: I didn't get that sense from this movie, but it's a good reason why audiences need to watch with a more discerning eye.
engSearchText:
I didn't get that sense from this movie, but it's a good
reason why audiences need to watch with a more
discerning eye.

jpnSearchText:
最優秀監督賞も案の定、単純な娯楽映画が受賞したが
ゴッチ作品にならなかった分マシだな。

engSearchText:
Hmph. Youngins won't stop yammering on about
that scandal Judith Lanster found herself in.
jpnChrName: 『狼達の鎮魂歌』、ゴッチのような下品さは無く、 往年の活劇映画へのリスペクトも感じられた。
jpnSearchText:
『狼達の鎮魂歌』、ゴッチのような下品さは無く、
往年の活劇映画へのリスペクトも感じられた。

engSearchText:
An actor's job is to act out stories, not be a paradigm

jpnSearchText:
かつての伝説級の活劇映画には劣るが、

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:
『天国のこちら側』……医者の葛藤を
描こうというのは面白いのだがなぁ……

engChrName: As if that weren't bad enough, I hear there are entertainers called 'idols' that sell themselves on that exact hogwash. How embarrassing!
engSearchText:

entertainers called 'idols' that sell themselves on that
exact hogwash. How embarrassing!

jpnSearchText:
いかんせん、挿入歌の入り方が形だけ

engSearchText:

Did the director sleep through history class

それを中途半端な挿入歌で描こうというのは、

本家のメッセルダム映画祭は、複数の協賛企業や

jpnSearchText:
対してベガスフィルムはゴッチを起用し、

How could this theater have fallen so low? *sigh*...

『ソバーキュリアス』……これは最近の

engSearchText:

than Golden Blood.

人間の二面性というテーマを、スリラーの

engSearchText:
There's no obscene content in that movie, unlike
Gotti's trash. You can tell it has respect for the
motion pictures that came before it.

jpnSearchText:
まあ、表現には多少は首を傾げるところもあるが、

produced, but as a piece of mass market
entertainment, it's good enough.

jpnSearchText:
ふん、この映画館もたまには昔ながらの

engSearchText:
This Side of Heaven does a fair job depicting the

jpnSearchText:
やはり最近の映画は低俗で直接的な刺激が

jpnSearchText:
特にゴッチ作品！　あんな過激さばかりを

engChrName: Back when movies were new, intimate scenes between characters would have no music. They'd only have a few ambient sounds at most.
engSearchText:
Back when movies were new, intimate scenes
between characters would have no music. They'd only
have a few ambient sounds at most.
jpnChrName: ……映画館の人たちが、少しずつだけど 街の事とか分かった事を教えてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
……映画館の人たちが、少しずつだけど
街の事とか分かった事を教えてくれて……

engSearchText:
But movies these days will blast mediocre music in
those moments. Those damned record companies are
ruining cinema!
jpnChrName: ママの事も心配だけど……少しだけ、 あたしも落ちつけてきたわ……
jpnSearchText:
ママの事も心配だけど……少しだけ、
あたしも落ちつけてきたわ……

engChrName: I heard the Tharbad Film Festival is being planned by Vegas Films. Nothing good will come out of that, I'm sure...
engSearchText:
I heard the Tharbad Film Festival is being planned by
Vegas Films. Nothing good will come out of that,
I'm sure...
jpnChrName: 大人たちが頑張ってくれてるのに、あたしだけ いつまでも怖がってたら失礼よね……！
jpnSearchText:
大人たちが頑張ってくれてるのに、あたしだけ
いつまでも怖がってたら失礼よね……！

engChrName: Messeldam's film festivals are the culmination of businesses and cultural organizations coming together to make something great.
engSearchText:
Messeldam's film festivals are the culmination of
businesses and cultural organizations coming together
to make something great.
jpnChrName: 落ち着いてきたし、何かお手伝いできる 事があれば、あたしも……！
jpnSearchText:
落ち着いてきたし、何かお手伝いできる
事があれば、あたしも……！

engChrName: Their focus isn't on making mira—they want to promote the cultural value of films.
engSearchText:
Their focus isn't on making mira—they want to
promote the cultural value of films.
jpnChrName: どど、どうしてこんな事に……！？
jpnSearchText: どど、どうしてこんな事に……！？

engChrName: But Vegas Films is a greedy company that makes its money off tacky thrills. With Gotti overseeing the event, my expectations for it are rock bottom.
engSearchText:
But Vegas Films is a greedy company that makes its
money off tacky thrills. With Gotti overseeing the
event, my expectations for it are rock bottom.
jpnChrName: こんな大変な事になってもママがトイレから 戻ってこないから流石に見に行ったら……
jpnSearchText:
こんな大変な事になってもママがトイレから
戻ってこないから流石に見に行ったら……

engChrName: Ahh... Sober Curious. Now there's a film with some meat on its bones.
engSearchText:
Ahh... Sober Curious. Now there's a film with some

jpnSearchText:
ママ、鏡の前で時間が止まったみたいに
固まっちゃってて……！

engChrName: It's more or less a thriller, but they did an excellent job depicting the duality of human beings.
engSearchText:
It's more or less a thriller, but they did an excellent
job depicting the duality of human beings.

jpnSearchText: ママ……元に戻るわよね……？

engChrName: It certainly wasn't perfect, but I'll gladly take it over the cheap fluff that's being churned out.
engSearchText:
It certainly wasn't perfect, but I'll gladly take it over
the cheap fluff that's being churned out.

jpnSearchText:
止まってる人、ママだけじゃなくて
たくさんいるみたいだけど……

engChrName: Hmph. I've been coming to this theater for a long time because I could always trust them to show quality films.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I've been coming to this theater for a long
time because I could always trust them to show
quality films.
jpnChrName: みんなも……ママも元に戻るわよね？
jpnSearchText: みんなも……ママも元に戻るわよね？

engChrName: But as of late, the only movies they show are sleazy films that rely solely on cheap, visceral shocks. It's disgraceful, I say!
engSearchText:
But as of late, the only movies they show are sleazy
films that rely solely on cheap, visceral shocks.
It's disgraceful, I say!

jpnSearchText:
待ちに待った映画祭の特別上映！
今日は夜まで色々観るわよ！

engChrName: The most deplorable director of all is that Salvatore Gotti. His rise to fame boggles the mind!
engSearchText:
The most deplorable director of all is that
Salvatore Gotti. His rise to fame boggles the mind!

jpnSearchText:
今日は特別な日だし、ママも遅くまで
映画に付き合ってくれるって言ってくれたわ！

engChrName: The movie theater people have been telling me what's happening in the city.
engSearchText:
The movie theater people have been telling me what's
happening in the city.
jpnChrName: ……それならそれで早くトイレから 戻ってきて欲しいけどね！
jpnSearchText:
……それならそれで早くトイレから
戻ってきて欲しいけどね！

engChrName: I'm still worried about Mama, but they've helped calm me down a little.
engSearchText:
I'm still worried about Mama, but they've helped
calm me down a little.
jpnChrName: 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』……公開直後は見逃してたけど、 ようやく観ることが出来たわ。
jpnSearchText:
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』……公開直後は見逃してたけど、
ようやく観ることが出来たわ。

engChrName: That said, I can't let myself be scared forever! Not when the grown-ups are doing everything they can to help!
engSearchText:
That said, I can't let myself be scared forever!
Not when the grown-ups are doing everything they
can to help!
jpnChrName: ニナ・フェンリィ……本当に凄いわね、途中から 肖像画のシーナが重なって見えたかも……
jpnSearchText:
ニナ・フェンリィ……本当に凄いわね、途中から
肖像画のシーナが重なって見えたかも……

engChrName: Now that I feel better, I need to find something I can do to help out!
engSearchText:
Now that I feel better, I need to find something I can
do to help out!
jpnChrName: 日曜学校で教えてくれなかった革命の 細かいお話も見れて勉強になったし……
jpnSearchText:
日曜学校で教えてくれなかった革命の
細かいお話も見れて勉強になったし……

engChrName: Why? How could this happen?!
engSearchText: Why? How could this happen?!
jpnChrName: あたし的には今年一番の映画だわ！
jpnSearchText: あたし的には今年一番の映画だわ！

engChrName: I went to check on Mama 'cause she was in the restroom a long time...
engSearchText:
I went to check on Mama 'cause she was in the
restroom a long time...
jpnChrName: 村一つが消えて無くなったって…… え、映画のお話じゃないのよね……？
jpnSearchText:
村一つが消えて無くなったって……
え、映画のお話じゃないのよね……？

engChrName: ...and she was standing completely still. It was like she was frozen in time!
engSearchText:
...and she was standing completely still. It was like she
was frozen in time!
jpnChrName: って事は、そこに住んでいた人達も皆…… そんな事が……本当に……？
jpnSearchText:
って事は、そこに住んでいた人達も皆……
そんな事が……本当に……？

engChrName: Mama's gonna turn back to normal...right?
engSearchText: Mama's gonna turn back to normal...right?
jpnChrName: 何だか……考えたら怖くなってきたわ、 ママ……早くトイレから帰ってきて……
jpnSearchText:
何だか……考えたら怖くなってきたわ、
ママ……早くトイレから帰ってきて……

engChrName: There are so many people who are frozen, too. It's not just Mama...
engSearchText:
There are so many people who are frozen, too.
It's not just Mama...
jpnChrName: 《長靴をはいたみっしぃ》は結構、   色々な人に子供向けって勧められるけど……
jpnSearchText:
《長靴をはいたみっしぃ》は結構、
色々な人に子供向けって勧められるけど……

engChrName: They're all gonna be okay, right? I want Mama back...
engSearchText: They're all gonna be okay, right? I want Mama back...
jpnChrName: そう言ってる人、絶対にあの映画は 観ないで言ってるわよね。
jpnSearchText:
そう言ってる人、絶対にあの映画は
観ないで言ってるわよね。

engChrName: Yay! Today's the special film festival movie screening day! I'm gonna watch a bunch of movies!
engSearchText:
Yay! Today's the special film festival movie
screening day! I'm gonna watch a bunch of movies!
jpnChrName: ……ところで、ジュディス・ランスターに何か あったの？　皆騒いでいるようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ところで、ジュディス・ランスターに何か
あったの？　皆騒いでいるようだけど……

engChrName: Mama said she'd watch them all with me till it gets dark. I'm so excited!
engSearchText:
Mama said she'd watch them all with me till it
gets dark. I'm so excited!
jpnChrName: その、『ゴールデンブラッド完全版』にあるらしい “ヌレバ”とかいうのと関係あるワケ？
jpnSearchText:
その、『ゴールデンブラッド完全版』にあるらしい
“ヌレバ”とかいうのと関係あるワケ？

engChrName: I just gotta wait for her to finish using the restroom. I wish she'd hurry up!
engSearchText:
I just gotta wait for her to finish using the restroom.
I wish she'd hurry up!
jpnChrName: 『ミッドナイト・メモリーズ』…… べ、別に怖くなんか……！
jpnSearchText:
『ミッドナイト・メモリーズ』……
べ、別に怖くなんか……！

engChrName: I missed out on Gloria when it came out, but now I've finally seen it.
engSearchText:
I missed out on Gloria when it came out, but now
I've finally seen it.
jpnChrName: で、でもほら、流石に一人で先に観始めるのも 悪いしね、ママがトイレから帰ってから入るわ！
jpnSearchText:
で、でもほら、流石に一人で先に観始めるのも
悪いしね、ママがトイレから帰ってから入るわ！

engChrName: Nina Fenly was an awesome Sheena Dirke. She's the best!
engSearchText:
Nina Fenly was an awesome Sheena Dirke. She's
the best!
jpnChrName: じょ、上映始まっちゃっても仕方ないわ、 一緒に見た方が良いもの！
jpnSearchText:
じょ、上映始まっちゃっても仕方ないわ、
一緒に見た方が良いもの！

engChrName: I learned a whole bunch from that movie. There were things about the revolution that they didn't teach us in Sunday School.
engSearchText:
I learned a whole bunch from that movie. There were
things about the revolution that they didn't teach us
in Sunday School.
jpnChrName: 映画祭、二人分の宿が取れなくて泣く泣く 行けなくなっちゃった……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭、二人分の宿が取れなくて泣く泣く
行けなくなっちゃった……

engChrName: It's my favorite movie I've seen all year! I loved it!
engSearchText: It's my favorite movie I've seen all year! I loved it!
jpnChrName: 流石に子供だけは危ないってママが言って……まあ、 あたし心は成熟してるし聞き分けてあげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
流石に子供だけは危ないってママが言って……まあ、
あたし心は成熟してるし聞き分けてあげるわ。

engChrName: A whole village disappeared? A-Are you sure that's not the story of some movie?
engSearchText:
A whole village disappeared? A-Are you sure that's
not the story of some movie?
jpnChrName: うーん、でもゴッチ監督の企画した映画祭、 サプライズも多そうで間近で見たかったな～。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、でもゴッチ監督の企画した映画祭、
サプライズも多そうで間近で見たかったな～。

engChrName: It really happened? Then does that mean...everyone who lived there...
engSearchText:
It really happened? Then does that mean...everyone
who lived there...
jpnChrName: さっき見てきた『百花王』、低予算って 言われていたけど殺陣とかは凄くアツかったわ！
jpnSearchText:
さっき見てきた『百花王』、低予算って
言われていたけど殺陣とかは凄くアツかったわ！

engChrName: I-I don't wanna think about it. I'm scared now. Hurry up and get outta the restroom, Mama...
engSearchText:
I-I don't wanna think about it. I'm scared now.
Hurry up and get outta the restroom, Mama...
jpnChrName: まあ、東方風の街並みは国内ロケって事で…… たまーに変なものも背景に映ってたのはご愛敬ね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、東方風の街並みは国内ロケって事で……
たまーに変なものも背景に映ってたのはご愛敬ね。

engChrName: A lot of grown-ups are recommending Mishy in Boots to kids.
engSearchText:
A lot of grown-ups are recommending Mishy in
Boots to kids.
jpnChrName: ……それにしてもママ、今日も遅いわね。
jpnSearchText: ……それにしてもママ、今日も遅いわね。

engChrName: But they wouldn't be saying that if they saw it for themselves. *shiver*
engSearchText:
But they wouldn't be saying that if they saw it
for themselves. *shiver*
jpnChrName: やっぱりコーフンできる作品が良いわよね、 特にゴッチ作品なんてスカッとするもの！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりコーフンできる作品が良いわよね、
特にゴッチ作品なんてスカッとするもの！

engChrName: Did something happen to Judith Lanster? Why's everyone talking about her?
engSearchText:
Did something happen to Judith Lanster?
Why's everyone talking about her?
jpnChrName: ホラー系もカタルシス？　っていうのかな、 そういうのがあるヤツなら観る甲斐あるしね！
jpnSearchText:
ホラー系もカタルシス？　っていうのかな、
そういうのがあるヤツなら観る甲斐あるしね！

engChrName: Someone said she's making love, but I don't know what that means. I heard she does that in Golden Blood Director's Cut, so maybe that's what it is?
engSearchText:
Someone said she's making love, but I don't know
what that means. I heard she does that in Golden
Blood Director's Cut, so maybe that's what it is?
jpnChrName: 映画館の人も子供向けのアニメばかり勧めるけど、 教育的配慮だかでコーフンできないやつでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
映画館の人も子供向けのアニメばかり勧めるけど、
教育的配慮だかでコーフンできないやつでしょ？

engChrName: I-I'm not scared of watching Midnight Memories! R-Really!
engSearchText:
I-I'm not scared of watching Midnight Memories!
R-Really!
jpnChrName: ……それにしても、ママは相変わらず トイレが長いことこの上ないわね……
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても、ママは相変わらず
トイレが長いことこの上ないわね……

engChrName: I'm just waiting for Mama to come back from the restroom. Going into a theater without permission is wrong, you know!
engSearchText:
I'm just waiting for Mama to come back from
the restroom. Going into a theater without
permission is wrong, you know!
jpnChrName: お化粧直ししてるにしても長過ぎ、待ってる あたしの方が催してきちゃったんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
お化粧直ししてるにしても長過ぎ、待ってる
あたしの方が催してきちゃったんだけど。

engChrName: If... If she doesn't get back until after it's started, that's okay! It's more fun if we watch it together!
engSearchText:
If... If she doesn't get back until after it's started,
that's okay! It's more fun if we watch it together!
jpnChrName: さて、状況も整理できたことだし アタシも本格的に動くとしようかい。
jpnSearchText:
さて、状況も整理できたことだし
アタシも本格的に動くとしようかい。

engChrName: I cried a bunch when Mama told me we had to give up on going to the Tharbad Film Festival. There wasn't any place to stay.
engSearchText:
I cried a bunch when Mama told me we had to give
up on going to the Tharbad Film Festival.
There wasn't any place to stay.
jpnChrName: ルウ家の方々と力を合わせれば いくらか光明も見えてくるだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
ルウ家の方々と力を合わせれば
いくらか光明も見えてくるだろうさ。

engChrName: She says I'm too young to go all by myself. I'm pretty mature for my age, though, so I won't make a big fuss about it.
engSearchText:
She says I'm too young to go all by myself. I'm pretty
mature for my age, though, so I won't make a big fuss
about it.
jpnChrName: クック、無論そちらの作戦にも期待している。 何かあればアタシらにも声を掛けるがいいさ。
jpnSearchText:
クック、無論そちらの作戦にも期待している。
何かあればアタシらにも声を掛けるがいいさ。

engChrName: But I sure would've loved to see it. Any festival planned by Salvatore Gotti's bound to have all kinds of fun surprises. *sigh*...
engSearchText:
But I sure would've loved to see it. Any festival
planned by Salvatore Gotti's bound to have all kinds
of fun surprises. *sigh*...
jpnChrName: 流石だねェ、裏解決屋。 これでウチも動きやすくなったよ。
jpnSearchText:
流石だねェ、裏解決屋。
これでウチも動きやすくなったよ。

engChrName: I just saw The Peony Blade. Everybody complains about the low budget, but I thought the sword fights were amazing!
engSearchText:
I just saw The Peony Blade. Everybody complains
about the low budget, but I thought the sword fights
were amazing!
jpnChrName: ツァオやファン大人とも じきに連絡がつくだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオやファン大人とも
じきに連絡がつくだろう。

engChrName: I guess the Eastern-looking street shots were filmed in Calvard. I liked seeing all the weird stuff in the background.
engSearchText:
I guess the Eastern-looking street shots were filmed
in Calvard. I liked seeing all the weird stuff in
the background.
jpnChrName: 巫山戯（フザケ）たアルマータの処断はその後── クック、お互い気合を入れ直すとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
巫山戯（フザケ）たアルマータの処断はその後──
クック、お互い気合を入れ直すとしようか。

engChrName: Mama's being a real slowpoke today.
engSearchText: Mama's being a real slowpoke today.
jpnChrName: ちょいと見解の相違がありそうだが 俺たちは先へ行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと見解の相違がありそうだが
俺たちは先へ行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I love movies that get me all hyped up. That's why I always look forward to seeing Salvatore Gotti's films.
engSearchText:
I love movies that get me all hyped up. That's why I
always look forward to seeing Salvatore Gotti's films.
jpnChrName: 連中、まだ得体の知れない何かを隠してやがる。 せいぜい足をすくわれねえようにな。
jpnSearchText:
連中、まだ得体の知れない何かを隠してやがる。
せいぜい足をすくわれねえようにな。

engChrName: It's also why I like horror movies. They're pretty cathartic—as the grown-ups say.
engSearchText:
It's also why I like horror movies. They're pretty
cathartic—as the grown-ups say.
jpnChrName: クック、そりゃこっちの台詞さ。 せいぜい気張りな、嬢ちゃん達もね。
jpnSearchText:
クック、そりゃこっちの台詞さ。
せいぜい気張りな、嬢ちゃん達もね。

engChrName: The staff only recommend kiddy movies to me. I get why they do, but they're so boring!
engSearchText:
The staff only recommend kiddy movies to me. I get
why they do, but they're so boring!
jpnChrName: はい！　オデット達の事、 どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
はい！　オデット達の事、
どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Ugh... What's taking Mama so long? Does it really take thirty minutes to use the restroom?
engSearchText:
Ugh... What's taking Mama so long? Does it really
take thirty minutes to use the restroom?
jpnChrName: アタシはこの辺りの治安を守る役目も 担っている、住民の安全は確保しよう。
jpnSearchText:
アタシはこの辺りの治安を守る役目も
担っている、住民の安全は確保しよう。

engChrName: All this waiting's making ME want to go now, too!
engSearchText: All this waiting's making ME want to go now, too!
jpnChrName: ツァオやファン大人と 連絡がつき次第、動くつもりだが──
jpnSearchText:
ツァオやファン大人と
連絡がつき次第、動くつもりだが──

engChrName: Now that we know what we're dealing with, it's time for me to spring into action.
engSearchText:
Now that we know what we're dealing with, it's time
for me to spring into action.
jpnChrName: せいぜい気張りな、裏解決屋。 そっちの嬢ちゃん達もね。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい気張りな、裏解決屋。
そっちの嬢ちゃん達もね。

engChrName: If we combine forces with the Lu family, we should be able to even the odds.
engSearchText:
If we combine forces with the Lu family, we should
be able to even the odds.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋たちにアーロン、無事で何よりだ。 状況は把握しているね？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋たちにアーロン、無事で何よりだ。
状況は把握しているね？

engChrName: I wish you the best of luck with your plan. If there's anything you need, don't be afraid to reach out to us.
engSearchText:
I wish you the best of luck with your plan. If there's
anything you need, don't be afraid to reach out to us.
jpnChrName: 近隣の連中はウチで保護させてもらっている。 アンタたちもやるべき事をやりな。
jpnSearchText:
近隣の連中はウチで保護させてもらっている。
アンタたちもやるべき事をやりな。

engChrName: I can always count on you to pull through, Mr. Arkride. Thanks to you, we can now operate more freely.
engSearchText:
I can always count on you to pull through,
Mr. Arkride. Thanks to you, we can now operate
more freely.
jpnChrName: ハッ……話が早くて助かるぜ。 ちょいと癪でもあるがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……話が早くて助かるぜ。
ちょいと癪でもあるがな。

engChrName: It shouldn't be long now before we're able to make contact with Cao and Fan.
engSearchText:
It shouldn't be long now before we're able to make
contact with Cao and Fan.
jpnChrName: まあ状況が状況だ。 黒月の力もアテにさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ状況が状況だ。
黒月の力もアテにさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Once we've reconnected with them, we can put Almata in their place. In the meantime, let's just keep fighting the good fight.
engSearchText:
Once we've reconnected with them, we can put
Almata in their place. In the meantime, let's just keep
fighting the good fight.
jpnChrName: いいさ、ウチとしても “停まっちまった”従業員が多くてねェ。
jpnSearchText:
いいさ、ウチとしても
“停まっちまった”従業員が多くてねェ。

engChrName: I don't know if your idea of 'the good fight' lines up with ours, but I'll wish you best of luck anyway.
engSearchText:
I don't know if your idea of 'the good fight' lines up
with ours, but I'll wish you best of luck anyway.
jpnChrName: 動ける連中は貴重だ。 頼りにさせてもらうよ、裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
動ける連中は貴重だ。
頼りにさせてもらうよ、裏解決屋。

engChrName: Watch yourselves. Those bastards have something up their sleeves. Don't let it trip you up.
engSearchText:
Watch yourselves. Those bastards have something up
their sleeves. Don't let it trip you up.
jpnChrName: 店の安全は確保してある。 拠点として遠慮なく使うといいさ。
jpnSearchText:
店の安全は確保してある。
拠点として遠慮なく使うといいさ。

engChrName: That's my line, pretty boy. Now get out there and earn your keep—and that goes for you, too, ladies.
engSearchText:
That's my line, pretty boy. Now get out there and
earn your keep—and that goes for you, too, ladies.
jpnChrName: 黒月としても今後は大きく動く、あたしは ルウ家と連携する準備もしておくとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
黒月としても今後は大きく動く、あたしは
ルウ家と連携する準備もしておくとするよ。

engChrName: Yes, ma'am! Thanks for looking after my friends, too!
engSearchText: Yes, ma'am! Thanks for looking after my friends, too!
jpnChrName: ふふ、思った通りの盛況ぶりだねェ。 あたしも久しぶりに接客するとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、思った通りの盛況ぶりだねェ。
あたしも久しぶりに接客するとしようか。

engChrName: One of my duties is to help maintain the peace around here. You can be sure I'll get the residents around here to safety.
engSearchText:
One of my duties is to help maintain the peace
around here. You can be sure I'll get the residents
around here to safety.
jpnChrName: 今夜は記念祭に来ている九龍グループの幹部が ここで会合をする予定もある。
jpnSearchText:
今夜は記念祭に来ている九龍グループの幹部が
ここで会合をする予定もある。

engChrName: I plan to move out once we've reconnected with Cao and Fan.
engSearchText:
I plan to move out once we've reconnected with Cao
and Fan.
jpnChrName: クック、来年度の動きも視野に入れて 整えて行くとしようかい。
jpnSearchText:
クック、来年度の動きも視野に入れて
整えて行くとしようかい。

engChrName: But don't wait for me. Go out there and earn your keep.
engSearchText:
But don't wait for me. Go out there and earn
your keep.
jpnChrName: 取りこぼしたアルマータ残党を始末してくれた件、 ツァオから聞いたよ、ご苦労だったね。
jpnSearchText:
取りこぼしたアルマータ残党を始末してくれた件、
ツァオから聞いたよ、ご苦労だったね。

engChrName: Good to see you're all in one piece. I take it you've got a good grasp on the situation now?
engSearchText:
Good to see you're all in one piece. I take it you've
got a good grasp on the situation now?
jpnChrName: これでウチも記念祭の準備に 本腰を入れられるよ。
jpnSearchText:
これでウチも記念祭の準備に
本腰を入れられるよ。

engChrName: Don't worry about us. We're just going to be sheltering the people of the neighborhood here. You go on out there and do what you have to do.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about us. We're just going to be
sheltering the people of the neighborhood here.
You go on out there and do what you have to do.
jpnChrName: ルウ家の方々もいらっしゃるとの事だ、 せいぜい持て成させてもらわないとねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ルウ家の方々もいらっしゃるとの事だ、
せいぜい持て成させてもらわないとねェ。

engChrName: Wish we could stick around and help out, but yeah, we've got shit to take care of.
engSearchText:
Wish we could stick around and help out, but yeah,
we've got shit to take care of.
jpnChrName: 例の一件で長老会もゴタついたが ようやく一区切りだろう。
jpnSearchText:
例の一件で長老会もゴタついたが
ようやく一区切りだろう。

engChrName: We'll leave this area to you.
engSearchText: We'll leave this area to you.
jpnChrName: 首都一帯の店を仕切ってる身として…… せいぜい持て成させてもらわないとねェ。
jpnSearchText:
首都一帯の店を仕切ってる身として……
せいぜい持て成させてもらわないとねェ。

engChrName: Thanks. You'll be doing us a favor by resolving this.
engSearchText: Thanks. You'll be doing us a favor by resolving this.
jpnChrName: 首都でのアルマータ残党は一通り洗い出したが、 いかんせん末端も含めると数が多くてねェ。
jpnSearchText:
首都でのアルマータ残党は一通り洗い出したが、
いかんせん末端も含めると数が多くてねェ。
