engChrName: Several of our people are frozen in time, so the sooner you fix this mess, the better.
engSearchText:
Several of our people are frozen in time, so the sooner
you fix this mess, the better.
jpnChrName: 討ち漏らしたのもいるかもしれないが まあ、そいつらも時間の問題だろうね。
jpnSearchText:
討ち漏らしたのもいるかもしれないが
まあ、そいつらも時間の問題だろうね。

engChrName: The restaurant is secure. Feel free to use it as a base of operations.
engSearchText:
The restaurant is secure. Feel free to use it as a base
of operations.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、これで裏社会の力関係もまた変わる。 フフ、この機会をどう活かしたものかねェ……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、これで裏社会の力関係もまた変わる。
フフ、この機会をどう活かしたものかねェ……

engChrName: Meanwhile, I'll be getting ready to link up with the Lu family. You can be sure that Heiyue isn't going to be sitting idly by during all of this.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, I'll be getting ready to link up with the
Lu family. You can be sure that Heiyue isn't going to
be sitting idly by during all of this.
jpnChrName: ……連中はやり過ぎた。 最早“潰す”しか手立てはないだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
……連中はやり過ぎた。
最早“潰す”しか手立てはないだろうさ。

engChrName: Things are as bustling today as I thought it'd be. I think I might take this rare opportunity to serve some of our guests myself.
engSearchText:
Things are as bustling today as I thought it'd be.
I think I might take this rare opportunity to serve
some of our guests myself.
jpnChrName: だが具体的なやり方に関しては 裏の各勢力でも色々あるようでね。
jpnSearchText:
だが具体的なやり方に関しては
裏の各勢力でも色々あるようでね。

engChrName: Tonight, we're expecting executives who are in town for the Revolution Festival. They're converging here for a meeting.
engSearchText:
Tonight, we're expecting executives who are in town
for the Revolution Festival. They're converging here
for a meeting.
jpnChrName: フン──我々は長老方の決定に従うのみだが 情勢は見極めておくべきだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
フン──我々は長老方の決定に従うのみだが
情勢は見極めておくべきだろうさ。

engChrName: It should be a good time—and not just for them. It'll give us insight into their trajectory for the coming year as well.
engSearchText:
It should be a good time—and not just for them.
It'll give us insight into their trajectory for the coming
year as well.
jpnChrName: 場合によっちゃ、この首都にも 血の雨が降る事になるかもしれないしねェ。
jpnSearchText:
場合によっちゃ、この首都にも
血の雨が降る事になるかもしれないしねェ。

engChrName: Cao told me you guys wiped the floor with Almata. I appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Cao told me you guys wiped the floor with Almata.
I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ここまでの大事になっちまうと どうしたって取れる手は限られるが──
jpnSearchText:
ここまでの大事になっちまうと
どうしたって取れる手は限られるが──

engChrName: With them out of the way, we can fully turn our attention towards preparing for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
With them out of the way, we can fully turn our
attention towards preparing for the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ふむ、他家の動きで気になる所もあるが……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、他家の動きで気になる所もあるが……

engChrName: A number of members of the Lu family will be in town, so we'll have to come prepared with a reception that rises to the occasion.
engSearchText:
A number of members of the Lu family will be in
town, so we'll have to come prepared with a reception
that rises to the occasion.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ長老方の決定に従うのみさ。 相応の覚悟を持ってね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ長老方の決定に従うのみさ。
相応の覚悟を持ってね。

engChrName: The elders were in disarray last week, but I think things will finally be winding down soon.
engSearchText:
The elders were in disarray last week, but I think
things will finally be winding down soon.
jpnChrName: おや、よく来たねェ。 実は今度、彩雲閣の支店を開く事になってね。
jpnSearchText:
おや、よく来たねェ。
実は今度、彩雲閣の支店を開く事になってね。

engChrName: And that means it'll be my turn to receive them when they come to town. I can't disappoint them.
engSearchText:
And that means it'll be my turn to receive them when
they come to town. I can't disappoint them.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムのテロ騒動で空いたビル、 先月のアンカーヴィルで被害に逢った店舗。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムのテロ騒動で空いたビル、
先月のアンカーヴィルで被害に逢った店舗。

engChrName: We may have dealt a decisive blow to Almata, but they haven't been fully eradicated.
engSearchText:
We may have dealt a decisive blow to Almata, but
they haven't been fully eradicated.
jpnChrName: その辺りを買い取ってオープンする予定さ。 クック、いい店にしなくちゃねェ～？
jpnSearchText:
その辺りを買い取ってオープンする予定さ。
クック、いい店にしなくちゃねェ～？

engChrName: However, it should only be a matter of time before the remnants are rounded up.
engSearchText:
However, it should only be a matter of time before
the remnants are rounded up.
jpnChrName: んな笑顔で言われてもな、 キナ臭さ全開なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
んな笑顔で言われてもな、
キナ臭さ全開なんだが……

engChrName: Once that happens, the balance of power in the underworld is sure to shift. I can't wait to see who ends up on top.
engSearchText:
Once that happens, the balance of power in the
underworld is sure to shift. I can't wait to see who
ends up on top.
jpnChrName: アルマータへの牽制と出待ちってトコか？ 確かにここの所、動きが見えねえようだが──
jpnSearchText:
アルマータへの牽制と出待ちってトコか？
確かにここの所、動きが見えねえようだが──

engChrName: Those people have gone too far. We're left with no choice but to crush them.
engSearchText:
Those people have gone too far. We're left with no
choice but to crush them.
jpnChrName: アルマータへの牽制と、威力偵察でしょうか。 確かに最近、動きが見えないそうですが──
jpnSearchText:
アルマータへの牽制と、威力偵察でしょうか。
確かに最近、動きが見えないそうですが──

engChrName: How we'll accomplish that end is still up in the air, however.
engSearchText:
How we'll accomplish that end is still up in the
air, however.
jpnChrName: さて何の話だい？ アタシはいい店を開くのに専念するだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
さて何の話だい？
アタシはいい店を開くのに専念するだけさ。

engChrName: We'll have to follow the elders' orders to the letter, regardless of what those orders may be.
engSearchText:
We'll have to follow the elders' orders to the letter,
regardless of what those orders may be.
jpnChrName: ま、ハコは格安で押さえたが 状況次第では即撤退もあり得る──
jpnSearchText:
ま、ハコは格安で押さえたが
状況次第では即撤退もあり得る──

engChrName: With a situation as grave as this, there are only so many ways we can respond.
engSearchText:
With a situation as grave as this, there are only so
many ways we can respond.
jpnChrName: 柔軟に行くとしようかい。 それが主家（ウチ）の醍醐味なんでねェ。
jpnSearchText:
柔軟に行くとしようかい。
それが主家（ウチ）の醍醐味なんでねェ。

engChrName: Depending on how things go, it's possible that there could be blood on the streets of Edith.
engSearchText:
Depending on how things go, it's possible that there
could be blood on the streets of Edith.
jpnChrName: ウチは首都周辺が中心だが 地方に支店がない訳じゃなくてねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチは首都周辺が中心だが
地方に支店がない訳じゃなくてねェ。

engChrName: I'll admit. I do have my concerns about what the other families are up to right now.
engSearchText:
I'll admit. I do have my concerns about what the
other families are up to right now.
jpnChrName: 状況次第では即撤退もあり得るが── クック、そこは柔軟に行くとしようかい。
jpnSearchText:
状況次第では即撤退もあり得るが──
クック、そこは柔軟に行くとしようかい。

engChrName: But, in the end, we have to follow whatever orders the elders give us.
engSearchText:
But, in the end, we have to follow whatever orders the
elders give us.
jpnChrName: クック、カオハンを振り回すとはね。 クンミンはバイトだが、面白い子だよ。
jpnSearchText:
クック、カオハンを振り回すとはね。
クンミンはバイトだが、面白い子だよ。

engChrName: Great news. We've decided to open two new Caiyunge branches.
engSearchText:
Great news. We've decided to open two new
Caiyunge branches.
jpnChrName: ああいう“普通の子”が安心して 暮らせるってのが理想なんだろうけどねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ああいう“普通の子”が安心して
暮らせるってのが理想なんだろうけどねェ。

engChrName: We bought two properties: a building in Messeldam that emptied out after terror threats and an Anchorville storefront that got damaged last month.
engSearchText:
We bought two properties: a building in Messeldam
that emptied out after terror threats and an
Anchorville storefront that got damaged last month.
jpnChrName: アタシも気合を入れるとしようかい。 ……また“裏”にも妙な動きがあるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシも気合を入れるとしようかい。
……また“裏”にも妙な動きがあるようだ。

engChrName: You can be sure we'll be making them special places to visit.
engSearchText:
You can be sure we'll be making them special places
to visit.
jpnChrName: ツァオ辺りと連携しつつ 探りを入れて行かないとねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ辺りと連携しつつ
探りを入れて行かないとねェ。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Get that smug look off your face. These ventures of yours sound about as virtuous as Aaron.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. Get that smug look off your face.
These ventures of yours sound about as virtuous
as Aaron.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、特捜課の警部殿も 苦労が多いようだねェ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、特捜課の警部殿も
苦労が多いようだねェ。

engChrName: Hey, leave me out of this. So what's the goal? Trying to keep an eye on Almata?
engSearchText:
Hey, leave me out of this. So what's the goal?
Trying to keep an eye on Almata?
jpnChrName: まあマフィアの対策に乗り出してくれるのは ウチとしても願ったりさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあマフィアの対策に乗り出してくれるのは
ウチとしても願ったりさ。

engChrName: So why open stores in those places? Are you trying to keep an eye on Almata?
engSearchText:
So why open stores in those places? Are you trying to
keep an eye on Almata?
jpnChrName: クック、協力できる所は させてもらうとしようかねェ？
jpnSearchText:
クック、協力できる所は
させてもらうとしようかねェ？

engChrName: Hmm? I have no idea what you're talking about. I'm only trying to spread the joy of authentic Eastern cuisine to more places.
engSearchText:
Hmm? I have no idea what you're talking about.
I'm only trying to spread the joy of authentic Eastern
cuisine to more places.
jpnChrName: おや……アンタが《羅州の麒麟児》かい。 クック、噂は聞いているよ。
jpnSearchText:
おや……アンタが《羅州の麒麟児》かい。
クック、噂は聞いているよ。

engChrName: Mind you, the plan isn't set in stone. We got the properties for cheap, but depending on their condition, we might reconsider.
engSearchText:
Mind you, the plan isn't set in stone. We got the
properties for cheap, but depending on their
condition, we might reconsider.
jpnChrName: お友達の事はお悔やみ申し上げる。 参列は出来なかったが、香典は送っておいたさ。
jpnSearchText:
お友達の事はお悔やみ申し上げる。
参列は出来なかったが、香典は送っておいたさ。

engChrName: After all, our organization is nothing if not flexible. We're good at thinking on our feet.
engSearchText:
After all, our organization is nothing if not flexible.
We're good at thinking on our feet.
jpnChrName: ハン、首都にも黒月（アイツら）の拠点が あるとは聞いてたが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、首都にも黒月（アイツら）の拠点が
あるとは聞いてたが……

engChrName: We're very much interested in expanding into other regions.
engSearchText:
We're very much interested in expanding into
other regions.
jpnChrName: アンタが“仕切り”みてえだな ルウ家とは別口の、どこか穏健派ってトコかよ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタが“仕切り”みてえだな
ルウ家とは別口の、どこか穏健派ってトコかよ？

engChrName: Depending on the condition of the properties, though, we may pull out. We'll just have to see.
engSearchText:
Depending on the condition of the properties,
though, we may pull out. We'll just have to see.
jpnChrName: アハハ！　ツァオから聞いた通り 中々面白い子だ。
jpnSearchText:
アハハ！　ツァオから聞いた通り
中々面白い子だ。

engChrName: Hah. Kunming's got guts, bossing Kaohan around like that.
engSearchText:
Hah. Kunming's got guts, bossing Kaohan around
like that.
jpnChrName: ──またいつでも遊びに来な。 本場の煌都料理を振舞ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
──またいつでも遊びに来な。
本場の煌都料理を振舞ってやるよ。

engChrName: She's completely clueless about our true line of business—and personally, I'd like to keep it that way.
engSearchText:
She's completely clueless about our true line of
business—and personally, I'd like to keep it that way.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そりゃどーも。 （幹部の一人か？　胆力もありそうな姐さんだな。）
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そりゃどーも。
（幹部の一人か？　胆力もありそうな姐さんだな。）

engChrName: Things are heating up behind the scenes, so if I want her to stay out of harm's way, I'll have to redouble my efforts.
engSearchText:
Things are heating up behind the scenes, so if I want
her to stay out of harm's way, I'll have to redouble
my efforts.
jpnChrName: （お前とは気が合いそうではあるが……   あんま入り浸んなよ？）
jpnSearchText:
（お前とは気が合いそうではあるが……
あんま入り浸んなよ？）

engChrName: I'd better link up with Cao so we can start investigating the situation.
engSearchText:
I'd better link up with Cao so we can start
investigating the situation.
jpnChrName: 煌都の方であった事件については アタシも聞き及んでいるよ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の方であった事件については
アタシも聞き及んでいるよ。

engChrName: I wouldn't want to be that SID detective. He has his work cut out for him.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't want to be that SID detective. He has his
work cut out for him.
jpnChrName: あんたらも活躍したそうじゃないかい。 そして噂の《麒麟児》も……
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも活躍したそうじゃないかい。
そして噂の《麒麟児》も……

engChrName: I'm rooting for him, though. If the police are able to contain the mafia, that'd be quite the boon for us.
engSearchText:
I'm rooting for him, though. If the police are able to
contain the mafia, that'd be quite the boon for us.
jpnChrName: まあ、煌都でさえああなった以上、 首都は一層気を抜けないね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、煌都でさえああなった以上、
首都は一層気を抜けないね。

engChrName: Perhaps I'll see what I can do to help, insofar as circumstances allow me.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I'll see what I can do to help, insofar as
circumstances allow me.
jpnChrName: もっとも、首都を預かる身としちゃ これを好機に変えるのも手だけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、首都を預かる身としちゃ
これを好機に変えるのも手だけどねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, you must be the famous Crimson Khan I've heard so much about. It's a pleasure to meet you at last.
engSearchText:
Oh, you must be the famous Crimson Khan I've
heard so much about. It's a pleasure to meet you
at last.
jpnChrName: 料理店経営ってのも、その実 地域の足場を作りやすい業態ではあってね。
jpnSearchText:
料理店経営ってのも、その実
地域の足場を作りやすい業態ではあってね。

engChrName: My deepest condolences about what happened to your friends. I wasn't able to attend the service, but I did send a funeral offering.
engSearchText:
My deepest condolences about what happened to
your friends. I wasn't able to attend the service, but I
did send a funeral offering.
jpnChrName: 首都は代々うちが地盤を固めてきたんだが、 それなりに重要な役回りなのさ。
jpnSearchText:
首都は代々うちが地盤を固めてきたんだが、
それなりに重要な役回りなのさ。

engChrName: Thanks. Nice to meet you, too. I knew Heiyue had some kinda operation up here.
engSearchText:
Thanks. Nice to meet you, too. I knew Heiyue had
some kinda operation up here.
jpnChrName: 煌都の一件以来、キナ臭い話も増えてきた。 アンタ達も巻き込まれないように気を付けな。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の一件以来、キナ臭い話も増えてきた。
アンタ達も巻き込まれないように気を付けな。

engChrName: You must be the one who calls the shots around here. Who're you with? I'm guessing it's not the Lu family, is it?
engSearchText:
You must be the one who calls the shots around here.
Who're you with? I'm guessing it's not the Lu family,
is it?
jpnChrName: おや、アークライド所長。 夕食は済ませたんじゃなかったかい？
jpnSearchText:
おや、アークライド所長。
夕食は済ませたんじゃなかったかい？

engChrName: Ahaha! Already cutting to the chase, are we? Cao was right—you're an absolute riot.
engSearchText:
Ahaha! Already cutting to the chase, are we? Cao was
right—you're an absolute riot.
jpnChrName: 知ってて聞くんじゃねえよ。 ったく黒月（おたく）は人が悪い連中ばっかだな。
jpnSearchText:
知ってて聞くんじゃねえよ。
ったく黒月（おたく）は人が悪い連中ばっかだな。

engChrName: Come back whenever you like and I'll treat you to some Langport dishes done right. Don't be a stranger, you hear?
engSearchText:
Come back whenever you like and I'll treat you to
some Langport dishes done right. Don't be a
stranger, you hear?
jpnChrName: ああ、ツァオの事か。 また上手く乗せられたようだねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ツァオの事か。
また上手く乗せられたようだねェ。

engChrName: Nice. I'll keep that in mind. (Is she one of the higher ups? Definitely looks like a tough chick.)
engSearchText:
Nice. I'll keep that in mind.
(Is she one of the higher ups? Definitely looks like a
tough chick.)
jpnChrName: “生ドライフルーツ”の取り寄せを 頼まれた時には何に使うのかと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
“生ドライフルーツ”の取り寄せを
頼まれた時には何に使うのかと思ったが。

engChrName: (Don't get any funny ideas. I'm sure you two would hit it off, but trust me, you don't wanna get in the habit of comin' here.)
engSearchText:
(Don't get any funny ideas. I'm sure you two would
hit it off, but trust me, you don't wanna get in the
habit of comin' here.)
jpnChrName: クック……アタシとは仕えている家が違うんでね。 肩を持つつもりもないが、やはり中々気が利く男さ。
jpnSearchText:
クック……アタシとは仕えている家が違うんでね。
肩を持つつもりもないが、やはり中々気が利く男さ。

engChrName: I caught wind of what happened over in Langport.
engSearchText: I caught wind of what happened over in Langport.
jpnChrName: （……黒月を束ねる８人の長老、その各々の家から   幹部が輩出される習わしらしいが──）
jpnSearchText:
（……黒月を束ねる８人の長老、その各々の家から
幹部が輩出される習わしらしいが──）

engChrName: It seems you all handled the situation quite well.
engSearchText: It seems you all handled the situation quite well.
jpnChrName: （恐らくこの姐さんも、ツァオと同格の幹部……   奴とは別の形で黒月を支えてるんだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（恐らくこの姐さんも、ツァオと同格の幹部……
奴とは別の形で黒月を支えてるんだろう。）

engChrName: At any rate, what happened in Langport indicates we need to be on guard here in the capital. If chaos can strike there, it can strike here.
engSearchText:
At any rate, what happened in Langport indicates we
need to be on guard here in the capital. If chaos can
strike there, it can strike here.
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、内部事情なんざ知りたくもないが   あんま迂闊な話はできないってのは確かだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、内部事情なんざ知りたくもないが
あんま迂闊な話はできないってのは確かだな。）

engChrName: Although, I do like being able to turn those situations to my advantage.
engSearchText:
Although, I do like being able to turn those situations
to my advantage.
jpnChrName: ツァオとは仕えている家が違うんでね。 肩を持つつもりもないが、中々気が利く男だ。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオとは仕えている家が違うんでね。
肩を持つつもりもないが、中々気が利く男だ。

engChrName: The restaurant business is a natural path to building a foothold into a region.
engSearchText:
The restaurant business is a natural path to building a
foothold into a region.
jpnChrName: 実際、今の煌都は騒がしい。 多少の保険は必要なんじゃないかい？
jpnSearchText:
実際、今の煌都は騒がしい。
多少の保険は必要なんじゃないかい？

engChrName: Our family has cemented its position in the capital over generations now, so we have a good grasp of all that goes on behind the scenes.
engSearchText:
Our family has cemented its position in the capital
over generations now, so we have a good grasp of all
that goes on behind the scenes.
jpnChrName: それこそ願い下げなんだがな…… ったく面倒な事になったもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ願い下げなんだがな……
ったく面倒な事になったもんだぜ。

engChrName: Things have gotten dicier around here in the past couple of weeks. Be careful not to get caught up in any trouble.
engSearchText:
Things have gotten dicier around here in the past
couple of weeks. Be careful not to get caught up in
any trouble.
jpnChrName: クック、今はアンタ達に対する 期待値だと思っておきな。
jpnSearchText:
クック、今はアンタ達に対する
期待値だと思っておきな。

engChrName: Welcome back, Mr. Arkride. What brings you here of all places? Haven't you had your dinner by now?
engSearchText:
Welcome back, Mr. Arkride. What brings you here
of all places? Haven't you had your dinner by now?
jpnChrName: ところで、２階席に面白い客が来ていてね。
jpnSearchText: ところで、２階席に面白い客が来ていてね。

engChrName: Don't ask questions you already know the answers to, lady.
engSearchText:
Don't ask questions you already know the answers
to, lady.
jpnChrName: フフ、ウチとしても歓迎さ。 ぜひ彩雲閣を楽しんでいって欲しいものだねェ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ウチとしても歓迎さ。
ぜひ彩雲閣を楽しんでいって欲しいものだねェ。

engChrName: Aww. Did Cao get you in a snippy mood? Poor thing.
engSearchText: Aww. Did Cao get you in a snippy mood? Poor thing.
jpnChrName: 彩雲閣へようこそ。 本場の東方料理、味わっていくといい。
jpnSearchText:
彩雲閣へようこそ。
本場の東方料理、味わっていくといい。

engChrName: When he asked me to order that dried fruit, I was wondering what he needed it for. And now I have my answer.
engSearchText:
When he asked me to order that dried fruit, I was
wondering what he needed it for. And now I have
my answer.
jpnChrName: フフ、首都でウチ以上の 東方料理店はないはずさ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、首都でウチ以上の
東方料理店はないはずさ。

engChrName: I'm not one to take sides on these things. Cao and I come from different families, but I know this much about him: he can be a very persuasive man.
engSearchText:
I'm not one to take sides on these things. Cao and I
come from different families, but I know this much
about him: he can be a very persuasive man.
jpnChrName: 私も入るのは初めてですけど…… 中もとても立派ですね。
jpnSearchText:
私も入るのは初めてですけど……
中もとても立派ですね。

engChrName: (From what I've heard, it's customary for the eight elders who run Heiyue to come from each of the different families.)
engSearchText:
(From what I've heard, it's customary for the eight
elders who run Heiyue to come from each of the
different families.)
jpnChrName: それに東方料理── 香ばしい匂いがして興味をそそります！
jpnSearchText:
それに東方料理──
香ばしい匂いがして興味をそそります！

engChrName: (If I had to guess, Mau's probably at the same level in the organization as Cao, but she doesn't serve the same role as him.)
engSearchText:
(If I had to guess, Mau's probably at the same level in
the organization as Cao, but she doesn't serve the
same role as him.)
jpnChrName: それはありがたい言葉だねェ。
jpnSearchText: それはありがたい言葉だねェ。

engChrName: (Ugh. It's not like I care to know the inner workings of these people, but I'd be eaten alive in my dealings with them if I didn't.)
engSearchText:
(Ugh. It's not like I care to know the inner workings
of these people, but I'd be eaten alive in my dealings
with them if I didn't.)
jpnChrName: そちらの“所長さん”も 今日は寛いでいくといい。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの“所長さん”も
今日は寛いでいくといい。

engChrName: I'm not one to take sides. After all, Cao and I come from different families, but I do know he can be a very persuasive man.
engSearchText:
I'm not one to take sides. After all, Cao and I come
from different families, but I do know he can be a
very persuasive man.
jpnChrName: クック、客である以上 彩雲閣の主人としてもてなさせてもらうよ？
jpnSearchText:
クック、客である以上
彩雲閣の主人としてもてなさせてもらうよ？

engChrName: I hear Langport is quite the rowdy city these days. You sure you don't need a little insurance going into a place like that?
engSearchText:
I hear Langport is quite the rowdy city these days.
You sure you don't need a little insurance going into a
place like that?
jpnChrName: へいへい、そりゃどーも。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、そりゃどーも。

engChrName: I'm fine. Ugh, this is already a pain in the ass, and we haven't even started.
engSearchText:
I'm fine. Ugh, this is already a pain in the ass, and we
haven't even started.
jpnChrName: （……？　ヴァンさんの   顔見知りなのかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
（……？　ヴァンさんの
顔見知りなのかな……？）

engChrName: I'm sure he only gave you such a challenging job because he knew you could handle it.
engSearchText:
I'm sure he only gave you such a challenging job
because he knew you could handle it.
jpnChrName: 中々見所のあるお嬢ちゃんたちだ。 本場の東方料理を味わっていくといい。
jpnSearchText:
中々見所のあるお嬢ちゃんたちだ。
本場の東方料理を味わっていくといい。

engChrName: Oh, you may also be interested to know that we have a pair of intriguing guests on the second floor.
engSearchText:
Oh, you may also be interested to know that we have
a pair of intriguing guests on the second floor.
jpnChrName: クック、そちらの“所長さん”も どうぞ良しなに。
jpnSearchText:
クック、そちらの“所長さん”も
どうぞ良しなに。

engChrName: Hopefully they enjoy their time with us. We always aim to please.
engSearchText:
Hopefully they enjoy their time with us. We always
aim to please.
jpnChrName: （やれやれ……）
jpnSearchText: （やれやれ……）

engChrName: Welcome to Caiyunge, Edith's number one home for Eastern cuisine.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Caiyunge, Edith's number one home
for Eastern cuisine.
jpnChrName: （何かありそうだけど……）
jpnSearchText: （何かありそうだけど……）

engChrName: You won't find a single restaurant in this city with more authentic food. I guarantee it.
engSearchText:
You won't find a single restaurant in this city with
more authentic food. I guarantee it.
jpnChrName: ……事態を打開する作戦のため、店内で ファン大人方が打ち合わせをされています。
jpnSearchText:
……事態を打開する作戦のため、店内で
ファン大人方が打ち合わせをされています。

engChrName: I've never been inside here before. It looks very nice and clean.
engSearchText:
I've never been inside here before. It looks very nice
and clean.
jpnChrName: 本来であれば今夜は、ファン大人に 料理を振る舞う予定でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
本来であれば今夜は、ファン大人に
料理を振る舞う予定でしたが……

engChrName: Yeah, and the food smells great! It's making me hungry!
engSearchText:
Yeah, and the food smells great! It's making
me hungry!
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、黒月に仕える者として為すべき事が あるという事実には変わりありません。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、黒月に仕える者として為すべき事が
あるという事実には変わりありません。

engChrName: That's very kind of you to say. Thank you.
engSearchText: That's very kind of you to say. Thank you.
jpnChrName: であれば……如何なる使命であれど 果たすのみでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
であれば……如何なる使命であれど
果たすのみでしょう。

engChrName: Ah. Well, if it isn't the chief of Arkride Solutions himself. How kind of you to grace us with your presence.
engSearchText:
Ah. Well, if it isn't the chief of Arkride
Solutions himself. How kind of you to grace us with
your presence.
jpnChrName: ……“球”の破壊、お見事でした。 こちらの事はお任せを。
jpnSearchText:
……“球”の破壊、お見事でした。
こちらの事はお任せを。

engChrName: Oh, please do make yourself at home, good sir. It is my honor and pleasure to serve such a distinguished guest.
engSearchText:
Oh, please do make yourself at home, good sir. It is
my honor and pleasure to serve such a
distinguished guest.
jpnChrName: どうやら各勢力も動き出している様子── 我々も矜持を示すとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら各勢力も動き出している様子──
我々も矜持を示すとしましょう。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.
jpnChrName: 九龍──いえ《黒月》の名に懸けて。
jpnSearchText: 九龍──いえ《黒月》の名に懸けて。

engChrName: (Hmm? That was an...odd exchange. Are they acquainted?)
engSearchText:
(Hmm? That was an...odd exchange. Are
they acquainted?)
jpnChrName: 我々が首都に根を下ろしているのは かような事態に備える為でもあります。
jpnSearchText:
我々が首都に根を下ろしているのは
かような事態に備える為でもあります。

engChrName: You ladies both look like bright young women. We'll serve you the finest Eastern cuisine you'll ever taste, so we hope you enjoy your time here.
engSearchText:
You ladies both look like bright young women.
We'll serve you the finest Eastern cuisine you'll ever
taste, so we hope you enjoy your time here.
jpnChrName: 想定を超える状況ではありますが 既に動ける人間を編成し、事に当たっている所。
jpnSearchText:
想定を超える状況ではありますが
既に動ける人間を編成し、事に当たっている所。

engChrName: Oh, and same to you, Mr. Arkride. Enjoy your meal.
engSearchText: Oh, and same to you, Mr. Arkride. Enjoy your meal.
jpnChrName: こちらの警備、並びに避難者についても どうかお任せを。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの警備、並びに避難者についても
どうかお任せを。

engChrName: (Hrrng. This lady ticks me off.)
engSearchText: (Hrrng. This lady ticks me off.)
jpnChrName: ……警備の方はご心配なく。 自分が責任を持って見張っていますから。
jpnSearchText:
……警備の方はご心配なく。
自分が責任を持って見張っていますから。

engChrName: (Okay, yes. They're definitely acquainted.)
engSearchText: (Okay, yes. They're definitely acquainted.)
jpnChrName: 少々武術の心得がありまして。 店内の安全はこの身に代えても保証しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
少々武術の心得がありまして。
店内の安全はこの身に代えても保証しましょう。

engChrName: Fan, Cao, Lady Ashen, and Ms. Mau are discussing the operation that will hopefully put an end to this crisis.
engSearchText:
Fan, Cao, Lady Ashen, and Ms. Mau are discussing
the operation that will hopefully put an end to
this crisis.
jpnChrName: とはいえ──今の状況では店を離れて各所を 偵察するのも難しい状況なのも事実です。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ──今の状況では店を離れて各所を
偵察するのも難しい状況なのも事実です。

engChrName: I would've taken great pleasure in treating Fan to all my finest dishes. Alas, it wasn't meant to be.
engSearchText:
I would've taken great pleasure in treating Fan to all
my finest dishes. Alas, it wasn't meant to be.
jpnChrName: あの忌々しい“球”さえ 破壊できれば、あるいは……
jpnSearchText:
あの忌々しい“球”さえ
破壊できれば、あるいは……

engChrName: Regardless, I still have a role I must play.
engSearchText: Regardless, I still have a role I must play.
jpnChrName: …………革命記念祭、どうか 当店の料理で楽しんでいかれますよう。
jpnSearchText:
…………革命記念祭、どうか
当店の料理で楽しんでいかれますよう。

engChrName: Whatever fate has in store for me, I shall carry my duties out to the very end.
engSearchText:
Whatever fate has in store for me, I shall carry my
duties out to the very end.
jpnChrName: ウザ……じゃなかった。 コホン、ご注文でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ウザ……じゃなかった。
コホン、ご注文でしょうか？

engChrName: You all did well in exterminating those spheres. We shall handle the rest from here.
engSearchText:
You all did well in exterminating those spheres.
We shall handle the rest from here.
jpnChrName: （またこのパターンか、やれやれ……）
jpnSearchText: （またこのパターンか、やれやれ……）

engChrName: Other groups are doing their utmost to resolve the crisis at hand. So, too, shall we rise to the occasion— and proudly so.
engSearchText:
Other groups are doing their utmost to resolve the
crisis at hand. So, too, shall we rise to the occasion—
and proudly so.
jpnChrName: （まあいい、一応病欠だった設定だし   しばらくは彼女の言いなりになってやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあいい、一応病欠だった設定だし
しばらくは彼女の言いなりになってやるか。）

engChrName: This is a defining moment for Kowloon—no, for all of Heiyue. Our legacy will be defined by what we do in these crucial moments.
engSearchText:
This is a defining moment for Kowloon—no, for all
of Heiyue. Our legacy will be defined by what we do
in these crucial moments.
jpnChrName: …………いらっしゃいませ。 ご注文は？
jpnSearchText:
…………いらっしゃいませ。
ご注文は？

engChrName: One of the reasons we set up shop in this city was so we could respond to situations such as this.
engSearchText:
One of the reasons we set up shop in this city was so
we could respond to situations such as this.
jpnChrName: …………何なりとお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText: …………何なりとお申し付けください。

engChrName: Nobody could've seen anything like this coming, but we're already assembling whatever members we can dispatch.
engSearchText:
Nobody could've seen anything like this coming, but
we're already assembling whatever members we
can dispatch.

engChrName: Don't worry about the evacuees. You can leave them and the security of this area to us.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about the evacuees. You can leave them
and the security of this area to us.
jpnChrName: いえ、何でもありません。 少々考え事を……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、何でもありません。
少々考え事を……

engChrName: There's no need to concern yourselves about us. I have some knowledge of martial arts, so I can look after everyone.
engSearchText:
There's no need to concern yourselves about us.
I have some knowledge of martial arts, so I can look
after everyone.
jpnChrName: （スキャンダルの陰で   妙な動きもあるようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（スキャンダルの陰で
妙な動きもあるようだが……）

engChrName: I'm fully prepared to lay down my life to protect this establishment and the people here.
engSearchText:
I'm fully prepared to lay down my life to protect this
establishment and the people here.
jpnChrName: （長老会に報告を上げておくべきか……）
jpnSearchText: （長老会に報告を上げておくべきか……）

engChrName: I wish I could leave the restaurant and survey other parts of the city.
engSearchText:
I wish I could leave the restaurant and survey other
parts of the city.
jpnChrName: …………どうぞごゆっくり。
jpnSearchText: …………どうぞごゆっくり。

engChrName: If only we could get rid of those annoying spheres...
engSearchText: If only we could get rid of those annoying spheres...
jpnChrName: （……この雑用の山は一体……   “彼女”の仕業か……）
jpnSearchText:
（……この雑用の山は一体……
“彼女”の仕業か……）

engChrName: Thank you for choosing to dine with us. We hope you're enjoying the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Thank you for choosing to dine with us. We hope
you're enjoying the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、面倒な……   事情を知らぬ一介のバイトだからな──）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、面倒な……
事情を知らぬ一介のバイトだからな──）

engChrName: Ugh. Must she always make such a racket... *cough* Sorry. May I take your order?
engSearchText:
Ugh. Must she always make such a racket...
*cough* Sorry. May I take your order?
jpnChrName: …………どうか気にせずご注文下さい。
jpnSearchText: …………どうか気にせずご注文下さい。

engChrName: (This madness again? Give me a break.)
engSearchText: (This madness again? Give me a break.)
jpnChrName: …………何なりとお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText: …………何なりとお申し付けください。

engChrName: (Well, I was 'out sick' for a while. I suppose I can do whatever she wants for the time being.)
engSearchText:
(Well, I was 'out sick' for a while. I suppose I can do
whatever she wants for the time being.)

engChrName: ...Ah, welcome. May I take your order?
engSearchText: ...Ah, welcome. May I take your order?
jpnChrName: ……自分の顔に何かついていますか？
jpnSearchText: ……自分の顔に何かついていますか？

engChrName: ...Is there something on the menu that catches your eye?
engSearchText:
...Is there something on the menu that catches
your eye?
jpnChrName: いや……何つーかただ者じゃねぇなって。 一応、“氣”はそれなりに感じられるんでな。
jpnSearchText:
いや……何つーかただ者じゃねぇなって。
一応、“氣”はそれなりに感じられるんでな。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ええ、それはもちろん。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それはもちろん。

engChrName: Oh, don't mind me. I was simply mulling something over.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind me. I was simply mulling
something over.
jpnChrName: これでも……ふふ、あの厳しいオーナーに 認められたシェフと自認してますのでね。
jpnSearchText:
これでも……ふふ、あの厳しいオーナーに
認められたシェフと自認してますのでね。

engChrName: (There's something fishy about that whole scandal...)
engSearchText: (There's something fishy about that whole scandal...)
jpnChrName: ハッ……ごまかしやがる。 まあ、飯の腕も凄いのは事実だろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……ごまかしやがる。
まあ、飯の腕も凄いのは事実だろうが……

engChrName: (Perhaps I should report it to the elders.)
engSearchText: (Perhaps I should report it to the elders.)
jpnChrName: （……まあ、口ぶりからしてあのオーナーの護衛 　或いは主家との連絡役ってとこか……）
jpnSearchText:
（……まあ、口ぶりからしてあのオーナーの護衛
　或いは主家との連絡役ってとこか……）

engChrName: ...Please, take your time while you're here. Relax and enjoy.
engSearchText:
...Please, take your time while you're here. Relax
and enjoy.
jpnChrName: （何にせよ……普通に店を利用する限り、 　脅威は無さそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（何にせよ……普通に店を利用する限り、
　脅威は無さそうだな。）

engChrName: (What's with all these odd jobs? Did that part-timer girl put me up to this...?)
engSearchText:
(What's with all these odd jobs? Did that part-timer
girl put me up to this...?)
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、そちらの事務所に加わった 《羅州の麒麟児》、ご一緒でないので？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、そちらの事務所に加わった
《羅州の麒麟児》、ご一緒でないので？

engChrName: (*sigh* What a hassle. I guess there's only so much she can handle, but still...)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* What a hassle. I guess there's only so much
she can handle, but still...)
jpnChrName: 彼の好みの料理も把握済みでしてね。 これでも煌都との“連絡役”も兼ねてますので。
jpnSearchText:
彼の好みの料理も把握済みでしてね。
これでも煌都との“連絡役”も兼ねてますので。

engChrName: ...I'll take your order whenever you're ready.
engSearchText: ...I'll take your order whenever you're ready.
jpnChrName: （相変わらず隙がねぇな……）
jpnSearchText: （相変わらず隙がねぇな……）

engChrName: ...Is there something on the menu that catches your eye?
engSearchText:
...Is there something on the menu that catches
your eye?
jpnChrName: （連絡役っつっても……   それだけじゃなさそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（連絡役っつっても……
それだけじゃなさそうだが……）

jpnChrName: それはそうと、何か料理の注文は？
jpnSearchText: それはそうと、何か料理の注文は？

engChrName: Do I...have something on my face?
engSearchText: Do I...have something on my face?
jpnChrName: 自分としては火鍋を勧めておきますよ。 辛みを活かすのは自分の十八番ですので。
jpnSearchText:
自分としては火鍋を勧めておきますよ。
辛みを活かすのは自分の十八番ですので。

engChrName: Nah, I was just sizing you up. I can tell you're packing some real chi under that chef's hat.
engSearchText:
Nah, I was just sizing you up. I can tell you're packing
some real chi under that chef's hat.
jpnChrName: …………どうか気にせずご注文下さい。
jpnSearchText: …………どうか気にせずご注文下さい。

engChrName: But of course.
engSearchText: But of course.

engChrName: Not to boast, but Ms. Mau has incredibly high standards. I couldn't serve as a cook in this establishment unless I had what it took.
engSearchText:
Not to boast, but Ms. Mau has incredibly
high standards. I couldn't serve as a cook in this
establishment unless I had what it took.
jpnChrName: …………………ごゆっくりどうぞ。
jpnSearchText: …………………ごゆっくりどうぞ。

engChrName: Uhh... I wasn't talking about your cooking skills.
engSearchText: Uhh... I wasn't talking about your cooking skills.
jpnChrName: …………………ごゆっくりどうぞ。
jpnSearchText: …………………ごゆっくりどうぞ。

engChrName: (The way he's talkin', I bet he's either Mau's bodyguard or her contact with the main part of the organization.)
engSearchText:
(The way he's talkin', I bet he's either Mau's
bodyguard or her contact with the main part of
the organization.)
jpnChrName: カオハン君、お疲れ～！ 賄いできたから食べてきたら？
jpnSearchText:
カオハン君、お疲れ～！
賄いできたから食べてきたら？

engChrName: (So long as we just come here to eat, he shouldn't pose a threat.)
engSearchText:
(So long as we just come here to eat, he shouldn't
pose a threat.)
jpnChrName: フフン……といっても作ったのは 私じゃなくて厨房長だけどねっ！！
jpnSearchText:
フフン……といっても作ったのは
私じゃなくて厨房長だけどねっ！！

engChrName: Welcome. I see you don't have your office's latest hire with you. That's unfortunate.
engSearchText:
Welcome. I see you don't have your office's latest hire
with you. That's unfortunate.

engChrName: I managed to work out the Crimson Khan's food preferences today on top of my normal duties. I function as our liaison with Langport.
engSearchText:
I managed to work out the Crimson Khan's food
preferences today on top of my normal duties.
I function as our liaison with Langport.
jpnChrName: ちょ、なんでウザそうな顔するの～！？ カウンター担当を代わってあげにきたのに！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、なんでウザそうな顔するの～！？
カウンター担当を代わってあげにきたのに！

engChrName: (Damn. Nothing gets past this guy, does it?)
engSearchText: (Damn. Nothing gets past this guy, does it?)

engChrName: (I've got a feeling he's more than just a go-between guy with Heiyue's different branches.)
engSearchText:
(I've got a feeling he's more than just a go-between
guy with Heiyue's different branches.)
jpnChrName: んも～、相も変わらず不愛想なんだから……
jpnSearchText: んも～、相も変わらず不愛想なんだから……

engChrName: At any rate, may I take your order?
engSearchText: At any rate, may I take your order?
jpnChrName: ま、ここはオトナな私が 折れてあげるけどねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、ここはオトナな私が
折れてあげるけどねっ！

engChrName: I would personally recommend the hotpot. It's something of a specialty of mine.
engSearchText:
I would personally recommend the hotpot.
It's something of a specialty of mine.
jpnChrName: ねえカオハン君、さっき貸し切りだった お客様なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ねえカオハン君、さっき貸し切りだった
お客様なんだけど……

engChrName: ...I'll take your order whenever you're ready.
engSearchText: ...I'll take your order whenever you're ready.

engChrName: ...Greetings.
engSearchText: ...Greetings.
jpnChrName: 一回も私に給仕させてくれなかったから ちょっと気になって……
jpnSearchText:
一回も私に給仕させてくれなかったから
ちょっと気になって……

engChrName: ...Please, take your time while you're here. Relax and enjoy.
engSearchText:
...Please, take your time while you're here. Relax
and enjoy.
jpnChrName: もしかして私、何か失礼だった……？
jpnSearchText: もしかして私、何か失礼だった……？

engChrName: ...Please, take your time while you're here. Relax and enjoy.
engSearchText:
...Please, take your time while you're here. Relax
and enjoy.

engChrName: Kaohan, Kaohan! I brought you some food!
engSearchText: Kaohan, Kaohan! I brought you some food!
jpnChrName: （ええ～、何かありそうだし   気になるんだけど～！？）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ～、何かありそうだし
気になるんだけど～！？）

engChrName: The head chef made it himself, so it should be nice and tasty!
engSearchText:
The head chef made it himself, so it should be nice
and tasty!
jpnChrName: （フム、黒月幹部のもてなしを   担当してたっつーことは……）
jpnSearchText:
（フム、黒月幹部のもてなしを
担当してたっつーことは……）

jpnChrName: （青年の方はそっち筋なんだろうな。 この隙の無さも含めて──）
jpnSearchText:
（青年の方はそっち筋なんだろうな。
この隙の無さも含めて──）

engChrName: Huh? Whaddaya mean, 'Oh'? Were you raised in a barn?! When someone brings food to you, you're SUPPOSED to say, 'Thank you.'
engSearchText:
Huh? Whaddaya mean, 'Oh'? Were you raised in
a barn?! When someone brings food to you, you're
SUPPOSED to say, 'Thank you.'
jpnChrName: オーナーと、九龍グループの偉い方たち…… 一体何の話をされているんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
オーナーと、九龍グループの偉い方たち……
一体何の話をされているんでしょうか？

jpnChrName: というか、オーナー達の動じなさと言い、 九龍の方々との話し合いと言い……
jpnSearchText:
というか、オーナー達の動じなさと言い、
九龍の方々との話し合いと言い……

engChrName: Grr... Now you're doing it on purpose!
engSearchText: Grr... Now you're doing it on purpose!
jpnChrName: あと、たまに私を貸し切りの時に 接客させてくれないのも思えば……
jpnSearchText:
あと、たまに私を貸し切りの時に
接客させてくれないのも思えば……

engChrName: Oh, well. Since I'm SOOO nice and mature, I'll let it slide—but only this once! You better watch yourself, buster!
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Since I'm SOOO nice and mature, I'll let it
slide—but only this once! You better watch
yourself, buster!
jpnChrName: ……もしかしてですけど、このお店って…… あの《黒月》のお店だったんです……？
jpnSearchText:
……もしかしてですけど、このお店って……
あの《黒月》のお店だったんです……？

engChrName: Hey, Kaohan. You know that customer who booked the entire restaurant earlier?
engSearchText:
Hey, Kaohan. You know that customer who booked
the entire restaurant earlier?
jpnChrName: （……マジで天然で今の今まで気づいて   いなかったのか、この娘は……）
jpnSearchText:
（……マジで天然で今の今まで気づいて
いなかったのか、この娘は……）

engChrName: ...Yes. What about it?
engSearchText: ...Yes. What about it?
jpnChrName: （ま……マウ姐さんにも可愛がられるようだし、   別に良いんじゃねぇか？）
jpnSearchText:
（ま……マウ姐さんにも可愛がられるようだし、
別に良いんじゃねぇか？）

engChrName: It kinda bothers me that I never got to do any serving that entire time.
engSearchText:
It kinda bothers me that I never got to do any serving
that entire time.
jpnChrName: でも、私がオーナーやカオハンさんを尊敬する 気持ちは微塵も変わらないですよ！
jpnSearchText:
でも、私がオーナーやカオハンさんを尊敬する
気持ちは微塵も変わらないですよ！

engChrName: Did I do something wrong? Was I rude somehow?
engSearchText: Did I do something wrong? Was I rude somehow?
jpnChrName: むしろ、堅気の私を快く雇って、危険から 遠ざけてくれて、有難いくらいですし……
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、堅気の私を快く雇って、危険から
遠ざけてくれて、有難いくらいですし……

engChrName: ...No. You were fine.
engSearchText: ...No. You were fine.
jpnChrName: 今一度、このお店を支えるために、オーナー達と 明日を迎えるために私なりに頑張りますっ！
jpnSearchText:
今一度、このお店を支えるために、オーナー達と
明日を迎えるために私なりに頑張りますっ！

engChrName: (Well, it sure seems like something was going on. It's bothering the heck out of me!)
engSearchText:
(Well, it sure seems like something was going on.
It's bothering the heck out of me!)
jpnChrName: どうやら外も少し落ち着いたようで…… 皆さん、本当にありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText:
どうやら外も少し落ち着いたようで……
皆さん、本当にありがとうございます！

engChrName: (The fact that he was servin' upper management could only mean one thing.)
engSearchText:
(The fact that he was servin' upper management
could only mean one thing.)
jpnChrName: しかも、カオハンさんやオーナーには 何か考えもあるみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
しかも、カオハンさんやオーナーには
何か考えもあるみたいで……

engChrName: (He must be one of them. That would explain why he always looks on guard.)
engSearchText:
(He must be one of them. That would explain why he
always looks on guard.)
jpnChrName: ──詳しい事は分からないですが今、 改めてこの店で働けて良かったと思います。
jpnSearchText:
──詳しい事は分からないですが今、
改めてこの店で働けて良かったと思います。

engChrName: I wonder what Ms. Mau and those Kowloon Group bigwigs are discussing.
engSearchText:
I wonder what Ms. Mau and those Kowloon Group
bigwigs are discussing.
jpnChrName: 皆さんとも知り合えましたし、頼もしいオーナーや カオハンさんを微力ながらお手伝い出来ますし……
jpnSearchText:
皆さんとも知り合えましたし、頼もしいオーナーや
カオハンさんを微力ながらお手伝い出来ますし……

engChrName: Whatever it is, she looked calm when I snuck a peek at them, so maybe it's nothing too serious.
engSearchText:
Whatever it is, she looked calm when I snuck a peek
at them, so maybe it's nothing too serious.
jpnChrName: ま、まさか記念祭が……こんな形で 台無しになっちゃうなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか記念祭が……こんな形で
台無しになっちゃうなんて……！

engChrName: But I just don't understand why she won't let me serve those guys whenever they book the restaurant to themselves.
engSearchText:
But I just don't understand why she won't let me
serve those guys whenever they book the restaurant
to themselves.
jpnChrName: でも、オーナーさんもカオハンさんも…… 冷静に対処して人も助けて……凄いです！
jpnSearchText:
でも、オーナーさんもカオハンさんも……
冷静に対処して人も助けて……凄いです！

engChrName: ...Wait. I just had a crazy thought. Could this place be...a front for Heiyue?
engSearchText:
...Wait. I just had a crazy thought. Could this place
be...a front for Heiyue?
jpnChrName: でも……どうして、東方料理屋の 経営者と料理人にここまでできるのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
でも……どうして、東方料理屋の
経営者と料理人にここまでできるのかな……？

engChrName: (She's only NOW realizing that?!)
engSearchText: (She's only NOW realizing that?!)
jpnChrName: う～ん……謎ですけど、頼りになるし、 お二人共良い人ですし別に良いですよね！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん……謎ですけど、頼りになるし、
お二人共良い人ですし別に良いですよね！

engChrName: (And the award for the most oblivious girl in the world goes to...)
engSearchText:
(And the award for the most oblivious girl in the
world goes to...)
jpnChrName: それなら私も、出来る範囲でお二人の お手伝いをしないと！
jpnSearchText:
それなら私も、出来る範囲でお二人の
お手伝いをしないと！

engChrName: Well, even if Ms. Mau and Kaohan work for Heiyue, that's okay! I still respect them a ton!
engSearchText:
Well, even if Ms. Mau and Kaohan work for
Heiyue, that's okay! I still respect them a ton!
jpnChrName: 私でも、お薬を用意したり避難してきた人の 応急手当をしたり……
jpnSearchText:
私でも、お薬を用意したり避難してきた人の
応急手当をしたり……

engChrName: If anything, I respect them even more now. They gave me this job and kept me out of harm's way this whole time.
engSearchText:
If anything, I respect them even more now.
They gave me this job and kept me out of harm's way
this whole time.
jpnChrName: お二人が冷静なお陰で、それくらいなら ちゃんとできるはずです、少しでもお力に……！
jpnSearchText:
お二人が冷静なお陰で、それくらいなら
ちゃんとできるはずです、少しでもお力に……！

engChrName: I've gotta do everything I can to help! This restaurant needs me, too, and I wanna get through this with everyone!
engSearchText:
I've gotta do everything I can to help! This restaurant
needs me, too, and I wanna get through this
with everyone!
jpnChrName: ぴゃ～！！　忙しい忙しい！ こんなにお客さんが来るなんて！！
jpnSearchText:
ぴゃ～！！　忙しい忙しい！
こんなにお客さんが来るなんて！！

engChrName: Thank you guys so much! It sounds like things are calming down outside.
engSearchText:
Thank you guys so much! It sounds like things are
calming down outside.
jpnChrName: 私がバイト始めて以来かも～！？ 何とか乗り切らないと！！
jpnSearchText:
私がバイト始めて以来かも～！？
何とか乗り切らないと！！

engChrName: I think Kaohan and Ms. Mau might have something up their sleeves, too.
engSearchText:
I think Kaohan and Ms. Mau might have something
up their sleeves, too.
jpnChrName: カオハン君はホントに 不愛想で不器用ですよね～。
jpnSearchText:
カオハン君はホントに
不愛想で不器用ですよね～。

engChrName: I don't really know what's going on right now, but I'll put my trust in them.
engSearchText:
I don't really know what's going on right now, but I'll
put my trust in them.
jpnChrName: この前まで体調崩して休んでたんですから 少しは甘えればいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
この前まで体調崩して休んでたんですから
少しは甘えればいいのに。

engChrName: I'm glad that I got the chance to meet everyone here. I'll continue to help them out—even if I know they can handle themselves.
engSearchText:
I'm glad that I got the chance to meet everyone here.
I'll continue to help them out—even if I know they
can handle themselves.
jpnChrName: カオハン君、クレイユ村の一件の後 一週間くらい休んでいたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
カオハン君、クレイユ村の一件の後
一週間くらい休んでいたんですけど……

engChrName: I... I can't believe the festival's all...ruined. Just like that!
engSearchText:
I... I can't believe the festival's all...ruined. Just
like that!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、久々に出てきたので 溜まっていた雑務を押し付けちゃいました！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、久々に出てきたので
溜まっていた雑務を押し付けちゃいました！

engChrName: Ms. Mau and Kaohan are so amazing, though. It's like this whole thing hasn't fazed them one bit!
engSearchText:
Ms. Mau and Kaohan are so amazing, though.
It's like this whole thing hasn't fazed them one bit!
jpnChrName: もう体調は良さそうだけど……給仕みたいに 立ち回る仕事は私が引き受けますよっ！
jpnSearchText:
もう体調は良さそうだけど……給仕みたいに
立ち回る仕事は私が引き受けますよっ！

engChrName: ...Now that I think about it, why ARE they so calm? Shouldn't they be, like, a little panicky, at least?
engSearchText:
...Now that I think about it, why ARE they so calm?
Shouldn't they be, like, a little panicky, at least?
jpnChrName: この前からカオハン君の姿が見えなくて……
jpnSearchText: この前からカオハン君の姿が見えなくて……

engChrName: Oh, well. I guess that just goes to show how dependable they are!
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I guess that just goes to show how
dependable they are!
jpnChrName: オーナーも忙しそうだし、一体何が……
jpnSearchText: オーナーも忙しそうだし、一体何が……

engChrName: I better pitch in, too. I've gotta carry my weight around here!
engSearchText:
I better pitch in, too. I've gotta carry my weight
around here!
jpnChrName: やっぱりクレイユ村の件と 関係があるんでしょうか………
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりクレイユ村の件と
関係があるんでしょうか………

engChrName: I'll go get some medicine for the evacuees. I can apply some basic first aid to the injured.
engSearchText:
I'll go get some medicine for the evacuees. I can apply
some basic first aid to the injured.
jpnChrName: 二人ともいつもと様子が違って…… 私も不安ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
二人ともいつもと様子が違って……
私も不安ですけど……

engChrName: Ms. Mau and Kaohan have things under control, but I can at least help lighten the load!
engSearchText:
Ms. Mau and Kaohan have things under control,
but I can at least help lighten the load!
jpnChrName: 《彩雲閣》の従業員の一人として しっかり仕事しなきゃ、ですよね……！
jpnSearchText:
《彩雲閣》の従業員の一人として
しっかり仕事しなきゃ、ですよね……！

engChrName: Aaaaaah! Where did all these customers come from?! I'm dying here!
engSearchText:
Aaaaaah! Where did all these customers come from?!
I'm dying here!
jpnChrName: 今日はオーナーに褒められたんです。 よく勉強してるなって！
jpnSearchText:
今日はオーナーに褒められたんです。
よく勉強してるなって！

engChrName: Well, it's sink or swim, and I'm sure as heck not gonna sink! Wish me luck!
engSearchText:
Well, it's sink or swim, and I'm sure as heck not
gonna sink! Wish me luck!
jpnChrName: 《彩雲閣》の従業員として 東方料理の勉強するのはとーぜんです！
jpnSearchText:
《彩雲閣》の従業員として
東方料理の勉強するのはとーぜんです！

engChrName: Kaohan is, like, the most awkward and unfriendly person ever.
engSearchText:
Kaohan is, like, the most awkward and unfriendly
person ever.
jpnChrName: 料理の特性や謂れを知っていないと 的確な配膳はできませんからね～！
jpnSearchText:
料理の特性や謂れを知っていないと
的確な配膳はできませんからね～！

engChrName: I wish he'd lean on me a little more. He was out sick until recently, so I don't mind lending a hand.
engSearchText:
I wish he'd lean on me a little more. He was out sick
until recently, so I don't mind lending a hand.
jpnChrName: 厨房担当だけじゃなくて私たち配膳係も 知識や経験が大事なんですよ！
jpnSearchText:
厨房担当だけじゃなくて私たち配膳係も
知識や経験が大事なんですよ！

engChrName: I decided to play a little prank on Kaohan.
engSearchText: I decided to play a little prank on Kaohan.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、東方料理の系統って 共和国内でもいくつかあるんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、東方料理の系統って
共和国内でもいくつかあるんですよね。

engChrName: He took a whole week off work. When he came back, I piled a bunch of my neglected chores onto him. Heehee!
engSearchText:
He took a whole week off work. When he came back,
I piled a bunch of my neglected chores onto him.
Heehee!
jpnChrName: 《彩雲閣》はどちらかというと煌都系に近く、 東方から海路で共和国にもたらされた文化──
jpnSearchText:
《彩雲閣》はどちらかというと煌都系に近く、
東方から海路で共和国にもたらされた文化──

engChrName: He seems to be doing better, but I'm taking over table-waiting duty. That way, he doesn't have to walk around a bunch. Aren't I nice?
engSearchText:
He seems to be doing better, but I'm taking over
table-waiting duty. That way, he doesn't have to walk
around a bunch. Aren't I nice?
jpnChrName: 対して陸路でもたらされた文化は もっと“和”や“侘び寂び”を重んじるとか。
jpnSearchText:
対して陸路でもたらされた文化は
もっと“和”や“侘び寂び”を重んじるとか。

engChrName: You know, I haven't seen Kaohan around here lately.
engSearchText:
You know, I haven't seen Kaohan around
here lately.
jpnChrName: 他にも違いがあると聞きますが…… 一度食べ比べとかしてみたいですよね～！
jpnSearchText:
他にも違いがあると聞きますが……
一度食べ比べとかしてみたいですよね～！

engChrName: And Ms. Mau's been really busy with something, too. What the heck is going on?
engSearchText:
And Ms. Mau's been really busy with something, too.
What the heck is going on?
jpnChrName: あ、あれっ！？　一ヶ月分のチラシと 伝票の整理が終わってる……！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、あれっ！？　一ヶ月分のチラシと
伝票の整理が終わってる……！？

engChrName: Maybe it has something to do with what happened in Creil...
engSearchText:
Maybe it has something to do with what happened
in Creil...
jpnChrName: それに来月の仕入れ表にメニューの調整、 こっちにはカオハン君のメモが……
jpnSearchText:
それに来月の仕入れ表にメニューの調整、
こっちにはカオハン君のメモが……

engChrName: Those two haven't been their usual selves. It's making me a little anxious...
engSearchText:
Those two haven't been their usual selves. It's making
me a little anxious...
jpnChrName: 『オーナーに渡せ』、 『調子に乗りましたと謝っておけ』って──
jpnSearchText:
『オーナーに渡せ』、
『調子に乗りましたと謝っておけ』って──

engChrName: But there's still work to be done here, and it's not gonna get done if I keep moping around! I better get to it!
engSearchText:
But there's still work to be done here, and it's not
gonna get done if I keep moping around! I better get
to it!
jpnChrName: ひええっ！？　滅茶苦茶怒ってる──！ しかも手際が良すぎだってば～！？
jpnSearchText:
ひええっ！？　滅茶苦茶怒ってる──！
しかも手際が良すぎだってば～！？

engChrName: Heehee. Ms. Mau complimented me today! She said I'm doing a good job studying everything I need to know for this job!
engSearchText:
Heehee. Ms. Mau complimented me today! She said
I'm doing a good job studying everything I need to
know for this job!
jpnChrName: さ、騒いじゃってすみません。 夕食時だし、私も仕事しないと……
jpnSearchText:
さ、騒いじゃってすみません。
夕食時だし、私も仕事しないと……

engChrName: You can't work here unless you know your stuff, so I really hit the books when I was hired!
engSearchText:
You can't work here unless you know your stuff, so I
really hit the books when I was hired!
jpnChrName: で、でもカオハン君手際良すぎ…… 一体何者なの～！？
jpnSearchText:
で、でもカオハン君手際良すぎ……
一体何者なの～！？

engChrName: How am I supposed to be a good server unless I know the history behind our dishes and what makes each of them so special?
engSearchText:
How am I supposed to be a good server unless I know
the history behind our dishes and what makes each of
them so special?
jpnChrName: カオハン君、いつも澄ました顔して 私の事を無視するから……
jpnSearchText:
カオハン君、いつも澄ました顔して
私の事を無視するから……

engChrName: You never know when that knowledge might come in handy on the job!
engSearchText:
You never know when that knowledge might come in
handy on the job!
jpnChrName: さっき一ヶ月分のチラシと 伝票の整理を押し付けてきたんです！
jpnSearchText:
さっき一ヶ月分のチラシと
伝票の整理を押し付けてきたんです！

engChrName: There's tons of different types of Eastern cuisine in the Republic—including some that originated elsewhere.
engSearchText:
There's tons of different types of Eastern cuisine in
the Republic—including some that
originated elsewhere.
jpnChrName: ふっふっふ、今頃頑張ってるかな～？ なんなら手伝ってあげてもいいんだよ～？
jpnSearchText:
ふっふっふ、今頃頑張ってるかな～？
なんなら手伝ってあげてもいいんだよ～？

engChrName: The stuff we make is similar to what's served in Langport, but it came from the Far East originally. People there brought it here by sea routes.
engSearchText:
The stuff we make is similar to what's served in
Langport, but it came from the Far East originally.
People there brought it here by sea routes.
jpnChrName: こんにちは！　本日は何になさいますか？
jpnSearchText: こんにちは！　本日は何になさいますか？

engChrName: And there's other cultural stuff that came in by land, including the idea of wabi-sabi—or beauty in imperfection.
engSearchText:
And there's other cultural stuff that came in by land,
including the idea of wabi-sabi—or beauty
in imperfection.
jpnChrName: ……カオハン君とマウ・オーナー、 時々話し込んでるみたいなんですが……
jpnSearchText:
……カオハン君とマウ・オーナー、
時々話し込んでるみたいなんですが……

engChrName: It's all so fascinating to me, and it makes me wanna sit down and try all kinds of Eastern foods.
engSearchText:
It's all so fascinating to me, and it makes me wanna
sit down and try all kinds of Eastern foods.
jpnChrName: 私の気のせい……？ う～んむしろ気にしすぎ……？
jpnSearchText:
私の気のせい……？
う～んむしろ気にしすぎ……？

engChrName: Huh? Wh-What the...? He's already done going through all the flyers and sales slips?!
engSearchText:
Huh? Wh-What the...? He's already done going
through all the flyers and sales slips?!
jpnChrName: なんでしょうかね…… いまいち釈然としませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
なんでしょうかね……
いまいち釈然としませんけど……

engChrName: Not only that, but he also took care of next month's ingredient list and tweaked the menus! Oh, and there's a note, too...
engSearchText:
Not only that, but he also took care of next month's
ingredient list and tweaked the menus! Oh, and
there's a note, too...
jpnChrName: すみません、微妙に仲間外れに されてるような気がしてしまって……
jpnSearchText:
すみません、微妙に仲間外れに
されてるような気がしてしまって……

engChrName: 'Get these back to Ms. Mau. Also, apologize to her for getting carried away, while you're at it.'
engSearchText:
'Get these back to Ms. Mau. Also, apologize to her
for getting carried away, while you're at it.'
jpnChrName: コホン、ご注文はこちらで承っているので ぜひ食べていってくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
コホン、ご注文はこちらで承っているので
ぜひ食べていってくださいね！

engChrName: Eeek! He sounds SO mad! And how is he so freaking capable, anyway?!
engSearchText:
Eeek! He sounds SO mad! And how is he so freaking
capable, anyway?!
jpnChrName: カオハン君ってば、ちゃんと聞いてる～！？
jpnSearchText: カオハン君ってば、ちゃんと聞いてる～！？

engChrName: Oh, umm, sorry for all the yelling. I should get back to work.
engSearchText:
Oh, umm, sorry for all the yelling. I should get back
to work.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。 本格的な東方料理を是非楽しんでください！
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ。
本格的な東方料理を是非楽しんでください！

engChrName: I just don't understand how Kaohan is that talented. I'm half-convinced he isn't even human.
engSearchText:
I just don't understand how Kaohan is that talented.
I'm half-convinced he isn't even human.
jpnChrName: 食材から料理人まで、全て東方人街から 取り寄せた本場尽くしのフルコースをお試しあれ！
jpnSearchText:
食材から料理人まで、全て東方人街から
取り寄せた本場尽くしのフルコースをお試しあれ！

engChrName: Kaohan's so stiff and serious, and he tries SO hard to ignore me. But that's about to change...
engSearchText:
Kaohan's so stiff and serious, and he tries SO hard
to ignore me. But that's about to change...
jpnChrName: ……あ、私はバイトですけどね！ あはは～っ！
jpnSearchText:
……あ、私はバイトですけどね！
あはは～っ！

engChrName: I just took all of last month's unfiled leaflets and sales slips and dropped them in his lap!
engSearchText:
I just took all of last month's unfiled leaflets and sales
slips and dropped them in his lap!
jpnChrName: ちなみに厨房で一番下っ端のカオハン君は 私と同い年なんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに厨房で一番下っ端のカオハン君は
私と同い年なんですが……

engChrName: Heehee. I bet he's freaking out right this second. Once I offer to help him out of his jam, he'll HAVE to notice me! ㈱
engSearchText:
Heehee. I bet he's freaking out right this second.
Once I offer to help him out of his jam, he'll HAVE
to notice me! ㈱
jpnChrName: どうしようもなく根暗なんですよね、ふう。 給仕係は向いてないんじゃないかな～。
jpnSearchText:
どうしようもなく根暗なんですよね、ふう。
給仕係は向いてないんじゃないかな～。

engChrName: Hey there! What'll it be today?
engSearchText: Hey there! What'll it be today?
jpnChrName: 仕方ないから、私がフォローして あげてるんですけどね！
jpnSearchText:
仕方ないから、私がフォローして
あげてるんですけどね！

engChrName: You know what's weird? Ms. Mau and Kaohan like to go off and have some private chats sometimes.
engSearchText:
You know what's weird? Ms. Mau and Kaohan like
to go off and have some private chats sometimes.
jpnChrName: この付近の安全確保、恩に着るわ。 記者としてこの機会は無駄にしないつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
この付近の安全確保、恩に着るわ。
記者としてこの機会は無駄にしないつもりよ。

engChrName: I don't know about you, but I'm DYING to know what they talk about!
engSearchText:
I don't know about you, but I'm DYING to know
what they talk about!
jpnChrName: 連絡のつかない記者たちが心配だけど…… 今はできる事をしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
連絡のつかない記者たちが心配だけど……
今はできる事をしましょう。

engChrName: I wish they'd let me listen in, too! It's no fair!
engSearchText: I wish they'd let me listen in, too! It's no fair!
jpnChrName: 付近の状況確認に協力しつつ、 私たちなりに情報を集め、整理するわ。
jpnSearchText:
付近の状況確認に協力しつつ、
私たちなりに情報を集め、整理するわ。

engChrName: I don't mean to bug anyone or anything. I just feel like they're pushing me off to the side. It stinks!
engSearchText:
I don't mean to bug anyone or anything. I just feel
like they're pushing me off to the side. It stinks!
jpnChrName: 何かあれば連絡するわ……そちらも気をつけて。
jpnSearchText: 何かあれば連絡するわ……そちらも気をつけて。

engChrName: *cough* Anyway, I'll take your order here whenever you're ready. Please, stay for a while and eat with us!
engSearchText:
*cough* Anyway, I'll take your order here whenever
you're ready. Please, stay for a while and eat with us!
jpnChrName: 彼、カニング編集長はマリエルが目標としていた ディンゴ記者の力を的確に活用してきた人よ。
jpnSearchText:
彼、カニング編集長はマリエルが目標としていた
ディンゴ記者の力を的確に活用してきた人よ。

engChrName: Kaohan! Hey, Kaohan! Are you listening?!
engSearchText: Kaohan! Hey, Kaohan! Are you listening?!
jpnChrName: くせ者と言われるけど、こう見えて人を見る目も 確かで、記者としての筋も通っている――
jpnSearchText:
くせ者と言われるけど、こう見えて人を見る目も
確かで、記者としての筋も通っている――

engChrName: Welcome! If you've been searching for the most legit Eastern food Edith's got, then look no more!
engSearchText:
Welcome! If you've been searching for the most legit
Eastern food Edith's got, then look no more!
jpnChrName: 私としても、見習うべき点は多いわ。
jpnSearchText: 私としても、見習うべき点は多いわ。

engChrName: We don't cut any corners here. All of our ingredients are sourced straight from the Eastern Quarter. And so are all of our staff, too.
engSearchText:
We don't cut any corners here. All of our ingredients
are sourced straight from the Eastern Quarter. And so
are all of our staff, too.
jpnChrName: 今、共和国で未曾有の事件が起こり、 多くの市民が混乱しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
今、共和国で未曾有の事件が起こり、
多くの市民が混乱しているわ。

engChrName: I'm not so special, though. I only work here part time.
engSearchText:
I'm not so special, though. I only work here
part time.
jpnChrName: いえ……混乱しているのは私たち記者も同じね。 だからこそ、求められる情報も理解できるはず！
jpnSearchText:
いえ……混乱しているのは私たち記者も同じね。
だからこそ、求められる情報も理解できるはず！

engChrName: Do you know Kaohan? We're the same age. He works in the kitchen, but he's at the very bottom of the totem pole.
engSearchText:
Do you know Kaohan? We're the same age.
He works in the kitchen, but he's at the very bottom
of the totem pole.
jpnChrName: 誤情報が流布される前に、 正確な情報をあるべき形で市民に伝えていく……
jpnSearchText:
誤情報が流布される前に、
正確な情報をあるべき形で市民に伝えていく……

engChrName: He's also kinda...antisocial. I don't think he's really cut out to be waiting tables. If you ask me, he's way in over his head.
engSearchText:
He's also kinda...antisocial. I don't think he's really
cut out to be waiting tables. If you ask me, he's way in
over his head.
jpnChrName: それが我々、タイレル通信の使命よ。 一同、誇りを胸に取材に挑むように！
jpnSearchText:
それが我々、タイレル通信の使命よ。
一同、誇りを胸に取材に挑むように！

engChrName: But it's okay, because he's got a capable person looking after him. Me!
engSearchText:
But it's okay, because he's got a capable person
looking after him. Me!
jpnChrName: はい、編集長！
jpnSearchText: はい、編集長！

engChrName: Thanks for securing things around here. We really owe you one.
engSearchText:
Thanks for securing things around here. We really
owe you one.
jpnChrName: この未曽有の事態は間違いなく、 我々記者の底力が試される時……
jpnSearchText:
この未曽有の事態は間違いなく、
我々記者の底力が試される時……

engChrName: I'm concerned about the reporters we still can't reach, but for now, we'll just have to make do with what we have.
engSearchText:
I'm concerned about the reporters we still can't reach,
but for now, we'll just have to make do with what
we have.
jpnChrName: 政府からの公式発表だけが全てではないわ、 我々にしか伝えられない事は必ずある。
jpnSearchText:
政府からの公式発表だけが全てではないわ、
我々にしか伝えられない事は必ずある。

engChrName: As we work on ascertaining the situation, we'll be gathering information and processing it however we need to.
engSearchText:
As we work on ascertaining the situation, we'll be
gathering information and processing it however we
need to.
jpnChrName: ペンは剣よりも強し――その意味を 今一度噛み締め、記者として戦うのみよ。
jpnSearchText:
ペンは剣よりも強し――その意味を
今一度噛み締め、記者として戦うのみよ。

engChrName: We'll contact you if we stumble across something big. Until then...stay safe out there.
engSearchText:
We'll contact you if we stumble across something big.
Until then...stay safe out there.
jpnChrName: マリエルが誘拐されかけたと聞いて、心に傷を 負ったりしていないか心配だったけど……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルが誘拐されかけたと聞いて、心に傷を
負ったりしていないか心配だったけど……

engChrName: Chief Cunning knew how to put Dingo and his talent as a reporter to good use.
engSearchText:
Chief Cunning knew how to put Dingo and his
talent as a reporter to good use.
jpnChrName: サルバッドのスクープ記事もしっかり まとめられているし、杞憂だったようね。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドのスクープ記事もしっかり
まとめられているし、杞憂だったようね。

engChrName: He's definitely got an eye for people, and he also has principles that he abides by.
engSearchText:
He's definitely got an eye for people, and he also has
principles that he abides by.
jpnChrName: こうした前向きなところも彼女を買っている 理由だからね、更なる精進に繋がれば幸いよ。
jpnSearchText:
こうした前向きなところも彼女を買っている
理由だからね、更なる精進に繋がれば幸いよ。

engChrName: I could stand to learn a thing or two from him.
engSearchText: I could stand to learn a thing or two from him.
jpnChrName: 改めて、報告ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: 改めて、報告ありがとう。

engChrName: The Republic has never faced a crisis like this before in its long history. There's a lot of unrest among the citizens right now.
engSearchText:
The Republic has never faced a crisis like this before
in its long history. There's a lot of unrest among the
citizens right now.
jpnChrName: 私としてもどうしてロデリック氏が 生き延びられたのか不可解ではあったの。
jpnSearchText:
私としてもどうしてロデリック氏が
生き延びられたのか不可解ではあったの。

engChrName: And that goes for us, too. We know all the questions that people want answered about this situation!
engSearchText:
And that goes for us, too. We know all the questions
that people want answered about this situation!
jpnChrName: それに、２０年ぶりに遺品が 帰ってくるだなんて良い話じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
それに、２０年ぶりに遺品が
帰ってくるだなんて良い話じゃない。

engChrName: We at the Tyrell Times have one job and one job only: to bring facts to the people before disinformation muddies the waters.
engSearchText:
We at the Tyrell Times have one job and one job
only: to bring facts to the people before
disinformation muddies the waters.
jpnChrName: ロデリック氏もこれで少しは救われたかと 思うと、私も協力した甲斐があったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ロデリック氏もこれで少しは救われたかと
思うと、私も協力した甲斐があったわね。

engChrName: What you're doing is vital to the well-being of this country. Be proud of what you do as you go out and get those answers!
engSearchText:
What you're doing is vital to the well-being of
this country. Be proud of what you do as you go out
and get those answers!
jpnChrName: ロデリック氏は駅前のテラス席でお待ちよ。
jpnSearchText: ロデリック氏は駅前のテラス席でお待ちよ。

engChrName: Yes, Chief!
engSearchText: Yes, Chief!
jpnChrName: 本人と会って依頼を終えたら 結果報告をちゃんとよろしくね。
jpnSearchText:
本人と会って依頼を終えたら
結果報告をちゃんとよろしくね。

engChrName: This is a completely unprecedented situation. It's really putting our abilities to the test.
engSearchText:
This is a completely unprecedented situation.
It's really putting our abilities to the test.
jpnChrName: ……彼のようなやり方も、 一つの強みである事は確かよ……
jpnSearchText:
……彼のようなやり方も、
一つの強みである事は確かよ……

engChrName: There's more to this story than what the government has led us to believe.
engSearchText:
There's more to this story than what the government
has led us to believe.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……こんな時代だからこそ改めて ジャーナリズムの在り方が問われているわ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……こんな時代だからこそ改めて
ジャーナリズムの在り方が問われているわ。

engChrName: The people are counting on us to shed light on the truth, so that's exactly what we'll do.
engSearchText:
The people are counting on us to shed light on the
truth, so that's exactly what we'll do.
jpnChrName: その意味ではマリエルに期待したいけど…… あの前のめりなところはやや不安ね。
jpnSearchText:
その意味ではマリエルに期待したいけど……
あの前のめりなところはやや不安ね。

engChrName: When I heard Marielle had been kidnapped, I was worried it would traumatize her and dampen her spirits.
engSearchText:
When I heard Marielle had been kidnapped, I was
worried it would traumatize her and dampen
her spirits.
jpnChrName: クク、記念祭前にあのマリエルって 嬢ちゃんも一旗揚げられたようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、記念祭前にあのマリエルって
嬢ちゃんも一旗揚げられたようで何よりだ。

engChrName: But she got right back on her feet and wrote up a top-notch article. I had nothing to be worried about after all.
engSearchText:
But she got right back on her feet and wrote up a
top-notch article. I had nothing to be worried about
after all.
jpnChrName: ディンゴの奴も、最後まであいつを気にかけて いたが、これで安心して逝けるってもんかね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴの奴も、最後まであいつを気にかけて
いたが、これで安心して逝けるってもんかね。

engChrName: Her drive never ceases to amaze. I can't wait to see where her bright future takes her.
engSearchText:
Her drive never ceases to amaze. I can't wait to see
where her bright future takes her.
jpnChrName: “遺書”の方も、あいつの望み通りに あの娘の手に渡った事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
“遺書”の方も、あいつの望み通りに
あの娘の手に渡った事だしな。

engChrName: Thanks again for your report. I genuinely appreciate your work.
engSearchText:
Thanks again for your report. I genuinely appreciate
your work.
jpnChrName: ええ……目標としていた彼がいなくなり、 道を見失わないか案じていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……目標としていた彼がいなくなり、
道を見失わないか案じていたけど……

engChrName: I was puzzled over how Roderick survived that ordeal, but now I have the answer.
engSearchText:
I was puzzled over how Roderick survived that ordeal,
but now I have the answer.
jpnChrName: どうやら彼女も、彼女なりに 歩んでいくことが出来そうよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら彼女も、彼女なりに
歩んでいくことが出来そうよ。

engChrName: It's great that he was able to be reunited with that locket after all those years.
engSearchText:
It's great that he was able to be reunited with that
locket after all those years.
jpnChrName: ハン、あんたの指導の賜物でもあるだろうさ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、あんたの指導の賜物でもあるだろうさ。

engChrName: Knowing that he's in a better place now makes me glad that I was able to step in and help, at least to the extent I was able to.
engSearchText:
Knowing that he's in a better place now makes me
glad that I was able to step in and help, at least to the
extent I was able to.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよアイツの仇は討たれた──俺達も 前に進まなきゃ儲からねぇってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよアイツの仇は討たれた──俺達も
前に進まなきゃ儲からねぇってモンだ。

engChrName: You'll find Roderick sitting at the terrace over by the station.
engSearchText:
You'll find Roderick sitting at the terrace over by
the station.
jpnChrName: 異例尽くしとなる今年の記念祭……あんたら（タイレル）と 俺達（メルド）じゃ記事の要点も多少違うだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
異例尽くしとなる今年の記念祭……あんたら（タイレル）と
俺達（メルド）じゃ記事の要点も多少違うだろうが……

engChrName: Once you meet him and get everything wrapped up, I expect you to report back to me and fill me in on what happened.
engSearchText:
Once you meet him and get everything wrapped up, I
expect you to report back to me and fill me in on
what happened.
jpnChrName: ええ、今年も負けないわよ、カニングさん。
jpnSearchText: ええ、今年も負けないわよ、カニングさん。

engChrName: I won't deny that his methods get results.
engSearchText: I won't deny that his methods get results.
jpnChrName: よくやったわね、マリエル…… サルバッドの記事、なかなかの反響よ。
jpnSearchText:
よくやったわね、マリエル……
サルバッドの記事、なかなかの反響よ。

engChrName: But in this day and age, there are a lot of questions about what our job is as journalists and how we should go about it.
engSearchText:
But in this day and age, there are a lot of questions
about what our job is as journalists and how we
should go about it.
jpnChrName: 貴女の急な要望に応えての出張だったけど…… こうして見れば正解だったわね。
jpnSearchText:
貴女の急な要望に応えての出張だったけど……
こうして見れば正解だったわね。

engChrName: It's why I'm happy to have principled up-and-comers like Marielle on staff. That said, her zealous energy is a bit...concerning, admittedly.
engSearchText:
It's why I'm happy to have principled up-and-comers
like Marielle on staff. That said, her zealous energy
is a bit...concerning, admittedly.
jpnChrName: 本当ですか、ありがとうございます編集長！
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか、ありがとうございます編集長！

engChrName: It was nice to see Marielle make a name for herself before the festival.
engSearchText:
It was nice to see Marielle make a name for herself
before the festival.
jpnChrName: これで……少しでも、あの人に……！
jpnSearchText: これで……少しでも、あの人に……！

engChrName: Dingo was always worried about that girl, but she's doing just fine now. Maybe he can finally rest easy...
engSearchText:
Dingo was always worried about that girl, but she's
doing just fine now. Maybe he can finally rest easy...
jpnChrName: ……“その人”への思い入れについても 気になるところだけど、一旦おいておいて……
jpnSearchText:
……“その人”への思い入れについても
気になるところだけど、一旦おいておいて……

engChrName: ...especially now that his legacy is in her hands, just like he wanted.
engSearchText:
...especially now that his legacy is in her hands, just
like he wanted.
jpnChrName: とにかく、今回の成功は 貴女の成長に間違いなく繋がるはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、今回の成功は
貴女の成長に間違いなく繋がるはずよ。

engChrName: I'd like to think so. Marielle idolized him, and she was so determined to reach his level.
engSearchText:
I'd like to think so. Marielle idolized him, and she
was so determined to reach his level.
jpnChrName: 記者は想定外の事態にあってこそ、 その真価が試される仕事だからね。
jpnSearchText:
記者は想定外の事態にあってこそ、
その真価が試される仕事だからね。

engChrName: When he died, I was worried she was going to lose her way, but she's pushing forward harder than ever.
engSearchText:
When he died, I was worried she was going to lose
her way, but she's pushing forward harder than ever.
jpnChrName: 取材先で予想だにしない事が起ったとしても、 最適な道を常に選べるよう、今後も精進を。
jpnSearchText:
取材先で予想だにしない事が起ったとしても、
最適な道を常に選べるよう、今後も精進を。

engChrName: I think she owes a lot of that to your leadership.
engSearchText: I think she owes a lot of that to your leadership.
jpnChrName: はい……頑張りますっ！
jpnSearchText: はい……頑張りますっ！

engChrName: In the end, Dingo was avenged, and that's what matters. Now it's on us to keep going—and that starts with the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
In the end, Dingo was avenged, and that's
what matters. Now it's on us to keep going—and that
starts with the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: では……大統領府の動きに関して、 与党議員への交渉の件は任せるわ。
jpnSearchText:
では……大統領府の動きに関して、
与党議員への交渉の件は任せるわ。

engChrName: I'm sure our publication will be examining it through a different lens, but I look forward to seeing what you bring to the table.
engSearchText:
I'm sure our publication will be examining it through
a different lens, but I look forward to seeing what you
bring to the table.
jpnChrName: 邪道な気もするけど……あなたの政権との関係、 記者クラブの情報力は貴重だしね。
jpnSearchText:
邪道な気もするけど……あなたの政権との関係、
記者クラブの情報力は貴重だしね。

engChrName: Likewise. You can be sure we'll be putting up a good fight on the newsstands like always, Chief Cunning.
engSearchText:
Likewise. You can be sure we'll be putting up a good
fight on the newsstands like always, Chief Cunning.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せあれ。 懇意の議員から聞き出してみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、お任せあれ。
懇意の議員から聞き出してみましょう。

engChrName: You did a good job, Marielle. Your writeup on Tharbad has made a pretty big splash.
engSearchText:
You did a good job, Marielle. Your writeup on
Tharbad has made a pretty big splash.
jpnChrName: もっとも、タイレル通信社もこれだけの規模です。 記者クラブ、もう少し活用されても良いのでは？
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、タイレル通信社もこれだけの規模です。
記者クラブ、もう少し活用されても良いのでは？

engChrName: Looks like I made the right call to send you out there.
engSearchText: Looks like I made the right call to send you out there.
jpnChrName: ……いえ、今のバランスで問題ないわ。
jpnSearchText: ……いえ、今のバランスで問題ないわ。

engChrName: You really think so? Aww. Thanks, chief!
engSearchText: You really think so? Aww. Thanks, chief!
jpnChrName: こんな時代だからこそ改めて ジャーナリズムの在り方が問われている。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時代だからこそ改めて
ジャーナリズムの在り方が問われている。

engChrName: I-I guess that means I'm that much closer to being on his level!
engSearchText:
I-I guess that means I'm that much closer to being on
his level!
jpnChrName: 祖父の名に恥じぬためにも、 社としての理念は大切にさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
祖父の名に恥じぬためにも、
社としての理念は大切にさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: I...have my concerns about how fixated you are on that man, but I'll put those worries off to the side for the time being.
engSearchText:
I...have my concerns about how fixated you are on
that man, but I'll put those worries off to the side for
the time being.
jpnChrName: フフ、それでは私は特例という事で、 誇りを持ってやらせてもらいますよ……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、それでは私は特例という事で、
誇りを持ってやらせてもらいますよ……

engChrName: It's safe to say that what you've accomplished is going to help you grow even more as a reporter.
engSearchText:
It's safe to say that what you've accomplished is going
to help you grow even more as a reporter.
jpnChrName: ちょうど良くあの記者の車が借りれそうです。 これで救助活動に行きますよ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど良くあの記者の車が借りれそうです。
これで救助活動に行きますよ！

engChrName: But never forget: a journalist's true worth is found in what they do when they're confronted with the unexpected.
engSearchText:
But never forget: a journalist's true worth is found in
what they do when they're confronted with
the unexpected.
jpnChrName: ええ、ラングドンさんから そんな言葉が出るとは……！？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ラングドンさんから
そんな言葉が出るとは……！？

engChrName: Just keep trying to improve so that—even when you're caught by surprise—you'll make all the right decisions.
engSearchText:
Just keep trying to improve so that—even when
you're caught by surprise—you'll make all the
right decisions.
jpnChrName: 血も涙もない人だと思っていてごめんなさい！
jpnSearchText: 血も涙もない人だと思っていてごめんなさい！

engChrName: Understood. I'll make you proud!
engSearchText: Understood. I'll make you proud!
jpnChrName: 君達ね……私を一体何だと……
jpnSearchText: 君達ね……私を一体何だと……

engChrName: When it comes to the Presidential Office's activities, I'll leave the negotiations with the Patriot League senators to you.
engSearchText:
When it comes to the Presidential Office's activities,
I'll leave the negotiations with the Patriot League
senators to you.
jpnChrName: この状況下で、記者が土地勘や情報網を 役立てる事もせずどうしろというのですか。
jpnSearchText:
この状況下で、記者が土地勘や情報網を
役立てる事もせずどうしろというのですか。

engChrName: I don't like going this route, but your connections to the administration and the press corps' information network are too valuable in this instance.
engSearchText:
I don't like going this route, but your connections to
the administration and the press corps' information
network are too valuable in this instance.
jpnChrName: それに──懇意にしている先生方の安否は、 何としてでも確認せねばならないでしょうが！
jpnSearchText:
それに──懇意にしている先生方の安否は、
何としてでも確認せねばならないでしょうが！

engChrName: Yes, I understand. I'd be happy to look into it for you. I'll start by reaching out to members that I'm on good terms with and proceed from there.
engSearchText:
Yes, I understand. I'd be happy to look into it for you.
I'll start by reaching out to members that I'm on good
terms with and proceed from there.
jpnChrName: チェン君など各地に逃げ遅れた記者もいます、 彼らの回収くらいは私達でやりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
チェン君など各地に逃げ遅れた記者もいます、
彼らの回収くらいは私達でやりますよ。

engChrName: That said, perhaps you should consider making use of the press corps' benefits more often. The Tyrell Times only has so much reach on its own.
engSearchText:
That said, perhaps you should consider making use of
the press corps' benefits more often. The Tyrell
Times only has so much reach on its own.
jpnChrName: まあ、それ以上に議員先生方もお助けできれば 事態収拾後に何かと私も……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それ以上に議員先生方もお助けできれば
事態収拾後に何かと私も……

engChrName: No, I won't. I think it's important we maintain this balance.
engSearchText:
No, I won't. I think it's important we maintain
this balance.
jpnChrName: いやはや、よもやこんな異常事態に直面するとは。 ……専門外ですが大スクープですよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、よもやこんな異常事態に直面するとは。
……専門外ですが大スクープですよ。

engChrName: In this day and age, there are a lot of questions about what our job is as journalists and how we should go about it.
engSearchText:
In this day and age, there are a lot of questions about
what our job is as journalists and how we should go
about it.
jpnChrName: しかし……私は運よく本社に戻っていましたが、 チェン君ら各地で取材をしている記者たちは……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……私は運よく本社に戻っていましたが、
チェン君ら各地で取材をしている記者たちは……

engChrName: It's important that this organization maintains and upholds its ideals. The last thing I want to do is disrespect the legacy of my grandfather.
engSearchText:
It's important that this organization maintains and
upholds its ideals. The last thing I want to do is
disrespect the legacy of my grandfather.
jpnChrName: そして何より……議員先生方の安否が心配です！ 何とかして連絡を取れれば……！
jpnSearchText:
そして何より……議員先生方の安否が心配です！
何とかして連絡を取れれば……！

engChrName: Very well. We'll consider this a special case so that you and your organization can hold on to your pride.
engSearchText:
Very well. We'll consider this a special case so that
you and your organization can hold on to your pride.
jpnChrName: いやはや、流石に忙しいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: いやはや、流石に忙しいですねぇ。

engChrName: We're lucky that we can borrow that reporter's vehicle. Now we can get out there and rescue some people!
engSearchText:
We're lucky that we can borrow that
reporter's vehicle. Now we can get out there and
rescue some people!
jpnChrName: 今朝まで記者クラブに詰めていましたが、 帰って早々に次は会食ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
今朝まで記者クラブに詰めていましたが、
帰って早々に次は会食ですよ。

engChrName: Holy... Did you hit your head on something, Langdon? I've never heard you say anything so selfless before!
engSearchText:
Holy... Did you hit your head on
something, Langdon? I've never heard you say
anything so selfless before!
jpnChrName: まあ非常事態宣言中と違い、先生方の口もやや緩く、 前向きな話も聞けるので悪い気はしないですが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ非常事態宣言中と違い、先生方の口もやや緩く、
前向きな話も聞けるので悪い気はしないですが。

engChrName: Yeah, I always thought you were completely heartless! I'm sorry for ever doubting you!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I always thought you were completely heartless!
I'm sorry for ever doubting you!
jpnChrName: やれやれ、先日のバーゼルでの一件と 関連する問題には困ったものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、先日のバーゼルでの一件と
関連する問題には困ったものですよ。

engChrName: Hey! What kind of monster do you take me for?
engSearchText: Hey! What kind of monster do you take me for?
jpnChrName: 何分ＣＩＤが動いているのもあって、 議員先生方も口が堅いもので……
jpnSearchText:
何分ＣＩＤが動いているのもあって、
議員先生方も口が堅いもので……

engChrName: Look, if you can't put your information network and knowledge to use at a time like this, you don't deserve to call yourself a reporter.
engSearchText:
Look, if you can't put your information network and
knowledge to use at a time like this, you don't deserve
to call yourself a reporter.
jpnChrName: いえ……ＣＩＤだけ、でもなさそうですがね。
jpnSearchText: いえ……ＣＩＤだけ、でもなさそうですがね。

engChrName: Now, then. I need to get out there and find out if my contacts in the parliament are doing okay!
engSearchText:
Now, then. I need to get out there and find out if my
contacts in the parliament are doing okay!
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授の異動やヴェルヌの取締役の 交代説など、気になる事は多いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授の異動やヴェルヌの取締役の
交代説など、気になる事は多いのですが……

engChrName: There are reporters out there like Chen who weren't able to get to safety in time. The least we can do is go out and round them up.
engSearchText:
There are reporters out there like Chen who weren't
able to get to safety in time. The least we can do is go
out and round them up.
jpnChrName: まあ──そこにタブーがあるなら、 気にはなりますが今は様子見としますか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ──そこにタブーがあるなら、
気にはなりますが今は様子見としますか。

engChrName: And if we can help out some of the senators at the same time, all that better. That should net me more than a few favors for the future.
engSearchText:
And if we can help out some of the senators at the
same time, all that better. That should net me more
than a few favors for the future.
jpnChrName: まあ、こうした折り合いをつけるのも、 私のやり方の必要な代償というものでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、こうした折り合いをつけるのも、
私のやり方の必要な代償というものでしょう。

engChrName: Well, this is quite the sticky situation. It'll make for a hell of a scoop, though, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Well, this is quite the sticky situation. It'll make for a
hell of a scoop, though, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: ふむ……最近は記者クラブも忙しく、 それ以外のネタが少々足りませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……最近は記者クラブも忙しく、
それ以外のネタが少々足りませんね。

engChrName: Luckily, I was back at the office when it all went down, but I don't know how Chen and the other guys are holding up.
engSearchText:
Luckily, I was back at the office when it all went
down, but I don't know how Chen and the other guys
are holding up.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここも人脈を使うとしましょうか。 弱小通信社との“取引”とかね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここも人脈を使うとしましょうか。
弱小通信社との“取引”とかね。

engChrName: I'll check up on them after I make sure the parliament members are safe. I have to find a way to get in touch with them—pronto!
engSearchText:
I'll check up on them after I make sure the parliament
members are safe. I have to find a way to get in touch
with them—pronto!
jpnChrName: クク、議員先生方の名前を出せば、 弱小誌の記者など案外簡単に……
jpnSearchText:
クク、議員先生方の名前を出せば、
弱小誌の記者など案外簡単に……

engChrName: Ugh. My schedule's jam-packed today.
engSearchText: Ugh. My schedule's jam-packed today.
jpnChrName: フン、あの記事のインパクトは認めますが、 要はたまたま現地に居合わせただけでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
フン、あの記事のインパクトは認めますが、
要はたまたま現地に居合わせただけでしょう？

engChrName: It was bad enough that I was holed up at the press corps all morning, but now I have a meeting to attend.
engSearchText:
It was bad enough that I was holed up at the press
corps all morning, but now I have a meeting to attend.
jpnChrName: 新米がまぐれで良い気になっていては いずれ痛い目を見るでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
新米がまぐれで良い気になっていては
いずれ痛い目を見るでしょうね。

engChrName: Not that that's too terrible, I suppose—it's always nice when politicians are willing to talk. They've been sounding more hopeful than ever lately as well.
engSearchText:
Not that that's too terrible, I suppose—it's always nice
when politicians are willing to talk. They've been
sounding more hopeful than ever lately as well.
jpnChrName: 記者の長生きする秘訣は人脈と舌の枚数、 これに尽きますよ、ハハッ！
jpnSearchText:
記者の長生きする秘訣は人脈と舌の枚数、
これに尽きますよ、ハハッ！

engChrName: That stuff up in Basel the other day sure caused me some problems.
engSearchText:
That stuff up in Basel the other day sure caused me
some problems.
jpnChrName: フフ、私に言わせてみれば政治家との 関係などあって損は無いのですがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私に言わせてみれば政治家との
関係などあって損は無いのですがねぇ。

engChrName: All of my contacts in parliament have refused to speak with me recently. The CID has likely been pressuring them to keep quiet on recent matters.
engSearchText:
All of my contacts in parliament have refused to
speak with me recently. The CID has likely been
pressuring them to keep quiet on recent matters.
