jpnChrName: もっとも、あまり入れ込み過ぎない事が 肝要でもありますが……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、あまり入れ込み過ぎない事が
肝要でもありますが……

engChrName: Well, it probably isn't just them.
engSearchText: Well, it probably isn't just them.
jpnChrName: さて、ロックスミス政権時代に懇意にしていた 皆さまは今頃どうしているのでしょうかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、ロックスミス政権時代に懇意にしていた
皆さまは今頃どうしているのでしょうかねぇ。

engChrName: There's a lot of red flags about all of that between Professor Cronkite being reassigned and Verne's board of directors getting shaken up.
engSearchText:
There's a lot of red flags about all of that between
Professor Cronkite being reassigned and Verne's
board of directors getting shaken up.
jpnChrName: 議員先生との会食にはまだ時間がありますな、 さてどうしたものか……
jpnSearchText:
議員先生との会食にはまだ時間がありますな、
さてどうしたものか……

engChrName: Well, if my sources won't speak up, then there isn't much I can do except wait and see how things unfold.
engSearchText:
Well, if my sources won't speak up, then there isn't
much I can do except wait and see how things unfold.
jpnChrName: 現与党の議員にも良くしてもらっているが…… どうにも前政権に比べて口は堅いですしね。
jpnSearchText:
現与党の議員にも良くしてもらっているが……
どうにも前政権に比べて口は堅いですしね。

engChrName: When you go about this job the way I do, making compromises with the people you're dealing with is the price you have to pay.
engSearchText:
When you go about this job the way I do, making
compromises with the people you're dealing with is
the price you have to pay.
jpnChrName: 特に大統領府に直接関わる事は…… 少しばかり秘密主義的な空気すらある。
jpnSearchText:
特に大統領府に直接関わる事は……
少しばかり秘密主義的な空気すらある。

engChrName: Bah. I've been held up with the press corps, so I haven't had any time to find leads on stories from other places.
engSearchText:
Bah. I've been held up with the press corps, so I
haven't had any time to find leads on stories from
other places.
jpnChrName: フン、マリエル君は相変わらず熱意だけは 凄いようですが……
jpnSearchText:
フン、マリエル君は相変わらず熱意だけは
凄いようですが……

engChrName: Though it's nothing I can't fix by calling in a few favors. Maybe I'll try and strike a deal with one of the smalltime news agencies.
engSearchText:
Though it's nothing I can't fix by calling in a
few favors. Maybe I'll try and strike a deal with one of
the smalltime news agencies.
jpnChrName: 現実が見えんと、本当の意味では 記者なぞ務まらんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
現実が見えんと、本当の意味では
記者なぞ務まらんでしょう。

engChrName: As soon as I offer to set them up with one of my contacts in parliament, I'll have them eating from the palm of my hand.
engSearchText:
As soon as I offer to set them up with one of my
contacts in parliament, I'll have them eating from the
palm of my hand.
jpnChrName: 綺麗事や夢より、如何に政財界と盤石な関係を 築くかを若いうちから考えても良いでしょうに。
jpnSearchText:
綺麗事や夢より、如何に政財界と盤石な関係を
築くかを若いうちから考えても良いでしょうに。

engChrName: Hmph. I won't deny that woman's article is making waves, but when you get down to it, she just happened to be at the right place at the right time.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I won't deny that woman's article is making
waves, but when you get down to it, she just
happened to be at the right place at the right time.
jpnChrName: サン、いつからお兄ちゃんに対して こんなに薄情に……
jpnSearchText:
サン、いつからお兄ちゃんに対して
こんなに薄情に……

engChrName: If a cub like her lets that luck get to her head, she's going to be in for a world of hurt later.
engSearchText:
If a cub like her lets that luck get to her head, she's
going to be in for a world of hurt later.
jpnChrName: 仕事に専念できるともとれるけど…… やっぱり悲しいよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
仕事に専念できるともとれるけど……
やっぱり悲しいよなぁ……

engChrName: The keys to a long career as a reporter are both connections and a healthy amount of duplicity! Bahaha!
engSearchText:
The keys to a long career as a reporter are
both connections and a healthy amount of duplicity!
Bahaha!
jpnChrName: 社交辞令でも良いから少しは 残念がってくれよ……
jpnSearchText:
社交辞令でも良いから少しは
残念がってくれよ……

engChrName: When you're a reporter, you've got nothing to lose by building up some solid relationships with politicians.
engSearchText:
When you're a reporter, you've got nothing to lose by
building up some solid relationships with politicians.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんの手記について話は聞いたよ。
jpnSearchText: ディンゴさんの手記について話は聞いたよ。

engChrName: Of course, there's a certain line you can't ever cross, but the fact remains that they're valuable assets.
engSearchText:
Of course, there's a certain line you can't ever cross,
but the fact remains that they're valuable assets.
jpnChrName: マリエルがいつも言ってた先輩── あの《Ａ》について調べ上げるなんて相当だ。
jpnSearchText:
マリエルがいつも言ってた先輩──
あの《Ａ》について調べ上げるなんて相当だ。

engChrName: On that note, I wonder how my contacts at the old Rocksmith administration are doing these days.
engSearchText:
On that note, I wonder how my contacts at the old
Rocksmith administration are doing these days.
jpnChrName: 強い信念を持った記者だったんだな…… 直接話せなかった事が残念だよ……
jpnSearchText:
強い信念を持った記者だったんだな……
直接話せなかった事が残念だよ……

engChrName: It seems I have some time to kill until my dinner with the senator. Now, what to do in the meantime...?
engSearchText:
It seems I have some time to kill until my dinner with
the senator. Now, what to do in the meantime...?
jpnChrName: 例のマリエルの記事を読ませてもらったけど、 いやはや負けたものだよ……
jpnSearchText:
例のマリエルの記事を読ませてもらったけど、
いやはや負けたものだよ……

engChrName: I get along well enough with the Patriot League's senators, but compared to the previous administration, they're much more tight-lipped.
engSearchText:
I get along well enough with the Patriot League's
senators, but compared to the previous administration,
they're much more tight-lipped.
jpnChrName: 面倒見てきた後輩がこうも成長すると、 嬉しいような少し悔しいような……
jpnSearchText:
面倒見てきた後輩がこうも成長すると、
嬉しいような少し悔しいような……

engChrName: They won't utter a word about matters pertaining to the Presidential Office. There's a dense air of secrecy surrounding all that.
engSearchText:
They won't utter a word about matters pertaining to
the Presidential Office. There's a dense air of secrecy
surrounding all that.
jpnChrName: まあ、だからこそ一応先輩の僕も気を 引き締めていかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、だからこそ一応先輩の僕も気を
引き締めていかないとね。

engChrName: Marielle's got no shortage of enthusiasm, I'll give her that.
engSearchText:
Marielle's got no shortage of enthusiasm, I'll give
her that.
jpnChrName: 妹の相手をしてあげられなさそうな分、 記念祭では一層良い記事を書かなきゃ。
jpnSearchText:
妹の相手をしてあげられなさそうな分、
記念祭では一層良い記事を書かなきゃ。

engChrName: But if she can't see reality for what it is, she isn't cut out to be a reporter. I don't care if that sounds harsh.
engSearchText:
But if she can't see reality for what it is, she isn't cut
out to be a reporter. I don't care if that sounds harsh.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村のテロ……信じたくはないけど、 民族問題が絡んでるんじゃないかって噂も……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村のテロ……信じたくはないけど、
民族問題が絡んでるんじゃないかって噂も……

engChrName: Instead of pursuing dreams and fanciful things, she should be forging relationships with people in business and politics while she's still young.
engSearchText:
Instead of pursuing dreams and fanciful things, she
should be forging relationships with people in
business and politics while she's still young.
jpnChrName: ……あくまでも噂というか一説に過ぎないけど…… 妹に聞かせてしまったのは悪い事をしたな。
jpnSearchText:
……あくまでも噂というか一説に過ぎないけど……
妹に聞かせてしまったのは悪い事をしたな。

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe San could be so nonchalant about this.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't believe San could be so nonchalant
about this.
jpnChrName: あの子……普段は意識しないように してるからか余計に……
jpnSearchText:
あの子……普段は意識しないように
してるからか余計に……

engChrName: I guess it's nice that I don't need to worry about her, but...it still depresses me, you know?
engSearchText:
I guess it's nice that I don't need to worry about her,
but...it still depresses me, you know?
jpnChrName: 僕は仕事柄どうしても 色々聞いてしまうしね……
jpnSearchText:
僕は仕事柄どうしても
色々聞いてしまうしね……

engChrName: She could at least pretend to be bummed out!
engSearchText: She could at least pretend to be bummed out!
jpnChrName: でも妹に語って聞かせたのは 良くなかったかな……
jpnSearchText:
でも妹に語って聞かせたのは
良くなかったかな……

engChrName: I heard about what happened with Dingo's old notebook.
engSearchText:
I heard about what happened with Dingo's
old notebook.
jpnChrName: ジュディス・ランスターのスキャンダル…… うちの妹もある程度興味あるかな？
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス・ランスターのスキャンダル……
うちの妹もある程度興味あるかな？

engChrName: Marielle always used to talk about that guy. Sounded like he had some real guts. I never could've dug into A's history like that.
engSearchText:
Marielle always used to talk about that guy.
Sounded like he had some real guts. I never could've
dug into A's history like that.
jpnChrName: まあ、それ以上に僕としては……この件の 取材にまた駆り出されないかの方が怖いけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それ以上に僕としては……この件の
取材にまた駆り出されないかの方が怖いけどね。

engChrName: He was a reporter with conviction. I'm sad I never got to speak with him while he was alive.
engSearchText:
He was a reporter with conviction. I'm sad I never got
to speak with him while he was alive.
jpnChrName: いつの間にかお使いの達人的な渾名が社内で つけられてて……本当にご勘弁願いたいよ。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にかお使いの達人的な渾名が社内で
つけられてて……本当にご勘弁願いたいよ。

engChrName: Marielle's writeup blew me away. She really put my stuff to shame.
engSearchText:
Marielle's writeup blew me away. She really put my
stuff to shame.
jpnChrName: ハックベリー氏への取材……何かと 気を遣ったよ、落ち着いた場所だったのに。
jpnSearchText:
ハックベリー氏への取材……何かと
気を遣ったよ、落ち着いた場所だったのに。

engChrName: As someone who mentored her, I feel proud seeing her come so far, but she also makes me feel like I could be doing better.
engSearchText:
As someone who mentored her, I feel proud seeing
her come so far, but she also makes me feel like I
could be doing better.
jpnChrName: でもまあ、想像してた以上に 人柄のいい人物だったっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、想像してた以上に
人柄のいい人物だったっていうか……

engChrName: I need to get my act together and step up my game.
engSearchText: I need to get my act together and step up my game.
jpnChrName: 彼のインタビュー記事なら、深掘りした いいものが書ける気がしてきたよ……！
jpnSearchText:
彼のインタビュー記事なら、深掘りした
いいものが書ける気がしてきたよ……！

engChrName: If I'm not gonna be able to see my sister, then the least I can do is put out some killer articles for the Revolution Festival!
engSearchText:
If I'm not gonna be able to see my sister, then the
least I can do is put out some killer articles for the
Revolution Festival!
jpnChrName: こんな時間だけど、なんだか 燃えてきちゃったというか……
jpnSearchText:
こんな時間だけど、なんだか
燃えてきちゃったというか……

engChrName: There have been murmurs that what happened in Creil might've been an ethnic attack. It's only speculation for now...
engSearchText:
There have been murmurs that what happened in
Creil might've been an ethnic attack. It's only
speculation for now...
jpnChrName: よーし、インタビュー時の感覚が 残っているうちに書き上げてしまうか！
jpnSearchText:
よーし、インタビュー時の感覚が
残っているうちに書き上げてしまうか！

engChrName: ...but I ended up telling my sister San about it anyway. I really shouldn't have done that, though. She's probably freaking out...
engSearchText:
...but I ended up telling my sister San about
it anyway. I really shouldn't have done that, though.
She's probably freaking out...
jpnChrName: ふう……今度は経済面のコラムを 担当する事になってね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……今度は経済面のコラムを
担当する事になってね。

engChrName: I get the feeling San is taking what I said really hard. I know she tries not to pay any mind to those sorts of issues.
engSearchText:
I get the feeling San is taking what I said really hard.
I know she tries not to pay any mind to those sorts
of issues.
jpnChrName: 著名人のインタビュー記事なんかを 書くことになりそうなんだ……
jpnSearchText:
著名人のインタビュー記事なんかを
書くことになりそうなんだ……

engChrName: Part of my job is to ask questions and explore as many angles of a potential story as I can.
engSearchText:
Part of my job is to ask questions and explore as many
angles of a potential story as I can.
jpnChrName: 文芸部ならそれくらい楽勝だろって 言われたけど……正直苦手なんだよな……
jpnSearchText:
文芸部ならそれくらい楽勝だろって
言われたけど……正直苦手なんだよな……

engChrName: But I think sharing that with her was the wrong call. I messed up big time...
engSearchText:
But I think sharing that with her was the wrong call.
I messed up big time...
jpnChrName: はぁ、その点いつも前向きな マリエルが羨ましいよ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、その点いつも前向きな
マリエルが羨ましいよ。

engChrName: I wonder if my sister cares about what's been happening with Judith Lanster.
engSearchText:
I wonder if my sister cares about what's been
happening with Judith Lanster.
jpnChrName: インタビュー記事……しっかり下調べして 向かわないと失礼になるよな……
jpnSearchText:
インタビュー記事……しっかり下調べして
向かわないと失礼になるよな……

engChrName: I'm worried one of the editors is going to ask me to write up a story about that, and I really, REALLY don't want that to happen.
engSearchText:
I'm worried one of the editors is going to ask me to
write up a story about that, and I really, REALLY
don't want that to happen.
jpnChrName: ってそういえばマリエル、また姿が 見えないけどどこに行ったんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
ってそういえばマリエル、また姿が
見えないけどどこに行ったんだろう……？

engChrName: At some point, everybody at the company's taken to calling me 'super gofer,' and I want them to stop already. *sigh*...
engSearchText:
At some point, everybody at the company's taken to
calling me 'super gofer,' and I want them to
stop already. *sigh*...
jpnChrName: 本当はもう少し早く 仕事が終わればよかったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
本当はもう少し早く
仕事が終わればよかったんだけど……

engChrName: I interviewed Walter Huckberry earlier today. We did it at a pretty relaxed location, but I still tried to be careful with what I said.
engSearchText:
I interviewed Walter Huckberry earlier today. We did
it at a pretty relaxed location, but I still tried to be
careful with what I said.
jpnChrName: 文芸部は一番暇そうって理由で 色々駆り出されて、今じゃこの有様さ。
jpnSearchText:
文芸部は一番暇そうって理由で
色々駆り出されて、今じゃこの有様さ。

engChrName: Still, he was definitely a nicer guy than I was expecting.
engSearchText:
Still, he was definitely a nicer guy than I
was expecting.
jpnChrName: しかもまあ、社会部とか手伝ってると…… 聞きたくないような情報もどうしたって……
jpnSearchText:
しかもまあ、社会部とか手伝ってると……
聞きたくないような情報もどうしたって……

engChrName: I've come away from that interview feeling like I can write a deep, insightful piece about him. Now I just need to put it all together!
engSearchText:
I've come away from that interview feeling like I can
write a deep, insightful piece about him. Now I just
need to put it all together!
jpnChrName: マリエル……一時期先輩として面倒見ていた けど、危なっかしくてひやひやするというか……
jpnSearchText:
マリエル……一時期先輩として面倒見ていた
けど、危なっかしくてひやひやするというか……

engChrName: It's strange. I don't usually get so fired up when I'm doing an assignment like this.
engSearchText:
It's strange. I don't usually get so fired up when I'm
doing an assignment like this.
jpnChrName: まあ、妹が増えたような気もしないでもないけど、 心配事で自分の仕事に手がつかないというか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、妹が増えたような気もしないでもないけど、
心配事で自分の仕事に手がつかないというか。

engChrName: I better take that feeling and run with it! I've gotta get all my thoughts down while they're still fresh in my mind!
engSearchText:
I better take that feeling and run with it! I've gotta get
all my thoughts down while they're still fresh in
my mind!
jpnChrName: 張り切るのも良いけど……何かあった時の 事もちゃんと考えて欲しいよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
張り切るのも良いけど……何かあった時の
事もちゃんと考えて欲しいよなぁ……

engChrName: Great. I get to write a column for the business pages. Yaaaaaay...
engSearchText:
Great. I get to write a column for the business pages.
Yaaaaaay...
jpnChrName: しかし締め切り前だっていうのに 何でこんなに他部署の仕事を……
jpnSearchText:
しかし締め切り前だっていうのに
何でこんなに他部署の仕事を……

engChrName: I guess it's fallen on me to do some interview piece on a celebrity.
engSearchText:
I guess it's fallen on me to do some interview piece on
a celebrity.
jpnChrName: 僕はそんなに暇そうに見えるのか……？ 作家さんに合わせるのも大変なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
僕はそんなに暇そうに見えるのか……？
作家さんに合わせるのも大変なんだが。

engChrName: The editor figured it'd be a cinch for someone from the literature section, but honestly, I suck at these kinds of things.
engSearchText:
The editor figured it'd be a cinch for someone from
the literature section, but honestly, I suck at these
kinds of things.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ……この調子じゃ今日も 妹に夕飯は作ってあげられないなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ……この調子じゃ今日も
妹に夕飯は作ってあげられないなぁ……

engChrName: Makes me wish I was more like Marielle. She can just dive headfirst into anything like it's no big deal.
engSearchText:
Makes me wish I was more like Marielle. She can just
dive headfirst into anything like it's no big deal.
jpnChrName: サリバン編集長は執務室にて状況の確認に 専念している状況です。
jpnSearchText:
サリバン編集長は執務室にて状況の確認に
専念している状況です。

engChrName: Guess I better do some research on the interviewee before we meet so I can sound like I know what I'm talking about...
engSearchText:
Guess I better do some research on the interviewee
before we meet so I can sound like I know what I'm
talking about...
jpnChrName: 私も各方面との連絡や、情報収集を 可能な限り行っています。
jpnSearchText:
私も各方面との連絡や、情報収集を
可能な限り行っています。

engChrName: Oh. I just realized Marielle disappeared on me again. Where did she go this time?
engSearchText:
Oh. I just realized Marielle disappeared on me again.
Where did she go this time?
jpnChrName: マリエルさんのためにも……私も 可能な限りのバックアップをしなくては。
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんのためにも……私も
可能な限りのバックアップをしなくては。

engChrName: I really would've preferred to be done with my work by now.
engSearchText:
I really would've preferred to be done with my work
by now.
jpnChrName: 助けていただきありがとうございます、 いきなりの事で我々も混乱していて……
jpnSearchText:
助けていただきありがとうございます、
いきなりの事で我々も混乱していて……

engChrName: Unfortunately, the other editors like to think literature section guys like me have all the time in world, so they hoist their crap on me.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, the other editors like to think
literature section guys like me have all the time in
world, so they hoist their crap on me.
jpnChrName: しかし……何人かの記者が 外出中だったのは気がかりですね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……何人かの記者が
外出中だったのは気がかりですね。

engChrName: The news section's especially bad. I end up hearing about things I reaaaaaally would rather not know about.
engSearchText:
The news section's especially bad. I end up hearing
about things I reaaaaaally would rather not
know about.
jpnChrName: マリエルさんも…… ご無事だといいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんも……
ご無事だといいのですが……

engChrName: *sigh* That Marielle... I was something of a mentor to her for a time. She has a way of scaring me when she gets into trouble.
engSearchText:
*sigh* That Marielle... I was something of a mentor
to her for a time. She has a way of scaring me when
she gets into trouble.
jpnChrName: 記念祭当日ともなると、記者の皆さんも 右に左に大忙しです。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭当日ともなると、記者の皆さんも
右に左に大忙しです。

engChrName: I guess I kind of think of her as another younger sister. It can be hard to concentrate on my work once I start worrying about her.
engSearchText:
I guess I kind of think of her as another younger
sister. It can be hard to concentrate on my work
once I start worrying about her.
jpnChrName: 同時に、問い合わせや情報の照合依頼も 多く、私も忙しいもので……
jpnSearchText:
同時に、問い合わせや情報の照合依頼も
多く、私も忙しいもので……

engChrName: I respect her drive, of course. I just wish she'd think things through ahead of time.
engSearchText:
I respect her drive, of course. I just wish she'd think
things through ahead of time.
jpnChrName: まあ、それだけ記念祭を多くの人が 満喫できているという証拠でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それだけ記念祭を多くの人が
満喫できているという証拠でしょう。

engChrName: Why do the editors always choose to dump work on me right before a deadline?
engSearchText:
Why do the editors always choose to dump work on
me right before a deadline?
jpnChrName: 不幸な事件を乗り越えた後だからこそ、 この多忙さも前向きに捉えたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
不幸な事件を乗り越えた後だからこそ、
この多忙さも前向きに捉えたいものです。

engChrName: Do I just look like I have oodles of time to spare? I'm a journalist, you know—not some author writing the Great Calvardian Novel.
engSearchText:
Do I just look like I have oodles of time to spare?
I'm a journalist, you know—not some author writing
the Great Calvardian Novel.
jpnChrName: 先日の事件の事後処理の取材も続いていますが、 予定通り記念祭に向けた準備も始まっています。
jpnSearchText:
先日の事件の事後処理の取材も続いていますが、
予定通り記念祭に向けた準備も始まっています。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I don't think I'll be able to fix dinner for my sister tonight. What a bummer...
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, I don't think I'll be able to fix dinner
for my sister tonight. What a bummer...
jpnChrName: 今年の記念祭は例年までとは違った式典や 発表も多いという事で皆さん張り切っていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
今年の記念祭は例年までとは違った式典や
発表も多いという事で皆さん張り切っていますよ。

engChrName: Editor-in-chief Sullivan is working hard to confirm the situation in town.
engSearchText:
Editor-in-chief Sullivan is working hard to confirm
the situation in town.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんの手記、 見つかって本当に良かったですね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんの手記、
見つかって本当に良かったですね。

engChrName: For my part, I'm trying to gather information and reach out to as many different people and entities as I can.
engSearchText:
For my part, I'm trying to gather information and
reach out to as many different people and entities as
I can.
jpnChrName: マリエルさんは最近どこか 元気が無い様子だったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんは最近どこか
元気が無い様子だったのですが……

engChrName: I want to offer as much support as I can, especially for Marielle. Nothing's going to stop me from doing what I can!
engSearchText:
I want to offer as much support as I can, especially
for Marielle. Nothing's going to stop me from doing
what I can!
jpnChrName: 手記の一件で気合が入ったのかもしれませんね。 ふふ、少し安心しました。
jpnSearchText:
手記の一件で気合が入ったのかもしれませんね。
ふふ、少し安心しました。

engChrName: Thank you all for your help. It was total chaos around here, and nobody knew what to do.
engSearchText:
Thank you all for your help. It was total chaos around
here, and nobody knew what to do.
jpnChrName: オラシオンにおけるマフィアの壊滅と名門企業の 社長逮捕まで、まさかマリエルさんが……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンにおけるマフィアの壊滅と名門企業の
社長逮捕まで、まさかマリエルさんが……

engChrName: I'm still concerned, though. A handful of reporters were out of the office when everything started happening...including Marielle.
engSearchText:
I'm still concerned, though. A handful of reporters
were out of the office when everything started
happening...including Marielle.
jpnChrName: 本当に行った先々でスクープを 見つけるというかなんというか……
jpnSearchText:
本当に行った先々でスクープを
見つけるというかなんというか……

engChrName: I hope she's doing okay. I'm really scared for her...
engSearchText: I hope she's doing okay. I'm really scared for her...
jpnChrName: いえ、きっとマリエルさん一人の 力ではないんでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、きっとマリエルさん一人の
力ではないんでしょうね。

engChrName: Our reporters are always as busy as can be whenever the Revolution Festival rolls around.
engSearchText:
Our reporters are always as busy as can be whenever
the Revolution Festival rolls around.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、これでディンゴ氏も 女神様の元で安心しているのではないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、これでディンゴ氏も
女神様の元で安心しているのではないでしょうか。

engChrName: I don't have it much easier, either. I have to collate a ton of information and field a never-ending stream of questions.
engSearchText:
I don't have it much easier, either. I have to collate a
ton of information and field a never-ending stream
of questions.
jpnChrName: 何という事でしょう…… 私たちも混乱しているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
何という事でしょう……
私たちも混乱しているのですが……

engChrName: But I'm choosing to look at it like this: we only have our hands full because so many people are enjoying the festival.
engSearchText:
But I'm choosing to look at it like this: we only have
our hands full because so many people are enjoying
the festival.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村は完全封鎖とのことで、 取材を行う事すらできていません……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村は完全封鎖とのことで、
取材を行う事すらできていません……

engChrName: After dealing with such an unfortunate tragedy, it's good to keep yourself busy, I think.
engSearchText:
After dealing with such an unfortunate tragedy, it's
good to keep yourself busy, I think.
jpnChrName: 編集長も発破をかけて下さっていますし きっと何らかの情報を掴めるはずですが……
jpnSearchText:
編集長も発破をかけて下さっていますし
きっと何らかの情報を掴めるはずですが……

engChrName: Our reporters are still conducting follow-up investigations into what took place, but we're also preparing for the Revolution Festival now.
engSearchText:
Our reporters are still conducting follow-up
investigations into what took place, but we're also
preparing for the Revolution Festival now.
jpnChrName: この事態、タイレル通信としても 正念場なのかもしれませんね……
jpnSearchText:
この事態、タイレル通信としても
正念場なのかもしれませんね……

engChrName: The festivities are shaping up to be different from previous years, and there are sure to be tons of announcements. Everyone's going all out.
engSearchText:
The festivities are shaping up to be different from
previous years, and there are sure to be tons
of announcements. Everyone's going all out.
jpnChrName: 私もクレイユ村の消滅に巻き込まれたと 思われる人名を纏めている所です。
jpnSearchText:
私もクレイユ村の消滅に巻き込まれたと
思われる人名を纏めている所です。

engChrName: It's so wonderful that Dingo's notebook was able to be recovered.
engSearchText:
It's so wonderful that Dingo's notebook was able to
be recovered.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ディンゴ・ブラッド…… あの《メルド》の男性記者が……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ディンゴ・ブラッド……
あの《メルド》の男性記者が……

engChrName: Marielle hasn't been her usual peppy self lately, but I think she's finding her groove again thanks to that.
engSearchText:
Marielle hasn't been her usual peppy self lately, but I
think she's finding her groove again thanks to that.
jpnChrName: 親しくしていたマリエルさんが心配ですね…… 思い詰めていなければいいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
親しくしていたマリエルさんが心配ですね……
思い詰めていなければいいのですが……

engChrName: I can finally breathe a sigh of relief.
engSearchText: I can finally breathe a sigh of relief.
jpnChrName: 今日はマリエルさんがお休みの日なんですが 何だか楽しみにしていたみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
今日はマリエルさんがお休みの日なんですが
何だか楽しみにしていたみたいで。

engChrName: Marielle's on a roll. She broke the stories about the end of that mafia gang and the arrest of that big-time president.
engSearchText:
Marielle's on a roll. She broke the stories about the
end of that mafia gang and the arrest of that
big-time president.
jpnChrName: 誰かとランチの約束があるとか何とか……
jpnSearchText: 誰かとランチの約束があるとか何とか……

engChrName: She's becoming one heck of a reporter. It's kind of unbelievable.
engSearchText:
She's becoming one heck of a reporter. It's kind
of unbelievable.
jpnChrName: う～ん、これはもしかして…… 私としても応援しないと……！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、これはもしかして……
私としても応援しないと……！

engChrName: I mean, I know she couldn't have done it all on her own or anything, but it's still pretty astonishing.
engSearchText:
I mean, I know she couldn't have done it all on her
own or anything, but it's still pretty astonishing.
jpnChrName: チェンさん、今日も今日とて専門外の 仕事を振られて大変だったようですね。
jpnSearchText:
チェンさん、今日も今日とて専門外の
仕事を振られて大変だったようですね。

engChrName: In any case, I think Dingo can rest in peace knowing Marielle's doing okay.
engSearchText:
In any case, I think Dingo can rest in peace knowing
Marielle's doing okay.
jpnChrName: マリエルさんが幸運体質なら、チェンさんは 苦労人体質みたいな所がありますが……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんが幸運体質なら、チェンさんは
苦労人体質みたいな所がありますが……

engChrName: Things have been pretty crazy around here lately. I've never seen anything like it.
engSearchText:
Things have been pretty crazy around here lately.
I've never seen anything like it.
jpnChrName: でも何か掴めた物もあったようですね。 ふふ、私も応援したい所です。
jpnSearchText:
でも何か掴めた物もあったようですね。
ふふ、私も応援したい所です。

engChrName: With the area surrounding Creil under lockdown, we can't send anybody out to do on-the-ground investigating.
engSearchText:
With the area surrounding Creil under lockdown, we
can't send anybody out to do
on-the-ground investigating.
jpnChrName: マリエルさん、サルバッドで誘拐されかけたと 聞いて本当に心配していましたが……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさん、サルバッドで誘拐されかけたと
聞いて本当に心配していましたが……

engChrName: The editor-in-chief gave a pep talk earlier, so I'm sure our reporters are fired up to dig up something. I doubt it'll be easy, though.
engSearchText:
The editor-in-chief gave a pep talk earlier, so I'm sure
our reporters are fired up to dig up something.
I doubt it'll be easy, though.
jpnChrName: 今でも全然トラウマとか残っていないようで、 本当に安心しましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
今でも全然トラウマとか残っていないようで、
本当に安心しましたよ。

engChrName: I've got a feeling this whole crisis could turn out to be a sink-or-swim moment for our paper.
engSearchText:
I've got a feeling this whole crisis could turn out to be
a sink-or-swim moment for our paper.
jpnChrName: それでいてあのスクープですからね、 本当に凄いというか……
jpnSearchText:
それでいてあのスクープですからね、
本当に凄いというか……

engChrName: Right now, I'm in the midst of compiling the names of the people believed to have been caught up in the attack.
engSearchText:
Right now, I'm in the midst of compiling the names
of the people believed to have been caught up in
the attack.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの前向きさというかへこたれない 事こそが、あの人の強みなのでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの前向きさというかへこたれない
事こそが、あの人の強みなのでしょうね。

engChrName: One name that's come up is Dingo Brad, that reporter for Meld Magazine...
engSearchText:
One name that's come up is Dingo Brad, that
reporter for Meld Magazine...
jpnChrName: マリエルさん、今日も相変わらず 張り切って出かけて行かれましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさん、今日も相変わらず
張り切って出かけて行かれましたよ。

engChrName: I'm really worried about Marielle. I know how close the two of them were. Poor girl...
engSearchText:
I'm really worried about Marielle. I know how close
the two of them were. Poor girl...
jpnChrName: 記者として熱心なのは結構ですけど…… また無茶をされないか心配ですね。
jpnSearchText:
記者として熱心なのは結構ですけど……
また無茶をされないか心配ですね。

engChrName: Marielle's got the day off today. She said she was going out to lunch with somebody, I thi—
engSearchText:
Marielle's got the day off today. She said she was
going out to lunch with somebody, I thi—
jpnChrName: この前なんて魔獣に襲われたと 着替えを取りに戻られてましたし……
jpnSearchText:
この前なんて魔獣に襲われたと
着替えを取りに戻られてましたし……

engChrName: Wait a minute... WAIT A MINUTE! Could it be who I think it is?!
engSearchText:
Wait a minute... WAIT A MINUTE! Could it be
who I think it is?!
jpnChrName: 先月も独断で煌都出張を延長したりと 傍から見ていても危なっかしくて……
jpnSearchText:
先月も独断で煌都出張を延長したりと
傍から見ていても危なっかしくて……

engChrName: Oooh, I'm crossing all my fingers and toes for her! Go get him, girl!
engSearchText:
Oooh, I'm crossing all my fingers and toes for her!
Go get him, girl!
jpnChrName: マリエルさん、張り切るのはいいんですが 傍から見ていても危なっかしくて……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさん、張り切るのはいいんですが
傍から見ていても危なっかしくて……

engChrName: Chen looked pretty stressed earlier. I'm guessing the editors thrust some assignment on him that's outside his wheelhouse.
engSearchText:
Chen looked pretty stressed earlier. I'm guessing the
editors thrust some assignment on him that's outside
his wheelhouse.
jpnChrName: そういえば、《メルド》の男性記者を 気にしているようですが、まさか──
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、《メルド》の男性記者を
気にしているようですが、まさか──

engChrName: In some ways, he's the opposite of Marielle. He's always down on his luck, but it's like she's blessed with it.
engSearchText:
In some ways, he's the opposite of Marielle.
He's always down on his luck, but it's like she's
blessed with it.
jpnChrName: ……いえ、偏見は良くないですね。 それにマリエルさんの地の性格な気も……
jpnSearchText:
……いえ、偏見は良くないですね。
それにマリエルさんの地の性格な気も……

engChrName: That said, it did sound like he had some sort of success. I hope the final article turns out great!
engSearchText:
That said, it did sound like he had some sort
of success. I hope the final article turns out great!
jpnChrName: タイレル通信は、歴史のある通信社ですからね。 共和国で最も信頼されているメディアでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル通信は、歴史のある通信社ですからね。
共和国で最も信頼されているメディアでしょう。

engChrName: I was so scared for Marielle when I heard she'd gotten kidnapped in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I was so scared for Marielle when I heard she'd gotten
kidnapped in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 最近ではラジオや街頭ビジョン、 導力ネットのニュース配信とも提携していますね。
jpnSearchText:
最近ではラジオや街頭ビジョン、
導力ネットのニュース配信とも提携していますね。

engChrName: Thankfully, it doesn't seem like she's traumatized about it or anything. I'm relieved she's still the same old Marielle.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, it doesn't seem like she's traumatized
about it or anything. I'm relieved she's still the same
old Marielle.
jpnChrName: ちなみに１００年以上前、《民主主義革命》を 成し遂げた際もメディアとして支えており──
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに１００年以上前、《民主主義革命》を
成し遂げた際もメディアとして支えており──

engChrName: She even snagged herself a big story for the road. I'm so proud of her.
engSearchText:
She even snagged herself a big story for the road.
I'm so proud of her.
jpnChrName: 例えばサリバン編集長のお祖父様など、 あのシーナ・ディルクの担当記者だったそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
例えばサリバン編集長のお祖父様など、
あのシーナ・ディルクの担当記者だったそうですよ。

engChrName: I've realized she's pretty strong in her own way. She never loses heart and always keeps her eyes looking straight ahead.
engSearchText:
I've realized she's pretty strong in her own way.
She never loses heart and always keeps her eyes
looking straight ahead.
jpnChrName: 《タイレル通信社》へようこそ。 記者や編集部の方への取次はお伺いしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
《タイレル通信社》へようこそ。
記者や編集部の方への取次はお伺いしましょう。

engChrName: Marielle took off earlier today. She was positively brimming with energy.
engSearchText:
Marielle took off earlier today. She was positively
brimming with energy.
jpnChrName: といっても編集部の皆さんはご多忙ですから お会いできない事もありますね。
jpnSearchText:
といっても編集部の皆さんはご多忙ですから
お会いできない事もありますね。

engChrName: It's great that she's so passionate about her job, but I'm worried she's pushing herself too hard.
engSearchText:
It's great that she's so passionate about her job, but
I'm worried she's pushing herself too hard.
jpnChrName: あとタイレル通信へのご意見、ご感想などは 私の方で受付させていただきますよ。
jpnSearchText:
あとタイレル通信へのご意見、ご感想などは
私の方で受付させていただきますよ。

engChrName: When she got attacked by that monster, for instance, she came back to fetch a change of clothes and got right back into the field.
engSearchText:
When she got attacked by that monster, for instance,
she came back to fetch a change of clothes and got
right back into the field.
jpnChrName: 最近忙しくて映画の方は 全然チェックできてなかったんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
最近忙しくて映画の方は
全然チェックできてなかったんですよね。

engChrName: And then she extended her stay in Langport last month without getting permission. She may have some trouble in her future...
engSearchText:
And then she extended her stay in Langport last
month without getting permission. She may have
some trouble in her future...
jpnChrName: さあ、ディンゴさんはどの作品がお目当てですか？ 好みのジャンルも教えて下さいっ！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、ディンゴさんはどの作品がお目当てですか？
好みのジャンルも教えて下さいっ！

engChrName: It's wonderful that Marielle's so passionate about her job, but I'm concerned she'll run into some trouble in the future...
engSearchText:
It's wonderful that Marielle's so passionate about her
job, but I'm concerned she'll run into some trouble in
the future...
jpnChrName: 俺に取材をするんじゃない。
jpnSearchText: 俺に取材をするんじゃない。

engChrName: Hey, now that I think about it, Marielle seems awfully interested in that reporter from Meld Magazine. Could she...?
engSearchText:
Hey, now that I think about it, Marielle seems
awfully interested in that reporter from
Meld Magazine. Could she...?
jpnChrName: だがこうなったら仕方ないな…… 適当に観ていくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
だがこうなったら仕方ないな……
適当に観ていくとするか。

engChrName: No, I shouldn't let preconceptions cloud my judgment. Knowing her, she's probably just being tenacious. I'm... I'm sure that's it.
engSearchText:
No, I shouldn't let preconceptions cloud
my judgment. Knowing her, she's probably just
being tenacious. I'm... I'm sure that's it.
jpnChrName: 確かドキュメンタリー系で気になる物が……
jpnSearchText: 確かドキュメンタリー系で気になる物が……

engChrName: The Tyrell Times is a media organization with a lot of history behind it. It's probably the most trusted name in news within the Republic.
engSearchText:
The Tyrell Times is a media organization with a lot
of history behind it. It's probably the most trusted
name in news within the Republic.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんの手帳の件は タイレル通信の皆にも話したんです。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんの手帳の件は
タイレル通信の皆にも話したんです。

engChrName: Lately, we've been partnering with other entities to get our work on radio, online news broadcasts, and outdoor screens.
engSearchText:
Lately, we've been partnering with other entities to
get our work on radio, online news broadcasts, and
outdoor screens.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》や《庭園》について、 誰も辿り着けなかった情報ばかりで……
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》や《庭園》について、
誰も辿り着けなかった情報ばかりで……

engChrName: In case you didn't know, the Tyrell Times has been in business for over a century. We supported the democratic revolution when that took place.
engSearchText:
In case you didn't know, the Tyrell Times has been in
business for over a century. We supported the
democratic revolution when that took place.
jpnChrName: 編集長も驚いてました。 こんな優秀な記者はそういないって…………
jpnSearchText:
編集長も驚いてました。
こんな優秀な記者はそういないって…………

engChrName: In fact, editor-in-chief Sullivan's own grandfather is said to have been in charge of reporting on Sheena Dirke himself. Isn't that amazing?
engSearchText:
In fact, editor-in-chief Sullivan's own grandfather is
said to have been in charge of reporting on Sheena
Dirke himself. Isn't that amazing?
jpnChrName: そうか……そうだろうな。
jpnSearchText: そうか……そうだろうな。

engChrName: Welcome to the Tyrell Times! If you need to speak with one of our reporters or editors, I'll be more than happy to set up a meeting.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Tyrell Times! If you need to speak
with one of our reporters or editors, I'll be more than
happy to set up a meeting.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……わたし……改めてこれからも ディンゴさんの背中を追いかけたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ……わたし……改めてこれからも
ディンゴさんの背中を追いかけたいと思います。

engChrName: Unfortunately, our editors are all rather busy, so they may not be able to see you right away.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, our editors are all rather busy, so they
may not be able to see you right away.
jpnChrName: 背中に追い付いて……よくやったって 褒めてもらう事はもう出来ないけど……
jpnSearchText:
背中に追い付いて……よくやったって
褒めてもらう事はもう出来ないけど……

engChrName: Though if you're here to offer your thoughts or opinions on the paper itself, I'll be more than happy to listen and pass your comments on.
engSearchText:
Though if you're here to offer your thoughts or
opinions on the paper itself, I'll be more than happy
to listen and pass your comments on.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……ごめんなさい。 いつまでもベソベソしちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ……ごめんなさい。
いつまでもベソベソしちゃって……

engChrName: I've been so busy, I haven't been able to stay on top of what's been playing at the theater.
engSearchText:
I've been so busy, I haven't been able to stay on top of
what's been playing at the theater.
jpnChrName: 謝る事はねえよ。
jpnSearchText: 謝る事はねえよ。

engChrName: So, Dingo. Which movie have you got your eye on? And what's your favorite genre? Tell me, tell me!
engSearchText:
So, Dingo. Which movie have you got your eye on?
And what's your favorite genre? Tell me, tell me!
jpnChrName: ……俺もお前も、アイツから貰った言葉を 無駄にしねえようにしねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
……俺もお前も、アイツから貰った言葉を
無駄にしねえようにしねえとな。

engChrName: *sigh* I didn't come here to be interviewed, you know.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I didn't come here to be interviewed,
you know.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ……そうですね。

engChrName: But I might as well check something out while I'm here.
engSearchText:
But I might as well check something out while
I'm here.
jpnChrName: 遺してくれた沢山の想いも、この手帳も。 絶対に無駄にはしません！
jpnSearchText:
遺してくれた沢山の想いも、この手帳も。
絶対に無駄にはしません！

engChrName: I think there's some sort of documentary-ish thing they're showing. Maybe I'll watch that.
engSearchText:
I think there's some sort of documentary-ish thing
they're showing. Maybe I'll watch that.
jpnChrName: そこでなんですけど……手帳に記されていた 仮説という部分が気になってるんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
そこでなんですけど……手帳に記されていた
仮説という部分が気になってるんですよね。

engChrName: I told everyone at the Tyrell Times about Dingo and his notebook.
engSearchText:
I told everyone at the Tyrell Times about Dingo and
his notebook.
jpnChrName: ジェラールの“恐怖”への渇望。 それがどこから来てるのかっつうヤツか。
jpnSearchText:
ジェラールの“恐怖”への渇望。
それがどこから来てるのかっつうヤツか。

engChrName: That thing is full of information on the Gardens and A. I can't believe he dug all that up on his own.
engSearchText:
That thing is full of information on the Gardens
and A. I can't believe he dug all that up on his own.
jpnChrName: 旧王家の末裔で、元《Ｄ∴Ｇ教団》の所属。 そして古代遺物の魔剣────
jpnSearchText:
旧王家の末裔で、元《Ｄ∴Ｇ教団》の所属。
そして古代遺物の魔剣────

engChrName: The chief was totally shocked. She said that reporters as good as him are...a rare thing...
engSearchText:
The chief was totally shocked. She said that reporters
as good as him are...a rare thing...
jpnChrName: どれも突拍子もない話ですよね…… その特殊な生い立ちが関係してるんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
どれも突拍子もない話ですよね……
その特殊な生い立ちが関係してるんでしょうか。

engChrName: Yeah. He was the best of the best.
engSearchText: Yeah. He was the best of the best.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんには心当たりが あったみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんには心当たりが
あったみたいですけど……

engChrName: *sniffle* It... It all makes me want to follow in his footsteps even more now.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* It... It all makes me want to follow in his
footsteps even more now.

engChrName: Even if he won't be there to see it when I finally catch up to him...
engSearchText:
Even if he won't be there to see it when I finally catch
up to him...
jpnChrName: う～ん……さっぱり分かりませんね。
jpnSearchText: う～ん……さっぱり分かりませんね。

engChrName: *sniffle* *sob*... I'm so sorry. I'm such a mess right now. I cry at the drop of a hat lately...
engSearchText:
*sniffle* *sob*... I'm so sorry. I'm such a mess
right now. I cry at the drop of a hat lately...
jpnChrName: でも、この件は引き続き調査してみたいと思います。 皆さんも何か分かったら教えて下さいね！
jpnSearchText:
でも、この件は引き続き調査してみたいと思います。
皆さんも何か分かったら教えて下さいね！

engChrName: It's okay. Ain't no shame in grieving.
engSearchText: It's okay. Ain't no shame in grieving.
jpnChrName: ああ。
jpnSearchText: ああ。

engChrName: We just have to make sure to remember those words of his—and we've gotta heed 'em, too.
engSearchText:
We just have to make sure to remember those words
of his—and we've gotta heed 'em, too.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんが遺してくれた想いも、 この手帳も絶対に無駄にはしませんっ。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんが遺してくれた想いも、
この手帳も絶対に無駄にはしませんっ。

engChrName: *sob* Yeah... You're right.
engSearchText: *sob* Yeah... You're right.
jpnChrName: あの仮説についても、わたしなりに 引き続き考えてみたいと思います！
jpnSearchText:
あの仮説についても、わたしなりに
引き続き考えてみたいと思います！

engChrName: This notebook is the last thing Dingo left behind. I'll make sure his findings won't go to waste!
engSearchText:
This notebook is the last thing Dingo left behind.
I'll make sure his findings won't go to waste!
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさん達…… その……オラシオンではお疲れさまでした！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさん達……
その……オラシオンではお疲れさまでした！

engChrName: Oh, and speaking of the notebook, one of his theories he wrote about has been weighing on my mind.
engSearchText:
Oh, and speaking of the notebook, one of his theories
he wrote about has been weighing on my mind.
jpnChrName: いえ……こちらこそお世話になってしまって。
jpnSearchText: いえ……こちらこそお世話になってしまって。

engChrName: Is it the part about Dantès' thirst for fear and where it comes from?
engSearchText:
Is it the part about Dantès' thirst for fear and where it
comes from?
jpnChrName: あの飛行船も、マリエルさんが協力して くださったからこそ……
jpnSearchText:
あの飛行船も、マリエルさんが協力して
くださったからこそ……

engChrName: Yeah. For better and for worse, he's led an unimaginable life—being descended from the royal family and also part of the D∴G cult.
engSearchText:
Yeah. For better and for worse, he's led an
unimaginable life—being descended from the royal
family and also part of the D∴G cult.
jpnChrName: ま、お互いケリは付けてきたって事だ。 あんたの方はその後も忙しかったようだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お互いケリは付けてきたって事だ。
あんたの方はその後も忙しかったようだが。

engChrName: We also can't forget the sword he wields is an artifact. I have to wonder if his background has anything to do with that obsession of his.
engSearchText:
We also can't forget the sword he wields is an artifact.
I have to wonder if his background has anything to do
with that obsession of his.
jpnChrName: ええ……明るみになったオラシオンの闇も 残って取材していましたから……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ……明るみになったオラシオンの闇も
残って取材していましたから……！

engChrName: It seems like Dingo might've had some idea about it, but he didn't go into it much in his notes...
engSearchText:
It seems like Dingo might've had some idea about it,
but he didn't go into it much in his notes...
jpnChrName: でも……その甲斐あって、ついに真実を暴くって 事が記者として出来たんじゃないかって……！
jpnSearchText:
でも……その甲斐あって、ついに真実を暴くって
事が記者として出来たんじゃないかって……！

jpnChrName: ハッ……それなら何よりだな。 ディンゴの奴も、心残りは減っただろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……それなら何よりだな。
ディンゴの奴も、心残りは減っただろうさ。

engChrName: *sigh* It's impossible to know what he was thinking.
engSearchText: *sigh* It's impossible to know what he was thinking.
jpnChrName: はい……！　少しでも、あの人に 近づけているなら私も……！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！　少しでも、あの人に
近づけているなら私も……！

engChrName: Anyway, I plan to pick up where he left off. If you guys come across anything, definitely let me know, okay?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I plan to pick up where he left off. If you
guys come across anything, definitely let me
know, okay?
jpnChrName: 今回の件では編集長にも誉めてもらえましたし、 ディンゴさんに近づけていれば良いけど……
jpnSearchText:
今回の件では編集長にも誉めてもらえましたし、
ディンゴさんに近づけていれば良いけど……

engChrName: You bet. We'll be in touch.
engSearchText: You bet. We'll be in touch.
jpnChrName: でも……やっぱり、最後に何の一言も 交わせなかった事が改めて……
jpnSearchText:
でも……やっぱり、最後に何の一言も
交わせなかった事が改めて……

engChrName: This notebook is the last thing Dingo left behind. I'll make sure his findings won't go to waste!
engSearchText:
This notebook is the last thing Dingo left behind.
I'll make sure his findings won't go to waste!
jpnChrName: あはは……今更……こんなに囚われていちゃ、 ディンゴさんも安心できないですよね……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……今更……こんなに囚われていちゃ、
ディンゴさんも安心できないですよね……

engChrName: I'm going to look into that theory he had. Maybe I can come up with some answers.
engSearchText:
I'm going to look into that theory he had. Maybe I
can come up with some answers.
jpnChrName: サルバッドでは色々ありましたけど、 ちゃんと実を結んでよかったです……！
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドでは色々ありましたけど、
ちゃんと実を結んでよかったです……！

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys. Umm... Great job, everyone! You all really saved the day back in Oración.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you guys. Umm... Great job, everyone!
You all really saved the day back in Oración.
jpnChrName: わたしが書いた記事、 ディンゴさんも読んでくれてるかな……？
jpnSearchText:
わたしが書いた記事、
ディンゴさんも読んでくれてるかな……？

engChrName: Thanks. You were a big help, too.
engSearchText: Thanks. You were a big help, too.
jpnChrName: はぁ……今朝の一面のスクープは 私も探りを入れてた案件だったのに……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……今朝の一面のスクープは
私も探りを入れてた案件だったのに……

engChrName: Without you, I doubt we would've been able to get all those kids on the airship.
engSearchText:
Without you, I doubt we would've been able to get all
those kids on the airship.
jpnChrName: でも──！　それなら次のスクープを 取って来ればいいだけの話ですよね！
jpnSearchText:
でも──！　それなら次のスクープを
取って来ればいいだけの話ですよね！

engChrName: I've noticed you've been keepin' busy lately.
engSearchText: I've noticed you've been keepin' busy lately.
jpnChrName: よしっ、今日も張り切って行こうっと！ それにディンゴさんの動向もチェックしてと……！
jpnSearchText:
よしっ、今日も張り切って行こうっと！
それにディンゴさんの動向もチェックしてと……！

engChrName: Yeah, you could say that. I had a lot of investigating to do once those revelations about Oración came to light.
engSearchText:
Yeah, you could say that. I had a lot of investigating
to do once those revelations about Oración came
to light.
jpnChrName: （コイツは相変わらずみてえだな。   ディンゴの苦労が偲ばれるぜ……）
jpnSearchText:
（コイツは相変わらずみてえだな。
ディンゴの苦労が偲ばれるぜ……）

engChrName: And it was all worth it in the end. I feel like I'm finally making a difference.
engSearchText:
And it was all worth it in the end. I feel like I'm
finally making a difference.
jpnChrName: あっ、そういえば文化面の記事の作成が 回って来ているんでした。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そういえば文化面の記事の作成が
回って来ているんでした。

engChrName: Good for you. Now Dingo's got one less thing to worry about up there.
engSearchText:
Good for you. Now Dingo's got one less thing to
worry about up there.
jpnChrName: 志望とは違う分野ですけど…… でも取材のついでに何かネタを取って来れば……！
jpnSearchText:
志望とは違う分野ですけど……
でも取材のついでに何かネタを取って来れば……！

engChrName: I sure hope so. If I'm that much closer to becoming the sort of reporter he was, I'll take it!
engSearchText:
I sure hope so. If I'm that much closer to becoming
the sort of reporter he was, I'll take it!
jpnChrName: フ……メルドとタイレル、スタンスは全く違う はずだが、どこかで通ずるところもある。
jpnSearchText:
フ……メルドとタイレル、スタンスは全く違う
はずだが、どこかで通ずるところもある。

engChrName: I hope this article has brought me one step closer to his level. Even the editor-in-chief complimented me on it.
engSearchText:
I hope this article has brought me one step closer to
his level. Even the editor-in-chief complimented me
on it.
jpnChrName: ちょいちょい感じちゃいたが……ディンゴと マリエルはその事を確信させてくれたもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいちょい感じちゃいたが……ディンゴと
マリエルはその事を確信させてくれたもんだよ。

engChrName: I just wish I could've said something to him before he was gone...
engSearchText:
I just wish I could've said something to him before he
was gone...
jpnChrName: ええっと、ええっと…… うひゃ～！　たまにテンパっちゃうけど……！
jpnSearchText:
ええっと、ええっと……
うひゃ～！　たまにテンパっちゃうけど……！

engChrName: Ugh. What am I even saying? Dingo's never going to be able to rest in peace if I let myself get hung up on what ifs.
engSearchText:
Ugh. What am I even saying? Dingo's never going to
be able to rest in peace if I let myself get hung up on
what ifs.
jpnChrName: つ、通信網の方はなんとかなってるから こっちはあたしたちに任せて！
jpnSearchText:
つ、通信網の方はなんとかなってるから
こっちはあたしたちに任せて！

engChrName: A lot of stuff went down while I was in Tharbad, but I got a great article out of it. It was all worth it in the end!
engSearchText:
A lot of stuff went down while I was in Tharbad, but
I got a great article out of it. It was all worth it in
the end!
jpnChrName: ……アニエスがまた無茶しないか 心配ではあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
……アニエスがまた無茶しないか
心配ではあるけど……

engChrName: I wonder if Dingo's read it yet. That'd make me happy.
engSearchText:
I wonder if Dingo's read it yet. That'd make
me happy.
jpnChrName: アニエスにしか出来ない事があるはずだもんね。 だから信じてる──きっとやり遂げてくるって！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスにしか出来ない事があるはずだもんね。
だから信じてる──きっとやり遂げてくるって！

engChrName: *sigh* I was looking into the exact story that made the front page this morning.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I was looking into the exact story that made the
front page this morning.
jpnChrName: うん……！　待っててオデット！ 必ずこの事態を止めてみせるから！
jpnSearchText:
うん……！　待っててオデット！
必ずこの事態を止めてみせるから！

engChrName: Oh, well. No use crying over spilled milk. I've just gotta go out there and find another story!
engSearchText:
Oh, well. No use crying over spilled milk. I've just
gotta go out there and find another story!
jpnChrName: レン先輩が何をしようとしてるのか サッパリだけど……
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩が何をしようとしてるのか
サッパリだけど……

engChrName: It's a brand new day! Time to get to work! Oh, and I better see what Dingo's up to as well.
engSearchText:
It's a brand new day! Time to get to work! Oh, and I
better see what Dingo's up to as well.
jpnChrName: アニエスや先輩ばっかりに 働かせてられないからね！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスや先輩ばっかりに
働かせてられないからね！

engChrName: (Nothing keeps this girl down for long, does it? I feel sorry for Dingo for whatever she's got in store for him in the near future.)
engSearchText:
(Nothing keeps this girl down for long, does it? I feel
sorry for Dingo for whatever she's got in store for
him in the near future.)
jpnChrName: あたしたちもできるだけ手伝うつもり！ アニエスたちも無事に戻ってきてよね！！
jpnSearchText:
あたしたちもできるだけ手伝うつもり！
アニエスたちも無事に戻ってきてよね！！

engChrName: Oh, I almost forgot. It's my turn to come up with an article for the culture section.
engSearchText:
Oh, I almost forgot. It's my turn to come up with an
article for the culture section.
jpnChrName: うん……！　オデットたちも どうか気を付けて！
jpnSearchText:
うん……！　オデットたちも
どうか気を付けて！

engChrName: It's not exactly the part of the paper I'm most interested in, but I'm sure I'll find something newsworthy if I nail the interview!
engSearchText:
It's not exactly the part of the paper I'm most
interested in, but I'm sure I'll find something
newsworthy if I nail the interview!
jpnChrName: アルベールってば、なんとか アニエスを助けようとして、化け物に襲われて……
jpnSearchText:
アルベールってば、なんとか
アニエスを助けようとして、化け物に襲われて……

engChrName: Meld and Tyrell might approach things differently, but that's not to say we don't see eye to eye on anything at all.
engSearchText:
Meld and Tyrell might approach things differently,
but that's not to say we don't see eye to eye on
anything at all.
jpnChrName: …………っ…………！ ここは任せて、アニエスの事を頼みます！！
jpnSearchText:
…………っ…………！
ここは任せて、アニエスの事を頼みます！！

engChrName: I've got Dingo and Marielle to thank for helping me to realize that.
engSearchText:
I've got Dingo and Marielle to thank for helping me
to realize that.
jpnChrName: でないとあたしたち、 もうどうしたらいいか……
jpnSearchText:
でないとあたしたち、
もうどうしたらいいか……

engChrName: Umm... I don't... GRRAAAH! This stupid piece of junk is driving me crazy!
engSearchText:
Umm... I don't... GRRAAAH! This stupid piece of
junk is driving me crazy!
jpnChrName: ああ……任せておけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……任せておけ。

engChrName: O-Oh, uh... Everything's under control! We got the communication systems up and running.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, uh... Everything's under control! We got the
communication systems up and running.
jpnChrName: あいつに関しては、俺も相応に 責任があるからな……！
jpnSearchText:
あいつに関しては、俺も相応に
責任があるからな……！

engChrName: We'll hold down the fort here. You go do what you have to do, Agnès.
engSearchText:
We'll hold down the fort here. You go do what you
have to do, Agnès.
jpnChrName: アルベールの怪我は大した事ないですし こっちは大丈夫ですから！
jpnSearchText:
アルベールの怪我は大した事ないですし
こっちは大丈夫ですから！

engChrName: I'll admit that I'm worried about you, but I know this is something you have to do.
engSearchText:
I'll admit that I'm worried about you, but I know this
is something you have to do.
jpnChrName: アニエスの事……どうかお願いします！！
jpnSearchText: アニエスの事……どうかお願いします！！

engChrName: Thanks for understanding. Just sit tight! We'll put a stop to this and be back in no time!
engSearchText:
Thanks for understanding. Just sit tight! We'll put a
stop to this and be back in no time!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのおかげでお菓子の調達はバッチリ！ 後は交流会を成功させるだけですね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんのおかげでお菓子の調達はバッチリ！
後は交流会を成功させるだけですね！

engChrName: I have no idea what Renne's trying to do on her end.
engSearchText: I have no idea what Renne's trying to do on her end.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんに参加してもらえるよう、 着ぐるみの方もバッチリ用意しておきますから。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんに参加してもらえるよう、
着ぐるみの方もバッチリ用意しておきますから。

engChrName: But what I do know is that we can't leave all the hard work to you and Van!
engSearchText:
But what I do know is that we can't leave all the hard
work to you and Van!
jpnChrName: 来年、予定が合ったらよろしくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText: 来年、予定が合ったらよろしくお願いしますね！

engChrName: That's why we're going to do everything we can to help. You guys just focus on making it back here in one piece!
engSearchText:
That's why we're going to do everything we can
to help. You guys just focus on making it back here in
one piece!
jpnChrName: やっと見つけた！ 最近話題の移動カフェ！
jpnSearchText:
やっと見つけた！
最近話題の移動カフェ！

engChrName: Right! You all stay safe! We'll be back soon!
engSearchText: Right! You all stay safe! We'll be back soon!
jpnChrName: カフェ好きとしては一度飲んで 見たかったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
カフェ好きとしては一度飲んで
見たかったんだけど……

engChrName: Albert got attacked by monsters while trying to save Agnès...
engSearchText:
Albert got attacked by monsters while trying to
save Agnès...
jpnChrName: うんうん、屋外ってのも斬新だし 味も居心地も最高ですな～♪
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、屋外ってのも斬新だし
味も居心地も最高ですな～♪

engChrName: ...But forget about us! You need to go find Agnès!
engSearchText: ...But forget about us! You need to go find Agnès!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、満喫してるみたいね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、満喫してるみたいね。

engChrName: At this point, you're the only one we can turn to for help...
engSearchText:
At this point, you're the only one we can turn to
for help...
jpnChrName: えへへ、アニエスは仕事中みたいだけど 適度に息抜きしてよねっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、アニエスは仕事中みたいだけど
適度に息抜きしてよねっ！

engChrName: Don't worry, I'm on it.
engSearchText: Don't worry, I'm on it.
jpnChrName: シノさんも良い人だし、 味も居心地も最高ですな～♪
jpnSearchText:
シノさんも良い人だし、
味も居心地も最高ですな～♪

engChrName: I'd be a shit boss if I wasn't prepared to do whatever it takes to keep her safe!
engSearchText:
I'd be a shit boss if I wasn't prepared to do whatever it
takes to keep her safe!
jpnChrName: （アルベールはまだ悶々としてるみたいだけど   そっとしといてあげますか。）
jpnSearchText:
（アルベールはまだ悶々としてるみたいだけど
そっとしといてあげますか。）

engChrName: Don't worry about things over here! Albert's injuries aren't that serious.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about things over here! Albert's injuries
aren't that serious.
jpnChrName: （あれから生徒会も忙しかったし   いい息抜きになるといいんだけどね～。）
jpnSearchText:
（あれから生徒会も忙しかったし
いい息抜きになるといいんだけどね～。）

engChrName: Now get on out there and save Agnès!
engSearchText: Now get on out there and save Agnès!
jpnChrName: 生徒会としても、みんなの相談には 積極的に乗らないとね！
jpnSearchText:
生徒会としても、みんなの相談には
積極的に乗らないとね！

engChrName: You found the perfect sweets for us to try out, Van! Thanks so much! This meetup's gonna be a big hit!
engSearchText:
You found the perfect sweets for us to try out, Van!
Thanks so much! This meetup's gonna be a big hit!
jpnChrName: もちろん個人的にも 目一杯楽しむつもりだけど！
jpnSearchText:
もちろん個人的にも
目一杯楽しむつもりだけど！

engChrName: All that's left is to find the perfect costume for you, Van. Then you can join in on the fun, too. ㈱
engSearchText:
All that's left is to find the perfect costume for
you, Van. Then you can join in on the fun, too. ㈱
jpnChrName: オデット、それにシニョン、ユリアン君も。
jpnSearchText: オデット、それにシニョン、ユリアン君も。

engChrName: Anyway, let me know what day works best for you. I wanna get this ball rolling!
engSearchText:
Anyway, let me know what day works best for you.
I wanna get this ball rolling!
jpnChrName: やあやあ、アニエスはバイト中？ どーもウチの子がお世話になってま～す！
jpnSearchText:
やあやあ、アニエスはバイト中？
どーもウチの子がお世話になってま～す！

engChrName: I finally found the roaming café that everyone's been talking about!
engSearchText:
I finally found the roaming café that everyone's been
talking about!
jpnChrName: 別に世話はしてねーけどな。 君らは相談事か？
jpnSearchText:
別に世話はしてねーけどな。
君らは相談事か？

engChrName: I love me a good café, so when I heard about it, I KNEW I had to come see it!
engSearchText:
I love me a good café, so when I heard about it, I
KNEW I had to come see it!
jpnChrName: ええ、来週の学校行事について 話し合っていまして──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、来週の学校行事について
話し合っていまして──

engChrName: Turns out, it's just as nice as everyone says! The drinks are to die for! ♪
engSearchText:
Turns out, it's just as nice as everyone says!
The drinks are to die for! ♪
jpnChrName: 特にユリアン君は留学生だもんね～！ あたしたちが相談に乗ってあげないと！
jpnSearchText:
特にユリアン君は留学生だもんね～！
あたしたちが相談に乗ってあげないと！

engChrName: Heehee. Sounds like it was worth the trip. I'm happy for you, Odette.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Sounds like it was worth the trip. I'm happy
for you, Odette.
jpnChrName: そーそー、生徒会の観点からも 各プランの見所と予算の解説を……
jpnSearchText:
そーそー、生徒会の観点からも
各プランの見所と予算の解説を……

engChrName: I can tell you're busy with work right now, but don't forget to take a break yourself when you can!
engSearchText:
I can tell you're busy with work right now, but don't
forget to take a break yourself when you can!
jpnChrName: ま、かく言う我々もまだ 具体的な話は決めてないんだけどネ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、かく言う我々もまだ
具体的な話は決めてないんだけどネ！

engChrName: This is a cute little place! Also, Shino's drinks are KILLER! I love it here!
engSearchText:
This is a cute little place! Also, Shino's drinks
are KILLER! I love it here!
jpnChrName: あははは…… （オデットは私と一緒って言ってたっけ。）
jpnSearchText:
あははは……
（オデットは私と一緒って言ってたっけ。）

engChrName: (Albert doesn't seem to be having as much fun, though. I think I'll give him some space.)
engSearchText:
(Albert doesn't seem to be having as much
fun, though. I think I'll give him some space.)
jpnChrName: 詳しくは分かりませんが、 皆様楽しみにされているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
詳しくは分かりませんが、
皆様楽しみにされているようですね。

engChrName: (Our Student Council work has kept us really busy, so I was hoping he could take this chance to rest and relax.)
engSearchText:
(Our Student Council work has kept us really busy, so
I was hoping he could take this chance to rest
and relax.)
jpnChrName: ええ、折角の機会ですし、しっかり検討して みんなで有意義なものにしたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、折角の機会ですし、しっかり検討して
みんなで有意義なものにしたいですね。

engChrName: When you're on the Student Council, it's always important to be there for people when they need advice.
engSearchText:
When you're on the Student Council, it's always
important to be there for people when they
need advice.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットの再起動…… ちょっとした“裏技”に心当たりがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットの再起動……
ちょっとした“裏技”に心当たりがあってね。

engChrName: Oh, and it's equally important to take a breather, too! We try to work in some fun when we can.
engSearchText:
Oh, and it's equally important to take a breather, too!
We try to work in some fun when we can.
jpnChrName: みんなも手を貸してくれるなら 案外早く目処が付くかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
みんなも手を貸してくれるなら
案外早く目処が付くかもしれないわ。

engChrName: Oh, hi there, everyone.
engSearchText: Oh, hi there, everyone.
jpnChrName: とはいえ──それだけじゃ 連中に届くには足りないはず……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ──それだけじゃ
連中に届くには足りないはず……

engChrName: Hey, Agnès! You on the clock right now? I hope your boss is looking out for you!
engSearchText:
Hey, Agnès! You on the clock right now? I hope your
boss is looking out for you!
jpnChrName: そっちは任せたわよ、アニエス。 裏解決屋のお兄さんたちも。
jpnSearchText:
そっちは任せたわよ、アニエス。
裏解決屋のお兄さんたちも。

engChrName: Eh. She can handle herself just fine without me babysitting. Anyway, what're you kids up to?
engSearchText:
Eh. She can handle herself just fine without
me babysitting. Anyway, what're you kids up to?
jpnChrName: はいっ！　先輩もどうかお気をつけて！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！　先輩もどうかお気をつけて！

engChrName: We were just talking about next week's school event.
engSearchText: We were just talking about next week's school event.
jpnChrName: 頼りにしてるぜ、元仔猫！
jpnSearchText: 頼りにしてるぜ、元仔猫！

engChrName: Julian's an exchange student, so we wanted to answer any questions he might have about it.
engSearchText:
Julian's an exchange student, so we wanted to
answer any questions he might have about it.
jpnChrName: 私達の依頼に付き合ってくれた所を見ると 今のところ問題は起きていないみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
私達の依頼に付き合ってくれた所を見ると
今のところ問題は起きていないみたいね。

engChrName: We're also going over the merits of each plan, as well as their budgetary needs.
engSearchText:
We're also going over the merits of each plan, as well
as their budgetary needs.
jpnChrName: でも、危機は去ったっていうのに どこか胸騒ぎがしてしまって……
jpnSearchText:
でも、危機は去ったっていうのに
どこか胸騒ぎがしてしまって……

engChrName: Everything's still up in the air, though. We haven't exactly settled on anything yet. Whoops!
engSearchText:
Everything's still up in the air, though. We haven't
exactly settled on anything yet. Whoops!
jpnChrName: ……いえ、きっと気のせいよね。 あれこれ考え過ぎるのは私の悪い癖だわ。
jpnSearchText:
……いえ、きっと気のせいよね。
あれこれ考え過ぎるのは私の悪い癖だわ。

engChrName: Ahaha... Why am I not surprised? (Not that I'm in any position to criticize...)
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Why am I not surprised?
(Not that I'm in any position to criticize...)
jpnChrName: （胸騒ぎか……）
jpnSearchText: （胸騒ぎか……）

engChrName: Well, at least you all seem to be enjoying yourselves.
engSearchText: Well, at least you all seem to be enjoying yourselves.

engChrName: For sure. Chances like this don't come around often, so we're taking our time.
engSearchText:
For sure. Chances like this don't come around often,
so we're taking our time.
jpnChrName: ふふ、オデット達に気合が 入っているのも分かる気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、オデット達に気合が
入っているのも分かる気がするわ。

engChrName: It won't take me long to get the orbal net back up and running.
engSearchText:
It won't take me long to get the orbal net back up
and running.
jpnChrName: 美味しいケーキを用意して、 ケーキに合う紅茶を淹れて……
jpnSearchText:
美味しいケーキを用意して、
ケーキに合う紅茶を淹れて……

engChrName: And it'll take even less time if I can get some help.
engSearchText: And it'll take even less time if I can get some help.
jpnChrName: 最高のお茶会にする為に 下準備をするのは楽しいものね♪
jpnSearchText:
最高のお茶会にする為に
下準備をするのは楽しいものね♪

engChrName: I'm not sure if it'll help us much with reaching Almata—at least, not on its own.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure if it'll help us much with reaching
Almata—at least, not on its own.
jpnChrName: お前が言うと意味ありげに聞こえるな。
jpnSearchText: お前が言うと意味ありげに聞こえるな。

engChrName: But I'll try to think of something. In the meantime, I wish you all the best of luck.
engSearchText:
But I'll try to think of something. In the meantime, I
wish you all the best of luck.
jpnChrName: 警察に遊撃士、各街区の有志の人たちも 既に動き出しているみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
警察に遊撃士、各街区の有志の人たちも
既に動き出しているみたいだ。

engChrName: You, too. Stay safe!
engSearchText: You, too. Stay safe!
jpnChrName: あの“悪魔”の数も減ったようだが…… ヴァンタイユ地区だけはやはり──
jpnSearchText:
あの“悪魔”の数も減ったようだが……
ヴァンタイユ地区だけはやはり──

engChrName: Now's your chance to show us what you're made of!
engSearchText: Now's your chance to show us what you're made of!
jpnChrName: ……アニエス、僕もできる限り みんなのバックアップに務める。
jpnSearchText:
……アニエス、僕もできる限り
みんなのバックアップに務める。

engChrName: You must be having a slow day if you had time to help us. Must be hard for you to find work when things are so peaceful.
engSearchText:
You must be having a slow day if you had time to
help us. Must be hard for you to find work when
things are so peaceful.
jpnChrName: だからどうか──君も 無事に帰ってくるって約束してくれ！！
jpnSearchText:
だからどうか──君も
無事に帰ってくるって約束してくれ！！

engChrName: Having said that, I feel a little restless, even though the worst of it should be behind us...
engSearchText:
Having said that, I feel a little restless, even though
the worst of it should be behind us...
jpnChrName: うん……アルベール君の 頑張りを無駄にはしないから。
jpnSearchText:
うん……アルベール君の
頑張りを無駄にはしないから。

engChrName: ...Don't mind me. I'm sure it's nothing. I have a bad habit of overthinking things.
engSearchText:
...Don't mind me. I'm sure it's nothing. I have a bad
habit of overthinking things.
jpnChrName: どうか信じていて。 きっと迎えに来るから。
jpnSearchText:
どうか信じていて。
きっと迎えに来るから。

engChrName: (Hmm... Her instincts are usually on point, though.)
engSearchText: (Hmm... Her instincts are usually on point, though.)
jpnChrName: アニエス……… ああ、オデットと待ってるからな！！
jpnSearchText:
アニエス………
ああ、オデットと待ってるからな！！

jpnChrName: 正直いまだに頭が混乱しているが…… ここが踏ん張りどころなんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
正直いまだに頭が混乱しているが……
ここが踏ん張りどころなんだろう。

engChrName: Heehee. I can understand why the others are so excited.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I can understand why the others are
so excited.
jpnChrName: 僕らも生徒会の一員として 先輩たちをサポートするつもりだ！
jpnSearchText:
僕らも生徒会の一員として
先輩たちをサポートするつもりだ！

engChrName: The act of preparing a tea party can be quite enjoyable.
engSearchText:
The act of preparing a tea party can be
quite enjoyable.
jpnChrName: アニエスも……詳しくは聞かないが 無茶はしないでくれよ！？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスも……詳しくは聞かないが
無茶はしないでくれよ！？

engChrName: Finding the perfect cake, brewing the right tea... What more fun could a girl ask for? ㈱
engSearchText:
Finding the perfect cake, brewing the right tea...
What more fun could a girl ask for? ㈱
jpnChrName: ええ、私の方は大丈夫。 ありがとう、アルベール君！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、私の方は大丈夫。
ありがとう、アルベール君！

engChrName: I think your idea of fun's a little different from everyone else's.
engSearchText:
I think your idea of fun's a little different from
everyone else's.
jpnChrName: くっ……僕とした事が不甲斐ない……！ あの時、もっと早く動けていれば……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……僕とした事が不甲斐ない……！
あの時、もっと早く動けていれば……

engChrName: The police, bracers, and volunteers in different districts are already on the move.
engSearchText:
The police, bracers, and volunteers in different
districts are already on the move.
jpnChrName: アニエスとブライト先輩があんな事に…… どうか、二人を……！！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスとブライト先輩があんな事に……
どうか、二人を……！！

engChrName: Those devils are finally thinning out, thankfully, but there's still the Vantail District to worry about...
engSearchText:
Those devils are finally thinning out, thankfully, but
there's still the Vantail District to worry about...
jpnChrName: まあ、想像していたよりも いいスイーツが揃った事は確かだな……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、想像していたよりも
いいスイーツが揃った事は確かだな……

engChrName: Even so, I'm going to do everything within my power to help everyone.
engSearchText:
Even so, I'm going to do everything within my power
to help everyone.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、それとこれとは話が別だ。 僕はまだお前を認めてないんだからな！？
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、それとこれとは話が別だ。
僕はまだお前を認めてないんだからな！？

engChrName: As for you, Agnès...just promise me you'll come back safe.
engSearchText:
As for you, Agnès...just promise me you'll come
back safe.
jpnChrName: へいへい、 今日も相変わらずの反応ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText:
へいへい、
今日も相変わらずの反応ありがとよ。

engChrName: I promise.
engSearchText: I promise.
jpnChrName: アニエス……何があるかわからない状況だ。 とにかく気をつけてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス……何があるかわからない状況だ。
とにかく気をつけてくれ。

engChrName: We'll return once we've saved the city!
engSearchText: We'll return once we've saved the city!
jpnChrName: 僕たちはいつでも君の味方だ。 何かあったら遠慮なく頼ってくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
僕たちはいつでも君の味方だ。
何かあったら遠慮なく頼ってくれよ？

engChrName: All right. Odette and I will be waiting for you!
engSearchText: All right. Odette and I will be waiting for you!
jpnChrName: アニエス、その……
jpnSearchText: アニエス、その……

engChrName: I'm having trouble making sense of everything, but I can't let that get to me. I have work to do.
engSearchText:
I'm having trouble making sense of everything, but I
can't let that get to me. I have work to do.
jpnChrName: どうしたの、アルベール君？
jpnSearchText: どうしたの、アルベール君？

engChrName: Odette and I will do whatever we can to help Renne!
engSearchText: Odette and I will do whatever we can to help Renne!
jpnChrName: い、いや……
jpnSearchText: い、いや……

engChrName: I won't ask what's going on with you, Agnès. Just please don't go overboard with whatever you have to do.
engSearchText:
I won't ask what's going on with you, Agnès.
Just please don't go overboard with whatever you have
to do.
jpnChrName: コホン、バイトお疲れ様だ。 くれぐれも危険のないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、バイトお疲れ様だ。
くれぐれも危険のないようにな。

engChrName: Of course. I promise I'll be careful.
engSearchText: Of course. I promise I'll be careful.
jpnChrName: （へえ？　ちょいとばかし   態度が変わったみたいだな？）
jpnSearchText:
（へえ？　ちょいとばかし
態度が変わったみたいだな？）

engChrName: Gah. I'm so...worthless! If I'd acted more quickly, Agnès and Renne would've been safe...
engSearchText:
Gah. I'm so...worthless! If I'd acted more quickly,
Agnès and Renne would've been safe...
jpnChrName: （ええ、バーゼルでの一件の後   色々話をしまして……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、バーゼルでの一件の後
色々話をしまして……）

engChrName: Please... You have to help them!
engSearchText: Please... You have to help them!
jpnChrName: （私が解決事務所の仕事を、誇りをもって   やっている事は分かってもらえたんです。）
jpnSearchText:
（私が解決事務所の仕事を、誇りをもって
やっている事は分かってもらえたんです。）

engChrName: I'll admit, you managed to bring us better sweets than I anticipated.
engSearchText:
I'll admit, you managed to bring us better sweets than
I anticipated.
jpnChrName: （へえ、そうだったんだ。   ……でも………）
jpnSearchText:
（へえ、そうだったんだ。
……でも………）

engChrName: But don't get the wrong idea. This does NOT mean we're good now! Not by a long shot!
engSearchText:
But don't get the wrong idea. This does NOT mean
we're good now! Not by a long shot!
jpnChrName: （万が一アニエスの身に何かあったら……   くっ、どうにか彼女を守る方法は……！）
jpnSearchText:
（万が一アニエスの身に何かあったら……
くっ、どうにか彼女を守る方法は……！）

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. It wouldn't be a day on the job if I didn't have you yelling my ears off at least once.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. It wouldn't be a day on the job if I didn't
have you yelling my ears off at least once.
jpnChrName: （──大分悩んじまってるみたいだが？）
jpnSearchText: （──大分悩んじまってるみたいだが？）

engChrName: I have no idea what's going on right now, but whatever happens, be careful, Agnès.
engSearchText:
I have no idea what's going on right now, but
whatever happens, be careful, Agnès.
jpnChrName: （あはは……心配してくれてるのは   相変わらずみたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……心配してくれてるのは
相変わらずみたいですね……）

engChrName: Don't forget, we're your friends, too. We'll always be here for you if you need to talk to us.
engSearchText:
Don't forget, we're your friends, too. We'll always be
here for you if you need to talk to us.
jpnChrName: コホン、オデットのカフェ巡りに付き合ってみれば こんなカフェを訪れる事になるとは……
jpnSearchText:
コホン、オデットのカフェ巡りに付き合ってみれば
こんなカフェを訪れる事になるとは……

engChrName: Hey, umm...Agnès?
engSearchText: Hey, umm...Agnès?
jpnChrName: だが落ち着くと言うか、 考え事をするにはもってこいだな……
jpnSearchText:
だが落ち着くと言うか、
考え事をするにはもってこいだな……

engChrName: Hmm? What is it?
engSearchText: Hmm? What is it?
jpnChrName: ……アニエス、その、 くれぐれも危険のないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
……アニエス、その、
くれぐれも危険のないようにな。

engChrName: N-Never mind. It's nothing.
engSearchText: N-Never mind. It's nothing.
jpnChrName: 困ったことがあったら 僕たちのことも頼ってくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
困ったことがあったら
僕たちのことも頼ってくれよ？

engChrName: *cough* Glad to see your work's...erm...going well. Stay safe out there, all right?
engSearchText:
*cough* Glad to see your work's...erm...going well.
Stay safe out there, all right?
jpnChrName: あ、アンタは裏解決屋……！？
jpnSearchText: あ、アンタは裏解決屋……！？

engChrName: (Am I seeing things, or is this kid startin' to change his tune?)
engSearchText:
(Am I seeing things, or is this kid startin' to change
his tune?)
jpnChrName: くっ、アニエスを連れて 今日は一体何をしているんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
くっ、アニエスを連れて
今日は一体何をしているんだ！？

engChrName: (Yes. He and I had a bit of a talk after our trip to Basel.)
engSearchText:
(Yes. He and I had a bit of a talk after our trip
to Basel.)
jpnChrName: あー、この前のピュアな少年か。 ここでバイトしてるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、この前のピュアな少年か。
ここでバイトしてるみてえだな。

engChrName: (He should fully understand now that I'm proud to be working with you—and that nobody's forcing me to do so.)
engSearchText:
(He should fully understand now that I'm proud to be
working with you—and that nobody's forcing me to
do so.)
jpnChrName: 勤労ゴクロウ、お互いしっかり働こうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 勤労ゴクロウ、お互いしっかり働こうぜ。

engChrName: (Oh, I didn't know you told him that. But still...)
engSearchText:
(Oh, I didn't know you told him that.
But still...)
jpnChrName: ……っ……やっぱりアンタには……！
jpnSearchText: ……っ……やっぱりアンタには……！

engChrName: (There's always a chance something could still happen to Agnès! I need to be ready to protect her at a moment's notice!)
engSearchText:
(There's always a chance something could still happen
to Agnès! I need to be ready to protect her at a
moment's notice!)
jpnChrName: えっと、アルベール君。 店内で大声を出すのはどうかと……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、アルベール君。
店内で大声を出すのはどうかと……

engChrName: (I, uh...don't know if that talk was all that effective, Agnès.)
engSearchText:
(I, uh...don't know if that talk was all that
effective, Agnès.)
jpnChrName: はい、わたしたち 客として来てるわけですし……
jpnSearchText:
はい、わたしたち
客として来てるわけですし……

engChrName: (S-Sure it was! He just needs a little more time to accept it, that's all.)
engSearchText:
(S-Sure it was! He just needs a little more time to
accept it, that's all.)
jpnChrName: クク、客商売でその対応は ねーんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、客商売でその対応は
ねーんじゃねえか？

engChrName: When I agreed to tag along with Odette on her café-hopping trip, I didn't expect to end up at a place like this.
engSearchText:
When I agreed to tag along with Odette on her
café-hopping trip, I didn't expect to end up at a place
like this.
jpnChrName: くっ……！？　それはその……
jpnSearchText: くっ……！？　それはその……

engChrName: It's pretty calm and relaxing, I'll admit. Definitely a good place to do some thinking.
engSearchText:
It's pretty calm and relaxing, I'll admit. Definitely a
good place to do some thinking.
jpnChrName: と、ともかく、アニエスに何かあったら 問題にさせてもらうからなっ！
jpnSearchText:
と、ともかく、アニエスに何かあったら
問題にさせてもらうからなっ！

engChrName: Hey, listen, Agnès. Just...try to stay out of danger, all right?
engSearchText:
Hey, listen, Agnès. Just...try to stay out of danger,
all right?
jpnChrName: あー、まあお手柔らかに頼むぜ。 （サルバッドの件がバレたら面倒そうだな……）
jpnSearchText:
あー、まあお手柔らかに頼むぜ。
（サルバッドの件がバレたら面倒そうだな……）

engChrName: If you run into any problems, you can always come talk to us. You know that, right?
engSearchText:
If you run into any problems, you can always come
talk to us. You know that, right?
jpnChrName: （マフィアと何度も遭遇している事も   伏せられた方がいいかもしれませんね。）
jpnSearchText:
（マフィアと何度も遭遇している事も
伏せられた方がいいかもしれませんね。）

engChrName: H-Hey! You're that spriggan!
engSearchText: H-Hey! You're that spriggan!
jpnChrName: （あはは……だ、大丈夫です。   私も気を付けていますから。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……だ、大丈夫です。
私も気を付けていますから。）

engChrName: Why are you here? No, more importantly, why are you dragging Agnès around town? Huh?!
engSearchText:
Why are you here? No, more importantly, why are
you dragging Agnès around town? Huh?!
jpnChrName: ともかく、解決屋なんて僕は信用しない。
jpnSearchText: ともかく、解決屋なんて僕は信用しない。

engChrName: Oh, great. It's the annoying, stick-in-the-mud kid. Didn't realize you worked here.
engSearchText:
Oh, great. It's the annoying, stick-in-the-mud kid.
Didn't realize you worked here.
jpnChrName: アニエスに何かあったら 問題にさせてもらうからなっ！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスに何かあったら
問題にさせてもらうからなっ！

engChrName: Don't point fingers at me. I'm just earnin' my keep, and she decided to tag along for the ride.
engSearchText:
Don't point fingers at me. I'm just earnin' my keep,
and she decided to tag along for the ride.
jpnChrName: ……在庫のチェック、効率的にやれば 少し早めに上がれるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
……在庫のチェック、効率的にやれば
少し早めに上がれるかもな。

engChrName: Grr... I'm warning you! You better not—
engSearchText: Grr... I'm warning you! You better not—
jpnChrName: それにしても彼女が“バイト”だなんて…… 今度ブライト先輩を問い詰めないと……（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText:
それにしても彼女が“バイト”だなんて……
今度ブライト先輩を問い詰めないと……（ブツブツ）

engChrName: Umm... Albert? I think you might want to use your inside voice.
engSearchText:
Umm... Albert? I think you might want to use your
inside voice.
jpnChrName: （ん……？　アラミスの生徒みてえだが……）
jpnSearchText: （ん……？　アラミスの生徒みてえだが……）

engChrName: Yeah. It's rude to yell at people, y'know.
engSearchText: Yeah. It's rude to yell at people, y'know.
jpnChrName: （気にならなくもねえが   まあ声を掛けるのはやめておくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（気にならなくもねえが
まあ声を掛けるのはやめておくか。）

engChrName: Screaming at customers is a quick way to get yourself fired.
engSearchText:
Screaming at customers is a quick way to get
yourself fired.
jpnChrName: ……彼女が理由もなく バイトなんかするはず……
jpnSearchText:
……彼女が理由もなく
バイトなんかするはず……

engChrName: Sh-Shut up! I mean, uh...shut up.
engSearchText: Sh-Shut up! I mean, uh...shut up.
jpnChrName: くっ、やはり今度ブライト先輩を 問い詰めないと……（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText:
くっ、やはり今度ブライト先輩を
問い詰めないと……（ブツブツ）

engChrName: Listen. If you put Agnès in ANY danger at all, I will have some choice words for you. VERY choice words. Understand?
engSearchText:
Listen. If you put Agnès in ANY danger at all, I will
have some choice words for you. VERY choice words.
Understand?
jpnChrName: アルベール君、ライエル君も……
jpnSearchText: アルベール君、ライエル君も……

engChrName: Loud and clear, kiddo. (Miiight be best to keep everything that happened in Tharbad under our hats.)
engSearchText:
Loud and clear, kiddo.
(Miiight be best to keep everything that happened in
Tharbad under our hats.)
jpnChrName: よっす、アニエスちゃん。 そっちもガッコー帰りにバイトみてーだな。
jpnSearchText:
よっす、アニエスちゃん。
そっちもガッコー帰りにバイトみてーだな。

engChrName: (Indeed. I also doubt he would be too pleased to learn of our numerous skirmishes with the mafia.)
engSearchText:
(Indeed. I also doubt he would be too pleased to learn
of our numerous skirmishes with the mafia.)
jpnChrName: オレもこの後バイトなんだが、その前に アルベールの顔を見てやろうと思ってよ～。
jpnSearchText:
オレもこの後バイトなんだが、その前に
アルベールの顔を見てやろうと思ってよ～。

engChrName: (Right... I'll make it a point to be careful what I say around him.)
engSearchText:
(Right... I'll make it a point to be careful what I say
around him.)
jpnChrName: 別に頼んでないんだが…… まあ、こんなご時世だしな。
jpnSearchText:
別に頼んでないんだが……
まあ、こんなご時世だしな。

engChrName: I just can't bring myself to trust someone as shady as you.
engSearchText:
I just can't bring myself to trust someone as shady
as you.
jpnChrName: アニエス、この前からしつこくて済まないが 本当に危険な事はしないでくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、この前からしつこくて済まないが
本当に危険な事はしないでくれよ？

engChrName: If anything happens to Agnès, you're going to have to answer to me! Understand?
engSearchText:
If anything happens to Agnès, you're going to have to
answer to me! Understand?
jpnChrName: バーゼルの時は非常時だったし仕方ないが…… 正直肝が冷えてならなかった。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの時は非常時だったし仕方ないが……
正直肝が冷えてならなかった。

engChrName: Okay, now to check our inventory. If I'm smart about this, I might be able to get this done ahead of schedule.
engSearchText:
Okay, now to check our inventory. If I'm smart about
this, I might be able to get this done ahead
of schedule.
jpnChrName: またあんな事になったら、僕は……
jpnSearchText: またあんな事になったら、僕は……

engChrName: *sigh* Why in the world did she need to get a job? Maybe Renne might know something about this.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Why in the world did she need to get a job?
Maybe Renne might know something about this.
jpnChrName: アルベール君…… ……ごめんなさい、いつも心配かけて。
jpnSearchText:
アルベール君……
……ごめんなさい、いつも心配かけて。

engChrName: (Looks like someone who goes to Aramis. Why's he workin' at this bookstore?)
engSearchText:
(Looks like someone who goes to Aramis. Why's he
workin' at this bookstore?)
jpnChrName: い、いやっ、そんなつもりじゃ──
jpnSearchText: い、いやっ、そんなつもりじゃ──

engChrName: (I'm curious—but not enough to ask. I'll just leave him be.)
engSearchText:
(I'm curious—but not enough to ask. I'll just leave
him be.)
jpnChrName: なに見せつけてんだよ、アルベール～？
jpnSearchText: なに見せつけてんだよ、アルベール～？

engChrName: She wouldn't go out and get a job unless it was for a good reason...
engSearchText:
She wouldn't go out and get a job unless it was for a
good reason...
jpnChrName: それにだ、ここは一つアニエスちゃんを 信じてやるべきなんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
それにだ、ここは一つアニエスちゃんを
信じてやるべきなんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Hmph. I'm going to have to talk to Renne about this when I get back.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I'm going to have to talk to Renne about this
when I get back.
jpnChrName: 女子の気持ちを尊重してやるってのが モテる秘訣らしいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
女子の気持ちを尊重してやるってのが
モテる秘訣らしいぜ？

engChrName: Albert! And Lyle, too!
engSearchText: Albert! And Lyle, too!
jpnChrName: 一瞬いい事を言ってる気もしたが…… コホン、やはり気の迷いだったか。
jpnSearchText:
一瞬いい事を言ってる気もしたが……
コホン、やはり気の迷いだったか。

engChrName: What's up, Agnès? You working hard?
engSearchText: What's up, Agnès? You working hard?
jpnChrName: ……とにかくアニエス、 何かあったら僕たちも頼ってくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
……とにかくアニエス、
何かあったら僕たちも頼ってくれよ？

engChrName: I'm on my way to work myself. I just swung by here real quick to check up on Albert.
engSearchText:
I'm on my way to work myself. I just swung by here
real quick to check up on Albert.
jpnChrName: ええ、ありがとう、アルベール君。
jpnSearchText: ええ、ありがとう、アルベール君。

engChrName: Not that I asked you to...but I understand, given all that's happened.
engSearchText:
Not that I asked you to...but I understand, given all
that's happened.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんとアニエスに頑張ってもらってる間、 あたし達はイベントの内容を詰めないとね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんとアニエスに頑張ってもらってる間、
あたし達はイベントの内容を詰めないとね！

engChrName: Anyway, I know I'm always bugging you about this, but seriously, don't do anything too dangerous, okay?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I know I'm always bugging you about this,
but seriously, don't do anything too dangerous, okay?
jpnChrName: まずはオープニングで 盛り上がる演出をしたいわよね～。
jpnSearchText:
まずはオープニングで
盛り上がる演出をしたいわよね～。

engChrName: I get that what happened in Basel was an unavoidable emergency, but that didn't stop me from being scared out of my mind for you.
engSearchText:
I get that what happened in Basel was an unavoidable
emergency, but that didn't stop me from being scared
out of my mind for you.
jpnChrName: そうだな、まずは交流会に対して 子供達に興味を持ってもらう必要がある。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、まずは交流会に対して
子供達に興味を持ってもらう必要がある。

engChrName: If anything happened to you, I... I...
engSearchText: If anything happened to you, I... I...
jpnChrName: となると……うーん、難しいな。 参考になる本でもあれば良いんだが……
jpnSearchText:
となると……うーん、難しいな。
参考になる本でもあれば良いんだが……

engChrName: Oh, Albert. I'm so sorry. I'm always making you worry, aren't I?
engSearchText:
Oh, Albert. I'm so sorry. I'm always making you
worry, aren't I?
jpnChrName: ああ、悪魔の事なら心配いらないわよ。 振り切ろうと思えば振り切れるから。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、悪魔の事なら心配いらないわよ。
振り切ろうと思えば振り切れるから。

engChrName: N-No, that's not... Ah, don't be sorry! I didn't mean to make you feel—
engSearchText:
N-No, that's not... Ah, don't be sorry! I didn't mean
to make you feel—
jpnChrName: この子達に危険が及ばないように 安全そうなルートも見繕っておいた。
jpnSearchText:
この子達に危険が及ばないように
安全そうなルートも見繕っておいた。

engChrName: Hoho. I've never seen you so hot and bothered before.
engSearchText:
Hoho. I've never seen you so hot and
bothered before.
jpnChrName: とにかく、どうか頑張って来てちょうだい。 アークライドと貴方達の事、信じてるから！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、どうか頑張って来てちょうだい。
アークライドと貴方達の事、信じてるから！

engChrName: I think you should have a little more faith in Agnès.
engSearchText: I think you should have a little more faith in Agnès.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達じゃないか！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん達じゃないか！

engChrName: After all, respecting a woman's feelings is the fastest way to her heart. Or so they say, anyway.
engSearchText:
After all, respecting a woman's feelings is the fastest
way to her heart. Or so they say, anyway.
jpnChrName: 良かった、全員無事に合流できたんだ！
