jpnSearchText: 良かった、全員無事に合流できたんだ！

engChrName: And here I thought you were going to have something insightful to say for once. I should've known better.
engSearchText:
And here I thought you were going to have
something insightful to say for once. I should've
known better.
jpnChrName: ああ、なんとかな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、なんとかな。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm not here to stop you. Just know that we're here for you if you need anything, all right?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm not here to stop you. Just know that
we're here for you if you need anything, all right?
jpnChrName: 聞いてるぜ、お前らも“動ける”ヤツの 足として大活躍だったみたいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
聞いてるぜ、お前らも“動ける”ヤツの
足として大活躍だったみたいじゃねえか。

engChrName: Of course. Thank you, Albert.
engSearchText: Of course. Thank you, Albert.
jpnChrName: エルメスまで合流してるとは 思わなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
エルメスまで合流してるとは
思わなかったが。

engChrName: While Van and Agnès are running around town, we've got to start ironing out the specifics of this whole event.
engSearchText:
While Van and Agnès are running around town,
we've got to start ironing out the specifics of this
whole event.
jpnChrName: ええ、一応顔馴染だし、お互い行き場に 困ってる人を送っていたから自然とね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、一応顔馴染だし、お互い行き場に
困ってる人を送っていたから自然とね。

engChrName: I think the first thing we should discuss is how we're going to kick things off.
engSearchText:
I think the first thing we should discuss is how we're
going to kick things off.
jpnChrName: これから皆でリバーサイドに戻って いったん補給をしようと思ってる所よ。
jpnSearchText:
これから皆でリバーサイドに戻って
いったん補給をしようと思ってる所よ。

engChrName: Good idea. We have to come up with a way to hook everyone right off the bat.
engSearchText:
Good idea. We have to come up with a way to hook
everyone right off the bat.
jpnChrName: その後手分けをしてまた街を周ってみるつもり。 勿論、貴方達への配達もやりつつね。
jpnSearchText:
その後手分けをしてまた街を周ってみるつもり。
勿論、貴方達への配達もやりつつね。

engChrName: The only question is how... If only we knew of a book on this subject.
engSearchText:
The only question is how... If only we knew of a book
on this subject.
jpnChrName: タイムリミットが迫ってるみたいだけど…… 私もバイク乗りとして出来る事をやるまでよ。
jpnSearchText:
タイムリミットが迫ってるみたいだけど……
私もバイク乗りとして出来る事をやるまでよ。

engChrName: Don't worry about me. I can shake those devils off my tail no problem.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me. I can shake those devils
off my tail no problem.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そうかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そうかよ。

engChrName: I'll take care of the kids. I know a safe route that'll get us all out of harm's way.
engSearchText:
I'll take care of the kids. I know a safe route that'll get
us all out of harm's way.
jpnChrName: 正直、あたし達はまだ よく分かってないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
正直、あたし達はまだ
よく分かってないんだけど……

engChrName: Now, go knock 'em dead. I believe in you—and so does everyone else!
engSearchText:
Now, go knock 'em dead. I believe in you—and so
does everyone else!
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街を元に戻すために なんかやろうとしてるんでしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街を元に戻すために
なんかやろうとしてるんでしょ！？

engChrName: Hey, it's you guys!
engSearchText: Hey, it's you guys!
jpnChrName: だったら俺たちは協力するだけだぜ！ 日頃の恩を返すためにもな！
jpnSearchText:
だったら俺たちは協力するだけだぜ！
日頃の恩を返すためにもな！

engChrName: I'm glad to see you're all okay!
engSearchText: I'm glad to see you're all okay!
jpnChrName: ハハ、そいつは心強ぇ。 どうかよろしく頼むぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、そいつは心強ぇ。
どうかよろしく頼むぜ！！

engChrName: Same to y'all.
engSearchText: Same to y'all.
jpnChrName: お前たちか…… あまりウロウロするんじゃあない。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちか……
あまりウロウロするんじゃあない。

engChrName: I heard you guys've been ferryin' people around. Nice going.
engSearchText:
I heard you guys've been ferryin' people around.
Nice going.
jpnChrName: お前たちも胡散臭さで言えば この店の連中とさほど変わらんのだからな。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちも胡散臭さで言えば
この店の連中とさほど変わらんのだからな。

engChrName: Didn't expect to see you workin' together with Hermès, though.
engSearchText:
Didn't expect to see you workin' together with
Hermès, though.
jpnChrName: “嗅ぎ回る”のも程々にしておけ。 またお縄になりたくなければな。
jpnSearchText:
“嗅ぎ回る”のも程々にしておけ。
またお縄になりたくなければな。

engChrName: We're all well acquainted at this point. I was doing the same thing earlier, and we happened to bump into each other along the way.
engSearchText:
We're all well acquainted at this point. I was doing
the same thing earlier, and we happened to bump
into each other along the way.
jpnChrName: よ、よし！　これでようやく 逃げ遅れた住民の対応に回れるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
よ、よし！　これでようやく
逃げ遅れた住民の対応に回れるぞ！

engChrName: We're just about to head back to Riverside to resupply.
engSearchText:
We're just about to head back to Riverside
to resupply.
jpnChrName: 銃一丁じゃ正直心もとないけど…… そんな事言ってられない状況だしな。
jpnSearchText:
銃一丁じゃ正直心もとないけど……
そんな事言ってられない状況だしな。

engChrName: From there, we'll split up and circle around town. Let me know if you want me to pick up anything for you all.
engSearchText:
From there, we'll split up and circle around town.
Let me know if you want me to pick up anything for
you all.
jpnChrName: 警察としてお前たちに負けっぱなしって 訳にもいかないんだよっ！
jpnSearchText:
警察としてお前たちに負けっぱなしって
訳にもいかないんだよっ！

engChrName: I know time isn't exactly on our side, but it might be good to take a second to stock up.
engSearchText:
I know time isn't exactly on our side, but it might be
good to take a second to stock up.
jpnChrName: ここいらの守りは婦警たちに任せて 僕もできる事をしないとな……！
jpnSearchText:
ここいらの守りは婦警たちに任せて
僕もできる事をしないとな……！

engChrName: Yeah. Guess it can't hurt.
engSearchText: Yeah. Guess it can't hurt.
jpnChrName: きっとダスワニ警部も 動き始めているはず……
jpnSearchText:
きっとダスワニ警部も
動き始めているはず……

engChrName: To be honest, we don't really know what's going on...
engSearchText: To be honest, we don't really know what's going on...
jpnChrName: 警察の底力を見せる時だ！ できる事をしていかないとな！
jpnSearchText:
警察の底力を見せる時だ！
できる事をしていかないとな！

engChrName: ...but I can tell you're all fighting to get this city back to normal.
engSearchText:
...but I can tell you're all fighting to get this city back
to normal.
jpnChrName: ……と、当然、身に危険がせまったら 避難するけどなっ！！
jpnSearchText:
……と、当然、身に危険がせまったら
避難するけどなっ！！

engChrName: We'll be happy to help out. You've already done so much for us, so it's time we return the favor!
engSearchText:
We'll be happy to help out. You've already done so
much for us, so it's time we return the favor!
jpnChrName: まさか映画館デートを満喫してる最中に こんな“異変”が起きるなんて──
jpnSearchText:
まさか映画館デートを満喫してる最中に
こんな“異変”が起きるなんて──

engChrName: Thanks, guys. I'll let you know if we need anything.
engSearchText: Thanks, guys. I'll let you know if we need anything.
jpnChrName: と、ともかく僕は近くの住民を 守るので精一杯だ！
jpnSearchText:
と、ともかく僕は近くの住民を
守るので精一杯だ！

engChrName: You all again? I would not recommend loitering around in here.
engSearchText:
You all again? I would not recommend loitering
around in here.
jpnChrName: お前たちが何をするつもりかは知らないが ……その、気を付けろよ……！
jpnSearchText:
お前たちが何をするつもりかは知らないが
……その、気を付けろよ……！

engChrName: As far as I'm concerned, you're just as suspicious as the people running this joint.
engSearchText:
As far as I'm concerned, you're just as suspicious as
the people running this joint.
jpnChrName: お、お願いだよ……これからはちゃんと君の 事を見ててあげるからさ……
jpnSearchText:
お、お願いだよ……これからはちゃんと君の
事を見ててあげるからさ……

engChrName: Keep your sleuthing around to a minimum if you don't want to end up on the wrong side of the law again. Do I make myself clear?
engSearchText:
Keep your sleuthing around to a minimum if you
don't want to end up on the wrong side of the
law again. Do I make myself clear?
jpnChrName: 頼むから……頼むから、もう一度だけ チャンスをくれよ……
jpnSearchText:
頼むから……頼むから、もう一度だけ
チャンスをくれよ……

engChrName: Okay! With that out of the way, I can focus on helping the people who weren't able to get away in time.
engSearchText:
Okay! With that out of the way, I can focus on
helping the people who weren't able to get away
in time.
jpnChrName: く……またしても……またしても この店でフラれてしまうのか～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
く……またしても……またしても
この店でフラれてしまうのか～っ！？

engChrName: Wish I had more than my measly pistol with me, but you've got to make do with what you have.
engSearchText:
Wish I had more than my measly pistol with me, but
you've got to make do with what you have.
jpnChrName: にしても警部も大胆な事をするなぁ…… 上の人間にバレたら何て言われるか……
jpnSearchText:
にしても警部も大胆な事をするなぁ……
上の人間にバレたら何て言われるか……

engChrName: I can't have you guys making us cops look bad all the time—especially at a time like this!
engSearchText:
I can't have you guys making us cops look bad all the
time—especially at a time like this!
jpnChrName: とはいえ、署内で燻って 手をこまねいてるよりはずっと効率的か。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、署内で燻って
手をこまねいてるよりはずっと効率的か。

engChrName: I'm going to leave the security of this area to these two ladies here and figure out my next move.
engSearchText:
I'm going to leave the security of this area to these
two ladies here and figure out my next move.
jpnChrName: 僕だって、サルバッドでアルマータに 一杯食わされた借りを返したいし。
jpnSearchText:
僕だって、サルバッドでアルマータに
一杯食わされた借りを返したいし。

engChrName: I've gotta trust that Inspector Daswani is getting to work on his end.
engSearchText:
I've gotta trust that Inspector Daswani is
getting to work on his end.
jpnChrName: ええい、こうなったら僕も 全力で警部についていくしか！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、こうなったら僕も
全力で警部についていくしか！

engChrName: It's now or never! Time to show everyone what a real policeman is made of!
engSearchText:
It's now or never! Time to show everyone what a real
policeman is made of!
jpnChrName: いや～、前の彼女とも別れちゃったし 新しい出会いがあってもいいかなってさ！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、前の彼女とも別れちゃったし
新しい出会いがあってもいいかなってさ！

engChrName: W-Within reason, of course! If I sense any danger coming, I'll be sure to run to safety!
engSearchText:
W-Within reason, of course! If I sense any danger
coming, I'll be sure to run to safety!
jpnChrName: （……あれれ～、ますますドン引き   されてるような……気のせいかなぁ？）
jpnSearchText:
（……あれれ～、ますますドン引き
されてるような……気のせいかなぁ？）

engChrName: And here I was, thinking I could have a nice, normal movie date. Why couldn't the world choose a different day to go to shit?!
engSearchText:
And here I was, thinking I could have a nice, normal
movie date. Why couldn't the world choose a
different day to go to shit?!
jpnChrName: ……ネイト、さっきここに顔出して 『やらなきゃ』って言って去って行ったの。
jpnSearchText:
……ネイト、さっきここに顔出して
『やらなきゃ』って言って去って行ったの。

engChrName: Oh, well. Never mind that! Right now, I just need to focus on keeping the people here safe!
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Never mind that! Right now, I just need to
focus on keeping the people here safe!
jpnChrName: 警察署に行ったんだろうけど……私を置いて 行く姿なのに、あんなに格好よく見えるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
警察署に行ったんだろうけど……私を置いて
行く姿なのに、あんなに格好よく見えるなんて……

engChrName: I don't know what you guys are planning, but be careful out there, all right? Don't do anything stupid!
engSearchText:
I don't know what you guys are planning, but be
careful out there, all right? Don't do anything stupid!
jpnChrName: ……私も、彼に色々文句言ってきた以上、 いつまでも怖気づいてるだけじゃダメよね。
jpnSearchText:
……私も、彼に色々文句言ってきた以上、
いつまでも怖気づいてるだけじゃダメよね。

engChrName: Baby, please! I promise to have eyes only for you from now on!
engSearchText:
Baby, please! I promise to have eyes only for you from
now on!
jpnChrName: 物資の配給とか怪我人の応急手当とか…… とにかく、出来る事は探してみるとするわ。
jpnSearchText:
物資の配給とか怪我人の応急手当とか……
とにかく、出来る事は探してみるとするわ。

engChrName: I'm begging you! Just give me another chance! I'll do anything! Anything!
engSearchText:
I'm begging you! Just give me another chance! I'll
do anything! Anything!
jpnChrName: ネイト、外で警備しているようだけど 流石に大丈夫かしら……
jpnSearchText:
ネイト、外で警備しているようだけど
流石に大丈夫かしら……

engChrName: Gah! ANOTHER breakup at this place?! I've got the worst luck of any man in Edith...
engSearchText:
Gah! ANOTHER breakup at this place?! I've got the
worst luck of any man in Edith...
jpnChrName: さっきは私や他の人を逃がしてくれて…… あんな頼もしいの初めて見たかも……
jpnSearchText:
さっきは私や他の人を逃がしてくれて……
あんな頼もしいの初めて見たかも……

engChrName: The inspector sure is pushing his luck. I'm sure the higher ups will have a few choice words for him if they hear about this.
engSearchText:
The inspector sure is pushing his luck. I'm sure
the higher ups will have a few choice words for him
if they hear about this.
jpnChrName: いつもは情けなくて自分勝手な彼だけど、 いざこうしてみると……
jpnSearchText:
いつもは情けなくて自分勝手な彼だけど、
いざこうしてみると……

engChrName: But at least it's more productive than lazing around at the station.
engSearchText:
But at least it's more productive than lazing around at
the station.
jpnChrName: 何だか、このままバイバイっていうのも 虚し過ぎる気がしてきたわ……
jpnSearchText:
何だか、このままバイバイっていうのも
虚し過ぎる気がしてきたわ……

engChrName: Plus I've got a score to settle with Almata for what they pulled on us back in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Plus I've got a score to settle with Almata for what
they pulled on us back in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ……そもそもネイトは、私のためを 思ってる感じがあんまりしないもん。
jpnSearchText:
……そもそもネイトは、私のためを
思ってる感じがあんまりしないもん。

engChrName: Hell, the more I think about it, the more I feel like I HAVE to go along with the inspector! Count me in!
engSearchText:
Hell, the more I think about it, the more I feel like I
HAVE to go along with the inspector! Count me in!
jpnChrName: 大体今日だって正直、今の今まで ほったらかしにしてたんだしさ……
jpnSearchText:
大体今日だって正直、今の今まで
ほったらかしにしてたんだしさ……

engChrName: Okay! I may be single again, but that just means I'm a free man! Now, time to start meeting some new people!
engSearchText:
Okay! I may be single again, but that just means I'm a
free man! Now, time to start meeting some
new people!
jpnChrName: 能天気に遊ぼうとか言う前に、 一言くらい謝っても良いじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
能天気に遊ぼうとか言う前に、
一言くらい謝っても良いじゃない。

engChrName: (Huh? Did they just...frown at me? Nah, I must be imagining things.)
engSearchText:
(Huh? Did they just...frown at me? Nah, I must be
imagining things.)
jpnChrName: あ、ネイト捜査官。 お疲れ様で～す！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ネイト捜査官。
お疲れ様で～す！

engChrName: Nate popped in and told me he had something to do and then ran off. I'm guessing he went down to the police station.
engSearchText:
Nate popped in and told me he had something to do
and then ran off. I'm guessing he went down to the
police station.
jpnChrName: これから繁華街の巡回ですか～？ 捜査官さんも大変ですなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
これから繁華街の巡回ですか～？
捜査官さんも大変ですなぁ。

engChrName: It's strange. Even though he was leaving me behind, he looked really...striking, taking off like that.
engSearchText:
It's strange. Even though he was leaving me behind,
he looked really...striking, taking off like that.
jpnChrName: まあね～、こんな時間まで仕事なわけだし 公僕ってホント辛いっていうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあね～、こんな時間まで仕事なわけだし
公僕ってホント辛いっていうか。

engChrName: That settles it. If Nate is fighting his fears in order to help people, then I'll do the same.
engSearchText:
That settles it. If Nate is fighting his fears in order to
help people, then I'll do the same.
jpnChrName: でも繁華街の巡回は嫌いじゃないんだよね！ ホラ、色っぽいお姉さんも多いしさ～♪
jpnSearchText:
でも繁華街の巡回は嫌いじゃないんだよね！
ホラ、色っぽいお姉さんも多いしさ～♪

engChrName: There has to be something I can do. Maybe I could distribute supplies or administer first aid.
engSearchText:
There has to be something I can do. Maybe I could
distribute supplies or administer first aid.
jpnChrName: （うわっ……この人マジ……？）
jpnSearchText: （うわっ……この人マジ……？）

engChrName: Nate's keeping watch for us outside. I hope he's okay...
engSearchText:
Nate's keeping watch for us outside. I hope
he's okay...
jpnChrName: （あかんわ～……そのうちなんや   不祥事とか起こしそうなタイプやで……）
jpnSearchText:
（あかんわ～……そのうちなんや
不祥事とか起こしそうなタイプやで……）

engChrName: I've never seen him take charge like that before, and he even protected everyone here.
engSearchText:
I've never seen him take charge like that before, and
he even protected everyone here.
jpnChrName: あれ？　二人とも黙っちゃってどしたの？？
jpnSearchText: あれ？　二人とも黙っちゃってどしたの？？

engChrName: I thought he was just a pathetic guy who only thought of himself, but maybe I misjudged him...
engSearchText:
I thought he was just a pathetic guy who only thought
of himself, but maybe I misjudged him...
jpnChrName: ほほう、それでウチに “裏”の動きを聞き込みにねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ほほう、それでウチに
“裏”の動きを聞き込みにねぇ。

engChrName: I think I'll give him another chance.
engSearchText: I think I'll give him another chance.
jpnChrName: 生憎、彩雲閣は真っ当な 東方料亭なんだがねェ？
jpnSearchText:
生憎、彩雲閣は真っ当な
東方料亭なんだがねェ？

engChrName: Hmph. Nate is one of the most inconsiderate people I've ever met.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Nate is one of the most inconsiderate people
I've ever met.
jpnChrName: しらばっくれるな、ここが 黒月系列の店である事は分かっている。
jpnSearchText:
しらばっくれるな、ここが
黒月系列の店である事は分かっている。

engChrName: I mean, he totally stopped paying attention to me until literally today.
engSearchText:
I mean, he totally stopped paying attention to me
until literally today.
jpnChrName: 情報を吐かせる方法など いくらでもあるんだぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
情報を吐かせる方法など
いくらでもあるんだぞ！？

engChrName: And then he asks to hang out like nothing's wrong between us. The least he could've done was apologize, but he missed his chance.
engSearchText:
And then he asks to hang out like nothing's wrong
between us. The least he could've done was apologize,
but he missed his chance.
jpnChrName: クックック！　この店を吊るし上げても 何も出ないと思うがねェ！
jpnSearchText:
クックック！　この店を吊るし上げても
何も出ないと思うがねェ！

engChrName: Hey, Detective. Good to see you!
engSearchText: Hey, Detective. Good to see you!
jpnChrName: 成程、流石は上層部にも煙たがられる 特捜課の警部殿だ。
jpnSearchText:
成程、流石は上層部にも煙たがられる
特捜課の警部殿だ。

engChrName: Off to patrol the shoppin' district? You never catch a break, do you?
engSearchText:
Off to patrol the shoppin' district? You never catch a
break, do you?
jpnChrName: 中東出身ってのもあるし 苦労してそうだねェ、アンタも。
jpnSearchText:
中東出身ってのもあるし
苦労してそうだねェ、アンタも。

engChrName: Yeah, I feel like I'm always swamped with work. Being a detective isn't as easy as it sounds.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I feel like I'm always swamped with work.
Being a detective isn't as easy as it sounds.
jpnChrName: くっ……余計なお世話だ！！ マフィア如きが警部を分かったように──
jpnSearchText:
くっ……余計なお世話だ！！
マフィア如きが警部を分かったように──

engChrName: But at least these patrols give me chances to run into hot babes like you, so it's not all bad!
engSearchText:
But at least these patrols give me chances to run into
hot babes like you, so it's not all bad!
jpnChrName: ……というかこの店が黒月系だったなんて！ さっき初めて知ったぞ！
jpnSearchText:
……というかこの店が黒月系だったなんて！
さっき初めて知ったぞ！

engChrName: (Is he...hitting on us? Eww.)
engSearchText: (Is he...hitting on us? Eww.)
jpnChrName: でもって無性に哀しくなってきたじゃないか！ 前の彼女と別れ際にデートした思い出の店がぁ！！
jpnSearchText:
でもって無性に哀しくなってきたじゃないか！
前の彼女と別れ際にデートした思い出の店がぁ！！

engChrName: (Ugh. This guy's a walkin', talkin' department scandal in the makin'.)
engSearchText:
(Ugh. This guy's a walkin', talkin' department
scandal in the makin'.)
jpnChrName: ……お前は少し黙っていろ。
jpnSearchText: ……お前は少し黙っていろ。

engChrName: Huh? What's wrong? Why'd you two get all quiet?
engSearchText: Huh? What's wrong? Why'd you two get all quiet?
jpnChrName: ともかく捜査に協力するのか否か。 我々の出方はそれ次第だという事だ！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく捜査に協力するのか否か。
我々の出方はそれ次第だという事だ！

engChrName: You want information on Edith's criminal underbelly?
engSearchText:
You want information on Edith's
criminal underbelly?
jpnChrName: クク……イイ啖呵だねェ、ダスワニの旦那。 気に入ったよ、噂話くらい聞かせようじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
クク……イイ啖呵だねェ、ダスワニの旦那。
気に入ったよ、噂話くらい聞かせようじゃないか。

engChrName: I think you may have walked into the wrong place, Inspector. We're just a humble Eastern restaurant.
engSearchText:
I think you may have walked into the wrong
place, Inspector. We're just a humble
Eastern restaurant.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤは掴んでる程度の話だが── 現場には中々降りてこないようだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤは掴んでる程度の話だが──
現場には中々降りてこないようだしね。

engChrName: Don't give me that bull. I know for a fact that this place is a front for Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Don't give me that bull. I know for a fact that this
place is a front for Heiyue.
jpnChrName: くぅぅ～っ！ それはそれでムカつく言い草だな！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ～っ！
それはそれでムカつく言い草だな！！

engChrName: So start talking—or we'll have to make you talk.
engSearchText: So start talking—or we'll have to make you talk.
jpnChrName: フン、どうでもいい。 情報さえ掴めるのならな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、どうでもいい。
情報さえ掴めるのならな。

engChrName: Hoho. Is that a threat? Well, you're free to come down on us all you like, but it won't get you anywhere.
engSearchText:
Hoho. Is that a threat? Well, you're free to come
down on us all you like, but it won't get
you anywhere.
jpnChrName: 大陸全土の“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”か…… ったく、どこまで最悪なんだよアルマータってのはよ。
jpnSearchText:
大陸全土の“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”か……
ったく、どこまで最悪なんだよアルマータってのはよ。

engChrName: I'll say this, though. I respect your determination. I think I'm starting to understand why your superiors aren't so fond of you.
engSearchText:
I'll say this, though. I respect your determination.
I think I'm starting to understand why your superiors
aren't so fond of you.
jpnChrName: とはいえ焦っても仕方ねえ。 互いにやれる事から始めねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ焦っても仕方ねえ。
互いにやれる事から始めねえとな。

engChrName: You hail from the Central East, correct? Every day must be a battle at your workplace.
engSearchText:
You hail from the Central East, correct? Every day
must be a battle at your workplace.
jpnChrName: だからヴァン、お前も気負い過ぎるんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText: だからヴァン、お前も気負い過ぎるんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: Can it, lady! He doesn't need pity from some mafioso scum—
engSearchText:
Can it, lady! He doesn't need pity from some mafioso
scum—
jpnChrName: ああ……ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……ありがとよ。

engChrName: Wait, this place is a front for Heiyue?! Why am I only NOW learning this?!
engSearchText:
Wait, this place is a front for Heiyue?! Why am I only
NOW learning this?!
jpnChrName: さっきは悪かったな…… 俺も気が動転しちまってるんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
さっきは悪かったな……
俺も気が動転しちまってるんだろう。

engChrName: Man, now I'm bummed out. This is where my last girlfriend broke up with me...
engSearchText:
Man, now I'm bummed out. This is where my last
girlfriend broke up with me...
jpnChrName: あの球について詳しいなら 遠慮なく頼りにさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あの球について詳しいなら
遠慮なく頼りにさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Detective. Please shut up.
engSearchText: Detective. Please shut up.
jpnChrName: 気を付けて行って来いよ！
jpnSearchText: 気を付けて行って来いよ！

engChrName: I'll give you two options: cooperate or don't. I'd pick the former if you care at all about your future!
engSearchText:
I'll give you two options: cooperate or don't. I'd pick
the former if you care at all about your future!
jpnChrName: いや、そもそもハルがこうも 気前がいいって所からして怪しいな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そもそもハルがこうも
気前がいいって所からして怪しいな。

engChrName: Hahaha. I like a man who can get fired up.
engSearchText: Hahaha. I like a man who can get fired up.
jpnChrName: もしかしてトランプのデッキ自体が仕込みか……！？
jpnSearchText: もしかしてトランプのデッキ自体が仕込みか……！？

engChrName: Very well. I'll throw you a bone. It's information that's already known to the CID, but they seem to be too cowardly to act on it.
engSearchText:
Very well. I'll throw you a bone. It's information
that's already known to the CID, but they seem to be
too cowardly to act on it.
jpnChrName: あたしが勝ったら今日はジャック持ち、 加えて帰るまで禁酒ね♪
jpnSearchText:
あたしが勝ったら今日はジャック持ち、
加えて帰るまで禁酒ね♪

engChrName: Gah! I REALLY don't like your tone!
engSearchText: Gah! I REALLY don't like your tone!
jpnChrName: っておおい！？　割に合ってねーっての！！
jpnSearchText: っておおい！？　割に合ってねーっての！！

engChrName: Fine. We'll take what we can get. Any information is better than none.
engSearchText:
Fine. We'll take what we can get. Any information is
better than none.
jpnChrName: まさかヴァンが“あの事件”の 関係者だったなんて、驚いたけど……
jpnSearchText:
まさかヴァンが“あの事件”の
関係者だったなんて、驚いたけど……

engChrName: So they're trying to spread Pandemonium across the entire continent, huh? Just how low can those Almata thugs get?
engSearchText:
So they're trying to spread Pandemonium across the
entire continent, huh? Just how low can those Almata
thugs get?
jpnChrName: 誰にでも知られたくない過去はあるものよね。 今はこれ以上は聞かないでおくわ。
jpnSearchText:
誰にでも知られたくない過去はあるものよね。
今はこれ以上は聞かないでおくわ。

engChrName: Freaking out and cryin' about it won't do any good, though. We've just gotta buckle up and do what we can to get through this.
engSearchText:
Freaking out and cryin' about it won't do any
good, though. We've just gotta buckle up and do
what we can to get through this.
jpnChrName: まずはこの状況の打開よ── 裏解決屋にかかってるんだから頑張って来てよね！
jpnSearchText:
まずはこの状況の打開よ──
裏解決屋にかかってるんだから頑張って来てよね！

engChrName: But remember, don't be afraid to fold if you're in danger. Gamblin' with your lives ain't worth it.
engSearchText:
But remember, don't be afraid to fold if you're
in danger. Gamblin' with your lives ain't worth it.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、あの連中が店の中に 入って来ないって所だけが救いね。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、あの連中が店の中に
入って来ないって所だけが救いね。

engChrName: Right. I'll keep that in mind.
engSearchText: Right. I'll keep that in mind.
jpnChrName: 学生の子たちの事は任せておいて。 あの球の方は頼んだわよ！
jpnSearchText:
学生の子たちの事は任せておいて。
あの球の方は頼んだわよ！

engChrName: Sorry 'bout before. I'm just a little bit rattled about everything that's going down.
engSearchText:
Sorry 'bout before. I'm just a little bit rattled about
everything that's going down.
jpnChrName: ジャックの相棒として たまには気前良くいかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックの相棒として
たまには気前良くいかないとね。

engChrName: You guys seem to know what's goin' on with those weird spheres, so I'll leave them to you.
engSearchText:
You guys seem to know what's goin' on with those
weird spheres, so I'll leave them to you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、だからと言って 負けてあげるつもりはないけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、だからと言って
負けてあげるつもりはないけど。

engChrName: Just don't get yourselves killed out there. Got it?
engSearchText: Just don't get yourselves killed out there. Got it?
jpnChrName: 仕事も入ってるけど、折角のお祭りだし 私たちも楽しまないとね！
jpnSearchText:
仕事も入ってるけど、折角のお祭りだし
私たちも楽しまないとね！

engChrName: You're bein' real aggressive with your bets.
engSearchText: You're bein' real aggressive with your bets.
jpnChrName: 本屋にあるっつう端末は使えそうだったか？
jpnSearchText: 本屋にあるっつう端末は使えそうだったか？

engChrName: Fess up. Did you rig the deck?
engSearchText: Fess up. Did you rig the deck?
jpnChrName: ええ、一般向けの導力端末だけど 多少の負荷にも耐えられそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、一般向けの導力端末だけど
多少の負荷にも耐えられそうだわ。

engChrName: Who can say? Just remember that if I win, you have to pay for everything today. And no drinking until we get home!
engSearchText:
Who can say? Just remember that if I win, you have
to pay for everything today. And no drinking until we
get home!
jpnChrName: 私の端末やザイファと並列処理させれば あの“裏技”が使えるはず……
jpnSearchText:
私の端末やザイファと並列処理させれば
あの“裏技”が使えるはず……

engChrName: Hey! That's not fair! You're killin' me here, Halle!
engSearchText: Hey! That's not fair! You're killin' me here, Halle!
jpnChrName: 上手く行けば首都限定で 導力ネットが再起動できるかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
上手く行けば首都限定で
導力ネットが再起動できるかもしれないわ。

engChrName: I was really surprised to hear you were involved in that whole mess. I never would've guessed.
engSearchText:
I was really surprised to hear you were involved in
that whole mess. I never would've guessed.
jpnChrName: ハッ、流石じゃねえか。 期待させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、流石じゃねえか。
期待させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: But I get that everyone has things in their past they'd rather keep to themselves. You won't hear anything else about it from me.
engSearchText:
But I get that everyone has things in their past they'd
rather keep to themselves. You won't hear anything
else about it from me.
jpnChrName: さっきの話だとこの嬢ちゃんが 噂の“元仔猫”な訳だよな。
jpnSearchText:
さっきの話だとこの嬢ちゃんが
噂の“元仔猫”な訳だよな。

engChrName: For now, we've got to work on getting this situation under control. Good luck, guys! Everything's riding on you!
engSearchText:
For now, we've got to work on getting this situation
under control. Good luck, guys! Everything's riding
on you!
jpnChrName: 名乗り出てみたはいいものの、 手伝える事はあんのかね。
jpnSearchText:
名乗り出てみたはいいものの、
手伝える事はあんのかね。

engChrName: At least those things aren't coming inside. We'd be in a real pickle if they did.
engSearchText:
At least those things aren't coming inside. We'd be in
a real pickle if they did.
jpnChrName: 本当に微力ながらって感じになりそうだけど 盗める技術は盗ませてもらいましょ。
jpnSearchText:
本当に微力ながらって感じになりそうだけど
盗める技術は盗ませてもらいましょ。

engChrName: Don't worry about the students. I'll look after them. Just take care of that sphere, and we'll call it even!
engSearchText:
Don't worry about the students. I'll look after them.
Just take care of that sphere, and we'll call it even!
jpnChrName: こういう土壇場で情報屋として 格好がつかないままってのもなんだしね。
jpnSearchText:
こういう土壇場で情報屋として
格好がつかないままってのもなんだしね。

engChrName: When you're Jack's partner in crime, sometimes you've gotta be a little indulgent to keep things fresh.
engSearchText:
When you're Jack's partner in crime, sometimes
you've gotta be a little indulgent to keep things fresh.
jpnChrName: うーん、相変わらずあたし達だけ 置いてけぼりって感じね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、相変わらずあたし達だけ
置いてけぼりって感じね……

engChrName: But that doesn't mean I plan on losing. Not by a long shot!
engSearchText:
But that doesn't mean I plan on losing. Not by a
long shot!
jpnChrName: ああ、レン先輩に至っては どこか慣れている感じすらするしな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、レン先輩に至っては
どこか慣れている感じすらするしな……

engChrName: We've got some work to do later, but first, we're gonna kick back and enjoy the festivities!
engSearchText:
We've got some work to do later, but first, we're
gonna kick back and enjoy the festivities!
jpnChrName: とにかく、ネットが復旧するなら 他のアラミス生の安否も分かるかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、ネットが復旧するなら
他のアラミス生の安否も分かるかもしれない。

engChrName: Hey. How's that terminal lookin'? Think it's usable?
engSearchText: Hey. How's that terminal lookin'? Think it's usable?
jpnChrName: 訳が分からない事ばかりだが……その時は 生徒会の一員として出来る事はやっていこう。
jpnSearchText:
訳が分からない事ばかりだが……その時は
生徒会の一員として出来る事はやっていこう。

engChrName: Yes. For a consumer-grade computer, it can actually take a fairly heavy load. It'll do in a pinch.
engSearchText:
Yes. For a consumer-grade computer, it can actually
take a fairly heavy load. It'll do in a pinch.
jpnChrName: そうね、アニエスとレン先輩ばっかり 働かせてられないもの！
jpnSearchText:
そうね、アニエスとレン先輩ばっかり
働かせてられないもの！

engChrName: Once I synchronize it with my own computer and the Xiphas, I should be able to work my magic.
engSearchText:
Once I synchronize it with my own computer and the
Xiphas, I should be able to work my magic.
jpnChrName: 我々黒月も可能な限り力になろう。
jpnSearchText: 我々黒月も可能な限り力になろう。

engChrName: With any luck, I'll be able to get the network back up and running in the city.
engSearchText:
With any luck, I'll be able to get the network back up
and running in the city.
jpnChrName: 市民の避難誘導から、君たちのサポートまで 責任を持って当たらせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
市民の避難誘導から、君たちのサポートまで
責任を持って当たらせてもらうよ。

engChrName: Nice. That's one problem we can check off our list.
engSearchText: Nice. That's one problem we can check off our list.
jpnChrName: 異変への根本的な対処は君たちに任せよう。 どうか宜しく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText:
異変への根本的な対処は君たちに任せよう。
どうか宜しく頼んだよ。

engChrName: Based on what we just heard, I'm guessin' this girl's the famous Kitty.
engSearchText:
Based on what we just heard, I'm guessin' this girl's
the famous Kitty.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達がいるから大丈夫だろうけど、 アンタも無茶するんじゃないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん達がいるから大丈夫だろうけど、
アンタも無茶するんじゃないわよ？

engChrName: I...uhh...kinda doubt there's much we can do to help her out.
engSearchText:
I...uhh...kinda doubt there's much we can do to help
her out.
jpnChrName: 焦るのは分かるし、確かに不利な状況だけど…… 力を合わせれば打開できない訳じゃないはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
焦るのは分かるし、確かに不利な状況だけど……
力を合わせれば打開できない訳じゃないはずよ。

engChrName: Maybe, but I'm sure we can make ourselves useful somehow.
engSearchText:
Maybe, but I'm sure we can make ourselves
useful somehow.
jpnChrName: ああ……分かってるっつの。
jpnSearchText: ああ……分かってるっつの。

engChrName: I think I'll keep an eye on her and see if I can pick up her techniques.
engSearchText:
I think I'll keep an eye on her and see if I can pick up
her techniques.
jpnChrName: お前の方こそ、こんな時まで ツァオに浮かれた事考えたりすんなよな？
jpnSearchText:
お前の方こそ、こんな時まで
ツァオに浮かれた事考えたりすんなよな？

engChrName: *sigh* It feels like we've been completely forgotten about.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It feels like we've been completely
forgotten about.
jpnChrName: えっ！？　わ、分かってるわよ！
jpnSearchText: えっ！？　わ、分かってるわよ！

engChrName: I know what you mean. Renne seems like she's in her element for some reason.
engSearchText:
I know what you mean. Renne seems like she's in her
element for some reason.
jpnChrName: （こんな時でも全くブレない所が   カッコイイって思ってた所だけど……！）
jpnSearchText:
（こんな時でも全くブレない所が
カッコイイって思ってた所だけど……！）

engChrName: Hopefully we can use the orbal net to check on the other students once it's back up.
engSearchText:
Hopefully we can use the orbal net to check on the
other students once it's back up.
jpnChrName: この状況で、中々の肝っ玉つーか…… こっちのことは心配なさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
この状況で、中々の肝っ玉つーか……
こっちのことは心配なさそうだな。

engChrName: It might be chaos incarnate out there, but we still have to support our fellow students.
engSearchText:
It might be chaos incarnate out there, but we still
have to support our fellow students.
jpnChrName: フフ、貴方の事ですから 純粋な善意と言っても信用されないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、貴方の事ですから
純粋な善意と言っても信用されないでしょう。

engChrName: Agreed. We can't sit back and take it easy while Agnès and Renne do all the hard work! No way!
engSearchText:
Agreed. We can't sit back and take it easy while
Agnès and Renne do all the hard work! No way!
jpnChrName: 我々もこの状況は望む所ではありません。 必要ならば遠慮なくお申し付け下さいね？
jpnSearchText:
我々もこの状況は望む所ではありません。
必要ならば遠慮なくお申し付け下さいね？

engChrName: Heiyue will lend as much aid as it can.
engSearchText: Heiyue will lend as much aid as it can.

engChrName: We'll take charge of evacuating the citizens while you address the root cause of the crisis.
engSearchText:
We'll take charge of evacuating the citizens while you
address the root cause of the crisis.
jpnChrName: ゼムリア大陸中西部 カルバード共和国
jpnSearchText:
ゼムリア大陸中西部
カルバード共和国

engChrName: Best of luck out there. I wish you well in what's to come.
engSearchText:
Best of luck out there. I wish you well in what's
to come.
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス、某所
jpnSearchText: 首都イーディス、某所

engChrName: I'm sure you'll be fine if you're with them, but please try not to be too reckless, okay?
engSearchText:
I'm sure you'll be fine if you're with them, but please
try not to be too reckless, okay?
jpnChrName: えと、ここは何の施設ですか？
jpnSearchText: えと、ここは何の施設ですか？

engChrName: I know things aren't looking good out there, but we all have to stay calm and work together if we're going to get through this.
engSearchText:
I know things aren't looking good out there, but we
all have to stay calm and work together if we're going
to get through this.
jpnChrName: ああ……《シネマ＝エスプリ》。 結構昔からある“映画館”だな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……《シネマ＝エスプリ》。
結構昔からある“映画館”だな。

engChrName: Yeah, I know. I hear you loud and clear.
engSearchText: Yeah, I know. I hear you loud and clear.

engChrName: But that goes for you, too, you know. You better not be fantasizing about Cao while you've got important shit to be doing.
engSearchText:
But that goes for you, too, you know. You better not
be fantasizing about Cao while you've got important
shit to be doing.
jpnChrName: そういや他国じゃ 珍しいって話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
そういや他国じゃ
珍しいって話だったか。

engChrName: I-I wasn't... Wh-Why would you even think that?!
engSearchText: I-I wasn't... Wh-Why would you even think that?!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、導力映画を 見たことがないんですね？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん、導力映画を
見たことがないんですね？

engChrName: (Don't get me wrong, though. I find it incredibly hot that he's so calm under all this pressure...but still! I'm focused!)
engSearchText:
(Don't get me wrong, though. I find it incredibly hot
that he's so calm under all this pressure...but still!
I'm focused!)
jpnChrName: あ……言葉自体は 聞いたことがあったような。
jpnSearchText:
あ……言葉自体は
聞いたことがあったような。

engChrName: I don't think you've got anything to worry about. She's got a good head on her shoulders—even if she does use it for daydreaming half the time.
engSearchText:
I don't think you've got anything to worry about.
She's got a good head on her shoulders—even if she
does use it for daydreaming half the time.
jpnChrName: でも、どういうものかは……
jpnSearchText: でも、どういうものかは……

engChrName: I know you're thinking we must have an ulterior motive in all of this.
engSearchText:
I know you're thinking we must have an ulterior
motive in all of this.
jpnChrName: う～ん…… どう説明すればいいんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん……
どう説明すればいいんでしょうか。

engChrName: But I assure you, this situation isn't what our organization wants, either. If you'd like our assistance, you need only ask for it.
engSearchText:
But I assure you, this situation isn't what our
organization wants, either. If you'd like our assistance,
you need only ask for it.
jpnChrName: フェリ、作戦なんかの 記録映像を見たことがあるか？
jpnSearchText:
フェリ、作戦なんかの
記録映像を見たことがあるか？

engChrName: August 26th, 1208, 8:50PM
engSearchText: August 26th, 1208, 8:50PM
jpnChrName: ？　はい、連携の確認や戦術の研究など、 色々と役に立ちますから。
jpnSearchText:
？　はい、連携の確認や戦術の研究など、
色々と役に立ちますから。

engChrName: Mid-West Zemuria, the Calvard Republic
engSearchText: Mid-West Zemuria, the Calvard Republic
jpnChrName: そういう映像の形で、役者たちが演じる 物語のシーンを繋ぎ合わせたのが映画だ。
jpnSearchText:
そういう映像の形で、役者たちが演じる
物語のシーンを繋ぎ合わせたのが映画だ。

engChrName: Somewhere in the Capital City of Edith
engSearchText: Somewhere in the Capital City of Edith
jpnChrName: んで、その映画を大きなスクリーンで 鑑賞できる所が映画館だな。
jpnSearchText:
んで、その映画を大きなスクリーンで
鑑賞できる所が映画館だな。

engChrName: Say, what is this big building for?
engSearchText: Say, what is this big building for?
jpnChrName: なるほど……都会って凄いです！
jpnSearchText: なるほど……都会って凄いです！

engChrName: Oh, this is a movie theater. It's where you go to watch movies. It's been a major attraction in this area for a while.
engSearchText:
Oh, this is a movie theater. It's where you go to
watch movies. It's been a major attraction in this area
for a while.
jpnChrName: つまり戦場での激闘や名勝負なんかを いっぱい見られるんですね！？
jpnSearchText:
つまり戦場での激闘や名勝負なんかを
いっぱい見られるんですね！？

engChrName: ...Uhh?
engSearchText: ...Uhh?
jpnChrName: ……まあ、そういうのもある。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、そういうのもある。

engChrName: Sorry, guess this stuff ain't real common outside Calvard, huh.
engSearchText:
Sorry, guess this stuff ain't real common outside
Calvard, huh.
jpnChrName: えっと、微妙に 食い違っているような……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、微妙に
食い違っているような……

engChrName: Have you ever seen an orbal film, Feri?
engSearchText: Have you ever seen an orbal film, Feri?
jpnChrName: うわぁ～～。
jpnSearchText: うわぁ～～。

engChrName: No, but I think I've heard the term once or twice.
engSearchText: No, but I think I've heard the term once or twice.
jpnChrName: お、面白そうですけど任務中ですし…… 巡回を続けましょう！
jpnSearchText:
お、面白そうですけど任務中ですし……
巡回を続けましょう！

engChrName: I don't really get the concept, though...
engSearchText: I don't really get the concept, though...
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん、一通り終わってからで   いいんですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさん、一通り終わってからで
いいんですけど……）

engChrName: Hmm... How should we explain it?
engSearchText: Hmm... How should we explain it?
jpnChrName: （？　ああ……   ってお前らが勝手に行きゃいいだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（？　ああ……
ってお前らが勝手に行きゃいいだろ。）

engChrName: Ever seen recorded combat footage before?
engSearchText: Ever seen recorded combat footage before?
jpnChrName: （もう、これも円滑な職場内   コミュニケーションですってば……！）
jpnSearchText:
（もう、これも円滑な職場内
コミュニケーションですってば……！）

engChrName: Of course! It's really useful for learning new tactics and reviewing squad movements.
engSearchText:
Of course! It's really useful for learning new tactics
and reviewing squad movements.
jpnChrName: （あ、それに館内でのみ販売される   秋限定のチュロスもあるみたいですよ！）
jpnSearchText:
（あ、それに館内でのみ販売される
秋限定のチュロスもあるみたいですよ！）

engChrName: Well, imagine a bunch of pieces of footage put together that's all performed by actors. That's a movie.
engSearchText:
Well, imagine a bunch of pieces of footage put
together that's all performed by actors. That's
a movie.

engChrName: Then a movie theater's where you go to watch movies on really big screens.
engSearchText:
Then a movie theater's where you go to watch movies
on really big screens.
jpnChrName: なんの用だよ、ルネ。
jpnSearchText: なんの用だよ、ルネ。

engChrName: Oh! The city is amazing!
engSearchText: Oh! The city is amazing!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0052}だから名前で呼ぶなと── ああ、新人２号もいるのか。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0052}だから名前で呼ぶなと──
ああ、新人２号もいるのか。

engChrName: I didn't realize there was a place here to see tests of strength and duels to the death!
engSearchText:
I didn't realize there was a place here to see tests of
strength and duels to the death!
jpnChrName: 改めて── ＣＩＤのキンケイド分析官だ。
jpnSearchText:
改めて──
ＣＩＤのキンケイド分析官だ。

engChrName: ...I mean, there are movies like that, yeah.
engSearchText: ...I mean, there are movies like that, yeah.
jpnChrName: ヴァンの下で働くつもりなら 今後も付き合いがあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンの下で働くつもりなら
今後も付き合いがあるだろう。

engChrName: We'll have to explain it more in depth later...
engSearchText: We'll have to explain it more in depth later...
jpnChrName: ………はい。 よろしくお願いしますっ。
jpnSearchText:
………はい。
よろしくお願いしますっ。

engChrName: I really want to see one now!
engSearchText: I really want to see one now!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……

engChrName: Too bad, though. We still have work to do.
engSearchText: Too bad, though. We still have work to do.
jpnChrName: ったく……誰のせいとか 本当なら言いたくはねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……誰のせいとか
本当なら言いたくはねえが。

engChrName: (Hey. When we finish up today...)
engSearchText: (Hey. When we finish up today...)
jpnChrName: ──アイゼンシルトがルートを変更したのは お前らＣＩＤの妨害オペレーションによってだ。
jpnSearchText:
──アイゼンシルトがルートを変更したのは
お前らＣＩＤの妨害オペレーションによってだ。

engChrName: (Yeah, yeah. I get you... Hang on, why do I have to come, too?)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, yeah. I get you... Hang on, why do I have to
come, too?)
jpnChrName: そのせいで結果として 全滅したことは分かってるんだよな？
jpnSearchText:
そのせいで結果として
全滅したことは分かってるんだよな？

engChrName: (If we're going to be a team, we've got to spend time together and get to know one another better!)
engSearchText:
(If we're going to be a team, we've got to spend time
together and get to know one another better!)
jpnChrName: 無論──だが言い訳はしない。 部隊の練度向上のためだったからな。
jpnSearchText:
無論──だが言い訳はしない。
部隊の練度向上のためだったからな。

engChrName: (Plus, they happen to be selling some seasonal churros at the concessions area in the theater!)
engSearchText:
(Plus, they happen to be selling some seasonal churros
at the concessions area in the theater!)
jpnChrName: とはいえアイゼンシルトとは 非正規作戦などでの付き合いもある。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえアイゼンシルトとは
非正規作戦などでの付き合いもある。

jpnChrName: 《火喰鳥》のことは個人的にも残念だ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>《火喰鳥》のことは個人的にも残念だ。

engChrName: What do you want, René?
engSearchText: What do you want, René?

engChrName: How many times must I—oh, I see your second part-timer has joined you.
engSearchText:
How many times must I—oh, I see your second
part-timer has joined you.
jpnChrName: 代わりと言ってはなんだが 一つ、判明したことを伝えておこう。
jpnSearchText:
代わりと言ってはなんだが
一つ、判明したことを伝えておこう。

engChrName: My name is Kincaid. I'm an analyst with the CID.
engSearchText: My name is Kincaid. I'm an analyst with the CID.
jpnChrName: アイーダ中隊を全滅させた相手── やはりマフィアでは無さそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダ中隊を全滅させた相手──
やはりマフィアでは無さそうだな。

engChrName: If you're working for Van, I expect this won't be our last meeting.
engSearchText:
If you're working for Van, I expect this won't be our
last meeting.

engChrName: ...Yes, I suppose so. It's nice to meet you.
engSearchText: ...Yes, I suppose so. It's nice to meet you.
jpnChrName: そういやあの野郎（メルキオル）が “古巣”とか抜かしてたな……
jpnSearchText:
そういやあの野郎（メルキオル）が
“古巣”とか抜かしてたな……

engChrName: Feri...
engSearchText: Feri...
jpnChrName: ああ、その幹部も含め何らかの形で 関わっていたのは間違いないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その幹部も含め何らかの形で
関わっていたのは間違いないだろう。

engChrName: Look, I don't really wanna play the blame game here...
engSearchText:
Look, I don't really wanna play the blame
game here...
jpnChrName: だが、アルマータの構成員の大多数は あくまで戦闘の“セミプロ”だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、アルマータの構成員の大多数は
あくまで戦闘の“セミプロ”だ。

engChrName: ...but there's no denyin' the Eisenschild changed course 'cause the CID got in their way.
engSearchText:
...but there's no denyin' the Eisenschild changed
course 'cause the CID got in their way.
jpnChrName: 高位猟兵団の中隊クラスを 一方的に殲滅するのは困難だろう。
jpnSearchText:
高位猟兵団の中隊クラスを
一方的に殲滅するのは困難だろう。

engChrName: You know that decision ended up costing them their lives, don't you?
engSearchText:
You know that decision ended up costing them their
lives, don't you?
jpnChrName: どのような戦術分析に照らしてもな。
jpnSearchText: <C1>どのような戦術分析に照らしてもな。

engChrName: I do—and in the moment, it was the correct decision to train our personnel, so I won't make any excuses.
engSearchText:
I do—and in the moment, it was the correct decision
to train our personnel, so I won't make any excuses.

engChrName: Still, the Eisenschild weren't strangers. I had unofficial connections with them as well.
engSearchText:
Still, the Eisenschild weren't strangers. I had
unofficial connections with them as well.
jpnChrName: ……そいつは 俺も引っ掛かってた所だな。
jpnSearchText:
……そいつは
俺も引っ掛かってた所だな。

engChrName: On a personal level, I deeply lament what happened to the Flameeater.
engSearchText:
On a personal level, I deeply lament what happened
to the Flameeater.
jpnChrName: すると、アイーダさんの部隊を 襲撃した集団というのは……？
jpnSearchText:
すると、アイーダさんの部隊を
襲撃した集団というのは……？

jpnChrName: 限定された条件では猟兵すら上回る “特殊な武装集団”と分析できる。
jpnSearchText:
限定された条件では猟兵すら上回る
“特殊な武装集団”と分析できる。

engChrName: While words alone cannot make amends for what happened, there is one thing I can disclose.
engSearchText:
While words alone cannot make amends for what
happened, there is one thing I can disclose.
jpnChrName: ──詫びにもならないだろうが 私から伝えられるのはその位だ。
jpnSearchText:
──詫びにもならないだろうが
私から伝えられるのはその位だ。

engChrName: It would seem the group that defeated the Eisenschild were not mafiosos after all.
engSearchText:
It would seem the group that defeated the Eisenschild
were not mafiosos after all.
jpnChrName: いえ……ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: いえ……ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Huh...?
engSearchText: Huh...?
jpnChrName: で、それを伝えるためだけに 連絡してきたわけじゃないんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
で、それを伝えるためだけに
連絡してきたわけじゃないんだろ？

engChrName: Now that you mention it, that sadistic bastard mentioned somethin' about an old haunt.
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, that sadistic bastard
mentioned somethin' about an old haunt.
jpnChrName: ああ──端的に言うとギルドから お前たちへの委託案件についてだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──端的に言うとギルドから
お前たちへの委託案件についてだ。

engChrName: Hmm... I think it is safe to say the group you are referring to and its executive members were involved.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I think it is safe to say the group you are
referring to and its executive members were involved.

engChrName: While Almata's members all know how to fight, few are combat specialists.
engSearchText:
While Almata's members all know how to fight, few
are combat specialists.
jpnChrName: ……ハン、そのうち 突っ込んでくるかとは思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
……ハン、そのうち
突っ込んでくるかとは思ったが。

engChrName: Ordinarily, they wouldn't have stood a chance against a capable company of jaegers like the Eisenschild.
engSearchText:
Ordinarily, they wouldn't have stood a chance against
a capable company of jaegers like the Eisenschild.
jpnChrName: 知っての通りＣＩＤは 遊撃士協会と対立は（・）していない。
jpnSearchText:
知っての通りＣＩＤは
遊撃士協会と対立は（・）していない。

engChrName: This is simply a matter of fact.
engSearchText: This is simply a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: だが、機密情報や安全保障案件を巡り、 立場の違いが明確になることが多い。
jpnSearchText:
だが、機密情報や安全保障案件を巡り、
立場の違いが明確になることが多い。

engChrName: ...You're right!
engSearchText: ...You're right!
jpnChrName: その状況で、《裏解決屋（お前たち）》との関係を ギルドへの攻撃材料とする意見があってな。
jpnSearchText:
その状況で、《裏解決屋（お前たち）》との関係を
ギルドへの攻撃材料とする意見があってな。

engChrName: Yeah, that's been bothering me, too.
engSearchText: Yeah, that's been bothering me, too.

engChrName: How did they do it, then?
engSearchText: How did they do it, then?
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: Whomever was deployed to fight the Eisenschild must have been exceptional fighters.
engSearchText:
Whomever was deployed to fight the Eisenschild
must have been exceptional fighters.
jpnChrName: ハッ、猟兵をたまに使ってる立場で よくヌケヌケと言えたもんだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、猟兵をたまに使ってる立場で
よくヌケヌケと言えたもんだな？

engChrName: And, again, I know this information hardly serves as recompense, but for now this is all I can share.
engSearchText:
And, again, I know this information hardly serves as
recompense, but for now this is all I can share.
jpnChrName: それが政治というものだ。 火遊びが好きな連中は何処にもいる。
jpnSearchText:
それが政治というものだ。
火遊びが好きな連中は何処にもいる。

engChrName: I appreciate you telling us.
engSearchText: I appreciate you telling us.
jpnChrName: だが、ＣＩＤ自（・）体（・）にはさして メリットはない──そこで提案だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、ＣＩＤ自（・）体（・）にはさして
メリットはない──そこで提案だ。

engChrName: Anyway, somethin' tells me you didn't just call to apologize.
engSearchText:
Anyway, somethin' tells me you didn't just call
to apologize.
jpnChrName: こ、これは……
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……

engChrName: Quite right. I'd like to discuss the work you have been doing for the guild.
engSearchText:
Quite right. I'd like to discuss the work you have been
doing for the guild.
jpnChrName: 魔獣討伐の依頼……！？
jpnSearchText: 魔獣討伐の依頼……！？

engChrName: Oh.
engSearchText: Oh.
jpnChrName: オイ……もしかして。
jpnSearchText: オイ……もしかして。

engChrName: Been keepin' your ear to the ground, eh? Why am I not surprised?
engSearchText:
Been keepin' your ear to the ground, eh? Why am I
not surprised?
jpnChrName: ああ、ギルドと同じく今（・）後（・）は ＣＩＤの案件も請けてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ギルドと同じく今（・）後（・）は
ＣＩＤの案件も請けてもらおう。

engChrName: As you know, we at CID do not see the guild as our enemy.
engSearchText:
As you know, we at CID do not see the guild as
our enemy.
jpnChrName: 無論、流儀に沿えばで構わん。 報酬レートもギルドに合わせる。
jpnSearchText:
無論、流儀に沿えばで構わん。
報酬レートもギルドに合わせる。

engChrName: Granted, our two organizations handle things differently—namely, national security and confidentiality.
engSearchText:
Granted, our two organizations handle things
differently—namely, national security
and confidentiality.
jpnChrName: クソったれ……！ せめて色を付けやがれよ！？
jpnSearchText:
クソったれ……！
せめて色を付けやがれよ！？

engChrName: Thus there are those within our ranks that wish to use your recent partnership as a means to besmirch the guild's reputation.
engSearchText:
Thus there are those within our ranks that wish to use
your recent partnership as a means to besmirch the
guild's reputation.
jpnChrName: フッ、あくまで省内での 無駄な意見を封じるためだからな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、あくまで省内での
無駄な意見を封じるためだからな。

jpnChrName: では宜しく頼むぞ── 《アークライド解決事務所》諸君。
jpnSearchText:
では宜しく頼むぞ──
《アークライド解決事務所》諸君。

engChrName: Uh-oh...
engSearchText: Uh-oh...
jpnChrName: あ、あんの鬼畜眼鏡があ～っ……！
jpnSearchText: あ、あんの鬼畜眼鏡があ～っ……！

engChrName: Heh. Real rich comin' from the department that hires jaegers for side gigs.
engSearchText:
Heh. Real rich comin' from the department that hires
jaegers for side gigs.
jpnChrName: あはは……でも何だか 私たちを庇ってくれたような？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でも何だか
私たちを庇ってくれたような？

engChrName: That's politics for you. No matter how many get burned, there will always be those who wish to play with fire.
engSearchText:
That's politics for you. No matter how many get
burned, there will always be those who wish to play
with fire.
jpnChrName: はい…… そんな感じもしました。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
そんな感じもしました。

engChrName: However, the CID as a whole would not stand to benefit with a plan like that. Therefore, I have a proposal.
engSearchText:
However, the CID as a whole would not stand to
benefit with a plan like that. Therefore, I have
a proposal.
jpnChrName: ハン、どうだかな。 まあいい──
jpnSearchText:
ハン、どうだかな。
まあいい──

engChrName: Isn't that...
engSearchText: Isn't that...
jpnChrName: 場所は二区の《サイデン地区》にある 地下の上水道エリア……成程な。
jpnSearchText:
場所は二区の《サイデン地区》にある
地下の上水道エリア……成程な。

engChrName: ...a monster extermination request?
engSearchText: ...a monster extermination request?
jpnChrName: あ、官公庁が多いので ギルドに任せたくないとか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、官公庁が多いので
ギルドに任せたくないとか？

engChrName: Aidios, take me now...
engSearchText: Aidios, take me now...
jpnChrName: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Haha. It's as you've surmised: we will be sending you tasks just as the guild does.
engSearchText:
Haha. It's as you've surmised: we will be sending you
tasks just as the guild does.
jpnChrName: すぐに行くのも業腹だし、 こいつは最後でいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
すぐに行くのも業腹だし、
こいつは最後でいいだろう。

engChrName: Feel free to handle them however you see fit, and we'll match the rate the guild is giving you.
engSearchText:
Feel free to handle them however you see fit, and
we'll match the rate the guild is giving you.
jpnChrName: やることを全部片付けた後で サイデン地区に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
やることを全部片付けた後で
サイデン地区に向かうぞ。

engChrName: At least sweeten the pot a little, you cheapskate.
engSearchText: At least sweeten the pot a little, you cheapskate.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……なんだか難しい話ですね。 都会って複雑です……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……なんだか難しい話ですね。
都会って複雑です……

engChrName: I'm paying just enough to keep certain voices in the department quiet.
engSearchText:
I'm paying just enough to keep certain voices in the
department quiet.
jpnChrName: ──ですが魔獣退治なら それなりの経験があります！
jpnSearchText:
──ですが魔獣退治なら
それなりの経験があります！

engChrName: And with that, I will bid you adieu. I'm looking forward to a fruitful business relationship with you all.
engSearchText:
And with that, I will bid you adieu. I'm looking
forward to a fruitful business relationship with you all.
jpnChrName: どんな相手でも突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）で粉砕するので 前衛は任せてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
どんな相手でも突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）で粉砕するので
前衛は任せてくださいっ！

engChrName: That four-eyed sadist...
engSearchText: That four-eyed sadist...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、張り切ってますね……
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん、張り切ってますね……

engChrName: It did sound like he's covering for us, at least.
engSearchText: It did sound like he's covering for us, at least.
jpnChrName: ま、ボチボチ頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、ボチボチ頼むぜ。

engChrName: I got that impression, too.
engSearchText: I got that impression, too.
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進める場合、 サイデン地区に向かってください。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進める場合、
サイデン地区に向かってください。

engChrName: *sigh* And that's how he gets ya...
engSearchText: *sigh* And that's how he gets ya...
jpnChrName: あれは……
jpnSearchText: あれは……

engChrName: Waterway under the Seiden District, huh? That's the 2nd District by the way, Feri.
engSearchText:
Waterway under the Seiden District, huh? That's the
2nd District by the way, Feri.
jpnChrName: アルベール、どしたの？
jpnSearchText: アルベール、どしたの？

engChrName: I'm guessing you don't go there often due to the higher than usual governmental presence?
engSearchText:
I'm guessing you don't go there often due to the
higher than usual governmental presence?
jpnChrName: あ、アニエスじゃん～。 確か今日は──
jpnSearchText:
あ、アニエスじゃん～。
確か今日は──

engChrName: Heh. You know me too well.
engSearchText: Heh. You know me too well.
jpnChrName: わわ、あれがバイト先のヒトかな？ 結構イケメンじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
わわ、あれがバイト先のヒトかな？
結構イケメンじゃない！

engChrName: I'm in no hurry to head over there. It ain't much, but we can stick it to that jerk for foistin' work onto us willy-nilly.
engSearchText:
I'm in no hurry to head over there. It ain't much, but
we can stick it to that jerk for foistin' work onto
us willy-nilly.
jpnChrName: 前に話してた女の子もいるし…… へ～、なんか楽しそうだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
前に話してた女の子もいるし……
へ～、なんか楽しそうだねぇ。

engChrName: Gotta go eventually, though, so we'll head over to the Seiden District once we finish everything else.
engSearchText:
Gotta go eventually, though, so we'll head over to the
Seiden District once we finish everything else.
jpnChrName: バイトって…… オデット、知っていたのか！？
jpnSearchText:
バイトって……
オデット、知っていたのか！？

engChrName: Gee, you city people have really complicated lives.
engSearchText: Gee, you city people have really complicated lives.
jpnChrName: そりゃまあ、親友だし。 なになに、気になるのかにゃ～？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃまあ、親友だし。
なになに、気になるのかにゃ～？

engChrName: At least it means I get to fight a bunch of strong monsters!
engSearchText:
At least it means I get to fight a bunch of
strong monsters!
jpnChrName: ゆ、友人として当然だっ。
jpnSearchText: ゆ、友人として当然だっ。

engChrName: Leave the front line to me! I can take on any foe, big or small!
engSearchText:
Leave the front line to me! I can take on any foe, big
or small!
jpnChrName: それより…… どういったバイトなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
それより……
どういったバイトなんだ？

engChrName: Someone's raring to go...
engSearchText: Someone's raring to go...
jpnChrName: うーん、調査系とか言ってたなぁ？
jpnSearchText: うーん、調査系とか言ってたなぁ？

engChrName: Save some of that fire for the monsters, kid.
engSearchText: Save some of that fire for the monsters, kid.
jpnChrName: アニエス自身も大切な品物の捜索を 頼んでるらしくて……それ以上は知らない。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス自身も大切な品物の捜索を
頼んでるらしくて……それ以上は知らない。

engChrName: The main story will advance upon entering the Seiden District.
engSearchText:
The main story will advance upon entering the
Seiden District.
jpnChrName: そ、それって大丈夫なのか？ 聞くからに胡散臭いんだが……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それって大丈夫なのか？
聞くからに胡散臭いんだが……

engChrName: Is that...?
engSearchText: Is that...?
jpnChrName: ま、あの子のことは そう心配しなくてもいいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あの子のことは
そう心配しなくてもいいわ。

engChrName: What's up?
engSearchText: What's up?
jpnChrName: あ、先輩～！
jpnSearchText: あ、先輩～！

engChrName: Oh, it's Agnès! She must be working today.
engSearchText: Oh, it's Agnès! She must be working today.
jpnChrName: な、何でそう言い切れるんですか？ バイト先の事を知っているとか……
jpnSearchText:
な、何でそう言い切れるんですか？
バイト先の事を知っているとか……

engChrName: Those two must be the ones she told me about. But she didn't mention that the guy's a total cutie!
engSearchText:
Those two must be the ones she told me about.
But she didn't mention that the guy's a total cutie!
jpnSearchText: ええ、一（・）応（・）ね。

engChrName: Aww. I wish I had a fun part-time job like her.
engSearchText: Aww. I wish I had a fun part-time job like her.
jpnChrName: 日頃率先して手伝ってもらっているから 休日くらいは好きになさいって言ったの。
jpnSearchText:
日頃率先して手伝ってもらっているから
休日くらいは好きになさいって言ったの。

engChrName: Agnès has a job?! Why's this the first time I'm hearing of it?
engSearchText:
Agnès has a job?! Why's this the first time I'm
hearing of it?
jpnChrName: ──さあ、時間もないことだし 残りの資料も揃えて学校に戻るわよ。
jpnSearchText:
──さあ、時間もないことだし
残りの資料も揃えて学校に戻るわよ。

engChrName: Besties tell each other everything, y'know. What, you jealous?
engSearchText:
Besties tell each other everything, y'know. What,
you jealous?
jpnChrName: 今日は良い茶葉が入ったし、 作業前にお茶会も開きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
今日は良い茶葉が入ったし、
作業前にお茶会も開きましょう。

engChrName: I'm just concerned about my friend, that's all.
engSearchText: I'm just concerned about my friend, that's all.
jpnChrName: は～い！ スコーンも買わなきゃですね！
jpnSearchText:
は～い！
スコーンも買わなきゃですね！

engChrName: So, what kind of job is it?
engSearchText: So, what kind of job is it?
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと！ バイトについてもう少し──
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと！
バイトについてもう少し──

engChrName: I think she said they investigate stuff for people.
engSearchText: I think she said they investigate stuff for people.
jpnChrName: 日が落ちましたね。
jpnSearchText: 日が落ちましたね。

engChrName: And apparently they're helping her look for something while they work. That's all I know, honest.
engSearchText:
And apparently they're helping her look for
something while they work. That's all I know, honest.
jpnChrName: いい時間だし、メシでも行くか。
jpnSearchText: いい時間だし、メシでも行くか。

engChrName: That's so vague... Are you sure it's not shady?
engSearchText: That's so vague... Are you sure it's not shady?
jpnChrName: はいっ、チュロスは美味しかったですけど またお腹が空いてきちゃいました……
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、チュロスは美味しかったですけど
またお腹が空いてきちゃいました……

engChrName: I assure you there's nothing to worry about.
engSearchText: I assure you there's nothing to worry about.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、成長期ですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、成長期ですね。

engChrName: There you are!
engSearchText: There you are!
jpnChrName: でも何処にしましょう？ このあたりはお店も多いですし──
jpnSearchText:
でも何処にしましょう？
このあたりはお店も多いですし──

engChrName: H-How can you be so certain? Do you know something we don't?
engSearchText:
H-How can you be so certain? Do you know
something we don't?
jpnChrName: ──宜しければ ご馳走いたしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
──宜しければ
ご馳走いたしましょうか？

engChrName: You could say that.
engSearchText: You could say that.
jpnChrName: ゲッ……
jpnSearchText: ゲッ……

engChrName: She came to me about working, and because she performs her duties so admirably, I told her she's free to do what she wants on her days off.
engSearchText:
She came to me about working, and because she
performs her duties so admirably, I told her she's free
to do what she wants on her days off.
jpnChrName: お久しぶりですね、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: お久しぶりですね、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: But enough about that. Let's finish our business and return to school.
engSearchText:
But enough about that. Let's finish our business and
return to school.
jpnChrName: おいおい、なんでアンタが……
jpnSearchText: おいおい、なんでアンタが……

engChrName: I bought some excellent tea for you both to try.
engSearchText: I bought some excellent tea for you both to try.
jpnChrName: 首都で少々、所用がありまして。 貴方にお目にかかるのも含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
首都で少々、所用がありまして。
貴方にお目にかかるのも含めてね。

engChrName: Nice! We've got to grab some scones to go with them.
engSearchText: Nice! We've got to grab some scones to go with them.
jpnChrName: 近くに私共が経営する酒家がありますので、 少々、話を聞いていただけませんか？
jpnSearchText:
近くに私共が経営する酒家がありますので、
少々、話を聞いていただけませんか？

engChrName: H-Hold on! You didn't explain anything!
engSearchText: H-Hold on! You didn't explain anything!
jpnChrName: （あれは確か《黒月（ヘイユエ）》の……）
jpnSearchText: （あれは確か《黒月（ヘイユエ）》の……）

engChrName: Oh, the sun's setting already.
engSearchText: Oh, the sun's setting already.
jpnChrName: （……やっぱりあの男、   只者じゃなさそうね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……やっぱりあの男、
只者じゃなさそうね。）

engChrName: Don't know about you guys, but I could go for some grub.
engSearchText:
Don't know about you guys, but I could go for
some grub.
jpnChrName: （あたしにも気付いてたみたいだし   ママたちにも相談しなきゃ……）
jpnSearchText:
（あたしにも気付いてたみたいだし
ママたちにも相談しなきゃ……）

engChrName: Me, too. Those churros were a good snack, but I'm hungry again.
engSearchText:
Me, too. Those churros were a good snack, but I'm
hungry again.
jpnChrName: 黒月貿易公司社長のツァオ・リーと申します。 ──お嬢さん方、今後もお見知り置きを。
jpnSearchText:
黒月貿易公司社長のツァオ・リーと申します。
──お嬢さん方、今後もお見知り置きを。

engChrName: You are a growing girl, after all.
engSearchText: You are a growing girl, after all.
jpnChrName: 《黒月（ヘイユエ）》って確か……
jpnSearchText: 《黒月（ヘイユエ）》って確か……

engChrName: Does anything sound good? There are plenty of options around—
engSearchText:
Does anything sound good? There are plenty of
options around—
jpnChrName: ああ、共和国の東方人社会のまとめ役、 と言やあ聞こえはいいが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、共和国の東方人社会のまとめ役、
と言やあ聞こえはいいが……

engChrName: If it's a meal you're after, I would be more than happy to provide.
engSearchText:
If it's a meal you're after, I would be more than happy
to provide.
jpnChrName: 共和国最大の巨大シンジケートの方が 正しいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国最大の巨大シンジケートの方が
正しいだろ。

engChrName: Shit.
engSearchText: Shit.
jpnChrName: フフ、まあそれも一面ですが。
jpnSearchText: フフ、まあそれも一面ですが。

engChrName: It's good to see you again, too, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: It's good to see you again, too, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: その《黒月》の方がどのようなご用件で？
jpnSearchText: その《黒月》の方がどのようなご用件で？

engChrName: Cut to the chase. What're you doin' here?
engSearchText: Cut to the chase. What're you doin' here?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのお知り合いのようですが……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんのお知り合いのようですが……

engChrName: I'm in Edith to tend to some business—namely, meeting with you.
engSearchText:
I'm in Edith to tend to some business—namely,
meeting with you.
jpnChrName: あんま知り合いたくなかった口だがな。
jpnSearchText: あんま知り合いたくなかった口だがな。

engChrName: My associates happen to run an excellent restaurant just down the way. Perhaps we can continue this conversation there?
engSearchText:
My associates happen to run an excellent restaurant
just down the way. Perhaps we can continue this
conversation there?
jpnChrName: 前に《黒月》から──つーかそいつから 二度ほど依頼を受けたことがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
前に《黒月》から──つーかそいつから
二度ほど依頼を受けたことがあってな。

engChrName: (I knew something was off about him...)
engSearchText: (I knew something was off about him...)
jpnChrName: ミラ払いは良かったんだが、 どちらも体よく利用されちまった。
jpnSearchText:
ミラ払いは良かったんだが、
どちらも体よく利用されちまった。

engChrName: (First the CID, and now Heiyue.)
engSearchText: (First the CID, and now Heiyue.)
jpnChrName: 歓迎できない類いの客ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText: 歓迎できない類いの客ってヤツだ。

engChrName: (It seems like he's figured out my true identity, too. I'll have to talk to Mom and Grammy about this.)
engSearchText:
(It seems like he's figured out my true identity, too.
I'll have to talk to Mom and Grammy about this.)
jpnChrName: それは残念、こちらとしては貴方とは 良好な関係を築きたいと思っているのですが。
jpnSearchText:
それは残念、こちらとしては貴方とは
良好な関係を築きたいと思っているのですが。

engChrName: My name is Cao Lee, president of Heiyue Trading Limited. It's a pleasure to meet you both.
engSearchText:
My name is Cao Lee, president of Heiyue Trading
Limited. It's a pleasure to meet you both.
jpnChrName: まあ、折角ですしお食事の前に 話だけでも聞いていただけませんか？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、折角ですしお食事の前に
話だけでも聞いていただけませんか？

engChrName: Heiyue? Isn't that...?
engSearchText: Heiyue? Isn't that...?
jpnChrName: ──実はヴァンさんには 煌都に“出張”して頂きたいのです。
jpnSearchText:
──実はヴァンさんには
煌都に“出張”して頂きたいのです。

engChrName: Whatever you're thinkin', you're probably right. Some see 'em as the protectors of Easterners everywhere...
engSearchText:
Whatever you're thinkin', you're probably right.
Some see 'em as the protectors of
Easterners everywhere...
jpnChrName: なに……？
jpnSearchText: なに……？

engChrName: ...but if you ask me, they're the biggest crime syndicate in the whole Republic.
engSearchText:
...but if you ask me, they're the biggest crime
syndicate in the whole Republic.
jpnChrName: 《煌都》って確か共和国の南の……
jpnSearchText: 《煌都》って確か共和国の南の……

engChrName: Ours is an organization of many faces.
engSearchText: Ours is an organization of many faces.
jpnChrName: ええ、共和国南部に位置する 巨大海港都市《煌都ラングポート》。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、共和国南部に位置する
巨大海港都市《煌都ラングポート》。

engChrName: If you don't mind me asking, what can we do for you, sir?
engSearchText:
If you don't mind me asking, what can we do for
you, sir?
jpnChrName: カルバード第二の人口を誇る街で、 大陸最大の東方人街もそこにあります。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード第二の人口を誇る街で、
大陸最大の東方人街もそこにあります。

engChrName: I've gathered that you and Van are acquainted, at least.
engSearchText:
I've gathered that you and Van are acquainted,
at least.
jpnChrName: ついでに《黒月（こいつら）》の本拠地もな。
jpnSearchText: ついでに《黒月（こいつら）》の本拠地もな。

engChrName: Awfully kind way of puttin' it.
engSearchText: Awfully kind way of puttin' it.
jpnChrName: その煌都で最近、厄介事が続いていましてね。
jpnSearchText: その煌都で最近、厄介事が続いていましてね。

engChrName: This guy's given me two jobs for Heiyue before.
engSearchText: This guy's given me two jobs for Heiyue before.
jpnChrName: 警察やギルドにも頼れないこともあって ほとほと困り果てているのです。
jpnSearchText:
警察やギルドにも頼れないこともあって
ほとほと困り果てているのです。

engChrName: The mira was good, but he was usin' me plain as day both times.
engSearchText:
The mira was good, but he was usin' me plain as day
both times.
jpnChrName: 無論、我々《黒月》も対処するつもりですが 我らが振るう力はあまりに大きすぎる──
jpnSearchText:
無論、我々《黒月》も対処するつもりですが
我らが振るう力はあまりに大きすぎる──

engChrName: Frankly, I was hopin' I'd never have to see his smug mug ever again.
engSearchText:
Frankly, I was hopin' I'd never have to see his smug
mug ever again.
jpnChrName: そこで《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》殿の手を お借りできないかと思った次第でして。
jpnSearchText:
そこで《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》殿の手を
お借りできないかと思った次第でして。

engChrName: You wound me, Mr. Arkride. Personally, I see great potential for a mutually beneficial relationship between you and me.
engSearchText:
You wound me, Mr. Arkride. Personally, I see great
potential for a mutually beneficial relationship
between you and me.
jpnChrName: 正直、御免だな。 ──厄介事もどうせ《Ａ》だろ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、御免だな。
──厄介事もどうせ《Ａ》だろ。

engChrName: So, might I explain our predicament while we wait for dinner to arrive?
engSearchText:
So, might I explain our predicament while we wait for
dinner to arrive?
jpnChrName: フフ、流石お耳が早い。
jpnSearchText: フフ、流石お耳が早い。

engChrName: The truth is, I'd like you to visit Langport on my behalf.
engSearchText:
The truth is, I'd like you to visit Langport on
my behalf.
jpnChrName: ええ、アルマータのダミーカンパニーが 先月煌都の新市街に支社を開きました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アルマータのダミーカンパニーが
先月煌都の新市街に支社を開きました。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: それ以降、関係者と思しき者たちが度々、 挑発するような嫌がらせを仕掛けています。
jpnSearchText:
それ以降、関係者と思しき者たちが度々、
挑発するような嫌がらせを仕掛けています。

engChrName: I think I know this one. It's down south, right?
engSearchText: I think I know this one. It's down south, right?
jpnChrName: 中には酷い諍（いさか）いに発展することもありまして、 いささか見過ごせぬ状況かと。
jpnSearchText:
中には酷い諍（いさか）いに発展することもありまして、
いささか見過ごせぬ状況かと。

engChrName: That's right. Langport—sometimes referred to as the 'Dazzling City'—is on the southern coast of Calvard.
engSearchText:
That's right. Langport—sometimes referred to as the
'Dazzling City'—is on the southern coast of Calvard.
jpnChrName: 裏勢力同士の話だ、 勝手に潰し合ってりゃあいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
裏勢力同士の話だ、
勝手に潰し合ってりゃあいいだろ。

engChrName: It's the second most populous city in the Republic and quite famous for its grand Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
It's the second most populous city in the Republic
and quite famous for its grand Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: これは手厳しい──ですがヴァンさんも 我々の果たす役割についてはご存じの筈。
jpnSearchText:
これは手厳しい──ですがヴァンさんも
我々の果たす役割についてはご存じの筈。

engChrName: And for bein' Heiyue's home turf.
engSearchText: And for bein' Heiyue's home turf.
jpnChrName: “バランサーとしての我々”になら 少々手を貸して頂く余地はあるのでは？
jpnSearchText:
“バランサーとしての我々”になら
少々手を貸して頂く余地はあるのでは？

engChrName: You see, trouble has been brewing on our doorstep.
engSearchText: You see, trouble has been brewing on our doorstep.

engChrName: And not the kind we can simply ask the police or guild to address, mind you.
engSearchText:
And not the kind we can simply ask the police or
guild to address, mind you.
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: Nor can our organization commit fully to addressing it so suddenly.
engSearchText:
Nor can our organization commit fully to addressing
it so suddenly.
jpnChrName: ばらんさー、ですか？
jpnSearchText: ばらんさー、ですか？

engChrName: With all that in mind, I think what we need is a spriggan's touch.
engSearchText:
With all that in mind, I think what we need is a
spriggan's touch.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》は言わば共和国における裏社会の顔。 我々は秩序を重んじます。
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》は言わば共和国における裏社会の顔。
我々は秩序を重んじます。

engChrName: Hell no. This reeks of A's bullshit to me.
engSearchText: Hell no. This reeks of A's bullshit to me.
jpnChrName: 無論、法の範疇にないようなことに 手を出していることは否定しませんが……
jpnSearchText:
無論、法の範疇にないようなことに
手を出していることは否定しませんが……

engChrName: Your nose is as sharp as ever, I see.
engSearchText: Your nose is as sharp as ever, I see.
jpnChrName: はっきりと一線を引いています。
jpnSearchText: はっきりと一線を引いています。

engChrName: Indeed, last month Almata set up a dummy company in Langport's New Town.
engSearchText:
Indeed, last month Almata set up a dummy company
in Langport's New Town.
jpnChrName: 度が過ぎるようなことを 《黒月》は“掟”で禁じているのです。
jpnSearchText:
度が過ぎるようなことを
《黒月》は“掟”で禁じているのです。

engChrName: Ever since, people seemingly in their employ have been picking fights with us at every turn.
engSearchText:
Ever since, people seemingly in their employ have
been picking fights with us at every turn.
jpnChrName: 例えば……依存性の高いドラッグの流通や、 人身売買のような、ね。
jpnSearchText:
例えば……依存性の高いドラッグの流通や、
人身売買のような、ね。

engChrName: The growing scale and severity of the conflicts means that we can no longer overlook their meddling.
engSearchText:
The growing scale and severity of the conflicts means
that we can no longer overlook their meddling.

engChrName: You mafias can take each other out, for all I care.
engSearchText: You mafias can take each other out, for all I care.
jpnChrName: 同時に、目を光らせて他の非合法組織にも 同じ掟に従うよう“協力”してもらっています。
jpnSearchText:
同時に、目を光らせて他の非合法組織にも
同じ掟に従うよう“協力”してもらっています。

engChrName: Come now, surely you understand the difference between us and the likes of Almata.
engSearchText:
Come now, surely you understand the difference
between us and the likes of Almata.
jpnChrName: カルバードの裏社会の秩序は 昔からこうして保たれてきました。
jpnSearchText:
カルバードの裏社会の秩序は
昔からこうして保たれてきました。

engChrName: We are the great equalizer of Calvard's underworld.
engSearchText: We are the great equalizer of Calvard's underworld.
jpnChrName: 組織として格上の《黒月》に 他の小規模組織も逆らえないと……
jpnSearchText:
組織として格上の《黒月》に
他の小規模組織も逆らえないと……

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...
jpnChrName: 警察やギルド以外に、黒月もまた この国の秩序の一部……ですか。
jpnSearchText:
警察やギルド以外に、黒月もまた
この国の秩序の一部……ですか。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: ふふ、その通りです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、その通りです。

engChrName: I'm not too good with math... What do you mean?
engSearchText: I'm not too good with math... What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 流石はヴァンさんの助手さん方、 ご理解が早くて助かります。
jpnSearchText:
流石はヴァンさんの助手さん方、
ご理解が早くて助かります。

engChrName: Unlike most criminal organizations, we at Heiyue understand the value of order.
engSearchText:
Unlike most criminal organizations, we at Heiyue
understand the value of order.
jpnChrName: い、いえ……
jpnSearchText: い、いえ……

engChrName: Yes, our activities are not always above board in a legal sense...
engSearchText:
Yes, our activities are not always above board in a
legal sense...
jpnChrName: ──と言っても、さっきの話は あくまで数年前までの状況、だな。
jpnSearchText:
──と言っても、さっきの話は
あくまで数年前までの状況、だな。

engChrName: ...but we have principles.
engSearchText: ...but we have principles.
jpnChrName: ええ、ここ数年で急速に力を付けてきた 《アルマータ》は我々の掟を無視しています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ここ数年で急速に力を付けてきた
《アルマータ》は我々の掟を無視しています。

engChrName: To uphold those principles, we crafted a set of rules.
engSearchText: To uphold those principles, we crafted a set of rules.
jpnChrName: 明らかに一線を超えた数々の悪行── 我らとの全面対決も辞さない姿勢でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
明らかに一線を超えた数々の悪行──
我らとの全面対決も辞さない姿勢でしょう。

engChrName: For example, the trade of highly addictive drugs and human trafficking are strictly forbidden.
engSearchText:
For example, the trade of highly addictive drugs and
human trafficking are strictly forbidden.
jpnChrName: つられて、他の幾つかの小規模組織までも “掟”に反発し始めていましてね……
jpnSearchText:
つられて、他の幾つかの小規模組織までも
“掟”に反発し始めていましてね……

jpnChrName: まあ、それらの有象無象は正直 大した問題ではありません……今はまだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それらの有象無象は正直
大した問題ではありません……今はまだ。

engChrName: We kindly ask that other criminal groups follow our rules, too.
engSearchText:
We kindly ask that other criminal groups follow our
rules, too.
jpnChrName: ですが、万が一《黒月》が 《アルマータ》との抗争に敗れれば──
jpnSearchText:
ですが、万が一《黒月》が
《アルマータ》との抗争に敗れれば──

engChrName: This is how the Republic's underworld has remained stable to this day.
engSearchText:
This is how the Republic's underworld has remained
stable to this day.
jpnChrName: 裏社会のルールが完全に書き換わり、 文字通りの“無法地帯”となるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
裏社会のルールが完全に書き換わり、
文字通りの“無法地帯”となるでしょう。

engChrName: So all the other groups do what you say because you guys are the strongest.
engSearchText:
So all the other groups do what you say because you
guys are the strongest.
jpnChrName: それがどういう未来なのか、 ……ご想像いただけるでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
それがどういう未来なのか、
……ご想像いただけるでしょうか？

engChrName: Meaning Heiyue plays as much a part in keeping order here in Calvard as the police or the guild...
engSearchText:
Meaning Heiyue plays as much a part in keeping
order here in Calvard as the police or the guild...
jpnChrName: で、連中をどうするか── 《黒月》としての方針は？
jpnSearchText:
で、連中をどうするか──
《黒月》としての方針は？

engChrName: Precisely.
engSearchText: Precisely.
jpnChrName: 『やるからには徹底的に一撃で』 ──これが長老がたの方針です。
jpnSearchText:
『やるからには徹底的に一撃で』
──これが長老がたの方針です。

engChrName: I must say, Mr. Arkride, you've gathered some promising assistants.
engSearchText:
I must say, Mr. Arkride, you've gathered some
promising assistants.
jpnChrName: 今の《アルマータ》はかつての 中規模マフィアだった頃とは訳が違います。
jpnSearchText:
今の《アルマータ》はかつての
中規模マフィアだった頃とは訳が違います。

engChrName: Y-You're too kind.
engSearchText: Y-You're too kind.
jpnChrName: 狙いの見極めも含め 慎重を期して掛かる必要があるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
狙いの見極めも含め
慎重を期して掛かる必要があるでしょう。

engChrName: ...But now that structure is fallin' apart.
engSearchText: ...But now that structure is fallin' apart.
jpnChrName: 挑発されているとはいえ、 短絡的な報復などは避けるべきかと。
jpnSearchText:
挑発されているとはいえ、
短絡的な報復などは避けるべきかと。

engChrName: Correct. As Almata's risen to power in the last few years, they've become more and more rebellious.
engSearchText:
Correct. As Almata's risen to power in the last few
years, they've become more and more rebellious.
jpnChrName: ま、妥当だな。
jpnSearchText: ま、妥当だな。

engChrName: Its members have committed no shortage of atrocities, yet they show no remorse.
engSearchText:
Its members have committed no shortage of
atrocities, yet they show no remorse.
jpnChrName: ただ── 跳ねっ返りが一人いるのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ──
跳ねっ返りが一人いるのですよ。

engChrName: They are challenging our control, and now lesser criminal organizations have begun to follow suit.
engSearchText:
They are challenging our control, and now lesser
criminal organizations have begun to follow suit.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》にまだ所属していない、 溢れんばかりのカリスマのある問題児が。
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》にまだ所属していない、
溢れんばかりのカリスマのある問題児が。

engChrName: Thankfully, none pose a significant threat—not yet, anyway.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, none pose a significant threat—not
yet, anyway.
jpnChrName: ──少々長くなりましたが 食事前のお話はこれくらいで。
jpnSearchText:
──少々長くなりましたが
食事前のお話はこれくらいで。

engChrName: However, if in the future Almata manages to wrest control away from Heiyue...
engSearchText:
However, if in the future Almata manages to wrest
control away from Heiyue...
jpnChrName: これ以上はヴァンさんが出張を 引き受けて頂いてからと致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上はヴァンさんが出張を
引き受けて頂いてからと致しましょう。

engChrName: ...all bets would be off. The rules would be rewritten—if not simply thrown out entirely.
engSearchText:
...all bets would be off. The rules would be
rewritten—if not simply thrown out entirely.
jpnChrName: ……状況は大体分かったが、 面倒くさすぎだろ……
jpnSearchText:
……状況は大体分かったが、
面倒くさすぎだろ……

engChrName: I could go on, but you undoubtedly understand the potential consequences by now.
engSearchText:
I could go on, but you undoubtedly understand the
potential consequences by now.
jpnChrName: 確かに《アルマータ》のことは 気になるっちゃ気になるが……
jpnSearchText:
確かに《アルマータ》のことは
気になるっちゃ気になるが……

engChrName: So, what're your honchos plannin' to do?
engSearchText: So, what're your honchos plannin' to do?

engChrName: The elders want our offensive to be swift and sure.
engSearchText: The elders want our offensive to be swift and sure.
jpnChrName: ふむ……？
jpnSearchText: ふむ……？

engChrName: To that end, we must approach with caution. Almata is no longer the fledgling organization they once were.
engSearchText:
To that end, we must approach with caution.
Almata is no longer the fledgling organization they
once were.
jpnChrName: とにかく話が急すぎる……！ 返事は明日にでも──
jpnSearchText:
とにかく話が急すぎる……！
返事は明日にでも──

engChrName: Our timing and avenue of attack will need to be chosen carefully.
engSearchText:
Our timing and avenue of attack will need to be
chosen carefully.
jpnChrName: いえ、実は私は明朝、 ク（・）ロ（・）ス（・）ベ（・）ル（・）に（・）発（・）つ（・）予定でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、実は私は明朝、
ク（・）ロ（・）ス（・）ベ（・）ル（・）に（・）発（・）つ（・）予定でしてね。

engChrName: We cannot allow their taunting to bait us into rash action.
engSearchText:
We cannot allow their taunting to bait us into
rash action.
jpnChrName: この場で返事が頂きたいのですよ。
jpnSearchText: この場で返事が頂きたいのですよ。

engChrName: Figures.
engSearchText: Figures.

engChrName: That said, one of our associates is nothing but rash.
engSearchText: That said, one of our associates is nothing but rash.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そこで黙られるから 貴方には期待してしまうのです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そこで黙られるから
貴方には期待してしまうのです。

engChrName: He's a charismatic young man who's on track to join Heiyue one day.
engSearchText:
He's a charismatic young man who's on track to join
Heiyue one day.
jpnChrName: ──言うまでもなく“保険”です。 そ（・）ち（・）ら（・）は（・）応じて頂けるか分かりませんので。
jpnSearchText:
──言うまでもなく“保険”です。
そ（・）ち（・）ら（・）は（・）応じて頂けるか分かりませんので。

engChrName: But I'll hold my tongue for now.
engSearchText: But I'll hold my tongue for now.
jpnChrName: ……そういうことか。 やっぱ嫌な野郎だな、アンタ。
jpnSearchText:
……そういうことか。
やっぱ嫌な野郎だな、アンタ。

engChrName: We can discuss the rest once you've eaten and agreed to help.
engSearchText:
We can discuss the rest once you've eaten and agreed
to help.
jpnChrName: 要はそ（・）こ（・）ま（・）で（・）する必要が あるほどの事態って訳だろ。
jpnSearchText:
要はそ（・）こ（・）ま（・）で（・）する必要が
あるほどの事態って訳だろ。

engChrName: Look, I get where you guys're comin' from...
engSearchText: Look, I get where you guys're comin' from...
jpnChrName: そうご理解いただければ。
jpnSearchText: そうご理解いただければ。

engChrName: ...but this sounds like a major pain in the ass.
engSearchText: ...but this sounds like a major pain in the ass.
jpnChrName: （よ、よく分かりませんが……   交渉が難航しているようですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（よ、よく分かりませんが……
交渉が難航しているようですね。）

engChrName: (Again?)
engSearchText: (Again?)
jpnChrName: （ええ、ヴァンさんの決断は……）
jpnSearchText: （ええ、ヴァンさんの決断は……）

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 大陸中東は《ヴァリス市国》から取り寄せた 秘伝の“生ドライフルーツ”を使った前菜です。
jpnSearchText:
大陸中東は《ヴァリス市国》から取り寄せた
秘伝の“生ドライフルーツ”を使った前菜です。

engChrName: Anyway! This is a lot to chew on, so how 'bout we pick this back up tomorrow?
engSearchText:
Anyway! This is a lot to chew on, so how 'bout we
pick this back up tomorrow?
jpnChrName: まずはご賞味あれ。
jpnSearchText: まずはご賞味あれ。

engChrName: That won't do. I leave for Crossbell first thing tomorrow morning.
engSearchText:
That won't do. I leave for Crossbell first thing
tomorrow morning.
jpnChrName: これがドライフルーツ……？
jpnSearchText: これがドライフルーツ……？

engChrName: I need your answer here and now.
engSearchText: I need your answer here and now.
jpnChrName: ……わたしが知ってるのと違います。
jpnSearchText: ……わたしが知ってるのと違います。

jpnChrName: ぐっ、話は終わっちゃ──
jpnSearchText: ぐっ、話は終わっちゃ──

engChrName: That tortured look on your face has me optimistic about your reply.
engSearchText:
That tortured look on your face has me optimistic
about your reply.
jpnChrName: ……じゅわっと…… 口の中でじゅわっと来ましたっ……！
jpnSearchText:
……じゅわっと……
口の中でじゅわっと来ましたっ……！

engChrName: I should mention, though, you'll merely be on deck in case my other helper chooses to decline.
engSearchText:
I should mention, though, you'll merely be on deck in
case my other helper chooses to decline.
jpnChrName: 甘さと味わいが凝縮されているのに 瑞々しさも残っているなんて………
jpnSearchText:
甘さと味わいが凝縮されているのに
瑞々しさも残っているなんて………

engChrName: ...You're a real son of a bitch, you know that?
engSearchText: ...You're a real son of a bitch, you know that?
jpnChrName: ──大変貴重なものでして、 黒月でも滅多に手に入らない逸品です。
jpnSearchText:
──大変貴重なものでして、
黒月でも滅多に手に入らない逸品です。

engChrName: Is the situation really that bad?
engSearchText: Is the situation really that bad?
jpnChrName: 依頼を引き受けてくださったら、１６種 詰め合わせの“特箱”をお贈りしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
依頼を引き受けてくださったら、１６種
詰め合わせの“特箱”をお贈りしましょう。

engChrName: More or less.
engSearchText: More or less.
jpnChrName: もちろん報酬とは別に…… あくまで“感謝の気持ち”として。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん報酬とは別に……
あくまで“感謝の気持ち”として。

engChrName: (I'm not sure what they're talking about anymore, but it doesn't sound like it's going well...)
engSearchText:
(I'm not sure what they're talking about anymore, but
it doesn't sound like it's going well...)
jpnChrName: 如何ですか──ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: 如何ですか──ヴァンさん？

engChrName: (Indeed. I'm not sure what Van will choose to do.)
engSearchText: (Indeed. I'm not sure what Van will choose to do.)

engChrName: This appetizer features the finest Central Eastern dried fruits, sourced from Valis and prepared using a secret recipe.
engSearchText:
This appetizer features the finest Central Eastern
dried fruits, sourced from Valis and prepared using a
secret recipe.
jpnChrName: 待てやコラアアアアッ！
jpnSearchText: <S6>待てやコラアアアアッ！

engChrName: Please, help yourself to as much as you'd like.
engSearchText: Please, help yourself to as much as you'd like.
jpnChrName: か、勘弁してくださああい！！
jpnSearchText: <S6>か、勘弁してくださああい！！

engChrName: Is this really dried fruit?
engSearchText: Is this really dried fruit?
jpnChrName: ハアハア……！ 鬼ゴッコは終わりみてぇだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
ハアハア……！
鬼ゴッコは終わりみてぇだなァ？

engChrName: Not like any I've ever had...
engSearchText: Not like any I've ever had...
jpnChrName: ひいっ、どうかお待ちを！！
jpnSearchText: ひいっ、どうかお待ちを！！

engChrName: Hang on! I ain't done wi—
engSearchText: Hang on! I ain't done wi—
jpnChrName: あ、あと３日──いえ！ あと１日だけ待ってください～！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あと３日──いえ！
あと１日だけ待ってください～！

engChrName: Whoa! It's like an explosion of flavor in my mouth!
