engSearchText: Whoa! It's like an explosion of flavor in my mouth!
jpnChrName: とっくに時間切れだボケがッ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>とっくに時間切れだボケがッ！

engChrName: It's so sweet and flavorful, yet fresh and juicy like it was just picked, too!
engSearchText:
It's so sweet and flavorful, yet fresh and juicy like it
was just picked, too!
jpnChrName: ここ数日、おちょくるみてぇに 何度も姿を晦ましやがって……！
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日、おちょくるみてぇに
何度も姿を晦ましやがって……！

engChrName: This is an extremely rare delicacy that even we struggled to procure.
engSearchText:
This is an extremely rare delicacy that even we
struggled to procure.
jpnChrName: 今、ここで耳揃えて払えねえなら マジで沈めんぞ、アアッ！？
jpnSearchText:
今、ここで耳揃えて払えねえなら
マジで沈めんぞ、アアッ！？

engChrName: Should you decide to help, I'll see to it that you receive a care package containing sixteen varieties of dried fruit.
engSearchText:
Should you decide to help, I'll see to it that you
receive a care package containing sixteen varieties of
dried fruit.
jpnChrName: ひいいいいっ……！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ひいいいいっ……！！

engChrName: That's on top of your monetary compensation, of course. Consider it a token of our appreciation.
engSearchText:
That's on top of your monetary compensation,
of course. Consider it a token of our appreciation.
jpnChrName: はーい、そこまでー。
jpnSearchText: はーい、そこまでー。

engChrName: So, do we have a deal?
engSearchText: So, do we have a deal?
jpnChrName: 朝っぱらからキャンキャン喚くなって。 盛りのついた犬かっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
朝っぱらからキャンキャン喚くなって。
盛りのついた犬かっつーの。

engChrName: October 3rd, 9:45AM
engSearchText: October 3rd, 9:45AM
jpnChrName: な、なんだこのガキ……？ 関係ねぇヤツは引っ込んでろや！！
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだこのガキ……？
関係ねぇヤツは引っ込んでろや！！

engChrName: Get back heeere!
engSearchText: Get back heeere!
jpnChrName: 関係あるんだなー、これが♪
jpnSearchText: 関係あるんだなー、これが♪

engChrName: N-No! Please!
engSearchText: N-No! Please!
jpnChrName: 今、ここで耳揃えて払えねえなら マジで沈めんぞ、アアッ！？
jpnSearchText:
今、ここで耳揃えて払えねえなら
マジで沈めんぞ、アアッ！？

engChrName: *pant* This game of cat and mouse is over!
engSearchText: *pant* This game of cat and mouse is over!

engChrName: P-Please wait! I can get the money!
engSearchText: P-Please wait! I can get the money!
jpnChrName: お、顔もバッチリ映ってやがるぜ。
jpnSearchText: お、顔もバッチリ映ってやがるぜ。

engChrName: Just give me three days—no, one day is enough!
engSearchText: Just give me three days—no, one day is enough!
jpnChrName: 闇金だろうが出るところに出ちまったら さすがにヤベー物言いじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
闇金だろうが出るところに出ちまったら
さすがにヤベー物言いじゃねえか？

engChrName: I'm done giving extensions!
engSearchText: I'm done giving extensions!
jpnChrName: ……ま、まさかてめぇっ！？
jpnSearchText: ……ま、まさかてめぇっ！？

engChrName: I've been chasing you around like a damn fool, but this is the end of the line.
engSearchText:
I've been chasing you around like a damn fool, but
this is the end of the line.
jpnChrName: へ、へへ……
jpnSearchText: へ、へへ……

engChrName: Pay up right now, or you'll be sleeping with the fishes!
engSearchText:
Pay up right now, or you'll be sleeping with
the fishes!
jpnChrName: ──チャラにしろとは言わねぇさ。 そっちもメンツがあるんだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
──チャラにしろとは言わねぇさ。
そっちもメンツがあるんだろうしな。

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnChrName: 三大銀行の一般向け利息＋αで お互い手を打つっつーのはどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
三大銀行の一般向け利息＋αで
お互い手を打つっつーのはどうだ？

engChrName: Oookay, that's enough of that.
engSearchText: Oookay, that's enough of that.
jpnChrName: ……へっ？
jpnSearchText: ……へっ？

engChrName: Good job being intimidating and all, but it's way too early for all this damn noise.
engSearchText:
Good job being intimidating and all, but it's way too
early for all this damn noise.
jpnChrName: こ、このガキ…… ふざけてんじゃねぇぞっ！！
jpnSearchText:
こ、このガキ……
ふざけてんじゃねぇぞっ！！

engChrName: Wh-Who the hell are you? Scram—this is none of your business!
engSearchText:
Wh-Who the hell are you? Scram—this is none of
your business!

engChrName: That's where you're wrong.
engSearchText: That's where you're wrong.
jpnChrName: クク、モチロン 荒っぽいのも嫌いじゃねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、モチロン
荒っぽいのも嫌いじゃねぇが。

engChrName: Pay up right now, or you'll be sleeping with the fishes!
engSearchText: Pay up right now, or you'll be sleeping with the fishes!
jpnChrName: どっちにする？
jpnSearchText: どっちにする？

engChrName: Oh, nice. I got a clear shot of your face, too.
engSearchText: Oh, nice. I got a clear shot of your face, too.
jpnChrName: わ、分かった── それで手を打つ、打つからッ！！
jpnSearchText:
わ、分かった──
それで手を打つ、打つからッ！！

engChrName: Look, dude. I get you're a loan shark, but aren't death threats pushing it a bit?
engSearchText:
Look, dude. I get you're a loan shark, but aren't death
threats pushing it a bit?
jpnChrName: ──オラ、とっとと払っちまいな。 これで晴れて自由の身だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
──オラ、とっとと払っちまいな。
これで晴れて自由の身だぜ？

engChrName: W-Wait, are you...?
engSearchText: W-Wait, are you...?
jpnChrName: え、ええっと……
jpnSearchText: え、ええっと……

engChrName: Heh heh.
engSearchText: Heh heh.
jpnChrName: さっきの証拠もあるし、どうせなら 全額チャラに出来ないかな～って……
jpnSearchText:
さっきの証拠もあるし、どうせなら
全額チャラに出来ないかな～って……

engChrName: Don't worry. I'm not saying you should let your debtor off the hook, though.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I'm not saying you should let your
debtor off the hook, though.
jpnChrName: そいつは流石にムシが良すぎだろうが。
jpnSearchText: そいつは流石にムシが良すぎだろうが。

engChrName: How about you lower his interest rate closer to what the big three banks give?
engSearchText:
How about you lower his interest rate closer to what
the big three banks give?
jpnChrName: 俺様が間に入ってやってんだ── スジはきっちり通しておけよ、なあ？
jpnSearchText:
俺様が間に入ってやってんだ──
スジはきっちり通しておけよ、なあ？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: ッ……は、はいっ只今っ！
jpnSearchText: ッ……は、はいっ只今っ！

engChrName: Don't mess with me, kid!
engSearchText: Don't mess with me, kid!
jpnChrName: ──とまあ、 これにて一件落着だが、どうよ？
jpnSearchText:
──とまあ、
これにて一件落着だが、どうよ？

engChrName: Gah... (Why can't I move...?)
engSearchText:
Gah...
(Why can't I move...?)
jpnChrName: ……ったく、 ハラハラさせやがって。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、
ハラハラさせやがって。

engChrName: We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
engSearchText: We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
jpnChrName: でも、鮮やかな手並みかと。 何だか上手くまとまりましたし。
jpnSearchText:
でも、鮮やかな手並みかと。
何だか上手くまとまりましたし。

engChrName: What'll it be?
engSearchText: What'll it be?
jpnChrName: はい、少し荒っぽかったですけど 双方がぎりぎり納得していましたね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、少し荒っぽかったですけど
双方がぎりぎり納得していましたね。

jpnChrName: その、もしかして煌都でも 似たような事をしてたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
その、もしかして煌都でも
似たような事をしてたんですか？

engChrName: F-Fine! We'll give him a fair rate!
engSearchText: F-Fine! We'll give him a fair rate!
jpnChrName: まあな、ミラの貸し借りなんざ 煌都も首都も変わるモンじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、ミラの貸し借りなんざ
煌都も首都も変わるモンじゃねぇ。

engChrName: Job's done. Now pay this guy already so we can be done with this.
engSearchText:
Job's done. Now pay this guy already so we can be
done with this.
jpnChrName: あっちはやり過ぎたら黒月に沈められるから 弁えてるヤツは多いけどな、ククク。
jpnSearchText:
あっちはやり過ぎたら黒月に沈められるから
弁えてるヤツは多いけどな、ククク。

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnChrName: うーん、なるほど。
jpnSearchText: うーん、なるほど。

engChrName: Can't you just use that video to make him forgive all of my debt?
engSearchText:
Can't you just use that video to make him forgive all
of my debt?
jpnChrName: （どうコメントしていいのやら……）
jpnSearchText: （どうコメントしていいのやら……）

engChrName: This isn't a charity, man.
engSearchText: This isn't a charity, man.
jpnChrName: そんで所長サン。 “採用試験”の結果はどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
そんで所長サン。
“採用試験”の結果はどうだい？

engChrName: If I have to be the mediator, then I'm not playing favorites. You get me?
engSearchText:
If I have to be the mediator, then I'm not
playing favorites. You get me?
jpnChrName: はあ……仕方ねぇ。 大マケにマケて合格にしてやる。
jpnSearchText:
はあ……仕方ねぇ。
大マケにマケて合格にしてやる。

engChrName: I-I get you! I'll pay him right away!
engSearchText: I-I get you! I'll pay him right away!
jpnChrName: だが忘れんな──調子に乗って 下手打ったら即クビだからな？
jpnSearchText:
だが忘れんな──調子に乗って
下手打ったら即クビだからな？

engChrName: That's a wrap. What do you think?
engSearchText: That's a wrap. What do you think?
jpnChrName: 俺が下手を？ クク、あり得ねぇつーの。
jpnSearchText:
俺が下手を？
クク、あり得ねぇつーの。

engChrName: Thought you'd screwed it up like three times there.
engSearchText: Thought you'd screwed it up like three times there.
jpnChrName: ──つーわけで小娘どもも 改めてよろしくしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
──つーわけで小娘どもも
改めてよろしくしてやるよ。

engChrName: You really did great, though! Mission accomplished, as far as I can tell.
engSearchText:
You really did great, though! Mission accomplished,
as far as I can tell.
jpnChrName: ああ、ガキには一リジュも興味はねぇ。 惚れちまっても無駄だから気をつけろよ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ガキには一リジュも興味はねぇ。
惚れちまっても無駄だから気をつけろよ？

engChrName: I wish it could have been solved without intimidation, but I'm at least glad both sides came to an agreement.
engSearchText:
I wish it could have been solved without intimidation,
but I'm at least glad both sides came to an agreement.
jpnChrName: あはは……（うーん、 本気で言ってるみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
あはは……（うーん、
本気で言ってるみたいですね。）

engChrName: Did you ever have to handle situations like this in Langport, by any chance?
engSearchText:
Did you ever have to handle situations like this in
Langport, by any chance?
jpnChrName: それはともかく宜しくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText: それはともかく宜しくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Sure did. Shit like this happens everywhere.
engSearchText: Sure did. Shit like this happens everywhere.
jpnChrName: 惚れるとかはよく分かりませんが 実戦での連携は高めたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
惚れるとかはよく分かりませんが
実戦での連携は高めたいですね。

engChrName: Only difference is that the crooks in Langport play it safer because they don't want the hammer of Heiyue coming down on them.
engSearchText:
Only difference is that the crooks in Langport play it
safer because they don't want the hammer of Heiyue
coming down on them.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんはムラ気が多そうなので 精度を高めていただければ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんはムラ気が多そうなので
精度を高めていただければ。

engChrName: Interesting.
engSearchText: Interesting.
jpnChrName: ……ほお……？ 一丁前に言うじゃねえか、チビ。
jpnSearchText:
……ほお……？
一丁前に言うじゃねえか、チビ。

engChrName: (I'm not sure how to respond to that...)
engSearchText: (I'm not sure how to respond to that...)
jpnChrName: チビじゃなくてフェリーダです。 フェリでも構いませんが。
jpnSearchText:
チビじゃなくてフェリーダです。
フェリでも構いませんが。

engChrName: So what's the verdict, chief? Did I pass the test?
engSearchText: So what's the verdict, chief? Did I pass the test?
jpnChrName: 分かった、 考えといてやるよ、チビ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、
考えといてやるよ、チビ。

engChrName: *sigh* Kills me a little to say this, but you did good.
engSearchText: *sigh* Kills me a little to say this, but you did good.
jpnChrName: むっ……
jpnSearchText: むっ……

engChrName: But I've got my eye on you. Botch a job, I'll kick your ass to the curb, ya hear?
engSearchText:
But I've got my eye on you. Botch a job, I'll kick your
ass to the curb, ya hear?
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Please! Have a little faith in me.
engSearchText: Please! Have a little faith in me.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……事務所もますます 賑やかになりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……事務所もますます
賑やかになりそうですね。

engChrName: I'll be taking care of your old ass and the girls before you know it.
engSearchText:
I'll be taking care of your old ass and the girls before
you know it.
jpnChrName: まったくもって不本意だがな。
jpnSearchText: まったくもって不本意だがな。

engChrName: Heads up, though—I'm a heart-breaker, so don't go falling in love with me.
engSearchText:
Heads up, though—I'm a heart-breaker, so don't go
falling in love with me.
jpnChrName: ……はぁ、ハードボイルドに 過ごしていた日々が懐かしいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……はぁ、ハードボイルドに
過ごしていた日々が懐かしいぜ。

engChrName: Ahaha... (He's serious, isn't he?)
engSearchText:
Ahaha...
(He's serious, isn't he?)
jpnSearchText: …………………………

engChrName: That last comment aside, welcome to the team.
engSearchText: That last comment aside, welcome to the team.
jpnChrName: “元々そこまでじゃ”とか 思ってねぇか……？
jpnSearchText:
“元々そこまでじゃ”とか
思ってねぇか……？

engChrName: Don't worry. I'm not interested in you at all.
engSearchText: Don't worry. I'm not interested in you at all.
jpnChrName: い、いえ、そんなことは……
jpnSearchText: い、いえ、そんなことは……

engChrName: But I am looking forward to improving your fighting skills. Your form is a little too loose.
engSearchText:
But I am looking forward to improving your
fighting skills. Your form is a little too loose.
jpnChrName: そろそろ１０時か…… ちょっと早いが事務所に戻るか。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ１０時か……
ちょっと早いが事務所に戻るか。

engChrName: You talk a big game, small fry.
engSearchText: You talk a big game, small fry.
jpnChrName: おお、帰ったらモンマルトで 早めのランチと洒落込もうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、帰ったらモンマルトで
早めのランチと洒落込もうぜ。

engChrName: My name's actually Ferida. Oh! But I also go by Feri if you like that.
engSearchText:
My name's actually Ferida. Oh! But I also go by Feri
if you like that.
jpnChrName: あそこの西方料理はまぁ悪くねぇ。 グラマーな出戻り看板娘もイカスしよ。
jpnSearchText:
あそこの西方料理はまぁ悪くねぇ。
グラマーな出戻り看板娘もイカスしよ。

engChrName: Meh. I'll call you whatever I want.
engSearchText: Meh. I'll call you whatever I want.
jpnChrName: その言い方はどうかと…… でも賄いは本当に嬉しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
その言い方はどうかと……
でも賄いは本当に嬉しいですね。

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: えへへ、はいっ。 昨夜のミルクシチューも絶品でした！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、はいっ。
昨夜のミルクシチューも絶品でした！

engChrName: This guy...
engSearchText: This guy...
jpnChrName: ──今日は本当に ありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
──今日は本当に
ありがとうございました。

engChrName: Heehee. I think the office is going to be quite a bit livelier from here on.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I think the office is going to be quite a
bit livelier from here on.
jpnChrName: お二人には、 お礼を言っても言い足りません！
jpnSearchText:
お二人には、
お礼を言っても言い足りません！

engChrName: You're tellin' me.
engSearchText: You're tellin' me.
jpnChrName: ……その、最初はエレインさんが なんでこんな人とって思いましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
……その、最初はエレインさんが
なんでこんな人とって思いましたけど。

engChrName: *sigh* What happened to my rough-and-tumble lone wolf image?
engSearchText:
*sigh* What happened to my rough-and-tumble lone
wolf image?
jpnChrName: 息、ピッタリでしたね！ 見ていて羨ましくなっちゃいました！
jpnSearchText:
息、ピッタリでしたね！
見ていて羨ましくなっちゃいました！

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...
jpnChrName: へ。
jpnSearchText: へ。

engChrName: Can't you at least pretend I'm a little cool?
engSearchText: Can't you at least pretend I'm a little cool?
jpnChrName: あ、あの……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの……

engChrName: O-Oh, I never thought otherwise!
engSearchText: O-Oh, I never thought otherwise!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとルルア……
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっとルルア……

engChrName: Anyway, it's almost ten. May as well head back to the office for now.
engSearchText:
Anyway, it's almost ten. May as well head back to the
office for now.
jpnChrName: 今のは気にしないで下さい。 ほら行くわよ──
jpnSearchText:
今のは気にしないで下さい。
ほら行くわよ──

engChrName: Works for me. We can swing by Montmart for an early lunch.
engSearchText:
Works for me. We can swing by Montmart for an
early lunch.
jpnChrName: ──なんだ、解決しちゃったんだ。
jpnSearchText: ──なんだ、解決しちゃったんだ。

engChrName: The food's good and all, but I need me some more of that hot piece of a waitress.
engSearchText:
The food's good and all, but I need me some more of
that hot piece of a waitress.
jpnChrName: クラウゼル、お前さんか。
jpnSearchText: クラウゼル、お前さんか。

engChrName: Please don't bother Paulette... Though, I will agree that the food is delicious.
engSearchText:
Please don't bother Paulette... Though, I will agree
that the food is delicious.
jpnChrName: フィー……ごめんなさい、 勝手に動いてしまって。
jpnSearchText:
フィー……ごめんなさい、
勝手に動いてしまって。

engChrName: That cream stew we had last night was delicious!
engSearchText: That cream stew we had last night was delicious!
jpnChrName: ううん、片付いたのならそれで。
jpnSearchText: ううん、片付いたのならそれで。

engChrName: Thank you both so much for your help.
engSearchText: Thank you both so much for your help.
jpnChrName: わたしが絡んでたら お邪魔だった可能性もありそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
わたしが絡んでたら
お邪魔だった可能性もありそうだし。

engChrName: Yeah! We can't thank you enough!
engSearchText: Yeah! We can't thank you enough!
jpnChrName: ……！ そ、そんなわけ──
jpnSearchText:
……！
そ、そんなわけ──

engChrName: I'll admit at first I was like, 'Really? THAT'S Elaine's guy?'
engSearchText:
I'll admit at first I was like, 'Really? THAT'S
Elaine's guy?'
jpnChrName: ふう、イジんじゃねえよ。 こう見えて意外と耐性ねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、イジんじゃねえよ。
こう見えて意外と耐性ねえからな。

engChrName: But the way you two moved in perfect sync was dazzling! Honestly, I'm kinda jealous.
engSearchText:
But the way you two moved in perfect sync
was dazzling! Honestly, I'm kinda jealous.
jpnChrName: さすがいい歳して“乙女”なんて 呼ばれてるだけはあるって──
jpnSearchText:
さすがいい歳して“乙女”なんて
呼ばれてるだけはあるって──

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: まだ四捨五入したら 二十歳（はたち）なのだけど……？
jpnSearchText:
まだ四捨五入したら
二十歳（はたち）なのだけど……？

engChrName: E-Erm...
engSearchText: E-Erm...
jpnChrName: ちなみに自分で名乗った覚えはないわ。 勝手に呼ばれるようになっただけ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに自分で名乗った覚えはないわ。
勝手に呼ばれるようになっただけ。

engChrName: Read the room, Lulua!
engSearchText: Read the room, Lulua!
jpnChrName: ハイ、ソウデスネ……
jpnSearchText: ハイ、ソウデスネ……

engChrName: Sorry, please ignore her. Come on, you, let's go.
engSearchText: Sorry, please ignore her. Come on, you, let's go.
jpnChrName: フフ、わたしも“妖精”だし、 気にすることないと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、わたしも“妖精”だし、
気にすることないと思うけど。

engChrName: Finish your job already?
engSearchText: Finish your job already?
jpnChrName: ギルドへの報告は任せて。 それじゃ、お二人ともごゆっくり。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドへの報告は任せて。
それじゃ、お二人ともごゆっくり。

engChrName: Ah. Hey there.
engSearchText: Ah. Hey there.
jpnChrName: ふう、あの子ったら……
jpnSearchText: ふう、あの子ったら……

engChrName: Sorry for going off on my own, Fie.
engSearchText: Sorry for going off on my own, Fie.
jpnChrName: 元西風の遊撃士…… あの《紫電》の妹分だったか。
jpnSearchText:
元西風の遊撃士……
あの《紫電》の妹分だったか。

engChrName: It's no biggie. I'm just glad everything got taken care of.
engSearchText:
It's no biggie. I'm just glad everything got taken
care of.
jpnChrName: サルバッドでも大活躍だったし、 まだまだ伸びそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドでも大活躍だったし、
まだまだ伸びそうだな。

engChrName: Besides, I've got nooo interest in being a third wheel.
engSearchText: Besides, I've got nooo interest in being a third wheel.
jpnChrName: ええ、ひょっとしたら私の記録も 塗り替えてくれるかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ひょっとしたら私の記録も
塗り替えてくれるかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Th-That's... We're not...
engSearchText: Th-That's... We're not...
jpnChrName: 帝国に大切な人たちがいるから たまに寂しそうにしているけど……
jpnSearchText:
帝国に大切な人たちがいるから
たまに寂しそうにしているけど……

engChrName: You're gonna have to go easy on her. She's more touchy than she lets on.
engSearchText:
You're gonna have to go easy on her. She's more
touchy than she lets on.
jpnChrName: 共和国（こちら）にも馴染んでくれてるし、 本当に助かっているわ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国（こちら）にも馴染んでくれてるし、
本当に助かっているわ。

engChrName: For example, if you start movin' the conversation just a little toward her age—
engSearchText:
For example, if you start movin' the conversation just
a little toward her age—
jpnChrName: クク、相変わらずっつーか、 生徒会長気質みてぇだな？
jpnSearchText:
クク、相変わらずっつーか、
生徒会長気質みてぇだな？

engChrName: First off, not funny.
engSearchText: First off, not funny.
jpnChrName: あ、貴方は見てないでしょう！？ 副会長だった時はともかく。
jpnSearchText:
あ、貴方は見てないでしょう！？
副会長だった時はともかく。

engChrName: And second, I'll have you know I am still in my early twenties.
engSearchText:
And second, I'll have you know I am still in my
early twenties.
jpnChrName: いや、ルネの野郎とは別の意味で 会長感丸出しだったからな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ルネの野郎とは別の意味で
会長感丸出しだったからな。

engChrName: Of course. My apologies, ma'am.
engSearchText: Of course. My apologies, ma'am.
jpnChrName: 学藝祭最終日の舞台なんか──
jpnSearchText: 学藝祭最終日の舞台なんか──

engChrName: Don't feel bad, Elaine. I can be a little sensitive about my age, too, sometimes.
engSearchText:
Don't feel bad, Elaine. I can be a little sensitive about
my age, too, sometimes.
jpnChrName: そ、それは言わない約束でしょう！ 第一あの時は貴方が悪乗りして……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは言わない約束でしょう！
第一あの時は貴方が悪乗りして……！

engChrName: Anyway, I'll go report to the guild for you. Have some fun, you two, okay?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'll go report to the guild for you.
Have some fun, you two, okay?
jpnChrName: おい、あれって……
jpnSearchText: おい、あれって……

engChrName: *sigh* She can be such a tease.
engSearchText: *sigh* She can be such a tease.
jpnChrName: ……間違いないわ。 何を話しているのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
……間違いないわ。
何を話しているのかしら……

engChrName: Ain't she somethin', though? Not every day a jaeger from a famous corps like Zephyr joins the guild—let alone one trained by the Purple Lightning.
engSearchText:
Ain't she somethin', though? Not every day a jaeger
from a famous corps like Zephyr joins the guild—let
alone one trained by the Purple Lightning.

engChrName: Shows up and immediately helped out in Tharbad. And she's got a lot of room to get even better, I reckon.
engSearchText:
Shows up and immediately helped out in Tharbad.
And she's got a lot of room to get even better,
I reckon.
jpnChrName: クク、有名人はツラいねぇ。
jpnSearchText: クク、有名人はツラいねぇ。

engChrName: Agreed. At this rate, she may even surpass my records.
engSearchText:
Agreed. At this rate, she may even surpass
my records.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、割り切ってるわ。 遊撃士として利用できる事もあるし。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、割り切ってるわ。
遊撃士として利用できる事もあるし。

engChrName: Though, sometimes a dour expression crosses her face. She must miss her friends back in Erebonia dearly.
engSearchText:
Though, sometimes a dour expression crosses
her face. She must miss her friends back in
Erebonia dearly.
jpnChrName: 貴方が裏解決屋（スプリガン）という肩書きを 名乗っているのと同じくらいは。
jpnSearchText:
貴方が裏解決屋（スプリガン）という肩書きを
名乗っているのと同じくらいは。

engChrName: Regardless, I must admit it's been a massive help to have her around, and I think she's beginning to settle in here little by little.
engSearchText:
Regardless, I must admit it's been a massive help to
have her around, and I think she's beginning to settle
in here little by little.
jpnChrName: ………そうか。
jpnSearchText: ………そうか。

engChrName: Heh. Once a Student Council president, always a Student Council president.
engSearchText:
Heh. Once a Student Council president, always a
Student Council president.
jpnChrName: ……さっきの動きを見る限り 夕食は済ませているみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
……さっきの動きを見る限り
夕食は済ませているみたいね？

engChrName: You don't get to say that—I was still only vice president when you were around!
engSearchText:
You don't get to say that—I was still only vice
president when you were around!
jpnChrName: 私も軽く食べているけど──
jpnSearchText: 私も軽く食べているけど──

engChrName: Pssh. René did things differently, so it was up to you to play the perfect prez.
engSearchText:
Pssh. René did things differently, so it was up to you
to play the perfect prez.
jpnChrName: 少し喉が渇いちゃったし、 ちょっとだけ付き合わない？
jpnSearchText:
少し喉が渇いちゃったし、
ちょっとだけ付き合わない？

engChrName: Remember the play we did on the last day of the festival where you—?
engSearchText:
Remember the play we did on the last day of the
festival where you—?
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Oh, you do NOT get to bring that up again! That was all your fault!
engSearchText:
Oh, you do NOT get to bring that up again!
That was all your fault!
jpnChrName: アン……？ 確か鍵がかかってなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
アン……？
確か鍵がかかってなかったか？

engChrName: Hey, isn't that—?
engSearchText: Hey, isn't that—?
jpnChrName: はい…… 小さな路地みたいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
小さな路地みたいですけど。

engChrName: It's gotta be. I wonder what they're talking about?
engSearchText: It's gotta be. I wonder what they're talking about?
jpnChrName: タイレル地区一帯の 上水道に降りる入口があるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区一帯の
上水道に降りる入口があるはずだ。

jpnChrName: 月一くらいでメンテナンス要員が 入っているとは聞いてるが……
jpnSearchText:
月一くらいでメンテナンス要員が
入っているとは聞いてるが……

engChrName: Sucks to be famous, huh?
engSearchText: Sucks to be famous, huh?
jpnChrName: ──どうやらノブが 引きちぎられているみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
──どうやらノブが
引きちぎられているみてぇだな。

engChrName: It has its pros and cons. When I introduce myself, sometimes I can make use of my reputation.
engSearchText:
It has its pros and cons. When I introduce myself,
sometimes I can make use of my reputation.

engChrName: Much like how you call yourself a spriggan.
engSearchText: Much like how you call yourself a spriggan.
jpnChrName: た、確かに…… しかも最近でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
た、確かに……
しかも最近でしょうか？

engChrName: True enough.
engSearchText: True enough.
jpnChrName: ふむ、常人の握力ではないな。 何らかの武芸者か、それとも──
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、常人の握力ではないな。
何らかの武芸者か、それとも──

engChrName: Knowing you, I imagine you've already eaten dinner.
engSearchText: Knowing you, I imagine you've already eaten dinner.
jpnChrName: ……常人の握力では不可能かと。 特殊な工具を使ったか、あるいは──
jpnSearchText:
……常人の握力では不可能かと。
特殊な工具を使ったか、あるいは──

engChrName: I had enough to hold me over...
engSearchText: I had enough to hold me over...
jpnChrName: うーん、普通の人間には無理だね。 特殊な工具を使ったか、それとも──
jpnSearchText:
うーん、普通の人間には無理だね。
特殊な工具を使ったか、それとも──

engChrName: ...but I could go for a drink. Want to come with me?
engSearchText: ...but I could go for a drink. Want to come with me?
jpnChrName: 例の話もあったし…… とにかく奥を見てみましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
例の話もあったし……
とにかく奥を見てみましょうか？

engChrName: Well, lookie here...
engSearchText: Well, lookie here...
jpnChrName: 例の話もあったし…… とにかく奥を見てみようか？
jpnSearchText:
例の話もあったし……
とにかく奥を見てみようか？

engChrName: Huh? Isn't this usually locked?
engSearchText: Huh? Isn't this usually locked?
jpnChrName: 例の話もありましたし…… 奥を確かめた方が良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
例の話もありましたし……
奥を確かめた方が良さそうですね。

engChrName: It is... Where does this alleyway lead?
engSearchText: It is... Where does this alleyway lead?

engChrName: Down into the waterways beneath the Tyrell District.
engSearchText: Down into the waterways beneath the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: こちらも、みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: こちらも、みたいですね。

engChrName: Far as I know, the only traffic this way sees is a maintenance team once a month.
engSearchText:
Far as I know, the only traffic this way sees is a
maintenance team once a month.
jpnChrName: ハン、しかも工具とかじゃなく、 素手で力任せっぽいな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、しかも工具とかじゃなく、
素手で力任せっぽいな。

engChrName: Now, I ain't an ace detective, but something's tellin' me this wasn't their doing.
engSearchText:
Now, I ain't an ace detective, but something's tellin'
me this wasn't their doing.
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: The handle's gone...?!
engSearchText: The handle's gone...?!
jpnChrName: ……どう考えても 普通じゃない人間の仕業みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
……どう考えても
普通じゃない人間の仕業みたいだね。

engChrName: This may have been done recently.
engSearchText: This may have been done recently.
jpnChrName: ……どう考えても 普通じゃない人間の仕業みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……どう考えても
普通じゃない人間の仕業みたいね。

engChrName: Whoever removed it may have inhuman strength. Or maybe it was a martial artist? Or perhaps...
engSearchText:
Whoever removed it may have inhuman strength.
Or maybe it was a martial artist? Or perhaps...
jpnChrName: ……どう考えても 尋常ではない者の仕業であろう。
jpnSearchText:
……どう考えても
尋常ではない者の仕業であろう。

engChrName: No ordinary person could accomplish this with their bare hands. Perhaps they employed some sort of tool, or perhaps...
engSearchText:
No ordinary person could accomplish this with their
bare hands. Perhaps they employed some sort of tool,
or perhaps...
jpnChrName: しかも扉の前に、比較的新しい 足跡が多く残されているようです。
jpnSearchText:
しかも扉の前に、比較的新しい
足跡が多く残されているようです。

engChrName: It's safe to say a normal person couldn't do that with their bare hands. I wonder if they used a special tool, or maybe...
engSearchText:
It's safe to say a normal person couldn't do that with
their bare hands. I wonder if they used a special tool,
or maybe...
jpnChrName: しかも扉の前に、比較的新しい 足跡が多く残されておるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
しかも扉の前に、比較的新しい
足跡が多く残されておるようだ。

engChrName: The quickest way to the bottom of this is to head in ourselves.
engSearchText:
The quickest way to the bottom of this is to head
in ourselves.
jpnChrName: しかも扉の前に、比較的新しい 足跡が多く残されているみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
しかも扉の前に、比較的新しい
足跡が多く残されているみたいね。

engChrName: Why don't we just head inside and find out for ourselves?
engSearchText:
Why don't we just head inside and find out
for ourselves?
jpnChrName: クク、只のネズミどもが 入り込んだんじゃなさそうだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、只のネズミどもが
入り込んだんじゃなさそうだなァ？

engChrName: I think the most prudent course may be to enter and discover the truth for ourselves.
engSearchText:
I think the most prudent course may be to enter and
discover the truth for ourselves.
jpnChrName: ああ──ビンゴだろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ──ビンゴだろう。

jpnChrName: 一応、様子を探ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 一応、様子を探ってみるぞ。

engChrName: This handle is broken, too...
engSearchText: This handle is broken, too...
jpnChrName: ただし何があるか分からねぇ…… 念のため準備は万全にしとけ。
jpnSearchText:
ただし何があるか分からねぇ……
念のため準備は万全にしとけ。

engChrName: There's no mistaking it, whoever did this just yanked the thing clean off.
engSearchText:
There's no mistaking it, whoever did this just yanked
the thing clean off.
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）……！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）……！

engChrName: Then they didn't use a tool after all...
engSearchText: Then they didn't use a tool after all...
jpnChrName: ……足りない装備があれば 揃えてきた方がよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……足りない装備があれば
揃えてきた方がよさそうですね。

engChrName: Whoever we're dealing with is far from ordinary.
engSearchText: Whoever we're dealing with is far from ordinary.
jpnChrName: 地下水道を進むと昼の解決業務が終了し、 ストーリーが進行するので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
地下水道を進むと昼の解決業務が終了し、
ストーリーが進行するので注意してください。

engChrName: We're dealing with a freakish level of strength, then.
engSearchText: We're dealing with a freakish level of strength, then.
jpnChrName: なお、解決事務所のメンバー全員が エリア攻略に参加することになります。
jpnSearchText:
なお、解決事務所のメンバー全員が
エリア攻略に参加することになります。

engChrName: What an absurd show of strength.
engSearchText: What an absurd show of strength.
jpnChrName: ……一方、革命記念祭でクレイユ村の 追悼式典が決まったことに加えて──
jpnSearchText:
……一方、革命記念祭でクレイユ村の
追悼式典が決まったことに加えて──

engChrName: There are a lot of fresh footprints in front of the door, too.
engSearchText:
There are a lot of fresh footprints in front of the
door, too.
jpnChrName: 共和国軍の次世代兵装の披露も改めて発表され、 国内外の注目が否が応でも集まっていく。
jpnSearchText:
共和国軍の次世代兵装の披露も改めて発表され、
国内外の注目が否が応でも集まっていく。

engChrName: There are a lot of fresh footprints in front of the door, too.
engSearchText:
There are a lot of fresh footprints in front of the
door, too.
jpnChrName: ──そんな中、記念祭に出席するため 多くの重要人物が首都入りを果たすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
──そんな中、記念祭に出席するため
多くの重要人物が首都入りを果たすのだった。

engChrName: There are a lot of fresh footprints in front of the door, too.
engSearchText:
There are a lot of fresh footprints in front of the
door, too.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは裏ルートを順調に進み──
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、ヴァンたちは裏ルートを順調に進み──

engChrName: Heh. Looks like we've got some huge-ass rats to flush out.
engSearchText:
Heh. Looks like we've got some huge-ass rats to
flush out.
jpnChrName: タイレル地区の地下鉄ホームの近くに 偽装された扉から出て、地上への階段を上った。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区の地下鉄ホームの近くに
偽装された扉から出て、地上への階段を上った。

engChrName: You got that right.
engSearchText: You got that right.
jpnChrName: こ、これは……
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……

engChrName: Let's have a look inside.
engSearchText: Let's have a look inside.
jpnChrName: おいおい……！ 南よりも酷くねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……！
南よりも酷くねぇか。

engChrName: Heads up, though—there's no tellin' what's waitin' for us in there. Be ready for anything, understand?
engSearchText:
Heads up, though—there's no tellin' what's waitin'
for us in there. Be ready for anything, understand?
jpnChrName: “元凶”により近いとはいえ、 まさかここまでとは……！
jpnSearchText:
“元凶”により近いとはいえ、
まさかここまでとは……！

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: ……いえ、 それだけでは無さそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……いえ、
それだけでは無さそうです。

engChrName: We should have time to stock up on equipment and items if need be.
engSearchText:
We should have time to stock up on equipment and
items if need be.
jpnChrName: ああ……！
jpnSearchText: ああ……！

engChrName: Entering the waterway will end the afternoon's activities and advance the main story.
engSearchText:
Entering the waterway will end the afternoon's
activities and advance the main story.

engChrName: All members of Arkride Solutions will participate in the next dungeon.
engSearchText:
All members of Arkride Solutions will participate in
the next dungeon.
jpnChrName: チッ、いきなりかよ！
jpnSearchText: チッ、いきなりかよ！

engChrName: The day approached with much suspense both at home and abroad, for what was to come following a memorial service set for Creil...
engSearchText:
The day approached with much suspense both at
home and abroad, for what was to come following a
memorial service set for Creil...
jpnChrName: 話は後だ──来るぞ！
jpnSearchText: 話は後だ──来るぞ！

engChrName: ...was the unveiling of the Republican Army's next generation of weapons.
engSearchText:
...was the unveiling of the Republican Army's next
generation of weapons.
jpnChrName: この霊子反応…… 脅威度中以上と推定！
jpnSearchText:
この霊子反応……
脅威度中以上と推定！

engChrName: A number of VIPs would soon descend upon the capital, ready to take part in moments both solemn and merry.
engSearchText:
A number of VIPs would soon descend upon the
capital, ready to take part in moments both solemn
and merry.
jpnChrName: うむ、中級悪魔のようだ！
jpnSearchText: うむ、中級悪魔のようだ！

engChrName: Moving with purpose, they made their way through one of the Blacklight District's secret passages...
engSearchText:
Moving with purpose, they made their way through
one of the Blacklight District's secret passages...
jpnChrName: 撃破する！ 師父（せんせい）も宜しく頼みます！
jpnSearchText:
撃破する！
師父（せんせい）も宜しく頼みます！

engChrName: ...and emerged from a well-concealed exit near the subway platforms in the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
...and emerged from a well-concealed exit near the
subway platforms in the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: くっ、いきなりとは カマしてくれんじゃねえか……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、いきなりとは
カマしてくれんじゃねえか……！

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...
jpnChrName: それにこの瘴気の濃さ…… ……気を引き締めないとっ……！
jpnSearchText:
それにこの瘴気の濃さ……
……気を引き締めないとっ……！

engChrName: Damn. It's even worse than the south side.
engSearchText: Damn. It's even worse than the south side.
jpnChrName: ……！ チッ、また来るぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
……！
チッ、また来るぞ！！

engChrName: I suspected the area close to the source would be heavily impacted, but I didn't imagine it would be quite this dire.
engSearchText:
I suspected the area close to the source would be
heavily impacted, but I didn't imagine it would be
quite this dire.

engChrName: We appear to have another problem, too.
engSearchText: We appear to have another problem, too.
jpnChrName: た、退路を……！？
jpnSearchText: た、退路を……！？

engChrName: No kiddin'.
engSearchText: No kiddin'.
jpnChrName: 増援──数は４、いえ５体！
jpnSearchText: 増援──数は４、いえ５体！

engChrName: A demon sphere!
engSearchText: A demon sphere!
jpnChrName: “魔球”による召喚── しかも無制限かもしれぬ！
jpnSearchText:
“魔球”による召喚──
しかも無制限かもしれぬ！

engChrName: Out of the pan and into the fire, huh?
engSearchText: Out of the pan and into the fire, huh?
jpnChrName: オイオイ、キリがねえだろ！？
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、キリがねえだろ！？

engChrName: Cut the chitchat, we've got company!
engSearchText: Cut the chitchat, we've got company!
jpnChrName: おい、いったん退け！
jpnSearchText: おい、いったん退け！

engChrName: These foes appear to be of moderate strength!
engSearchText: These foes appear to be of moderate strength!
jpnChrName: ジャック、ハル……！
jpnSearchText: ジャック、ハル……！

engChrName: Indeed. These devils are middle of the pack!
engSearchText: Indeed. These devils are middle of the pack!
jpnChrName: それにアニエスさんの……！
jpnSearchText: それにアニエスさんの……！

engChrName: Whatever they are, they're going down! C'mon!
engSearchText: Whatever they are, they're going down! C'mon!
jpnChrName: 無事だったかよ──！
jpnSearchText: 無事だったかよ──！

engChrName: Sheesh. Talk about a welcoming party.
engSearchText: Sheesh. Talk about a welcoming party.
jpnChrName: そっちこそな！ とにかくそこから離れろ！
jpnSearchText:
そっちこそな！
とにかくそこから離れろ！

engChrName: We need to be careful, the miasma is thick here!
engSearchText: We need to be careful, the miasma is thick here!
jpnChrName: “球”に近寄らない限り そこまで襲ってこないから！
jpnSearchText:
“球”に近寄らない限り
そこまで襲ってこないから！

engChrName: Bah, more already?!
engSearchText: Bah, more already?!
jpnChrName: ぐっ、離せオデット…… ……僕は行かなくっちゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ、離せオデット……
……僕は行かなくっちゃ……！

jpnChrName: そんな足でなに言ってんの！ いいから戻るわよ！
jpnSearchText:
そんな足でなに言ってんの！
いいから戻るわよ！

engChrName: Th-They've blocked our retreat!
engSearchText: Th-They've blocked our retreat!
jpnChrName: ご、ごめんヴァンさんたち！ 手伝ってくれない！？
jpnSearchText:
ご、ごめんヴァンさんたち！
手伝ってくれない！？

engChrName: Five new targets confirmed.
engSearchText: Five new targets confirmed.
jpnChrName: ああ……！
jpnSearchText: ああ……！

engChrName: I suspect the demon sphere can summon a neverending cavalcade of foes.
engSearchText:
I suspect the demon sphere can summon a
neverending cavalcade of foes.
jpnChrName: 私が運ぼう！
jpnSearchText: 私が運ぼう！

engChrName: Great...
engSearchText: Great...
jpnChrName: ──なるほど、そんな状況か。
jpnSearchText: ──なるほど、そんな状況か。

engChrName: Quick! Come this way!
engSearchText: Quick! Come this way!
jpnChrName: 黒月たちの動きから アルマータ絡みだとは思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
黒月たちの動きから
アルマータ絡みだとは思ったが。

engChrName: Jack! Halle!
engSearchText: Jack! Halle!
jpnChrName: まさかこの期に及んで こんな事をしでかすなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこの期に及んで
こんな事をしでかすなんて……

engChrName: Agnès' classmates, too!
engSearchText: Agnès' classmates, too!
jpnChrName: ……エンリケがいた頃の方が 遙かにマシだったじゃない……
jpnSearchText:
……エンリケがいた頃の方が
遙かにマシだったじゃない……

engChrName: Good to see you all in one piece.
engSearchText: Good to see you all in one piece.

engChrName: Yeah, same here! Now get out of there, already!
engSearchText: Yeah, same here! Now get out of there, already!
jpnChrName: ハルさん……
jpnSearchText: ハルさん……

engChrName: The monsters will give up if you get far enough away from that orb up there!
engSearchText:
The monsters will give up if you get far enough away
from that orb up there!
jpnChrName: たしかジェラールの前のボスに 使われてたって話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
たしかジェラールの前のボスに
使われてたって話だったか。

engChrName: Urgh... I need to go, Odette! Don't try and stop me!
engSearchText: Urgh... I need to go, Odette! Don't try and stop me!
jpnChrName: うん……といっても代打ちとして 手を貸していただけだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うん……といっても代打ちとして
手を貸していただけだけど。

engChrName: No way! What are you talking about?! You can barely walk!
engSearchText:
No way! What are you talking about?! You can
barely walk!
jpnChrName: もう７年くらい前になるかな……
jpnSearchText: もう７年くらい前になるかな……

engChrName: Can you please help me with him?
engSearchText: Can you please help me with him?
jpnChrName: その時はエンリケっていう 小物っぽいヤツがボスだったわ。
jpnSearchText:
その時はエンリケっていう
小物っぽいヤツがボスだったわ。

engChrName: Got this, Master?
engSearchText: Got this, Master?
jpnChrName: その時の若頭だったジェラールが 下手を打ったエンリケを粛正──
jpnSearchText:
その時の若頭だったジェラールが
下手を打ったエンリケを粛正──

engChrName: Easily!
engSearchText: Easily!
jpnChrName: 北のメッセルダム港に拠点を移して 今の体制になったみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
北のメッセルダム港に拠点を移して
今の体制になったみたいだが……

engChrName: So that's really how it is, huh?
engSearchText: So that's really how it is, huh?
jpnChrName: ヴァン──この際だから聞いておく。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン──この際だから聞いておく。

engChrName: Given the way Heiyue was acting, we figured Almata had somethin' to do with all this.
engSearchText:
Given the way Heiyue was acting, we figured Almata
had somethin' to do with all this.
jpnChrName: お前……ジェラールと どこかで面識でもあったのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
お前……ジェラールと
どこかで面識でもあったのかよ？

engChrName: I never thought they'd be capable of something like this, though.
engSearchText:
I never thought they'd be capable of something like
this, though.
jpnChrName: ………どうしてそう思う？
jpnSearchText: ………どうしてそう思う？

engChrName: None of this would be happening if Enrique was still their leader...
engSearchText:
None of this would be happening if Enrique was still
their leader...
jpnChrName: 俺も情報屋の端くれだから ヤツの経歴は色々探っていてな。
jpnSearchText:
俺も情報屋の端くれだから
ヤツの経歴は色々探っていてな。

engChrName: No use thinkin' about that now.
engSearchText: No use thinkin' about that now.
jpnChrName: ９年前、当時のアルマータに いきなり入ってきたようだが……
jpnSearchText:
９年前、当時のアルマータに
いきなり入ってきたようだが……

engChrName: Halle...
engSearchText: Halle...
jpnChrName: それ以前に何をしていたのか まったく分からなかったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それ以前に何をしていたのか
まったく分からなかったんだ。

engChrName: Oh, right. You got mixed up with that guy, didn't you?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. You got mixed up with that guy,
didn't you?
jpnChrName: ……まさか旧王家の末裔で 教団関係者とは思わなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
……まさか旧王家の末裔で
教団関係者とは思わなかったが。

engChrName: Yeah, but thankfully all I ever did was play cards for him.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but thankfully all I ever did was play cards
for him.
jpnChrName: で、これはディンゴのヤツも 薄々気になってたみてぇだが……
jpnSearchText:
で、これはディンゴのヤツも
薄々気になってたみてぇだが……

engChrName: It's been seven years now.
engSearchText: It's been seven years now.
jpnChrName: ヤツがアルマータに入ったのと お前がアラミスに入った時期──
jpnSearchText:
ヤツがアルマータに入ったのと
お前がアラミスに入った時期──

engChrName: Back then, Enrique was the leader of a much less dangerous Almata.
engSearchText:
Back then, Enrique was the leader of a much less
dangerous Almata.
jpnChrName: ほぼ同じくらいなんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: ほぼ同じくらいなんじゃねえか？

engChrName: After Enrique bit the dust, Dantès, who was the number two at the time, took over.
engSearchText:
After Enrique bit the dust, Dantès, who was the
number two at the time, took over.
jpnChrName: え、え……
jpnSearchText: え、え……

engChrName: He moved the whole operation up north to Messeldam, and the rest is history.
engSearchText:
He moved the whole operation up north to
Messeldam, and the rest is history.
jpnChrName: おいおい、ジャック。 そりゃいくらなんでも──
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、ジャック。
そりゃいくらなんでも──

engChrName: ...Say, Van. Got a question for you—though I don't like asking it.
engSearchText:
...Say, Van. Got a question for you—though I
don't like asking it.
jpnChrName: ヴァン……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……？

engChrName: You met Dantès before he took over Almata, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You met Dantès before he took over Almata,
didn't you?

engChrName: ...What makes you say that?
engSearchText: ...What makes you say that?
jpnChrName: へぼギャンブラーのカン程度なら 鼻で笑ってたところだが……
jpnSearchText:
へぼギャンブラーのカン程度なら
鼻で笑ってたところだが……

engChrName: I've been in the information game for a long time now.
engSearchText:
I've been in the information game for a long
time now.
jpnChrName: ディンゴにも掴まれてたっつーなら ちっと反論しづれえな。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴにも掴まれてたっつーなら
ちっと反論しづれえな。

engChrName: Couldn't help but hear all about when Dantès came onto the scene nine years back.
engSearchText:
Couldn't help but hear all about when Dantès came
onto the scene nine years back.
jpnChrName: そ、そういえばディンゴさんが 残していたファイルに……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そういえばディンゴさんが
残していたファイルに……

engChrName: 'Cept I never heard a peep about what he was up to before then.
engSearchText:
'Cept I never heard a peep about what he was up to
before then.

engChrName: Never would've guessed he was a cult leader AND former royalty at that.
engSearchText:
Never would've guessed he was a cult leader AND
former royalty at that.
jpnChrName: チッ、直前までの経歴が 不明っていうことも含めてか……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、直前までの経歴が
不明っていうことも含めてか……

engChrName: But that's not why I'm bringin' this up now.
engSearchText: But that's not why I'm bringin' this up now.
jpnChrName: ──その様子じゃメイドに ジジイも薄々気付いてたってか？
jpnSearchText:
──その様子じゃメイドに
ジジイも薄々気付いてたってか？

engChrName: Both Dingo and I noticed somethin': Dantès joined Almata and you enrolled at Aramis...
engSearchText:
Both Dingo and I noticed somethin': Dantès joined
Almata and you enrolled at Aramis...
jpnChrName: いえ……わたくしはＭＫとの契約時の 簡単な経歴調査を存じているのみです。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……わたくしはＭＫとの契約時の
簡単な経歴調査を存じているのみです。

engChrName: ...at almost the exact same time.
engSearchText: ...at almost the exact same time.
jpnChrName: ……私からも、語ることはないな。
jpnSearchText: ……私からも、語ることはないな。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: ってオイ……
jpnSearchText: ってオイ……

engChrName: Come on, Jack. Cut it...
engSearchText: Come on, Jack. Cut it...
jpnChrName: ア、アーロンさん、落ち着いてっ。
jpnSearchText: ア、アーロンさん、落ち着いてっ。

engChrName: ...Van?
engSearchText: ...Van?
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに俺が師父（せんせい）と “最初”に会ったのは１０年前……
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに俺が師父（せんせい）と
“最初”に会ったのは１０年前……

jpnChrName: ギルド主導のとある国際的な作戦を 師父（せんせい）がバックアップしてた時だ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルド主導のとある国際的な作戦を
師父（せんせい）がバックアップしてた時だ。

engChrName: If it were just you, I'd laugh the whole thing off as a gambler seein' patterns that ain't really there.
engSearchText:
If it were just you, I'd laugh the whole thing off as a
gambler seein' patterns that ain't really there.

engChrName: But if Dingo picked up on it, too, guess I'm not that lucky.
engSearchText:
But if Dingo picked up on it, too, guess I'm not
that lucky.
jpnChrName: そ、それって……
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……

engChrName: Now that I think about it, Dingo's notes did say something about a theory...
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, Dingo's notes did say
something about a theory...
jpnChrName: …………やっぱりか。
jpnSearchText: …………やっぱりか。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: ふう、アルベールってば なかなか言うことを聞いて──
jpnSearchText:
ふう、アルベールってば
なかなか言うことを聞いて──

engChrName: He also mentioned not knowing what Dantès was up to before joining Almata.
engSearchText:
He also mentioned not knowing what Dantès was up
to before joining Almata.
jpnChrName: ……ってどうしたの？
jpnSearchText: ……ってどうしたの？

engChrName: Don't tell me you two already knew about this?
engSearchText: Don't tell me you two already knew about this?
jpnChrName: ま、詳しい話は後だ。 まずはこっちが先決だろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、詳しい話は後だ。
まずはこっちが先決だろ。

engChrName: What I know is limited to the contents of his basic background check with Marduk.
engSearchText:
What I know is limited to the contents of his basic
background check with Marduk.
jpnChrName: ……っ、そうでした！
jpnSearchText: ……っ、そうでした！

engChrName: ...I'll abstain from commenting.
engSearchText: ...I'll abstain from commenting.
jpnChrName: アニエスとチート娘の話か。
jpnSearchText: アニエスとチート娘の話か。

engChrName: You son of a...
engSearchText: You son of a...
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちは その嬢ちゃんから聞くといい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そっちは
その嬢ちゃんから聞くといい。

engChrName: E-Easy, Aaron.
engSearchText: E-Easy, Aaron.
jpnChrName: ……？ ってそれ所じゃなかった！
jpnSearchText:
……？
ってそれ所じゃなかった！

engChrName: By the way, I first met Master ten years ago.
engSearchText: By the way, I first met Master ten years ago.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、アニエスと レン先輩を助けてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、アニエスと
レン先輩を助けてくださいっ！

engChrName: He was helpin' out with a major international operation spearheaded by the guild.
engSearchText:
He was helpin' out with a major international
operation spearheaded by the guild.
jpnChrName: ２人ともあの気持ち悪い“球”に 飲み込まれちゃって……！
jpnSearchText:
２人ともあの気持ち悪い“球”に
飲み込まれちゃって……！

jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: Y-You don't mean...
engSearchText: Y-You don't mean...
jpnChrName: それは一体──
jpnSearchText: それは一体──

engChrName: And everything finally clicks.
engSearchText: And everything finally clicks.
jpnChrName: ……詳しく話してくれるか？
jpnSearchText: ……詳しく話してくれるか？

engChrName: *sigh* That Albert will not listen to a word I say...
engSearchText: *sigh* That Albert will not listen to a word I say...
jpnChrName: は、はい……あの時あたしたち、 学藝祭の打ち合わせをしてて……
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……あの時あたしたち、
学藝祭の打ち合わせをしてて……

engChrName: Uh... Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Uh... Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: 大いなる魔を、第七の遺産によって展開する、 《汎魔（パンデモニウム）化》という名の夜明けを！！
jpnSearchText:
大いなる魔を、第七の遺産によって展開する、
《汎魔（パンデモニウム）化》という名の夜明けを！！

engChrName: Nothin' important. We've got more pressin' problems.
engSearchText:
Nothin' important. We've got more
pressin' problems.
jpnChrName: レン先輩、これって……！
jpnSearchText: レン先輩、これって……！

engChrName: Yeah, we still haven't found Agnès yet.
engSearchText: Yeah, we still haven't found Agnès yet.
jpnChrName: 流石に予想外すぎるけど…… ──あなた達、気を付けなさい！
jpnSearchText:
流石に予想外すぎるけど……
──あなた達、気を付けなさい！

engChrName: The super schoolgirl's not here either.
engSearchText: The super schoolgirl's not here either.
jpnChrName: うわあああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うわあああっ……！？

engChrName: The young miss can actually fill you in on all that.
engSearchText: The young miss can actually fill you in on all that.
jpnChrName: こ、これって……
jpnSearchText: こ、これって……

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, right!
engSearchText: Hmm? Oh, right!
jpnSearchText: え……？

engChrName: You need to help Agnès and Renne! Please!
engSearchText: You need to help Agnès and Renne! Please!
jpnChrName: 人が……停まって……？
jpnSearchText: 人が……停まって……？

engChrName: That creepy orb thing sucked them in!
engSearchText: That creepy orb thing sucked them in!
jpnChrName: 時空間への何らかの干渉！？
jpnSearchText: 時空間への何らかの干渉！？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかこれもゲネシスの……
jpnSearchText: ま、まさかこれもゲネシスの……

engChrName: Could you start from the beginning?
engSearchText: Could you start from the beginning?
jpnChrName: なああっ！？
jpnSearchText: なああっ！？

engChrName: And don't skimp on the details, anything may be important here.
engSearchText:
And don't skimp on the details, anything may be
important here.
jpnChrName: な、なにあれ……！？
jpnSearchText: な、なにあれ……！？

engChrName: O-Of course. We'd all gathered to discuss the school festival when that broadcast started...
engSearchText:
O-Of course. We'd all gathered to discuss the school
festival when that broadcast started...
jpnChrName: ……！　ゲネシスが……！？
jpnSearchText: ……！　ゲネシスが……！？

engChrName: Witness and cower as this relic ends all things by ushering in a new dawn: Pandemonium!
engSearchText:
Witness and cower as this relic ends all things by
ushering in a new dawn: Pandemonium!
jpnChrName: いけない── アニエス、離れなさい！
jpnSearchText:
いけない──
アニエス、離れなさい！

engChrName: Renne!
engSearchText: Renne!
jpnChrName: きゃあああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: きゃあああっ……！？

engChrName: This is certainly unexpected... Everyone, stay on your guard!
engSearchText:
This is certainly unexpected... Everyone, stay on
your guard!
jpnChrName: アニエス──！？
jpnSearchText: アニエス──！？

engChrName: Whaaa...?!
engSearchText: Whaaa...?!
jpnChrName: いやああああっ！？
jpnSearchText: いやああああっ！？

engChrName: Wh-What in the world...?
engSearchText: Wh-What in the world...?
jpnChrName: くっ……！
jpnSearchText: くっ……！

engChrName: Everyone's...
engSearchText: Everyone's...
jpnChrName: ……これは内部空間…… 取り込もうとするつもり……！？
jpnSearchText:
……これは内部空間……
取り込もうとするつもり……！？

engChrName: ...frozen?
engSearchText: ...frozen?
jpnChrName: くっ……持たないか。
jpnSearchText: くっ……持たないか。

engChrName: Is this some kind of spacetime interference?!
engSearchText: Is this some kind of spacetime interference?!
jpnChrName: ──あなた達は離れなさい！ 東方料理屋にでも行くといいわ！
jpnSearchText:
──あなた達は離れなさい！
東方料理屋にでも行くといいわ！

engChrName: Could it be because of the Genesis...?
engSearchText: Could it be because of the Genesis...?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋さんかそれ以外か…… 頼れそうな人が来たら状況を説明して！
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋さんかそれ以外か……
頼れそうな人が来たら状況を説明して！

engChrName: Whoa!
engSearchText: Whoa!
jpnChrName: それまで何とか凌いでみせるから！
jpnSearchText: それまで何とか凌いでみせるから！

engChrName: I-Is that an...orb?
engSearchText: I-Is that an...orb?
jpnChrName: うおおおっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うおおおっ……！？

engChrName: Huh?! My Genesis is reacting!
engSearchText: Huh?! My Genesis is reacting!
jpnChrName: ば、化物……！？ アルベール、いったん離れるわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ば、化物……！？
アルベール、いったん離れるわよ！

engChrName: Oh, no... Agnès, get away!
engSearchText: Oh, no... Agnès, get away!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事が…… ──ヴァンさんっ……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな事が……
──ヴァンさんっ……！

engChrName: Aaaah!
engSearchText: Aaaah!
jpnChrName: ああ、これまでと違うパターンだが やるべき事は変わらねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これまでと違うパターンだが
やるべき事は変わらねぇだろ。

engChrName: Agnès!
engSearchText: Agnès!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、２人は大丈夫！？ 食べられちゃったりしてないよね！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、２人は大丈夫！？
食べられちゃったりしてないよね！？

engChrName: Nooooo!
engSearchText: Nooooo!
jpnChrName: ああ、心配すんな。 今のところは無事みたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、心配すんな。
今のところは無事みたいだ。

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: レンが凌いでるってのもあるだろうが 危害を加えるのが目的じゃねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
レンが凌いでるってのもあるだろうが
危害を加えるのが目的じゃねえだろ。

engChrName: It's trying to absorb her into its phase space...!
engSearchText: It's trying to absorb her into its phase space...!
jpnChrName: ハン、どうしてそんな事が 分かるのか突っ込みたい所だが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、どうしてそんな事が
分かるのか突っ込みたい所だが……

engChrName: ...I can't hold on much longer.
engSearchText: ...I can't hold on much longer.
jpnChrName: 折角のご指名だ──今はとっとと お嬢ちゃんたちを解放してこい！
jpnSearchText:
折角のご指名だ──今はとっとと
お嬢ちゃんたちを解放してこい！

engChrName: Albert, Odette, go hide at the Eastern restaurant down the street!
engSearchText:
Albert, Odette, go hide at the Eastern restaurant
down the street!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、アーロンたちも頼んだわよ！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、アーロンたちも頼んだわよ！

engChrName: If someone dependable like the spriggan comes by, tell them what happened!
engSearchText:
If someone dependable like the spriggan comes by,
tell them what happened!
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せとけ。

engChrName: We'll be sure to survive until then!
engSearchText: We'll be sure to survive until then!
jpnChrName: ハッ、速攻でケリを付けてやるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、速攻でケリを付けてやるぜ。

engChrName: Aaaaah!
engSearchText: Aaaaah!

engChrName: M-Monsters?! W-We've got to get out of here!
engSearchText: M-Monsters?! W-We've got to get out of here!
jpnChrName: きゃああ……！？
jpnSearchText: きゃああ……！？

engChrName: Th-That's awful... We've got to go and save them!
engSearchText: Th-That's awful... We've got to go and save them!
jpnChrName: なんだこのプレッシャーは！？
jpnSearchText: なんだこのプレッシャーは！？

engChrName: Yeah. Even if it's different than the spheres before, what we've gotta do hasn't changed.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Even if it's different than the spheres before,
what we've gotta do hasn't changed.
jpnChrName: 霊子反応、数倍以上に増大……！
jpnSearchText: 霊子反応、数倍以上に増大……！

engChrName: They're both okay, right?! They haven't been eaten in there or anything?!
engSearchText:
They're both okay, right?! They haven't been eaten in
there or anything?!
jpnChrName: これは……何らかの形で 霊力を取り込んでいるのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
これは……何らかの形で
霊力を取り込んでいるのか……！？

engChrName: Don't worry. They're just fine.
engSearchText: Don't worry. They're just fine.
jpnChrName: イヤ……わたしじゃない…… ……それはわたしじゃないっ……！
jpnSearchText:
イヤ……わたしじゃない……
……それはわたしじゃないっ……！

engChrName: For one thing, Renne's not about to go down that easy, but those spheres don't seem like they're out to hurt anyone to begin with.
engSearchText:
For one thing, Renne's not about to go down that
easy, but those spheres don't seem like they're out to
hurt anyone to begin with.
jpnChrName: クロス……どこ…… ……隠れてないで出てきてよおおっ！
jpnSearchText:
クロス……どこ……
……隠れてないで出てきてよおおっ！

engChrName: Hmph. I'm curious why you're so sure of that, but I guess now ain't really the time.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I'm curious why you're so sure of that, but I
guess now ain't really the time.
jpnChrName: 先輩……レン先輩！ しっかりしてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
先輩……レン先輩！
しっかりしてくださいっ！

engChrName: Just go bring 'em back safely for us!
engSearchText: Just go bring 'em back safely for us!
jpnChrName: （過去のトラウマを取り込んで……）
jpnSearchText: （過去のトラウマを取り込んで……）

engChrName: We're counting on you guys!
engSearchText: We're counting on you guys!
jpnChrName: （クソ……何とか魔球に   手が届きさえすれば──！）
jpnSearchText:
（クソ……何とか魔球に
手が届きさえすれば──！）

engChrName: You don't need to tell me twice.
engSearchText: You don't need to tell me twice.
jpnChrName: ──やれやれ、 間に合ったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
──やれやれ、
間に合ったみたいだな。

engChrName: Heh. We'll be back before you know it.
engSearchText: Heh. We'll be back before you know it.
jpnChrName: クク、手が必要かよ？
jpnSearchText: クク、手が必要かよ？

engChrName: Ugh...!
engSearchText: Ugh...!
jpnChrName: 不動に痩せ狼……！
jpnSearchText: 不動に痩せ狼……！

engChrName: How the hell is it pushing us back?!
engSearchText: How the hell is it pushing us back?!
jpnChrName: 霊圧が……！
jpnSearchText: 霊圧が……！

engChrName: It's intensifying!
engSearchText: It's intensifying!
jpnChrName: 動けんぞ──！
jpnSearchText: 動けんぞ──！

engChrName: Somehow it's absorbing our mana!
engSearchText: Somehow it's absorbing our mana!

engChrName: No... That wasn't me! That wasn't me!
engSearchText: No... That wasn't me! That wasn't me!
jpnChrName: いかん──ヴァン、征くぞ！
jpnSearchText: いかん──ヴァン、征くぞ！

engChrName: Cross? Where are you?! Please, come back...!
engSearchText: Cross? Where are you?! Please, come back...!
jpnChrName: ええ──！ すまねえ、恩に着るぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ええ──！
すまねえ、恩に着るぜ！

engChrName: Renne! You can't lose sight of yourself!
engSearchText: Renne! You can't lose sight of yourself!
jpnChrName: いいってことよ！ ヴァルター、俺も行くから任せた！
jpnSearchText:
いいってことよ！
ヴァルター、俺も行くから任せた！

engChrName: (It's feedin' on her trauma...)
engSearchText: (It's feedin' on her trauma...)
jpnChrName: クカカ、いいだろう！ せいぜい抑えといてやるよ！
jpnSearchText:
クカカ、いいだろう！
せいぜい抑えといてやるよ！

engChrName: (Damn it. If only I could reach it!)
engSearchText: (Damn it. If only I could reach it!)
jpnChrName: カカ、昔馴染みもいるんでなァ！ ──ジン、ここは抑えとけ！
jpnSearchText:
カカ、昔馴染みもいるんでなァ！
──ジン、ここは抑えとけ！

engChrName: Looks like we're not a minute too soon.
engSearchText: Looks like we're not a minute too soon.
jpnChrName: いいだろう！ アークライドたちも頼んだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう！
アークライドたちも頼んだぞ！

engChrName: Hope you're down for us lendin' you a hand.
engSearchText: Hope you're down for us lendin' you a hand.
jpnChrName: ハッハーッ、黙ってろやクソ球ァ！！
jpnSearchText: ハッハーッ、黙ってろやクソ球ァ！！

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: 泰斗流奥義──《龍神掌破》！！
jpnSearchText: 泰斗流奥義──《龍神掌破》！！

engChrName: Zin and the Direwolf!
engSearchText: Zin and the Direwolf!

engChrName: Its power has been suppressed!
engSearchText: Its power has been suppressed!
jpnChrName: ハッ…… こっちの魔球も消えたか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
こっちの魔球も消えたか。

engChrName: I can move again!
engSearchText: I can move again!
jpnChrName: クク、まあ及第点をやるよ。
jpnSearchText: クク、まあ及第点をやるよ。

engChrName: Uh-oh!
engSearchText: Uh-oh!
jpnChrName: ああ── よくやったなお前たち。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
よくやったなお前たち。

engChrName: Van, the time is now!
engSearchText: Van, the time is now!
jpnChrName: 先輩、大丈夫ですかっ！？
jpnSearchText: 先輩、大丈夫ですかっ！？

engChrName: Right! I owe you guys one!
engSearchText: Right! I owe you guys one!
jpnChrName: ええ……こっちに戻ってきたら 急に調子が戻ってきたわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……こっちに戻ってきたら
急に調子が戻ってきたわね。

engChrName: Don't sweat it! Hold down the fort, Walter—I'm going in!
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it! Hold down the fort, Walter—I'm
going in!
jpnChrName: ──お姫様気分も悪くないし もう少しこのままでも良いんだけど㈱
jpnSearchText:
──お姫様気分も悪くないし
もう少しこのままでも良いんだけど㈱

engChrName: I'll give this thing a piece of my mind.
engSearchText: I'll give this thing a piece of my mind.
jpnChrName: あのな……
jpnSearchText: あのな……

engChrName: I've got an old pal in there to save, so I'll leave the outside to you, Zin!
engSearchText:
I've got an old pal in there to save, so I'll leave the
outside to you, Zin!
jpnChrName: も、もう…… でもまだ無理はしないでください。
jpnSearchText:
も、もう……
でもまだ無理はしないでください。

engChrName: Got it. Take care of Arkride and the others!
engSearchText: Got it. Take care of Arkride and the others!
jpnChrName: おーい……！
jpnSearchText: <S3>おーい……！

engChrName: Quit messing with me, ya damn ball!
engSearchText: Quit messing with me, ya damn ball!
jpnChrName: よかったアニエス……！ レン先輩も大丈夫ですか～！？
jpnSearchText:
よかったアニエス……！
レン先輩も大丈夫ですか～！？

engChrName: Take this! Divine Dragon Fist!
engSearchText: Take this! Divine Dragon Fist!
jpnChrName: オデット……うん、大丈夫！
jpnSearchText: オデット……うん、大丈夫！

engChrName: We're back...
engSearchText: We're back...
jpnChrName: はああっ…… 何とかなったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
はああっ……
何とかなったみたいね。

engChrName: Another sphere done and dusted.
engSearchText: Another sphere done and dusted.
jpnChrName: ああ、色々あるようだが ヤツはヤツだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、色々あるようだが
ヤツはヤツだからな。

engChrName: Heh. You all weren't half bad.
engSearchText: Heh. You all weren't half bad.
jpnChrName: よ、よかった、瘴気も消えたし……
jpnSearchText: よ、よかった、瘴気も消えたし……

engChrName: Nice job, everyone.
engSearchText: Nice job, everyone.
jpnChrName: ってまだ危ないんだから くれぐれも気をつけてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
ってまだ危ないんだから
くれぐれも気をつけてくれ！

engChrName: Are you all right, Renne?!
engSearchText: Are you all right, Renne?!
jpnChrName: ったく、揃って登場とは…… 前の勝負は何だったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ったく、揃って登場とは……
前の勝負は何だったんだ？

engChrName: Yes. As soon as we returned I started feeling much better.
engSearchText:
Yes. As soon as we returned I started feeling
much better.
jpnChrName: いや、それまで完全に 別方面で動いていたんだがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、それまで完全に
別方面で動いていたんだがなぁ。

engChrName: I wouldn't mind being cradled like a princess for a while longer, though. ㈱
engSearchText:
I wouldn't mind being cradled like a princess for a
while longer, though. ㈱
jpnChrName: 一回りした所に 偶然カチ合っちまっただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
一回りした所に
偶然カチ合っちまっただけだ。

engChrName: Come on, now...
engSearchText: Come on, now...
jpnChrName: しかしルクレツィアはまだ動いてねぇのか。 相変わらずものぐさな女だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしルクレツィアはまだ動いてねぇのか。
相変わらずものぐさな女だぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* If you can tease like that, then you really are back to normal.
engSearchText:
*sigh* If you can tease like that, then you really are
back to normal.
jpnChrName: その人も確か《結社》の……
jpnSearchText: その人も確か《結社》の……

engChrName: Heeey!
engSearchText: Heeey!
jpnChrName: 《黄金蝶》だったか…… 聞いてた以上にフリーダムだな。
jpnSearchText:
《黄金蝶》だったか……
聞いてた以上にフリーダムだな。

engChrName: I'm so glad to see you both! Is everyone okay?!
engSearchText: I'm so glad to see you both! Is everyone okay?!
jpnChrName: それと、あのレンって子も 元々は所属してたって話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
それと、あのレンって子も
元々は所属してたって話だったか。

engChrName: Odette! Yes, we're fine!
engSearchText: Odette! Yes, we're fine!
jpnChrName: ハン、抜けた小娘を助けるとは 顔に似合わずお優しいじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、抜けた小娘を助けるとは
顔に似合わずお優しいじゃねえか？

engChrName: Thank goodness.
engSearchText: Thank goodness.
jpnChrName: クク、ちっこい頃から知ってたから 親戚のガキみたいなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ちっこい頃から知ってたから
親戚のガキみたいなもんだ。

engChrName: Yeah. Glad that spiky-haired softie's still in one piece. I've got some questions for him.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Glad that spiky-haired softie's still in one piece.
I've got some questions for him.
jpnChrName: 今の生き方が良いか悪いかは知らんが 自分で決めたのならいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
今の生き方が良いか悪いかは知らんが
自分で決めたのならいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: That creepy miasma's gone, too.
engSearchText: That creepy miasma's gone, too.
jpnChrName: ──どうやら完全に“過去”と 決別できてるわけじゃねえようだが。
jpnSearchText:
──どうやら完全に“過去”と
決別できてるわけじゃねえようだが。

engChrName: But that doesn't mean you should go rushing out on your own! Be more careful!
engSearchText:
But that doesn't mean you should go rushing out on
your own! Be more careful!

engChrName: Never expected you two to roll up together. Was that fist fight before just for show or what?
engSearchText:
Never expected you two to roll up together. Was that
fist fight before just for show or what?
jpnChrName: ……そいつは…… 誰だって同じだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……そいつは……
誰だって同じだろう。

engChrName: Of course not. This isn't a formal partnership.
engSearchText: Of course not. This isn't a formal partnership.
jpnChrName: 俺も勿論だが── アンタらや室長さんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
俺も勿論だが──
アンタらや室長さんだってな。

engChrName: Just happened to run into each other after goin' around the city.
engSearchText:
Just happened to run into each other after goin'
around the city.

engChrName: That damn Lucrezia still ain't carrying her weight. A real slacker as always.
engSearchText:
That damn Lucrezia still ain't carrying her weight.
A real slacker as always.
jpnChrName: まあ、否定はしないぜ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、否定はしないぜ。

engChrName: I remember that name...
engSearchText: I remember that name...
jpnChrName: まったく、人をダシにして しんみりしないでちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、人をダシにして
しんみりしないでちょうだい。

engChrName: The society's Golden Butterfly, right? You guys really are free spirits.
engSearchText:
The society's Golden Butterfly, right? You guys really
are free spirits.
jpnChrName: クク、悪いな。
jpnSearchText: クク、悪いな。

engChrName: Come to think of it, Renne used to be a member too, didn't she?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, Renne used to be a member too,
didn't she?
jpnChrName: 優等生の方は大丈夫か？
jpnSearchText: 優等生の方は大丈夫か？

engChrName: Why save a traitor? Is the Direwolf all bark and no bite after all?
engSearchText:
Why save a traitor? Is the Direwolf all bark and no
bite after all?
jpnChrName: はい……でも無理をしたらしくて しばらく安静にした方がいいって。
jpnSearchText:
はい……でも無理をしたらしくて
しばらく安静にした方がいいって。

engChrName: Slow your roll, Red. I've known the girl since she was little. We're practically family.
engSearchText:
Slow your roll, Red. I've known the girl since she was
little. We're practically family.
jpnChrName: でも良かったです。 無事、また４人で会えて。
jpnSearchText:
でも良かったです。
無事、また４人で会えて。

engChrName: And I'm not here to judge her. Long as she's choosing for herself, that's all that matters.
engSearchText:
And I'm not here to judge her. Long as she's
choosing for herself, that's all that matters.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Not sure she's totally gotten away from her past, though.
engSearchText:
Not sure she's totally gotten away from her
past, though.
jpnChrName: わ、わたしたちもそうですよっ！
jpnSearchText: わ、わたしたちもそうですよっ！

jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……ふふっ、 無事で本当に良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん……ふふっ、
無事で本当に良かったです。

engChrName: ...Can't blame her. How many of us truly have?
engSearchText: ...Can't blame her. How many of us truly have?
jpnChrName: アーロンさんにリゼットさん、 ベルガルドさんも……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんにリゼットさん、
ベルガルドさんも……

engChrName: I sure as hell haven't, and somethin' tells me you two and that chief you're friends with haven't either.
engSearchText:
I sure as hell haven't, and somethin' tells me you two
and that chief you're friends with haven't either.
jpnChrName: それに──ヴァンさんも。
jpnSearchText: それに──ヴァンさんも。

engChrName: ...Heh.
engSearchText: ...Heh.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: Can't argue with you there.
engSearchText: Can't argue with you there.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… ご無事で何よりでした。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
ご無事で何よりでした。

engChrName: Don't you know it's rude to use others as an excuse for your heart-to-heart talks?
engSearchText:
Don't you know it's rude to use others as an excuse
for your heart-to-heart talks?
jpnChrName: うむ、おぬしらが互いに 信じた故の再会でもあろう。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、おぬしらが互いに
信じた故の再会でもあろう。

engChrName: Heheh. Sorry, kiddo.
engSearchText: Heheh. Sorry, kiddo.
jpnChrName: こっ恥ずかしいのは止めてください。 ──でもま、これでバイト再開だな？
jpnSearchText:
こっ恥ずかしいのは止めてください。
──でもま、これでバイト再開だな？

engChrName: How's the poindexter doin'?
engSearchText: How's the poindexter doin'?
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Albert's fine, but worn out and in need of rest.
engSearchText: Albert's fine, but worn out and in need of rest.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……

engChrName: I'm just glad the four of us are back together again.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad the four of us are back
together again.
jpnChrName: やれやれ。 ハードボイルドには程遠そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ。
ハードボイルドには程遠そうだな。

engChrName: Happy for you.
engSearchText: Happy for you.
jpnChrName: 元々向いてないんじゃない？ 本人が気取ってるだけで。
jpnSearchText:
元々向いてないんじゃない？
本人が気取ってるだけで。

engChrName: I-I'm glad we finally found you, too!
engSearchText: I-I'm glad we finally found you, too!
jpnChrName: そんなことねえっつの！
jpnSearchText: そんなことねえっつの！

engChrName: Aww... It's good to see you again, too, Feri.
engSearchText: Aww... It's good to see you again, too, Feri.
jpnChrName: ……って和やかなのはここまでだ。 アニエスが戻ったのはいいとして。
jpnSearchText:
……って和やかなのはここまでだ。
アニエスが戻ったのはいいとして。

engChrName: And Aaron, Risette, and Bergard...
engSearchText: And Aaron, Risette, and Bergard...
jpnChrName: レン──お前さんに会えたら ちょいと確認したいことがあった。
jpnSearchText:
レン──お前さんに会えたら
ちょいと確認したいことがあった。

engChrName: And Van, too, of course.
engSearchText: And Van, too, of course.
jpnChrName: あら……
jpnSearchText: あら……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: We were deeply concerned for your safety.
engSearchText: We were deeply concerned for your safety.
jpnChrName: アルマータの狙いの推測？ この事態の打開についての相談？
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの狙いの推測？
この事態の打開についての相談？

engChrName: Indeed, but we never stopped believing that we would be reunited once more.
engSearchText:
Indeed, but we never stopped believing that we would
be reunited once more.
jpnChrName: それとも──停まっている人と そうでない人の法則性についてかしら？
jpnSearchText:
それとも──停まっている人と
そうでない人の法則性についてかしら？

engChrName: Ugh. That's sappy as hell... Anywho, you ready to come back to work?
engSearchText:
Ugh. That's sappy as hell... Anywho, you ready to
come back to work?

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授が 質問されていた……
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授が
質問されていた……

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの人も 天才だし気付いてたか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの人も
天才だし気付いてたか。

engChrName: Sheesh. Who does he think he's foolin' with that tough-guy act?
engSearchText:
Sheesh. Who does he think he's foolin' with that
tough-guy act?
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？

engChrName: Oh, I'm sure he realizes we've figured him out by now.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm sure he realizes we've figured him out
by now.
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: I heard that!
engSearchText: I heard that!
jpnChrName: ま、どれも知恵は借りたいが さし当たっては最後のヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、どれも知恵は借りたいが
さし当たっては最後のヤツだ。

engChrName: Back to business.
engSearchText: Back to business.
jpnChrName: 俺自身が直感している分、 客観的な分析が聞きたくてな。
jpnSearchText:
俺自身が直感している分、
客観的な分析が聞きたくてな。

engChrName: I've got a serious question I've been wantin' to ask you, Renne.
engSearchText:
I've got a serious question I've been wantin' to ask
you, Renne.
jpnChrName: ええ──いいわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ──いいわ。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: それじゃあヴァンさん、助手さんたち、 ヴァルターにジンさんにギャンブラーさんも。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあヴァンさん、助手さんたち、
ヴァルターにジンさんにギャンブラーさんも。

engChrName: Is something wrong...?
engSearchText: Is something wrong...?
jpnChrName: この異変が始まって覚えている限り、 “停まってなかった”人を言ってみて。
jpnSearchText:
この異変が始まって覚えている限り、
“停まってなかった”人を言ってみて。

engChrName: Are you wondering what Almata is after? Or perhaps how to restore peace to the city?
engSearchText:
Are you wondering what Almata is after? Or perhaps
how to restore peace to the city?

engChrName: Could it be why some people can move but others can't?
engSearchText:
Could it be why some people can move but
others can't?
jpnChrName: なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: なんだと……！？

engChrName: Professor Cronkite raised the same issue with us, actually...
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite raised the same issue with
us, actually...
jpnChrName: ぐ、偶然、ですよね……？
jpnSearchText: ぐ、偶然、ですよね……？

engChrName: The man is a bona fide genius, so color me unsurprised that he put it together already.
engSearchText:
The man is a bona fide genius, so color me
unsurprised that he put it together already.
jpnChrName: ……常識で考えればな。
jpnSearchText: ……常識で考えればな。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: だが、事態打開の手がかりとなるなら 目を向けざるを得まい。
jpnSearchText:
だが、事態打開の手がかりとなるなら
目を向けざるを得まい。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ええ──さすがに 俺も面食らっちまいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ──さすがに
俺も面食らっちまいましたが……

engChrName: Much as I want to hear all your answers to those, that last one was what I had in mind.
engSearchText:
Much as I want to hear all your answers to those, that
last one was what I had in mind.
jpnChrName: ま、まさか停まっていないのが ヴァンの知り合いだけ──
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか停まっていないのが
ヴァンの知り合いだけ──

engChrName: I've got a hunch, but I need someone who ain't me to say whether I'm goin' crazy or not.
engSearchText:
I've got a hunch, but I need someone who ain't me to
say whether I'm goin' crazy or not.
jpnChrName: 少なくともてめえが一度でも 話したことがあるヤツだけとはな。
jpnSearchText:
少なくともてめえが一度でも
話したことがあるヤツだけとはな。

engChrName: Very well.
engSearchText: Very well.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱそうか。 何となく分かっちゃいたが。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱそうか。
何となく分かっちゃいたが。

engChrName: For everyone not in the loop, I'll pose this as a challenge.
engSearchText:
For everyone not in the loop, I'll pose this
as a challenge.
jpnChrName: 客観的な分析で 斬ってくれてスッキリしたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
客観的な分析で
斬ってくれてスッキリしたぜ。

engChrName: Think back—try to recall who you have seen that can still move since this crisis began.
engSearchText:
Think back—try to recall who you have seen that can
still move since this crisis began.
jpnChrName: ふう、そういう役目をレンに 押し付けないで欲しいんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、そういう役目をレンに
押し付けないで欲しいんだけど。

engChrName: O...kay.
engSearchText: O...kay.
jpnChrName: どうやら貴方も気付いてたみたいね？
jpnSearchText: どうやら貴方も気付いてたみたいね？

engChrName: Where's this going?
engSearchText: Where's this going?
jpnChrName: ……俺はギャンブラーなんでな。 人よりそういうカンは鋭いつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
……俺はギャンブラーなんでな。
人よりそういうカンは鋭いつもりだ。

jpnChrName: 何故かは分からねえし、どっちかっつうと さっきの話の方が気になる口だが。
jpnSearchText:
何故かは分からねえし、どっちかっつうと
さっきの話の方が気になる口だが。

engChrName: Wait... Th-This has to be a coincidence, right?
engSearchText: Wait... Th-This has to be a coincidence, right?

engChrName: It's the only thing that makes sense...
engSearchText: It's the only thing that makes sense...
jpnChrName: ……先ほど少し聞きましたけど。
jpnSearchText: ……先ほど少し聞きましたけど。

engChrName: If the truth of this matter can be used to resolve this crisis, we acknowledge it head on.
engSearchText:
If the truth of this matter can be used to resolve this
crisis, we acknowledge it head on.
jpnChrName: 貴方がジェラール・ダンテスと 過去面識があったどうか、かしら？
jpnSearchText:
貴方がジェラール・ダンテスと
過去面識があったどうか、かしら？

engChrName: That's a tough pill to swallow, but you're right.
engSearchText: That's a tough pill to swallow, but you're right.
jpnChrName: ──結論を言っちまうと “面識”は無いが“因縁”はあった。
jpnSearchText:
──結論を言っちまうと
“面識”は無いが“因縁”はあった。

engChrName: You seriously think the only people who can move are the ones that know Van?!
engSearchText:
You seriously think the only people who can move are
the ones that know Van?!
jpnChrName: 向こうは俺のことを 俺として認識すらしてなかっただろう。
jpnSearchText:
向こうは俺のことを
俺として認識すらしてなかっただろう。

engChrName: One chat could be the difference between bein' frozen or not.
engSearchText:
One chat could be the difference between bein'
frozen or not.
jpnChrName: よくてモルモット──いやただの “抜け殻”に過ぎなかっただろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
よくてモルモット──いやただの
“抜け殻”に過ぎなかっただろうからな。

engChrName: So you guys reached the same conclusion, huh?
engSearchText: So you guys reached the same conclusion, huh?

engChrName: Glad I haven't completely lost it yet.
engSearchText: Glad I haven't completely lost it yet.
jpnChrName: ……そいつは………
jpnSearchText: ……そいつは………

engChrName: *sigh* Why did I get saddled with explaining?
engSearchText: *sigh* Why did I get saddled with explaining?

engChrName: You could have backed me up, you know?
engSearchText: You could have backed me up, you know?
jpnChrName: ふぅん…… やっぱりそう、なのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅん……
やっぱりそう、なのね。

engChrName: Gambling's made my instincts better than most, but I ain't a scientist.
engSearchText:
Gambling's made my instincts better than most, but I
ain't a scientist.
jpnChrName: クカカ…… そう繋がりやがるとはなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クカカ……
そう繋がりやがるとはなァ。

engChrName: Even if I can guess what's happenin', I couldn't tell you why. Honestly, though, I'd rather continue that topic from earlier.
engSearchText:
Even if I can guess what's happenin', I couldn't tell
you why. Honestly, though, I'd rather continue that
topic from earlier.
jpnChrName: ……あ、頭がまだ ついて行けてない、ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
……あ、頭がまだ
ついて行けてない、ですけど。

engChrName: Oh, right...
engSearchText: Oh, right...
jpnChrName: 例の連中がエグい人体実験を してたっつーのは聞いてたが……
jpnSearchText:
例の連中がエグい人体実験を
してたっつーのは聞いてたが……

engChrName: I think I heard someone mention it when we got back.
engSearchText:
I think I heard someone mention it when we
got back.

engChrName: The issue of whether Van and Dantès met before Dantès joined Almata, correct?
engSearchText:
The issue of whether Van and Dantès met before
Dantès joined Almata, correct?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、さん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、さん……

engChrName: The long and short of it is that while I didn't really know the guy directly, we did have an indirect connection.
engSearchText:
The long and short of it is that while I didn't really
know the guy directly, we did have an
indirect connection.
jpnChrName: ……ま、そこは今はいいだろ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、そこは今はいいだろ。

engChrName: Even then, I doubt he even saw me as a human being.
engSearchText: Even then, I doubt he even saw me as a human being.
jpnChrName: “停まってない”のが俺の知り合いだけで 死んだ筈のジェラールが動いている……
jpnSearchText:
“停まってない”のが俺の知り合いだけで
死んだ筈のジェラールが動いている……

engChrName: At best, he'd think me a guinea pig. At worst, I was just an empty husk.
engSearchText:
At best, he'd think me a guinea pig. At worst, I was
just an empty husk.
jpnChrName: だとすれば、連中の狙いは多分──
jpnSearchText: だとすれば、連中の狙いは多分──

jpnChrName: 時空停止中に……！
jpnSearchText: 時空停止中に……！

engChrName: Wait...
engSearchText: Wait...
jpnChrName: どうやら都合のいい カラクリを使っているみたいね！
jpnSearchText:
どうやら都合のいい
カラクリを使っているみたいね！

jpnChrName: フフ、それぞれ徐々に 真相に辿り着き始めているようだな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、それぞれ徐々に
真相に辿り着き始めているようだな？

engChrName: So it really is true...
engSearchText: So it really is true...
jpnChrName: 宴の準備は順調だ── このまま足掻いてみせるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
宴の準備は順調だ──
このまま足掻いてみせるがいい。

engChrName: Damn. Didn't see that one comin'.
engSearchText: Damn. Didn't see that one comin'.
jpnChrName: だが、それだけでは味気ないと メルキオルが言い出してな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、それだけでは味気ないと
メルキオルが言い出してな。

engChrName: I can't wrap my head around all this yet.
engSearchText: I can't wrap my head around all this yet.
jpnChrName: うん、せっかくだからみんなには 古都以上に愉しんでもらいたくてね㈱
jpnSearchText:
うん、せっかくだからみんなには
古都以上に愉しんでもらいたくてね㈱

engChrName: I remember hearing that those nutjobs were into human experimentation, but this just...ugh.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing that those nutjobs were into
human experimentation, but this just...ugh.
jpnChrName: この通話が終わってから５時間── それを“タイムリミット”にしようか。
jpnSearchText:
この通話が終わってから５時間──
それを“タイムリミット”にしようか。

jpnChrName: それを過ぎたら全ての準備は整い、 俺たちは“祝宴”の幕を上げる。
jpnSearchText:
それを過ぎたら全ての準備は整い、
俺たちは“祝宴”の幕を上げる。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: 具体的には、首都だけでなく共和国、 そして大陸全土の“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”だ。
jpnSearchText:
具体的には、首都だけでなく共和国、
そして大陸全土の“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”だ。

engChrName: No use mopin' about it now. Got more pressin' matters to attend to.
engSearchText:
No use mopin' about it now. Got more pressin'
matters to attend to.
jpnChrName: クク、前回の勝利者には 特に頑張ってもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、前回の勝利者には
特に頑張ってもらおうか？

engChrName: Like how Dantès and his goons are back from the dead somehow.
engSearchText:
Like how Dantès and his goons are back from the
dead somehow.
jpnChrName: それでは待っているぞ。
jpnSearchText: それでは待っているぞ。

engChrName: I reckon their goal is—
engSearchText: I reckon their goal is—
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンタイユの周りには 巨大な《結界》があるから頑張ってね～。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンタイユの周りには
巨大な《結界》があるから頑張ってね～。

engChrName: How?! Time is frozen!
engSearchText: How?! Time is frozen!
jpnChrName: 各地の魔球（デアボロスフィア）と繋がってるから 全部壊せば突破できるかもよ？
jpnSearchText:
各地の魔球（デアボロスフィア）と繋がってるから
全部壊せば突破できるかもよ？

engChrName: I don't know, but evidently they found a way!
engSearchText: I don't know, but evidently they found a way!
jpnChrName: それじゃあごきげんよう！ ──カウントダウン・スタート♪
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあごきげんよう！
──カウントダウン・スタート♪

engChrName: How grand it is to see you all collectively toil ever closer to the truth.
engSearchText:
How grand it is to see you all collectively toil ever
closer to the truth.
jpnChrName: 時間予告とはお優しいじゃねえか。 ──そんじゃあ、活動再開と行くか！
jpnSearchText:
時間予告とはお優しいじゃねえか。
──そんじゃあ、活動再開と行くか！

engChrName: And I suggest you continue to toil, for our banquet's preparations are progressing swimmingly.
engSearchText:
And I suggest you continue to toil, for our banquet's
preparations are progressing swimmingly.
jpnChrName: っ……はいっ！
jpnSearchText: っ……はいっ！

engChrName: I was content to leave it at that, but Melchior here informed me that your challenge is not nearly thrilling enough.
engSearchText:
I was content to leave it at that, but Melchior here
informed me that your challenge is not nearly
thrilling enough.
jpnChrName: 了解ですっ……！
jpnSearchText: 了解ですっ……！

engChrName: Absolutely! Compared to the fun we had at Oración, our party here is boooring.
engSearchText:
Absolutely! Compared to the fun we had at Oración,
our party here is boooring.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちはサイデン地区と オーベル地区に向かうんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちはサイデン地区と
オーベル地区に向かうんだったか。

engChrName: So I thought, 'How can we spice this up?' And my answer for you is simple: the moment this call ends, a five hour countdown will begin.
engSearchText:
So I thought, 'How can we spice this up?' And my
answer for you is simple: the moment this call ends, a
five hour countdown will begin.
jpnChrName: それ以外の郊外エリアは俺たちに任せろ。 ──ヴァルター、お前らも付き合え。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の郊外エリアは俺たちに任せろ。
──ヴァルター、お前らも付き合え。

engChrName: Fail to stop us before the clock hits zero, and we will let loose the hounds of chaos.
engSearchText:
Fail to stop us before the clock hits zero, and we will
let loose the hounds of chaos.
jpnChrName: クク、まあいいぜ。 声をかけて手分けするか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあいいぜ。
声をかけて手分けするか。

engChrName: That is to say, Pandemonium will not only consume the Republic, but the continent as a whole.
engSearchText:
That is to say, Pandemonium will not only consume
the Republic, but the continent as a whole.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえな…… 嬢ちゃん、手伝えることはあるか？
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえな……
嬢ちゃん、手伝えることはあるか？

engChrName: We expect great things of you all, and especially of our carnival's victors.
engSearchText:
We expect great things of you all, and especially of
our carnival's victors.
jpnChrName: そうね、何とか導力ネットを 再起動できないか試してみるわ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、何とか導力ネットを
再起動できないか試してみるわ。

engChrName: May we meet again soon.
engSearchText: May we meet again soon.
jpnChrName: 情報屋なら少しは手伝えるでしょう？ 猫の手でいいから貸してちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
情報屋なら少しは手伝えるでしょう？
猫の手でいいから貸してちょうだい。

engChrName: Oh, and by the by, I put up a scary-strong barrier around the Vantail District. Good luck cracking that one!
engSearchText:
Oh, and by the by, I put up a scary-strong barrier
around the Vantail District. Good luck cracking
that one!
jpnChrName: はいよ──仕事用に 端末を新調してよかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はいよ──仕事用に
端末を新調してよかったぜ。

engChrName: Here's a little hint: it's linked to those Demon Spheres all around the city. Break every single one, and maybe you'll have a chance.
engSearchText:
Here's a little hint: it's linked to those Demon Spheres
all around the city. Break every single one, and maybe
you'll have a chance.
jpnChrName: 節約した甲斐があったでしょ？ ──私も慣れてるし手伝わせて！
jpnSearchText:
節約した甲斐があったでしょ？
──私も慣れてるし手伝わせて！

engChrName: Anyway, toodle-oo! Let the countdown begin! ♪
engSearchText: Anyway, toodle-oo! Let the countdown begin! ♪
jpnChrName: 話は聞きました！ 当然、あたしたちも手伝います！
jpnSearchText:
話は聞きました！
当然、あたしたちも手伝います！

engChrName: Gee, how kind of 'em to say when they're gonna screw us all. Let's get to work, everyone!
engSearchText:
Gee, how kind of 'em to say when they're gonna
screw us all. Let's get to work, everyone!
jpnChrName: 僕がバイトしている書店に……！ 最新の端末を導入したばかりです！
jpnSearchText:
僕がバイトしている書店に……！
最新の端末を導入したばかりです！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: ナイス、アルベール君！
jpnSearchText: ナイス、アルベール君！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: アニエス、ヴァンさんたちも 上手くいったらすぐ連絡するわ！
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、ヴァンさんたちも
上手くいったらすぐ連絡するわ！

engChrName: You're planning to visit the Auber and Seiden districts, right?
engSearchText:
You're planning to visit the Auber and Seiden
districts, right?
jpnChrName: アニエス……！ 絶対に無理はするなよ……！
jpnSearchText:
アニエス……！
絶対に無理はするなよ……！

engChrName: Leave the suburbs to us, then. Walter, you and your people are coming with.
engSearchText:
Leave the suburbs to us, then. Walter, you and your
people are coming with.
jpnChrName: アンタもでしょ──ヴァンさんたち、 アニエスのことをよろしくね！
jpnSearchText:
アンタもでしょ──ヴァンさんたち、
アニエスのことをよろしくね！

engChrName: Whatever you say. I'll go let 'em know.
engSearchText: Whatever you say. I'll go let 'em know.
jpnChrName: 先輩たち……ジンさんに ジャックさんたちまで。
jpnSearchText:
先輩たち……ジンさんに
ジャックさんたちまで。

engChrName: Suppose I should lend ya a hand for earlier. Anything you need, young lady?
engSearchText:
Suppose I should lend ya a hand for earlier.
Anything you need, young lady?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、どいつも即断即決かよ。
