jpnSearchText: やれやれ、どいつも即断即決かよ。

engChrName: There is. I'd like to get the orbal network up and running again.
engSearchText:
There is. I'd like to get the orbal network up and
running again.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… でも頼もしいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
でも頼もしいですっ。

engChrName: Surely your information savvy will come in handy somehow. Frankly, I'll need all the help I can get.
engSearchText:
Surely your information savvy will come in
handy somehow. Frankly, I'll need all the help I
can get.
jpnChrName: ハッ──負けてられるかよ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ──負けてられるかよ！

engChrName: Good thing I got that new terminal for work, else I'd be totally out of my depth.
engSearchText:
Good thing I got that new terminal for work, else I'd
be totally out of my depth.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区とオーベル地区── 最適の移動ルートを探しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区とオーベル地区──
最適の移動ルートを探しましょう。

engChrName: See, I told you it was worth the investment. I'm pretty good with techy stuff, so I'll lend a hand!
engSearchText:
See, I told you it was worth the investment. I'm pretty
good with techy stuff, so I'll lend a hand!
jpnChrName: うむ──征くぞ！
jpnSearchText: うむ──征くぞ！

engChrName: Count us in, too!
engSearchText: Count us in, too!
jpnChrName: アニエスがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アニエスがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: The bookstore I work at...*pant* They got a cutting-edge model just recently!
engSearchText:
The bookstore I work at...*pant* They got a
cutting-edge model just recently!
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、エリアの端に行くか 移動メニューで新たな行き先を選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、エリアの端に行くか
移動メニューで新たな行き先を選んで下さい。

engChrName: Now that's music to my ears!
engSearchText: Now that's music to my ears!
jpnChrName: （カウントダウンが進んでいる……   ここからは効率的に移動するしかねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（カウントダウンが進んでいる……
ここからは効率的に移動するしかねぇ。）

engChrName: If we can reconnect, we'll contact you as soon as possible.
engSearchText:
If we can reconnect, we'll contact you as soon
as possible.
jpnChrName: （まずはサイデン、それからオーベルだ。）
jpnSearchText: （まずはサイデン、それからオーベルだ。）

engChrName: Agnès! Just please, please take care of yourself!
engSearchText: Agnès! Just please, please take care of yourself!
jpnChrName: 一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、 他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。
jpnSearchText:
一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、
他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。

engChrName: Geez Louise, I bet she wants to tell you the same thing, bucko! Take care of our friend for us, okay?
engSearchText:
Geez Louise, I bet she wants to tell you the same
thing, bucko! Take care of our friend for us, okay?
jpnChrName: （ここの担当はジュディスだったか……   今の通信でどう動くかは分からんが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここの担当はジュディスだったか……
今の通信でどう動くかは分からんが。）

engChrName: Everyone sprung into action without a second thought.
engSearchText:
Everyone sprung into action without a
second thought.
jpnChrName: （時間がない──とにかく向かうぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （時間がない──とにかく向かうぞ！）

engChrName: A little too quick, if you ask me.
engSearchText: A little too quick, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区への近道はこっちだな。 駆け足で２０分ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区への近道はこっちだな。
駆け足で２０分ってところか。

engChrName: Heehee. We're fortunate to be surrounded by such good friends.
engSearchText:
Heehee. We're fortunate to be surrounded by such
good friends.
jpnChrName: チッ…… こういう時に車がねぇと痛ぇな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
こういう時に車がねぇと痛ぇな。

engChrName: We better hurry our asses up. I'm not letting those background dancers upstage me!
engSearchText:
We better hurry our asses up. I'm not letting those
background dancers upstage me!
jpnChrName: 停まってるヤツとか使えねえのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 停まってるヤツとか使えねえのかよ？

engChrName: Let's set course for the Seiden and Auber districts. We'll have to find the fastest route in the field.
engSearchText:
Let's set course for the Seiden and Auber districts.
We'll have to find the fastest route in the field.
jpnChrName: 乗員同様“停止”しているようです。 少々、難しそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
乗員同様“停止”しているようです。
少々、難しそうですね。

engChrName: Indeed. Let's roll out!
engSearchText: Indeed. Let's roll out!
jpnChrName: ど、どのみち無断使用は駄目ですよ。 私も頑張って走りますから……！
jpnSearchText:
ど、どのみち無断使用は駄目ですよ。
私も頑張って走りますから……！

engChrName: Agnès rejoined the party.
engSearchText: Agnès rejoined the party.
jpnChrName: おーい、ヴァンたち！
jpnSearchText: おーい、ヴァンたち！

engChrName: To advance the main story, either walk to the edge of the district you are in and choose your next destination, or select it directly from the Travel menu.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, either walk to the edge of
the district you are in and choose your next
destination, or select it directly from the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのＰＵトラック……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんのＰＵトラック……！

engChrName: (We're up against the clock now, so we better make every moment count.)
engSearchText:
(We're up against the clock now, so we better make
every moment count.)
jpnChrName: 乗っているのは ユニファさんに走り屋の方の……
jpnSearchText:
乗っているのは
ユニファさんに走り屋の方の……

engChrName: (Let's hit the Seiden District, then move on to the Auber District.)
engSearchText:
(Let's hit the Seiden District, then move on to the
Auber District.)
jpnChrName: 驚いたな……！ まさか運んできてくれたのか。
jpnSearchText:
驚いたな……！
まさか運んできてくれたのか。

engChrName: Once a district has been selected, the others will be temporarily unavailable.
engSearchText:
Once a district has been selected, the others will be
temporarily unavailable.
jpnChrName: そういや整備用の鍵も預けていたな。
jpnSearchText: そういや整備用の鍵も預けていたな。

engChrName: (Judith was in Seiden. Dunno what she would've done when that countdown started, but we've still gotta find her.)
engSearchText:
(Judith was in Seiden. Dunno what she would've
done when that countdown started, but we've still
gotta find her.)
jpnChrName: うん、リバーサイドに辿り着いた後、 伯父さんから話を聞いてさ！
jpnSearchText:
うん、リバーサイドに辿り着いた後、
伯父さんから話を聞いてさ！

engChrName: (Let's hustle!)
engSearchText: (Let's hustle!)
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちの行き先については フィーって人から教えてもらったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちの行き先については
フィーって人から教えてもらったよ。

engChrName: This is the fastest way to the Seiden District. If we hoof it on foot, we can probably get there in 20 minutes.
engSearchText:
This is the fastest way to the Seiden District. If we
hoof it on foot, we can probably get there in
20 minutes.
jpnChrName: フィーさんが……！
jpnSearchText: フィーさんが……！

engChrName: Man, what I wouldn't give to have your truck right now, Van.
engSearchText:
Man, what I wouldn't give to have your truck right
now, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちの行き先については キンケイドって人から教えてもらったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちの行き先については
キンケイドって人から教えてもらったよ。

engChrName: All these frozen people aren't going anywhere, think they'd mind if we 'borrowed' a car?
engSearchText:
All these frozen people aren't going anywhere, think
they'd mind if we 'borrowed' a car?
jpnChrName: あの野郎……
jpnSearchText: あの野郎……

engChrName: I don't believe those vehicles can move.
engSearchText: I don't believe those vehicles can move.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちの行き先については ツァオって人から教えてもらったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちの行き先については
ツァオって人から教えてもらったよ。

engChrName: AND that's illegal! It's a bit of a run, but I'm sure we can manage.
engSearchText:
AND that's illegal! It's a bit of a run, but I'm sure we
can manage.
jpnChrName: さすがツァオ、渡りに船だぜ！
jpnSearchText: さすがツァオ、渡りに船だぜ！

engChrName: Vaaan!
engSearchText: Vaaan!
jpnChrName: フフ、あの後も立ち寄って 声を掛けてくれていたようだな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、あの後も立ち寄って
声を掛けてくれていたようだな。

engChrName: What's the truck doing here?!
engSearchText: What's the truck doing here?!
jpnChrName: なんにせよ渡りに船だな……！
jpnSearchText: なんにせよ渡りに船だな……！

engChrName: I guess Junifer and one of the street racers decided to bring it to us?
engSearchText:
I guess Junifer and one of the street racers decided to
bring it to us?
jpnChrName: 悪いな──恩に着るぜ。
jpnSearchText: 悪いな──恩に着るぜ。

engChrName: Now that's what I call a sight for sore eyes!
engSearchText: Now that's what I call a sight for sore eyes!
jpnChrName: ううん、気にしないでよ！ 普段から世話になってるんだし。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、気にしないでよ！
普段から世話になってるんだし。

engChrName: Oh, right. I did give you guys the keys to do maintenance on her, didn't I?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. I did give you guys the keys to do
maintenance on her, didn't I?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達には昼間の勝負でも 世話になっちまったからな！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん達には昼間の勝負でも
世話になっちまったからな！

engChrName: Yeah! My uncle filled me in on everything as soon as I got back to Riverside!
engSearchText:
Yeah! My uncle filled me in on everything as soon as
I got back to Riverside!
jpnChrName: 俺らも動ける仲間に声をかけて 各方面に足を提供させてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
俺らも動ける仲間に声をかけて
各方面に足を提供させてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Then some woman named Fie told us where you were headed.
engSearchText:
Then some woman named Fie told us where you
were headed.
jpnChrName: 助かります……！
jpnSearchText: 助かります……！

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: よし──それじゃあ とっととサイデン地区に向かうぞ！
jpnSearchText:
よし──それじゃあ
とっととサイデン地区に向かうぞ！

engChrName: Then some man named Kincaid told us where you were headed.
engSearchText:
Then some man named Kincaid told us where you
were headed.
jpnChrName: ええ──汎用エイオンシステムを使った 特殊な共鳴デバイスでリブートしたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──汎用エイオンシステムを使った
特殊な共鳴デバイスでリブートしたわ。

engChrName: That damn meddler.
engSearchText: That damn meddler.
jpnChrName: 大きな声じゃ言えないけど、 マルドゥックの新サービスも利用している。
jpnSearchText:
大きな声じゃ言えないけど、
マルドゥックの新サービスも利用している。

engChrName: Then some man named Cao told us where you were headed.
engSearchText:
Then some man named Cao told us where you
were headed.
jpnChrName: ま、こんな事態だから良いわよね？
jpnSearchText: ま、こんな事態だから良いわよね？

engChrName: Dude always shows up at the right moment.
engSearchText: Dude always shows up at the right moment.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は、以前アニエスが 休日に回ったルートを調べ直す事になり……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達は、以前アニエスが
休日に回ったルートを調べ直す事になり……

engChrName: That must have been after we parted ways.
engSearchText: That must have been after we parted ways.
jpnChrName: カフェや書店や地下鉄など、 各地で本を探して回るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
カフェや書店や地下鉄など、
各地で本を探して回るのだった。

engChrName: I'm just glad our feet are saved!
engSearchText: I'm just glad our feet are saved!
jpnChrName: ヴァンは車を出して タイレル地区の本屋に向かった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは車を出して
タイレル地区の本屋に向かった。

engChrName: For sure. Thanks for the hook up.
engSearchText: For sure. Thanks for the hook up.
jpnChrName: （龍來といえば代表的な観光地だからな。   スイーツなんかは年々進化してるはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（龍來といえば代表的な観光地だからな。
スイーツなんかは年々進化してるはずだ。）

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about it! You guys have helped us plenty.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about it! You guys have helped
us plenty.
jpnChrName: （ここは裏解決屋として下準備を   おろそかにする訳にはいかねえよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここは裏解決屋として下準備を
おろそかにする訳にはいかねえよな。）

engChrName: Yeah. You even lent a hand with that race earlier today.
engSearchText:
Yeah. You even lent a hand with that race
earlier today.
jpnChrName: （どれ、観光ガイドのコーナーは、と……）
jpnSearchText: （どれ、観光ガイドのコーナーは、と……）

engChrName: We'll send our friends around to make sure your allies have rides, too!
engSearchText:
We'll send our friends around to make sure your allies
have rides, too!
jpnChrName: って、アニエスか……？
jpnSearchText: って、アニエスか……？

engChrName: Thank you!
engSearchText: Thank you!
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさん……お疲れ様です。 ふふ、またお会いしましたね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさん……お疲れ様です。
ふふ、またお会いしましたね。

engChrName: All right, next stop: the Seiden District!
engSearchText: All right, next stop: the Seiden District!
jpnChrName: そういえば、夜の街を よく見回っているんでしたか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、夜の街を
よく見回っているんでしたか。

engChrName: Of course. I managed to reboot it using a special resonance device operated by a general-purpose fork of the Aeon system.
engSearchText:
Of course. I managed to reboot it using a special
resonance device operated by a general-purpose fork
of the Aeon system.
jpnChrName: まあ、今は普通に本を買いに来ただけだが。
jpnSearchText: まあ、今は普通に本を買いに来ただけだが。

engChrName: Not to mention a little help from Marduk's new service, but let's keep that tidbit between us.
engSearchText:
Not to mention a little help from Marduk's new
service, but let's keep that tidbit between us.
jpnChrName: そういうお前は、あの後まっ直ぐ帰らずに こっちに立ち寄ってたんだな？
jpnSearchText:
そういうお前は、あの後まっ直ぐ帰らずに
こっちに立ち寄ってたんだな？

engChrName: Desperate times call for desperate measures, after all.
engSearchText: Desperate times call for desperate measures, after all.
jpnChrName: はい、先日学校の先生から 参考書をおススメされたのを思い出して。
jpnSearchText:
はい、先日学校の先生から
参考書をおススメされたのを思い出して。

engChrName: Van and Agnès retraced the route that she previously took on her day off.
engSearchText:
Van and Agnès retraced the route that she
previously took on her day off.
jpnChrName: 忘れない内に買っておこうと思ったんです。
jpnSearchText: 忘れない内に買っておこうと思ったんです。

engChrName: Their search for the book led them across the city, including cafés, bookstores, and the subway.
engSearchText:
Their search for the book led them across the city,
including cafés, bookstores, and the subway.
jpnChrName: ははぁ、参考書ねえ。 お前さんはホントしっかりしてんな。
jpnSearchText:
ははぁ、参考書ねえ。
お前さんはホントしっかりしてんな。

engChrName: Van got in his pickup truck and drove to the bookstore located in the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
Van got in his pickup truck and drove to the
bookstore located in the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そんな事はないですよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そんな事はないですよ。

engChrName: (Longlai's such a popular tourist attraction, you gotta figure the local sweets change up over time.)
engSearchText:
(Longlai's such a popular tourist attraction, you gotta
figure the local sweets change up over time.)
jpnChrName: 龍來のガイドブックも見ておきたくて ここに来たようなものですから。
jpnSearchText:
龍來のガイドブックも見ておきたくて
ここに来たようなものですから。

engChrName: (Way I see it, I'd be shirkin' my professional duties as a spriggan if I didn't take the time to study up on 'em beforehand.)
engSearchText:
(Way I see it, I'd be shirkin' my professional duties as
a spriggan if I didn't take the time to study up on
'em beforehand.)
jpnChrName: あっ、もしかしてヴァンさんも…… 龍來のスイーツの情報がお目当てだったり？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、もしかしてヴァンさんも……
龍來のスイーツの情報がお目当てだったり？

engChrName: (Now to just find where they keep the tour guides here. Hmm...)
engSearchText:
(Now to just find where they keep the tour
guides here. Hmm...)
jpnChrName: ハッ……言わずもがなだろ。 そんじゃガイドブックのコーナーを見てみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……言わずもがなだろ。
そんじゃガイドブックのコーナーを見てみるか。

engChrName: Huh? Is that Agnès over there?
engSearchText: Huh? Is that Agnès over there?
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンとアニエスは 無事に目当ての本を購入し、店を出た。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンとアニエスは
無事に目当ての本を購入し、店を出た。

engChrName: Oh! Hi, Van. Fancy seeing you here!
engSearchText: Oh! Hi, Van. Fancy seeing you here!
jpnChrName: そういや、この時間だと 地下鉄の数も減ってるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
そういや、この時間だと
地下鉄の数も減ってるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Are you doing your rounds across the city? You seem to do that a lot at night.
engSearchText:
Are you doing your rounds across the city? You seem
to do that a lot at night.
jpnChrName: そうですね、今の時間から考えると……
jpnSearchText: そうですね、今の時間から考えると……

engChrName: Nah, not this time. I just came here to shop for some books, that's all.
engSearchText:
Nah, not this time. I just came here to shop for some
books, that's all.
jpnChrName: あ……地下鉄で 車両トラブルがあったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ……地下鉄で
車両トラブルがあったみたいですね。

engChrName: What brings you here? I figured you went back to your dorm after we were all finished talking.
engSearchText:
What brings you here? I figured you went back to
your dorm after we were all finished talking.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういや情報が入ってたな。 すぐに終わるとは思うが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そういや情報が入ってたな。
すぐに終わるとは思うが。

engChrName: I just remembered a reference book that one of my teachers recommended to me the other day.
engSearchText:
I just remembered a reference book that one of my
teachers recommended to me the other day.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、点検がどのくらいで終わるか まだ目途は立っていないそうです。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、点検がどのくらいで終わるか
まだ目途は立っていないそうです。

engChrName: I decided I might as well pick it up on my way back before I forgot.
engSearchText:
I decided I might as well pick it up on my way back
before I forgot.
jpnChrName: うーん……カフェで時間を潰すか、 歩いて帰るしかなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……カフェで時間を潰すか、
歩いて帰るしかなさそうですね。

engChrName: Got'cha. That's some dedication if you're goin' out of your way to pick up that kind of extracurricular material.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. That's some dedication if you're goin' out of
your way to pick up that kind of
extracurricular material.
jpnChrName: なんだ、それなら送って行ってやるよ。 丁度いい足もあることだしな。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、それなら送って行ってやるよ。
丁度いい足もあることだしな。

engChrName: I don't know if I'd say I'm that dedicated this time.
engSearchText: I don't know if I'd say I'm that dedicated this time.
jpnChrName: 寮の門限もあんだろうし 早く帰れるに越した事はねえんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
寮の門限もあんだろうし
早く帰れるに越した事はねえんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Otherwise I wouldn't have found myself over here looking for guidebooks on Longlai.
engSearchText:
Otherwise I wouldn't have found myself over here
looking for guidebooks on Longlai.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん…… ふふ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……
ふふ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Oh, but if you're here, does that mean...you're looking for information on the kinds of sweets they have in Longlai?
engSearchText:
Oh, but if you're here, does that mean...you're looking
for information on the kinds of sweets they have
in Longlai?
jpnChrName: それではお言葉に 甘えさせて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
それではお言葉に
甘えさせて頂きますね。

engChrName: You know me only too well at this point. Well, since we're both here, might as well see what they got.
engSearchText:
You know me only too well at this point. Well, since
we're both here, might as well see what they got.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはタイレル地区の東方料理屋に向かい、 肉まんをテイクアウトした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはタイレル地区の東方料理屋に向かい、
肉まんをテイクアウトした。

engChrName: Once Van and Agnès found the books they were looking for, they made their purchases and departed the store.
engSearchText:
Once Van and Agnès found the books they were
looking for, they made their purchases and departed
the store.
jpnChrName: さぁて、どっか適当なところでつまんで……
jpnSearchText: さぁて、どっか適当なところでつまんで……

engChrName: The subway's probably runnin' less frequently at this time of day, aren't they?
engSearchText:
The subway's probably runnin' less frequently at this
time of day, aren't they?

engChrName: I'd say so. At this hour, they probably—
engSearchText: I'd say so. At this hour, they probably—
jpnChrName: うわぁぁん……！ どこなの、おかあさぁん……！
jpnSearchText:
うわぁぁん……！
どこなの、おかあさぁん……！

engChrName: Oh, no... Looks like they're having some sort of problem with the train cars.
engSearchText:
Oh, no... Looks like they're having some sort of
problem with the train cars.
jpnChrName: もう、泣かないでってば……！ 大体ミーナがあちこち歩き回るから……！
jpnSearchText:
もう、泣かないでってば……！
大体ミーナがあちこち歩き回るから……！

engChrName: Yeah, I read that earlier. I'm sure they'll be up and runnin' again soon.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I read that earlier. I'm sure they'll be up and
runnin' again soon.
jpnChrName: ああああん……！
jpnSearchText: ああああん……！

engChrName: Maybe. It says they don't have an estimate for how long the inspection is going to take.
engSearchText:
Maybe. It says they don't have an estimate for how
long the inspection is going to take.
jpnChrName: よしよし、落ち着いて二人とも。 そんなに心配しなくても大丈夫。
jpnSearchText:
よしよし、落ち着いて二人とも。
そんなに心配しなくても大丈夫。

engChrName: Hmm... I guess I'll either have to wait it out at a café or just walk home instead.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I guess I'll either have to wait it out at a café
or just walk home instead.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと二人を 警察署まで案内してあげるからっ。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと二人を
警察署まで案内してあげるからっ。

engChrName: You don't have to go to all that trouble. I can just drive you back in my truck.
engSearchText:
You don't have to go to all that trouble. I can just
drive you back in my truck.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ、ほんと……？
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ、ほんと……？

engChrName: Beats how long it takes to go on foot. I'm sure your dorm's got a curfew in place, right?
engSearchText:
Beats how long it takes to go on foot. I'm sure your
dorm's got a curfew in place, right?
jpnChrName: そしたらお兄ちゃんもわたしも おうちに帰れる……？
jpnSearchText:
そしたらお兄ちゃんもわたしも
おうちに帰れる……？

engChrName: You don't mind? That would definitely help me a lot.
engSearchText: You don't mind? That would definitely help me a lot.
jpnChrName: うん、絶対に。
jpnSearchText: うん、絶対に。

engChrName: Thanks, Van. You're a lifesaver.
engSearchText: Thanks, Van. You're a lifesaver.
jpnChrName: 二人のお父さん（アブ）もお母さん（アマ）も もしかしたら待ってくれてるかも。
jpnSearchText:
二人のお父さん（アブ）もお母さん（アマ）も
もしかしたら待ってくれてるかも。

engChrName: Van made his way to the Eastern cuisine restaurant in the Tyrell District and ordered meat buns for takeout.
engSearchText:
Van made his way to the Eastern cuisine restaurant in
the Tyrell District and ordered meat buns for takeout.
jpnChrName: あぶ……あま？ よ、よくわからないけど……
jpnSearchText:
あぶ……あま？
よ、よくわからないけど……

engChrName: Great. Now to just find somewhere to sit and eat these bad bo—
engSearchText:
Great. Now to just find somewhere to sit and eat
these bad bo—
jpnChrName: ……お姉ちゃん。 僕たちを連れてってくれる……？
jpnSearchText:
……お姉ちゃん。
僕たちを連れてってくれる……？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: うん、任せて！
jpnSearchText: うん、任せて！

engChrName: Waaaaaah! Mommy, where are you? Mommy!
engSearchText: Waaaaaah! Mommy, where are you? Mommy!
jpnChrName: 距離的にはそんな遠くないし、 ア──ご両親とすれ違うかも。
jpnSearchText:
距離的にはそんな遠くないし、
ア──ご両親とすれ違うかも。

engChrName: Stop crying! This wouldn't have happened if you hadn't wandered off like that, Mina!
engSearchText:
Stop crying! This wouldn't have happened if you
hadn't wandered off like that, Mina!
jpnChrName: このまま歩いていくけど平気かな？
jpnSearchText: このまま歩いていくけど平気かな？

engChrName: WAAAAAAH!
engSearchText: WAAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: うんっ……！
jpnSearchText: うんっ……！

engChrName: Hey, it's okay, you two. Everything's going to be fine. I promise!
engSearchText:
Hey, it's okay, you two. Everything's going to be fine.
I promise!
jpnChrName: この辺りをブラつくとか言ってたが あんなお節介をしてるとは。
jpnSearchText:
この辺りをブラつくとか言ってたが
あんなお節介をしてるとは。

engChrName: Want me to take you guys to the police station? I'm sure they'll help you.
engSearchText:
Want me to take you guys to the police station?
I'm sure they'll help you.
jpnChrName: 最近は街の地図も把握してきてるし、 あいつなら心配ないと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
最近は街の地図も把握してきてるし、
あいつなら心配ないと思うが……

engChrName: *sniffle* Really?
engSearchText: *sniffle* Really?
jpnChrName: ……ま、一応な。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、一応な。

engChrName: Does that mean my brother and I will...will be able to go home?
engSearchText:
Does that mean my brother and I will...will be able to
go home?
jpnChrName: ヴァンはタイレル地区の本屋に向かい、 映画関係のコーナーを眺めることにした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはタイレル地区の本屋に向かい、
映画関係のコーナーを眺めることにした。

engChrName: Absolutely!
engSearchText: Absolutely!
jpnChrName: へえ、この間のサルバッド映画祭についての本が 出ているみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、この間のサルバッド映画祭についての本が
出ているみたいだな。

engChrName: For all we know, Abi and Umi could be there waiting for you two already!
engSearchText:
For all we know, Abi and Umi could be there waiting
for you two already!
jpnChrName: どれどれ……ハン、よく見てるじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: どれどれ……ハン、よく見てるじゃねぇか。

engChrName: 'Abi'...? 'Umi'...? What're those?
engSearchText: 'Abi'...? 'Umi'...? What're those?
jpnChrName: おっ、またニナ・フェンリィの特集か。 最近勢いスゲーな。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、またニナ・フェンリィの特集か。
最近勢いスゲーな。

engChrName: Anyway, could you take us there? I don't know where to find it.
engSearchText:
Anyway, could you take us there? I don't know where
to find it.
jpnChrName: そりゃそうだろう、なにせあの ジュディス・ランスターから──
jpnSearchText:
そりゃそうだろう、なにせあの
ジュディス・ランスターから──

engChrName: Sure! No problem.
engSearchText: Sure! No problem.
jpnChrName: 《最優秀女優賞》を奪い取ったんだぜ？ いまや映画界一の注目株だろ。
jpnSearchText:
《最優秀女優賞》を奪い取ったんだぜ？
いまや映画界一の注目株だろ。

engChrName: It's not that far away at all. We might even run into Ab—er, your parents on the way there.
engSearchText:
It's not that far away at all. We might even run into
Ab—er, your parents on the way there.
jpnChrName: いよいよニナの時代なのかねぇ。 ジュディスも応援したいんだけどなー。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよニナの時代なのかねぇ。
ジュディスも応援したいんだけどなー。

engChrName: It's gonna be a little bit of a walk. Will you be okay?
engSearchText: It's gonna be a little bit of a walk. Will you be okay?
jpnChrName: ああ、やっぱあのアクションと エロさはたまんないしな！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、やっぱあのアクションと
エロさはたまんないしな！

engChrName: Y-Yeah!
engSearchText: Y-Yeah!

engChrName: I knew she said she would be hanging around here, but I didn't expect to find her helping out like this.
engSearchText:
I knew she said she would be hanging around here,
but I didn't expect to find her helping out like this.
jpnChrName: おいおい、あれは……
jpnSearchText: おいおい、あれは……

engChrName: She knows the city pretty well at this point, so there's probably nothing to worry about, but still...
engSearchText:
She knows the city pretty well at this point, so there's
probably nothing to worry about, but still...
jpnChrName: さてもう一回──
jpnSearchText: さてもう一回──

engChrName: Better keep an eye just in case.
engSearchText: Better keep an eye just in case.
jpnChrName: まだ同じのを観るのかよ？ これで３回目だぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ同じのを観るのかよ？
これで３回目だぞ。

engChrName: Van decided to pay a visit to the bookstore in Tyrell District and browse through their section on films.
engSearchText:
Van decided to pay a visit to the bookstore in Tyrell
District and browse through their section on films.

engChrName: Damn—this publisher works fast. Already got somethin' out about the Tharbad Film Festival.
engSearchText:
Damn—this publisher works fast. Already got
somethin' out about the Tharbad Film Festival.
jpnChrName: ア、アンタ、どうして──
jpnSearchText: ア、アンタ、どうして──

engChrName: Let's see what they say about it... Yep, they were definitely there and watching the entrants.
engSearchText:
Let's see what they say about it... Yep, they were
definitely there and watching the entrants.
jpnChrName: つーか映画館に来て何回も 自分の出演作を観るとか、さすがに──
jpnSearchText:
つーか映画館に来て何回も
自分の出演作を観るとか、さすがに──

engChrName: Check it out! Another special on Nina Fenly. That chick's on a roll lately.
engSearchText:
Check it out! Another special on Nina Fenly.
That chick's on a roll lately.
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょ、スト──ップ！！
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょ、スト──ップ！！

engChrName: I mean, why wouldn't she be?
engSearchText: I mean, why wouldn't she be?
jpnChrName: ここじゃまずいから、 とにかくこっちに来て！
jpnSearchText:
ここじゃまずいから、
とにかくこっちに来て！

engChrName: She stole Judith Lanster's crown as best actress at the festival. She's gotta be the hottest actress in Zemuria right now!
engSearchText:
She stole Judith Lanster's crown as best actress at
the festival. She's gotta be the hottest actress in
Zemuria right now!
jpnChrName: ふぅ……ここなら誰もいないわね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……ここなら誰もいないわね。

engChrName: Guess it's now Nina's time to be in the spotlight. Not that I'll stop liking Judith or anything, of course, but you know what I mean.
engSearchText:
Guess it's now Nina's time to be in the spotlight.
Not that I'll stop liking Judith or anything, of course,
but you know what I mean.
jpnChrName: アンタね、バレたらどうするのよ！ 特にあそこは映画館、大騒ぎになるじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
アンタね、バレたらどうするのよ！
特にあそこは映画館、大騒ぎになるじゃない！

engChrName: Hell yeah, man! No one keeps the action sexy like her!
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, man! No one keeps the action sexy
like her!
jpnChrName: ちゃんとお前さんにだけ聞こえるように 声に気を付けてはいたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんとお前さんにだけ聞こえるように
声に気を付けてはいたんだが……

jpnChrName: むしろそっちが過剰に反応してたような。
jpnSearchText: むしろそっちが過剰に反応してたような。

engChrName: Hey, is that who I think it is?
engSearchText: Hey, is that who I think it is?
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: Okay. No time to waste. Time to watch another—
engSearchText: Okay. No time to waste. Time to watch another—
jpnChrName: で、なんで何回も自分の映画を観てたんだ？ ジュディス・ナルシストさん？
jpnSearchText:
で、なんで何回も自分の映画を観てたんだ？
ジュディス・ナルシストさん？

engChrName: You're watchin' the same movie again? That's gotta be the third time now.
engSearchText:
You're watchin' the same movie again? That's gotta
be the third time now.
jpnChrName: 誰がナルシストよ！ 違うから！　そういうのじゃないから！
jpnSearchText:
誰がナルシストよ！
違うから！　そういうのじゃないから！

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!
jpnChrName: ああ大丈夫分かるぜ、 誰しもそういう時期はある。
jpnSearchText:
ああ大丈夫分かるぜ、
誰しもそういう時期はある。

engChrName: Wh-What the heck?! What are you doing here?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the heck?! What are you doing here?!
jpnChrName: 自分の姿に酔いしれたいってのは 思春期にはよくあることだからな。
jpnSearchText:
自分の姿に酔いしれたいってのは
思春期にはよくあることだからな。

engChrName: What am I doing here? What are YOU doing, comin' to this theater and watching your own movie over and over again? Don't you think that's kinda—
engSearchText:
What am I doing here? What are YOU doing, comin'
to this theater and watching your own movie over and
over again? Don't you think that's kinda—
jpnChrName: ただその歳になってもってのは さすがにちょっとなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ただその歳になってもってのは
さすがにちょっとなぁ……

engChrName: S-SHUSH! Don't you say another word!
engSearchText: S-SHUSH! Don't you say another word!
jpnChrName: だから違うって！！ ていうかアンタよりは若いわよ！
jpnSearchText:
だから違うって！！
ていうかアンタよりは若いわよ！

engChrName: This isn't a good place to talk! Follow me!
engSearchText: This isn't a good place to talk! Follow me!
jpnChrName: じゃあなんの遊びだ？
jpnSearchText: じゃあなんの遊びだ？

engChrName: Phew. All right—the coast is clear.
engSearchText: Phew. All right—the coast is clear.
jpnChrName: 遊びでもないっ！
jpnSearchText: 遊びでもないっ！

engChrName: Are you out of your mind? Do you know what would've happened if people in that theater knew I was there?! It'd be chaos!
engSearchText:
Are you out of your mind? Do you know what
would've happened if people in that theater knew I
was there?! It'd be chaos!
jpnChrName: ──見ていたのは映画じゃなくて、 観客の方よ。
jpnSearchText:
──見ていたのは映画じゃなくて、
観客の方よ。

engChrName: Hey, you're the one who blared your horn.
engSearchText: Hey, you're the one who blared your horn.
jpnChrName: 客を？
jpnSearchText: 客を？

engChrName: I was tryin' to keep my voice down so only you could hear me. If people were gonna notice you, it wouldn't have been 'cause of me.
engSearchText:
I was tryin' to keep my voice down so only you could
hear me. If people were gonna notice you, it wouldn't
have been 'cause of me.
jpnChrName: 自分の姿に見惚れてる客を見て悦に浸るのか…… 俺が想像してたよりも高等なテクニックだな。
jpnSearchText:
自分の姿に見惚れてる客を見て悦に浸るのか……
俺が想像してたよりも高等なテクニックだな。

engChrName: W-Well, you still...
engSearchText: W-Well, you still...
jpnChrName: やっぱナルシストじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: やっぱナルシストじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Anyway, you didn't answer my question. Why all the repeat viewings of your own movies? You that much of a narcissist?
engSearchText:
Anyway, you didn't answer my question. Why all the
repeat viewings of your own movies? You that much
of a narcissist?
jpnChrName: しつこいわね！ もうわざとでしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
しつこいわね！
もうわざとでしょ！？

engChrName: Who said I was a narcissist?! It's nothing like that!
engSearchText: Who said I was a narcissist?! It's nothing like that!
jpnChrName: ち、バレたか…… もう少しこのネタでからかいたかったが。
jpnSearchText:
ち、バレたか……
もう少しこのネタでからかいたかったが。

engChrName: Look, I get it. We all go through that phase at some point in our lives.
engSearchText:
Look, I get it. We all go through that phase at some
point in our lives.
jpnChrName: 少しは悪びれなさいよ！！
jpnSearchText: 少しは悪びれなさいよ！！

engChrName: It's perfectly normal for you to get a kick outta how hot you look in the mirror when you're going through puberty.
engSearchText:
It's perfectly normal for you to get a kick outta how
hot you look in the mirror when you're going
through puberty.
jpnChrName: ああもう、アンタといると 調子が狂うわね……
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、アンタといると
調子が狂うわね……

engChrName: Thought you were a little old for that, though.
engSearchText: Thought you were a little old for that, though.
jpnChrName: つまりあれか、自分の作品に対する 客の反応が見たいってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
つまりあれか、自分の作品に対する
客の反応が見たいってわけか。

engChrName: I'm telling you, you've got it all wrong! And what do you mean, 'old'? I'm younger than you!
engSearchText:
I'm telling you, you've got it all wrong! And what do
you mean, 'old'? I'm younger than you!
jpnChrName: 端的に言えばそうよ。
jpnSearchText: 端的に言えばそうよ。

engChrName: I'll take your word for it, then. So what is it you're doing? Some kinda weird hobby?
engSearchText:
I'll take your word for it, then. So what is it
you're doing? Some kinda weird hobby?
jpnChrName: まあ、あたしの場合 もう少し具体性があるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あたしの場合
もう少し具体性があるけどね。

engChrName: It's NOT a hobby!
engSearchText: It's NOT a hobby!
jpnChrName: 自分が出るシーンで 重点的に周囲の人間を観察して──
jpnSearchText:
自分が出るシーンで
重点的に周囲の人間を観察して──

engChrName: ...I didn't come here to watch the movie. I came here to watch the audience.
engSearchText:
...I didn't come here to watch the movie. I came here
to watch the audience.
jpnChrName: どういう所で笑って、どういう所で感動して、 どういう所でがっかりするか……
jpnSearchText:
どういう所で笑って、どういう所で感動して、
どういう所でがっかりするか……

engChrName: The audience?
engSearchText: The audience?
jpnChrName: そういったささやかな目つきや表情の変化が あたしの演技の良し悪しを物語っているから。
jpnSearchText:
そういったささやかな目つきや表情の変化が
あたしの演技の良し悪しを物語っているから。

engChrName: Like what, to bask in their adoration as they watch you strut your stuff? Well, damn, girl. You're an even bigger narcissist than I thought.
engSearchText:
Like what, to bask in their adoration as they watch
you strut your stuff? Well, damn, girl. You're an even
bigger narcissist than I thought.
jpnChrName: そこまで見ていたのか……
jpnSearchText: そこまで見ていたのか……

engChrName: Gotta hand it to you, it takes a special kind of person to go to that much trouble to have their ego massaged. Props.
engSearchText:
Gotta hand it to you, it takes a special kind of person
to go to that much trouble to have their ego
massaged. Props.
jpnChrName: それと、認識のズレの矯正かな。
jpnSearchText: それと、認識のズレの矯正かな。

engChrName: Now you're just trying to piss me off, aren't you?!
engSearchText: Now you're just trying to piss me off, aren't you?!
jpnChrName: なんだそりゃ？
jpnSearchText: なんだそりゃ？

engChrName: You figured it out already? And here I was hopin' I'd get a couple more selge out of that...
engSearchText:
You figured it out already? And here I was hopin' I'd
get a couple more selge out of that...
jpnChrName: 撮影の時は、もちろんあたしも 監督も自分たちが納得するものを撮ったつもりでも……
jpnSearchText:
撮影の時は、もちろんあたしも
監督も自分たちが納得するものを撮ったつもりでも……

engChrName: You could at least PRETEND to be a little sorry!
engSearchText: You could at least PRETEND to be a little sorry!
jpnChrName: それが観客の目に同じように映るとは限らない。
jpnSearchText: それが観客の目に同じように映るとは限らない。

engChrName: Ugh... I swear, talking to you is bad for my mental health.
engSearchText:
Ugh... I swear, talking to you is bad for my
mental health.
jpnChrName: 自分が自信を持ってやっていた所が不評だったり、 逆に大して力を入れていない所がウケたりして……
jpnSearchText:
自分が自信を持ってやっていた所が不評だったり、
逆に大して力を入れていない所がウケたりして……

engChrName: Okay, real talk. I'm guessin' you're here to gauge the audience's reaction to your work?
engSearchText:
Okay, real talk. I'm guessin' you're here to gauge the
audience's reaction to your work?
jpnChrName: それを単に視点や趣向の違いで片付けるのは すごく勿体ないとあたしは思うのよね。
jpnSearchText:
それを単に視点や趣向の違いで片付けるのは
すごく勿体ないとあたしは思うのよね。

engChrName: Yeah, more or less.
engSearchText: Yeah, more or less.
jpnChrName: だって映画は独りよがりのものじゃない、 観客に歓びや感動を伝えるためのものだから。
jpnSearchText:
だって映画は独りよがりのものじゃない、
観客に歓びや感動を伝えるためのものだから。

engChrName: Although I'm mostly looking for some specific things.
engSearchText: Although I'm mostly looking for some specific things.
jpnChrName: そういったズレをちゃんと認識してこそ 本当の意味で前に進める。
jpnSearchText:
そういったズレをちゃんと認識してこそ
本当の意味で前に進める。

engChrName: When I come on the screen, I pay attention to how the people around me are reacting.
engSearchText:
When I come on the screen, I pay attention to how
the people around me are reacting.
jpnChrName: 少なくともあたしはそう信じてる。
jpnSearchText: 少なくともあたしはそう信じてる。

engChrName: Where they laugh, where they cry, where they're let down. Stuff like that.
engSearchText:
Where they laugh, where they cry, where they're
let down. Stuff like that.
jpnChrName: へえ、勢い任せと思っていたが、 意外とちゃんと考えてるんだな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、勢い任せと思っていたが、
意外とちゃんと考えてるんだな。

engChrName: It gives me a good barometer of how well my acting is landing with people, so I can see where I maybe need to improve going forward.
engSearchText:
It gives me a good barometer of how well my acting is
landing with people, so I can see where I maybe need
to improve going forward.
jpnChrName: 誰が勢い任せの考えなしよ！ お祖母ちゃんたちと同じこと言わないで！
jpnSearchText:
誰が勢い任せの考えなしよ！
お祖母ちゃんたちと同じこと言わないで！

engChrName: You don't say? I didn't realize you did so much homework between shoots.
engSearchText:
You don't say? I didn't realize you did so much
homework between shoots.
jpnChrName: 一応褒めてるつもりなんだが…… つーか家族にも言われてるのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
一応褒めてるつもりなんだが……
つーか家族にも言われてるのかよ。

engChrName: I don't do it just to study their reactions, either. I also do it to...put things into perspective for myself, I guess you'd put it.
engSearchText:
I don't do it just to study their reactions, either. I also
do it to...put things into perspective for myself, I
guess you'd put it.
jpnChrName: うっ……
jpnSearchText: うっ……

engChrName: Not sure I follow.
engSearchText: Not sure I follow.
jpnChrName: しかし、よく暗いシアター内で 人間観察なんてできたもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、よく暗いシアター内で
人間観察なんてできたもんだ。

engChrName: When I'm filming something, obviously I like to think that the final product's going to come out just like the director and I intended.
engSearchText:
When I'm filming something, obviously I like to
think that the final product's going to come out just
like the director and I intended.
jpnChrName: ああ、“猫”だけに 夜目が効くとかそういうのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、“猫”だけに
夜目が効くとかそういうのか？

engChrName: But audiences don't always see what we see in the same way.
engSearchText:
But audiences don't always see what we see in the
same way.
jpnChrName: 別にそういうわけじゃ──じゃなくて 何のことを言ってるのかしら！？
jpnSearchText:
別にそういうわけじゃ──じゃなくて
何のことを言ってるのかしら！？

engChrName: They might hate something you felt confident about, or they'll love something you didn't even put all that much work into.
engSearchText:
They might hate something you felt confident about,
or they'll love something you didn't even put all that
much work into.
jpnChrName: （まだ引っ張るのかよ……）
jpnSearchText: （まだ引っ張るのかよ……）

engChrName: Some people might chalk it up to just differences in tastes or perspective, but that feels like such a waste when there's so much you can learn.
engSearchText:
Some people might chalk it up to just differences in
tastes or perspective, but that feels like such a waste
when there's so much you can learn.
jpnChrName: 昔からよく映画館で こんなことをしてたのか？
jpnSearchText:
昔からよく映画館で
こんなことをしてたのか？

engChrName: Unlike what you might think, we don't make movies just to satisfy ourselves. We want audiences to be moved—maybe even be inspired by them.
engSearchText:
Unlike what you might think, we don't make movies
just to satisfy ourselves. We want audiences to be
moved—maybe even be inspired by them.
jpnChrName: ……昔はね。 ここ２、３年はあんまり。
jpnSearchText:
……昔はね。
ここ２、３年はあんまり。

engChrName: You can't improve your craft as an actor unless you take the time to sit down and figure out where you and your audience don't see eye to eye.
engSearchText:
You can't improve your craft as an actor unless you
take the time to sit down and figure out where you
and your audience don't see eye to eye.
jpnChrName: 一作がクランクアップしたらすぐに また次の作品の撮影が入って──
jpnSearchText:
一作がクランクアップしたらすぐに
また次の作品の撮影が入って──

engChrName: At least, that's what I sincerely feel.
engSearchText: At least, that's what I sincerely feel.
jpnChrName: “副業”のこともあるし、 時間なんて取れなかったから。
jpnSearchText:
“副業”のこともあるし、
時間なんて取れなかったから。

engChrName: Huh. You put more thought into your work than I expected. I always figured you were just riding the wave of your success all the way to the bank.
engSearchText:
Huh. You put more thought into your work than
I expected. I always figured you were just riding the
wave of your success all the way to the bank.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに暇ができたってわけか。
jpnSearchText: 久しぶりに暇ができたってわけか。

engChrName: Aidios, you sound just like my mom and grammy! What on Zemuria makes you think I'm anything like that?!
engSearchText:
Aidios, you sound just like my mom and grammy!
What on Zemuria makes you think I'm anything
like that?!
jpnChrName: というよりは、作った、暇。
jpnSearchText: というよりは、作った、暇。

engChrName: I was tryin' to give you a compliment, I swear. Interesting to know your family gives you that same sort of grief, though.
engSearchText:
I was tryin' to give you a compliment, I swear.
Interesting to know your family gives you that same
sort of grief, though.
jpnChrName: 最近入った撮影やインタビューの オファーは全部断ったわ。
jpnSearchText:
最近入った撮影やインタビューの
オファーは全部断ったわ。

engChrName: Err... Pretend you didn't hear that.
engSearchText: Err... Pretend you didn't hear that.
jpnChrName: また思いきったことをしたな……
jpnSearchText: また思いきったことをしたな……

engChrName: Also, I'm impressed you can discern people's faces so much inside a dark movie theater.
engSearchText:
Also, I'm impressed you can discern people's faces so
much inside a dark movie theater.
jpnChrName: 別に、このままじゃいけないと思ったから。
jpnSearchText: 別に、このままじゃいけないと思ったから。

engChrName: Is that one of the perks from your side hustle? It gives you cat vision at night?
engSearchText:
Is that one of the perks from your side hustle? It gives
you cat vision at night?
jpnChrName: それは……この前の映画祭で 《最優秀女優賞》を取り逃したことか？
jpnSearchText:
それは……この前の映画祭で
《最優秀女優賞》を取り逃したことか？

engChrName: No, it's not because of th—I mean, I have no idea what you're talking about!
engSearchText:
No, it's not because of th—I mean, I have no idea
what you're talking about!
jpnChrName: ええ……
jpnSearchText: ええ……

engChrName: (Who does this woman think she's fooling?)
engSearchText: (Who does this woman think she's fooling?)
jpnChrName: ニナはあの若さで 途轍もない才能を持った女優だわ。
jpnSearchText:
ニナはあの若さで
途轍もない才能を持った女優だわ。

engChrName: Is this sort of field research somethin' you've always done since becoming an actress?
engSearchText:
Is this sort of field research somethin' you've always
done since becoming an actress?
jpnChrName: いつかこうなるかもしれないって思っては いたけど、まさかこんなに早かったとはね……
jpnSearchText:
いつかこうなるかもしれないって思っては
いたけど、まさかこんなに早かったとはね……

engChrName: I used to do it a lot back in the day. But the last two or three years, not so much.
engSearchText:
I used to do it a lot back in the day. But the last two
or three years, not so much.
jpnChrName: 別にお前さんが演技で 負けたとは思わねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
別にお前さんが演技で
負けたとは思わねえけどな。

engChrName: These days, as soon as I wrap up one film, it's immediately on to the next shoot.
engSearchText:
These days, as soon as I wrap up one film, it's
immediately on to the next shoot.
jpnChrName: 《ゴールデン・ブラッド》と《狼たちの鎮魂歌》── どちらもエンタメ性の高い大作映画だ。
jpnSearchText:
《ゴールデン・ブラッド》と《狼たちの鎮魂歌》──
どちらもエンタメ性の高い大作映画だ。

engChrName: Between that and my other 'occupation,' I hardly have time for it now.
engSearchText:
Between that and my other 'occupation,' I hardly
have time for it now.
jpnChrName: どんな映画評論でも、キャストの演技や 映画の完成度に優劣はつけがたいって意見が多数だ。
jpnSearchText:
どんな映画評論でも、キャストの演技や
映画の完成度に優劣はつけがたいって意見が多数だ。

engChrName: But you had some free time for once and decided to do it for old time's sake?
engSearchText:
But you had some free time for once and decided to
do it for old time's sake?
jpnChrName: サルバッド映画祭での結果だけに こだわる必要はねぇんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド映画祭での結果だけに
こだわる必要はねぇんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Had it? More like I had to make it for myself.
engSearchText: Had it? More like I had to make it for myself.
jpnChrName: それでも負けは負けよ。 そんなのは言い訳にしかならないわ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも負けは負けよ。
そんなのは言い訳にしかならないわ。

engChrName: I had to turn down every offer for shooting and interviews in order to make this happen.
engSearchText:
I had to turn down every offer for shooting and
interviews in order to make this happen.
jpnChrName: どんな状況であろうと、運すらも味方して、 観客も審査員も魅了する絶対的な演技──
jpnSearchText:
どんな状況であろうと、運すらも味方して、
観客も審査員も魅了する絶対的な演技──

engChrName: No kidding? That determined, huh?
engSearchText: No kidding? That determined, huh?
jpnChrName: それこそあたし、ジュディス・ランスターが 目指してるものなんだから！
jpnSearchText:
それこそあたし、ジュディス・ランスターが
目指してるものなんだから！

engChrName: It's not just that I missed it and wanted to do it. The festival made me realize I need to start stepping up my game.
engSearchText:
It's not just that I missed it and wanted to do it.
The festival made me realize I need to start stepping
up my game.
jpnChrName: （トップ女優ジュディス・ランスターか……   さすが、言うだけあるって感じだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（トップ女優ジュディス・ランスターか……
さすが、言うだけあるって感じだな。）

engChrName: Because you had the award for best actress taken from under your nose?
engSearchText:
Because you had the award for best actress taken from
under your nose?
jpnChrName: （実物を知った時はファンになったことを   後悔しそうになったもんだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（実物を知った時はファンになったことを
後悔しそうになったもんだが。）

engChrName: Pretty much...
engSearchText: Pretty much...
jpnChrName: ……なんだか失礼なことを 考えてないでしょうね？
jpnSearchText:
……なんだか失礼なことを
考えてないでしょうね？

engChrName: Nina has such incredible talent for an actress her age.
engSearchText: Nina has such incredible talent for an actress her age.
jpnChrName: まあいいわ──ところでアンタ、 どうやってあたしの変装を見破ったのよ？
jpnSearchText:
まあいいわ──ところでアンタ、
どうやってあたしの変装を見破ったのよ？

engChrName: I knew she might catch up to me sooner or later, but I didn't remotely expect it to happen this soon.
engSearchText:
I knew she might catch up to me sooner or later, but I
didn't remotely expect it to happen this soon.
jpnChrName: そんなに凝ったものじゃないけど、 結構自信があったのに……
jpnSearchText:
そんなに凝ったものじゃないけど、
結構自信があったのに……

engChrName: I get how that might be a shock to you, but it's just one film festival. Do you really need to be so hung up on the results?
engSearchText:
I get how that might be a shock to you, but it's just
one film festival. Do you really need to be so hung up
on the results?
jpnChrName: 多分、直前に お前さんの噂話を聞いたからだな。
jpnSearchText:
多分、直前に
お前さんの噂話を聞いたからだな。

engChrName: Her winning the award doesn't take away from the caliber of your own acting.
engSearchText:
Her winning the award doesn't take away from the
caliber of your own acting.
jpnChrName: でないとさすがに気付かなかっただろ。
jpnSearchText: でないとさすがに気付かなかっただろ。

engChrName: Golden Blood and Wolves' Requiem are both huge, incredibly entertaining films.
engSearchText:
Golden Blood and Wolves' Requiem are both huge,
incredibly entertaining films.
jpnChrName: 噂話？
jpnSearchText: 噂話？

engChrName: Most reviews had 'em neck and neck when it came to the quality of their acting and their sheer level of polish.
engSearchText:
Most reviews had 'em neck and neck when it came to
the quality of their acting and their sheer level
of polish.
jpnChrName: ジュディス・ランスターのだよ。 それこそ映画祭の結果についてのな。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス・ランスターのだよ。
それこそ映画祭の結果についてのな。

engChrName: I appreciate the pep talk, but I don't want to give myself excuses for what happened.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the pep talk, but I don't want to give
myself excuses for what happened.
jpnChrName: 聞き耳立てた限りじゃ応援してくれてるヤツも 全然多いみたいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
聞き耳立てた限りじゃ応援してくれてるヤツも
全然多いみたいだぜ。

engChrName: At the end of the day, I lost out. Those are the facts, plain and simple.
engSearchText:
At the end of the day, I lost out. Those are the facts,
plain and simple.
jpnChrName: もちろん、俺も含めてな。
jpnSearchText: もちろん、俺も含めてな。

engChrName: If I don't always knock audiences and judges off their feet with my acting, then I'm not doing the absolute best I can!
engSearchText:
If I don't always knock audiences and judges off their
feet with my acting, then I'm not doing the absolute
best I can!
jpnChrName: ……そ、そう。
jpnSearchText: ……そ、そう。

engChrName: (Spoken like a true actress who's earned her spot as queen of the industry.)
engSearchText:
(Spoken like a true actress who's earned her spot as
queen of the industry.)
jpnChrName: フフン、見てなさい、次の映画祭では 必ず最優秀賞をとってみせるんだから。
jpnSearchText:
フフン、見てなさい、次の映画祭では
必ず最優秀賞をとってみせるんだから。

engChrName: (When I first got to see the real her, I thought I'd regret ever being a fan...but maybe I don't have anything to worry about after all.)
engSearchText:
(When I first got to see the real her, I thought I'd
regret ever being a fan...but maybe I don't have
anything to worry about after all.)
jpnChrName: それまでは初心に戻って とことん自分の演技を磨かないとね！
jpnSearchText:
それまでは初心に戻って
とことん自分の演技を磨かないとね！

engChrName: You got something else you want to say to me, hmm?
engSearchText: You got something else you want to say to me, hmm?
jpnChrName: そうか……楽しみにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: そうか……楽しみにしてるぜ。

engChrName: Anyway, not to get off topic, but how did you see through my disguise in the theater?
engSearchText:
Anyway, not to get off topic, but how did you see
through my disguise in the theater?
jpnChrName: その後、自宅に 戻っていくジュディスを地下鉄まで見送り……
jpnSearchText:
その後、自宅に
戻っていくジュディスを地下鉄まで見送り……

engChrName: I know it wasn't the most elaborate thing in the world, but I was pretty confident I wouldn't get caught.
engSearchText:
I know it wasn't the most elaborate thing in the
world, but I was pretty confident I wouldn't
get caught.
jpnChrName: ヴァンも改めて巡回に戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンも改めて巡回に戻ったのだった。

engChrName: I probably only noticed 'cause I heard a couple of guys talking about you right before I saw you.
engSearchText:
I probably only noticed 'cause I heard a couple of guys
talking about you right before I saw you.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはタイレル地区のカフェに向かい、 テラス席で休憩することにした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはタイレル地区のカフェに向かい、
テラス席で休憩することにした。

engChrName: If I hadn't, I doubt I'd have given you the time of day.
engSearchText: If I hadn't, I doubt I'd have given you the time of day.
jpnChrName: （ふう、たまにはこういうのもいいもんだ。   昼間は色々ドタバタしてたしな……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう、たまにはこういうのもいいもんだ。
昼間は色々ドタバタしてたしな……）

engChrName: Really? What were they discussing?
engSearchText: Really? What were they discussing?
jpnChrName: 今なら他の客も少ないようです。
jpnSearchText: 今なら他の客も少ないようです。

engChrName: Nothin' big. Just how things went for you at the film festival.
engSearchText:
Nothin' big. Just how things went for you at the
film festival.
jpnChrName: ちょうどあの席が空いていますね。
jpnSearchText: ちょうどあの席が空いていますね。

engChrName: From the way they were talking, those awards—or lack of, I guess—don't seem to have done anything to diminish your fan base.
engSearchText:
From the way they were talking, those awards—or
lack of, I guess—don't seem to have done anything to
diminish your fan base.
jpnChrName: （この声は……）
jpnSearchText: （この声は……）

engChrName: I know I still count myself as part of it.
engSearchText: I know I still count myself as part of it.

engChrName: Oh, uh... Good to know.
engSearchText: Oh, uh... Good to know.
jpnChrName: どうかなさいましたか？
jpnSearchText: どうかなさいましたか？

engChrName: Well, don't you worry. Next time a film festival comes rolling around, I'll be standing at the top of that winners' podium where I belong.
engSearchText:
Well, don't you worry. Next time a film festival
comes rolling around, I'll be standing at the top of
that winners' podium where I belong.
jpnChrName: いえ、なんでもありません。
jpnSearchText: いえ、なんでもありません。

engChrName: Until then, I'm going back to basics and honing my acting so it's that much better! You'll see!
engSearchText:
Until then, I'm going back to basics and honing my
acting so it's that much better! You'll see!
jpnChrName: それでは、本日のインタビューを 始めさせていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、本日のインタビューを
始めさせていただきます。

engChrName: Heh. Good luck with that. I'll be watching.
engSearchText: Heh. Good luck with that. I'll be watching.
jpnChrName: ええ、よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ええ、よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Afterwards, Van escorted Judith to the subway on her way back home.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, Van escorted Judith to the subway on her
way back home.
jpnChrName: （ハッ、雑誌のインタビューか。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、雑誌のインタビューか。）

engChrName: From there, he resumed his patrol around town.
engSearchText: From there, he resumed his patrol around town.
jpnChrName: まずは先日アンカーヴィルで起きた 難事件の解決、本当にお疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText:
まずは先日アンカーヴィルで起きた
難事件の解決、本当にお疲れ様でした。

engChrName: Van decided to pay a visit to the café in the Tyrell District and took a break out on its terrace.
engSearchText:
Van decided to pay a visit to the café in the Tyrell
District and took a break out on its terrace.
jpnChrName: 各種交渉に現場に乗り込んでの犯人拘束、 まさに《剣の乙女》のご活躍あってこそでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
各種交渉に現場に乗り込んでの犯人拘束、
まさに《剣の乙女》のご活躍あってこそでしたね。

engChrName: (*sigh* Sometimes, a pit stop at a café is just what the doctor ordered. I sure needed it after such a crazy afternoon.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* Sometimes, a pit stop at a café is just what the
doctor ordered. I sure needed it after such a
crazy afternoon.)
jpnChrName: いえ、協力していただいた 皆さんのおかげでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、協力していただいた
皆さんのおかげでしょう。

engChrName: It looks like there aren't many customers here right now.
engSearchText:
It looks like there aren't many customers here
right now.
jpnChrName: 沢山の支えがあってこそ 私たちの手の届く範囲を広げられる──
jpnSearchText:
沢山の支えがあってこそ
私たちの手の届く範囲を広げられる──

engChrName: Perfect. Let's sit at that empty table over there.
engSearchText: Perfect. Let's sit at that empty table over there.
jpnChrName: Ａ級を拝命してなお、 改めて感じていることです。
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級を拝命してなお、
改めて感じていることです。

engChrName: (Hey, I recognize that voice.)
engSearchText: (Hey, I recognize that voice.)
jpnChrName: なるほど～、初心こそが大事であると。
jpnSearchText: なるほど～、初心こそが大事であると。

jpnChrName: そんなエレインさんのご実家といえば かの大手菓子メーカーですが──
jpnSearchText:
そんなエレインさんのご実家といえば
かの大手菓子メーカーですが──

engChrName: Are you okay? Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Are you okay? Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: いや～、本日は 誠にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、本日は
誠にありがとうございました。

engChrName: No, no, I'm fine.
engSearchText: No, no, I'm fine.
jpnChrName: 読者が気になるオフの話なんかも 色々聞かせていただいて！
jpnSearchText:
読者が気になるオフの話なんかも
色々聞かせていただいて！

engChrName: All right, then. Ready to start our interview?
engSearchText: All right, then. Ready to start our interview?
jpnChrName: ふふ、大したことじゃありませんが お役に立てたならよかったです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、大したことじゃありませんが
お役に立てたならよかったです。

engChrName: Yes. Ready when you are.
engSearchText: Yes. Ready when you are.
jpnChrName: それにしてもエレインさんの笑顔、 やはり画になりますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもエレインさんの笑顔、
やはり画になりますねぇ。

engChrName: (Ahh. Guess she's talkin' to some magazine tonight.)
engSearchText: (Ahh. Guess she's talkin' to some magazine tonight.)
jpnChrName: 以前も打診させていただきましたが 弊社から写真集を出す気はありませんか？
jpnSearchText:
以前も打診させていただきましたが
弊社から写真集を出す気はありませんか？

engChrName: First off, I wanted to discuss the whole incident that you resolved in Anchorville the other day.
engSearchText:
First off, I wanted to discuss the whole incident that
you resolved in Anchorville the other day.
jpnChrName: ……すみません、そういうのは 基本、お断りさせて頂いていまして。
jpnSearchText:
……すみません、そういうのは
基本、お断りさせて頂いていまして。

engChrName: You did a fantastic job apprehending the culprits as negotiations were taking place. Your work was instrumental in defusing the whole crisis.
engSearchText:
You did a fantastic job apprehending the culprits as
negotiations were taking place. Your work was
instrumental in defusing the whole crisis.
jpnChrName: うーん残念です、爆売れ間違いなし だと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
うーん残念です、爆売れ間違いなし
だと思いますが……

engChrName: Thank you—but it wasn't just me who pulled it off. I was with a whole team of people. I'd argue they were the ones who really made it possible.
engSearchText:
Thank you—but it wasn't just me who pulled it off.
I was with a whole team of people. I'd argue they
were the ones who really made it possible.
jpnChrName: とにかく今日はありがとうございました。 私は一足先に失礼させていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく今日はありがとうございました。
私は一足先に失礼させていただきます。

engChrName: Being promoted to A-rank has really driven that point home to me.
engSearchText:
Being promoted to A-rank has really driven that
point home to me.
jpnChrName: エレインさんはどうぞごゆっくり くつろいでくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんはどうぞごゆっくり
くつろいでくださいね。

engChrName: When we all come together and support one another, we can achieve far more than we could by ourselves. That was true in Anchorville as well.
engSearchText:
When we all come together and support one another,
we can achieve far more than we could by ourselves.
That was true in Anchorville as well.

engChrName: Interesting! Clearly you're a woman who values the fundamentals in life and work.
engSearchText:
Interesting! Clearly you're a woman who values the
fundamentals in life and work.
jpnChrName: バニラココアです。
jpnSearchText: バニラココアです。

engChrName: Now about your family—obviously, they run one of the biggest sweets manufacturers in Zemuria...
engSearchText:
Now about your family—obviously, they run one of
the biggest sweets manufacturers in Zemuria...
jpnChrName: え？　注文していませんが……
jpnSearchText: え？　注文していませんが……

engChrName: Well, that's all the questions I have for you. Thank you so much for taking the time to talk with me tonight.
engSearchText:
Well, that's all the questions I have for you.
Thank you so much for taking the time to talk with
me tonight.
jpnChrName: あちらのお客様からです。
jpnSearchText: あちらのお客様からです。

engChrName: Our readers are going to love learning about all the fascinating things you get up to in your spare time.
engSearchText:
Our readers are going to love learning about all the
fascinating things you get up to in your spare time.
jpnChrName: ……どういう風の吹き回しかしら？
jpnSearchText: ……どういう風の吹き回しかしら？

engChrName: It was my pleasure. I don't think I had anything all that insightful to offer, but if your readers will enjoy it, I'm happy to talk.
engSearchText:
It was my pleasure. I don't think I had anything all
that insightful to offer, but if your readers will enjoy
it, I'm happy to talk.
jpnChrName: 好きだろ？　バニラココア。
jpnSearchText: 好きだろ？　バニラココア。

engChrName: Also, I have to say! You look absolutely radiant as always.
engSearchText:
Also, I have to say! You look absolutely radiant
as always.
jpnChrName: 何年前のことだと思っているのよ……
jpnSearchText: 何年前のことだと思っているのよ……

engChrName: I know I've asked you before, but would you be willing to publish a photobook with our company? I think you should really consider it.
engSearchText:
I know I've asked you before, but would you be
willing to publish a photobook with our company?
I think you should really consider it.
jpnChrName: いらねえのかよ、じゃ俺が貰うが。
jpnSearchText: いらねえのかよ、じゃ俺が貰うが。

engChrName: I'm really sorry...but as a rule, I always turn down offers like that. It's nothing personal.
engSearchText:
I'm really sorry...but as a rule, I always turn down
offers like that. It's nothing personal.
jpnChrName: いらないとは言ってないわ。
jpnSearchText: いらないとは言ってないわ。

engChrName: That's a shame. I'm sure it would be a smash hit. The people can't get enough of you, you know.
engSearchText:
That's a shame. I'm sure it would be a smash hit.
The people can't get enough of you, you know.
jpnChrName: 今も好きよ、この味。 ホッとするから。
jpnSearchText:
今も好きよ、この味。
ホッとするから。

engChrName: Anyway, I'll let you go now. I've taken up enough of your time as it is.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'll let you go now. I've taken up enough of
your time as it is.
jpnChrName: たまにルネとお茶する時に頼むと、 “まだまだ子供だな”なんて笑われるけど。
jpnSearchText:
たまにルネとお茶する時に頼むと、
“まだまだ子供だな”なんて笑われるけど。

engChrName: Enjoy the rest of your evening.
engSearchText: Enjoy the rest of your evening.
jpnChrName: ハッ、目に浮かぶようだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、目に浮かぶようだ。

engChrName: *sigh*...
engSearchText: *sigh*...
jpnChrName: にしても、すっかりギルドの 広告塔になっちまったなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
にしても、すっかりギルドの
広告塔になっちまったなぁ。

engChrName: Here's your vanilla cocoa!
engSearchText: Here's your vanilla cocoa!
jpnChrName: 雑誌のインタビュー、 今シーズンに入ってこれで何件目だ？
jpnSearchText:
雑誌のインタビュー、
今シーズンに入ってこれで何件目だ？

engChrName: Huh? I didn't order anything like that.
engSearchText: Huh? I didn't order anything like that.
jpnChrName: ギルドの理念を宣伝するのも仕事の内、 Ａ級を引き受けた時に覚悟していたことよ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの理念を宣伝するのも仕事の内、
Ａ級を引き受けた時に覚悟していたことよ。

engChrName: You didn't, but the customer sitting at the next table did. He asked me to give you one.
engSearchText:
You didn't, but the customer sitting at the next
table did. He asked me to give you one.
jpnChrName: そう言ってる割には 疲れた顔をしてるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そう言ってる割には
疲れた顔をしてるじゃねえか。

engChrName: What's the big idea behind this?
engSearchText: What's the big idea behind this?

engChrName: There's no big idea. I just know you like vanilla cocoa, that's all.
engSearchText:
There's no big idea. I just know you like vanilla cocoa,
that's all.
jpnChrName: 上手く取り繕ってても分かんだよ。
jpnSearchText: 上手く取り繕ってても分かんだよ。

engChrName: How old do you think I am?
engSearchText: How old do you think I am?
jpnChrName: 昔からそういう機会が多いくせに、 本当は苦手なんだよな、お前。
jpnSearchText:
昔からそういう機会が多いくせに、
本当は苦手なんだよな、お前。

engChrName: Hey, if you don't want it, I'll gladly take it. Your call.
engSearchText: Hey, if you don't want it, I'll gladly take it. Your call.
jpnChrName: ヴァン……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……

engChrName: I didn't say I wouldn't have it.
engSearchText: I didn't say I wouldn't have it.
jpnChrName: 知ったような口を利かないで。 ……何年も見ていなかったくせに。
jpnSearchText:
知ったような口を利かないで。
……何年も見ていなかったくせに。

engChrName: You're not wrong. I do still enjoy this—it's a soothing flavor.
engSearchText:
You're not wrong. I do still enjoy this—it's a
soothing flavor.

engChrName: René always makes fun of me for it and says I'm still a little kid whenever we go out for drinks.
engSearchText:
René always makes fun of me for it and says I'm still a
little kid whenever we go out for drinks.
jpnChrName: ……だな、悪い。
jpnSearchText: ……だな、悪い。

engChrName: I'd be more shocked if he didn't.
engSearchText: I'd be more shocked if he didn't.
jpnChrName: 別に謝られることでもないわ。
jpnSearchText: 別に謝られることでもないわ。

engChrName: Still, you're pretty much the poster girl for the guild these days, aren't you?
engSearchText:
Still, you're pretty much the poster girl for the guild
these days, aren't you?
jpnChrName: 私のことより、自分の心配をしたらどう？
jpnSearchText: 私のことより、自分の心配をしたらどう？

engChrName: How many magazine interviews have you done this season? I've lost track.
engSearchText:
How many magazine interviews have you done
this season? I've lost track.
jpnChrName: いつまでもそんな違法スレスレな仕事をして、 貴方なら他にいくらでも……
jpnSearchText:
いつまでもそんな違法スレスレな仕事をして、
貴方なら他にいくらでも……

engChrName: It's no big deal. I knew that promoting the guild's mission was going to be part of the job when I accepted the promotion to A-rank.
engSearchText:
It's no big deal. I knew that promoting the guild's
mission was going to be part of the job when I
accepted the promotion to A-rank.
jpnChrName: いいんだよ、俺はこれで。 性に合ってんだ──色んな意味でな。
jpnSearchText:
いいんだよ、俺はこれで。
性に合ってんだ──色んな意味でな。

engChrName: For somethin' that's not such a big deal, you sure look exhausted carrying it out.
engSearchText:
For somethin' that's not such a big deal, you sure look
exhausted carrying it out.

jpnChrName: せめてアニエスさんとフェリさんだったわね、 あの子たちに危険なことをさせないように。
jpnSearchText:
せめてアニエスさんとフェリさんだったわね、
あの子たちに危険なことをさせないように。

engChrName: You might be able to play it cool around other people, but you can't fool me, Elaine.
engSearchText:
You might be able to play it cool around other people,
but you can't fool me, Elaine.
jpnChrName: ああ、分かってる。 本当にやべぇ時は自分でなんとかするさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、分かってる。
本当にやべぇ時は自分でなんとかするさ。

engChrName: As often as these sorts of things come up for you, deep down, I know they don't come easy.
engSearchText:
As often as these sorts of things come up for you,
deep down, I know they don't come easy.
jpnChrName: それもやめてほしいんだけど……
jpnSearchText: <S3>それもやめてほしいんだけど……

engChrName: ...I'd appreciate it if you didn't speak like you understand where I'm coming from, Van.
engSearchText:
...I'd appreciate it if you didn't speak like you
understand where I'm coming from, Van.
jpnChrName: そろそろ行くわね。
jpnSearchText: そろそろ行くわね。

engChrName: Not after you've been gone for all these years.
engSearchText: Not after you've been gone for all these years.
jpnChrName: バニラココア、ごちそうさま。 おかげで大分疲れが取れたわ。
jpnSearchText:
バニラココア、ごちそうさま。
おかげで大分疲れが取れたわ。

jpnChrName: ああ、じゃあな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、じゃあな。

engChrName: You're right. That was out of line. I'm sorry.
engSearchText: You're right. That was out of line. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: （……水に流して、   ってワケにはいかねぇよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……水に流して、
ってワケにはいかねぇよな。）

engChrName: You don't need to apologize. I wasn't asking you to.
engSearchText: You don't need to apologize. I wasn't asking you to.
jpnChrName: （ま、少しは休めたなら   奢った甲斐もあったってもんだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、少しは休めたなら
奢った甲斐もあったってもんだ。）

engChrName: You should be more worried about yourself first and foremost.
engSearchText:
You should be more worried about yourself first
and foremost.
jpnChrName: こっちはすっかり冷めちまったな。 ったく、やれやれだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
こっちはすっかり冷めちまったな。
ったく、やれやれだぜ……

engChrName: You're always brushing up at the very edge of the law with your work. You're a smart and capable man, Van. You could be doing so many other—
engSearchText:
You're always brushing up at the very edge of the law
with your work. You're a smart and capable man, Van.
You could be doing so many other—
jpnChrName: その後、あらためて一服してから 巡回を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、あらためて一服してから
巡回を再開するのだった。

engChrName: I'm fine with my life as a spriggan. It's what suits me best—in a lot of ways.
engSearchText:
I'm fine with my life as a spriggan. It's what suits me
best—in a lot of ways.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: ...If you say so.
engSearchText: ...If you say so.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Those young women who work with you: their names are Agnès and Feri, right? At least keep those two out of harm's way, all right?
engSearchText:
Those young women who work with you: their names
are Agnès and Feri, right? At least keep those two out
of harm's way, all right?
jpnChrName: お、珍しい所で会うな。
jpnSearchText: お、珍しい所で会うな。

engChrName: I will, I promise. If shit ever really hits the fan, I'll be the one who sticks his neck out and takes care of it one way or the other.
engSearchText:
I will, I promise. If shit ever really hits the fan,
I'll be the one who sticks his neck out and takes
care of it one way or the other.
jpnChrName: ヴァン……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……

engChrName: Talk like that is another thing I wish you would knock off.
engSearchText:
Talk like that is another thing I wish you would
knock off.
jpnChrName: 別に、通りかかっただけよ。 この辺りで依頼を受けてね。
jpnSearchText:
別に、通りかかっただけよ。
この辺りで依頼を受けてね。

engChrName: Well, I'm going to take off now.
engSearchText: Well, I'm going to take off now.
jpnChrName: そうか、てっきりサボって 映画でも見るのかと思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
そうか、てっきりサボって
映画でも見るのかと思ってたが。

engChrName: Thanks for the drink. I feel a lot better after that. Much more refreshed.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the drink. I feel a lot better after that.
Much more refreshed.
jpnChrName: これでも忙しいの、ヒマそうな貴方と 一緒にしないでちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
これでも忙しいの、ヒマそうな貴方と
一緒にしないでちょうだい。

engChrName: No problem. Have a good night.
engSearchText: No problem. Have a good night.
jpnChrName: 今は休憩時間だっつの。
jpnSearchText: 今は休憩時間だっつの。

engChrName: (Guess it's gonna take a lot more than that to mend things with her. Big surprise there.)
engSearchText:
(Guess it's gonna take a lot more than that to mend
things with her. Big surprise there.)
jpnChrName: それで、剣の乙女どのが注目してる 映画ってのはいったい──
jpnSearchText:
それで、剣の乙女どのが注目してる
映画ってのはいったい──

engChrName: (Oh, well. If it helped her relax and feel better after that interview, that's what counts. Money well spent.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, well. If it helped her relax and feel better after
that interview, that's what counts. Money well spent.)
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、私は仕事だから。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、私は仕事だから。

engChrName: Man, I got so busy talkin', I let it get cold. Money not so well spent there.
engSearchText:
Man, I got so busy talkin', I let it get cold. Money not
so well spent there.
jpnChrName: あ、おい……
jpnSearchText: あ、おい……

engChrName: After taking a sip of his cooled coffee, Van got back to patrolling Edith.
engSearchText:
After taking a sip of his cooled coffee, Van got back
to patrolling Edith.
jpnChrName: 共和国でも人気の“みっしぃ”が ついに映画になった！
jpnSearchText:
共和国でも人気の“みっしぃ”が
ついに映画になった！

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: 劇場版《長靴をはいたみっしぃ》、 １１月から公開予定！
jpnSearchText:
劇場版《長靴をはいたみっしぃ》、
１１月から公開予定！

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: ハン、なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ハン、なるほどな。

engChrName: Hey there. Not used to seein' you here.
engSearchText: Hey there. Not used to seein' you here.
jpnChrName: 好きなら好きでいいと思うが…… ま、あいつらしいか。
jpnSearchText:
好きなら好きでいいと思うが……
ま、あいつらしいか。

engChrName: Oh. It's you, Van.
engSearchText: Oh. It's you, Van.

engChrName: I'm not here to watch any movies. I was just passing through after receiving a nearby assignment.
engSearchText:
I'm not here to watch any movies. I was just passing
through after receiving a nearby assignment.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: That explains it. For a sec, I thought you were slackin' off and sneaking in a showing.
engSearchText:
That explains it. For a sec, I thought you were slackin'
off and sneaking in a showing.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Just because you have that sort of time on your hands doesn't mean we all do. I happen to be as busy as ever.
engSearchText:
Just because you have that sort of time on your hands
doesn't mean we all do. I happen to be as busy
as ever.
jpnChrName: で、急に呼び出して どういう風の吹き回しだ、ルネ？
jpnSearchText:
で、急に呼び出して
どういう風の吹き回しだ、ルネ？

engChrName: Hey, I'm plenty busy, too, y'know. I'm just taking a short break.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'm plenty busy, too, y'know. I'm just taking a
short break.
jpnChrName: 名前で呼ぶなっ。
jpnSearchText: 名前で呼ぶなっ。

engChrName: Anyway, which movie caught your attention? Curious what Beauty's Blade is into these—
engSearchText:
Anyway, which movie caught your attention?
Curious what Beauty's Blade is into these—
jpnChrName: まったく、開口一番このやり取りか。 何年経っても変わらんな。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、開口一番このやり取りか。
何年経っても変わらんな。

engChrName: Sorry, I can't talk any more. I have to get back to work.
engSearchText:
Sorry, I can't talk any more. I have to get back
to work.
jpnChrName: そりゃお前の名前が変わってねえからな。 改名したら呼び方を変えてやる。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃお前の名前が変わってねえからな。
改名したら呼び方を変えてやる。

engChrName: H-Hey! I was just asking!
engSearchText: H-Hey! I was just asking!
jpnChrName: フ、減らず口は増えたようだ。
jpnSearchText: フ、減らず口は増えたようだ。

engChrName: The Mishy everyone loves is hitting the big screen!
engSearchText: The Mishy everyone loves is hitting the big screen!
jpnChrName: 連絡先を交換してから プライベートで全く会ってないと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
連絡先を交換してから
プライベートで全く会ってないと思ってな。

engChrName: Mishy in Boots, coming to theaters this November!
engSearchText: Mishy in Boots, coming to theaters this November!
jpnChrName: せっかくだからこちらの仕事の 休憩時間に合わせて呼び出してみたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだからこちらの仕事の
休憩時間に合わせて呼び出してみたわけだ。

engChrName: Well, that explains it.
engSearchText: Well, that explains it.
jpnChrName: つまり用はねぇのかよ……ったく。
jpnSearchText: つまり用はねぇのかよ……ったく。

engChrName: Can't say I'm shocked she's a little bashful about it. Nothin' wrong with liking Mishy, though.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm shocked she's a little bashful about it.
Nothin' wrong with liking Mishy, though.
jpnChrName: 大体、男同士なら普通は酒を飲みながら ってのがお約束じゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
大体、男同士なら普通は酒を飲みながら
ってのがお約束じゃねえのか？

engChrName: Hmm... I've got an idea.
engSearchText: Hmm... I've got an idea.
jpnChrName: 飲みたいのは山々だがな。 それは今度の機会としておこう。
jpnSearchText:
飲みたいのは山々だがな。
それは今度の機会としておこう。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: 自由気ままな解決屋とは違って、 宮仕えは仕事が山積みでな。
jpnSearchText:
自由気ままな解決屋とは違って、
宮仕えは仕事が山積みでな。

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: それに用ならあるさ。
jpnSearchText: それに用ならあるさ。

engChrName: So what's the big deal, René? Why'd you drag me all the way out here on such short notice?
engSearchText:
So what's the big deal, René? Why'd you drag me
all the way out here on such short notice?
jpnChrName: 大事な“弟分”の近況が気になるのは “兄貴分”の性というものだろう？
jpnSearchText:
大事な“弟分”の近況が気になるのは
“兄貴分”の性というものだろう？

engChrName: You know I'd prefer if you didn't call me that.
engSearchText: You know I'd prefer if you didn't call me that.
jpnChrName: ……ったく……
jpnSearchText: ……ったく……

engChrName: All these years later, and I still have to remind you first thing when we sit down to talk. You never change, do you, Van?
engSearchText:
All these years later, and I still have to remind you
first thing when we sit down to talk. You never
change, do you, Van?
jpnChrName: 近況もなにも、こっちは相変わらずの 自転車操業ってだけだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
近況もなにも、こっちは相変わらずの
自転車操業ってだけだけどな。

engChrName: I only call you that 'cause it's still your name, pal. Change your name and I'll change what I call you. Simple as that.
engSearchText:
I only call you that 'cause it's still your name, pal.
Change your name and I'll change what I call you.
Simple as that.
jpnChrName: ああ、また人が増えたそうだな？ それも今度は黒月に連なる者らしい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、また人が増えたそうだな？
それも今度は黒月に連なる者らしい。

engChrName: Heh. I take that back. You HAVE changed. You're now sassier than before.
engSearchText:
Heh. I take that back. You HAVE changed.
You're now sassier than before.
jpnChrName: 裏稼業らしい面子になって来たじゃないか、 あのお嬢さんは置いておいて。
jpnSearchText:
裏稼業らしい面子になって来たじゃないか、
あのお嬢さんは置いておいて。

engChrName: Now, then, I realized that ever since we exchanged contact info, we haven't once gotten together in private like this.
engSearchText:
Now, then, I realized that ever since we exchanged
contact info, we haven't once gotten together in
private like this.
jpnChrName: だから言ってもねえことを 当然のように掴んでんじゃねえっ。
jpnSearchText:
だから言ってもねえことを
当然のように掴んでんじゃねえっ。

engChrName: So, since I had some time to relax away from work today, I decided to call you over here—and now, here we are.
engSearchText:
So, since I had some time to relax away from work
today, I decided to call you over here—and now, here
we are.
jpnChrName: ……どいつもこいつも勝手に押しかけて来ただけさ。 こっちの都合なんかお構いなしにな。
jpnSearchText:
……どいつもこいつも勝手に押しかけて来ただけさ。
こっちの都合なんかお構いなしにな。

engChrName: So you don't have any real business with me, is what you're saying? You're a real roundabout guy, y'know that?
engSearchText:
So you don't have any real business with me, is what
you're saying? You're a real roundabout guy,
y'know that?
jpnChrName: 俺としては一人の方がよかったんだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺としては一人の方がよかったんだが。

engChrName: Most guys when they just wanna shoot the shit together do it over a couple pints at the local bar or somethin'.
engSearchText:
Most guys when they just wanna shoot the shit
together do it over a couple pints at the local bar
or somethin'.
jpnChrName: その割には以前よりも 生き生きしているように見えるがな？
jpnSearchText:
その割には以前よりも
生き生きしているように見えるがな？

engChrName: Trust me, I have plenty of reasons to drink. We'll have to make time to do that sometime later.
engSearchText:
Trust me, I have plenty of reasons to drink.
We'll have to make time to do that sometime later.
jpnChrName: なるほど、いわゆるツンデレというヤツか。 ２０歳超えて目覚めるのは少々痛いが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、いわゆるツンデレというヤツか。
２０歳超えて目覚めるのは少々痛いが。

engChrName: Unlike your freewheeling self as a spriggan, those of us in the government always have our hands full with work.
engSearchText:
Unlike your freewheeling self as a spriggan, those of
us in the government always have our hands full
with work.
jpnChrName: ちげえよ！
jpnSearchText: ちげえよ！

engChrName: And I never said I didn't have business with you, Van.
engSearchText: And I never said I didn't have business with you, Van.
jpnChrName: はあ、マジで変わらねえな。 ……エレインの奴といい……
jpnSearchText:
はあ、マジで変わらねえな。
……エレインの奴といい……

engChrName: Don't you think it's my job as something of the older brother to wonder how you're doing and want to check in?
engSearchText:
Don't you think it's my job as something of the older
brother to wonder how you're doing and want to
check in?
jpnChrName: フッ…… それはお前も同じだろう。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……
それはお前も同じだろう。

engChrName: Oh... So that's what all this is about, huh?
engSearchText: Oh... So that's what all this is about, huh?
jpnChrName: 個人的には、バイト諸君にはお前にとっての いい刺激になってくれることを期待している。
jpnSearchText:
個人的には、バイト諸君にはお前にとっての
いい刺激になってくれることを期待している。

engChrName: Well, I'm just about the same as ever. Barely keepin' the business afloat as best I can. You know how it goes.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm just about the same as ever. Barely keepin'
the business afloat as best I can. You know how
it goes.
jpnChrName: あの時のようなことは 俺もエレインもコリゴリだからな。
jpnSearchText:
あの時のようなことは
俺もエレインもコリゴリだからな。

engChrName: You brought in more help, though, didn't you? I heard he's attached to Heiyue as well.
engSearchText:
You brought in more help, though, didn't you?
I heard he's attached to Heiyue as well.

engChrName: With one glaring exception, I have to say, you're building up quite the seedy roster of lackeys over there.
engSearchText:
With one glaring exception, I have to say, you're
building up quite the seedy roster of lackeys
over there.
jpnChrName: ？　仕事の連絡とかじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText: ？　仕事の連絡とかじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Could you not dig these things up like you're a world-class shovel before I've even said a word about them?!
engSearchText:
Could you not dig these things up like you're a
world-class shovel before I've even said a word
about them?!
jpnChrName: ああ、気にするな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、気にするな。

engChrName: But just so we're clear, they foisted themselves onto me without asking. They're not there 'cause I asked 'em to be.
engSearchText:
But just so we're clear, they foisted themselves onto
me without asking. They're not there 'cause I asked
'em to be.
jpnChrName: それよりも、まだ時間はあるな？ ──このまま居てもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
それよりも、まだ時間はあるな？
──このまま居てもらおうか。

engChrName: If I had it my way, I'd still be flyin' solo and everything would be perfect.
engSearchText:
If I had it my way, I'd still be flyin' solo and
everything would be perfect.
jpnChrName: そのコーヒーを飲み切るまでだ。 なんなら好きなスイーツを追加注文してもいい。
jpnSearchText:
そのコーヒーを飲み切るまでだ。
なんなら好きなスイーツを追加注文してもいい。

engChrName: You say that, but you have a noticeable spring in your step compared to before.
engSearchText:
You say that, but you have a noticeable spring in your
step compared to before.
jpnChrName: 今日は特別に俺の奢りだ。
jpnSearchText: 今日は特別に俺の奢りだ。

engChrName: It's fine to say you like them, Van. You're not a child anymore. No need to be bashful.
engSearchText:
It's fine to say you like them, Van. You're not a
child anymore. No need to be bashful.
jpnChrName: ！　……おい、まさか……
jpnSearchText: ！　……おい、まさか……

engChrName: Shut up!
engSearchText: Shut up!
jpnChrName: 雑談も止めるな、顔を強張らせるな。 あくまで自然にだ。
jpnSearchText:
雑談も止めるな、顔を強張らせるな。
あくまで自然にだ。

engChrName: *sigh* It's always the same with you. You and Elaine both...
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's always the same with you. You and
Elaine both...
jpnChrName: ……ああ、話し相手は 確かデータにあった……
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、話し相手は
確かデータにあった……

engChrName: And you, I should say.
engSearchText: And you, I should say.
jpnChrName: ………また連絡する………
jpnSearchText: ………また連絡する………

engChrName: If nothing else, I imagine your new helpers will be good for you in the long run.
engSearchText:
If nothing else, I imagine your new helpers will be
good for you in the long run.
jpnChrName: ……行ったか。
jpnSearchText: ……行ったか。

engChrName: My hope is they'll keep you from being tempted to repeat what you pulled before. Certainly Elaine and I would both appreciate it.
engSearchText:
My hope is they'll keep you from being tempted to
repeat what you pulled before. Certainly Elaine and I
would both appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 見られてたのはお前のほうか？
jpnSearchText: 見られてたのはお前のほうか？

jpnChrName: フッ……察しがいいな。
jpnSearchText: フッ……察しがいいな。

engChrName: Aren't you going to pick that up? It's probably a work call, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Aren't you going to pick that up? It's probably a work
call, isn't it?
jpnChrName: ……ああ、問題なく。 後は予定通り進めてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、問題なく。
後は予定通り進めてくれ。

engChrName: Don't worry about it. This is more important.
engSearchText: Don't worry about it. This is more important.
jpnChrName: ったく……要するにこっちが 本当の用事だったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……要するにこっちが
本当の用事だったわけだ。

engChrName: Now, you're not in a rush, right? Why don't you and I...stay here for a while?
engSearchText:
Now, you're not in a rush, right? Why don't you and
I...stay here for a while?
jpnChrName: フッ、そう拗ねるな。 お前の近況を聞きたかったのも確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、そう拗ねるな。
お前の近況を聞きたかったのも確かだ。

engChrName: At least until we're done drinking our coffee. You can even order some dessert, if you like.
engSearchText:
At least until we're done drinking our coffee. You can
even order some dessert, if you like.
jpnChrName: 拗ねてねぇっつの。
jpnSearchText: 拗ねてねぇっつの。

engChrName: It'll be my treat. I'm feeling generous.
engSearchText: It'll be my treat. I'm feeling generous.
jpnChrName: 奴はヒューバート── １年半ほど前に入ったＣＩＤの新参者だ。
jpnSearchText:
奴はヒューバート──
１年半ほど前に入ったＣＩＤの新参者だ。

engChrName: ...Are you telling me we're—
engSearchText: ...Are you telling me we're—
jpnChrName: その割にはそれなりに 修羅場を潜っていた感じだが。
jpnSearchText:
その割にはそれなりに
修羅場を潜っていた感じだが。

engChrName: Keep talking like normal and don't look alarmed. This must look like a perfectly natural conversation.
engSearchText:
Keep talking like normal and don't look alarmed.
This must look like a perfectly natural conversation.
jpnChrName: なんでそんなのが 分析官殿を見張ってやがるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
なんでそんなのが
分析官殿を見張ってやがるんだ？

engChrName: Yeah. He's talking to that guy we have in our data.
engSearchText: Yeah. He's talking to that guy we have in our data.
jpnChrName: 新参者であっても新人ではない。 ──元は帝国軍情報局の者だからな。
jpnSearchText:
新参者であっても新人ではない。
──元は帝国軍情報局の者だからな。

engChrName: ...All right. I'll contact you again later.
engSearchText: ...All right. I'll contact you again later.
jpnChrName: 帝国軍情報局…… 少し前に再編したっつう。
jpnSearchText:
帝国軍情報局……
少し前に再編したっつう。

engChrName: Looks like he took off.
engSearchText: Looks like he took off.
jpnChrName: 《鉄血》が命を落とし、大戦が終結した後の 帝国に見切りをつけ──
jpnSearchText:
《鉄血》が命を落とし、大戦が終結した後の
帝国に見切りをつけ──

engChrName: Am I right in thinkin' it was you he was watching and not me?
engSearchText:
Am I right in thinkin' it was you he was watching and
not me?
jpnChrName: “新情報局”設立の詳細を手土産に うちに寝返って来た。
jpnSearchText:
“新情報局”設立の詳細を手土産に
うちに寝返って来た。

engChrName: Indeed. Your intuition is on point.
engSearchText: Indeed. Your intuition is on point.
jpnChrName: あくまでも帝国側に籍を残したままでな。
jpnSearchText: あくまでも帝国側に籍を残したままでな。

engChrName: ...Correct. No problems here. Proceed with things as we originally planned.
engSearchText:
...Correct. No problems here. Proceed with things as
we originally planned.
jpnChrName: そいつは…… ２重スパイってヤツか。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは……
２重スパイってヤツか。

engChrName: Aidios. This is why you really called me out here, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Aidios. This is why you really called me out here,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: ──と、いうことになっている。 あくまでＣＩＤ内部ではな。
jpnSearchText:
──と、いうことになっている。
あくまでＣＩＤ内部ではな。
