engChrName: No need to be so upset. It wasn't entirely about me— I genuinely wanted to hear how you were doing, too.
engSearchText:
No need to be so upset. It wasn't entirely about me—
I genuinely wanted to hear how you were doing, too.
jpnChrName: ！？　おいおいまさか……
jpnSearchText: ！？　おいおいまさか……

engChrName: I didn't say I was upset.
engSearchText: I didn't say I was upset.
jpnChrName: 実際は３重スパイ（トリプル・クロス）だろう。
jpnSearchText: 実際は３重スパイ（トリプル・クロス）だろう。

engChrName: His name is Hubert. He's a relatively recent hire of the CID who joined us a year and a half ago.
engSearchText:
His name is Hubert. He's a relatively recent hire of
the CID who joined us a year and a half ago.
jpnChrName: こちらに寝返ったのは嘘で、真の目的は こちらの情報の入手、もしくは攪乱だ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらに寝返ったのは嘘で、真の目的は
こちらの情報の入手、もしくは攪乱だ。

engChrName: That's all? He sure looks and acts like someone who's a lot less fresh than that.
engSearchText:
That's all? He sure looks and acts like someone who's
a lot less fresh than that.
jpnChrName: 新情報局、レクター・アランドールの指示でな。
jpnSearchText: 新情報局、レクター・アランドールの指示でな。

engChrName: What's a guy like him doing lookin' after one of the agency's own analysts?
engSearchText:
What's a guy like him doing lookin' after one of the
agency's own analysts?

engChrName: I said he was new to the CID, not the occupation itself. He used to work for the Imperial Army's Intelligence Division.
engSearchText:
I said he was new to the CID, not the
occupation itself. He used to work for the Imperial
Army's Intelligence Division.
jpnChrName: その名前は聞いたことはある…… 相当な切れ者だって話だな。
jpnSearchText:
その名前は聞いたことはある……
相当な切れ者だって話だな。

engChrName: One of Erebonia's guys? Didn't their agency just get a big reshuffle a little while back?
engSearchText:
One of Erebonia's guys? Didn't their agency just get a
big reshuffle a little while back?
jpnChrName: ああ、《鉄血》亡き後でも、帝国軍情報局の 中心を支える厄介な人物だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《鉄血》亡き後でも、帝国軍情報局の
中心を支える厄介な人物だ。

engChrName: That's right. With the Ironbloods out of the picture and the war over, he said he saw the Empire as a lost cause.
engSearchText:
That's right. With the Ironbloods out of the picture
and the war over, he said he saw the Empire as a
lost cause.
jpnChrName: 大戦後に帝国へ送ったこちらの工作員、 そのほとんどが奴に排除、懐柔されていた。
jpnSearchText:
大戦後に帝国へ送ったこちらの工作員、
そのほとんどが奴に排除、懐柔されていた。

engChrName: So he came over to our side and was nice enough to supply us with intelligence about the founding of Erebonia's new Intelligence Division.
engSearchText:
So he came over to our side and was nice enough to
supply us with intelligence about the founding of
Erebonia's new Intelligence Division.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤが何度も煮え湯を飲まされた相手だ。
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤが何度も煮え湯を飲まされた相手だ。

engChrName: He still maintains his citizenship over there as well.
engSearchText: He still maintains his citizenship over there as well.
jpnChrName: おいおい、ちょっと待て。 お前がそれすらも掴んでるっつうことは……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、ちょっと待て。
お前がそれすらも掴んでるっつうことは……

engChrName: A double agent, then.
engSearchText: A double agent, then.
jpnChrName: お前と会っている場面を見せたことで、 多少なりともあちら側の情報網を攪乱できる。
jpnSearchText:
お前と会っている場面を見せたことで、
多少なりともあちら側の情報網を攪乱できる。

engChrName: ...He is—insofar as most people within the CID are concerned.
engSearchText:
...He is—insofar as most people within the CID
are concerned.
jpnChrName: ヤツを更なる４重スパイ（クアドルプル ・クロス）に 仕立てよう、というわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツを更なる４重スパイ（クアドルプル ・クロス）に
仕立てよう、というわけだ。

engChrName: Hold on! You're tellin' me he's...
engSearchText: Hold on! You're tellin' me he's...
jpnChrName: ──あの《かかし男》の次の一手が見物だな。
jpnSearchText: ──あの《かかし男》の次の一手が見物だな。

engChrName: Yes. In all likelihood, he's a triple agent.
engSearchText: Yes. In all likelihood, he's a triple agent.
jpnChrName: そこまで行くと 複雑すぎてワケがわかんねぇよ……
jpnSearchText:
そこまで行くと
複雑すぎてワケがわかんねぇよ……

engChrName: He hasn't truly defected to our side. His real objective is to either obtain information on us or disrupt our operations.
engSearchText:
He hasn't truly defected to our side. His real objective
is to either obtain information on us or disrupt
our operations.
jpnChrName: つうかロクでもねぇ諜報戦に 巻き込んでんじゃねえ、この鬼畜メガネが！
jpnSearchText:
つうかロクでもねぇ諜報戦に
巻き込んでんじゃねえ、この鬼畜メガネが！

engChrName: All under the orders of Lechter Arundel at the new division.
engSearchText:
All under the orders of Lechter Arundel at the
new division.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう言うな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そう言うな。

jpnChrName: だから好きなだけスイーツを 注文していいと言っただろう？
jpnSearchText:
だから好きなだけスイーツを
注文していいと言っただろう？

engChrName: I've heard that name before. Has a reputation for being a real cunning bastard.
engSearchText:
I've heard that name before. Has a reputation for
being a real cunning bastard.
jpnChrName: 絶対釣り合わねえっつーの！！
jpnSearchText: 絶対釣り合わねえっつーの！！

engChrName: You're telling me. Even with the Ironbloods gone, he's a formidable figure who continues to sit at the heart of their intelligence operations.
engSearchText:
You're telling me. Even with the Ironbloods gone,
he's a formidable figure who continues to sit at the
heart of their intelligence operations.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンは仕返しとばかりに 高価な順にスイーツを注文したものの、 キンケイドは全く平気な顔で支払いを終え……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンは仕返しとばかりに
高価な順にスイーツを注文したものの、
キンケイドは全く平気な顔で支払いを終え……

engChrName: Nearly all spies we've sent into Erebonia since the war have either been terminated or sweet-talked into joining him instead.
engSearchText:
Nearly all spies we've sent into Erebonia since the war
have either been terminated or sweet-talked into
joining him instead.
jpnChrName: 幼馴染の変わらないそつのなさに溜息をつきながら 業務に戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
幼馴染の変わらないそつのなさに溜息をつきながら
業務に戻ったのだった。

engChrName: We've had quite a lot of egg on our face in recent times because of him.
engSearchText:
We've had quite a lot of egg on our face in recent
times because of him.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: All right, so back up a sec. If you already know that much about him, then that means you must be doing somethin' about it, right?
engSearchText:
All right, so back up a sec. If you already know that
much about him, then that means you must be doing
somethin' about it, right?
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Correct. By letting him see me with you, we hope to cause a little disruption of our own within his intelligence network.
engSearchText:
Correct. By letting him see me with you, we hope to
cause a little disruption of our own within his
intelligence network.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋さん、来てくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋さん、来てくれてありがとう。

engChrName: With any luck, he'll be turned into a quadruple agent working to our benefit, whether he realizes it or not.
engSearchText:
With any luck, he'll be turned into a quadruple agent
working to our benefit, whether he realizes it or not.
jpnChrName: お前さんからの依頼とはな。 わざわざアニエスに内緒でとは。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんからの依頼とはな。
わざわざアニエスに内緒でとは。

engChrName: Suffice it to say, it will be very interesting to see what Scarecrow's next move will be.
engSearchText:
Suffice it to say, it will be very interesting to see what
Scarecrow's next move will be.
jpnChrName: 余計な心配をかけたくなくてね。
jpnSearchText: 余計な心配をかけたくなくてね。

engChrName: I'm not gonna lie. All this double-double crossing crap you got goin' on is making my head spin...
engSearchText:
I'm not gonna lie. All this double-double crossing
crap you got goin' on is making my head spin...
jpnChrName: 本音は？
jpnSearchText: 本音は？

engChrName: And hey! Keep me outta your stupid intelligence warfare! I don't want anything to do with that bullshit whatsoever!
engSearchText:
And hey! Keep me outta your stupid
intelligence warfare! I don't want anything to do with
that bullshit whatsoever!
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋さんと二人で解決したほうが 面白そうだから。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋さんと二人で解決したほうが
面白そうだから。

engChrName: Now, now. No need to get so worked up.
engSearchText: Now, now. No need to get so worked up.
jpnChrName: 面白いって……
jpnSearchText: 面白いって……

engChrName: I told you that you can order anything off the dessert menu. Go ahead—pick whatever you like. It'll make you feel better.
engSearchText:
I told you that you can order anything off the
dessert menu. Go ahead—pick whatever you like.
It'll make you feel better.
jpnChrName: もちろん前者も本音だけど。
jpnSearchText: もちろん前者も本音だけど。

engChrName: Don't you try to bribe me, you spectacled sadist!
engSearchText: Don't you try to bribe me, you spectacled sadist!
jpnChrName: 学校周辺で 問題が起きてるとか言ってたな？
jpnSearchText:
学校周辺で
問題が起きてるとか言ってたな？

engChrName: Van proceeded to order the most expensive desserts he could find out of spite. However, Kincaid wasn't even fazed, paying for it without a word of protest.
engSearchText:
Van proceeded to order the most expensive desserts
he could find out of spite. However, Kincaid wasn't
even fazed, paying for it without a word of protest.
jpnChrName: 実は最近、うちの生徒たちの身の上を 嗅ぎ回っている連中がいるみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
実は最近、うちの生徒たちの身の上を
嗅ぎ回っている連中がいるみたいでね。

engChrName: Exasperated by his friend's eternally unflappable demeanor, Van returned to work with a sigh.
engSearchText:
Exasperated by his friend's eternally unflappable
demeanor, Van returned to work with a sigh.
jpnChrName: 穏やかな話じゃなさそうだな。 警察やギルドには相談したのか？
jpnSearchText:
穏やかな話じゃなさそうだな。
警察やギルドには相談したのか？

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: いいえ、今のところは。
jpnSearchText: いいえ、今のところは。

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 情報源がちょっと警察方面には 言いにくいものだから。
jpnSearchText:
情報源がちょっと警察方面には
言いにくいものだから。

engChrName: It's good to see you, spriggan. Thanks for coming by.
engSearchText: It's good to see you, spriggan. Thanks for coming by.
jpnChrName: その情報源が何かはあえて聞かないとして、 嗅ぎ回ってる、ねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
その情報源が何かはあえて聞かないとして、
嗅ぎ回ってる、ねぇ……

engChrName: No problem. Didn't expect to get a request from you of all people, though. What gives? Why don't you want Agnès to know?
engSearchText:
No problem. Didn't expect to get a request from you
of all people, though. What gives? Why don't you
want Agnès to know?
jpnChrName: 普通に考えりゃ 誘拐のための下調べって所か。
jpnSearchText:
普通に考えりゃ
誘拐のための下調べって所か。

engChrName: Oh, I just don't want her to worry for no good reason, that's all.
engSearchText:
Oh, I just don't want her to worry for no good reason,
that's all.
jpnChrName: アラミスは資産家の子供も それなりにいるからな。
jpnSearchText:
アラミスは資産家の子供も
それなりにいるからな。

engChrName: Sure, 'that's all.' What's the real reason?
engSearchText: Sure, 'that's all.' What's the real reason?
jpnChrName: あの学校の敷地は警備も万全だし そう簡単には行かないはずだが。
jpnSearchText:
あの学校の敷地は警備も万全だし
そう簡単には行かないはずだが。

engChrName: Because it'll be more fun to take care of if it's just the two of us.
engSearchText:
Because it'll be more fun to take care of if it's just the
two of us.
jpnChrName: だけど確かに予兆はある。
jpnSearchText: だけど確かに予兆はある。

engChrName: Fun, huh? You always have an...interesting definition of that.
engSearchText:
Fun, huh? You always have an...interesting definition
of that.
jpnChrName: そして生徒たちだけで学校を離れる タイミングなら警備は及ばなくなってしまう。
jpnSearchText:
そして生徒たちだけで学校を離れる
タイミングなら警備は及ばなくなってしまう。

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. I really don't want to concern Agnès with this, either.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. I really don't want to concern
Agnès with this, either.
jpnChrName: そうか、確かアラミスはそろそろ……
jpnSearchText: そうか、確かアラミスはそろそろ……

engChrName: I'll take your word for it. You said you guys are having some kind of problem in the neighborhood around Aramis?
engSearchText:
I'll take your word for it. You said you guys are having
some kind of problem in the neighborhood
around Aramis?
jpnChrName: そう、控えている“あの行事”が 唯一のネックでね。
jpnSearchText:
そう、控えている“あの行事”が
唯一のネックでね。

engChrName: Right. In short, we seem to be having some people who are trying to spy on our students of late.
engSearchText:
Right. In short, we seem to be having some people
who are trying to spy on our students of late.
jpnChrName: 生徒だけでの校外活動になるから 私が全部カバーするのは物理的に不可能。
jpnSearchText:
生徒だけでの校外活動になるから
私が全部カバーするのは物理的に不可能。

engChrName: Not somethin' you really wanna hear. Have you talked to the police or the guild about it?
engSearchText:
Not somethin' you really wanna hear. Have you
talked to the police or the guild about it?
jpnChrName: 出来ればそれまでに完全に懸念を 取り除いておきたいの。
jpnSearchText:
出来ればそれまでに完全に懸念を
取り除いておきたいの。

engChrName: No. Not yet.
engSearchText: No. Not yet.
jpnChrName: ……俺が知ってる前提で 話を進めてるのは気になるが、まあいい。
jpnSearchText:
……俺が知ってる前提で
話を進めてるのは気になるが、まあいい。

engChrName: My source for this information isn't the kind I'd rather share with the police in particular. I'm sure you understand.
engSearchText:
My source for this information isn't the kind I'd
rather share with the police in particular. I'm sure
you understand.
jpnChrName: たしかに、今のうちにとっとと 片付けちまったほうがいいだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
たしかに、今のうちにとっとと
片付けちまったほうがいいだろうな。

engChrName: Fair enough. I won't stick my nose where it isn't wanted either, then. If we're talkin' about kids being spied on here...
engSearchText:
Fair enough. I won't stick my nose where it isn't
wanted either, then. If we're talkin' about kids being
spied on here...
jpnChrName: 協力してくれるかしら？
jpnSearchText: 協力してくれるかしら？

engChrName: ...then conventional wisdom would suggest these people are scoping 'em out to kidnap them later.
engSearchText:
...then conventional wisdom would suggest these
people are scoping 'em out to kidnap them later.
jpnChrName: ま、ここまで話を聞いたしな。 ……それに面白そうだからとか言ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ここまで話を聞いたしな。
……それに面白そうだからとか言ってたが。

engChrName: Wouldn't be all that surprising considering how many kids there come from money.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't be all that surprising considering how many
kids there come from money.
jpnChrName: お前さんが俺に頼むってことは “ワケあり”なんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんが俺に頼むってことは
“ワケあり”なんだろう？

engChrName: Even so, with the sort of security that campus has got, they've got their work cut out for them.
engSearchText:
Even so, with the sort of security that campus has got,
they've got their work cut out for them.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、実はまったく心当たりが ないわけでもなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、実はまったく心当たりが
ないわけでもなくてね。

engChrName: They do, but the signs are there nevertheless.
engSearchText: They do, but the signs are there nevertheless.
jpnChrName: その意味でも貴方の手を借りたいの。
jpnSearchText: その意味でも貴方の手を借りたいの。

engChrName: Plus these people don't have to strike on campus to cause trouble. Once the students leave campus, they're out of our security guards' orbit.
engSearchText:
Plus these people don't have to strike on campus to
cause trouble. Once the students leave campus,
they're out of our security guards' orbit.
jpnChrName: もちろん、通常の依頼料とは別の “報酬”も用意しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、通常の依頼料とは別の
“報酬”も用意しているわ。

engChrName: Right. Which is exactly what they'll be doing sooner rather than later. I see where this is going.
engSearchText:
Right. Which is exactly what they'll be doing sooner
rather than later. I see where this is going.
jpnChrName: リベール王国の有名アイスクリーム屋、 《ソルベ》の新作ジェラート……
jpnSearchText:
リベール王国の有名アイスクリーム屋、
《ソルベ》の新作ジェラート……

engChrName: Exactly. Our big trip coming up puts me in a real bind.
engSearchText:
Exactly. Our big trip coming up puts me in a
real bind.
jpnChrName: 王都グランセルから空輸で 取り寄せさせてもらったわ。
jpnSearchText:
王都グランセルから空輸で
取り寄せさせてもらったわ。

engChrName: With the students operating on their own outside of campus, it'll be impossible for me to be in all places at once to keep an eye on things.
engSearchText:
With the students operating on their own outside of
campus, it'll be impossible for me to be in all places at
once to keep an eye on things.
jpnChrName: 某スイーツ情報誌で今話題のッ！？
jpnSearchText: 某スイーツ情報誌で今話題のッ！？

engChrName: Which is why I'd prefer if we can get all of this straightened out before we leave so I can put this idiot's machinations to bed once and for all.
engSearchText:
Which is why I'd prefer if we can get all of this
straightened out before we leave so I can put this
idiot's machinations to bed once and for all.
jpnChrName: 取り寄せの予約は１年先まで 埋まってるって話だったはずじゃあ……！！
jpnSearchText:
取り寄せの予約は１年先まで
埋まってるって話だったはずじゃあ……！！

engChrName: ...Sounds like there's more to this than meets the eye, but even without me knowing, I understand where you're comin' from.
engSearchText:
...Sounds like there's more to this than meets the eye,
but even without me knowing, I understand where
you're comin' from.
jpnChrName: フフ、貴方に頼む以上は これくらいは当然でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、貴方に頼む以上は
これくらいは当然でしょう？

engChrName: Not somethin' we should put on the back burner, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Not somethin' we should put on the back burner,
that's for sure.
jpnChrName: ハッ……分かってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……分かってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: So does that mean you'll help me?
engSearchText: So does that mean you'll help me?
jpnChrName: こうなったら 全力であたらせてもらうぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら
全力であたらせてもらうぜ……！

engChrName: I've come this far, so might as well. Plus I'm curious what would make it so 'fun,' as you put it.
engSearchText:
I've come this far, so might as well. Plus I'm curious
what would make it so 'fun,' as you put it.
jpnChrName: あれっ、あれっ、メモが……
jpnSearchText: あれっ、あれっ、メモが……

engChrName: Guessin' you have some sort of reason you want me to help you specifically?
engSearchText:
Guessin' you have some sort of reason you want me to
help you specifically?
jpnChrName: よう、こいつはお前さんのかい？
jpnSearchText: よう、こいつはお前さんのかい？

engChrName: I do. I have a good hunch as to who might be behind this.
engSearchText:
I do. I have a good hunch as to who might be
behind this.
jpnChrName: 拾ってくれたんですか？ あ、ありがとうございます～。
jpnSearchText:
拾ってくれたんですか？
あ、ありがとうございます～。

engChrName: He's the kind of person who'd be best to handle with your help.
engSearchText:
He's the kind of person who'd be best to handle with
your help.
jpnChrName: 大事なものですから 失くしてなくてよかったですっ。
jpnSearchText:
大事なものですから
失くしてなくてよかったですっ。

engChrName: Of course, I want to make it worth your time, too, so I've arranged a special award for you in addition to your usual commission.
engSearchText:
Of course, I want to make it worth your time, too, so
I've arranged a special award for you in addition to
your usual commission.
jpnChrName: 上映中も熱心にメモしてたな。 内容を書き留めていたのか？
jpnSearchText:
上映中も熱心にメモしてたな。
内容を書き留めていたのか？

engChrName: There's a famous ice cream maker in Liberl who put out a brand new gelato flavor.
engSearchText:
There's a famous ice cream maker in Liberl who put
out a brand new gelato flavor.
jpnChrName: 内容……というよりは演技の方でして。 今回はすごく参考になりました。
jpnSearchText:
内容……というよりは演技の方でして。
今回はすごく参考になりました。

engChrName: A flavor that I just so happened to have flown to me all the way from Grancel. You interested?
engSearchText:
A flavor that I just so happened to have flown to me
all the way from Grancel. You interested?
jpnChrName: 特に主人公のショーンが、自分の無力さを 感じて葛藤する時の表情──
jpnSearchText:
特に主人公のショーンが、自分の無力さを
感じて葛藤する時の表情──

engChrName: 'Interested'?! That flavor's the hottest topic right now in the sweets magazine I read!
engSearchText:
'Interested'?! That flavor's the hottest topic right now
in the sweets magazine I read!
jpnChrName: 何重もの感情が一点に重なったように見えて、 本当に素晴らしかったですっ！
jpnSearchText:
何重もの感情が一点に重なったように見えて、
本当に素晴らしかったですっ！

engChrName: I thought they had orders for that stuff backed up all the way to next year!
engSearchText:
I thought they had orders for that stuff backed up all
the way to next year!
jpnChrName: ああ確かに、あれは名演だったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ確かに、あれは名演だったな。

engChrName: What can I say? If I want your services, I've got to make sure I come prepared. It's the least I could do.
engSearchText:
What can I say? If I want your services, I've got to
make sure I come prepared. It's the least I could do.
jpnChrName: 女子高生が見るには渋い映画だと思うが、 なかなか見る目があるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
女子高生が見るには渋い映画だと思うが、
なかなか見る目があるじゃないか。

engChrName: Heh. You know me too well, Kitty.
engSearchText: Heh. You know me too well, Kitty.
jpnChrName: アラミスの演劇部の部員あたりか？
jpnSearchText: アラミスの演劇部の部員あたりか？

engChrName: If that's on the line, you can be damn sure I'll earn my keep! Let's get to work!
engSearchText:
If that's on the line, you can be damn sure I'll earn
my keep! Let's get to work!
jpnChrName: えっと……そのようなものです。 実は女優志望でして。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……そのようなものです。
実は女優志望でして。

engChrName: Huh? Just where did my notes go? Oh, no...
engSearchText: Huh? Just where did my notes go? Oh, no...
jpnChrName: そのためにも日々勉強中なんですっ。
jpnSearchText: そのためにも日々勉強中なんですっ。

engChrName: Hey. Looking for this?
engSearchText: Hey. Looking for this?
jpnChrName: ま、頑張りな。 その熱意がありゃ本当になっちまうかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、頑張りな。
その熱意がありゃ本当になっちまうかもな。

engChrName: Oh, yes! Thank you so much! You don't know how much I appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Oh, yes! Thank you so much! You don't know how
much I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: えへへ、ありがとうございます。 それでは、またどこかで～。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ありがとうございます。
それでは、またどこかで～。

engChrName: These notes are so important to me. I would've hated to lose them.
engSearchText:
These notes are so important to me. I would've hated
to lose them.
jpnChrName: （ハン……？   どっかで見覚えあるような……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……？
どっかで見覚えあるような……）

engChrName: You were writing a ton of stuff down while that movie was playing. Were you jottin' down the plot for future reference?
engSearchText:
You were writing a ton of stuff down while that
movie was playing. Were you jottin' down the plot for
future reference?
jpnChrName: （……まさかな。）
jpnSearchText: （……まさかな。）

engChrName: Err, not so much the plot as how the actors performed. Watching them gave me a lot of really good food for thought.
engSearchText:
Err, not so much the plot as how the
actors performed. Watching them gave me a lot of
really good food for thought.
jpnChrName: 『天国のこちら側』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『天国のこちら側』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Especially when it came to Shawn, the main character.
engSearchText: Especially when it came to Shawn, the main character.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは映画の上映スケジュールを確認がてら 《シネマ・エスプリ》を訪れた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは映画の上映スケジュールを確認がてら
《シネマ・エスプリ》を訪れた。

engChrName: The way he looked so powerless as he argued with his supervisor, you could see so many emotions running through him at once. It was incredible!
engSearchText:
The way he looked so powerless as he argued with his
supervisor, you could see so many emotions running
through him at once. It was incredible!
jpnChrName: お目当ての『ゴールデンブラッド　完全版』、 他にもいくつかの新作映画の情報を仕入れつつ……
jpnSearchText:
お目当ての『ゴールデンブラッド　完全版』、
他にもいくつかの新作映画の情報を仕入れつつ……

engChrName: Absolutely. Master class in acting right there.
engSearchText: Absolutely. Master class in acting right there.
jpnChrName: 自分へのご褒美として カラメルポップコーンを買って帰るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
自分へのご褒美として
カラメルポップコーンを買って帰るのだった。

engChrName: You've got pretty sophisticated taste for a high schooler. That movie's pretty subdued, all things considered.
engSearchText:
You've got pretty sophisticated taste for a
high schooler. That movie's pretty subdued, all
things considered.
jpnChrName: しかし完全版か……年齢制限のある シーンなんかも追加されてるそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
しかし完全版か……年齢制限のある
シーンなんかも追加されてるそうだが。

engChrName: You in the drama club at Aramis or something?
engSearchText: You in the drama club at Aramis or something?
jpnChrName: 何にせよ楽しみにしておくかね。
jpnSearchText: 何にせよ楽しみにしておくかね。

engChrName: Uh, yes. Something like that.
engSearchText: Uh, yes. Something like that.
jpnChrName: ああっ、お前は！
jpnSearchText: ああっ、お前は！

engChrName: I'm actually studying to try and become an actress after I graduate.
engSearchText:
I'm actually studying to try and become an actress
after I graduate.
jpnChrName: ふらふらと出歩いて、今度は何を企んでる！
jpnSearchText: ふらふらと出歩いて、今度は何を企んでる！

engChrName: Nice! Good for you. I'm sure it ain't easy, but with passion like that, you just might make it.
engSearchText:
Nice! Good for you. I'm sure it ain't easy, but with
passion like that, you just might make it.
jpnChrName: おいおい、出歩いてるだけで 文句言われる筋合いはないぜ？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、出歩いてるだけで
文句言われる筋合いはないぜ？

engChrName: Aww, thank you. I hope so! Anyway, I have to get going now. See you later!
engSearchText:
Aww, thank you. I hope so! Anyway, I have to get
going now. See you later!
jpnChrName: 遅くまでお忙しいみたいだが 善良な一般市民に当たんのはやめてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
遅くまでお忙しいみたいだが
善良な一般市民に当たんのはやめてくれや。

engChrName: (Wait a minute. I feel like I've seen her somewhere before...)
engSearchText:
(Wait a minute. I feel like I've seen her
somewhere before...)
jpnChrName: こ、このっ……！
jpnSearchText: こ、このっ……！

engChrName: (No, it couldn't be...could it?)
engSearchText: (No, it couldn't be...could it?)
jpnChrName: まったく、相変わらず口が回ることだ。
jpnSearchText: まったく、相変わらず口が回ることだ。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for This Side of Heaven.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for This Side of Heaven.
jpnChrName: ネイト、お前もいい加減 “相手にしないこと”を覚えるんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ネイト、お前もいい加減
“相手にしないこと”を覚えるんだな。

engChrName: Van decided to stop by Esprit Cinema to check the showtime for the movies currently playing there.
engSearchText:
Van decided to stop by Esprit Cinema to check the
showtime for the movies currently playing there.
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: In particular, he was interested in Golden Blood Director's Cut, as well as a handful of other new releases.
engSearchText:
In particular, he was interested in Golden Blood
Director's Cut, as well as a handful of other
new releases.
jpnChrName: とはいえ《裏解決屋》── 目をつけられる立場なのは忘れるな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ《裏解決屋》──
目をつけられる立場なのは忘れるな。

engChrName: While there, he also bought some caramel popcorn as a scrumptious reward for himself before leaving.
engSearchText:
While there, he also bought some caramel popcorn as
a scrumptious reward for himself before leaving.
jpnChrName: 次に何かあった時は今度こそ──
jpnSearchText: 次に何かあった時は今度こそ──

engChrName: Heard they added some scenes to that director's cut that turned it into an age-restricted film.
engSearchText:
Heard they added some scenes to that director's cut
that turned it into an age-restricted film.
jpnChrName: きゃああああッ！
jpnSearchText: きゃああああッ！

engChrName: Should be pretty fun seeing if they're worth the hype.
engSearchText:
Should be pretty fun seeing if they're worth
the hype.
jpnChrName: ご、強盗だ！！
jpnSearchText: ご、強盗だ！！

engChrName: You again!
engSearchText: You again!
jpnChrName: おらあ、どけどけ！！
jpnSearchText: おらあ、どけどけ！！

engChrName: Just what are you planning this time? How come you're prowling the street so nonchalantly, huh?!
engSearchText:
Just what are you planning this time? How come
you're prowling the street so nonchalantly, huh?!

engChrName: C'mon, now. Since when did it become illegal to go out for a walk?
engSearchText:
C'mon, now. Since when did it become illegal to go
out for a walk?
jpnChrName: ごご、強盗ぉっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ごご、強盗ぉっ……！？

engChrName: I appreciate you working late, Detective, but can't you leave a law-abiding citizen like me alone? Ain't good to harass without probable cause.
engSearchText:
I appreciate you working late, Detective, but can't you
leave a law-abiding citizen like me alone? Ain't good
to harass without probable cause.
jpnChrName: ハッ、見回りの甲斐があったな。 早く追った方がいいんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、見回りの甲斐があったな。
早く追った方がいいんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Law-abiding? YOU?! You have GOT to be—
engSearchText: Law-abiding? YOU?! You have GOT to be—
jpnChrName: って、見て見ぬふりするつもりか！？ 少しは腕が立つんだろ、だったら──
jpnSearchText:
って、見て見ぬふりするつもりか！？
少しは腕が立つんだろ、だったら──

engChrName: You've always got a comeback just ready to go, don't you, spriggan?
engSearchText:
You've always got a comeback just ready to go, don't
you, spriggan?
jpnChrName: タダ働きは流儀じゃないんでね。 大体、悪者を捕まえるのはアンタらの仕事だ。
jpnSearchText:
タダ働きは流儀じゃないんでね。
大体、悪者を捕まえるのはアンタらの仕事だ。

engChrName: As for you, Nate, stay out of this guy's way. Don't go stirring things up without good reason. Understand?
engSearchText:
As for you, Nate, stay out of this guy's way. Don't go
stirring things up without good reason. Understand?
jpnChrName: ほら、行った行った。
jpnSearchText: ほら、行った行った。

engChrName: Yes, sir...
engSearchText: Yes, sir...
jpnChrName: お、お前なあ……！
jpnSearchText: お、お前なあ……！

engChrName: Make no mistake, Arkride. The police are watching you. Remember that.
engSearchText:
Make no mistake, Arkride. The police are
watching you. Remember that.
jpnChrName: ──構うな、行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: ──構うな、行くぞ！

engChrName: The next time something happens, you'll be—
engSearchText: The next time something happens, you'll be—
jpnChrName: いたたた……
jpnSearchText: いたたた……

engChrName: EEEEEEK!
engSearchText: EEEEEEK!
jpnChrName: 婆さん、大丈夫か？
jpnSearchText: 婆さん、大丈夫か？

engChrName: Look out! A robber!
engSearchText: Look out! A robber!
jpnChrName: 悪いねぇ、親切にありがとう。
jpnSearchText: 悪いねぇ、親切にありがとう。

engChrName: Out of the way, losers!
engSearchText: Out of the way, losers!
jpnChrName: ……さっきの強盗に突き飛ばされたのか。
jpnSearchText: ……さっきの強盗に突き飛ばされたのか。

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!
jpnChrName: 歩けそうか？
jpnSearchText: 歩けそうか？

engChrName: A robber? Here?!
engSearchText: A robber? Here?!
jpnChrName: え、ええ…… 足がちょっと痛いけどなんとか……
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ……
足がちょっと痛いけどなんとか……

engChrName: Well, good thing you guys are out on patrol right now, huh? Better hurry up and catch him.
engSearchText:
Well, good thing you guys are out on patrol right
now, huh? Better hurry up and catch him.
jpnChrName: 親切にありがとうねぇ。 あいたた……
jpnSearchText:
親切にありがとうねぇ。
あいたた……

engChrName: Excuse me? Are you just going to stand there and do nothing? You're strong! You should be helping us!
engSearchText:
Excuse me? Are you just going to stand there and
do nothing? You're strong! You should be helping us!
jpnChrName: ……近くのベンチで休んでな。 警察には俺から連絡入れとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……近くのベンチで休んでな。
警察には俺から連絡入れとくぜ。

engChrName: Sorry, but I don't work for free. 'Sides, I'm not exactly in the business of catching bad guys. That's your job, cop.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but I don't work for free. 'Sides, I'm not exactly
in the business of catching bad guys. That's your
job, cop.
jpnChrName: （逃げた強盗が選んだのはおそらく、   入り組んだ地下を利用した逃走ルート。）
jpnSearchText:
（逃げた強盗が選んだのはおそらく、
入り組んだ地下を利用した逃走ルート。）

engChrName: Now what're you waiting for? Time's a-wastin'.
engSearchText: Now what're you waiting for? Time's a-wastin'.
jpnChrName: （その手の輩が選びがちなお決まりだ。）
jpnSearchText: （その手の輩が選びがちなお決まりだ。）

engChrName: You've got some nerve, spriggan! I have half a mind to—
engSearchText:
You've got some nerve, spriggan! I have half a mind
to—
jpnChrName: （使えるルートと出口は複数。   この時間帯で有用そうなのは──）
jpnSearchText:
（使えるルートと出口は複数。
この時間帯で有用そうなのは──）

engChrName: Forget him! Let's go!
engSearchText: Forget him! Let's go!
jpnChrName: って、どうしてお前がここにいる……
jpnSearchText: って、どうしてお前がここにいる……

engChrName: Oww...
engSearchText: Oww...
jpnChrName: そんなの決まってるじゃない。 ──コインを買ったのが私だからよ。
jpnSearchText:
そんなの決まってるじゃない。
──コインを買ったのが私だからよ。

engChrName: Are you all right, ma'am?
engSearchText: Are you all right, ma'am?
jpnChrName: はは…… この可能性もあるとは思っちゃいたが。
jpnSearchText:
はは……
この可能性もあるとは思っちゃいたが。

engChrName: Oh, thank you. Thank you!
engSearchText: Oh, thank you. Thank you!
jpnChrName: フフ、こんにちはヴァン。
jpnSearchText: フフ、こんにちはヴァン。

engChrName: I'm guessin' it was that robber who pushed you over, yeah?
engSearchText:
I'm guessin' it was that robber who pushed you
over, yeah?
jpnChrName: 私とジャックの真剣勝負── マウ・オーナーに立ち会ってもらう予定だったけど。
jpnSearchText:
私とジャックの真剣勝負──
マウ・オーナーに立ち会ってもらう予定だったけど。

engChrName: Think you can walk?
engSearchText: Think you can walk?
jpnChrName: 貴方がいるなら、貴方にお願いしたいかな。
jpnSearchText: 貴方がいるなら、貴方にお願いしたいかな。

engChrName: Y-Yes, I think so. My foot hurts a little, but I can do it...
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, I think so. My foot hurts a little, but I can
do it...
jpnChrName: そいつは構わねえが…… また回りくどい勝負の挑み方だな。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは構わねえが……
また回りくどい勝負の挑み方だな。

engChrName: You're so kind. I really appreciate it... Oww!
engSearchText: You're so kind. I really appreciate it... Oww!
jpnChrName: そうなんだけど、こうでもしないと ジャックが本気になってくれないからね。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんだけど、こうでもしないと
ジャックが本気になってくれないからね。

engChrName: You should rest on that bench over there. I'll go ring up the cops so they can take care of you.
engSearchText:
You should rest on that bench over there. I'll go ring
up the cops so they can take care of you.
jpnChrName: 改めて──キング（パパ）のコインを賭けて 私とポーカーで勝負をしてもらうわよ。
jpnSearchText:
改めて──キング（パパ）のコインを賭けて
私とポーカーで勝負をしてもらうわよ。

engChrName: (If I had to guess, the robber took that winding underground escape route to get away.)
engSearchText:
(If I had to guess, the robber took that winding
underground escape route to get away.)
jpnChrName: いいわね、ジャック。
jpnSearchText: いいわね、ジャック。

engChrName: (Guys like him can't resist going through there.)
engSearchText: (Guys like him can't resist going through there.)
jpnChrName: 分かった──受けて立つぜ。
jpnSearchText: 分かった──受けて立つぜ。

engChrName: (There are multiple exits out of that place and ways to get to them. At this time of day, the best one for a criminal to use would be...)
engSearchText:
(There are multiple exits out of that place and ways to
get to them. At this time of day, the best one for a
criminal to use would be...)
jpnChrName: ちなみに勝算はあるんだろうな？
jpnSearchText: ちなみに勝算はあるんだろうな？

engChrName: Huh? What're you doing here?
engSearchText: Huh? What're you doing here?
jpnChrName: そんなの言わずもがなじゃない？
jpnSearchText: そんなの言わずもがなじゃない？

engChrName: Why do you think I'm here? It's because I'm the one who bought the coin.
engSearchText:
Why do you think I'm here? It's because I'm the one
who bought the coin.
jpnChrName: だな、愚問だった。
jpnSearchText: だな、愚問だった。

engChrName: I figured it was possible I might run into you, and now here you are, I guess.
engSearchText:
I figured it was possible I might run into you, and
now here you are, I guess.
jpnChrName: フフフ。
jpnSearchText: フフフ。

engChrName: Yep, here I am. Good to see you, Van.
engSearchText: Yep, here I am. Good to see you, Van.
jpnChrName: さてと、それじゃあ このコインはヴァンに預けるから。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、それじゃあ
このコインはヴァンに預けるから。

engChrName: I was originally planning on having Mau officiate our little game.
engSearchText:
I was originally planning on having Mau officiate
our little game.
jpnChrName: 勝負の度にコインを弾いて貰って、 先攻後攻を決める形にさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
勝負の度にコインを弾いて貰って、
先攻後攻を決める形にさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Buuut if you're here, I'd be more than happy to have you do it, if you don't mind.
engSearchText:
Buuut if you're here, I'd be more than happy to have
you do it, if you don't mind.
jpnChrName: 表が出たら私の先攻、 裏が出たらジャックの先攻ってことで。
jpnSearchText:
表が出たら私の先攻、
裏が出たらジャックの先攻ってことで。

engChrName: Sure, I can do that. Bit of a roundabout way to challenge someone to a game, though, don't you think?
engSearchText:
Sure, I can do that. Bit of a roundabout way to
challenge someone to a game, though, don't
you think?
jpnChrName: ふう、そいつはまた責任重大だな。
jpnSearchText: ふう、そいつはまた責任重大だな。

engChrName: Yeah, but unless I go to that much trouble, Jack won't take it as seriously as he should.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but unless I go to that much trouble, Jack won't
take it as seriously as he should.
jpnChrName: ま、一つよろしく頼む。 せいぜい公平に頼んだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ま、一つよろしく頼む。
せいぜい公平に頼んだぜ？

engChrName: So just to reiterate, Jack, I want to play a game of poker with you. Winner keeps King's coin.
engSearchText:
So just to reiterate, Jack, I want to play a game of
poker with you. Winner keeps King's coin.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンが立ち会う中、 ジャックとハルの真剣勝負が始まった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンが立ち会う中、
ジャックとハルの真剣勝負が始まった。

engChrName: Sound good to you?
engSearchText: Sound good to you?
jpnChrName: ２人は１０万ミラを１０枚のチップに換えた上で 一進一退の攻防を展開──
jpnSearchText:
２人は１０万ミラを１０枚のチップに換えた上で
一進一退の攻防を展開──

engChrName: I'm game. You're on.
engSearchText: I'm game. You're on.
jpnChrName: 場が温まりきった所で、 残りのチップを全て賭けた決戦が行われるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
場が温まりきった所で、
残りのチップを全て賭けた決戦が行われるのだった。

engChrName: You think you have any chance of winning against me?
engSearchText:
You think you have any chance of winning
against me?
jpnChrName: また一段と腕を上げたな、ハル。
jpnSearchText: また一段と腕を上げたな、ハル。

engChrName: Do you really need to ask, Jack?
engSearchText: Do you really need to ask, Jack?
jpnChrName: 正直ここまでやるとは思ってなかったぜ。
jpnSearchText: 正直ここまでやるとは思ってなかったぜ。

engChrName: You're right, my bad. That was dumb.
engSearchText: You're right, my bad. That was dumb.
jpnChrName: フフ、その台詞は勝ってからにしたら？ まだまだこんなものじゃないんだから。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、その台詞は勝ってからにしたら？
まだまだこんなものじゃないんだから。

engChrName: Haha.
engSearchText: Haha.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、違いねえ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、違いねえ。

engChrName: All right—now with that settled, I'll have you hold on to the coin, Van.
engSearchText:
All right—now with that settled, I'll have you hold on
to the coin, Van.
jpnChrName: 恐ろしく高度な読み合いに化かし合い…… やれやれ、二人ともマジでとんでもねえな。
jpnSearchText:
恐ろしく高度な読み合いに化かし合い……
やれやれ、二人ともマジでとんでもねえな。

engChrName: Every round, you'll flip that bad boy to determine who goes first.
engSearchText:
Every round, you'll flip that bad boy to determine
who goes first.
jpnChrName: だが次の勝負でとうとう決着ってわけだ。
jpnSearchText: だが次の勝負でとうとう決着ってわけだ。

engChrName: If it's heads, I go first. Tails, Jack goes first.
engSearchText: If it's heads, I go first. Tails, Jack goes first.
jpnChrName: ああ、最後も頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、最後も頼んだぜ。

engChrName: I feel like I'm being given a big responsibility, runnin' this match. I'll do my best to make you guys proud.
engSearchText:
I feel like I'm being given a big responsibility, runnin'
this match. I'll do my best to make you guys proud.
jpnChrName: 先攻でも後攻でも結果は同じよ。 ──確実に決める！
jpnSearchText:
先攻でも後攻でも結果は同じよ。
──確実に決める！

engChrName: I'm sure you'll do just fine, Van. We appreciate having you. ...Well, may the best hand win. Let's get down to business.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you'll do just fine, Van. We appreciate
having you. ...Well, may the best hand win. Let's
get down to business.
jpnChrName: よし、なら行くぜ──
jpnSearchText: よし、なら行くぜ──

engChrName: Jack and Halle's game got underway as Van watched the proceedings unfold.
engSearchText:
Jack and Halle's game got underway as Van watched
the proceedings unfold.
jpnChrName: （コインを右手で取るか左手で取るか──   どっちだ？）
jpnSearchText:
（コインを右手で取るか左手で取るか──
どっちだ？）

engChrName: After the pair exchanged 100,000 mira for ten poker chips, they began to trade blows with each hand of cards.
engSearchText:
After the pair exchanged 100,000 mira for ten poker
chips, they began to trade blows with each hand
of cards.
jpnChrName: ──コインは裏。 ジャックの先攻だな。
jpnSearchText:
──コインは裏。
ジャックの先攻だな。

engChrName: Once the match fully heated up, all of the remaining chips were put on the line in a dramatic showdown.
engSearchText:
Once the match fully heated up, all of the remaining
chips were put on the line in a dramatic showdown.
jpnChrName: ちっ、先攻かよ。
jpnSearchText: ちっ、先攻かよ。

engChrName: You've really stepped up your game, Halle. I'm impressed.
engSearchText:
You've really stepped up your game, Halle.
I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: まあいい……２枚、カードチェンジだ。
jpnSearchText: まあいい……２枚、カードチェンジだ。

engChrName: Truth be told, I didn't expect you to even last this long.
engSearchText:
Truth be told, I didn't expect you to even last
this long.
jpnChrName: フフ、もしかして “あの技”を使うつもりだった？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、もしかして
“あの技”を使うつもりだった？

engChrName: Save it for when you win, Jack. This game ain't over until it's over.
engSearchText:
Save it for when you win, Jack. This game ain't over
until it's over.
jpnChrName: 確かに──それなら後攻の方が有利よね。
jpnSearchText: 確かに──それなら後攻の方が有利よね。

engChrName: Heh. You got that right.
engSearchText: Heh. You got that right.
jpnChrName: ハルはＫ（キング）のフォーカードか……
jpnSearchText: ハルはＫ（キング）のフォーカードか……

engChrName: Sheesh, you two are freakin' nuts. Not too many in Zemuria who can read each other's hands and bluff the way you can.
engSearchText:
Sheesh, you two are freakin' nuts. Not too many in
Zemuria who can read each other's hands and bluff
the way you can.
jpnChrName: ジャックは──？
jpnSearchText: ジャックは──？

engChrName: Looks like this next hand's gonna be our grand finale.
engSearchText: Looks like this next hand's gonna be our grand finale.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……お前もキングの技を 使えるようになっていたってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……お前もキングの技を
使えるようになっていたってわけか。

engChrName: Sure seems like it. Keep up the good work, Van.
engSearchText: Sure seems like it. Keep up the good work, Van.
jpnChrName: Ｊ（ジャック）のフォーカード……
jpnSearchText: Ｊ（ジャック）のフォーカード……

engChrName: It doesn't matter who goes first. Either way, your fate's already set!
engSearchText:
It doesn't matter who goes first. Either way, your
fate's already set!
jpnChrName: こいつはもしかしてハルが仕込んだのか？
jpnSearchText: こいつはもしかしてハルが仕込んだのか？

engChrName: Well, here goes nothing.
engSearchText: Well, here goes nothing.
jpnChrName: ああ、かつてキングが得意とした 敵のカードを含めてコントロールする技だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、かつてキングが得意とした
敵のカードを含めてコントロールする技だ。

engChrName: (Moment of truth. Which hand should I catch the coin with?)
engSearchText:
(Moment of truth. Which hand should I catch the
coin with?)
jpnChrName: ──見事だぜ、ハル。
jpnSearchText: ──見事だぜ、ハル。

engChrName: It's tails. Your move, Jack.
engSearchText: It's tails. Your move, Jack.
jpnChrName: ──コインは表。 ハルの先攻だな。
jpnSearchText:
──コインは表。
ハルの先攻だな。

engChrName: Damn. I've gotta go first, huh?
engSearchText: Damn. I've gotta go first, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ、つうことは俺の後攻か。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、つうことは俺の後攻か。

engChrName: If that's the way it's going to be...I'll exchange two cards.
engSearchText:
If that's the way it's going to be...I'll exchange
two cards.
jpnChrName: フフ、もしかして “あの技”を使うつもり？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、もしかして
“あの技”を使うつもり？

engChrName: Aww, were you thinking of trying 'that' on me?
engSearchText: Aww, were you thinking of trying 'that' on me?
jpnChrName: けど果たしてうまく行くかしら。 ──２枚、カードチェンジよ。
jpnSearchText:
けど果たしてうまく行くかしら。
──２枚、カードチェンジよ。

engChrName: No wonder you're disappointed. It's definitely better to go second in that case.
engSearchText:
No wonder you're disappointed. It's definitely better
to go second in that case.
jpnChrName: それは見てのお楽しみってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText: それは見てのお楽しみってヤツだ。

engChrName: Halle's got four kings.
engSearchText: Halle's got four kings.
jpnChrName: 俺も２枚、カードをチェンジ── でもってそのままオープンするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も２枚、カードをチェンジ──
でもってそのままオープンするぜ。

engChrName: What've you got, Jack?
engSearchText: What've you got, Jack?
jpnChrName: まさか……あり得ねえ。
jpnSearchText: まさか……あり得ねえ。

engChrName: I get it now. You must've mastered King's technique to play like that.
engSearchText:
I get it now. You must've mastered King's technique
to play like that.
jpnChrName: 俺の手は── Ｋ（キング）のフォーカードだったはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺の手は──
Ｋ（キング）のフォーカードだったはずだ。

engChrName: Four-of-a-kind for Jack.
engSearchText: Four-of-a-kind for Jack.
jpnChrName: フフ、何を言っているの？
jpnSearchText: フフ、何を言っているの？

engChrName: What's going on? Did Halle set this all up?
engSearchText: What's going on? Did Halle set this all up?
jpnChrName: それは──私の手よ。
jpnSearchText: それは──私の手よ。

engChrName: Sure did. King's whole specialty back in the day was taking control of the cards—including his opponent's own hand.
engSearchText:
Sure did. King's whole specialty back in the day was
taking control of the cards—including his opponent's
own hand.
jpnChrName: ……確かにＫ（キング）のフォーカードだ。
jpnSearchText: ……確かにＫ（キング）のフォーカードだ。

engChrName: You played well, Halle.
engSearchText: You played well, Halle.
jpnChrName: まさか──ジャックの手も含めて 全てハルが仕込んだってのか？
jpnSearchText:
まさか──ジャックの手も含めて
全てハルが仕込んだってのか？

engChrName: It's heads. Your move, Halle.
engSearchText: It's heads. Your move, Halle.
jpnChrName: ああ、かつてキングが得意とした 敵のカードを含めてコントロールする技だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、かつてキングが得意とした
敵のカードを含めてコントロールする技だ。

engChrName: Guess I'm after her.
engSearchText: Guess I'm after her.
jpnChrName: まさかお前もこの技を 使えるようになっていたとはな。
jpnSearchText:
まさかお前もこの技を
使えるようになっていたとはな。

engChrName: Oh? Thinking of pulling 'that' on me, are you?
engSearchText: Oh? Thinking of pulling 'that' on me, are you?
jpnChrName: ──恐れ入ったぜ、ハル。
jpnSearchText: ──恐れ入ったぜ、ハル。

engChrName: Don't count your chickens before they hatch is all I've got to say. ...I'll exchange two cards.
engSearchText:
Don't count your chickens before they hatch is all I've
got to say. ...I'll exchange two cards.
jpnChrName: フフ、どんなもんよ──って。
jpnSearchText: フフ、どんなもんよ──<w500>って。

engChrName: Let's see you walk the walk, then.
engSearchText: Let's see you walk the walk, then.
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待って。 まだ全てのカードがオープンしていない。
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと待って。
まだ全てのカードがオープンしていない。

engChrName: I'll also exchange two cards. And with that, I'll open.
engSearchText: I'll also exchange two cards. And with that, I'll open.
jpnChrName: ジャック、残りのカードはいったい……
jpnSearchText: ジャック、残りのカードはいったい……

engChrName: Wait... You've gotta be shitting me.
engSearchText: Wait... You've gotta be shitting me.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かワイルドカードはアリだったよな？
jpnSearchText: ああ、確かワイルドカードはアリだったよな？

engChrName: I'm supposed to be the one with four kings here.
engSearchText: I'm supposed to be the one with four kings here.
jpnChrName: つうわけで俺の手は── Ｊ（ジャック）のファイブカード。
jpnSearchText:
つうわけで俺の手は──
Ｊ（ジャック）のファイブカード。

engChrName: Haha. What are you talking about?
engSearchText: Haha. What are you talking about?
jpnChrName: ──悪いなハル、俺の勝ちだ。
jpnSearchText: ──悪いなハル、俺の勝ちだ。

engChrName: That's my hand, silly.
engSearchText: That's my hand, silly.

engChrName: ...So it is. That's another four-of-a-kind.
engSearchText: ...So it is. That's another four-of-a-kind.
jpnChrName: よく分からねえが……ハルの技を ジャックが逆に利用したってことでいいのか？
jpnSearchText:
よく分からねえが……ハルの技を
ジャックが逆に利用したってことでいいのか？

engChrName: You tellin' me Halle set all this up? Even your own hand?
engSearchText:
You tellin' me Halle set all this up? Even your
own hand?
jpnChrName: ま、そんなところだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そんなところだ。

engChrName: Sure did. King's whole specialty back in the day was taking control of the cards, including his opponent's own hand.
engSearchText:
Sure did. King's whole specialty back in the day was
taking control of the cards, including his opponent's
own hand.
jpnChrName: あり得ない……一体どうやって……
jpnSearchText: あり得ない……一体どうやって……

engChrName: You had to have mastered King's technique in order to play like that.
engSearchText:
You had to have mastered King's technique in order
to play like that.

engChrName: I'm genuinely impressed.
engSearchText: I'm genuinely impressed.
jpnChrName: ……フフ、けどそれでこそ 《勝利》のジャックね。
jpnSearchText:
……フフ、けどそれでこそ
《勝利》のジャックね。

engChrName: Ain't nothing to it! W-Wait.
engSearchText: Ain't nothing to it! W-Wait.
jpnChrName: 文句なしで私の完敗よ。
jpnSearchText: 文句なしで私の完敗よ。

engChrName: There's still one card you haven't opened.
engSearchText: There's still one card you haven't opened.
jpnChrName: 約束通り──コインは勝者の手に。
jpnSearchText: 約束通り──コインは勝者の手に。

engChrName: What could you possibly still have left? The game should be over...
engSearchText:
What could you possibly still have left? The game
should be over...
jpnChrName: つまり貴方の物よ、ジャック。
jpnSearchText: つまり貴方の物よ、ジャック。

engChrName: Not if I've got a wild card in my hand.
engSearchText: Not if I've got a wild card in my hand.
jpnChrName: ほらよジャック。
jpnSearchText: ほらよジャック。

engChrName: And that's exactly what I have. A five-of-a-kind with jacks. Read 'em and weep.
engSearchText:
And that's exactly what I have. A five-of-a-kind
with jacks. Read 'em and weep.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かに受け取った。
jpnSearchText: ああ、確かに受け取った。

engChrName: Sorry, Halle. I win.
engSearchText: Sorry, Halle. I win.
jpnChrName: さて、今度は俺からプレゼントだ。
jpnSearchText: さて、今度は俺からプレゼントだ。

engChrName: What the...?
engSearchText: What the...?
jpnChrName: キングが使っていたエラーコイン…… こいつはハル、お前が持つべきものだ。
jpnSearchText:
キングが使っていたエラーコイン……
こいつはハル、お前が持つべきものだ。

engChrName: I'm not sure I follow you guys. Did you somehow use Halle's own move against her?
engSearchText:
I'm not sure I follow you guys. Did you somehow use
Halle's own move against her?
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと、 何を言ってるのよ、ジャック。
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと、
何を言ってるのよ、ジャック。

engChrName: More or less, yeah.
engSearchText: More or less, yeah.
jpnChrName: 勝負には貴方が勝ったんだから 当然貴方が……
jpnSearchText:
勝負には貴方が勝ったんだから
当然貴方が……

engChrName: No way... How...? How is that possible...?
engSearchText: No way... How...? How is that possible...?
jpnChrName: というより私は──そのコインを 他の誰でもない、貴方に持っていて欲しいの。
jpnSearchText:
というより私は──そのコインを
他の誰でもない、貴方に持っていて欲しいの。

jpnChrName: （なるほどな……ハルは最初から   ジャックにコインを持たせるために……）
jpnSearchText:
（なるほどな……ハルは最初から
ジャックにコインを持たせるために……）

engChrName: *sigh* I can wonder all I like. But at the end of the day, they call you 'Victory Jack' for a reason.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can wonder all I like. But at the end of the
day, they call you 'Victory Jack' for a reason.
jpnChrName: 残念だがハル、 お前には自分の要求を通す権利はねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
残念だがハル、
お前には自分の要求を通す権利はねえぜ。

engChrName: I lost, and that's all there is to it.
engSearchText: I lost, and that's all there is to it.
jpnChrName: コインが俺の物なら、 それをどう扱うかも俺次第だからな。
jpnSearchText:
コインが俺の物なら、
それをどう扱うかも俺次第だからな。

engChrName: So, time for me to pay the piper, I suppose.
engSearchText: So, time for me to pay the piper, I suppose.
jpnChrName: どうしても俺に押し付けたいってんなら──
jpnSearchText: どうしても俺に押し付けたいってんなら──

engChrName: The coin's all yours, Jack.
engSearchText: The coin's all yours, Jack.
jpnChrName: ……リベンジしろ、そういうことね。
jpnSearchText: ……リベンジしろ、そういうことね。

engChrName: Here you are, Jack. Good game.
engSearchText: Here you are, Jack. Good game.
jpnChrName: その通りだ。
jpnSearchText: その通りだ。

engChrName: Thanks. That was a fun one, to say the least.
engSearchText: Thanks. That was a fun one, to say the least.
jpnChrName: ……っ………… いいわよ、分かったわ……！
jpnSearchText:
……っ…………
いいわよ、分かったわ……！

engChrName: There's one more thing we need to settle before we head on out.
engSearchText:
There's one more thing we need to settle before we
head on out.
jpnChrName: もっともっと腕を磨いて── 必ずジャック、本気の貴方に勝ってみせる。
jpnSearchText:
もっともっと腕を磨いて──
必ずジャック、本気の貴方に勝ってみせる。

engChrName: Halle, I'm giving you the coin. You're the one who should hold on to it.
engSearchText:
Halle, I'm giving you the coin. You're the one who
should hold on to it.
jpnChrName: それまでに、私以外の誰かに負けたら 承知しないんだから！
jpnSearchText:
それまでに、私以外の誰かに負けたら
承知しないんだから！

engChrName: H-Huh? Jack, what are you doing?
engSearchText: H-Huh? Jack, what are you doing?
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、了解だ。

engChrName: We agreed that whoever won gets to keep the coin. You earned it. You shouldn't give it back to me!
engSearchText:
We agreed that whoever won gets to keep the coin.
You earned it. You shouldn't give it back to me!
jpnChrName: （ハルもジャックも──   やっぱとんでもねえ勝負師だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハルもジャックも──
やっぱとんでもねえ勝負師だな。）

engChrName: In fact, I WANT you to have it! There's nobody else I'd rather see it with than you. Seriously, take it. It's okay.
engSearchText:
In fact, I WANT you to have it! There's nobody else
I'd rather see it with than you. Seriously, take it.
It's okay.
jpnChrName: （とにかく、今日はイイモンが見れたぜ。）
jpnSearchText: （とにかく、今日はイイモンが見れたぜ。）

engChrName: (Oh, I get it now. That whole match was just a setup for her to give the coin to him all along, wasn't it?)
engSearchText:
(Oh, I get it now. That whole match was just a setup
for her to give the coin to him all along, wasn't it?)
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンはジャックたちと 彩雲閣にて飲茶（ヤムチャ）を楽しみ──
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンはジャックたちと
彩雲閣にて飲茶（ヤムチャ）を楽しみ──

engChrName: Sorry, Halle, but I can't let you have your way on this one.
engSearchText:
Sorry, Halle, but I can't let you have your way on
this one.
jpnChrName: 改めて仲間と合流して 裏解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
改めて仲間と合流して
裏解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: If that coin was mine, then it'd be up to me to decide what to do with it.
engSearchText:
If that coin was mine, then it'd be up to me to decide
what to do with it.
jpnChrName: 遡ること３０分前──
jpnSearchText: <C1>遡ること３０分前──

engChrName: But if you're that determined to hoist the thing on me anyway, then there's only one thing you can do.
engSearchText:
But if you're that determined to hoist the thing on me
anyway, then there's only one thing you can do.
jpnChrName: うん、やはり共和国の映画文化は素晴らしい── 大作は勿論、小さな制作会社の作品でも粒揃いだ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、やはり共和国の映画文化は素晴らしい──
大作は勿論、小さな制作会社の作品でも粒揃いだ。

engChrName: ...Play you again. Play you again and win.
engSearchText: ...Play you again. Play you again and win.
jpnChrName: こうして映画に触れる場が 民に開かれているのも良いことだ。
jpnSearchText:
こうして映画に触れる場が
民に開かれているのも良いことだ。

engChrName: That's right. That's how these things work in our world.
engSearchText:
That's right. That's how these things work in
our world.
jpnChrName: 我が国にももっと普及させなくてはね── 君もそう思わないか、ナージェ？
jpnSearchText:
我が国にももっと普及させなくてはね──
君もそう思わないか、ナージェ？

engChrName: ...Hmph. Fine. If that's how you're going to be, you're on!
engSearchText:
...Hmph. Fine. If that's how you're going to be,
you're on!
jpnChrName: ええ、映画祭に参加した身としましても。
jpnSearchText: ええ、映画祭に参加した身としましても。

engChrName: I'll keep improving my skills and then one of these days, I'll beat you when you're playing your absolute hardest.
engSearchText:
I'll keep improving my skills and then one of these
days, I'll beat you when you're playing your
absolute hardest.
jpnChrName: さて、次はどこを覗いてみるか──
jpnSearchText: さて、次はどこを覗いてみるか──

engChrName: Until then, you'd better not lose to anybody else but me or your ass is grass! Deal?
engSearchText:
Until then, you'd better not lose to anybody else but
me or your ass is grass! Deal?
jpnChrName: いえ殿下、本日はそろそろ。
jpnSearchText: いえ殿下、本日はそろそろ。

engChrName: Haha. Deal.
engSearchText: Haha. Deal.
jpnChrName: 明日以降は他の共和国企業との 会合も控えておりますゆえ。
jpnSearchText:
明日以降は他の共和国企業との
会合も控えておりますゆえ。

engChrName: (Man, you won't find another pair of gamblers like these anywhere else in Zemuria.)
engSearchText:
(Man, you won't find another pair of gamblers like
these anywhere else in Zemuria.)
jpnChrName: ……そうだったな。 分かった、ホテルへ帰ろう。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだったな。
分かった、ホテルへ帰ろう。

engChrName: (I'm glad I got to see this little exchange today. That was neat.)
engSearchText:
(I'm glad I got to see this little exchange today.
That was neat.)
jpnChrName: それではお車を──
jpnSearchText: それではお車を──

engChrName: With the promise made, Van proceeded to enjoy some yum cha with Jack and Halle at Caiyunge.
engSearchText:
With the promise made, Van proceeded to enjoy
some yum cha with Jack and Halle at Caiyunge.
jpnChrName: どうした…………何？ 帰りのルートで車同士の接触事故？
jpnSearchText:
どうした…………何？
帰りのルートで車同士の接触事故？

engChrName: Afterwards, he reunited with the others and got back to work.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, he reunited with the others and got back
to work.
jpnChrName: ……状況を確認しろ、万が一にも殿下を 危険に晒すわけにはいかない。
jpnSearchText:
……状況を確認しろ、万が一にも殿下を
危険に晒すわけにはいかない。

engChrName: Thirty minutes prior...
engSearchText: Thirty minutes prior...
jpnChrName: Ａ班は念のため現場へ、 Ｂ班は代替ルートの検討を──
jpnSearchText:
Ａ班は念のため現場へ、
Ｂ班は代替ルートの検討を──

engChrName: Calvard's film culture is truly impressive. Big studio or small, they all manage to release some rather fine pieces of cinema.
engSearchText:
Calvard's film culture is truly impressive. Big studio or
small, they all manage to release some rather fine
pieces of cinema.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: That ordinary members of the public have places like this that they can visit to enjoy such works is also wonderful.
engSearchText:
That ordinary members of the public have places like
this that they can visit to enjoy such works is
also wonderful.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: We really must work to further their spread into Elsaim. Wouldn't you agree, Naje?
engSearchText:
We really must work to further their spread
into Elsaim. Wouldn't you agree, Naje?
jpnChrName: いや～、都会は面白いね。 珍しいものがたくさんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、都会は面白いね。
珍しいものがたくさんだ。

engChrName: Yes. Our time at the film festival really heightened my appreciation for movies.
engSearchText:
Yes. Our time at the film festival really heightened
my appreciation for movies.
jpnChrName: あの店はなんだろう。 ちょっと冷やかしてみようかな？
jpnSearchText:
あの店はなんだろう。
ちょっと冷やかしてみようかな？

engChrName: Well, then, now to decide our next destination. Any ideas?
engSearchText:
Well, then, now to decide our next destination.
Any ideas?
jpnChrName: （何やってんだ、アイツ……）
jpnSearchText: （何やってんだ、アイツ……）

engChrName: Shouldn't we call it an evening, Your Highness?
engSearchText: Shouldn't we call it an evening, Your Highness?
jpnChrName: （あんな恰好でブラついてるから   めっちゃ注目されてるみてえだし。）
jpnSearchText:
（あんな恰好でブラついてるから
めっちゃ注目されてるみてえだし。）

engChrName: You have meetings with other Calvardian businesses scheduled for tomorrow and beyond, after all.
engSearchText:
You have meetings with other Calvardian businesses
scheduled for tomorrow and beyond, after all.
jpnChrName: （……とにかく、噂は確かめた。   面倒に巻き込まれないうちに……）
jpnSearchText:
（……とにかく、噂は確かめた。
面倒に巻き込まれないうちに……）

engChrName: ...I suppose you're right. Very well. Let's return to our hotel.
engSearchText:
...I suppose you're right. Very well. Let's return to
our hotel.
jpnChrName: おーい、ヴァンじゃないか。 こんな所で奇遇だね。
jpnSearchText:
おーい、ヴァンじゃないか。
こんな所で奇遇だね。

engChrName: As you wish. I'll have them send the car to—
engSearchText: As you wish. I'll have them send the car to—

engChrName: What is it? ...What? There's been a collision along our route back?
engSearchText:
What is it? ...What? There's been a collision along
our route back?
jpnChrName: 今、私を見て逃げようとしてなかった？
jpnSearchText: 今、私を見て逃げようとしてなかった？

engChrName: Get me the details. I need to know exactly what's going on. We can't risk exposing His Highness to any potential danger, no matter how slight.
engSearchText:
Get me the details. I need to know exactly what's
going on. We can't risk exposing His Highness to any
potential danger, no matter how slight.
jpnChrName: フフ、つれないなぁ。 さすがの私もちょっと傷つくよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、つれないなぁ。
さすがの私もちょっと傷つくよ。

engChrName: A Team, go to the scene and report what you find. B Team, search for any viable substitute routes we can take if necessary.
engSearchText:
A Team, go to the scene and report what you find.
B Team, search for any viable substitute routes we
can take if necessary.
jpnChrName: いや、ンな恰好でブラついてるヤツと 知り合いだと思われたくないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ンな恰好でブラついてるヤツと
知り合いだと思われたくないんだが。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ん？　この格好、変かな？ 私的に流行には気を使ってるつもりだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ん？　この格好、変かな？
私的に流行には気を使ってるつもりだけど。

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: そりゃお前さんとこの忍びどもよりは マシだろうが、普通に目立つからな？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃお前さんとこの忍びどもよりは
マシだろうが、普通に目立つからな？

engChrName: Aaah, it's so fun being in the big city! There are so many strange and unusual things to see.
engSearchText:
Aaah, it's so fun being in the big city! There are so
many strange and unusual things to see.
jpnChrName: そう？　まあ細かい事は気にしないでよ。
jpnSearchText: そう？　まあ細かい事は気にしないでよ。

engChrName: Like that place over there! I wonder what it's supposed to be. Maybe I'll have a look-see just for fun.
engSearchText:
Like that place over there! I wonder what it's
supposed to be. Maybe I'll have a look-see just
for fun.
jpnChrName: 細かくねーっつの……
jpnSearchText: 細かくねーっつの……

engChrName: (Ugh. What does she think she's doing?)
engSearchText: (Ugh. What does she think she's doing?)
jpnChrName: 何をしているかというと…… うーん、ちょうどいい。
jpnSearchText:
何をしているかというと……
うーん、ちょうどいい。

engChrName: (She's drawing a ton of attention to herself, walking around lookin' like that.)
engSearchText:
(She's drawing a ton of attention to herself, walking
around lookin' like that.)
jpnChrName: ヴァン、少し付き合ってくれないかな？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、少し付き合ってくれないかな？

engChrName: (I guess everything I heard was true after all. Better make myself scarce before I get caught up in anything—)
engSearchText:
(I guess everything I heard was true after all.
Better make myself scarce before I get caught up in
anything—)
jpnChrName: ……言っとくが物騒な立ち会いとかは ごめんだからな。
jpnSearchText:
……言っとくが物騒な立ち会いとかは
ごめんだからな。

engChrName: Van! Van, is that you over there? What a COINCIDENCE!
engSearchText:
Van! Van, is that you over there? What
a COINCIDENCE!
jpnChrName: それもいい提案だけど、今回は違うかな。
jpnSearchText: それもいい提案だけど、今回は違うかな。

engChrName: Damn it. Guess I better resign myself to my fate.
engSearchText: Damn it. Guess I better resign myself to my fate.
jpnChrName: いやそもそも提案じゃねえし……
jpnSearchText: いやそもそも提案じゃねえし……

engChrName: Heeey. You weren't trying to run away from me just now, were you?
engSearchText:
Heeey. You weren't trying to run away from me just
now, were you?
jpnChrName: 実はそれなりに腕が良くて、口が堅くて、 武具の修理ができる人間を探していてね。
jpnSearchText:
実はそれなりに腕が良くて、口が堅くて、
武具の修理ができる人間を探していてね。

engChrName: That really hurts! Just because I'm a hardened warrior doesn't mean I'm made of stone, you know.
engSearchText:
That really hurts! Just because I'm a hardened warrior
doesn't mean I'm made of stone, you know.
jpnChrName: イーディスには詳しくなくてね、 なかなか見つからないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
イーディスには詳しくなくてね、
なかなか見つからないんだ。

engChrName: I'm not worried about your feelings as much as my own rep if people see me hanging out with someone who can't dress like a normal person.
engSearchText:
I'm not worried about your feelings as much as my
own rep if people see me hanging out with someone
who can't dress like a normal person.
jpnChrName: ヴァンなら心当たりがあるんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンなら心当たりがあるんじゃないかな？

engChrName: What? Do I really look that weird? I like to think I stay on top of the latest trends in my own way.
engSearchText:
What? Do I really look that weird? I like to think I
stay on top of the latest trends in my own way.
jpnChrName: まあなくはないが…… なんだ、あの刀を鍛え直すのか？
jpnSearchText:
まあなくはないが……
なんだ、あの刀を鍛え直すのか？

engChrName: You're better than your ninja pals, I'll give you that much. But you still stick out like a sore thumb in these parts.
engSearchText:
You're better than your ninja pals, I'll give you
that much. But you still stick out like a sore thumb in
these parts.
jpnChrName: ううん、刀は無事だけど。
jpnSearchText: ううん、刀は無事だけど。

engChrName: Well, so what if I do? You've got to learn not to sweat the small stuff so much, Van.
engSearchText:
Well, so what if I do? You've got to learn not to sweat
the small stuff so much, Van.
jpnChrName: ただオラシオンでかなり酷使したから、 鞘の方が少し破損しちゃってね。
jpnSearchText:
ただオラシオンでかなり酷使したから、
鞘の方が少し破損しちゃってね。

engChrName: I wouldn't be sweatin' it if it was SMALL. That's what I'm telling you!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be sweatin' it if it was SMALL.
That's what I'm telling you!
jpnChrName: 鞘の方が……？
jpnSearchText: 鞘の方が……？

engChrName: Well, either way, I found you at the perfect time.
engSearchText: Well, either way, I found you at the perfect time.
jpnChrName: （武器として扱う技は知ってるが   オラシオンでそんな使い方してたか？）
jpnSearchText:
（武器として扱う技は知ってるが
オラシオンでそんな使い方してたか？）

engChrName: I don't know what you're up to right now, but could you come with me for a little bit? I could use your help with something.
engSearchText:
I don't know what you're up to right now, but could
you come with me for a little bit? I could use your
help with something.
jpnChrName: そういうわけで、案内よろしく♪
jpnSearchText: そういうわけで、案内よろしく♪

engChrName: *sigh*... Whatever you have in mind, you better not be tryin' to stir anything up. I don't want any part of that.
engSearchText:
*sigh*... Whatever you have in mind, you better not
be tryin' to stir anything up. I don't want any part
of that.
jpnChrName: ふう……仕方ねえな。 用が済んだら大人しくしとけよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……仕方ねえな。
用が済んだら大人しくしとけよ。

engChrName: Alas, I'm not. Although that's a good idea, too!
engSearchText: Alas, I'm not. Although that's a good idea, too!
jpnChrName: リックに追い詰められるシーンは 何度観てもドキドキしちゃいますね……
jpnSearchText:
リックに追い詰められるシーンは
何度観てもドキドキしちゃいますね……

engChrName: I wasn't TRYING to suggest anything.
engSearchText: I wasn't TRYING to suggest anything.
jpnChrName: ゾーイはリックの裏切りに、 実はすごく傷ついてるんじゃないかな……
jpnSearchText:
ゾーイはリックの裏切りに、
実はすごく傷ついてるんじゃないかな……

engChrName: Anyway, I'm looking to track down a skilled smithy who can keep things hush-hush.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm looking to track down a skilled smithy
who can keep things hush-hush.
jpnChrName: 最初に観た時は気づかなかったですけど 今日はそう感じたんです。
jpnSearchText:
最初に観た時は気づかなかったですけど
今日はそう感じたんです。

engChrName: But as you can imagine, I hardly know anything about the city, so I haven't had much luck finding anyone so far.
engSearchText:
But as you can imagine, I hardly know anything about
the city, so I haven't had much luck finding anyone
so far.
jpnChrName: 初見じゃ見つからない気づきがあるのも 映画鑑賞の醍醐味だな。
jpnSearchText:
初見じゃ見つからない気づきがあるのも
映画鑑賞の醍醐味だな。

engChrName: Do you know anybody you could maybe recommend to me?
engSearchText:
Do you know anybody you could maybe recommend
to me?
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、おかげでより楽しめました。 誘ってもらってありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、おかげでより楽しめました。
誘ってもらってありがとうございます。

engChrName: Sure, I got someone in mind. Why do you need someone like that? Gotta retemper your sword or somethin'?
engSearchText:
Sure, I got someone in mind. Why do you need
someone like that? Gotta retemper your sword
or somethin'?
jpnChrName: やっぱり面白いですねっ！ 何度観ても楽しめますっ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり面白いですねっ！
何度観ても楽しめますっ！

engChrName: Oh, no. The blade itself is doing just fine.
engSearchText: Oh, no. The blade itself is doing just fine.
jpnChrName: ゾーイのあの機能的で“せくしー”な戦闘服、 欲しくなっちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
ゾーイのあの機能的で“せくしー”な戦闘服、
欲しくなっちゃいました。

engChrName: It's the scabbard that needs some patching up after the heavy beating it took in Oración.
engSearchText:
It's the scabbard that needs some patching up
after the heavy beating it took in Oración.
jpnChrName: そこか……
jpnSearchText: そこか……

engChrName: It does, huh? That's unfortunate.
engSearchText: It does, huh? That's unfortunate.
jpnChrName: 撮影で使った衣装の展示なんてのも、 いずれどっかでやることもあるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
撮影で使った衣装の展示なんてのも、
いずれどっかでやることもあるかもな。

engChrName: (I've heard of swordsmen using their scabbards as weapons before, but I didn't realize that's what she did back there.)
engSearchText:
(I've heard of swordsmen using their scabbards as
weapons before, but I didn't realize that's what she
did back there.)
jpnChrName: その時はぜひ見に行きたいです！
jpnSearchText: その時はぜひ見に行きたいです！

engChrName: I'll say! So, what do you say? Think you can hook a girl up? ❤
engSearchText:
I'll say! So, what do you say? Think you can hook a
girl up? ❤
jpnChrName: 試着できたりするんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: 試着できたりするんでしょうか……

engChrName: ...All right. But if I'm gonna help you, you have to promise not to cause any chaos once we're done. Got it?
engSearchText:
...All right. But if I'm gonna help you, you have to
promise not to cause any chaos once we're done.
Got it?
jpnChrName: んー、それはちょいと厳しいだろうな。
jpnSearchText: んー、それはちょいと厳しいだろうな。

engChrName: Phew. That scene where Zoe gets cornered by Rick always gets my heart racing every time I see it.
engSearchText:
Phew. That scene where Zoe gets cornered by Rick
always gets my heart racing every time I see it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、前評判通りだな。 とにかくド派手で面白かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、前評判通りだな。
とにかくド派手で面白かったぜ。

engChrName: Deep down, I have to wonder if she really felt hurt by his whole betrayal.
engSearchText:
Deep down, I have to wonder if she really felt hurt by
his whole betrayal.
jpnChrName: 欲を言えば、あのイカす女スパイの乳が もっと見え見えだったら満点だったな。
jpnSearchText:
欲を言えば、あのイカす女スパイの乳が
もっと見え見えだったら満点だったな。

engChrName: The first time I saw it, I didn't really pick up on anything like that. But this time around, I felt like she was.
engSearchText:
The first time I saw it, I didn't really pick up on
anything like that. But this time around, I felt like
she was.
jpnChrName: おい、自重しろよ。
jpnSearchText: おい、自重しろよ。

engChrName: That's one of the best parts of watching movies. When you go back and rewatch them, you notice little things like that you didn't before.
engSearchText:
That's one of the best parts of watching movies.
When you go back and rewatch them, you notice
little things like that you didn't before.
jpnChrName: てか、てめぇはあのアマの裸体を “生で”“超至近距離で”拝めたんだもんなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
てか、てめぇはあのアマの裸体を
“生で”“超至近距離で”拝めたんだもんなぁ？

engChrName: I totally get that now. It made it even more fun to watch. Thanks for bringing me, Van.
engSearchText:
I totally get that now. It made it even more fun
to watch. Thanks for bringing me, Van.
jpnChrName: 実際どうだったよ？　見応えはよぉ？
jpnSearchText: 実際どうだったよ？　見応えはよぉ？

engChrName: I LOVE Golden Blood! It never gets old!
engSearchText: I LOVE Golden Blood! It never gets old!
jpnChrName: 言うかっ！　所内の風紀を乱すんじゃねぇ！
jpnSearchText: 言うかっ！　所内の風紀を乱すんじゃねぇ！

engChrName: I wish I could have Zoe's combat suit! It's so—what's the word?—mature, but so practical at the same time!
engSearchText:
I wish I could have Zoe's combat suit! It's so—what's
the word?—mature, but so practical at the same time!
jpnChrName: ククッ、Ｒ指定版を観に行くしかねぇか。
jpnSearchText: ククッ、Ｒ指定版を観に行くしかねぇか。

engChrName: Bit young to be wantin' it for one of those reasons, don't you think?
engSearchText:
Bit young to be wantin' it for one of those reasons,
don't you think?
jpnChrName: ふふ、ジュディス様の身のこなし…… さすがのものでした。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ジュディス様の身のこなし……
さすがのものでした。

engChrName: But hey, if you're interested in it so much, it wouldn't surprise me if they put the real suit that was used in the film out on display sometime.
engSearchText:
But hey, if you're interested in it so much, it wouldn't
surprise me if they put the real suit that was used in
the film out on display sometime.
jpnChrName: 日頃の身体作りの賜物なのでしょう。 並々ならぬ努力があるのではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
日頃の身体作りの賜物なのでしょう。
並々ならぬ努力があるのではないかと。

engChrName: Really? That'd be awesome! You've gotta take me if they do!
engSearchText:
Really? That'd be awesome! You've gotta take me if
they do!
jpnChrName: たしかに、そもそもの身体能力や ポテンシャルは高いんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
たしかに、そもそもの身体能力や
ポテンシャルは高いんだろう。

engChrName: You think they'd let me try it on if I asked?
engSearchText: You think they'd let me try it on if I asked?
jpnChrName: ええ、あの“猫”の能力といい──
jpnSearchText: ええ、あの“猫”の能力といい──

engChrName: I wouldn't get your hopes up about that.
engSearchText: I wouldn't get your hopes up about that.
jpnChrName: 力を存分に引き出す、活かせるかは、 やはり自分の基礎が大事ですから。
jpnSearchText:
力を存分に引き出す、活かせるかは、
やはり自分の基礎が大事ですから。

engChrName: Well, that lived up to the hype. Always enjoy me a good spectacle.
engSearchText:
Well, that lived up to the hype. Always enjoy me a
good spectacle.
jpnChrName: そういう見えない頑張りが積み重なって 今の実力に繋がってるってことだな。
jpnSearchText:
そういう見えない頑張りが積み重なって
今の実力に繋がってるってことだな。

engChrName: Only thing that would've made it better is if that chick's tits spilled out of her suit even more. You've gotta agree, that'd make it perfect.
engSearchText:
Only thing that would've made it better is if that
chick's tits spilled out of her suit even more.
You've gotta agree, that'd make it perfect.
jpnChrName: なんというか……うん、色々と刺激的だったよ。
jpnSearchText: なんというか……うん、色々と刺激的だったよ。

engChrName: *sigh* Can't you keep it in your pants for just one day?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Can't you keep it in your pants for just
one day?
jpnChrName: 噂では聞いてたけど、想像以上に。
jpnSearchText: 噂では聞いてたけど、想像以上に。

engChrName: Shut up, you old prude. You can't give me crap after getting to worship at that woman's altar all up close and personal.
engSearchText:
Shut up, you old prude. You can't give me crap after
getting to worship at that woman's altar all up close
and personal.
jpnChrName: えっと、それは楽しめたのか？ 良い意味で言ってるか？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、それは楽しめたのか？
良い意味で言ってるか？

engChrName: How was the view? Pretty hot I bet, huh?
engSearchText: How was the view? Pretty hot I bet, huh?
jpnChrName: も、もちろん。 もう１回観てもいいくらいだよ。
jpnSearchText:
も、もちろん。
もう１回観てもいいくらいだよ。

engChrName: Like I'm telling you, you brat! Now quit makin' a scene in public with your horny ass!
engSearchText:
Like I'm telling you, you brat! Now quit makin' a
scene in public with your horny ass!
jpnChrName: 次は役者さんの表情やシーンの細部を 落ち着いて観てみたいなって。
jpnSearchText:
次は役者さんの表情やシーンの細部を
落ち着いて観てみたいなって。

engChrName: Suit yourself. I'll just catch that director's cut and find out for myself if that's what it takes.
engSearchText:
Suit yourself. I'll just catch that director's cut and find
out for myself if that's what it takes.
jpnChrName: ほう、だいぶ気に入ったんだな。 行く時は声かけてくれてもいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、だいぶ気に入ったんだな。
行く時は声かけてくれてもいいぜ。

engChrName: Ms. Lanster's athleticism was as impeccable as always.
engSearchText: Ms. Lanster's athleticism was as impeccable as always.
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: Her daily fitness routine has clearly paid dividends. The amount of time and effort she puts into it must be extraordinary.
engSearchText:
Her daily fitness routine has clearly paid dividends.
The amount of time and effort she puts into it must
be extraordinary.
jpnChrName: （一緒に観るのはちょっと恥ずかしい、   なんて言いづらいんだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（一緒に観るのはちょっと恥ずかしい、
なんて言いづらいんだけど……）

engChrName: To put it lightly. That woman is no slouch. You can't pull off those kinds of stunts without being puttin' in the work.
engSearchText:
To put it lightly. That woman is no slouch. You can't
pull off those kinds of stunts without being puttin' in
the work.
jpnChrName: うーん、どうしても粗探しをしちゃうわね。
jpnSearchText: うーん、どうしても粗探しをしちゃうわね。

engChrName: Indeed. Even if she's immensely talented in her... extracurricular activities, that alone doesn't explain it.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Even if she's immensely talented in her...
extracurricular activities, that alone doesn't explain it.
jpnChrName: アクションはもっと詰められたし 体の魅せ方が美しくないところもあったわ。
jpnSearchText:
アクションはもっと詰められたし
体の魅せ方が美しくないところもあったわ。

engChrName: No matter how much strength one might have, it takes mastering such fundamentals in order to both draw it and then utilize it in practice.
engSearchText:
No matter how much strength one might have, it
takes mastering such fundamentals in order to both
draw it and then utilize it in practice.
jpnChrName: そういうもんか。 素人目から見れば何の違和感も無いが。
jpnSearchText:
そういうもんか。
素人目から見れば何の違和感も無いが。

engChrName: Yeah. There's clearly a lot that's gone on behind the scenes for her to achieve so much. Gotta give her props for it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There's clearly a lot that's gone on behind the
scenes for her to achieve so much. Gotta give her
props for it.
jpnChrName: あのタイトな全身スーツに劣らない ボディラインだったと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
あのタイトな全身スーツに劣らない
ボディラインだったと思うけどな。

engChrName: That was—what's the best way to describe it?— very bombastic, to say the least.
engSearchText:
That was—what's the best way to describe it?—
very bombastic, to say the least.
jpnChrName: そりゃあ、体型維持は基本だし。 ……って、ちゃんと見てるわね。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ、体型維持は基本だし。
……って、ちゃんと見てるわね。

engChrName: I'd certainly heard as much going into it, but I still wasn't fully prepared for it.
engSearchText:
I'd certainly heard as much going into it, but I still
wasn't fully prepared for it.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、最優秀女優賞を逃した理由は あるってことよ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、最優秀女優賞を逃した理由は
あるってことよ。

engChrName: Uhh, is that a good thing? Were you still able to enjoy it?
engSearchText:
Uhh, is that a good thing? Were you still able to
enjoy it?
jpnChrName: ……よし、絶対次は負けないんだから。
jpnSearchText: ……よし、絶対次は負けないんだから。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Absolutely! In fact, I'd love to see it again.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! Absolutely! In fact, I'd love to see it again.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、実に痛快な作品であった。
jpnSearchText: ハッハッハッ、実に痛快な作品であった。

engChrName: Now that I've seen it once, I'd love to sit down and analyze the scenes and the actors' expressions in it.
engSearchText:
Now that I've seen it once, I'd love to sit down and
analyze the scenes and the actors' expressions in it.
jpnChrName: 頭が切れる強き女性の前では、男とは無力なものだな。
jpnSearchText: 頭が切れる強き女性の前では、男とは無力なものだな。

engChrName: Damn. That into it, huh? Well, lemme know when you decide to go. I'll tag along.
engSearchText:
Damn. That into it, huh? Well, lemme know when
you decide to go. I'll tag along.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督は特に、 女優の魅力を引き出すのが上手いんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督は特に、
女優の魅力を引き出すのが上手いんですよ。

engChrName: Oh... Okay. If you say so.
engSearchText: Oh... Okay. If you say so.
jpnChrName: ほう、それを聞くと他の作品も気になってくるな。
jpnSearchText: ほう、それを聞くと他の作品も気になってくるな。

engChrName: (I don't know how to tell him it'd be a little awkward watching it together with him like that...)
engSearchText:
(I don't know how to tell him it'd be a little awkward
watching it together with him like that...)
jpnChrName: ぜひとも過去作もリバイバル上映してほしいものだ。
jpnSearchText: ぜひとも過去作もリバイバル上映してほしいものだ。

engChrName: It's hard to watch it without wanting to pick it apart now.
engSearchText:
It's hard to watch it without wanting to pick it
apart now.
jpnChrName: 楽しむ気満々ですね、師父。
jpnSearchText: 楽しむ気満々ですね、師父。

engChrName: We could've fit more action into it if we tried. And to be honest, I don't think I always had the most flattering angles, either.
engSearchText:
We could've fit more action into it if we tried. And to
be honest, I don't think I always had the most
flattering angles, either.
jpnChrName: 『ゴールデンブラッド』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『ゴールデンブラッド』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: You really think so? I don't think your average viewer is bound to see anything wrong with any of that.
engSearchText:
You really think so? I don't think your average viewer
is bound to see anything wrong with any of that.
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Your body looks like it was born for that skintight suit Zoe's got.
engSearchText:
Your body looks like it was born for that skintight suit
Zoe's got.
jpnChrName: おお！？　そこにいるのは！
jpnSearchText: おお！？　そこにいるのは！

engChrName: Maybe, but it's my job to stay fit. What can I say? ...Sounds like somebody sure was paying close attention, though.
engSearchText:
Maybe, but it's my job to stay fit. What can I say?
...Sounds like somebody sure was paying close
attention, though.
jpnChrName: あれ、ヴァンがいる。
jpnSearchText: あれ、ヴァンがいる。

engChrName: All I'm saying is, when I watch that movie now, I can see why I lost that award for best actress to Nina. That's all.
engSearchText:
All I'm saying is, when I watch that movie now, I can
see why I lost that award for best actress to Nina.
That's all.
jpnChrName: ええっ！？　アンタは……！
jpnSearchText: ええっ！？　アンタは……！

engChrName: Something I won't let happen again, no matter what it takes.
engSearchText:
Something I won't let happen again, no matter what
it takes.
jpnChrName: ワハハ、ヴァン君じゃないか。 数刻ぶりじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
ワハハ、ヴァン君じゃないか。
数刻ぶりじゃな。

engChrName: Hahaha! Now that was quite the thriller.
engSearchText: Hahaha! Now that was quite the thriller.
jpnChrName: まさかここで監督とお会いできるとは。 あれからこっちへ足を延ばしてたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
まさかここで監督とお会いできるとは。
あれからこっちへ足を延ばしてたんですね。

engChrName: I like that Zoe woman. She shows that even the hardiest man around can't hold a candle to a sharp, tough woman.
engSearchText:
I like that Zoe woman. She shows that even the
hardiest man around can't hold a candle to a sharp,
tough woman.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの酔い醒ましに来たんじゃが、 ちょうど拙作が上映しておったからな。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの酔い醒ましに来たんじゃが、
ちょうど拙作が上映しておったからな。

engChrName: Yeah. Director Salvatore Gotti's got a talent for drawin' out the charm and appeal of the actresses that he works with, which he sure did there.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Director Salvatore Gotti's got a talent for
drawin' out the charm and appeal of the actresses that
he works with, which he sure did there.
jpnChrName: レオンドールを逃した悔しさを肴に 見納めたところよ。
jpnSearchText:
レオンドールを逃した悔しさを肴に
見納めたところよ。

engChrName: Does he, now? It makes me curious to see his other films.
engSearchText:
Does he, now? It makes me curious to see his
other films.
jpnChrName: おっと、瞳がギラギラしてますぜ。
jpnSearchText: おっと、瞳がギラギラしてますぜ。

engChrName: I'll hope that they put out some of his old work back into theaters so I can catch them.
engSearchText:
I'll hope that they put out some of his old work back
into theaters so I can catch them.
jpnChrName: その様子じゃ、次なる新作も 既に走り出してるんですかね？
jpnSearchText:
その様子じゃ、次なる新作も
既に走り出してるんですかね？

engChrName: Sounds like he's got a brand new fan in you, Master.
engSearchText: Sounds like he's got a brand new fan in you, Master.
jpnChrName: うむ、ヴァン君との縁を祝して 肯定だけはしておこう。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、ヴァン君との縁を祝して
肯定だけはしておこう。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Golden Blood.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Golden Blood.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、君は実に見どころがある若者だ。 新作ではぜひ俳優デビューしてみぬか！？
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、君は実に見どころがある若者だ。
新作ではぜひ俳優デビューしてみぬか！？

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: ほれ、サルバッドで目撃したあの、 青い焔（ほむら）をまとったカッチョイイ悪役（ヴィラン）で！！
jpnSearchText:
ほれ、サルバッドで目撃したあの、
青い焔（ほむら）をまとったカッチョイイ悪役（ヴィラン）で！！

engChrName: Hey! Is that who I think it is?
engSearchText: Hey! Is that who I think it is?
jpnChrName: きっと……いや絶対！ 主役並みに人気が出るに違いないッ！
jpnSearchText:
きっと……いや絶対！
主役並みに人気が出るに違いないッ！

engChrName: Oh, it's Edith's most famous spriggan.
engSearchText: Oh, it's Edith's most famous spriggan.
jpnChrName: えーと、あれは……
jpnSearchText: えーと、あれは……

engChrName: What the—? Why are you here?!
engSearchText: What the—? Why are you here?!
jpnChrName: 作品のテーマは、そうじゃな…… 『悪の正義と運命への復讐』で行こう！
jpnSearchText:
作品のテーマは、そうじゃな……
『悪の正義と運命への復讐』で行こう！

engChrName: Gahaha! Van, my man! It has been a WHILE! How've you been, huh?
engSearchText:
Gahaha! Van, my man! It has been a WHILE!
How've you been, huh?
jpnChrName: いやいや、俺は観る専で。 お気持ちだけ受け取っときますよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、俺は観る専で。
お気持ちだけ受け取っときますよ。

engChrName: Hey, Gotti. Didn't think I'd bump into you of all people here.
engSearchText:
Hey, Gotti. Didn't think I'd bump into you of all
people here.
jpnChrName: おっと、ここでお前さんと会うとは。
jpnSearchText: おっと、ここでお前さんと会うとは。

engChrName: Yeah, well, I came over here to sober up from that afterparty, only to find they were playing my damn movie.
engSearchText:
Yeah, well, I came over here to sober up from that
afterparty, only to find they were playing my
damn movie.
jpnChrName: １人で映画鑑賞か。 もうすっかり共和国に馴染んでるな。
jpnSearchText:
１人で映画鑑賞か。
もうすっかり共和国に馴染んでるな。

engChrName: Ended up watching it one last time. Nothing like being reminded of the Lionne d'Or that got away to get me back to my senses, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Ended up watching it one last time. Nothing like
being reminded of the Lionne d'Or that got away to
get me back to my senses, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ようやく１ヶ月が経つ頃かな。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ようやく１ヶ月が経つ頃かな。

engChrName: I thought your eyes looked a little teared up for some reason. Guess it wasn't my imagination.
engSearchText:
