I thought your eyes looked a little teared up for
some reason. Guess it wasn't my imagination.
jpnChrName: でも、ゆっくり観光とかできてなくて。 せめて映画でも観ようかなと。
jpnSearchText:
でも、ゆっくり観光とかできてなくて。
せめて映画でも観ようかなと。

engChrName: If you've put it behind you, though, does that mean you're already movin' on to your next movie?
engSearchText:
If you've put it behind you, though, does that mean
you're already movin' on to your next movie?
jpnChrName: 昼間は忙しいけど、夜ならいくらかフリーだからさ。
jpnSearchText: 昼間は忙しいけど、夜ならいくらかフリーだからさ。

engChrName: Normally I'm not one to say—but you're a good friend, Van, so I'll make an exception and tell you I am. But that's all you're getting!
engSearchText:
Normally I'm not one to say—but you're a good
friend, Van, so I'll make an exception and tell you
I am. But that's all you're getting!
jpnChrName: それでチョイスしたのがＲ－１７版か…… まぁ女子が観てダメってモンじゃないが。
jpnSearchText:
それでチョイスしたのがＲ－１７版か……
まぁ女子が観てダメってモンじゃないが。

engChrName: That said, you got a lot of potential in you. A LOT of potential. Say, why don't you come make your big acting debut on my next film?
engSearchText:
That said, you got a lot of potential in you. A LOT
of potential. Say, why don't you come make your big
acting debut on my next film?
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんが出てるし、話題の作品だし。 どうせ観るなら完全版、と思って。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさんが出てるし、話題の作品だし。
どうせ観るなら完全版、と思って。

engChrName: You can be that hot as hell bad boy persona I saw you as back in Tharbad! Y'know, the one with the wild hair and the blue flames!
engSearchText:
You can be that hot as hell bad boy persona I saw you
as back in Tharbad! Y'know, the one with the wild
hair and the blue flames!
jpnChrName: ……たしかに露出が多くて 目のやり場に困るシーンは多かった。
jpnSearchText:
……たしかに露出が多くて
目のやり場に困るシーンは多かった。

engChrName: I bet—no, I KNOW that you'll be as popular as the actual stars themselves! Everybody'll love you!
engSearchText:
I bet—no, I KNOW that you'll be as popular as the
actual stars themselves! Everybody'll love you!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士もスパイっぽいことはするけど さすがにああまではできないね。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士もスパイっぽいことはするけど
さすがにああまではできないね。

engChrName: Uhh, I don't know about—
engSearchText: Uhh, I don't know about—
jpnChrName: ハニートラップはあくまで、映画の醍醐味だしな。
jpnSearchText: ハニートラップはあくまで、映画の醍醐味だしな。

engChrName: You'll love the theme of it, too! The movie's about dark justice and getting revenge on fate—the kinda material that's right up your alley!
engSearchText:
You'll love the theme of it, too! The movie's about
dark justice and getting revenge on fate—the kinda
material that's right up your alley!
jpnChrName: よりによってどうしてアンタと……
jpnSearchText: よりによってどうしてアンタと……

engChrName: I appreciate the offer, I really do. But I think I'll pass. I'm a much better armchair critic than I am an actor.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the offer, I really do. But I think I'll pass.
I'm a much better armchair critic than I am an actor.
jpnChrName: えっと、アニエスには……
jpnSearchText: えっと、アニエスには……

engChrName: And there's one of the Bracer Guild's rising stars. Didn't think I'd see you here.
engSearchText:
And there's one of the Bracer Guild's rising stars.
Didn't think I'd see you here.
jpnChrName: 安心しな、チクらねぇよ。 もちろん生徒会長にもな。
jpnSearchText:
安心しな、チクらねぇよ。
もちろん生徒会長にもな。

engChrName: Come here to watch something all by yourself? Must be pretty used to life in Calvard if you're takin' in stuff like this in your free time.
engSearchText:
Come here to watch something all by yourself?
Must be pretty used to life in Calvard if you're takin'
in stuff like this in your free time.
jpnChrName: 無断外出に年齢詐称くらいのやんちゃ、 かわいいもんだと思うが。
jpnSearchText:
無断外出に年齢詐称くらいのやんちゃ、
かわいいもんだと思うが。

engChrName: I guess you could say that. I've been here about a month, so I'm feeling pretty comfortable now.
engSearchText:
I guess you could say that. I've been here about a
month, so I'm feeling pretty comfortable now.
jpnChrName: そ、そうではなく！　いや、それも大事だが！
jpnSearchText: そ、そうではなく！　いや、それも大事だが！

engChrName: I can't exactly go sightseeing around the country, so I figured I'd at least take in some of the film culture while I'm here.
engSearchText:
I can't exactly go sightseeing around the country, so I
figured I'd at least take in some of the film culture
while I'm here.
jpnChrName: 僕が隠したいのはどっちかっていうと “何を観たか”っていう方で──
jpnSearchText:
僕が隠したいのはどっちかっていうと
“何を観たか”っていう方で──

engChrName: And I've got plenty of time to kill at night, unlike the daytime, so this is as good of a way to spend it as any.
engSearchText:
And I've got plenty of time to kill at night, unlike the
daytime, so this is as good of a way to spend it as any.
jpnChrName: あっ！　やっぱりいた！
jpnSearchText: あっ！　やっぱりいた！

engChrName: Looks like you just caught that spicy director's cut. What made you go for that? Not that there's anything wrong with a woman seeing it.
engSearchText:
Looks like you just caught that spicy director's cut.
What made you go for that? Not that there's anything
wrong with a woman seeing it.
jpnChrName: もう、心配したんだからね！ アルベールが門限破るなんて！
jpnSearchText:
もう、心配したんだからね！
アルベールが門限破るなんて！

engChrName: I mean, everyone's talked about it and Judith's in it. I figured, if I'm gonna see any version of it, might as well make it the real deal.
engSearchText:
I mean, everyone's talked about it and Judith's in it.
I figured, if I'm gonna see any version of it, might as
well make it the real deal.
jpnChrName: オデット！？　どうしてここがっ！
jpnSearchText: オデット！？　どうしてここがっ！

engChrName: They...don't leave a lot to the imagination. There were a lot of scenes where I didn't know where to keep my eyes.
engSearchText:
They...don't leave a lot to the imagination.
There were a lot of scenes where I didn't know where
to keep my eyes.
jpnChrName: 『アルベール君なら映画館じゃない？』 ってレン先輩がね。
jpnSearchText:
『アルベール君なら映画館じゃない？』
ってレン先輩がね。

engChrName: The spy bits were interesting, too. Bracers get up to espionage sometimes, but we don't use the kinds of tactics Judith does.
engSearchText:
The spy bits were interesting, too. Bracers get up to
espionage sometimes, but we don't use the kinds of
tactics Judith does.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんと一緒だったのは安心したけど…… なになに、２人で映画を観てたとか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんと一緒だったのは安心したけど……
なになに、２人で映画を観てたとか？

engChrName: I figured. Sexy spycraft might only be a thing of the silver screen, but that's what makes those kinds of movies fun, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
I figured. Sexy spycraft might only be a thing of the
silver screen, but that's what makes those kinds of
movies fun, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: 偶然、同じヤツをな。
jpnSearchText: 偶然、同じヤツをな。

engChrName: *sigh* Of all the people I could've run into, why did it have to be you?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Of all the people I could've run into, why did it
have to be you?
jpnChrName: 『どうしても観たい映画があった』という 彼の熱意と心意気に免じて、許してやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
『どうしても観たい映画があった』という
彼の熱意と心意気に免じて、許してやってくれ。

engChrName: Y-You're not going to tell Agnès about this...are you?
engSearchText: Y-You're not going to tell Agnès about this...are you?
jpnChrName: ふむふむ、この時間にやってる映画と言えば…… はは～ん、左様でございますか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむふむ、この時間にやってる映画と言えば……
はは～ん、左様でございますか。

engChrName: Nah. Your secret's safe with me, kid. I won't tell your president friend, either.
engSearchText:
Nah. Your secret's safe with me, kid. I won't tell your
president friend, either.
jpnChrName: な、なんだよその顔は……
jpnSearchText: な、なんだよその顔は……

engChrName: I just find it quaint that your idea of mischief amounts to some good old lying about your age while you're sneakin' outta the dorm.
engSearchText:
I just find it quaint that your idea of mischief
amounts to some good old lying about your age while
you're sneakin' outta the dorm.
jpnChrName: アルベールも健全な男子なんですなぁ。
jpnSearchText: アルベールも健全な男子なんですなぁ。

engChrName: I wasn't talking about that! I mean, definitely don't tell the girls about those things, either!
engSearchText:
I wasn't talking about that! I mean, definitely don't
tell the girls about those things, either!
jpnChrName: 頼むからこの件、アニエスにだけは……
jpnSearchText: 頼むからこの件、アニエスにだけは……

engChrName: I'm more worried about them finding out what I watched, so...
engSearchText:
I'm more worried about them finding out what I
watched, so...
jpnChrName: 思いがけず出会った知り合いと それから少し言葉を交わした後──
jpnSearchText:
思いがけず出会った知り合いと
それから少し言葉を交わした後──

engChrName: There you are!
engSearchText: There you are!
jpnChrName: 帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。

engChrName: I can't believe you, of all people, broke curfew! You had me so worried!
engSearchText:
I can't believe you, of all people, broke curfew!
You had me so worried!
jpnChrName: 『ゴールデンブラッド　完全版』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『ゴールデンブラッド　完全版』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Odette?! Why are you here?!
engSearchText: Odette?! Why are you here?!
jpnChrName: ヴァン──君とここで会うとはな。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン──君とここで会うとはな。

engChrName: Renne figured if I'd find you anywhere, it'd probably be the movie theater, and what do you know? She was right.
engSearchText:
Renne figured if I'd find you anywhere, it'd probably
be the movie theater, and what do you know? She
was right.
jpnChrName: あら、こんな偶然もあるのね。
jpnSearchText: あら、こんな偶然もあるのね。

engChrName: I'm glad you at least had Van with you. What'd you two watch here anyway?
engSearchText:
I'm glad you at least had Van with you. What'd you
two watch here anyway?
jpnChrName: おっ、アークライドじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: おっ、アークライドじゃないか。

engChrName: Funny you should ask that.
engSearchText: Funny you should ask that.
jpnChrName: ……その台詞、そのまんま返すぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……その台詞、そのまんま返すぜ。

engChrName: We ended up catching the same movie. It's supposed to be adults only, but he wanted to see it so badly, I decided to sneak him in with me.
engSearchText:
We ended up catching the same movie. It's supposed
to be adults only, but he wanted to see it so badly, I
decided to sneak him in with me.
jpnChrName: アンタも映画とか観るんだな。 佇まいといい、色々な意味で目立ちすぎだが。
jpnSearchText:
アンタも映画とか観るんだな。
佇まいといい、色々な意味で目立ちすぎだが。

engChrName: I see. What were they playing at this hour that Albert had to ask... Oooh! That's what you saw, was it?
engSearchText:
I see. What were they playing at this hour that Albert
had to ask... Oooh! That's what you saw, was it?
jpnChrName: 生憎、渉外用のスーツを持ってきていなくてな。
jpnSearchText: 生憎、渉外用のスーツを持ってきていなくてな。

engChrName: Wh-What? What's with that look?
engSearchText: Wh-What? What's with that look?
jpnChrName: とはいえ、こうして足を運んだ甲斐があったものだ。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、こうして足を運んだ甲斐があったものだ。

engChrName: Nothing, nothing! You're just a teenage guy at the end of the day.
engSearchText:
Nothing, nothing! You're just a teenage guy at the
end of the day.
jpnChrName: おかげで元教え子と 落ち着いて話をする機会にも恵まれた。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで元教え子と
落ち着いて話をする機会にも恵まれた。

engChrName: I'm begging you. Whatever you do, please...don't tell Agnès.
engSearchText:
I'm begging you. Whatever you do, please...don't
tell Agnès.
jpnChrName: 別に落ち着いて話すネタもねぇが……
jpnSearchText: 別に落ち着いて話すネタもねぇが……

engChrName: Van's conversation in the theater continued for a brief period.
engSearchText:
Van's conversation in the theater continued for a
brief period.
jpnChrName: 昼間も何かと忙しかったようだし、 映画鑑賞で息抜きってか？
jpnSearchText:
昼間も何かと忙しかったようだし、
映画鑑賞で息抜きってか？

engChrName: Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of his evening.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in
the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of
his evening.
jpnChrName: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』をチョイスするのは まぁアンタらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』をチョイスするのは
まぁアンタらしいな。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Golden Blood Director's Cut.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Golden Blood Director's Cut.
jpnChrName: 娯楽性に振り切らず、 時勢を反映している点に好感が持てた。
jpnSearchText:
娯楽性に振り切らず、
時勢を反映している点に好感が持てた。

engChrName: Van! I didn't expect to run into you here.
engSearchText: Van! I didn't expect to run into you here.
jpnChrName: どんな物事にも陽（ひかり）と陰がある―― もちろん、人にも。
jpnSearchText:
どんな物事にも陽（ひかり）と陰がある――
もちろん、人にも。

engChrName: Well, look who we have here.
engSearchText: Well, look who we have here.
jpnChrName: それを切り取ってこそのリアリティで、 作品に深みが出るものだろう。
jpnSearchText:
それを切り取ってこそのリアリティで、
作品に深みが出るものだろう。

engChrName: Hey, is that Van I see?
engSearchText: Hey, is that Van I see?
jpnChrName: それは同感だ。
jpnSearchText: それは同感だ。

engChrName: I...could definitely say the same to you.
engSearchText: I...could definitely say the same to you.
jpnChrName: ……というかこういう話も、 たまには妹（フェリ）としてやったらどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……というかこういう話も、
たまには妹（フェリ）としてやったらどうだ。

engChrName: I didn't know you were into movies. Don't you think you stand out a little, lookin' like that, though?
engSearchText:
I didn't know you were into movies. Don't you think
you stand out a little, lookin' like that, though?
jpnChrName: あっちはそれを望んでるだろ、きっと。
jpnSearchText: あっちはそれを望んでるだろ、きっと。

engChrName: Perhaps, but I didn't bring any of my business suits with me, so it was either come like this or don't come at all.
engSearchText:
Perhaps, but I didn't bring any of my business suits
with me, so it was either come like this or don't come
at all.
jpnChrName: ふむ、所員の私生活にまで気を配っているのか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、所員の私生活にまで気を配っているのか。

engChrName: Either way, that movie was well worth coming out to see.
engSearchText:
Either way, that movie was well worth coming out
to see.
jpnChrName: 君のその気遣い上手なところは 昔と変わらないようだ。
jpnSearchText:
君のその気遣い上手なところは
昔と変わらないようだ。

engChrName: Especially since it gives me an opportunity to relax and catch up with one of my old students.
engSearchText:
Especially since it gives me an opportunity to relax
and catch up with one of my old students.
jpnChrName: あくまで所長としてのフォローだ、元教官殿。
jpnSearchText: あくまで所長としてのフォローだ、元教官殿。

engChrName: I don't know that there's anything relaxing you and I can really talk about, but maybe that's just me.
engSearchText:
I don't know that there's anything relaxing you and I
can really talk about, but maybe that's just me.
jpnChrName: おっと、生徒会長がこんな時間に 出歩いてていいのか？
jpnSearchText:
おっと、生徒会長がこんな時間に
出歩いてていいのか？

engChrName: You sure seemed busy earlier today. Did you come here to take a breather or something?
engSearchText:
You sure seemed busy earlier today. Did you come
here to take a breather or something?
jpnChrName: うふふ、それはもちろん――
jpnSearchText: うふふ、それはもちろん――

engChrName: Not that I'm surprised a guy like you would go out of his way to see a movie like Wolves' Requiem. That's got your name written all over it.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm surprised a guy like you would go out of
his way to see a movie like Wolves' Requiem.
That's got your name written all over it.
jpnChrName: “見回り”、だろ？
jpnSearchText: “見回り”、だろ？

engChrName: And you'd be right. I appreciate how it reflects the times we live in while still making for an entertaining watch.
engSearchText:
And you'd be right. I appreciate how it reflects the
times we live in while still making for an
entertaining watch.
jpnChrName: まぁいいさ。 リバイバル上映は夜限定だしな。
jpnSearchText:
まぁいいさ。
リバイバル上映は夜限定だしな。

engChrName: It feels like it could happen in our own world, which gives it a certain depth.
engSearchText:
It feels like it could happen in our own world, which
gives it a certain depth.
jpnChrName: 映画祭で最優秀賞を獲った作品は チェックしたいじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
映画祭で最優秀賞を獲った作品は
チェックしたいじゃない？

engChrName: Everything you see in the movie has a light side and dark side to it—including its cast.
engSearchText:
Everything you see in the movie has a light side and
dark side to it—including its cast.
jpnChrName: 特にニナ・フェンリィさんのお芝居には 目を奪われっぱなしだったわ。
jpnSearchText:
特にニナ・フェンリィさんのお芝居には
目を奪われっぱなしだったわ。

engChrName: You took the words right outta my mouth.
engSearchText: You took the words right outta my mouth.
jpnChrName: 瀕死の状態の中、愛する人の腕の中で微笑む 狂気を感じるくらいの純愛──
jpnSearchText:
瀕死の状態の中、愛する人の腕の中で微笑む
狂気を感じるくらいの純愛──

engChrName: But enough about me. Shouldn't you think about seeing your kid sister for once?
engSearchText:
But enough about me. Shouldn't you think about
seeing your kid sister for once?
jpnChrName: 同じ１０代とは思えない色気があるというか。 魅力的な女優さんよね。
jpnSearchText:
同じ１０代とは思えない色気があるというか。
魅力的な女優さんよね。

engChrName: I know for a fact she'd really appreciate it.
engSearchText: I know for a fact she'd really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 当の本人の清楚な雰囲気とのギャップに また驚くんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
当の本人の清楚な雰囲気とのギャップに
また驚くんだよな。

engChrName: Concerning yourself with your staffs' personal lives, are you?
engSearchText:
Concerning yourself with your staffs' personal lives,
are you?
jpnChrName: お次はどんな役に化けるのか 楽しみなのは違いねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お次はどんな役に化けるのか
楽しみなのは違いねぇ。

engChrName: You never could help yourself sticking your neck out for other people when you were younger. I see that remains the case.
engSearchText:
You never could help yourself sticking your neck out
for other people when you were younger. I see that
remains the case.
jpnChrName: ……化ける、ね。
jpnSearchText: ……化ける、ね。

engChrName: This isn't about sticking my neck for other people. I just try to support my assistants so they can do their best work.
engSearchText:
This isn't about sticking my neck for other people.
I just try to support my assistants so they can do their
best work.
jpnChrName: それが彼女が“天賦の才能”と謳われる所以 でしょうけれど。
jpnSearchText:
それが彼女が“天賦の才能”と謳われる所以
でしょうけれど。

engChrName: Should you really be wandering around town at this hour? Don't you have responsibilities back on campus?
engSearchText:
Should you really be wandering around town at
this hour? Don't you have responsibilities back
on campus?
jpnChrName: “見えない”のよね…… 掴みどころがない、とも言えるかしら。
jpnSearchText:
“見えない”のよね……
掴みどころがない、とも言えるかしら。

engChrName: Oh, whatever are you talking about? I'm out on business—really.
engSearchText:
Oh, whatever are you talking about? I'm out on
business—really.
jpnChrName: “ニナ・フェンリィ”という人の実体が。
jpnSearchText: “ニナ・フェンリィ”という人の実体が。

engChrName: Yeah? This your idea of patrolling the city?
engSearchText: Yeah? This your idea of patrolling the city?
jpnChrName: （実際、本人も“自分というものがない”と   悩んでいたっけな。）
jpnSearchText:
（実際、本人も“自分というものがない”と
悩んでいたっけな。）

engChrName: Eh, I guess there's no harm in it. They're only doing these reruns at night anyway.
engSearchText:
Eh, I guess there's no harm in it. They're only doing
these reruns at night anyway.
jpnChrName: 何度か直に話したが、 たしかに裏表がある感じじゃあない。
jpnSearchText:
何度か直に話したが、
たしかに裏表がある感じじゃあない。

engChrName: Well, after it took the Lionne d'Or in Tharbad, I couldn't afford NOT to see it, could I?
engSearchText:
Well, after it took the Lionne d'Or in Tharbad, I
couldn't afford NOT to see it, could I?
jpnChrName: ……だがお前さんが言いたいのは そういうことじゃなさそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
……だがお前さんが言いたいのは
そういうことじゃなさそうだな？

engChrName: I get why it made such a stir now. Nina Fenly's acting captured my attention the whole way through.
engSearchText:
I get why it made such a stir now. Nina Fenly's acting
captured my attention the whole way through.
jpnChrName: 何者でもないからこそ、 何にでも染まることができる。
jpnSearchText:
何者でもないからこそ、
何にでも染まることができる。

engChrName: Especially while she lied in the arms of the man she loved, smiling till her final breath. You could feel the purity behind her feelings.
engSearchText:
Especially while she lied in the arms of the man she
loved, smiling till her final breath. You could feel the
purity behind her feelings.
jpnChrName: おそらく本人の意思とは関係なく―― ある種の恐ろしささえ感じるわ。
jpnSearchText:
おそらく本人の意思とは関係なく――
ある種の恐ろしささえ感じるわ。

engChrName: She's a bewitching actress. It's hard to believe how much feminine charm she can muster despite us being nearly the same age.
engSearchText:
She's a bewitching actress. It's hard to believe how
much feminine charm she can muster despite us
being nearly the same age.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、“天才”と呼ばれる人って ほんとに興味深い人たちばかりね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、“天才”と呼ばれる人って
ほんとに興味深い人たちばかりね。

engChrName: It's even crazier to think about when you consider how subdued and wholesome she is in real life.
engSearchText:
It's even crazier to think about when you consider
how subdued and wholesome she is in real life.
jpnChrName: 言わずもがな、そこにはお前さんも含まれるけどな。
jpnSearchText: 言わずもがな、そこにはお前さんも含まれるけどな。

engChrName: Makes you wonder what sort of façade she'll end up putting on next. I know I'll be first in line to see for myself.
engSearchText:
Makes you wonder what sort of façade she'll end up
putting on next. I know I'll be first in line to see
for myself.
jpnChrName: へぇ、アンタも来てたのか。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、アンタも来てたのか。

engChrName: ...'Façade.' That's a good choice of words.
engSearchText: ...'Façade.' That's a good choice of words.
jpnChrName: この時間でないと体が空かなくてな。
jpnSearchText: この時間でないと体が空かなくてな。

engChrName: Her ability to so convincingly put on such different personas must be why she has a reputation for being a gifted actress.
engSearchText:
Her ability to so convincingly put on such different
personas must be why she has a reputation for being a
gifted actress.
jpnChrName: サルバッドで起きたことは フィーから諸々報告は受けていたが――
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドで起きたことは
フィーから諸々報告は受けていたが――

engChrName: But at the same time, it makes it hard to get a sense of who she really is when the cameras aren't rolling.
engSearchText:
But at the same time, it makes it hard to get a sense
of who she really is when the cameras aren't rolling.
jpnChrName: 『初レオンドール記念、リバイバル上映中！』 なんて銘打たれちゃ、観たくなるだろ？
jpnSearchText:
『初レオンドール記念、リバイバル上映中！』
なんて銘打たれちゃ、観たくなるだろ？

engChrName: It's almost like her identity is completely invisible looking at her from the outside.
engSearchText:
It's almost like her identity is completely invisible
looking at her from the outside.
jpnChrName: ま、今年イチオシの１作だろうな。 受賞に違わぬ傑作だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今年イチオシの１作だろうな。
受賞に違わぬ傑作だ。

engChrName: (You're not the only one who thinks that. Nina herself has definitely worried about that exact thing before.)
engSearchText:
(You're not the only one who thinks that.
Nina herself has definitely worried about that exact
thing before.)
jpnChrName: 主演のニナ・フェンリィは最優秀女優賞、 男優の方も優秀男優賞を獲ったくらいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
主演のニナ・フェンリィは最優秀女優賞、
男優の方も優秀男優賞を獲ったくらいだしな。

engChrName: I've met her a couple of times. At the very least, I don't get the vibe that she's a two-faced person or anything like that.
engSearchText:
I've met her a couple of times. At the very least, I
don't get the vibe that she's a two-faced person or
anything like that.
jpnChrName: おう、すごく良かったぜ！ 男臭いアクションと、切ないロマンス！
jpnSearchText:
おう、すごく良かったぜ！
男臭いアクションと、切ないロマンス！

engChrName: ...But that's not what you're really saying here, is it?
engSearchText: ...But that's not what you're really saying here, is it?
jpnChrName: 警察とギャングの対立という硬派なテーマながら エンターテインメント性も忘れない……
jpnSearchText:
警察とギャングの対立という硬派なテーマながら
エンターテインメント性も忘れない……

engChrName: No. It's precisely because she's not any one person deep down that she can so capably mold herself however she likes.
engSearchText:
No. It's precisely because she's not any one person
deep down that she can so capably mold herself
however she likes.
jpnChrName: ラム監督の今後の作品も追いかけたくなった。
jpnSearchText: ラム監督の今後の作品も追いかけたくなった。

engChrName: In some ways, that makes her a pretty formidable person, whether she herself necessarily wants to be that way or not.
engSearchText:
In some ways, that makes her a pretty formidable
person, whether she herself necessarily wants to be
that way or not.
jpnChrName: 当分は映画好きからもメディアからも 注目の的だろう。
jpnSearchText:
当分は映画好きからもメディアからも
注目の的だろう。

engChrName: Heehee. Geniuses are all such fascinating people to analyze. Wouldn't you agree?
engSearchText:
Heehee. Geniuses are all such fascinating people
to analyze. Wouldn't you agree?
jpnChrName: 恐らくもう新作の話は進んでるはずだし、 俺もいちファンとして楽しみだ。
jpnSearchText:
恐らくもう新作の話は進んでるはずだし、
俺もいちファンとして楽しみだ。

engChrName: I think a ton of people would toss you in that exact same basket, you know.
engSearchText:
I think a ton of people would toss you in that exact
same basket, you know.
jpnChrName: 思いがけず出会った知り合いと それから少し言葉を交わした後──
jpnSearchText:
思いがけず出会った知り合いと
それから少し言葉を交わした後──

engChrName: Oh. Hey, Zin. Didn't realize you were here.
engSearchText: Oh. Hey, Zin. Didn't realize you were here.
jpnChrName: 帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。

engChrName: This time of day's the only stretch I get to myself.
engSearchText: This time of day's the only stretch I get to myself.
jpnChrName: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Fie filled me in on everything that happened around the film festival in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Fie filled me in on everything that happened
around the film festival in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ほう、見慣れた奴がいるかと思えば。
jpnSearchText: ほう、見慣れた奴がいるかと思えば。

engChrName: That's how I learned about the movie and it winning the first Lionne d'Or. When I saw they were doing reruns, I couldn't pass up seeing it.
engSearchText:
That's how I learned about the movie and it winning
the first Lionne d'Or. When I saw they were doing
reruns, I couldn't pass up seeing it.
jpnChrName: ヴァン？　貴方もしかして……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン？　貴方もしかして……

engChrName: Makes sense. It won that award for a damn good reason. It's probably the best movie released this year—a real masterpiece.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. It won that award for a damn good
reason. It's probably the best movie released this
year—a real masterpiece.
jpnChrName: フッ、こんな場所で奇遇だな。
jpnSearchText: フッ、こんな場所で奇遇だな。

engChrName: Not to mention that Nina Fenly and her co-star both took the awards for best actress and actor on top of that.
engSearchText:
Not to mention that Nina Fenly and her co-star both
took the awards for best actress and actor on top
of that.
jpnChrName: 珍しいところで会うな。
jpnSearchText: 珍しいところで会うな。

engChrName: I can see why! It was great stuff. Lots of macho action and just as much romance that really pulls at your heartstrings. I loved it!
engSearchText:
I can see why! It was great stuff. Lots of macho action
and just as much romance that really pulls at
your heartstrings. I loved it!
jpnChrName: 多忙なＣＩＤのエースも、映画を観る余裕はあるか。
jpnSearchText: 多忙なＣＩＤのエースも、映画を観る余裕はあるか。

engChrName: It's impressive how gritty it manages to depict the conflict between the police and gang while still being so entertaining to watch.
engSearchText:
It's impressive how gritty it manages to depict the
conflict between the police and gang while still being
so entertaining to watch.
jpnChrName: フッ、仕事ができる人間は 息抜きも上手いものだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、仕事ができる人間は
息抜きも上手いものだぞ。

engChrName: Makes me want to follow Leslie Lam's work and see what else he puts out.
engSearchText:
Makes me want to follow Leslie Lam's work and see
what else he puts out.
jpnChrName: とはいえこの作品は、前評判から気になっていてな。
jpnSearchText: とはいえこの作品は、前評判から気になっていてな。

engChrName: Can't say I blame you. The press loves him just as much as movie nerds like me.
engSearchText:
Can't say I blame you. The press loves him just as
much as movie nerds like me.
jpnChrName: 実力派女優ニケ・マルソーの異色作―― 秘密を抱える女性というのはやはり魅惑的に映る。
jpnSearchText:
実力派女優ニケ・マルソーの異色作――
秘密を抱える女性というのはやはり魅惑的に映る。

engChrName: I have to imagine he's knee-deep in his next film by now. Lookin' forward to checking it out as a fan when it's out, myself.
engSearchText:
I have to imagine he's knee-deep in his next film
by now. Lookin' forward to checking it out as a fan
when it's out, myself.
jpnChrName: （秘密を抱える、ね。   噂は聞いたことあるが。）
jpnSearchText:
（秘密を抱える、ね。
噂は聞いたことあるが。）

engChrName: Van's conversation in the theater continued for a brief period.
engSearchText:
Van's conversation in the theater continued for a
brief period.
jpnChrName: 肝心の映画の内容は、ちょいと難解だったな。 初見では評価しづらいっつうか。
jpnSearchText:
肝心の映画の内容は、ちょいと難解だったな。
初見では評価しづらいっつうか。

engChrName: Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of his evening.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in
the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of
his evening.
jpnChrName: そうか、それは意外だな。
jpnSearchText: そうか、それは意外だな。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Wolves' Requiem.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Wolves' Requiem.
jpnChrName: ……歪みを認知しながらも、 そんな世界で生きることを選ぶ。
jpnSearchText:
……歪みを認知しながらも、
そんな世界で生きることを選ぶ。

engChrName: I thought you looked familiar. It seems I was more than a little right.
engSearchText:
I thought you looked familiar. It seems I was more
than a little right.
jpnChrName: 自分が生きる世界を断定し、狭めてしまう。
jpnSearchText: 自分が生きる世界を断定し、狭めてしまう。

engChrName: Van? Were you just at that showing, too?
engSearchText: Van? Were you just at that showing, too?
jpnChrName: そんな奴を、俺は身近に知っているんだがな？
jpnSearchText: そんな奴を、俺は身近に知っているんだがな？

engChrName: Heh. Of all the people I could've run into here, it had to be you.
engSearchText:
Heh. Of all the people I could've run into here, it had
to be you.
jpnChrName: ……ふん、そりゃ狂人じゃなく どこぞの世捨て人の間違いじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
……ふん、そりゃ狂人じゃなく
どこぞの世捨て人の間違いじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Not used to seeing you here, René.
engSearchText: Not used to seeing you here, René.
jpnChrName: ……すごいタイミングだな。 同じヤツを観てたとは。
jpnSearchText:
……すごいタイミングだな。
同じヤツを観てたとは。

engChrName: Does a CID wunderkind like you ever even have the time to spare to catch a movie?
engSearchText:
Does a CID wunderkind like you ever even have the
time to spare to catch a movie?
jpnChrName: 実力派女優のニケ・マルソーさんが 人の狂気を演じ上げる異色作──
jpnSearchText:
実力派女優のニケ・マルソーさんが
人の狂気を演じ上げる異色作──

engChrName: Hmph. In my mind, a person who doesn't know when to take a break and catch their breath isn't truly good at their job.
engSearchText:
Hmph. In my mind, a person who doesn't know
when to take a break and catch their breath isn't truly
good at their job.
jpnChrName: 前評判を聞いて、気になっていた作品だったの。
jpnSearchText: 前評判を聞いて、気になっていた作品だったの。

engChrName: In any case, the reviews I read prior to its release made me want to see it, and now I have. I can see how it earned such praise.
engSearchText:
In any case, the reviews I read prior to its release
made me want to see it, and now I have. I can see
how it earned such praise.
jpnChrName: へぇ、意外とリサーチしてるんだな。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、意外とリサーチしてるんだな。

engChrName: Nike Marceau does a bewitching job playing a woman with secrets to hide. Really, she's as immensely talented as one could be.
engSearchText:
Nike Marceau does a bewitching job playing a
woman with secrets to hide. Really, she's as
immensely talented as one could be.
jpnChrName: だがお前の好みはもっとこう、かわい――
jpnSearchText: だがお前の好みはもっとこう、かわい――

engChrName: (I bet you DID like her acting, you government spook. I've heard my share of rumblings of what you're involved in.)
engSearchText:
(I bet you DID like her acting, you
government spook. I've heard my share of rumblings
of what you're involved in.)
jpnChrName: 何を観ようが私の勝手でしょう？
jpnSearchText: 何を観ようが私の勝手でしょう？

engChrName: Honestly, I found the main plot of the movie to be a little tough to follow. Can't say it really grabbed me, at least watching it my first time.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I found the main plot of the movie to be a
little tough to follow. Can't say it really grabbed me,
at least watching it my first time.
jpnChrName: 別に文句を言ってるんじゃねぇよ……
jpnSearchText: 別に文句を言ってるんじゃねぇよ……

engChrName: Really? You're such a connoisseur, I would have figured you enjoyed it.
engSearchText:
Really? You're such a connoisseur, I would have
figured you enjoyed it.
jpnChrName: ただ、ああいう暗くて重い話とか あんま得意じゃなかったろ？
jpnSearchText:
ただ、ああいう暗くて重い話とか
あんま得意じゃなかったろ？

engChrName: You know, her performance really reminds me of someone I know.
engSearchText:
You know, her performance really reminds me of
someone I know.
jpnChrName: ……学生時代はね。 でも今は、共感さえできる。
jpnSearchText:
……学生時代はね。
でも今は、共感さえできる。

engChrName: Especially the way she chooses to live that world knowing full well how twisted it is. How despite it all, she embraces it, letting it box her in.
engSearchText:
Especially the way she chooses to live that world
knowing full well how twisted it is. How despite it all,
she embraces it, letting it box her in.
jpnChrName: 主人公のリリーがそうだったように――
jpnSearchText: 主人公のリリーがそうだったように――

engChrName: Does that sound familiar to you at all? Or is it just me, perhaps?
engSearchText:
Does that sound familiar to you at all? Or is it just
me, perhaps?
jpnChrName: グラスに注がれるように少しずつ プレッシャーがかさを増していく感覚が。
jpnSearchText:
グラスに注がれるように少しずつ
プレッシャーがかさを増していく感覚が。

engChrName: ...Heh. I think it might just be you, pal. And 'sides, not everybody who chooses to be a recluse turns out to be crazy like her.
engSearchText:
...Heh. I think it might just be you, pal. And 'sides,
not everybody who chooses to be a recluse turns out
to be crazy like her.
jpnChrName: 私はもう、何者でもないエレイン・オークレール には戻れないから。
jpnSearchText:
私はもう、何者でもないエレイン・オークレール
には戻れないから。

engChrName: Hey, Elaine. That's wild, both of us catchin' the same movie at the exact same time. What were the odds of that, huh?
engSearchText:
Hey, Elaine. That's wild, both of us catchin' the same
movie at the exact same time. What were the odds of
that, huh?
jpnChrName: エレイン、お前……
jpnSearchText: エレイン、お前……

engChrName: You're telling me. I couldn't pass this one up after hearing the reviews.
engSearchText:
You're telling me. I couldn't pass this one up after
hearing the reviews.
jpnChrName: ……今のは聞き流してちょうだい。
jpnSearchText: ……今のは聞き流してちょうだい。

engChrName: They were all talking about what a unique movie it is and how good of a job Nike Marceau does in playing a woman going insane.
engSearchText:
They were all talking about what a unique movie it is
and how good of a job Nike Marceau does in playing
a woman going insane.
jpnChrName: そろそろ帰るわ。 貴方もあまり遅くまで出歩かないように。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ帰るわ。
貴方もあまり遅くまで出歩かないように。

engChrName: Damn. Sounds like you really did your homework goin' into it.
engSearchText:
Damn. Sounds like you really did your homework
goin' into it.
jpnChrName: ま、お前がこれを観に来てるのは 別に意外じゃねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前がこれを観に来てるのは
別に意外じゃねぇが。

engChrName: I'm surprised you'd watch something like that. I figured you were into more cutesy sh—
engSearchText:
I'm surprised you'd watch something like that.
I figured you were into more cutesy sh—
jpnChrName: 実力派女優ニケ・マルソーが 人の狂気を演じ上げる異色作──
jpnSearchText:
実力派女優ニケ・マルソーが
人の狂気を演じ上げる異色作──

engChrName: So what if I am? I can watch whatever I like, can't I?
engSearchText: So what if I am? I can watch whatever I like, can't I?
jpnChrName: 前評判で気になっていた作品でな。
jpnSearchText: 前評判で気になっていた作品でな。

engChrName: I wasn't criticizing you, I swear. Just caught me off guard, is all.
engSearchText:
I wasn't criticizing you, I swear. Just caught me off
guard, is all.
jpnChrName: 彼女の話は、煌都にいる彼から たまに聞くこともあったが。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の話は、煌都にいる彼から
たまに聞くこともあったが。

engChrName: I didn't think you could really handle the dark, heavier stuff.
engSearchText:
I didn't think you could really handle the dark,
heavier stuff.
jpnChrName: （煌都にいる彼……） そういや、あいつの昔馴染みだったか。
jpnSearchText:
（煌都にいる彼……）
そういや、あいつの昔馴染みだったか。

engChrName: ...I couldn't when I was younger, yes. But these days, I can relate to someone like her.
engSearchText:
...I couldn't when I was younger, yes. But these days,
I can relate to someone like her.
jpnChrName: 肝心の映画の内容は、ちょいと演出が難解で 観る人を選びそうな印象だったな。
jpnSearchText:
肝心の映画の内容は、ちょいと演出が難解で
観る人を選びそうな印象だったな。

engChrName: I know what it's like to have pressure slowly piling onto you.
engSearchText:
I know what it's like to have pressure slowly piling
onto you.
jpnChrName: リリー本人の歪（いびつ）な心が生み出した “２人のリリー”の対話が鍵だったな。
jpnSearchText:
リリー本人の歪（いびつ）な心が生み出した
“２人のリリー”の対話が鍵だったな。

engChrName: It's like a glass someone's always pouring into, little by little. It keeps getting closer to the top, but it never seems to stop.
engSearchText:
It's like a glass someone's always pouring into, little
by little. It keeps getting closer to the top, but it never
seems to stop.
jpnChrName: そんな２人が奏でる不協和音が リリーの“自分は何者なのか（アイデンティティ）”を曖昧にしていく。
jpnSearchText:
そんな２人が奏でる不協和音が
リリーの“自分は何者なのか（アイデンティティ）”を曖昧にしていく。

engChrName: I can't go back to being a nobody now. I'm Beauty's Blade and everything that comes with it—good and bad.
engSearchText:
I can't go back to being a nobody now. I'm Beauty's
Blade and everything that comes with it—good
and bad.
jpnChrName: ない交ぜになった真実と虚構── それを見極められなくなった時、人はどうなるか。
jpnSearchText:
ない交ぜになった真実と虚構──
それを見極められなくなった時、人はどうなるか。

engChrName: Elaine, I...I didn't realize you were...
engSearchText: Elaine, I...I didn't realize you were...
jpnChrName: ……といったところか。
jpnSearchText: ……といったところか。

engChrName: Forget I said any of that. It's nothing you needed to hear, Van.
engSearchText:
Forget I said any of that. It's nothing you needed to
hear, Van.
jpnChrName: くっ、このインテリ色男め……
jpnSearchText: くっ、このインテリ色男め……

engChrName: I'm going to head home now. Don't stay out too late, all right?
engSearchText:
I'm going to head home now. Don't stay out too late,
all right?
jpnChrName: フッ、お前とはまたゆっくり 映画談義をしたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、お前とはまたゆっくり
映画談義をしたいものだな。

engChrName: Can't say I'm all that surprised to see you. This definitely strikes me as your kind of flick.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm all that surprised to see you.
This definitely strikes me as your kind of flick.
jpnChrName: お互い落ち着いた頃に、飲みにでも行くとしよう。
jpnSearchText: お互い落ち着いた頃に、飲みにでも行くとしよう。

engChrName: You're not wrong. After all the reviews it got, I had to check it out for myself.
engSearchText:
You're not wrong. After all the reviews it got, I had to
check it out for myself.
jpnChrName: 思いがけず出会った知り合いと それから少し言葉を交わした後──
jpnSearchText:
思いがけず出会った知り合いと
それから少し言葉を交わした後──

engChrName: They all talked about how Nike Marceau's portrayal of insanity made it an unusual movie, which got my attention.
engSearchText:
They all talked about how Nike Marceau's portrayal
of insanity made it an unusual movie, which got
my attention.
jpnChrName: 帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。

engChrName: I've also heard stories of that woman from our friend in Langport from time to time, too. That gave me another reason to see it.
engSearchText:
I've also heard stories of that woman from our friend
in Langport from time to time, too. That gave me
another reason to see it.
jpnChrName: 『ソバーキュリアス』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『ソバーキュリアス』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: (Our friend in Langport, huh? He must mean...) Oh, yeah. I forgot those two go back a long way. That's interesting.
engSearchText:
(Our friend in Langport, huh? He must mean...)
Oh, yeah. I forgot those two go back a long way.
That's interesting.
jpnChrName: 決死の覚悟を宿した瞳と、 迷いのない凛としたシーナの表情──
jpnSearchText:
決死の覚悟を宿した瞳と、
迷いのない凛としたシーナの表情──

engChrName: Truth be told, I found the direction to be a little obtuse. Definitely the kind of movie that's tailor-made for a particular kind of audience.
engSearchText:
Truth be told, I found the direction to be a
little obtuse. Definitely the kind of movie that's
tailor-made for a particular kind of audience.
jpnChrName: ニナさんの演技、本当に素晴らしかったです。
jpnSearchText: ニナさんの演技、本当に素晴らしかったです。

engChrName: Fair enough. I'd say the core of the movie was the dialogue between the two Lilys that her warped mind gives rise to.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. I'd say the core of the movie was the
dialogue between the two Lilys that her warped mind
gives rise to.
jpnChrName: ああ、同感だ。 決起のシーンは惹きこまれたな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、同感だ。
決起のシーンは惹きこまれたな。

engChrName: Their back-and-forth projects a certain sense of dissonance that makes it difficult to pin down who Lily even really is as a person.
engSearchText:
Their back-and-forth projects a certain sense of
dissonance that makes it difficult to pin down who
Lily even really is as a person.
jpnChrName: この感動をすぐにでも ご本人に伝えたいくらいですけど……！
jpnSearchText:
この感動をすぐにでも
ご本人に伝えたいくらいですけど……！

engChrName: The movie weaves truth and fiction together and is an exploration of what people become when they can no longer tell the two of them apart.
engSearchText:
The movie weaves truth and fiction together and is an
exploration of what people become when they can no
longer tell the two of them apart.
jpnChrName: ニナさんは出られてる作品すべて雰囲気が違くて、 出演作を追いかけたい女優さんの１人です！
jpnSearchText:
ニナさんは出られてる作品すべて雰囲気が違くて、
出演作を追いかけたい女優さんの１人です！

engChrName: At least, that's what it's about in my opinion.
engSearchText: At least, that's what it's about in my opinion.
jpnChrName: そんなに楽しめたなら、誘った甲斐があったもんだ。
jpnSearchText: そんなに楽しめたなら、誘った甲斐があったもんだ。

engChrName: Damn. Look at you, gettin' all intellectual on me. Not good enough being Edith's most handsome guy in town, huh? Gotta be its smartest, too, now?
engSearchText:
Damn. Look at you, gettin' all intellectual on me.
Not good enough being Edith's most handsome guy
in town, huh? Gotta be its smartest, too, now?
jpnChrName: ……はい、お陰様で。 ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、お陰様で。
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: What can I say? It's a movie that made me think.
engSearchText: What can I say? It's a movie that made me think.
jpnChrName: このような状況下ですけど…… ちょっと元気が出てきました。
jpnSearchText:
このような状況下ですけど……
ちょっと元気が出てきました。

engChrName: We should get together for some drinks when both of us have some time to breathe. I want to talk shop about movies some more with you.
engSearchText:
We should get together for some drinks when both of
us have some time to breathe. I want to talk shop
about movies some more with you.
jpnChrName: はいっ！　本当にありがとうございますっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！　本当にありがとうございますっ！

engChrName: Van's conversation in the theater continued for a brief period.
engSearchText:
Van's conversation in the theater continued for a
brief period.
jpnChrName: ディルク記念公園で見た像の通りの── いえ、それ以上の凛々しさでした。
jpnSearchText:
ディルク記念公園で見た像の通りの──
いえ、それ以上の凛々しさでした。

engChrName: Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of his evening.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in
the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of
his evening.
jpnChrName: シーナと仲間たちの絆には、ここが熱くなりましたし。
jpnSearchText: シーナと仲間たちの絆には、ここが熱くなりましたし。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Sober Curious.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Sober Curious.
jpnChrName: ……その、人物の名前は覚えきれなかったですけど。
jpnSearchText: ……その、人物の名前は覚えきれなかったですけど。

engChrName: Nina's acting in that movie was...incredible.
engSearchText: Nina's acting in that movie was...incredible.
jpnChrName: たしかに登場人物は多かったな。
jpnSearchText: たしかに登場人物は多かったな。

engChrName: She looked so dignified and certain about herself. You could see the determination in her eyes—like she really was prepared to die.
engSearchText:
She looked so dignified and certain about herself.
You could see the determination in her eyes—like she
really was prepared to die.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと知りたいなら 日曜学校で聞いてみたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと知りたいなら
日曜学校で聞いてみたらどうだ？

engChrName: It was impressive stuff, yeah. The scene where they all finally rise up was absolutely gripping.
engSearchText:
It was impressive stuff, yeah. The scene where they all
finally rise up was absolutely gripping.
jpnChrName: 知ってる範囲で俺も教えられるが、 正しく学んだ方が良いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
知ってる範囲で俺も教えられるが、
正しく学んだ方が良いだろう。

engChrName: Now I really wish Nina was here so I could tell her just how amazing she was!
engSearchText:
Now I really wish Nina was here so I could tell her
just how amazing she was!
jpnChrName: あっ、そうですね！ 今度、先生に聞いてみます。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そうですね！
今度、先生に聞いてみます。

engChrName: Every movie she's in feels so different from everything else she's done. I almost can't wait to see what she'll do next!
engSearchText:
Every movie she's in feels so different from everything
else she's done. I almost can't wait to see what she'll
do next!
jpnChrName: ……ありがとうございます、ヴァンさん。 ちょっぴり元気が出ました。
jpnSearchText:
……ありがとうございます、ヴァンさん。
ちょっぴり元気が出ました。

engChrName: Well, I'm glad you enjoyed it. Sounds like I made the right call bringin' you along.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm glad you enjoyed it. Sounds like I made the
right call bringin' you along.
jpnChrName: さすがは実力派女優ニナ・フェンリィってか。
jpnSearchText: さすがは実力派女優ニナ・フェンリィってか。

engChrName: ...Yes, you most certainly did. Thank you, Van.
engSearchText: ...Yes, you most certainly did. Thank you, Van.
jpnChrName: 白人貴族であるシーナ・ディルクが 違和感なく様になってやがった。
jpnSearchText:
白人貴族であるシーナ・ディルクが
違和感なく様になってやがった。

engChrName: It made me feel a little better. With everything that's going on, I definitely needed it.
engSearchText:
It made me feel a little better. With everything that's
going on, I definitely needed it.
jpnChrName: ああ、人種の差を感じなかったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、人種の差を感じなかったな。

engChrName: Absolutely! Thank you, Van!
engSearchText: Absolutely! Thank you, Van!
jpnChrName: 制作側だけじゃなく本人にとっても 相当な意欲作だったろうが。
jpnSearchText:
制作側だけじゃなく本人にとっても
相当な意欲作だったろうが。

engChrName: Sheena Dirke was just as impressive in that movie as that statue in the memorial park. Actually, no, she was even MORE impressive!
engSearchText:
Sheena Dirke was just as impressive in that movie as
that statue in the memorial park. Actually, no, she
was even MORE impressive!
jpnChrName: ま、人種のカテゴライズなんざ そもそもしょうもねぇ話だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、人種のカテゴライズなんざ
そもそもしょうもねぇ話だ。

engChrName: I couldn't help but get fired up seeing how close she and her friends were. Although, uh...
engSearchText:
I couldn't help but get fired up seeing how close she
and her friends were. Although, uh...
jpnChrName: オレもいずれ、色気ムンムンの 西方美女を演じても面白ぇかもな。
jpnSearchText:
オレもいずれ、色気ムンムンの
西方美女を演じても面白ぇかもな。

engChrName: ...I kinda forgot what their names were.
engSearchText: ...I kinda forgot what their names were.
jpnChrName: 一定の需要はありそうだな……なんとなく。
jpnSearchText: 一定の需要はありそうだな……なんとなく。

engChrName: That's okay. There were a lot of people to keep track of in that movie.
engSearchText:
That's okay. There were a lot of people to keep track
of in that movie.
jpnChrName: 革命を成し遂げた娘の物語…… とても面白かったです。
jpnSearchText:
革命を成し遂げた娘の物語……
とても面白かったです。

engChrName: If you wanna learn more about them, you could always ask them to teach you during Sunday School, y'know.
engSearchText:
If you wanna learn more about them, you could
always ask them to teach you during Sunday
School, y'know.
jpnChrName: シーナは今のわたくしと同じ歳の頃に あのような戦いに身を投じていたのですね。
jpnSearchText:
シーナは今のわたくしと同じ歳の頃に
あのような戦いに身を投じていたのですね。

engChrName: Not that I mind telling you what I know, either. But it's probably one of those things you're better off learning properly.
engSearchText:
Not that I mind telling you what I know, either.
But it's probably one of those things you're better off
learning properly.
jpnChrName: そういうことになるな。
jpnSearchText: そういうことになるな。

engChrName: That's true! Yeah, I'll ask my teacher next time I see her! Good idea!
engSearchText:
That's true! Yeah, I'll ask my teacher next time I
see her! Good idea!
jpnChrName: 最低限の平和を享受できる時代に生まれてこれて、 ありがたい話だ。
jpnSearchText:
最低限の平和を享受できる時代に生まれてこれて、
ありがたい話だ。

engChrName: ...Anyway, thanks for doing this Van. I feel a little better after watching that.
engSearchText:
...Anyway, thanks for doing this Van. I feel a little
better after watching that.
jpnChrName: ええ……いつ、どのような時代に生を受けるか すべては女神の采配次第ですが──
jpnSearchText:
ええ……いつ、どのような時代に生を受けるか
すべては女神の采配次第ですが──

engChrName: That Nina chick knocked it out of the park.
engSearchText: That Nina chick knocked it out of the park.
jpnChrName: こうして与えられた命を、 全うして生きていきたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
こうして与えられた命を、
全うして生きていきたいものです。

engChrName: She was a total natural playing a white aristocrat like Sheena Dirke. Big surprise there, though.
engSearchText:
She was a total natural playing a white aristocrat like
Sheena Dirke. Big surprise there, though.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、そうだな。

engChrName: I get the feeling it was a movie she herself wanted to make just as much as the people directing and producing it.
engSearchText:
I get the feeling it was a movie she herself wanted to
make just as much as the people directing and
producing it.
jpnChrName: 共和国の歴史は、博士から教えてもらってたけど──
jpnSearchText: 共和国の歴史は、博士から教えてもらってたけど──

engChrName: Just goes to show that with enough determination and acting chops, anybody can make a role work.
engSearchText:
Just goes to show that with enough determination
and acting chops, anybody can make a role work.
jpnChrName: 物語としても見応えがあるよね。 救国の英雄譚って感じで。
jpnSearchText:
物語としても見応えがあるよね。
救国の英雄譚って感じで。

engChrName: Yeah. There's no getting around the whole racial conversation. All she could do is play it to the best of her ability and she sure as hell did.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There's no getting around the whole
racial conversation. All she could do is play it to the
best of her ability and she sure as hell did.
jpnChrName: ま、多少なりとも エンタメとして誇張されてるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、多少なりとも
エンタメとして誇張されてるだろうが。

engChrName: Gives me something to think about as an actor. Maybe I'll try my hand playing a foxy western lady one of these days. Could be fun.
engSearchText:
Gives me something to think about as an actor.
Maybe I'll try my hand playing a foxy western lady
one of these days. Could be fun.
jpnChrName: 歴史の勉強のとっかかりにはなるな。
jpnSearchText: 歴史の勉強のとっかかりにはなるな。

engChrName: I guess I could see there being a certain amount of demand for somethin' like that, sure. Couldn't tell you why, but yeah.
engSearchText:
I guess I could see there being a certain amount of
demand for somethin' like that, sure. Couldn't tell
you why, but yeah.
jpnChrName: うん、こういう学びがある映画も良いね。
jpnSearchText: うん、こういう学びがある映画も良いね。

engChrName: That was a very excellent and entertaining retelling of Sheena Dirke and how she brought about the revolution.
engSearchText:
That was a very excellent and entertaining retelling of
Sheena Dirke and how she brought about
the revolution.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、誘ってくれて。 良い気分転換になったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、誘ってくれて。
良い気分転換になったよ。

engChrName: It's difficult to fathom that she was exactly my age when she thrust herself into such a historic battle.
engSearchText:
It's difficult to fathom that she was exactly my age
when she thrust herself into such a historic battle.
jpnChrName: 泣いた……自分で引くくらい泣いたわ……
jpnSearchText: 泣いた……自分で引くくらい泣いたわ……

engChrName: I guess she would've been now that you mention it, huh?
engSearchText:
I guess she would've been now that you mention
it, huh?
jpnChrName: 死の恐怖に不安げな シーナのただの少女としての表情と──
jpnSearchText:
死の恐怖に不安げな
シーナのただの少女としての表情と──

engChrName: She made a hell of a sacrifice in her lifetime so we could enjoy some amount of peace in our time today. We owe her more than we'll ever know.
engSearchText:
She made a hell of a sacrifice in her lifetime so we
could enjoy some amount of peace in our time today.
We owe her more than we'll ever know.
jpnChrName: いつだって前向きに、希望を捨てない リーダーとしての表情の対比がね……
jpnSearchText:
いつだって前向きに、希望を捨てない
リーダーとしての表情の対比がね……

engChrName: Indeed. They say it's the Goddess' will when in history we are all meant to be given life and fulfill our purpose.
engSearchText:
Indeed. They say it's the Goddess' will when in
history we are all meant to be given life and fulfill
our purpose.
jpnChrName: ……ハンカチいるか？
jpnSearchText: ……ハンカチいるか？

engChrName: If that's the case, then I, for one, hope to make the most of the time I'm given and live my life to the fullest, just like Sheena Dirke did.
engSearchText:
If that's the case, then I, for one, hope to make the
most of the time I'm given and live my life to the
fullest, just like Sheena Dirke did.
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫、後で化粧直しする。
jpnSearchText: ……大丈夫、後で化粧直しする。

engChrName: ...Yeah. Agreed.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. Agreed.
jpnChrName: ……はぁ、ちょっとスッキリしたかも。 最近色々あったし、考えることもあるし。
jpnSearchText:
……はぁ、ちょっとスッキリしたかも。
最近色々あったし、考えることもあるし。

engChrName: The professor is the one who taught me what I know about the Republic's history.
engSearchText:
The professor is the one who taught me what I know
about the Republic's history.
jpnChrName: 一応、お礼を言っとくわ。
jpnSearchText: 一応、お礼を言っとくわ。

engChrName: But even on its own, it's simply a good movie worth watching. A nice celebration of the savior of the country.
engSearchText:
But even on its own, it's simply a good movie
worth watching. A nice celebration of the savior of
the country.
jpnChrName: どういたしましてだ。
jpnSearchText: どういたしましてだ。

engChrName: Yeah. I could see how it would inspire someone to want to learn more.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I could see how it would inspire someone to
want to learn more.
jpnChrName: ふむ、タイトルの『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』── “栄光”という意の通り。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、タイトルの『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』──
“栄光”という意の通り。

engChrName: Definitely have to assume some of it was embellished at least a little for entertainment's sake, though.
engSearchText:
Definitely have to assume some of it was embellished
at least a little for entertainment's sake, though.
jpnChrName: 過酷な題材を、あくまで前向きな出来事として まとめていたのが印象的であったな。
jpnSearchText:
過酷な題材を、あくまで前向きな出来事として
まとめていたのが印象的であったな。

engChrName: Yeah. But still, I like movies like this that have something educational to offer.
engSearchText:
Yeah. But still, I like movies like this that have
something educational to offer.
jpnChrName: 革命を前向きに描くことは、 今の共和国を良く見せることにも繋がる……
jpnSearchText:
革命を前向きに描くことは、
今の共和国を良く見せることにも繋がる……

engChrName: Thanks for taking me to see it, Van. That helped me brighten up my mood.
engSearchText:
Thanks for taking me to see it, Van. That helped me
brighten up my mood.
jpnChrName: 愛国心やナショナリズムを自然に形成してる、 って側面もあるのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
愛国心やナショナリズムを自然に形成してる、
って側面もあるのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I cried so much watching that. I'm surprised how much that movie really got to me...
engSearchText:
I cried so much watching that. I'm surprised how
much that movie really got to me...
jpnChrName: ほう、なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ほう、なるほどな。

engChrName: The contrast in how Sheena Dirke looks is so striking. On the one hand, you have a positive revolutionary leader who never gives up hope...
engSearchText:
The contrast in how Sheena Dirke looks is
so striking. On the one hand, you have a positive
revolutionary leader who never gives up hope...
jpnChrName: だがおぬし、かように小難しいことを考えて…… 楽しめておるのか？
jpnSearchText:
だがおぬし、かように小難しいことを考えて……
楽しめておるのか？

engChrName: ...and on the other hand, you have an ordinary young woman who's understandably scared and anxious about dying.
engSearchText:
...and on the other hand, you have an ordinary young
woman who's understandably scared and anxious
about dying.
jpnChrName: ち、ちゃんと楽しんでますって。
jpnSearchText: ち、ちゃんと楽しんでますって。

engChrName: Do you...need a handkerchief?
engSearchText: Do you...need a handkerchief?
jpnChrName: 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ（グロリア）～運命の五月革命～』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ（グロリア）～運命の五月革命～』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: I'll be okay. I'll have to touch up my makeup after this, though.
engSearchText:
I'll be okay. I'll have to touch up my makeup after
this, though.
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Phew... That was kind of cathartic. I've had a lot on my mind after everything that's happened. I needed something like this.
engSearchText:
Phew... That was kind of cathartic. I've had a lot on
my mind after everything that's happened. I needed
something like this.
jpnChrName: 親子って、難しいですよね。
jpnSearchText: 親子って、難しいですよね。

engChrName: So thanks, Van. I appreciate you doing this.
engSearchText: So thanks, Van. I appreciate you doing this.
jpnChrName: 血の繋がりがあるから許せたり、 逆に譲れないことが出てきたり。
jpnSearchText:
血の繋がりがあるから許せたり、
逆に譲れないことが出てきたり。

engChrName: No problem. That's what I'm here for.
engSearchText: No problem. That's what I'm here for.
jpnChrName: もどかしく生きてきたフィリップに すごく共感しちゃいました……
jpnSearchText:
もどかしく生きてきたフィリップに
すごく共感しちゃいました……

engChrName: That was certainly a movie that wore its title on its sleeve, glorifying Sheena Dirke the way that it did.
engSearchText:
That was certainly a movie that wore its title on its
sleeve, glorifying Sheena Dirke the way that it did.
jpnChrName: まぁ、なんだ。 説教垂れる気はさらさら無いが──
jpnSearchText:
まぁ、なんだ。
説教垂れる気はさらさら無いが──

engChrName: What stood out to me about it is how it was able to take such a stark period of history and portray it in such an optimistic manner.
engSearchText:
What stood out to me about it is how it was able to
take such a stark period of history and portray it in
such an optimistic manner.
jpnChrName: 言いたいことは、言えるうちに言っとけ。 と、俺は思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
言いたいことは、言えるうちに言っとけ。
と、俺は思うけどな。

engChrName: Some people might argue that depictin' the revolution that way is meant to make today's Republic look good.
engSearchText:
Some people might argue that depictin' the
revolution that way is meant to make today's Republic
look good.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……そうですね。 それができるうちに。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……そうですね。
それができるうちに。

engChrName: Could just be the natural result of the patriotism and nationalism found in the people making it, too, though.
engSearchText:
Could just be the natural result of the patriotism and
nationalism found in the people making it,
too, though.
jpnChrName: オラシオンへ行く前みたいに またお父さんとちゃんと話してみます。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンへ行く前みたいに
またお父さんとちゃんと話してみます。

engChrName: Intriguing. I hadn't thought of it like that.
engSearchText: Intriguing. I hadn't thought of it like that.
jpnChrName: 難儀な父、ですから。
jpnSearchText: 難儀な父、ですから。

engChrName: There were some profound topics to consider with this one, Van. Were you still able to enjoy it despite that?
engSearchText:
There were some profound topics to consider with
this one, Van. Were you still able to enjoy it
despite that?
jpnChrName: 偉大な父（アブ）を持つことは 嬉しいだけじゃないんですね……
jpnSearchText:
偉大な父（アブ）を持つことは
嬉しいだけじゃないんですね……

engChrName: I did, Master! Swear! You don't...have to look at me like that.
engSearchText:
I did, Master! Swear! You don't...have to look at me
like that.
jpnChrName: フィリップにとってそうじゃなかったのが ちょっと悲しいです……
jpnSearchText:
フィリップにとってそうじゃなかったのが
ちょっと悲しいです……

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Gloria: Dawn of the Revolution.
engSearchText:
Obtained brochure for Gloria: Dawn of
the Revolution.
jpnChrName: たしかに、お前さんとこの親子と比べるとな。
jpnSearchText: たしかに、お前さんとこの親子と比べるとな。

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: お前さんにプレッシャーは無いのか？ どうしても大人から期待される立場だろう？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんにプレッシャーは無いのか？
どうしても大人から期待される立場だろう？

engChrName: Family relationships can be such tricky things to deal with.
engSearchText:
Family relationships can be such tricky things to
deal with.
jpnChrName: うーん……特に無いような。
jpnSearchText: うーん……特に無いような。

engChrName: There are some things you can forgive because you're related, but there're other things that are hard to compromise for that same reason.
engSearchText:
There are some things you can forgive because you're
related, but there're other things that are hard to
compromise for that same reason.
jpnChrName: 父は目標であり道しるべ。 わたしは父のようになりたいので。
jpnSearchText:
父は目標であり道しるべ。
わたしは父のようになりたいので。

engChrName: I can really relate to Phillip's frustration in the movie...
engSearchText:
I can really relate to Phillip's frustration in
the movie...
jpnChrName: なるほど、お前さんのそういうひたむきさが フィリップにあれば──
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、お前さんのそういうひたむきさが
フィリップにあれば──

engChrName: How should I put it? I'm the last person in Zemuria who wants to come off as preachy, but...
engSearchText:
How should I put it? I'm the last person in Zemuria
who wants to come off as preachy, but...
jpnChrName: また違った運命だったのかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText: また違った運命だったのかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: When you have something to say to someone, you should say it while you still can. That's my motto.
engSearchText:
When you have something to say to someone, you
should say it while you still can. That's my motto.
jpnChrName: 無駄に馴れ合う仲良しこよしの親子が 正解とは思わねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
無駄に馴れ合う仲良しこよしの親子が
正解とは思わねぇが。

engChrName: ...You're right, Van. I should talk to my dad while I still have the time.
engSearchText:
...You're right, Van. I should talk to my dad while I
still have the time.
jpnChrName: 父親と息子の距離感ってのは オフクロとは違うモンなんだな。
jpnSearchText:
父親と息子の距離感ってのは
オフクロとは違うモンなんだな。

engChrName: I think I'll try reaching out to him before we visit Oración.
engSearchText:
I think I'll try reaching out to him before we
visit Oración.
jpnChrName: そういや、お前の親父さんは……
jpnSearchText: そういや、お前の親父さんは……

engChrName: He's...not the easiest person to talk to, but it's the right thing to do.
engSearchText:
He's...not the easiest person to talk to, but it's the
right thing to do.
jpnChrName: 親父の顔は知らねぇ。 ギエン爺さんは祖父代わりだし。
jpnSearchText:
親父の顔は知らねぇ。
ギエン爺さんは祖父代わりだし。

engChrName: I felt kinda sad watching that movie, to be honest.
engSearchText: I felt kinda sad watching that movie, to be honest.
jpnChrName: だからなんつーか…… 父親ってモンに興味はあるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
だからなんつーか……
父親ってモンに興味はあるかもな。

engChrName: I guess having such an amazing dad isn't always so easy...
engSearchText:
I guess having such an amazing dad isn't always
so easy...
jpnChrName: へぇ……お前もそんなこと考えるんだな。
jpnSearchText: へぇ……お前もそんなこと考えるんだな。

engChrName: It definitely didn't look like how things are between you and your dad, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
It definitely didn't look like how things are between
you and your dad, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: なんだその、うぜぇ顔は。
jpnSearchText: なんだその、うぜぇ顔は。

engChrName: You don't feel any kind of pressure, even a little? I'm sure the adults among the warriors must have high expectations for you.
engSearchText:
You don't feel any kind of pressure, even a little?
I'm sure the adults among the warriors must have
high expectations for you.
jpnChrName: ふう、心地良い緊張感がまだ残っています。
jpnSearchText: ふう、心地良い緊張感がまだ残っています。

engChrName: Hmm... I dunno. I don't really think there is.
engSearchText: Hmm... I dunno. I don't really think there is.
jpnChrName: レースシーンは見応えがあって、 思わず拳を握ってしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
レースシーンは見応えがあって、
思わず拳を握ってしまいました。

engChrName: My dad is like my guidepost. He teaches me so much! I want to be someone like him when I grow up.
engSearchText:
My dad is like my guidepost. He teaches me so much!
I want to be someone like him when I grow up.
jpnChrName: ヒューマンドラマが主軸だが、 レース演出も力が入ってたな。
jpnSearchText:
ヒューマンドラマが主軸だが、
レース演出も力が入ってたな。

engChrName: Got'cha. Knowing what I do about the two of you, I can see how you'd feel that way.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Knowing what I do about the two of you, I
can see how you'd feel that way.
jpnChrName: さすがプロのドライビングテク…… 同乗して味わってみたいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さすがプロのドライビングテク……
同乗して味わってみたいぜ。

engChrName: Maybe if Phillip was more dedicated like you are, things would've turned out a lot differently for him in that movie.
engSearchText:
Maybe if Phillip was more dedicated like you are,
things would've turned out a lot differently for him in
that movie.
jpnChrName: わたくしは、安全で快適な運転を ご提供するのが基本方針ですが──
jpnSearchText:
わたくしは、安全で快適な運転を
ご提供するのが基本方針ですが──

engChrName: Sons definitely tend to have a different kinda relationship with their dads compared to their moms.
engSearchText:
Sons definitely tend to have a different kinda
relationship with their dads compared to their moms.
jpnChrName: いくらか“本気”を出してよろしければ、あるいは……
jpnSearchText: いくらか“本気”を出してよろしければ、あるいは……

engChrName: And they really shouldn't try to force themselves to be all buddy-buddy if it doesn't come to them naturally, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
And they really shouldn't try to force themselves to be
all buddy-buddy if it doesn't come to them naturally,
if you ask me.
jpnChrName: 正直興味はそそられるが……安全運転で頼む。
jpnSearchText: 正直興味はそそられるが……安全運転で頼む。

engChrName: You know, speaking of dads, I don't know if I've ever heard much about yours.
engSearchText:
You know, speaking of dads, I don't know if I've ever
heard much about yours.
jpnChrName: ふふ、承知いたしました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、承知いたしました。

engChrName: That's 'cause I never knew the guy. And Gien was much more of a grandfather to me.
engSearchText:
That's 'cause I never knew the guy. And Gien was
much more of a grandfather to me.
jpnChrName: ……お気遣いをありがとうございます、ヴァン様。
jpnSearchText: ……お気遣いをありがとうございます、ヴァン様。

engChrName: Just goes to show that you don't need a dad in your life to make life work, I guess.
engSearchText:
Just goes to show that you don't need a dad in your
life to make life work, I guess.
jpnChrName: 心のつかえが少し、取れた気がいたします。
jpnSearchText: 心のつかえが少し、取れた気がいたします。

engChrName: Huh. Kind of a deep thought for you. I guess you do have a brain somewhere in that head of yours.
engSearchText:
Huh. Kind of a deep thought for you. I guess you do
have a brain somewhere in that head of yours.
jpnChrName: ……車を好きになる気持ちが、ちょっと分かったかも。
jpnSearchText: ……車を好きになる気持ちが、ちょっと分かったかも。

engChrName: Oh, shut up!
engSearchText: Oh, shut up!
jpnChrName: 大事にしてる相棒（マシン）で あんなに自由自在に運転できたら──
jpnSearchText:
大事にしてる相棒（マシン）で
あんなに自由自在に運転できたら──

engChrName: *sigh* I still feel slightly on edge after watching that film, albeit in a good way.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I still feel slightly on edge after watching that
film, albeit in a good way.
jpnChrName: 楽しいだろうし、かっこいいよね。
jpnSearchText: 楽しいだろうし、かっこいいよね。

engChrName: The races were so engrossing. I could feel my hands tensing up before I even knew it.
engSearchText:
The races were so engrossing. I could feel my hands
tensing up before I even knew it.
jpnChrName: お、お前……！　そのロマンに気づいたか！
jpnSearchText: お、お前……！　そのロマンに気づいたか！

engChrName: For a movie that puts the human drama front and center, they still put a lot of effort into the racing.
engSearchText:
For a movie that puts the human drama front and
center, they still put a lot of effort into the racing.
jpnChrName: 別に意図は無かったんだが、 いやぁ誘った甲斐があったモンだ！
jpnSearchText:
別に意図は無かったんだが、
いやぁ誘った甲斐があったモンだ！

engChrName: I'd love to hop in the passenger seat with a pro driver like that sometime and feel what it's like to whip a car around like that. Gotta be wild.
engSearchText:
I'd love to hop in the passenger seat with a pro driver
like that sometime and feel what it's like to whip a car
around like that. Gotta be wild.
jpnChrName: ちょ、テンション抑えて。 ロマン……かはともかく。
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、テンション抑えて。
ロマン……かはともかく。

engChrName: I will say, ordinarily, I strive to provide a safe, comfortable riding experience for my clients while driving.
engSearchText:
I will say, ordinarily, I strive to provide a safe,
comfortable riding experience for my clients
while driving.
jpnChrName: 免許は、いずれ取ってみたいかも。
jpnSearchText: 免許は、いずれ取ってみたいかも。

engChrName: However, if you wish for me to make an exception, I can certainly show you what I'm truly capable of.
engSearchText:
However, if you wish for me to make an exception, I
can certainly show you what I'm truly capable of.
jpnChrName: うんうん、良いぞ。 なんなら基礎は俺が──
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、良いぞ。
なんなら基礎は俺が──

engChrName: ...I'm gonna be real with you, Risette. I'm more than a little tempted to take you up on it. But let's not get up to any trouble, all right?
engSearchText:
...I'm gonna be real with you, Risette. I'm more than
a little tempted to take you up on it. But let's not get
up to any trouble, all right?
jpnChrName: ちょっとちょっと、 そんなすぐの話じゃないからね？
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとちょっと、
そんなすぐの話じゃないからね？

engChrName: Heehee. As you wish.
engSearchText: Heehee. As you wish.
jpnChrName: ……って、ふざけた感じになっちゃったけど。
jpnSearchText: ……って、ふざけた感じになっちゃったけど。

engChrName: I appreciate your consideration, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: I appreciate your consideration, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ……誘ってくれてありがとう。 ちょっと気分転換できたかな。
jpnSearchText:
……誘ってくれてありがとう。
ちょっと気分転換できたかな。

engChrName: I was apprehensive about your response, but now I feel relieved.
engSearchText:
I was apprehensive about your response, but now I
feel relieved.
jpnChrName: 気持ちがすれ違う親子の確執と和解──
jpnSearchText: 気持ちがすれ違う親子の確執と和解──

engChrName: I think I'm beginning to understand what you like about cars so much.
engSearchText:
I think I'm beginning to understand what you like
about cars so much.
jpnChrName: 共感しやすいテーマと、Ｚ１という個性の相性が 上手くマッチしてたわね。
jpnSearchText:
共感しやすいテーマと、Ｚ１という個性の相性が
上手くマッチしてたわね。

engChrName: I can see how someone might get so attached to their vehicle when it provides so much freedom. It's like a partner in a lifelong adventure.
engSearchText:
I can see how someone might get so attached to their
vehicle when it provides so much freedom. It's like a
partner in a lifelong adventure.
jpnChrName: このシリーズは１作目もヒットしたしな。 あれの脚本と演出も良かったのを覚えてる。
jpnSearchText:
このシリーズは１作目もヒットしたしな。
あれの脚本と演出も良かったのを覚えてる。

engChrName: It must feel pretty fun and cool to be able to get to drive around like that, I must admit.
engSearchText:
It must feel pretty fun and cool to be able to get to
drive around like that, I must admit.
jpnChrName: そうね、今回の撮影でも俳優陣は 実際に猛スピードのマシンに乗ったらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、今回の撮影でも俳優陣は
実際に猛スピードのマシンに乗ったらしいわ。

engChrName: Quatre, have you...have you seen the light?! Have you fallen in love with cars 'cause of that movie?
engSearchText:
Quatre, have you...have you seen the light?! Have you
fallen in love with cars 'cause of that movie?
jpnChrName: そういう体験を通して、 生の演技がしやすいのはありがたい環境ね。
jpnSearchText:
そういう体験を通して、
生の演技がしやすいのはありがたい環境ね。

engChrName: Finally, someone who gets me around here! I wasn't trying to convert you or anything, but man, am I glad I took you along now! Yes!
engSearchText:
Finally, someone who gets me around here! I wasn't
trying to convert you or anything, but man, am I glad
I took you along now! Yes!
jpnChrName: ……って、ナチュラルに映画トークしちゃったけど。
jpnSearchText: ……って、ナチュラルに映画トークしちゃったけど。

engChrName: V-Van, calm down! Let's not get ahead of ourselves here.
engSearchText:
V-Van, calm down! Let's not get ahead of
ourselves here.
jpnChrName: ちょうど良い気分転換になったわ。 ……ありがと。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど良い気分転換になったわ。
……ありがと。

engChrName: I don't know that I'd say I've fallen in love with them...but it's making me think about getting my license.
engSearchText:
I don't know that I'd say I've fallen in love with
them...but it's making me think about getting
my license.
jpnChrName: レースシーンの臨場感と迫力、見応えがあったな。
jpnSearchText: レースシーンの臨場感と迫力、見応えがあったな。

engChrName: That's great. Really great! If you want someone to teach you the basics, I'd be more than happy to—
engSearchText:
That's great. Really great! If you want someone to
teach you the basics, I'd be more than happy to—
jpnChrName: 事故の描写は、なかなか生々しかったが。
jpnSearchText: 事故の描写は、なかなか生々しかったが。

engChrName: I mean sometime in the FUTURE! I don't mean right this minute, okay?!
engSearchText:
I mean sometime in the FUTURE! I don't mean
right this minute, okay?!
jpnChrName: 実際のＺ１グランプリでも 事故はそこそこ起きてますからね。
jpnSearchText:
実際のＺ１グランプリでも
事故はそこそこ起きてますからね。

engChrName: ...Sorry. I don't mean to sound so flippant about it or anything.
engSearchText:
...Sorry. I don't mean to sound so flippant about it
or anything.
jpnChrName: 栄光と悲劇を併せ持つ華やかな世界…… だからこそ魅了されるんでしょうが。
jpnSearchText:
栄光と悲劇を併せ持つ華やかな世界……
だからこそ魅了されるんでしょうが。

engChrName: Thanks for inviting me, Van. I think I feel a little better after seeing that.
engSearchText:
Thanks for inviting me, Van. I think I feel a little
better after seeing that.
jpnChrName: ふむ、俄然Ｚ１に興味が出てきたな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、俄然Ｚ１に興味が出てきたな。

engChrName: That was a well-made movie. On the one hand, you've got that family drama of a dad and his son who can't see eye to eye, which is relatable.
engSearchText:
That was a well-made movie. On the one hand,
you've got that family drama of a dad and his son who
can't see eye to eye, which is relatable.
jpnChrName: シーズンが始まったら、サーキットに出向いてみるか。
jpnSearchText: シーズンが始まったら、サーキットに出向いてみるか。

engChrName: And then on the other hand, you've got the Z1, which brings something unique to the table. Those two things go really well together.
engSearchText:
And then on the other hand, you've got the Z1,
which brings something unique to the table.
Those two things go really well together.
jpnChrName: ハハ、師父の趣味がまた１つ増えそうだ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、師父の趣味がまた１つ増えそうだ。

engChrName: The first movie was such a hit, too. I remember the script and direction both being solid stuff.
engSearchText:
The first movie was such a hit, too. I remember the
script and direction both being solid stuff.
jpnChrName: 『パーフェクト・ドライバー２』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『パーフェクト・ドライバー２』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Totally. Apparently the actors got to drive around inside real high-speed cars while shooting again.
engSearchText:
Totally. Apparently the actors got to drive around
inside real high-speed cars while shooting again.
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: That sort of working environment is always a good recipe for getting raw, natural acting out of talent. You love to see it.
engSearchText:
That sort of working environment is always a good
recipe for getting raw, natural acting out of talent.
You love to see it.
jpnChrName: はぁ……別れ際のミアの表情、 なんとも言えませんね……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……別れ際のミアの表情、
なんとも言えませんね……

engChrName: Ack! You're making me go into actress mode with this conversation. Got to remember I'm not on the clock.
engSearchText:
Ack! You're making me go into actress mode with
this conversation. Got to remember I'm not on
the clock.
jpnChrName: ウィルには、もっと強く引き留めてほしかったです。
jpnSearchText: ウィルには、もっと強く引き留めてほしかったです。

engChrName: Anyway...thanks, Van. This is exactly what the doctor ordered. I feel much better now.
engSearchText:
Anyway...thanks, Van. This is exactly what the
doctor ordered. I feel much better now.
jpnChrName: まぁウィル的には ミアが望むことを尊重したんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まぁウィル的には
ミアが望むことを尊重したんだろう。

engChrName: Those race scenes were an immersive sight, I'll give the movie that.
engSearchText:
Those race scenes were an immersive sight, I'll give
the movie that.
jpnChrName: 彼女が大事だからこそ。
jpnSearchText: 彼女が大事だからこそ。

engChrName: The accident was perhaps a bit too graphic for my tastes, however.
engSearchText:
The accident was perhaps a bit too graphic for my
tastes, however.
jpnChrName: うーん、余計に歯がゆいですね……
jpnSearchText: うーん、余計に歯がゆいですね……

engChrName: Maybe, but I'd argue it was realistic call. That sort of thing happens a fair amount in the Z1 Grand Prix.
engSearchText:
Maybe, but I'd argue it was realistic call. That sort of
thing happens a fair amount in the Z1 Grand Prix.
jpnChrName: ミアにはまだ、溢れ出してしまう想いがあったのに。
jpnSearchText: ミアにはまだ、溢れ出してしまう想いがあったのに。

engChrName: I think that's what draws people to it—it's a glitzy world that's got as much drama and tragedy as it does glory.
engSearchText:
I think that's what draws people to it—it's a glitzy
world that's got as much drama and tragedy as it
does glory.
jpnChrName: 自分の気持ちに、嘘はつけませんよね……
jpnSearchText: <S3>自分の気持ちに、嘘はつけませんよね……

engChrName: So it seems. I admit to being more interested in it now, that much is true.
engSearchText:
So it seems. I admit to being more interested in it
now, that much is true.
jpnChrName: ん？　悪い、よく聞こえなかった。
jpnSearchText: ん？　悪い、よく聞こえなかった。

engChrName: I just might have to come down and watch one of the races once the new season starts.
engSearchText:
I just might have to come down and watch one of the
races once the new season starts.
jpnChrName: い、いえ、なんでもないです。
jpnSearchText: い、いえ、なんでもないです。

engChrName: Haha. You can never have too many hobbies, can you, Master?
engSearchText:
Haha. You can never have too many hobbies, can
you, Master?
jpnChrName: 映画、すごく楽しかったです。 お誘いありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
映画、すごく楽しかったです。
お誘いありがとうございます。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Perfect Driver 2.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Perfect Driver 2.
jpnChrName: 物語は、よく分かりました。
jpnSearchText: 物語は、よく分かりました。

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: でも、どうして２人は別れなきゃいけないんでしょう。
jpnSearchText: でも、どうして２人は別れなきゃいけないんでしょう。

engChrName: *sigh* I can't even describe how I feel after seeing Mia's face when they go their separate ways.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't even describe how I feel after seeing
Mia's face when they go their separate ways.
jpnChrName: “コイビト”のまま離れた場所にいるのは ダメなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
“コイビト”のまま離れた場所にいるのは
ダメなんですか？

engChrName: I really wanted Will to do more to hold on to her.
engSearchText: I really wanted Will to do more to hold on to her.
jpnChrName: そうだなぁ、ダメってことは無いが。
jpnSearchText: そうだなぁ、ダメってことは無いが。

engChrName: I can get that. But Will was probably trying to respect Mia's wishes.
engSearchText:
I can get that. But Will was probably trying to respect
Mia's wishes.
jpnChrName: ミアの覚悟と決意を聞いて ウィルは受け止めるしかなかったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ミアの覚悟と決意を聞いて
ウィルは受け止めるしかなかったんだろう。

engChrName: He let her go precisely because he loved her so much.
engSearchText: He let her go precisely because he loved her so much.
jpnChrName: 大人って、難しいですね……
jpnSearchText: 大人って、難しいですね……

engChrName: Hmm... It's still frustrating, though.
engSearchText: Hmm... It's still frustrating, though.
jpnChrName: 大切な人と一緒にいたいって、 みんなそう思うものだと。
jpnSearchText:
大切な人と一緒にいたいって、
みんなそう思うものだと。

engChrName: It's clear Will still had a lot of feelings for her in the end.
engSearchText:
It's clear Will still had a lot of feelings for her in
the end.
jpnChrName: ハハ、お前さんらしいな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、お前さんらしいな。

engChrName: Besides, deep down, you can't ever lie about how you feel...
engSearchText:
Besides, deep down, you can't ever lie about how
you feel...
jpnChrName: その気持ちは、大人になっても大事にするといい。
jpnSearchText: その気持ちは、大人になっても大事にするといい。

engChrName: What was that? I didn't catch what you said.
engSearchText: What was that? I didn't catch what you said.
jpnChrName: ？　分かりましたっ。
jpnSearchText: ？　分かりましたっ。

engChrName: Oh, nothing! I was just thinking to myself.
engSearchText: Oh, nothing! I was just thinking to myself.
jpnChrName: あーあ、まったく共感できねぇまま終わっちまった。
jpnSearchText: あーあ、まったく共感できねぇまま終わっちまった。

engChrName: Thanks for inviting me, Van. I wish it had a better ending, but I still really enjoyed the movie.
engSearchText:
Thanks for inviting me, Van. I wish it had a better
ending, but I still really enjoyed the movie.
jpnChrName: ああいう時は本能に任せて、 さくっと女を抱き寄せればいいだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああいう時は本能に任せて、
さくっと女を抱き寄せればいいだろうよ。

engChrName: I get what happened in the movie. It's pretty easy to understand.
engSearchText:
I get what happened in the movie. It's pretty easy
to understand.
jpnChrName: お前ならそうだろうが……
jpnSearchText: お前ならそうだろうが……

engChrName: Except for one thing: why did those two have to break up?
engSearchText:
Except for one thing: why did those two have to
break up?
jpnChrName: ウィルにはできなかったんだろ。 抱きしめる理由が必要だった、とかな。
jpnSearchText:
ウィルにはできなかったんだろ。
抱きしめる理由が必要だった、とかな。

engChrName: Couldn't they be boyfriend and girlfriend even if they lived apart?
engSearchText:
Couldn't they be boyfriend and girlfriend even if they
lived apart?
jpnChrName: てめぇの心に理屈をつけて、身を引くのが美徳ってか？
jpnSearchText: てめぇの心に理屈をつけて、身を引くのが美徳ってか？

engChrName: If it was a different kinda relationship, I guess. There's nothing wrong with people who choose to do that.
engSearchText:
If it was a different kinda relationship, I guess.
There's nothing wrong with people who choose to
do that.
jpnChrName: そのレビュー元は実体験かよ？
jpnSearchText: そのレビュー元は実体験かよ？

engChrName: But I think once Will knew how determined Mia was, he felt like he had no choice but to accept her decision, even if it hurt.
engSearchText:
But I think once Will knew how determined Mia
was, he felt like he had no choice but to accept her
decision, even if it hurt.
jpnChrName: 違うわっ！
jpnSearchText: 違うわっ！

engChrName: Huh. Being an adult sounds so complicated...
engSearchText: Huh. Being an adult sounds so complicated...
jpnChrName: これは、男女どちらの視点で観るかで 感想が変わってきそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
これは、男女どちらの視点で観るかで
感想が変わってきそうですね。

engChrName: I thought people always wanted to stay with the ones that they love.
engSearchText:
I thought people always wanted to stay with the ones
that they love.
jpnChrName: お前さんは？　ミアの方か？
jpnSearchText: お前さんは？　ミアの方か？

engChrName: Haha. I like the way you think.
engSearchText: Haha. I like the way you think.
jpnChrName: ……と初めは思っていたのですが、 気づけばウィルの視点で観ていました。
jpnSearchText:
……と初めは思っていたのですが、
気づけばウィルの視点で観ていました。

engChrName: Be sure to hold on to that and don't throw it away once you grow up. You'll be glad you did.
engSearchText:
Be sure to hold on to that and don't throw it away
once you grow up. You'll be glad you did.
jpnChrName: 誰かを見送る、見守る立場に 共感しやすいと言いますか……
jpnSearchText:
誰かを見送る、見守る立場に
共感しやすいと言いますか……

engChrName: Huh? Uh, okay. If you say so, Van.
engSearchText: Huh? Uh, okay. If you say so, Van.
jpnChrName: わたくしの仕事の性質が 関係しているのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの仕事の性質が
関係しているのかもしれません。

engChrName: Man, I dunno what the hell that doofus was thinking. I couldn't relate to him at all.
engSearchText:
Man, I dunno what the hell that doofus was thinking.
I couldn't relate to him at all.
jpnChrName: たしかに、その時の気分や境遇によっても 感想は変わるものだしな。
jpnSearchText:
たしかに、その時の気分や境遇によっても
感想は変わるものだしな。

engChrName: If I were in his shoes, I would've let instinct take over and held on to my girl tight—literally.
engSearchText:
If I were in his shoes, I would've let instinct take over
and held on to my girl tight—literally.
jpnChrName: 一度観た映画を、あえて日を置いて観直すと 面白い発見があったりするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
一度観た映画を、あえて日を置いて観直すと
面白い発見があったりするぜ。

engChrName: Of course YOU would. You approach women guns blazing.
engSearchText:
Of course YOU would. You approach women
guns blazing.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そのような楽しみ方もあるのですね。 ふふ、勉強になります。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、そのような楽しみ方もあるのですね。
ふふ、勉強になります。

engChrName: But evidently, Will couldn't bring himself to do that. He probably would've needed a good reason to do that after everything she said.
engSearchText:
But evidently, Will couldn't bring himself to do that.
He probably would've needed a good reason to do
that after everything she said.
jpnChrName: 『雨と僕の物語』っていうタイトルの通り、 雨がキーワードになってたね。
jpnSearchText:
『雨と僕の物語』っていうタイトルの通り、
雨がキーワードになってたね。

engChrName: Sounds like you're just making excuses for someone who messed up. You telling me wussing out like that's supposed to be some kind of virtue?
engSearchText:
Sounds like you're just making excuses for someone
who messed up. You telling me wussing out like that's
supposed to be some kind of virtue?
jpnChrName: ２人が別れるシーンといい、 重要な場面では必ず雨が降ってたから。
jpnSearchText:
２人が別れるシーンといい、
重要な場面では必ず雨が降ってたから。

engChrName: What kind of hot bullshit is that? You still working through some breakup you went through in school or something when you were younger?
engSearchText:
What kind of hot bullshit is that? You still working
through some breakup you went through in school or
something when you were younger?
jpnChrName: ほう……
jpnSearchText: ほう……

engChrName: No, I'm not, thank you!
engSearchText: No, I'm not, thank you!
jpnChrName: ２人の心が動くシーンを印象づけるために そういう演出をしてるんじゃないかな。
