jpnSearchText:
２人の心が動くシーンを印象づけるために
そういう演出をしてるんじゃないかな。

engChrName: That was one of those films where you can come away with different things depending on which character's perspective you examine it through.
engSearchText:
That was one of those films where you can come
away with different things depending on which
character's perspective you examine it through.
jpnChrName: ハハ、何を考え込んでるのかと思えば、 さすがの分析力だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、何を考え込んでるのかと思えば、
さすがの分析力だな。

engChrName: True. Is it safe to say you sympathize more with Mia, then?
engSearchText:
True. Is it safe to say you sympathize more with
Mia, then?
jpnChrName: 恋愛映画はお前さんにはつまらないかと、 ちょいと気にしてたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
恋愛映画はお前さんにはつまらないかと、
ちょいと気にしてたんだが。

engChrName: Initially, I thought that was the case. But the more I watched it, the more I found I saw the story through his eyes.
engSearchText:
Initially, I thought that was the case. But the more I
watched it, the more I found I saw the story
through his eyes.
jpnChrName: 何その、妙な気遣いは…… 僕だってそれくらい楽しめるし。
jpnSearchText:
何その、妙な気遣いは……
僕だってそれくらい楽しめるし。

engChrName: It may very well have to do with the nature of my work.
engSearchText:
It may very well have to do with the nature of
my work.
jpnChrName: ま、良い時間を過ごせたよ。 誘ってくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、良い時間を過ごせたよ。
誘ってくれてありがとう。

engChrName: You could say I...understand what it's like very well to see other people off and watch over them as you remain in place.
engSearchText:
You could say I...understand what it's like very well to
see other people off and watch over them as you
remain in place.
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、快活なミアが見せる いじらしさが良かったな。
jpnSearchText:
……ふむ、快活なミアが見せる
いじらしさが良かったな。

engChrName: True. With movies, your feelings and circumstances at the time you watch them can really affect how you react to them.
engSearchText:
True. With movies, your feelings and circumstances
at the time you watch them can really affect how you
react to them.
jpnChrName: 強気な表情から一転、降り注ぐ雨の中で流す涙が──
jpnSearchText: 強気な表情から一転、降り注ぐ雨の中で流す涙が──

engChrName: Sometimes if you come back to a movie after a good while and watch it again, you discover some interesting new things you didn't see before.
engSearchText:
Sometimes if you come back to a movie after a good
while and watch it again, you discover some
interesting new things you didn't see before.
jpnChrName: （本人の前で）冷静に考察しないでよね！ さすがに恥ずかしいから！
jpnSearchText:
（本人の前で）冷静に考察しないでよね！
さすがに恥ずかしいから！

engChrName: I see. I hadn't considered that additional viewings could be rewarding in their own way. You gave me some food for thought, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I see. I hadn't considered that additional viewings
could be rewarding in their own way. You gave me
some food for thought, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ……まぁ、あたし的にも あのシーンの表情作りにはこだわったわ。
jpnSearchText:
……まぁ、あたし的にも
あのシーンの表情作りにはこだわったわ。

engChrName: As the title suggests, rain plays a key role in the movie.
engSearchText:
As the title suggests, rain plays a key role in
the movie.
jpnChrName: ウィルに気づいてもらえない、 ミアの苦しみや痛みが──
jpnSearchText:
ウィルに気づいてもらえない、
ミアの苦しみや痛みが──

engChrName: If you pay close attention, you'll notice it always rains during important scenes in general—not just when they break up in the end.
engSearchText:
If you pay close attention, you'll notice it always rains
during important scenes in general—not just when
they break up in the end.
jpnChrName: スクリーンを見守る観客の心には 棘のようにチクッと刺さるように、ってね。
jpnSearchText:
スクリーンを見守る観客の心には
棘のようにチクッと刺さるように、ってね。

engChrName: Interesting. I didn't even notice. Good eye, Quatre.
engSearchText: Interesting. I didn't even notice. Good eye, Quatre.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……
jpnSearchText: なるほどな……

engChrName: Thanks. If I had to guess, they probably did that so the emotional scenes make more of a lasting impression on viewers.
engSearchText:
Thanks. If I had to guess, they probably did that so
the emotional scenes make more of a lasting
impression on viewers.
jpnChrName: それをちゃんと表現できるのは 役者の技術があってこそだろう？
jpnSearchText:
それをちゃんと表現できるのは
役者の技術があってこそだろう？

engChrName: I was wonderin' what got you thinking so heavily. Guess you were just puttin' on your analytical hat for the movie like you always do, haha.
engSearchText:
I was wonderin' what got you thinking so heavily.
Guess you were just puttin' on your analytical hat for
the movie like you always do, haha.
jpnChrName: フフ、映画好きらしいアンタに褒められるのは 悪い気はしないわね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、映画好きらしいアンタに褒められるのは
悪い気はしないわね。

engChrName: To be honest, I wasn't sure if you'd like it. I figured a researcher like you might find romance plots to be tedious and pointless.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I wasn't sure if you'd like it. I figured a
researcher like you might find romance plots to be
tedious and pointless.
jpnChrName: 夢を追う若い男女の別離か──
jpnSearchText: 夢を追う若い男女の別離か──

engChrName: You shouldn't have worried. I might be a researcher at heart, but that doesn't mean I can't enjoy more romantic or emotional stories, too.
engSearchText:
You shouldn't have worried. I might be a researcher
at heart, but that doesn't mean I can't enjoy more
romantic or emotional stories, too.
jpnChrName: 感情の余韻に浸る“エモーショナル”な作品だったな。
jpnSearchText: 感情の余韻に浸る“エモーショナル”な作品だったな。

engChrName: So thanks for bringing me, Van. This was a really nice time we had.
engSearchText:
So thanks for bringing me, Van. This was a really
nice time we had.
jpnChrName: 自分１人では観ない類ゆえ、なかなか興味深かったぞ。
jpnSearchText: 自分１人では観ない類ゆえ、なかなか興味深かったぞ。

engChrName: Hmm... There's a certain sweetness to Mia's lighthearted disposition that I really enjoyed.
engSearchText:
Hmm... There's a certain sweetness to Mia's
lighthearted disposition that I really enjoyed.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そう言ってもらえて何よりですよ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そう言ってもらえて何よりですよ。

engChrName: And the way she went from lookin' so strong to those tears rolling down her face as it was raining, it was really—
engSearchText:
And the way she went from lookin' so strong to those
tears rolling down her face as it was raining, it was
really—
jpnChrName: ……思えば、師父自身の浮いた話って これまで聞いたこと無いような？
jpnSearchText:
……思えば、師父自身の浮いた話って
これまで聞いたこと無いような？

engChrName: Can you NOT critique the movie like you're some film reviewer when I'm right here? You're making me feel self-conscious!
engSearchText:
Can you NOT critique the movie like you're some
film reviewer when I'm right here? You're making me
feel self-conscious!
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、己の色恋を 弟子に語るものでもあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、己の色恋を
弟子に語るものでもあるまい。

engChrName: ...I guess I appreciate you noticing, though. I did put a lot of effort into putting on just the right expression for that scene.
engSearchText:
...I guess I appreciate you noticing, though. I did put
a lot of effort into putting on just the right expression
for that scene.
jpnChrName: まぁいずれ機会があろうものなら、 そんな昔話も一興かもしれぬな。
jpnSearchText:
まぁいずれ機会があろうものなら、
そんな昔話も一興かもしれぬな。

engChrName: There's a certain pain and suffering Mia feels in that scene that she can't let on to Will in that moment.
engSearchText:
There's a certain pain and suffering Mia feels in that
scene that she can't let on to Will in that moment.
jpnChrName: 『雨と僕の物語』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『雨と僕の物語』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: I wanted that to really sting for people in the audience who can't do anything but watch that sadness unfold.
engSearchText:
I wanted that to really sting for people in the
audience who can't do anything but watch that
sadness unfold.
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Ah, I can see that now that you mention it.
engSearchText: Ah, I can see that now that you mention it.
jpnChrName: あれ、ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: あれ、ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: Just goes to show how talented you clearly are as an actress if you're able to pull off somethin' that complicated.
engSearchText:
Just goes to show how talented you clearly are as an
actress if you're able to pull off somethin'
that complicated.
jpnChrName: あれ、アークライドじゃない。
jpnSearchText: あれ、アークライドじゃない。

engChrName: Haha! That's really high praise coming from a movie buff as big as you. Thanks, Van. That means a lot.
engSearchText:
Haha! That's really high praise coming from a movie
buff as big as you. Thanks, Van. That means a lot.
jpnChrName: お前さんか、１人で来たのか？
jpnSearchText: お前さんか、１人で来たのか？

engChrName: It's a bittersweet moment to end a relationship in order to pursue one's dreams.
engSearchText:
It's a bittersweet moment to end a relationship in
order to pursue one's dreams.
jpnChrName: ……映画でも観に行こうかな、って。 思いついたまま来ちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
……映画でも観に行こうかな、って。
思いついたまま来ちゃいました。

engChrName: I found this is the kind of movie that stays with you even as the credits roll.
engSearchText:
I found this is the kind of movie that stays with you
even as the credits roll.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんは、この作品がお目当てで？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんは、この作品がお目当てで？

engChrName: I doubt I would have seen this alone, but I still found it to be an engrossing watch, all things considered.
engSearchText:
I doubt I would have seen this alone, but I still found
it to be an engrossing watch, all things considered.
jpnChrName: まぁな。
jpnSearchText: まぁな。

engChrName: Awesome. Glad to hear you enjoyed it, Master.
engSearchText: Awesome. Glad to hear you enjoyed it, Master.
jpnChrName: だがドキュメンタリーを選んで正解だった。 １人でじっくり観るのにちょうど良い。
jpnSearchText:
だがドキュメンタリーを選んで正解だった。
１人でじっくり観るのにちょうど良い。

engChrName: ...You know, now that you mention it, I don't think you've ever mentioned anything about your love life to me. What gives?
engSearchText:
...You know, now that you mention it, I don't think
you've ever mentioned anything about your love life
to me. What gives?
jpnChrName: 分かります…… いつの間にか無心になれてるような。
jpnSearchText:
分かります……
いつの間にか無心になれてるような。

engChrName: Haha! I suppose it is because it isn't the kind of subject worth bringing up during a student's lessons.
engSearchText:
Haha! I suppose it is because it isn't the kind of
subject worth bringing up during a student's lessons.
jpnChrName: ……でも途中でふと、 ディンゴさんのことを思い出したんです。
jpnSearchText:
……でも途中でふと、
ディンゴさんのことを思い出したんです。

engChrName: Perhaps it wouldn't hurt to share a story or two about my youngers years if we ever get the chance. One of these days...
engSearchText:
Perhaps it wouldn't hurt to share a story or two about
my youngers years if we ever get the chance. One of
these days...
jpnChrName: だけどそのディンゴさんは辛そうだったり 悲しそうなんじゃなくて──
jpnSearchText:
だけどそのディンゴさんは辛そうだったり
悲しそうなんじゃなくて──

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Rainfall.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Rainfall.
jpnChrName: 優しく笑ってる、穏やかな表情でした。
jpnSearchText: 優しく笑ってる、穏やかな表情でした。

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: わたしそれが、すごく嬉しくて……
jpnSearchText: わたしそれが、すごく嬉しくて……

engChrName: Van? Is that you?
engSearchText: Van? Is that you?
jpnChrName: す、すみません……取り留めない話で。
jpnSearchText: す、すみません……取り留めない話で。

engChrName: Heya. It's my favorite customer.
engSearchText: Heya. It's my favorite customer.
jpnChrName: ……いや。
jpnSearchText: ……いや。

engChrName: Well, look who it is. You come here all by yourself?
engSearchText: Well, look who it is. You come here all by yourself?
jpnChrName: それが聞けて、なんか安心したぜ。
jpnSearchText: それが聞けて、なんか安心したぜ。

engChrName: M-Maybe. I was thinking it might be nice to maybe catch something and then before I knew it, I found myself here.
engSearchText:
M-Maybe. I was thinking it might be nice to maybe
catch something and then before I knew it, I found
myself here.
jpnChrName: お前さんとここで会うのも珍しいな。
jpnSearchText: お前さんとここで会うのも珍しいな。

engChrName: Did you come here to watch this movie, too?
engSearchText: Did you come here to watch this movie, too?
jpnChrName: フフ、実はこれの公開を楽しみにしてたの。 少し登山に興味があってね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、実はこれの公開を楽しみにしてたの。
少し登山に興味があってね。

engChrName: I guess you could say that.
engSearchText: I guess you could say that.
jpnChrName: 貴方もそんな感じ？
jpnSearchText: 貴方もそんな感じ？

engChrName: You were smart to pick a documentary. One of the better genres to enjoy by yourself, in my opinion.
engSearchText:
You were smart to pick a documentary. One of the
better genres to enjoy by yourself, in my opinion.
jpnChrName: いや、俺は割となんでも観るクチでな。
jpnSearchText: いや、俺は割となんでも観るクチでな。

engChrName: I know what you mean. Before I knew it, I was completely sucked into what was going on.
engSearchText:
I know what you mean. Before I knew it, I was
completely sucked into what was going on.
jpnChrName: と言っても物語ありきの作品が多いが。 たまにはドキュメンタリーも良いな。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても物語ありきの作品が多いが。
たまにはドキュメンタリーも良いな。

engChrName: Except...at one point, I suddenly saw Dingo in my mind.
engSearchText:
Except...at one point, I suddenly saw Dingo in
my mind.
jpnChrName: ええ、作り物じゃない美しくも過酷な景色を 大画面で堪能できるんだもの。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、作り物じゃない美しくも過酷な景色を
大画面で堪能できるんだもの。

engChrName: But he didn't look like he was sad or in pain or anything.
engSearchText:
But he didn't look like he was sad or in pain
or anything.
jpnChrName: 『この景色を生で見てみたい！』 っていう目標もできたわ。
jpnSearchText:
『この景色を生で見てみたい！』
っていう目標もできたわ。

engChrName: He was...smiling, softly. He looked like he was in such peace.
engSearchText:
He was...smiling, softly. He looked like he was in
such peace.
jpnChrName: ……何かと忙しいから、 すぐには実現できなさそうだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
……何かと忙しいから、
すぐには実現できなさそうだけれど。

engChrName: It made me so happy to see that. Really happy, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
It made me so happy to see that. Really happy, as a
matter of fact.
jpnChrName: お互いクライアントありきの仕事だからな。
jpnSearchText: お互いクライアントありきの仕事だからな。

engChrName: Ugh... I'm sorry. I must sound crazy right now, talking like that.
engSearchText:
Ugh... I'm sorry. I must sound crazy right now,
talking like that.
jpnChrName: 俺も頼りにしちまってる手前、 ちょいと申し訳ねぇくらいだが。
jpnSearchText:
俺も頼りにしちまってる手前、
ちょいと申し訳ねぇくらいだが。

engChrName: ...Nah. Not at all.
engSearchText: ...Nah. Not at all.
jpnChrName: フフ、そんなの気にしないで。
jpnSearchText: フフ、そんなの気にしないで。

engChrName: Hearing that from you honestly brings me a little comfort. Thanks, Marielle.
engSearchText:
Hearing that from you honestly brings me a
little comfort. Thanks, Marielle.
jpnChrName: これからも頼りにしてちょうだい。 いつだって迅速に丁寧にお届けするわ。
jpnSearchText:
これからも頼りにしてちょうだい。
いつだって迅速に丁寧にお届けするわ。

engChrName: Not used to seein' you here, of all places. What's the occasion?
engSearchText:
Not used to seein' you here, of all places. What's
the occasion?
jpnChrName: 思いがけず出会った知り合いと それから少し言葉を交わした後──
jpnSearchText:
思いがけず出会った知り合いと
それから少し言葉を交わした後──

engChrName: Nothing much. I'd just had my eye on this movie since before it was out. I'm actually a bit of a mountain climber.
engSearchText:
Nothing much. I'd just had my eye on this movie
since before it was out. I'm actually a bit of a
mountain climber.
jpnChrName: 帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。

engChrName: Is that why you decided to watch it, too?
engSearchText: Is that why you decided to watch it, too?
jpnChrName: 『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Nah. I'm just a movie junkie who'll watch a little of everything.
engSearchText:
Nah. I'm just a movie junkie who'll watch a little
of everything.
jpnChrName: 主人公の雰囲気が どことなくアーロンさんに似てましたね。
jpnSearchText:
主人公の雰囲気が
どことなくアーロンさんに似てましたね。

engChrName: I tend to watch a lot of plot-driven stuff when I go to the movies, but I enjoy a good documentary every now and again, too.
engSearchText:
I tend to watch a lot of plot-driven stuff when I go to
the movies, but I enjoy a good documentary every
now and again, too.
jpnChrName: 仲間想いで正義感も喧嘩も強くて、 かっこいい呼び名がついていたり。
jpnSearchText:
仲間想いで正義感も喧嘩も強くて、
かっこいい呼び名がついていたり。

engChrName: Good for you. There's something to be said for seeing such harsh yet beautiful vistas up on the big screen.
engSearchText:
Good for you. There's something to be said for seeing
such harsh yet beautiful vistas up on the big screen.
jpnChrName: 《百花王》は“花の中で最も優れたもの” という意味だそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
《百花王》は“花の中で最も優れたもの”
という意味だそうですよ。

engChrName: Watching that movie made me want to go check all that out for myself one of these days.
engSearchText:
Watching that movie made me want to go check all
that out for myself one of these days.
jpnChrName: お、さっそく調べたのか。
jpnSearchText: お、さっそく調べたのか。

engChrName: When I'll actually get around to it, though, who knows? You know me—always got my hands more than a little full with work.
engSearchText:
When I'll actually get around to it, though,
who knows? You know me—always got my hands
more than a little full with work.
jpnChrName: きれいな男を花に喩えるってのは 東方文化たる所以だな。
jpnSearchText:
きれいな男を花に喩えるってのは
東方文化たる所以だな。

engChrName: Don't I know it. We both need the clients to put food on the table, but work sure has a way of pilin' 'em on.
engSearchText:
Don't I know it. We both need the clients to put food
on the table, but work sure has a way of pilin' 'em on.
jpnChrName: ……もしヴァンさんを花に喩えるなら なんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
……もしヴァンさんを花に喩えるなら
なんでしょうか。

engChrName: I feel bad hitting you up as much as I do. Must not make things any easier for you.
engSearchText:
I feel bad hitting you up as much as I do. Must not
make things any easier for you.
jpnChrName: 想像しないでいい……
jpnSearchText: 想像しないでいい……

engChrName: Oh, don't you worry about me. It's always a pleasure hooking you up with what you need.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't you worry about me. It's always a pleasure
hooking you up with what you need.
jpnChrName: ……なんだか、普通にお喋りしちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText: ……なんだか、普通にお喋りしちゃいましたね。

engChrName: So keep those orders coming. I'll get them to your door faster than you can even hit 'send' no matter what time of day.
engSearchText:
So keep those orders coming. I'll get them to your
door faster than you can even hit 'send' no matter
what time of day.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、ヴァンさん。 ちょっと元気が出た気がします。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、ヴァンさん。
ちょっと元気が出た気がします。

engChrName: Van's conversation in the theater continued for a brief period.
engSearchText:
Van's conversation in the theater continued for a
brief period.
jpnChrName: ……まだ胸の中がグルグルします。
jpnSearchText: ……まだ胸の中がグルグルします。

engChrName: Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of his evening.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in
the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of
his evening.
jpnChrName: 悪者が倒されたのは良かったですけど。
jpnSearchText: 悪者が倒されたのは良かったですけど。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Climber's Story.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Climber's Story.
jpnChrName: だからって、これまで起きたことを 許せるわけじゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
だからって、これまで起きたことを
許せるわけじゃありません。

engChrName: The main character reminds me of Aaron in a lot of ways.
engSearchText:
The main character reminds me of Aaron in a lot
of ways.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうだな。

engChrName: He cares about his friends, he has a strong sense of justice, and he knows his way around a fight. Not to mention how people gave him a nickname.
engSearchText:
He cares about his friends, he has a strong sense of
justice, and he knows his way around a fight. Not to
mention how people gave him a nickname.
jpnChrName: 善悪を裁くのは法だが それを“決める”のは人の心だろう。
jpnSearchText:
善悪を裁くのは法だが
それを“決める”のは人の心だろう。

engChrName: Apparently in Eastern cultures, peonies are considered to be the finest of all flowers. I feel like that adds a fun extra layer to it.
engSearchText:
Apparently in Eastern cultures, peonies are
considered to be the finest of all flowers. I feel like
that adds a fun extra layer to it.
jpnChrName: 自分の心が出す答えを大事にして、 無理に曲げる必要はない。
jpnSearchText:
自分の心が出す答えを大事にして、
無理に曲げる必要はない。

engChrName: Somebody's done her homework. Good for you.
engSearchText: Somebody's done her homework. Good for you.
jpnChrName: ……って、考えてみるのはどうだ？
jpnSearchText: ……って、考えてみるのはどうだ？

engChrName: Yeah, comparin' pretty-looking men to flowers is definitely a thing they do in the East.
engSearchText:
Yeah, comparin' pretty-looking men to flowers is
definitely a thing they do in the East.
jpnChrName: ……ちょっと落ち着きそうです。
jpnSearchText: ……ちょっと落ち着きそうです。

engChrName: Hmm... Now I can't help but wonder what kind of flower you're most like, Van.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Now I can't help but wonder what kind of
flower you're most like, Van.
jpnChrName: ……そうか。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか。

engChrName: You...don't have to think too deep on that. Really.
engSearchText: You...don't have to think too deep on that. Really.
jpnChrName: 最後の一騎打ちの立ち回り、 なかなか良い出来だったな。
jpnSearchText:
最後の一騎打ちの立ち回り、
なかなか良い出来だったな。

engChrName: Whoops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that out loud.
engSearchText: Whoops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that out loud.
jpnChrName: 映画俳優がやるレベルにしては、だが。
jpnSearchText: 映画俳優がやるレベルにしては、だが。

engChrName: Anyway, thanks, Van. I feel a little lighter after watching that.
engSearchText:
Anyway, thanks, Van. I feel a little lighter after
watching that.
jpnChrName: ほう、お前がそう言うなら大したものだな。
jpnSearchText: ほう、お前がそう言うなら大したものだな。

engChrName: My heart feels kinda...twisty now after seeing that.
engSearchText: My heart feels kinda...twisty now after seeing that.
jpnChrName: 何ならお前でも役が務まりそうだ。 腕も容姿も申し分ないだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
何ならお前でも役が務まりそうだ。
腕も容姿も申し分ないだろうし。

engChrName: I'm glad the bad guy lost in the end.
engSearchText: I'm glad the bad guy lost in the end.
jpnChrName: あー、そういや。 オファーは来たことあったな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、そういや。
オファーは来たことあったな。

engChrName: But that doesn't mean everything he did should be forgiven in my opinion. Does that make sense?
engSearchText:
But that doesn't mean everything he did should be
forgiven in my opinion. Does that make sense?
jpnChrName: 気が乗らなくて引き受けなかったが。 やることが普通すぎて面白くなかったし。
jpnSearchText:
気が乗らなくて引き受けなかったが。
やることが普通すぎて面白くなかったし。

engChrName: ...You know, Feri? I agree.
engSearchText: ...You know, Feri? I agree.
jpnChrName: そんな理由で……制作者にちょいと同情するぜ。
jpnSearchText: そんな理由で……制作者にちょいと同情するぜ。

engChrName: We have the law to try and define what's good or bad, but when you get down to it, the only truth about it is the one you feel in your heart.
engSearchText:
We have the law to try and define what's good or bad,
but when you get down to it, the only truth about it is
the one you feel in your heart.
jpnChrName: 討たれるべき悪が討たれる、 奇をてらわない勧善懲悪の物語──
jpnSearchText:
討たれるべき悪が討たれる、
奇をてらわない勧善懲悪の物語──

engChrName: Always listen to what your heart tells you. You don't have to change how you feel just to make other people happy.
engSearchText:
Always listen to what your heart tells you. You don't
have to change how you feel just to make other
people happy.
jpnChrName: 胸がすく思いでした。 このような状況下なのもありますが。
jpnSearchText:
胸がすく思いでした。
このような状況下なのもありますが。

engChrName: Does that help at all?
engSearchText: Does that help at all?
jpnChrName: 偶然とはいえ、な。
jpnSearchText: 偶然とはいえ、な。

engChrName: ...Yeah. I guess a little.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. I guess a little.
jpnChrName: あんなきれいな結末は フィクションに限られるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
あんなきれいな結末は
フィクションに限られるだろうが。

engChrName: Fair enough. Wish I had more to offer in this situation.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. Wish I had more to offer in
this situation.
jpnChrName: ええ……それでも、善処はいたしましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ……それでも、善処はいたしましょう。

engChrName: That last one-on-one fight was pretty well done.
engSearchText: That last one-on-one fight was pretty well done.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様も無理はなさらないように。 いつでもわたくしを頼ってくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様も無理はなさらないように。
いつでもわたくしを頼ってくださいませ。

engChrName: At least, well done for a couple of film actors.
engSearchText: At least, well done for a couple of film actors.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、頼りにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、頼りにしてるぜ。

engChrName: Well, if you thought it was all right, they must've done a hell of a decent job.
engSearchText:
Well, if you thought it was all right, they must've
done a hell of a decent job.
jpnChrName: 亡きお父さんと同じ剣技…… と、見せかけてからの逆転劇。
jpnSearchText:
亡きお父さんと同じ剣技……
と、見せかけてからの逆転劇。

engChrName: I bet you could act in a movie. Sure got the looks and talents to make it work.
engSearchText:
I bet you could act in a movie. Sure got the looks and
talents to make it work.
jpnChrName: 主人公の成長が敵討ちで発揮されて 胸が熱くなったよ。
jpnSearchText:
主人公の成長が敵討ちで発揮されて
胸が熱くなったよ。

engChrName: Actually, I did get an offer to work on a film one time.
engSearchText:
Actually, I did get an offer to work on a film
one time.
jpnChrName: 観客（俺たち）も旅を見守ってきた分、一緒にスカッとできたな。
jpnSearchText: 観客（俺たち）も旅を見守ってきた分、一緒にスカッとできたな。

engChrName: Didn't really sound like my jam, though, so I turned it down. Would've had me doing completely vanilla stuff, which wasn't exciting to me.
engSearchText:
Didn't really sound like my jam, though, so I turned
it down. Would've had me doing completely vanilla
stuff, which wasn't exciting to me.
jpnChrName: まぁ、そうじゃないと面白くないしね。
jpnSearchText: まぁ、そうじゃないと面白くないしね。

engChrName: That's what you said to them? *sigh* I kinda feel for the poor sap who must've been on the other end of that conversation.
engSearchText:
That's what you said to them? *sigh* I kinda feel for
the poor sap who must've been on the other end of
that conversation.
jpnChrName: 子は親を、弟子は師匠を乗り越えるものでしょ？
jpnSearchText: 子は親を、弟子は師匠を乗り越えるものでしょ？

engChrName: In a lot of ways, that was a very conventional story of good triumphing over evil.
engSearchText:
In a lot of ways, that was a very conventional story of
good triumphing over evil.
jpnChrName: ハハ、言うじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、言うじゃないか。

engChrName: However, at a time like this, there is something to be said for the comfort that such a movie can provide.
engSearchText:
However, at a time like this, there is something to be
said for the comfort that such a movie can provide.
jpnChrName: ……非常事態になったとはいえ 僕がやるべきことは変わらない。
jpnSearchText:
……非常事態になったとはいえ
僕がやるべきことは変わらない。

engChrName: You're tellin' me. It couldn't have shown up at a better time.
engSearchText:
You're tellin' me. It couldn't have shown up at a
better time.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン門下の研究者として 技術面のサポートは任せてよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン門下の研究者として
技術面のサポートは任せてよ。

engChrName: Too bad those sorts of clean, happy endings are only the stuff of fiction, though.
engSearchText:
Too bad those sorts of clean, happy endings are only
the stuff of fiction, though.
jpnChrName: ……正直この作品はノーマークだったけど、 良い意味で裏切られたわ。
jpnSearchText:
……正直この作品はノーマークだったけど、
良い意味で裏切られたわ。

engChrName: Indeed. But that doesn't mean we shouldn't do our best within our means regardless.
engSearchText:
Indeed. But that doesn't mean we shouldn't do our
best within our means regardless.
jpnChrName: 主役のアクションは特にキレがあったし、 衣装もセットも無骨だけれど華もあって。
jpnSearchText:
主役のアクションは特にキレがあったし、
衣装もセットも無骨だけれど華もあって。

engChrName: Be that as it may, please, always remember that I'm here, Mr. Arkride, every minute of every day. You needn't take on too much all by yourself.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, please, always remember that I'm
here, Mr. Arkride, every minute of every day.
You needn't take on too much all by yourself.
jpnChrName: 作品の規模はＢ級なはずだが 大作系に劣らない出来栄えだったな。
jpnSearchText:
作品の規模はＢ級なはずだが
大作系に劣らない出来栄えだったな。

engChrName: ...Thanks, Risette. Believe me, I'll be leaning on you plenty.
engSearchText:
...Thanks, Risette. Believe me, I'll be leaning on
you plenty.
jpnChrName: 大作じゃないからこそ実現できる 表現の自由があるのかもしれないが。
jpnSearchText:
大作じゃないからこそ実現できる
表現の自由があるのかもしれないが。

engChrName: That feint that the hero pulls off using the same move as his father really got my blood pumping.
engSearchText:
That feint that the hero pulls off using the same move
as his father really got my blood pumping.
jpnChrName: ……って、この非常事態に 映画トークしてる場合じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
……って、この非常事態に
映画トークしてる場合じゃないか。

engChrName: You could see how much he's grown as a character when he took down the villain.
engSearchText:
You could see how much he's grown as a character
when he took down the villain.
jpnChrName: ……いえ、だからこそ。
jpnSearchText: ……いえ、だからこそ。

engChrName: Absolutely. There's definitely a real thrill watchin' it happen as the audience after seeing him go on that journey.
engSearchText:
Absolutely. There's definitely a real thrill watchin' it
happen as the audience after seeing him go on
that journey.
jpnChrName: エンターテインメントが少しでも みんなの心を慰めてくれることを願うわ。
jpnSearchText:
エンターテインメントが少しでも
みんなの心を慰めてくれることを願うわ。

engChrName: Well, it'd be a pretty big letdown if he didn't pull through in the end, wouldn't it?
engSearchText:
Well, it'd be a pretty big letdown if he didn't pull
through in the end, wouldn't it?
jpnChrName: ……ああ、そうだと良いな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、そうだと良いな。

engChrName: Children are supposed to surpass their parents, and students are supposed to surpass their teachers. That's the way it's meant to be.
engSearchText:
Children are supposed to surpass their parents, and
students are supposed to surpass their teachers.
That's the way it's meant to be.
jpnChrName: 『百花王』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『百花王』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Spoken like a student on his way to doing just that.
engSearchText: Spoken like a student on his way to doing just that.
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: ...Things may have become dire, but my role and what I should be doing is still the same as ever.
engSearchText:
...Things may have become dire, but my role and
what I should be doing is still the same as ever.
jpnChrName: えっと……イメージしてたのと ちょっと違いましたね。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……イメージしてたのと
ちょっと違いましたね。

engChrName: As a researcher and student of Professor Hamilton, I'll do whatever I can to support you in terms of technology. I'm here for you, Van.
engSearchText:
As a researcher and student of Professor Hamilton,
I'll do whatever I can to support you in terms
of technology. I'm here for you, Van.
jpnChrName: いえ、ちょっとじゃなくて、だいぶ。
jpnSearchText: いえ、ちょっとじゃなくて、だいぶ。

engChrName: As you can maybe imagine, that movie wasn't exactly on my radar before today. But count me pleasantly surprised by it.
engSearchText:
As you can maybe imagine, that movie wasn't exactly
on my radar before today. But count me pleasantly
surprised by it.
jpnChrName: すまん……かわいいアニメーションだと思って お前を誘ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
すまん……かわいいアニメーションだと思って
お前を誘ったんだが。

engChrName: The lead actor's action chops were on point, and the costume and set designs were definitely unrefined, but not without their charm.
engSearchText:
The lead actor's action chops were on point, and the
costume and set designs were definitely unrefined, but
not without their charm.
jpnChrName: あっ、いえいえ。 その意外性も含めて楽しめました！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、いえいえ。
その意外性も含めて楽しめました！

engChrName: Yeah, it's definitely a B-movie in terms of its size and scope, but it's as well executed as anything made on a heftier budget.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it's definitely a B-movie in terms of its size and
scope, but it's as well executed as anything made on a
heftier budget.
jpnChrName: 毒気の強いみっしぃが 段々と愛くるしく見えてきちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
毒気の強いみっしぃが
段々と愛くるしく見えてきちゃって。

engChrName: If anything, that humbleness might've enabled the filmmakers to be more expressive than they would've otherwise managed.
engSearchText:
If anything, that humbleness might've enabled the
filmmakers to be more expressive than they would've
otherwise managed.
jpnChrName: 愛くるしい？　あれは愛くるしいのか……？
jpnSearchText: 愛くるしい？　あれは愛くるしいのか……？

engChrName: ...Should we really be talking shop about movies at a time like this, though? Don't we have more important things to worry about?
engSearchText:
...Should we really be talking shop about movies at a
time like this, though? Don't we have more important
things to worry about?
jpnChrName: ……みっしぃは、不思議な力を使える ぬいぐるみだったんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
……みっしぃは、不思議な力を使える
ぬいぐるみだったんでしょうか。

engChrName: No, I take that back. We need moments like this now more than ever.
engSearchText:
No, I take that back. We need moments like this now
more than ever.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳとも違うみたいですし。 そこが、よく分かりませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳとも違うみたいですし。
そこが、よく分かりませんでした。

engChrName: As an actress myself, I can only hope people are able to find solace and comfort in our work, even if it's just a little bit.
engSearchText:
As an actress myself, I can only hope people are able
to find solace and comfort in our work, even if it's just
a little bit.
jpnChrName: そうだなぁ、あのユーモアを笑えるかどうかは 人を選ぶかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
そうだなぁ、あのユーモアを笑えるかどうかは
人を選ぶかもしれない。

engChrName: Yeah. Can't get enough of that in this day and age.
engSearchText: Yeah. Can't get enough of that in this day and age.
jpnChrName: すまん、もうちっと楽しめる作品に誘えば良かったな。
jpnSearchText: すまん、もうちっと楽しめる作品に誘えば良かったな。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for The Peony Blade.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for The Peony Blade.
jpnChrName: あっ、楽しくなかったわけじゃないですよっ。
jpnSearchText: あっ、楽しくなかったわけじゃないですよっ。

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: でも分からないままは悔しいので、 いつかリベンジしたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
でも分からないままは悔しいので、
いつかリベンジしたいですっ。

engChrName: That movie...definitely took a turn, I think it's fair to say.
engSearchText:
That movie...definitely took a turn, I think it's fair
to say.
jpnChrName: その時はまた一緒に観ましょうね、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: その時はまた一緒に観ましょうね、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: That wasn't exactly what I expected it to be.
engSearchText: That wasn't exactly what I expected it to be.
jpnChrName: おう、分かった！　リベンジだな。
jpnSearchText: おう、分かった！　リベンジだな。

engChrName: To put it lightly. Sorry if that was disappointing. Thought it was just gonna be some cutesy cartoon, so that's why I invited you along.
engSearchText:
To put it lightly. Sorry if that was disappointing.
Thought it was just gonna be some cutesy cartoon, so
that's why I invited you along.
jpnChrName: クク、とんでもねぇ猫被りのオカルトアニメだったな。
jpnSearchText: クク、とんでもねぇ猫被りのオカルトアニメだったな。

engChrName: Oh, no, no! I still enjoyed it! That surprise was part of the fun!
engSearchText:
Oh, no, no! I still enjoyed it! That surprise was part of
the fun!
jpnChrName: だが面白ぇ、オレは嫌いじゃないぜ。
jpnSearchText: だが面白ぇ、オレは嫌いじゃないぜ。

engChrName: The more I watched that movie, the more I found myself liking that mean little Mishy. He's cute!
engSearchText:
The more I watched that movie, the more I found
myself liking that mean little Mishy. He's cute!
jpnChrName: 夢を叶える人形か。 マジにいたら、オレなら……
jpnSearchText:
夢を叶える人形か。
マジにいたら、オレなら……

engChrName: Cute? That thing?! Did you forget what he does?
engSearchText: Cute? That thing?! Did you forget what he does?
jpnChrName: おい、分かってるよな？　ここは公共の場──
jpnSearchText: おい、分かってるよな？　ここは公共の場──

engChrName: I don't get it. So was that Mishy some kinda stuffed animal that had mystical powers?
engSearchText:
I don't get it. So was that Mishy some kinda
stuffed animal that had mystical powers?
jpnChrName: イカす姉ちゃんを“よりどりみどり”に揃えて アレをアレして……
jpnSearchText:
イカす姉ちゃんを“よりどりみどり”に揃えて
アレをアレして……

engChrName: It seemed like he was different from FIO and XEROS, but that's all I could understand.
engSearchText:
It seemed like he was different from FIO and
XEROS, but that's all I could understand.
jpnChrName: お前、わざとだろ！
jpnSearchText: お前、わざとだろ！

engChrName: It's meant to have a certain kinda humor, but I guess it's not for everyone.
engSearchText:
It's meant to have a certain kinda humor, but I guess
it's not for everyone.
jpnChrName: 一風変わった、不思議な作品でしたね。
jpnSearchText: 一風変わった、不思議な作品でしたね。

engChrName: Sorry, Feri. I could've done better picking a movie you'd enjoy.
engSearchText:
Sorry, Feri. I could've done better picking a movie
you'd enjoy.
jpnChrName: 子供たちへの教訓──にしては刺激が強そうですが、 道徳的な側面も持っていると言いましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
子供たちへの教訓──にしては刺激が強そうですが、
道徳的な側面も持っていると言いましょうか。

engChrName: Oh, I didn't hate it or anything like that! It's okay!
engSearchText: Oh, I didn't hate it or anything like that! It's okay!
jpnChrName: とはいえ変わり種だがなぁ。 子供のトラウマにならなきゃいいが。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ変わり種だがなぁ。
子供のトラウマにならなきゃいいが。

engChrName: I just hate not being able to understand what's going on. I'll have to watch it again to see if I can figure it out.
engSearchText:
I just hate not being able to understand what's
going on. I'll have to watch it again to see if I can
figure it out.
jpnChrName: 一応、ビクトルのおやっさんやポーレットに 感想を伝えとくか……
jpnSearchText:
一応、ビクトルのおやっさんやポーレットに
感想を伝えとくか……

engChrName: Let's see it again together, Van! I wanna try pushing myself!
engSearchText:
Let's see it again together, Van! I wanna try
pushing myself!
jpnChrName: ふふ、本当にユメ様想いでございますね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、本当にユメ様想いでございますね。

engChrName: Sure. I'll take you, Feri. I like your attitude!
engSearchText: Sure. I'll take you, Feri. I like your attitude!
jpnChrName: あのみっしぃは、心理学の言葉にある “イマジナリーフレンド”なのかと思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
あのみっしぃは、心理学の言葉にある
“イマジナリーフレンド”なのかと思ったけど。

engChrName: Damn, that movie sure went some crazy places by the end of it!
engSearchText:
Damn, that movie sure went some crazy places by the
end of it!
jpnChrName: それとは、ちょっと違ったみたいだ。 子供の心を支える存在というより……
jpnSearchText:
それとは、ちょっと違ったみたいだ。
子供の心を支える存在というより……

engChrName: I dig it. That shit was hilarious!
engSearchText: I dig it. That shit was hilarious!
jpnChrName: 完全に敵意むき出しだったな。
jpnSearchText: 完全に敵意むき出しだったな。

engChrName: Man, if I had a magic doll that could grant me wishes, you know what I'd ask it?
engSearchText:
Man, if I had a magic doll that could grant me
wishes, you know what I'd ask it?
jpnChrName: あはは、そうだった。
jpnSearchText: あはは、そうだった。

engChrName: Yes, I know EXACTLY what you'd ask, you horndog. Keep it to yourself. We're in pub—
engSearchText:
Yes, I know EXACTLY what you'd ask,
you horndog. Keep it to yourself. We're in pub—
jpnChrName: やっぱり肝心なのは優れた道具じゃなく それを扱う人間の心……ってことだね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり肝心なのは優れた道具じゃなく
それを扱う人間の心……ってことだね。

engChrName: I'd ask it to give me a room full of Calvard's finest babes so we could all go off and wet each other's whistles, if you know what I mean.
engSearchText:
I'd ask it to give me a room full of Calvard's finest
babes so we could all go off and wet each other's
whistles, if you know what I mean.
jpnChrName: ……クロスベル、か。
jpnSearchText: ……クロスベル、か。

engChrName: Now you're just tryin' to make a scene!
engSearchText: Now you're just tryin' to make a scene!
jpnChrName: あの子の生のステージ、観てみたいのよね。
jpnSearchText: あの子の生のステージ、観てみたいのよね。

engChrName: That was a very peculiar film, I think we can agree.
engSearchText: That was a very peculiar film, I think we can agree.
jpnChrName: あの子って、みっしぃの……じゃねぇな？ 例の好敵手の方か。
jpnSearchText:
あの子って、みっしぃの……じゃねぇな？
例の好敵手の方か。

engChrName: I suppose one might argue that it's something of a morality tale—although it's perhaps rather overwhelming as a teaching tool for children.
engSearchText:
I suppose one might argue that it's something of a
morality tale—although it's perhaps rather
overwhelming as a teaching tool for children.
jpnChrName: まぁ、そゆこと。 もちろんテーマパークも行きたいけど。
jpnSearchText:
まぁ、そゆこと。
もちろんテーマパークも行きたいけど。

engChrName: Definitely a weird-ass film, at the very least. I can only imagine how many kids it's gonna end up traumatizing.
engSearchText:
Definitely a weird-ass film, at the very least. I can
only imagine how many kids it's gonna end
up traumatizing.
jpnChrName: まとめて休暇とって、舞台を観まくったり みっしぃにハグしてもらったり──
jpnSearchText:
まとめて休暇とって、舞台を観まくったり
みっしぃにハグしてもらったり──

engChrName: Might wanna warn Victor and Paulette about what's in store before it's too late.
engSearchText:
Might wanna warn Victor and Paulette about what's
in store before it's too late.
jpnChrName: って、しばらくは難しいわね…… 仕事のスケジュールパンパンだし。
jpnSearchText:
って、しばらくは難しいわね……
仕事のスケジュールパンパンだし。

engChrName: Heehee. That's very sweet of you to think of Yumé, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
Heehee. That's very sweet of you to think of Yumé,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: 穴を開けられねぇ“副業”もあるしな？
jpnSearchText: 穴を開けられねぇ“副業”もあるしな？

engChrName: At first, I thought that Mishy was maybe something of an imaginary friend to the kid in that movie.
engSearchText:
At first, I thought that Mishy was maybe something
of an imaginary friend to the kid in that movie.
jpnChrName: うぐ……そうね。 でもいずれ絶対、実現してみせるわっ。
jpnSearchText:
うぐ……そうね。
でもいずれ絶対、実現してみせるわっ。

engChrName: But that's certainly not what you get by the end.
engSearchText: But that's certainly not what you get by the end.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、みっしぃか。 久々に名前を聞いたな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、みっしぃか。
久々に名前を聞いたな。

engChrName: That thing wasn't out to set him straight so much as get its revenge on him outright.
engSearchText:
That thing wasn't out to set him straight so much as
get its revenge on him outright.
jpnChrName: 師父も知ってましたか。
jpnSearchText: 師父も知ってましたか。

engChrName: Yeah. Can't really call it a friend by any definition, ahaha.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Can't really call it a friend by any
definition, ahaha.
jpnChrName: 外国のご当地キャラの割には さすがの知名度っつうか。
jpnSearchText:
外国のご当地キャラの割には
さすがの知名度っつうか。

engChrName: I guess when you get down to it, the story's not really about how amazing that Mishy doll is as much as it is the heart of the kid using him.
engSearchText:
I guess when you get down to it, the story's not really
about how amazing that Mishy doll is as much as it is
the heart of the kid using him.
jpnChrName: 現役時代には幾度となくクロスベルに 立ち寄ったこともあるのでな。
jpnSearchText:
現役時代には幾度となくクロスベルに
立ち寄ったこともあるのでな。

engChrName: Oh, Crossbell...
engSearchText: Oh, Crossbell...
jpnChrName: みっしぃ本人と相対したことは無いが…… かように手厳しい人柄だったとは。
jpnSearchText:
みっしぃ本人と相対したことは無いが……
かように手厳しい人柄だったとは。

engChrName: I'd love to catch a show live there one of these days.
engSearchText: I'd love to catch a show live there one of these days.
jpnChrName: 本家はもっと毒気が薄いはずなので そこは共和国流ってことで。
jpnSearchText:
本家はもっと毒気が薄いはずなので
そこは共和国流ってことで。

engChrName: Who're you talking about? You don't mean Mish—oh! You mean one of her shows, huh?
engSearchText:
Who're you talking about? You don't mean
Mish—oh! You mean one of her shows, huh?
jpnChrName: 『長靴をはいたみっしぃ』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『長靴をはいたみっしぃ』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Bingo. Not that I don't want to pay a visit to Mishelam Wonderland, either, of course.
engSearchText:
Bingo. Not that I don't want to pay a visit to
Mishelam Wonderland, either, of course.
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: A good vacation there where I can just take off, indulge in a ton of local theater, and maybe get Mishy to hug me once or twice sounds just perfect.
engSearchText:
A good vacation there where I can just take off,
indulge in a ton of local theater, and maybe get Mishy
to hug me once or twice sounds just perfect.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》……ここで出くわすとは。
jpnSearchText: 《裏解決屋》……ここで出くわすとは。

engChrName: Not that I'll get the chance to anytime soon with my work schedule being so hectic, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
Not that I'll get the chance to anytime soon with my
work schedule being so hectic, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: おっと、ここで説教は勘弁してくれや。
jpnSearchText: おっと、ここで説教は勘弁してくれや。

engChrName: Plus you can't exactly step away from your side hustle willy-nilly, can you?
engSearchText:
Plus you can't exactly step away from your side hustle
willy-nilly, can you?
jpnChrName: 今は１人でのんびり映画鑑賞を楽しんでただけだぜ。
jpnSearchText: 今は１人でのんびり映画鑑賞を楽しんでただけだぜ。

engChrName: Yeah, that's true, too... One of these days, though! I don't know how, but I'm going to make it happen or die trying!
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's true, too... One of these days, though!
I don't know how, but I'm going to make it happen
or die trying!
jpnChrName: ……別に疑っちゃいない。
jpnSearchText: ……別に疑っちゃいない。

engChrName: Hahaha! I haven't thought about Mishy in a good while.
engSearchText:
Hahaha! I haven't thought about Mishy in a
good while.
jpnChrName: こちらもせっかくの非番に 余計な気を煩わせたくはないからな。
jpnSearchText:
こちらもせっかくの非番に
余計な気を煩わせたくはないからな。

engChrName: I didn't realize you'd even heard of him before, Master.
engSearchText:
I didn't realize you'd even heard of him
before, Master.
jpnChrName: そりゃ良かった。
jpnSearchText: そりゃ良かった。

engChrName: Guess it just goes to show how famous he's become for someone who's meant to just be a local mascot.
engSearchText:
Guess it just goes to show how famous he's become
for someone who's meant to just be a local mascot.
jpnChrName: 察するに、上映終了が近づいて 慌てて駆け込みで観に来たってところか？
jpnSearchText:
察するに、上映終了が近づいて
慌てて駆け込みで観に来たってところか？

engChrName: When I was with the church, I found myself in Crossbell on countless occasions.
engSearchText:
When I was with the church, I found myself in
Crossbell on countless occasions.
jpnChrName: ……まぁな。
jpnSearchText: ……まぁな。

engChrName: I never met him while there, but DID hear of him often. I never took him to be quite so...stark of a personality.
engSearchText:
I never met him while there, but DID hear of
him often. I never took him to be quite so...stark of
a personality.
jpnChrName: 次から次へと湧く事件や事故に追われるうちに 気づけば上映終了間際になっていた。
jpnSearchText:
次から次へと湧く事件や事故に追われるうちに
気づけば上映終了間際になっていた。

engChrName: That's only a Calvard thing from what I know. The real Mishy's supposed to be way less malicious than the movie version.
engSearchText:
That's only a Calvard thing from what I know.
The real Mishy's supposed to be way less malicious
than the movie version.
jpnChrName: それでも観に来るとは、案外映画好きなんだな。
jpnSearchText: それでも観に来るとは、案外映画好きなんだな。

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Mishy in Boots.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Mishy in Boots.
jpnChrName: この医療モノは特に気になっていただけだ。
jpnSearchText: この医療モノは特に気になっていただけだ。

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: 主人公が受け持つ幼い女の子の患者のように 自分の娘が同じ状況になったらと……
jpnSearchText:
主人公が受け持つ幼い女の子の患者のように
自分の娘が同じ状況になったらと……

engChrName: Oh, great. Just who I wanted to find here. Good to see you, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Oh, great. Just who I wanted to find here. Good to
see you, spriggan.
jpnChrName: まぁ、そんなことを考えながら観ていた。
jpnSearchText: まぁ、そんなことを考えながら観ていた。

engChrName: You're not gonna lecture me here, too, are you, Inspector?
engSearchText:
You're not gonna lecture me here, too, are
you, Inspector?
jpnChrName: へぇ、意外と子煩悩なタイプか。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、意外と子煩悩なタイプか。

engChrName: I just came to take in a movie all by myself, that's it. Not here to cause any trouble.
engSearchText:
I just came to take in a movie all by myself, that's it.
Not here to cause any trouble.
jpnChrName: ……意外とはなんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……意外とはなんだ。

engChrName: ...I didn't say I thought you were.
engSearchText: ...I didn't say I thought you were.
jpnChrName: 思いがけず出会った知り合いと それから少し言葉を交わした後──
jpnSearchText:
思いがけず出会った知り合いと
それから少し言葉を交わした後──

engChrName: Besides, I'd rather not spend this precious downtime I've got giving anybody grief if I can at all help it.
engSearchText:
Besides, I'd rather not spend this precious downtime
I've got giving anybody grief if I can at all help it.
jpnChrName: 帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>帰路につく相手を、ロビーで見送ったのだった。

engChrName: Well, that's good to hear. Not gonna catch me complainin'.
engSearchText:
Well, that's good to hear. Not gonna catch
me complainin'.
jpnChrName: 『天国のこちら側』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『天国のこちら側』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: From the look of things, it seems like you had to scramble to catch the last showing tonight.
engSearchText:
From the look of things, it seems like you had to
scramble to catch the last showing tonight.
jpnChrName: くっ……姿が見えない敵ほど 恐ろしいものはありませんねっ。
jpnSearchText:
くっ……姿が見えない敵ほど
恐ろしいものはありませんねっ。

engChrName: Pretty much.
engSearchText: Pretty much.
jpnChrName: 奇襲も陽動も効かない相手……攻略は難しいですっ。
jpnSearchText: 奇襲も陽動も効かない相手……攻略は難しいですっ。

engChrName: I was running around, dealing with so many cases and accidents tonight that before I knew it, it was almost closing time here.
engSearchText:
I was running around, dealing with so many cases and
accidents tonight that before I knew it, it was almost
closing time here.
jpnChrName: そんなことを考えて観てたのか。
jpnSearchText: そんなことを考えて観てたのか。

engChrName: You must really like your movies to go to that much trouble to make it here anyway.
engSearchText:
You must really like your movies to go to that much
trouble to make it here anyway.
jpnChrName: 一応言っておくが、フィクションだしな？
jpnSearchText: 一応言っておくが、フィクションだしな？

engChrName: I suppose. I'd also been really wanting to watch this movie in general as a medical drama.
engSearchText:
I suppose. I'd also been really wanting to watch this
movie in general as a medical drama.
jpnChrName: いつどんなオバケが来ようとヴァンさんのことは──
jpnSearchText: いつどんなオバケが来ようとヴァンさんのことは──

engChrName: It gave me a lot to think about as a parent.
engSearchText: It gave me a lot to think about as a parent.
jpnChrName: いえ、みなさんはわたしが絶対に守りますっ。
jpnSearchText: いえ、みなさんはわたしが絶対に守りますっ。

engChrName: It made me wonder what I would do if my daughter ever wound up like the little girl does that the intern takes in...
engSearchText:
It made me wonder what I would do if my daughter
ever wound up like the little girl does that the intern
takes in...
jpnChrName: お、おう？ （まぁ、下手に怖がってるより良いか。）
jpnSearchText:
お、おう？
（まぁ、下手に怖がってるより良いか。）

engChrName: Heh. Didn't realize you had it in you to be so sentimental.
engSearchText:
Heh. Didn't realize you had it in you to be
so sentimental.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、低予算のＢ級ホラーなんざ所詮……
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、低予算のＢ級ホラーなんざ所詮……

engChrName: ...And what's that supposed to mean?
engSearchText: ...And what's that supposed to mean?
jpnChrName: って高をくくってたが、案外面白かったな。 憑依されたエミリーの顔とかエグかったしよ。
jpnSearchText:
って高をくくってたが、案外面白かったな。
憑依されたエミリーの顔とかエグかったしよ。

engChrName: Van's conversation in the theater continued for a brief period.
engSearchText:
Van's conversation in the theater continued for a
brief period.
jpnChrName: ああ、あのシーンは迫力あったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、あのシーンは迫力あったな。

engChrName: Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of his evening.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, however, the two sides parted ways in
the lobby. From there, Van got on with the rest of
his evening.
jpnChrName: ……顔見知りがあんな状態になったら お前ならどうする？
jpnSearchText:
……顔見知りがあんな状態になったら
お前ならどうする？

engChrName: Obtained brochure for This Side of Heaven.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for This Side of Heaven.
jpnChrName: ……まずは祓うのを試す。 それがダメなら倒すだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
……まずは祓うのを試す。
それがダメなら倒すだろうな。

engChrName: Ugh. There's nothing scarier than an enemy you can't even see.
engSearchText:
Ugh. There's nothing scarier than an enemy you can't
even see.
jpnChrName: そいつにとって最善のオチをくれてやる。
jpnSearchText: そいつにとって最善のオチをくれてやる。

engChrName: They're so tough to deal with. You can't ambush them and you can't do any diversions, either. It sucks.
engSearchText:
They're so tough to deal with. You can't ambush
them and you can't do any diversions, either. It sucks.
jpnChrName: そうか、お前らしいな。
jpnSearchText: そうか、お前らしいな。

engChrName: THAT'S what you were thinking about the whole time?
engSearchText:
THAT'S what you were thinking about the
whole time?
jpnChrName: なんじゃそりゃ。
jpnSearchText: なんじゃそりゃ。

engChrName: Just to be clear, you do understand it was all made up, right? None of that was real.
engSearchText:
Just to be clear, you do understand it was all made
up, right? None of that was real.
jpnChrName: ホラー映画は初めて観ましたが、 とても面白かったです。
jpnSearchText:
ホラー映画は初めて観ましたが、
とても面白かったです。

engChrName: So? I've gotta be prepared in case we ever encounter any ghosts. Who knows when or where we might find one!
engSearchText:
So? I've gotta be prepared in case we ever encounter
any ghosts. Who knows when or where we might
find one!
jpnChrName: あえて恐怖を煽られに行く心理…… 少しばかりクセになりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
あえて恐怖を煽られに行く心理……
少しばかりクセになりそうです。

engChrName: But don't worry, Van! If that ever happens, I'll protect you! You and everybody else! Okay?
engSearchText:
But don't worry, Van! If that ever happens, I'll
protect you! You and everybody else! Okay?
jpnChrName: なんとなく予想はしてたが、 お前さんは平気なタイプだな？
jpnSearchText:
なんとなく予想はしてたが、
お前さんは平気なタイプだな？

engChrName: Uhh, okay. 'Preciate you watching our backs, Feri. (Guess I'll take this over her comin' out of it super spooked, at least.)
engSearchText:
Uhh, okay. 'Preciate you watching our backs, Feri.
(Guess I'll take this over her comin' out of it super
spooked, at least.)
jpnChrName: ふふ、ですが心拍数の上昇は感じました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ですが心拍数の上昇は感じました。

engChrName: Y'know, at first I thought this was just gonna be some low budget, B-grade schlock.
engSearchText:
Y'know, at first I thought this was just gonna be some
low budget, B-grade schlock.
jpnChrName: ……今度は夜に鑑賞するのも 雰囲気が出て良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……今度は夜に鑑賞するのも
雰囲気が出て良さそうですね。

engChrName: But that was actually pretty damn entertaining. Emily's face when she got all possessed was messed up.
engSearchText:
But that was actually pretty damn entertaining.
Emily's face when she got all possessed was
messed up.
jpnChrName: 真夜中の、おまけに古い屋敷で 何も起きないわけがないよね。
jpnSearchText:
真夜中の、おまけに古い屋敷で
何も起きないわけがないよね。

engChrName: Yeah, that scene was definitely a shocker.
engSearchText: Yeah, that scene was definitely a shocker.
jpnChrName: ……ってフラグが立つのは分かってても びっくりしちゃうんだから悔しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ってフラグが立つのは分かってても
びっくりしちゃうんだから悔しいよ。

engChrName: ...Tell me somethin', Aaron. If someone you knew wound up like her, what would you do?
engSearchText:
...Tell me somethin', Aaron. If someone you knew
wound up like her, what would you do?
jpnChrName: ハハ、でも涼しい顔で観てたよな？ 時々ちょいと様子を見てたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、でも涼しい顔で観てたよな？
時々ちょいと様子を見てたんだが。

engChrName: ...I'd try to save them. But if that wouldn't work, then I'd put 'em out of their misery.
engSearchText:
...I'd try to save them. But if that wouldn't work, then
I'd put 'em out of their misery.
jpnChrName: ええ、そうなの？
jpnSearchText: ええ、そうなの？

engChrName: It'd suck, but it'd be the best thing for them. Better than letting them suffer.
engSearchText:
It'd suck, but it'd be the best thing for them.
Better than letting them suffer.
jpnChrName: 誘った手前、怖がって楽しめてなかったら 悪いと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
誘った手前、怖がって楽しめてなかったら
悪いと思ってな。

engChrName: That's about what I figured you'd say, yeah. Can't say I'm terribly surprised.
engSearchText:
That's about what I figured you'd say, yeah. Can't say
I'm terribly surprised.
jpnChrName: いつでも腕を掴めるように 座席の肘掛けに置いたりとか……
jpnSearchText:
いつでも腕を掴めるように
座席の肘掛けに置いたりとか……

engChrName: Well, sorry I'm so predictable, I guess. What do you want?
engSearchText:
Well, sorry I'm so predictable, I guess. What do
you want?
jpnChrName: よ、余計な気遣いだよ。 もう、なんだかな……
jpnSearchText:
よ、余計な気遣いだよ。
もう、なんだかな……

engChrName: That was very entertaining. I've never seen a horror film before this.
engSearchText:
That was very entertaining. I've never seen a horror
film before this.
jpnChrName: ……ねぇ、ホラー映画って 大体２パターンあるじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
……ねぇ、ホラー映画って
大体２パターンあるじゃない？

engChrName: I can understand now why someone would go out of their way to subject themselves to such fear. I imagine it becomes addicting.
engSearchText:
I can understand now why someone would go out of
their way to subject themselves to such fear. I imagine
it becomes addicting.
jpnChrName: いきなりびっくり系と、じわじわ迫ってくる系。
jpnSearchText: いきなりびっくり系と、じわじわ迫ってくる系。

engChrName: You seemed to handle that movie like a trooper, though. Not that I expected anything else from the likes of you.
engSearchText:
You seemed to handle that movie like a
trooper, though. Not that I expected anything else
from the likes of you.
jpnChrName: 前者の場合、自分が怖がってるのか驚いてるのか 分からなくなるのよね。
jpnSearchText:
前者の場合、自分が怖がってるのか驚いてるのか
分からなくなるのよね。

engChrName: Heehee. Perhaps, but I certainly still felt my heart race as I was watching it.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Perhaps, but I certainly still felt my heart
race as I was watching it.
jpnChrName: ああ、たしか…… “ジャンプスケア”って手法だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、たしか……
“ジャンプスケア”って手法だったか。

engChrName: Perhaps next time I watch such a film, I'll do so at night. I'm sure that must add to the ambience.
engSearchText:
Perhaps next time I watch such a film, I'll do so
at night. I'm sure that must add to the ambience.
jpnChrName: ホラー映画の基礎っつうか、 演出として使われがちだな。
jpnSearchText:
ホラー映画の基礎っつうか、
演出として使われがちだな。

engChrName: Anybody reasonable would recognize that visiting such an old mansion in the middle of the night isn't without its own risks. And yet...
engSearchText:
Anybody reasonable would recognize that visiting
such an old mansion in the middle of the night isn't
without its own risks. And yet...
jpnChrName: でも、“怖い”と“驚く”は別物だと思うのよ。 ホラーは恐怖で楽しませてなんぼでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
でも、“怖い”と“驚く”は別物だと思うのよ。
ホラーは恐怖で楽しませてなんぼでしょ？

engChrName: ...I'm embarrassed that movie still managed to scare so much despite knowing what those characters were in for. *sigh*
engSearchText:
...I'm embarrassed that movie still managed to scare
so much despite knowing what those characters were
in for. *sigh*
jpnChrName: ……今度、監督と話し合ってみるべきね。 他と同じことをやってもつまらないし。
jpnSearchText:
……今度、監督と話し合ってみるべきね。
他と同じことをやってもつまらないし。

engChrName: Haha, yeah. I was keepin' an eye on you during the movie and you looked pretty real spooked at times, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Haha, yeah. I was keepin' an eye on you during the
movie and you looked pretty real spooked at times,
that's for sure.
jpnChrName: （次はホラー映画にでも出るのか？）
jpnSearchText: （次はホラー映画にでも出るのか？）

engChrName: Really? It was that obvious?
engSearchText: Really? It was that obvious?
jpnChrName: （ある種の職業病だが、つくづく仕事熱心だな。）
jpnSearchText: （ある種の職業病だが、つくづく仕事熱心だな。）

engChrName: Mm-hmm. I feel bad now. Sorry if you were too scared to have much of a good time back there.
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm. I feel bad now. Sorry if you were too
scared to have much of a good time back there.
jpnChrName: ……人々が怪異に巻き込まれ 逃げ惑う様を描く、か。
jpnSearchText:
……人々が怪異に巻き込まれ
逃げ惑う様を描く、か。

engChrName: I tried keepin' my arm on the arm rest so you could hold on to it if you needed, you know. I wouldn't have minded.
engSearchText:
I tried keepin' my arm on the arm rest so you could
hold on to it if you needed, you know. I wouldn't
have minded.
jpnChrName: このような類の映画もあるのだな。 若人の感性は面白い。
jpnSearchText:
このような類の映画もあるのだな。
若人の感性は面白い。

engChrName: Th-That's okay! You really didn't have to go to that much trouble! Ugh, I swear, Van...
engSearchText:
Th-That's okay! You really didn't have to go to that
much trouble! Ugh, I swear, Van...
jpnChrName: 元聖職者の師父に言われると ちょいとバツが悪い気になりますね。
jpnSearchText:
元聖職者の師父に言われると
ちょいとバツが悪い気になりますね。

engChrName: You know, when you get down to it, there tend to be two main kinds of horror movies.
engSearchText:
You know, when you get down to it, there tend to be
two main kinds of horror movies.
jpnChrName: フフ、かような含みはまったく無い。
jpnSearchText: フフ、かような含みはまったく無い。

engChrName: You've got ones that deal in jump scares and then ones that prefer to have a more encroaching sense of dread.
engSearchText:
You've got ones that deal in jump scares and then
ones that prefer to have a more encroaching sense
of dread.
jpnChrName: ……良くも悪くも、人は目に見えぬ存在を畏怖する。
jpnSearchText: ……良くも悪くも、人は目に見えぬ存在を畏怖する。

engChrName: My problem with jump scares is that you never know if you're reacting because you're genuinely scared, or you're just caught by surprise.
engSearchText:
My problem with jump scares is that you never know
if you're reacting because you're genuinely scared, or
you're just caught by surprise.
jpnChrName: その心理を活かしているのが興味深かっただけよ。
jpnSearchText: その心理を活かしているのが興味深かっただけよ。

engChrName: Yeah, I totally get what you mean by that.
engSearchText: Yeah, I totally get what you mean by that.
jpnChrName: ア、アニエス……？　大丈夫か？
jpnSearchText: ア、アニエス……？　大丈夫か？

engChrName: They're a real cornerstone of the genre, but a lot of movies use 'em too much as a crutch.
engSearchText:
They're a real cornerstone of the genre, but a lot of
movies use 'em too much as a crutch.
jpnChrName: な、何がですか？　私はなんとも……
jpnSearchText: な、何がですか？　私はなんとも……

engChrName: I guess what I'm trying to say is, what good is a horror movie if there's no real fear to enjoy? Because fear and surprise aren't the same thing.
engSearchText:
I guess what I'm trying to say is, what good is a horror
movie if there's no real fear to enjoy? Because fear
and surprise aren't the same thing.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが傍にいるおかげで 観てる間はすごく心強かったですし。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんが傍にいるおかげで
観てる間はすごく心強かったですし。

engChrName: ...I'm going to have to talk to the director next time I'm on set. I don't want to be doing the same boring things as other movies.
engSearchText:
...I'm going to have to talk to the director next time
I'm on set. I don't want to be doing the same boring
things as other movies.
jpnChrName: いつもより心臓がドキドキして 血がグルグルしてる気がするだけで……
jpnSearchText:
いつもより心臓がドキドキして
血がグルグルしてる気がするだけで……

engChrName: (Guess I know what genre we'll see her in next.)
engSearchText: (Guess I know what genre we'll see her in next.)
jpnChrName: ドキドキ、グルグルして──
jpnSearchText: ドキドキ、グルグルして──

engChrName: (Gotta respect how much passion she has for her job—even if it's something of a liability at times.)
engSearchText:
(Gotta respect how much passion she has for her
job—even if it's something of a liability at times.)
jpnChrName: アニエス！？　し、しっかりしろ──！！
jpnSearchText: アニエス！？　し、しっかりしろ──！！

engChrName: The sensibilities of the young are interesting to consider. I get a kick out of it, you might say.
engSearchText:
The sensibilities of the young are interesting
to consider. I get a kick out of it, you might say.
jpnChrName: 医務室に運ばれたアニエスは少し休んだ後、 普段通りに復活したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
医務室に運ばれたアニエスは少し休んだ後、
普段通りに復活したのだった。

engChrName: I hadn't realized they made movies where the characters encounter ghosts and then try to escape them. You learn something new every day.
engSearchText:
I hadn't realized they made movies where the
characters encounter ghosts and then try to
escape them. You learn something new every day.
jpnChrName: 『ミッドナイト・メモリーズ』のパンフレット を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
『ミッドナイト・メモリーズ』のパンフレット
を手に入れた。

engChrName: Heh. In hindsight, maybe it wasn't the best idea to take a man of the church to see a movie like that, huh?
engSearchText:
Heh. In hindsight, maybe it wasn't the best idea to
take a man of the church to see a movie like
that, huh?
jpnChrName: 束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
束の間の休憩を終えたヴァンたちは
その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Oh, something like this does not offend me in the least. You have nothing to worry about.
engSearchText:
Oh, something like this does not offend me in
the least. You have nothing to worry about.
jpnChrName: （そういや、売店にパンフレットが売ってたな。）
jpnSearchText: （そういや、売店にパンフレットが売ってたな。）

engChrName: For better or worse, it's human nature for people to treat things they cannot see with fear and awe.
engSearchText:
For better or worse, it's human nature for people to
treat things they cannot see with fear and awe.
jpnChrName: （記念に買っても良いかもしれん。）
jpnSearchText: （記念に買っても良いかもしれん。）

engChrName: I'm just impressed these movie makers have found a way to harness that reaction and turn it into something entertaining.
engSearchText:
I'm just impressed these movie makers have found a
way to harness that reaction and turn it into
something entertaining.
jpnChrName: （……手持ちが無かったな。）
jpnSearchText: （……手持ちが無かったな。）

engChrName: Uh, Agnès? You doing okay?
engSearchText: Uh, Agnès? You doing okay?
jpnChrName: タイレル地区に到着ですね。
jpnSearchText: タイレル地区に到着ですね。

engChrName: Wh-What do you mean? I'm... I'm perfectly fine, really!
engSearchText:
Wh-What do you mean? I'm... I'm perfectly
fine, really!
jpnChrName: ジェシカさんを知ってる人がいないか 色々な人に聞き込みをするんでしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
ジェシカさんを知ってる人がいないか
色々な人に聞き込みをするんでしたよね。

engChrName: I had you there next to me the whole time. What more could I have needed to feel safe?
engSearchText:
I had you there next to me the whole time.
What more could I have needed to feel safe?
jpnChrName: よーし、張り切って行きましょう！
jpnSearchText: よーし、張り切って行きましょう！

engChrName: Sure, it got my heart really pounding and blood racing, but...
engSearchText:
Sure, it got my heart really pounding and blood
racing, but...
jpnChrName: とはいえ実は、 聞き込み先として第一候補がいてな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ実は、
聞き込み先として第一候補がいてな。

engChrName: ...other than that...I'm...I'm...
engSearchText: ...other than that...I'm...I'm...
jpnChrName: よくタイレル地区でスカウトをしてる ファッションモデルのプロデューサーがいるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
よくタイレル地区でスカウトをしてる
ファッションモデルのプロデューサーがいるんだ。

engChrName: Agnès? Agnès, wake up! AGNÈS!
engSearchText: Agnès? Agnès, wake up! AGNÈS!
jpnChrName: まずはそいつに話を聞いてみようぜ。
jpnSearchText: まずはそいつに話を聞いてみようぜ。

engChrName: After being carried to the doctor's office and taking a brief rest, Agnès came back to her senses and fully recovered, good as new.
engSearchText:
After being carried to the doctor's office and taking a
brief rest, Agnès came back to her senses and fully
recovered, good as new.
jpnChrName: ふぁっしょんもでるの ぷろでゅーさー、ですか……？
jpnSearchText:
ふぁっしょんもでるの
ぷろでゅーさー、ですか……？

engChrName: Obtained brochure for Midnight Memories.
engSearchText: Obtained brochure for Midnight Memories.
jpnChrName: 妹さんは美人な方でしたから 目撃情報が得られるかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
妹さんは美人な方でしたから
目撃情報が得られるかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Having finished their break, Van and his crew resumed their work.
engSearchText:
Having finished their break, Van and his crew
resumed their work.
jpnChrName: 確か大通りで何度か見かけた事が ある気がするんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
確か大通りで何度か見かけた事が
ある気がするんだよな。

engChrName: (Hey, looks like they're sellin' commemorative brochures for this movie.)
engSearchText:
(Hey, looks like they're sellin' commemorative
brochures for this movie.)
jpnChrName: タイレル地区をぶらつきながら 探してみるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区をぶらつきながら
探してみるとすっか。

engChrName: (Maybe I should pick one up as a souvenir. Hmm...)
engSearchText: (Maybe I should pick one up as a souvenir. Hmm...)
jpnChrName: こんにちは、貴方がジェスさんですよね？
jpnSearchText: こんにちは、貴方がジェスさんですよね？

engChrName: (Whoops. Guess I'm a little short.)
engSearchText: (Whoops. Guess I'm a little short.)
jpnChrName: 君たちはこの前の……？
jpnSearchText: 君たちはこの前の……？

engChrName: Well, we're in the Tyrell District.
engSearchText: Well, we're in the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: はい、お久しぶりです。
jpnSearchText: はい、お久しぶりです。

engChrName: Now to talk to as many people as we can and see if we can find anyone who knows this Jessica lady.
engSearchText:
Now to talk to as many people as we can and see if
we can find anyone who knows this Jessica lady.
jpnChrName: 君たちは……
jpnSearchText: 君たちは……

engChrName: Well, what're we waiting for? Let's get to work!
engSearchText: Well, what're we waiting for? Let's get to work!
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: Hold up a sec, kiddo. I've got an idea who we should probably hit up first.
engSearchText:
Hold up a sec, kiddo. I've got an idea who we should
probably hit up first.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋宛てに依頼を出したよな。 早速詳しい話を聞かせてもらいたいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋宛てに依頼を出したよな。
早速詳しい話を聞かせてもらいたいんだが。

engChrName: There's a producer who often hangs out around here to tryin' to recruit new people to be mannequins.
engSearchText:
There's a producer who often hangs out around here
to tryin' to recruit new people to be mannequins.
jpnChrName: そうか……期待はしてたけど まさか本当に来てくれるだなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……期待はしてたけど
まさか本当に来てくれるだなんてね。

engChrName: Let's talk to him before we try askin' anyone else. Might save us a lot of wandering around.
engSearchText:
Let's talk to him before we try askin' anyone else.
Might save us a lot of wandering around.
jpnChrName: それじゃあそこの席に座ってくれるかな。 少し長くなるだろうしね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあそこの席に座ってくれるかな。
少し長くなるだろうしね。

engChrName: Manny...kin? I've never heard of that. What do they do?
engSearchText:
Manny...kin? I've never heard of that. What do
they do?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、改めて── シンガーソングライターをしているジェスだ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、改めて──
シンガーソングライターをしているジェスだ。

engChrName: He means models—people who wear clothes to advertise new outfits. And Van's right that Jessica is pretty enough to be noticed by a producer.
engSearchText:
He means models—people who wear clothes to
advertise new outfits. And Van's right that Jessica is
pretty enough to be noticed by a producer.
jpnChrName: と言っても、芽が出たばかりの駆け出しでね。 名乗るほどの者じゃないけど。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても、芽が出たばかりの駆け出しでね。
名乗るほどの者じゃないけど。

engChrName: I know for a fact I've seen him hanging out along the main street.
engSearchText:
I know for a fact I've seen him hanging out along the
main street.
jpnChrName: それでも、この前聞かせて頂いた歌は すごく良かったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、この前聞かせて頂いた歌は
すごく良かったですよ。

engChrName: Let's walk around and see if he's out hustling again.
engSearchText: Let's walk around and see if he's out hustling again.
jpnChrName: へぇ～、わたしも聞いてみたかったです！
jpnSearchText: へぇ～、わたしも聞いてみたかったです！

engChrName: Hello! You're Jess, aren't you?
engSearchText: Hello! You're Jess, aren't you?
jpnChrName: はは、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: はは、ありがとう。

engChrName: Uh... Hey. Haven't I seen you guys before?
engSearchText: Uh... Hey. Haven't I seen you guys before?
jpnChrName: それにしても、最近君たちの事を 近所で見かける事が増えた気がするな。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、最近君たちの事を
近所で見かける事が増えた気がするな。

engChrName: We've met before, yes. It's good to see you.
engSearchText: We've met before, yes. It's good to see you.
jpnChrName: まあな、ウチの事務所が 旧市街にあるからだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、ウチの事務所が
旧市街にあるからだろう。

engChrName: Sorry, but mind if you refresh my memory?
engSearchText: Sorry, but mind if you refresh my memory?
jpnChrName: しんがーそんぐらいたーって、 なんだか響きがカッコイイですっ！
jpnSearchText:
しんがーそんぐらいたーって、
なんだか響きがカッコイイですっ！

engChrName: We're with Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: We're with Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: はは、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: はは、ありがとう。

engChrName: You put out a request askin' for our help, yeah? That's what we're here to talk about. Care to fill us in on what's going on?
engSearchText:
You put out a request askin' for our help, yeah?
That's what we're here to talk about. Care to fill
us in on what's going on?
jpnChrName: ……というか、君たちの事は 家の近くでたまに見かけるような……？
jpnSearchText:
……というか、君たちの事は
家の近くでたまに見かけるような……？

engChrName: Wow! You really came after all. I mean, not that I doubted you guys or anything, but...still.
engSearchText:
Wow! You really came after all. I mean, not that I
doubted you guys or anything, but...still.
jpnChrName: 言われてみりゃあ、こっちも見覚えがあんな。 ウチの事務所は旧市街にあるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
言われてみりゃあ、こっちも見覚えがあんな。
ウチの事務所は旧市街にあるんだが。

engChrName: Anyway, you guys should probably sit down. It's going to take me a while to explain everything.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you guys should probably sit down.
It's going to take me a while to explain everything.
jpnChrName: そうだったんだね……！ 僕たちの家と同じ街区だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんだね……！
僕たちの家と同じ街区だったんだ。

engChrName: So to give you guys a brief introduction, as you know, my name's Jess. I'm a singer and songwriter—if I can even really call myself that.
engSearchText:
So to give you guys a brief introduction, as you know,
my name's Jess. I'm a singer and songwriter—if I can
even really call myself that.
jpnChrName: 僕たち、というと？
jpnSearchText: 僕たち、というと？

engChrName: I just started doing all of that pretty recently, so it's not like I'm famous or anything close to that.
engSearchText:
I just started doing all of that pretty recently, so it's
not like I'm famous or anything close to that.
jpnChrName: 幼馴染と田舎から首都にやって来てね。 ルームシェアをしているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
幼馴染と田舎から首都にやって来てね。
ルームシェアをしているんだ。

engChrName: Well, I thought your music was really great when I heard it earlier! You should be proud of it.
engSearchText:
Well, I thought your music was really great when I
heard it earlier! You should be proud of it.
jpnChrName: 旧市街の花屋でバイトをしている 友達のレイモンドと──
jpnSearchText:
旧市街の花屋でバイトをしている
友達のレイモンドと──

engChrName: Was it really? Aww! I wish I could've heard it!
engSearchText: Was it really? Aww! I wish I could've heard it!
jpnChrName: ブティックでバイトをしている 彼のお姉さん──キャロルの３人でね。
jpnSearchText:
ブティックでバイトをしている
彼のお姉さん──キャロルの３人でね。

engChrName: Haha, thanks. You girls are too kind.
engSearchText: Haha, thanks. You girls are too kind.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そうだったのか。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、そうだったのか。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, I feel like I've been seeing you guys more and more around my neighborhood.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, I feel like I've been seeing
you guys more and more around my neighborhood.
jpnChrName: でも、《裏解決屋》について 余計な事は言い触らさないから安心して。
jpnSearchText:
でも、《裏解決屋》について
余計な事は言い触らさないから安心して。

engChrName: That's probably 'cause our office is located in Old Town.
engSearchText:
That's probably 'cause our office is located in
Old Town.
jpnChrName: 僕のこの依頼だって、レイモンド達には 絶対に知られる訳にはいかないから……
jpnSearchText:
僕のこの依頼だって、レイモンド達には
絶対に知られる訳にはいかないから……

engChrName: Wow! You can sing AND write songs? That's so cool! I didn't know there were people who could do both.
engSearchText:
Wow! You can sing AND write songs? That's
so cool! I didn't know there were people who could
do both.
jpnChrName: えと、依頼内容は『ネタ帳』に載っている ジェスさんの情報の削除でしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
えと、依頼内容は『ネタ帳』に載っている
ジェスさんの情報の削除でしたよね。

engChrName: Haha. I don't think it's that big of a deal, but thanks.
engSearchText: Haha. I don't think it's that big of a deal, but thanks.
jpnChrName: うん……そこでなんだけど。 君たちはジャコモという男を知ってるかな。
jpnSearchText:
うん……そこでなんだけど。
君たちはジャコモという男を知ってるかな。

engChrName: Actually, maybe it's just me, but I feel like I've seen you guys around my neighborhood before.
engSearchText:
Actually, maybe it's just me, but I feel like I've seen
you guys around my neighborhood before.
jpnChrName: ジャコモさんですか……！？
jpnSearchText: ジャコモさんですか……！？

engChrName: Think I recognize you, too, as a matter of fact. Our office is located in Old Town, if that means anything to you.
engSearchText:
Think I recognize you, too, as a matter of fact.
Our office is located in Old Town, if that means
anything to you.
jpnChrName: それなりに知ってはいるが…… その男がどうした？
jpnSearchText:
それなりに知ってはいるが……
その男がどうした？

engChrName: Oh! No kidding? That's where the three of us live!
engSearchText: Oh! No kidding? That's where the three of us live!
jpnChrName: 知ってるなら話が早くて助かるよ。
jpnSearchText: 知ってるなら話が早くて助かるよ。

engChrName: That's neat! Who else do you live with?
engSearchText: That's neat! Who else do you live with?
jpnChrName: そのネタ帳というのが ジャコモの『ゆすりネタ帳』なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そのネタ帳というのが
ジャコモの『ゆすりネタ帳』なんだ。

engChrName: I live with some friends I've known since we were kids. We all came up to Edith from the countryside and decided to room together.
engSearchText:
I live with some friends I've known since we
were kids. We all came up to Edith from the
countryside and decided to room together.
jpnChrName: ゆ、ゆすりネタ……依頼の件名にも なっていましたが、なんだか物騒ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ゆ、ゆすりネタ……依頼の件名にも
なっていましたが、なんだか物騒ですね。

engChrName: One of them is this guy named Raymond. He works at the flower shop.
engSearchText:
One of them is this guy named Raymond. He works
at the flower shop.
jpnChrName: まあアイツらしいっちゃらしいが、 悪趣味丸出しの手帳だな。
jpnSearchText:
まあアイツらしいっちゃらしいが、
悪趣味丸出しの手帳だな。

engChrName: The other is Raymond's older sister, Carol. She works at the boutique.
engSearchText:
The other is Raymond's older sister, Carol. She works
at the boutique.
jpnChrName: しかし、アンタはどういう経緯で ネタ帳に載る事になったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、アンタはどういう経緯で
ネタ帳に載る事になったんだ？

engChrName: Got'cha. Good to know.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Good to know.
jpnChrName: 実は……少し名が売れて来た時期に ライブハウスの外で待ち伏せをされてね。
jpnSearchText:
実は……少し名が売れて来た時期に
ライブハウスの外で待ち伏せをされてね。

engChrName: And just to be clear, I promise not to go around talking to people about you guys or anything.
engSearchText:
And just to be clear, I promise not to go around
talking to people about you guys or anything.
jpnChrName: 『俺はお前の秘密を知っている』……
jpnSearchText: 『俺はお前の秘密を知っている』……

engChrName: This isn't exactly the sort of request I want Raymond and Carol to know about anyway, so it's really for the best.
engSearchText:
This isn't exactly the sort of request I want Raymond
and Carol to know about anyway, so it's really for
the best.
jpnChrName: 『相手にバラされたくなければ 必要な時に俺の仕事を手伝え』と言われたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
『相手にバラされたくなければ
必要な時に俺の仕事を手伝え』と言われたんだ。

engChrName: You wrote that you wanted us to remove your information from somebody's notebook. Could you go into that a little more?
engSearchText:
You wrote that you wanted us to remove your
information from somebody's notebook. Could you
go into that a little more?
jpnChrName: 彼とはそれきりで音沙汰が無いけど…… 悪用される前に情報を消してほしいんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼とはそれきりで音沙汰が無いけど……
悪用される前に情報を消してほしいんだよ。

engChrName: Sure. But before I do, I need to ask: have you guys ever heard of a guy named Giacomo before?
engSearchText:
Sure. But before I do, I need to ask: have you guys
ever heard of a guy named Giacomo before?
jpnChrName: 同じ戦場の兵士ならいざ知らず 一般人を脅すなんて汚いやり方ですね。
jpnSearchText:
同じ戦場の兵士ならいざ知らず
一般人を脅すなんて汚いやり方ですね。

engChrName: Did you say Giacomo?!
engSearchText: Did you say Giacomo?!
jpnChrName: ……あれ？　でも待ってください。
jpnSearchText: ……あれ？　でも待ってください。

engChrName: You could say we know him—for better or for worse.
engSearchText: You could say we know him—for better or for worse.
jpnChrName: ジャコモというと、 先日ヴァンさんから話を聞いたような……？
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモというと、
先日ヴァンさんから話を聞いたような……？

engChrName: Oh, great. That saves me the trouble of having to explain who he is.
engSearchText:
Oh, great. That saves me the trouble of having to
explain who he is.
jpnChrName: ああ、ジャコモ・コンテは亡くなった──
jpnSearchText: ああ、ジャコモ・コンテは亡くなった──

engChrName: Basically, the notebook I wrote about is this one he keeps full of material to blackmail people.
engSearchText:
Basically, the notebook I wrote about is this one he
keeps full of material to blackmail people.
jpnChrName: 一般人のアンタに詳しい事情は言えないがな。
jpnSearchText: 一般人のアンタに詳しい事情は言えないがな。

engChrName: Yikes. I knew that notebook wasn't good news based on the title of your request, but that sounds super bad.
engSearchText:
Yikes. I knew that notebook wasn't good news based
on the title of your request, but that sounds super bad.
jpnChrName: それは本当なのか！？
jpnSearchText: それは本当なのか！？

engChrName: Can't say I'm surprised he'd have such a thing, but it doesn't put him in any better of a light, that's for damn sure.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm surprised he'd have such a thing, but it
doesn't put him in any better of a light, that's for
damn sure.
jpnChrName: だ、だとすれば、ネタ帳は一体どこに……
jpnSearchText: だ、だとすれば、ネタ帳は一体どこに……

engChrName: How'd you find out you were in his little black book?
engSearchText: How'd you find out you were in his little black book?
jpnChrName: 普通だったら警察に 押収されているはずですけど……
jpnSearchText:
普通だったら警察に
押収されているはずですけど……

engChrName: Well, once I started to make a name for myself doing music stuff, he ambushed me outside the concert hall one day.
engSearchText:
Well, once I started to make a name for myself doing
music stuff, he ambushed me outside the concert hall
one day.
jpnChrName: 用心深いアイツの事だ、商売道具（ネタ帳）は 警察でも簡単に見つけられねえ場所に隠すはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
用心深いアイツの事だ、商売道具（ネタ帳）は
警察でも簡単に見つけられねえ場所に隠すはずだ。

engChrName: What he said really freaked me out.
engSearchText: What he said really freaked me out.
jpnChrName: 押収されてる可能性と、発見されてない可能性、 五分五分っつう所だろう。
jpnSearchText:
押収されてる可能性と、発見されてない可能性、
五分五分っつう所だろう。

engChrName: He told me that he knew my secret and if I didn't want it getting out to the wrong guy, I'd have to help him with his work.
engSearchText:
He told me that he knew my secret and if I didn't
want it getting out to the wrong guy, I'd have to help
him with his work.
jpnChrName: そこの所がどうなってるのか、 確かめてみる価値はありそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
そこの所がどうなってるのか、
確かめてみる価値はありそうだが。

engChrName: I haven't seen Giacomo at all since then, but I want that information scrubbed out of his notebook before he has a chance to do anything with it.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen Giacomo at all since then, but I want
that information scrubbed out of his notebook before
he has a chance to do anything with it.
jpnChrName: なるほど……分かった。
jpnSearchText: なるほど……分かった。

engChrName: That's despicable! It's one thing to play dirty on the battlefield, but threatening a private citizen is just low!
engSearchText:
That's despicable! It's one thing to play dirty on the
battlefield, but threatening a private citizen is
just low!
jpnChrName: 警察に押収されてる可能性があるとしても、 君達の方で探してみてくれると助かるよ。
jpnSearchText:
警察に押収されてる可能性があるとしても、
君達の方で探してみてくれると助かるよ。

engChrName: ...Wait. Hold on a second.
engSearchText: ...Wait. Hold on a second.
jpnChrName: どうするんですか、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: どうするんですか、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Van, weren't you talking about Giacomo just the other day?
engSearchText:
Van, weren't you talking about Giacomo just the
other day?
jpnChrName: ジャコモの持っていた『ゆすりネタ帳』…… これに書かれた僕の情報を消して欲しいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモの持っていた『ゆすりネタ帳』……
これに書かれた僕の情報を消して欲しいんだ。

engChrName: Yeah, and for a reason our client here might like to know: Giacomo's dead.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and for a reason our client here might like
to know: Giacomo's dead.
jpnChrName: 悪いけど、どうか力を貸してくれないかな？
jpnSearchText: 悪いけど、どうか力を貸してくれないかな？

engChrName: I can't go into the specific circumstances of what happened with someone like you, but I figured it's worth clearin' up that much.
engSearchText:
I can't go into the specific circumstances of what
happened with someone like you, but I figured it's
worth clearin' up that much.
jpnChrName: ウチで請け負っても構わねえんだが……
jpnSearchText: ウチで請け負っても構わねえんだが……

engChrName: Are you serious?! I had no idea!
engSearchText: Are you serious?! I had no idea!
jpnChrName: 先に片付けたい案件があってな、 その後に話をさせてもらえないか。
jpnSearchText:
先に片付けたい案件があってな、
その後に話をさせてもらえないか。

engChrName: Now I'm worried... If he's dead, what could've happened to the notebook?
engSearchText:
Now I'm worried... If he's dead, what could've
happened to the notebook?
jpnChrName: うん、それで構わないよ。
jpnSearchText: うん、それで構わないよ。

engChrName: Ordinarily, something like that would be in the custody of the police.
engSearchText:
Ordinarily, something like that would be in the
custody of the police.
jpnChrName: 時間が空いたら、また来てよ。 夜になるまでここで待ってるからさ。
jpnSearchText:
時間が空いたら、また来てよ。
夜になるまでここで待ってるからさ。

engChrName: But this is Giacomo we're talking about. He wouldn't let one of the tools of his trade fall into the hands of the police so easily.
engSearchText:
But this is Giacomo we're talking about. He wouldn't
let one of the tools of his trade fall into the hands of
the police so easily.
jpnChrName: そういう事なら引き受けさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: そういう事なら引き受けさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: My bet is he kept it hidden. Odds are about 50-50 as to whether the cops've managed to uncover it or not.
