engSearchText:
My bet is he kept it hidden. Odds are about 50-50 as
to whether the cops've managed to uncover it or not.
jpnChrName: とりあえずは……この前行った アイツの隠れ家の２か所を捜索してみるかね。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえずは……この前行った
アイツの隠れ家の２か所を捜索してみるかね。

engChrName: It's probably in our best interests to figure out where he stashed it or what's become of it.
engSearchText:
It's probably in our best interests to figure out where
he stashed it or what's become of it.
jpnChrName: 他にも隠れ家はあるだろうが、 そこから手掛かりが見つかれば御の字だ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも隠れ家はあるだろうが、
そこから手掛かりが見つかれば御の字だ。

engChrName: Sure, that makes sense to me.
engSearchText: Sure, that makes sense to me.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 行き方も把握していますから。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
行き方も把握していますから。

engChrName: Even if the police might have it in their possession, I'd appreciate you guys going out and checking just to make sure.
engSearchText:
Even if the police might have it in their possession,
I'd appreciate you guys going out and checking just to
make sure.
jpnChrName: わたしも勉強させてもらいますっ！
jpnSearchText: わたしも勉強させてもらいますっ！

engChrName: What do you say, Van? Are we gonna help him?
engSearchText: What do you say, Van? Are we gonna help him?
jpnChrName: 捜査に一区切りがついたら 結果に関わらず連絡させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
捜査に一区切りがついたら
結果に関わらず連絡させてもらう。

engChrName: There's some information about me in Giacomo's blackmail notebook I need you guys to erase for me.
engSearchText:
There's some information about me in Giacomo's
blackmail notebook I need you guys to erase for me.
jpnChrName: それまで適当に待っていてくれ。
jpnSearchText: それまで適当に待っていてくれ。

engChrName: Would you guys be willing to help me? You're the only ones I can turn to here.
engSearchText:
Would you guys be willing to help me? You're the
only ones I can turn to here.
jpnChrName: 分かった、どうかよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText: 分かった、どうかよろしく頼むよ。

engChrName: I'm not against us taking up your case.
engSearchText: I'm not against us taking up your case.
jpnChrName: クエスト【ゆすりネタの抹消依頼】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>ゆすりネタの抹消依頼<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: But we got some other stuff that needs our attention first. Mind if we come back and talk to you again later?
engSearchText:
But we got some other stuff that needs our
attention first. Mind if we come back and talk to you
again later?
jpnChrName: ……という訳で、この手帳が アンタの探してた『ゆすりネタ帳』だ。
jpnSearchText:
……という訳で、この手帳が
アンタの探してた『ゆすりネタ帳』だ。

engChrName: Sure, that's fine. At this point, I just appreciate you guys hearing me out.
engSearchText:
Sure, that's fine. At this point, I just appreciate you
guys hearing me out.
jpnChrName: このページにアンタの情報が 載ってる事も確認させてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
このページにアンタの情報が
載ってる事も確認させてもらった。

engChrName: No need to rush. I'll be hanging around here till nightfall, so take your time.
engSearchText:
No need to rush. I'll be hanging around here till
nightfall, so take your time.
jpnChrName: 消したかった情報ってのは コイツで間違いないか？
jpnSearchText:
消したかった情報ってのは
コイツで間違いないか？

engChrName: Don't worry. We'll take the case.
engSearchText: Don't worry. We'll take the case.
jpnChrName: …………ああ、間違いないよ。
jpnSearchText: …………ああ、間違いないよ。

engChrName: Our first stops should probably be Giacomo's two hideouts that we visited before. We should sift through 'em and see what we find.
engSearchText:
Our first stops should probably be Giacomo's two
hideouts that we visited before. We should sift
through 'em and see what we find.
jpnChrName: これが絶対に隠し通したかった 僕の“ネタ”っていうやつだ。
jpnSearchText:
これが絶対に隠し通したかった
僕の“ネタ”っていうやつだ。

engChrName: I'm sure the guy had other spots while he was alive, but with any luck, something'll turn up and we won't have to go through any more trouble.
engSearchText:
I'm sure the guy had other spots while he was alive,
but with any luck, something'll turn up and we won't
have to go through any more trouble.
jpnChrName: ……このページとこの写真、 破いて捨ててしまっても構わないかな？
jpnSearchText:
……このページとこの写真、
破いて捨ててしまっても構わないかな？

engChrName: That makes sense. We already know where the two hideouts are, so we might as well investigate them.
engSearchText:
That makes sense. We already know where the two
hideouts are, so we might as well investigate them.
jpnChrName: ああ、問題ないぜ。 好きにしてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、問題ないぜ。
好きにしてくれや。

engChrName: Sounds good to me! I can't wait to see you guys do your thing! I'm sure I'm gonna learn a lot about being a spriggan!
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me! I can't wait to see you guys do
your thing! I'm sure I'm gonna learn a lot about being
a spriggan!
jpnChrName: ジェスは自分の情報が載ったページと写真を 細かく破った。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスは自分の情報が載ったページと写真を
細かく破った。

engChrName: Once we come to some sort of conclusion, we'll be sure to contact you with whatever news we have.
engSearchText:
Once we come to some sort of conclusion, we'll be
sure to contact you with whatever news we have.
jpnChrName: ふう……これで少しは安心して 過ごす事が出来るかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……これで少しは安心して
過ごす事が出来るかな。

engChrName: Until then, sit tight. We've got you covered.
engSearchText: Until then, sit tight. We've got you covered.
jpnChrName: ここまできたら、君たちにはバレてるよね。 僕がどうしても隠したかった事……
jpnSearchText:
ここまできたら、君たちにはバレてるよね。
僕がどうしても隠したかった事……

engChrName: Perfect. Thank you guys so much for doing this! You don't know how much I appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Perfect. Thank you guys so much for doing this!
You don't know how much I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 僕の気持ちを知られたくなかった相手について……
jpnSearchText: 僕の気持ちを知られたくなかった相手について……

engChrName: Quest Blacking Out Blackmail started!
engSearchText: Quest Blacking Out Blackmail started!
jpnChrName: 確かに察しは付いてるが……
jpnSearchText: 確かに察しは付いてるが……

engChrName: It took some doing, but we managed to track down Giacomo's little black book.
engSearchText:
It took some doing, but we managed to track down
Giacomo's little black book.
jpnChrName: そういう“志向”は今時珍しくも何ともねえだろ。 頑なに隠す必要もねえと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
そういう“志向”は今時珍しくも何ともねえだろ。
頑なに隠す必要もねえと思うけどな。

engChrName: We found the information concerning you on this page here.
engSearchText:
We found the information concerning you on this
page here.
jpnChrName: ああ、それは分かってる……その事に関しては 世間に公表されたって別に構わない。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それは分かってる……その事に関しては
世間に公表されたって別に構わない。

engChrName: Could you take a look at it and confirm this is what you want gone?
engSearchText:
Could you take a look at it and confirm this is what
you want gone?
jpnChrName: だけど僕は…… あの２人との今の関係を守りたいんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
だけど僕は……
あの２人との今の関係を守りたいんだよ。

engChrName: ...Yes, this is it.
engSearchText: ...Yes, this is it.
jpnChrName: だからどうか、他言はしないでもらえないかな。
jpnSearchText: だからどうか、他言はしないでもらえないかな。

engChrName: This is the information about me that I absolutely don't want getting out at any cost.
engSearchText:
This is the information about me that I absolutely
don't want getting out at any cost.
jpnChrName: ああ、勿論だ。 ウチの事務所の信用問題に関わるんでな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、勿論だ。
ウチの事務所の信用問題に関わるんでな。

engChrName: Is it...all right if I tear out the page and photo and throw them away?
engSearchText:
Is it...all right if I tear out the page and photo and
throw them away?
jpnChrName: はい、守秘義務は守らせてもらいます。
jpnSearchText: はい、守秘義務は守らせてもらいます。

engChrName: Totally. Do whatever you want with 'em. They're yours now.
engSearchText:
Totally. Do whatever you want with 'em.
They're yours now.
jpnChrName: ……？　よく分かりませんけど、 当然わたしも他言はしませんよ！
jpnSearchText:
……？　よく分かりませんけど、
当然わたしも他言はしませんよ！

engChrName: Jess proceeded to tear the notebook page and photograph into fine pieces.
engSearchText:
Jess proceeded to tear the notebook page and
photograph into fine pieces.
jpnChrName: ありがとう…… 疑うような事を言ってごめんね。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう……
疑うような事を言ってごめんね。

engChrName: Phew... I think I'll rest a little easier knowing that stuff isn't out there anymore.
engSearchText:
Phew... I think I'll rest a little easier
knowing that stuff isn't out there anymore.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、この手帳は返そうかな。 他の人のネタも色々と載ってるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、この手帳は返そうかな。
他の人のネタも色々と載ってるみたいだし。

engChrName: Although, no offense, if I'm being completely honest, I wish you guys hadn't ended up finding out about my...circumstances.
engSearchText:
Although, no offense, if I'm being completely honest,
I wish you guys hadn't ended up finding out about
my...circumstances.
jpnChrName: 後の始末は……君たちに任せるよ。
jpnSearchText: 後の始末は……君たちに任せるよ。

engChrName: As for who those lyrics were about, well...
engSearchText: As for who those lyrics were about, well...
jpnChrName: ああ、そんじゃ預からせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そんじゃ預からせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I think I have an idea of who it might be.
engSearchText: I think I have an idea of who it might be.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、色々とありがとう。 ……君たちには本当に世話になったよ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、色々とありがとう。
……君たちには本当に世話になったよ。

engChrName: I'll say this: there are plenty of people like you who live out in the open these days. You shouldn't feel like you have to keep that bottled up.
engSearchText:
I'll say this: there are plenty of people like you who
live out in the open these days. You shouldn't feel like
you have to keep that bottled up.
jpnChrName: 報酬は振り込んでおくから確認してくれ。
jpnSearchText: 報酬は振り込んでおくから確認してくれ。

engChrName: Yeah, I know that. It's not like I would really mind if people in society knew who I was. That's not what I'm worried about.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I know that. It's not like I would really mind if
people in society knew who I was. That's not what
I'm worried about.
jpnChrName: さてと、後はこの手帳の始末だけだな。
jpnSearchText: さてと、後はこの手帳の始末だけだな。

engChrName: I'm more...trying not to ruin what I have with my childhood friends, if that makes sense.
engSearchText:
I'm more...trying not to ruin what I have with my
childhood friends, if that makes sense.
jpnChrName: ジャコモさんの『ゆすりネタ帳』…… これからはヴァンさんが使うんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモさんの『ゆすりネタ帳』……
これからはヴァンさんが使うんでしょうか？

engChrName: So if you guys could still keep all of that to yourselves, I'd really, really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
So if you guys could still keep all of that to yourselves,
I'd really, really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: いや、こんな情報の出所も怪しいようなモンを 持ってても仕方ねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、こんな情報の出所も怪しいようなモンを
持ってても仕方ねえだろ。

engChrName: Of course. It'd be bad for business if people thought they couldn't trust us with their personal details like that.
engSearchText:
Of course. It'd be bad for business if people thought
they couldn't trust us with their personal details
like that.
jpnChrName: コイツは警察に引き渡すぜ。 ここぞとばかりに恩を売る形でな。
jpnSearchText:
コイツは警察に引き渡すぜ。
ここぞとばかりに恩を売る形でな。

engChrName: Absolutely. We promise we'll maintain the strictest confidentiality about your case.
engSearchText:
Absolutely. We promise we'll maintain the strictest
confidentiality about your case.
jpnChrName: あはは……ヴァンさんらしいですね。
jpnSearchText: あはは……ヴァンさんらしいですね。

engChrName: Uhh, I don't really understand what you guys are talking about, but don't worry! We'll never tell anybody about you no matter what!
engSearchText:
Uhh, I don't really understand what you guys are
talking about, but don't worry! We'll never tell
anybody about you no matter what!
jpnChrName: その後ヴァン達は警察署に足を運び、 重要証拠としてゆすりネタ帳を提出──
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァン達は警察署に足を運び、
重要証拠としてゆすりネタ帳を提出──

engChrName: Thank you. I'm sorry if it sounded like I don't trust you guys. I just...needed that extra reassurance, is all.
engSearchText:
Thank you. I'm sorry if it sounded like I don't trust
you guys. I just...needed that extra reassurance, is all.
jpnChrName: 事情に明るいダスワニ警部の下に届けられるよう 話を通してもらう事となったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
事情に明るいダスワニ警部の下に届けられるよう
話を通してもらう事となったのだった。

engChrName: Anyway, you guys can have the notebook back now. I'm not the only one in it, so I really shouldn't be the one to hold on to it.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you guys can have the notebook back now.
I'm not the only one in it, so I really shouldn't be the
one to hold on to it.
jpnChrName: クエスト【ゆすりネタの抹消依頼】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>ゆすりネタの抹消依頼<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: I'll let you guys figure out how to dispose of it, if that's okay.
engSearchText:
I'll let you guys figure out how to dispose of it, if
that's okay.
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: No problem. We're more than happy to handle that.
engSearchText: No problem. We're more than happy to handle that.
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: I think that's it for me. Thank you guys so, so much for doing this. You don't know how relieved I am to have all of that behind me...
engSearchText:
I think that's it for me. Thank you guys so, so much
for doing this. You don't know how relieved I am to
have all of that behind me...
jpnChrName: アンタが解決屋に依頼を出したエイミーか？
jpnSearchText: アンタが解決屋に依頼を出したエイミーか？

engChrName: I'll deposit the money into your account soon. See you all later!
engSearchText:
I'll deposit the money into your account soon.
See you all later!
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。

engChrName: All right—now to take care of that notebook once and for all.
engSearchText:
All right—now to take care of that notebook once
and for all.
jpnChrName: 貴方達が噂の……！ 良かった、来てくれたのね。
jpnSearchText:
貴方達が噂の……！
良かった、来てくれたのね。

engChrName: What a scary thing that notebook is. Are you planning to use it for yourself, Van?
engSearchText:
What a scary thing that notebook is. Are you
planning to use it for yourself, Van?
jpnChrName: 申し訳ないけど、早速依頼の説明を させてもらってもいいかしら。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ないけど、早速依頼の説明を
させてもらってもいいかしら。

engChrName: No way. Considering how Giacomo must've sourced that info, keepin' it would be asking for nothing but trouble.
engSearchText:
No way. Considering how Giacomo must've sourced
that info, keepin' it would be asking for nothing
but trouble.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼む。

engChrName: I'm turning it over to the cops. It'll be a good way to get them to owe us a favor, digging up something as valuable as this.
engSearchText:
I'm turning it over to the cops. It'll be a good way to
get them to owe us a favor, digging up something as
valuable as this.
jpnChrName: 依頼内容は、行方不明になってしまった 恋人の方の捜索という事でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容は、行方不明になってしまった
恋人の方の捜索という事でしたね。

engChrName: It's always give-and-take with you, Van, isn't it?
engSearchText: It's always give-and-take with you, Van, isn't it?
jpnChrName: 依頼内容は、行方不明になってしまった 恋人さんの捜索っていう事でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容は、行方不明になってしまった
恋人さんの捜索っていう事でしたね。

engChrName: From there, the party did exactly as Van suggested, submitting the notebook to the police station as key evidence in the murder case.
engSearchText:
From there, the party did exactly as Van suggested,
submitting the notebook to the police station as key
evidence in the murder case.
jpnChrName: 依頼内容は、行方不明になっちまった 恋人の捜索だったか？
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容は、行方不明になっちまった
恋人の捜索だったか？

engChrName: They asked that it be delivered straight to Inspector Daswani, who would know exactly what to do with it.
engSearchText:
They asked that it be delivered straight to Inspector
Daswani, who would know exactly what to do with it.
jpnChrName: そいつが行方不明になるまでの間に 何があったか聞かせてもらえるか。
jpnSearchText:
そいつが行方不明になるまでの間に
何があったか聞かせてもらえるか。

engChrName: Quest Blacking Out Blackmail completed!
engSearchText: Quest Blacking Out Blackmail completed!
jpnChrName: ええ……まず、彼の名前はマルクと言うの。 付き合ってもう４年になるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……まず、彼の名前はマルクと言うの。
付き合ってもう４年になるわ。

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: でも……彼は俗に言う半グレでね。
jpnSearchText: でも……彼は俗に言う半グレでね。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 闇バイトとか何とか、 悪い事を色々とやってきたみたいなのよ。
jpnSearchText:
闇バイトとか何とか、
悪い事を色々とやってきたみたいなのよ。

engChrName: 'Scuse me. Are you Amy?
engSearchText: 'Scuse me. Are you Amy?
jpnChrName: だから行方不明になったと分かった時も 警察に連絡は出来なかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
だから行方不明になったと分かった時も
警察に連絡は出来なかったわ。

engChrName: We're from Arkride Solutions. Did you need our help with somethin'?
engSearchText:
We're from Arkride Solutions. Did you need our help
with somethin'?
jpnChrName: そうだったんですね。 だから私達に依頼を……
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんですね。
だから私達に依頼を……

engChrName: Oh! Yes, I do! Thank you guys for coming. I can't believe you're actually real!
engSearchText:
Oh! Yes, I do! Thank you guys for coming. I can't
believe you're actually real!
jpnChrName: なるほど、だから裏解決屋に依頼を……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、だから裏解決屋に依頼を……

engChrName: Not to be rude, but do you mind if I get straight to business and explain what I need?
engSearchText:
Not to be rude, but do you mind if I get straight to
business and explain what I need?
jpnChrName: だからこそ裏解決屋に依頼したって訳か。
jpnSearchText: だからこそ裏解決屋に依頼したって訳か。

engChrName: Not at all. Let's get down to it.
engSearchText: Not at all. Let's get down to it.
jpnChrName: ああでも、誤解しないでほしいんだけど……
jpnSearchText: ああでも、誤解しないでほしいんだけど……

engChrName: Basically, you want us to search for your missing boyfriend, right?
engSearchText:
Basically, you want us to search for your missing
boyfriend, right?
jpnChrName: 半グレって言っても 彼は筋は通すような真っすぐな性格の人でね。
jpnSearchText:
半グレって言っても
彼は筋は通すような真っすぐな性格の人でね。

engChrName: You wrote that you want us to find your missing boyfriend, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You wrote that you want us to find your missing
boyfriend, didn't you?
jpnChrName: 付き合うようになってから、 更生する事を誓ってくれたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
付き合うようになってから、
更生する事を誓ってくれたのよ。

engChrName: Long story short, you need us to go hunt down your missing boyfriend, yeah?
engSearchText:
Long story short, you need us to go hunt down your
missing boyfriend, yeah?
jpnChrName: 将来的には彼との結婚まで考えていたわ……
jpnSearchText: 将来的には彼との結婚まで考えていたわ……

engChrName: Could you tell us about what happened leading up to his disappearance?
engSearchText:
Could you tell us about what happened leading up to
his disappearance?
jpnChrName: そこで一か月前、ようやく不良グループを 抜ける準備が出来たと話してくれたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
そこで一か月前、ようやく不良グループを
抜ける準備が出来たと話してくれたのよ。

engChrName: Sure. So, my boyfriend's name is Mark. We've been going out for four years now.
engSearchText:
Sure. So, my boyfriend's name is Mark. We've been
going out for four years now.
jpnChrName: でも……その後、彼とは全く連絡が 付かなくなってしまったの。
jpnSearchText:
でも……その後、彼とは全く連絡が
付かなくなってしまったの。

engChrName: Things have been great between us, except...he's in a gang.
engSearchText:
Things have been great between us, except...he's in
a gang.
jpnChrName: 不良グループから抜けようとした所で 行方不明になっちまった訳か。
jpnSearchText:
不良グループから抜けようとした所で
行方不明になっちまった訳か。

engChrName: They've had him do shady jobs and all kinds of bad things since he joined from what I can tell.
engSearchText:
They've had him do shady jobs and all kinds of bad
things since he joined from what I can tell.
jpnChrName: 色々と考えられるが、 そいつはきな臭せえ話だな……
jpnSearchText:
色々と考えられるが、
そいつはきな臭せえ話だな……

engChrName: That's why when I knew he was missing, I couldn't turn to the police.
engSearchText:
That's why when I knew he was missing, I couldn't
turn to the police.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、その不良グループの チーム名は分かるか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、その不良グループの
チーム名は分かるか？

engChrName: And that's why you turned to us. That makes sense.
engSearchText: And that's why you turned to us. That makes sense.
jpnChrName: ええ……確か《ディザイア》とか言ったかしら。
jpnSearchText: ええ……確か《ディザイア》とか言ったかしら。

engChrName: Oh, so that's why you contacted us. I get it now.
engSearchText: Oh, so that's why you contacted us. I get it now.
jpnChrName: 彼が詳しい事は何も教えてくれなくてね。 名前しか分からないのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
彼が詳しい事は何も教えてくれなくてね。
名前しか分からないのだけど……

engChrName: And so you figured you had to call in a spriggan if you wanted to get to the bottom of it?
engSearchText:
And so you figured you had to call in a spriggan if you
wanted to get to the bottom of it?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、ご存知ですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、ご存知ですか？

engChrName: Yes, exactly. But, I should make something clear about Mark.
engSearchText:
Yes, exactly. But, I should make something clear
about Mark.
jpnChrName: でぃざいあ……？ ヴァンさんなら知ってますか？
jpnSearchText:
でぃざいあ……？
ヴァンさんなら知ってますか？

engChrName: He might be in a gang, but deep down, he's such a reasonable, honest guy. Really!
engSearchText:
He might be in a gang, but deep down, he's such a
reasonable, honest guy. Really!
jpnChrName: 《ディザイア》？ ククッ、随分とイタイセンスをしてやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
《ディザイア》？
ククッ、随分とイタイセンスをしてやがるな。

engChrName: Once we started dating, he promised me he would get his act together and change his ways.
engSearchText:
Once we started dating, he promised me he would get
his act together and change his ways.
jpnChrName: 心当たりはあんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 心当たりはあんのかよ？

engChrName: I was even thinking about marrying him in the future.
engSearchText: I was even thinking about marrying him in the future.
jpnChrName: ああ、最近たまに名前を聞くな。 だが俺も詳しい事までは知らねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、最近たまに名前を聞くな。
だが俺も詳しい事までは知らねえ。

engChrName: Then a month ago, he told me that he was finally going to leave the gang for good.
engSearchText:
Then a month ago, he told me that he was finally
going to leave the gang for good.
jpnChrName: 依頼を引き受けるなら、 まずはそこから調べる必要がありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
依頼を引き受けるなら、
まずはそこから調べる必要がありそうだな。

engChrName: That's the last I ever heard from him. I haven't seen hide nor hair of him since.
engSearchText:
That's the last I ever heard from him. I haven't seen
hide nor hair of him since.
jpnChrName: 自分でも出来る限り調べたけど、 マルクの行方は掴めなかった。
jpnSearchText:
自分でも出来る限り調べたけど、
マルクの行方は掴めなかった。

engChrName: So he vanished right as he was about to pull out, huh? That's some timing.
engSearchText:
So he vanished right as he was about to pull out, huh?
That's some timing.
jpnChrName: 貴方達しか頼れる人がいないの…… どうか、依頼を引き受けてもらえないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
貴方達しか頼れる人がいないの……
どうか、依頼を引き受けてもらえないかしら。

engChrName: Any number of things could've happened, but it all definitely raises some eyebrows.
engSearchText:
Any number of things could've happened, but it all
definitely raises some eyebrows.
jpnChrName: ……自分でも出来る限り調べたけど、 マルクの行方は掴めなかった。
jpnSearchText:
……自分でも出来る限り調べたけど、
マルクの行方は掴めなかった。

engChrName: You know the name of the gang he belongs to, by any chance?
engSearchText:
You know the name of the gang he belongs to, by
any chance?
jpnChrName: 貴方達しか頼れる人がいないの…… どうか、マルクを探してくれないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
貴方達しか頼れる人がいないの……
どうか、マルクを探してくれないかしら。

engChrName: Yeah, I'm pretty sure it's called 'Desire' or something along those lines.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'm pretty sure it's called 'Desire' or something
along those lines.
jpnChrName: そうだな……引き受けても構わねえが、 他にも用事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……引き受けても構わねえが、
他にも用事があってな。

engChrName: That's all I really know. He never went into any more detail beyond the name when we talked.
engSearchText:
That's all I really know. He never went into any more
detail beyond the name when we talked.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、少し待ってもらえるか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、少し待ってもらえるか？

engChrName: Have you heard of them, Van?
engSearchText: Have you heard of them, Van?
jpnChrName: 分かったわ…… それなら私はここで待たせてもらうわね。
jpnSearchText:
分かったわ……
それなら私はここで待たせてもらうわね。

engChrName: Does that ring any bells, Van?
engSearchText: Does that ring any bells, Van?
jpnChrName: ああ分かった、ウチで請け負ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ分かった、ウチで請け負ってやるよ。

engChrName: Desire, huh? What a corny-ass name for a bunch of goons.
engSearchText:
Desire, huh? What a corny-ass name for a bunch
of goons.
jpnChrName: ……！　ありがとう、恩に着るわ。
jpnSearchText: ……！　ありがとう、恩に着るわ。

engChrName: You know who those people are, chief?
engSearchText: You know who those people are, chief?
jpnChrName: ハッ、礼を言うのは早いぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、礼を言うのは早いぜ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I've heard that name come up here and there recently. Can't say I know all that much about them myself, though.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I've heard that name come up here and
there recently. Can't say I know all that much about
them myself, though.
jpnChrName: 状況を整理するが……まず、マルクとやらは 《ディザイア》から足を洗おうとしてた訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
状況を整理するが……まず、マルクとやらは
《ディザイア》から足を洗おうとしてた訳だ。

engChrName: If we decide to search for this guy, we'll have to see what we can learn about them first.
engSearchText:
If we decide to search for this guy, we'll have to see
what we can learn about them first.
jpnChrName: そこで音信不通になって一か月経つ…… っつう事だったな。
jpnSearchText:
そこで音信不通になって一か月経つ……
っつう事だったな。

engChrName: I tried as much as I could to look into it, but I couldn't figure out where Mark went.
engSearchText:
I tried as much as I could to look into it, but I
couldn't figure out where Mark went.
jpnChrName: 状況から考えて……チームから脱退する時に トラブルがあったのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
状況から考えて……チームから脱退する時に
トラブルがあったのかもしれません。

engChrName: You guys are the only hope I have now. Please, is there any way you could possibly help...?
engSearchText:
You guys are the only hope I have now. Please, is
there any way you could possibly help...?
jpnChrName: それを調査する為にも、まずは《ディザイア》を 知っている方に話を聞けるといいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
それを調査する為にも、まずは《ディザイア》を
知っている方に話を聞けるといいのですが……

engChrName: I tried as much as I could to track my boyfriend down, but I couldn't figure out where he went.
engSearchText:
I tried as much as I could to track my boyfriend
down, but I couldn't figure out where he went.
jpnChrName: もしかして、チームから脱退する時に トラブルがあったのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
もしかして、チームから脱退する時に
トラブルがあったのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: You guys are the only hope I have now. Please, is there any way you could possibly help...?
engSearchText:
You guys are the only hope I have now. Please, is
there any way you could possibly help...?
jpnChrName: その辺りを調査する為にも、《ディザイア》を 知っている方に話を聞けるといいんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
その辺りを調査する為にも、《ディザイア》を
知っている方に話を聞けるといいんですけど……

engChrName: Hmm... Could you give us a little time? I'm not against taking up your case, but there's somethin' else we need to handle first.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Could you give us a little time? I'm not
against taking up your case, but there's somethin' else
we need to handle first.
jpnChrName: 十中八九、チームから抜ける時に トラブルが起きたんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
十中八九、チームから抜ける時に
トラブルが起きたんだろ。

engChrName: I hate to do this, but can we come back and talk to you later?
engSearchText:
I hate to do this, but can we come back and talk to
you later?
jpnChrName: その辺りの調査をする為にも、《ディザイア》を 知ってるヤツから話を聞かねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りの調査をする為にも、《ディザイア》を
知ってるヤツから話を聞かねえとな。

engChrName: I... I understand. I'll wait here until you're ready. Thanks for listening...
engSearchText:
I... I understand. I'll wait here until you're ready.
Thanks for listening...
jpnChrName: ああ、それなら俺に心当たりがある。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それなら俺に心当たりがある。

engChrName: Sure, I don't see why not. Consider us on board.
engSearchText: Sure, I don't see why not. Consider us on board.
jpnChrName: 相手が半グレっつう事なら、武器の世話に なった事がある可能性が高い。
jpnSearchText:
相手が半グレっつう事なら、武器の世話に
なった事がある可能性が高い。

engChrName: *sniffle* Oh, thank you! You don't know how much that means to me!
engSearchText:
*sniffle* Oh, thank you! You don't know how much
that means to me!
jpnChrName: 駅前通りにある百貨店のガンショップに 話を聞いてみてもいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
駅前通りにある百貨店のガンショップに
話を聞いてみてもいいかもな。

engChrName: Don't go thanking us just yet—we haven't even gotten started.
engSearchText:
Don't go thanking us just yet—we haven't even
gotten started.
jpnChrName: 皆さん頼もしいですね…… 本当に依頼を出して良かった。
jpnSearchText:
皆さん頼もしいですね……
本当に依頼を出して良かった。

engChrName: Let's review what we know and then figure out our plan of attack. Basically, our man Mark was determined to get out of Desire so he could live clean.
engSearchText:
Let's review what we know and then figure out our
plan of attack. Basically, our man Mark was
determined to get out of Desire so he could live clean.
jpnChrName: マルクの事──どうかよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: マルクの事──どうかよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: But after making that intention clear, he's been incommunicado for a month, which brings us to today.
engSearchText:
But after making that intention clear, he's been
incommunicado for a month, which brings us
to today.
jpnChrName: ああ、詳しい事が分かり次第 アンタに連絡させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、詳しい事が分かり次第
アンタに連絡させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Given what we know, it's entirely possible he ran into some kind of trouble once he actually tried to leave.
engSearchText:
Given what we know, it's entirely possible he ran into
some kind of trouble once he actually tried to leave.
jpnChrName: クエスト【行方不明になった彼】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>行方不明になった彼<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: If we could find someone who knows about the gang, it might be a good idea to ask if they have any idea what happened. How does that sound, Van?
engSearchText:
If we could find someone who knows about the
gang, it might be a good idea to ask if they have any
idea what happened. How does that sound, Van?
jpnChrName: 思っていたよりも早かったわね、 裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
思っていたよりも早かったわね、
裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: He could've gotten into some kinda trouble once he actually tried to leave. That's what I think.
engSearchText:
He could've gotten into some kinda trouble once he
actually tried to leave. That's what I think.
jpnChrName: それで、マルクについて情報は掴めたの……？ 些細な事でも構わないから教えて。
jpnSearchText:
それで、マルクについて情報は掴めたの……？
些細な事でも構わないから教えて。

engChrName: Maybe we should try searching for someone who knows about the gang and ask if they know what happened to him. What do you think, Van?
engSearchText:
Maybe we should try searching for someone who
knows about the gang and ask if they know what
happened to him. What do you think, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: My bet's things didn't exactly go to plan once the guy actually tried to pull out.
engSearchText:
My bet's things didn't exactly go to plan once the guy
actually tried to pull out.
jpnChrName: それは…………
jpnSearchText: それは…………

engChrName: Probably need to find someone with an in to the gang and talk to them—see if they have any clue what happened to the guy.
engSearchText:
Probably need to find someone with an in to the gang
and talk to them—see if they have any clue what
happened to the guy.
jpnChrName: どうすんだよ、アークライド。
jpnSearchText: どうすんだよ、アークライド。

engChrName: You read my mind. I think I know just the person we should hit up.
engSearchText:
You read my mind. I think I know just the person we
should hit up.
jpnChrName: ああ、分かってる。
jpnSearchText: ああ、分かってる。

engChrName: If we're talkin' about a gangster here, then chances are good he's had his fair share of weapons business to take care of from time to time.
engSearchText:
If we're talkin' about a gangster here, then chances
are good he's had his fair share of weapons business to
take care of from time to time.
jpnChrName: （真実を知りたい依頼主の意志を尊重するか……）
jpnSearchText: （真実を知りたい依頼主の意志を尊重するか……）

engChrName: Might wanna stop by the gun shop in the department store over on Station Street and have a talk with the shopkeeper.
engSearchText:
Might wanna stop by the gun shop in the department
store over on Station Street and have a talk with
the shopkeeper.
jpnChrName: （はたまた、彼女を悲しませたくねえっつう   マルクの遺志を尊重するか……）
jpnSearchText:
（はたまた、彼女を悲しませたくねえっつう
マルクの遺志を尊重するか……）

engChrName: Wow! You guys are already so on top of things! I'm so glad I decided to reach out to you.
engSearchText:
Wow! You guys are already so on top of things!
I'm so glad I decided to reach out to you.
jpnChrName: （いずれにせよ依頼主を   傷つける結果になっちまうだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（いずれにせよ依頼主を
傷つける結果になっちまうだろう。）

engChrName: Well, thanks for helping me find Mark. I'll leave it in your capable hands to figure out things now.
engSearchText:
Well, thanks for helping me find Mark. I'll leave it in
your capable hands to figure out things now.
jpnChrName: （だからこそここは──   俺なりの選択をさせてもらうぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（だからこそここは──
俺なりの選択をさせてもらうぜ。）

engChrName: You can always count on us professionals. We'll contact you again once we have more information about him. Till then, sit tight.
engSearchText:
You can always count on us professionals.
We'll contact you again once we have more
information about him. Till then, sit tight.
jpnChrName: （……ここは依頼主の意志を尊重させてもらうか。）
jpnSearchText: （……ここは依頼主の意志を尊重させてもらうか。）

engChrName: Quest A Lost Lover started!
engSearchText: Quest A Lost Lover started!
jpnChrName: 実はマルクの友人から手紙を預かったんだ。
jpnSearchText: 実はマルクの友人から手紙を預かったんだ。

engChrName: That was fast! I didn't expect to see you guys again so soon.
engSearchText:
That was fast! I didn't expect to see you guys again
so soon.
jpnChrName: まずはこれを読んでもらった上で、 マルクに何があったのか説明させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
まずはこれを読んでもらった上で、
マルクに何があったのか説明させてもらう。

engChrName: Does that mean you found some kind of lead on Mark? It's okay if it's nothing big. I'll take anything you have! I want to know.
engSearchText:
Does that mean you found some kind of lead
on Mark? It's okay if it's nothing big. I'll take
anything you have! I want to know.
jpnChrName: この字……本当にマルクのものだわ。
jpnSearchText: この字……本当にマルクのものだわ。

engChrName: Err, Van? What should we say?
engSearchText: Err, Van? What should we say?
jpnChrName: それに……これを書いたのは、 仕事に行く前日の夜ですって……？
jpnSearchText:
それに……これを書いたのは、
仕事に行く前日の夜ですって……？

engChrName: Uhh, about that...
engSearchText: Uhh, about that...

engChrName: What's it gonna be, chief? Need to say something.
engSearchText: What's it gonna be, chief? Need to say something.
jpnChrName: その後、手紙を読み終えて涙を流すエイミーに ヴァン達はネットニュースと共に真実を伝えたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、手紙を読み終えて涙を流すエイミーに
ヴァン達はネットニュースと共に真実を伝えたのだった。

engChrName: I know. I'm just trying to figure out how to put it. Gimme a sec.
engSearchText:
I know. I'm just trying to figure out how to put it.
Gimme a sec.
jpnChrName: ……マルクが大丈夫だって言うから。 素直に信じてしまったのよ……
jpnSearchText:
……マルクが大丈夫だって言うから。
素直に信じてしまったのよ……

engChrName: (I can either respect Amy's wishes here and give her the cold, hard truth...)
engSearchText:
(I can either respect Amy's wishes here and give her
the cold, hard truth...)
jpnChrName: チームを抜ける事は簡単じゃないって、 私も分かっていたのに……
jpnSearchText:
チームを抜ける事は簡単じゃないって、
私も分かっていたのに……

engChrName: (...or I can respect Mark's wishes and cover it up so she doesn't go on mournin' him.)
engSearchText:
(...or I can respect Mark's wishes and cover it up so
she doesn't go on mournin' him.)
jpnChrName: それなのに私っ……関係を断ち切れたら 結婚しようなんて言ってしまって……！
jpnSearchText:
それなのに私っ……関係を断ち切れたら
結婚しようなんて言ってしまって……！

engChrName: (Either way, she's not getting out of this conversation unscathed.)
engSearchText:
(Either way, she's not getting out of this
conversation unscathed.)
jpnChrName: 私があんな事を言わなければ……きっと……っ！
jpnSearchText: 私があんな事を言わなければ……きっと……っ！

engChrName: (It's up to me to choose how this case ends. I have to decide what's ultimately best and stick with it.)
engSearchText:
(It's up to me to choose how this case ends. I have to
decide what's ultimately best and stick with it.)
jpnChrName: ……ああぁぁぁぁっ…………！
jpnSearchText: ……ああぁぁぁぁっ…………！

engChrName: (...I'm gonna give it to her straight. She's the client, after all.)
engSearchText:
(...I'm gonna give it to her straight. She's the client,
after all.)

engChrName: Well, a friend of Mark's gave us a letter that he wrote.
engSearchText: Well, a friend of Mark's gave us a letter that he wrote.

engChrName: You should read it first—then we'll tell you what happened to Mark.
engSearchText:
You should read it first—then we'll tell you what
happened to Mark.

engChrName: This handwriting... It's definitely his.
engSearchText: This handwriting... It's definitely his.

engChrName: It says he wrote this the night before he left for work...?
engSearchText:
It says he wrote this the night before he left for
work...?
jpnChrName: 取り乱してごめんなさい……もう大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText: 取り乱してごめんなさい……もう大丈夫よ。

jpnChrName: 手紙も勿論だけど、捜査してくれた 皆さんには本当に感謝しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
手紙も勿論だけど、捜査してくれた
皆さんには本当に感謝しているわ。

engChrName: After reading the letter, Amy was left in tears, at which point Van divulged what he read in the online news article.
engSearchText:
After reading the letter, Amy was left in tears, at
which point Van divulged what he read in the online
news article.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういう依頼だったからな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そういう依頼だったからな。

engChrName: Mark sounded so confident that everything was going to be okay. I completely believed him.
engSearchText:
Mark sounded so confident that everything was going
to be okay. I completely believed him.
jpnChrName: ねえ……良ければもうひとつ 依頼をさせてくれないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ねえ……良ければもうひとつ
依頼をさせてくれないかしら。

engChrName: I knew it wasn't going to be easy for him to leave the gang, but...
engSearchText:
I knew it wasn't going to be easy for him to leave the
gang, but...
jpnChrName: なんだ？
jpnSearchText: なんだ？

engChrName: Why...? Why did I tell him we could get married if he cut ties with them?!
engSearchText:
Why...? Why did I tell him we could get married if he
cut ties with them?!
jpnChrName: ……《アルマータ》に 復讐する手伝いをしてほしいの。
jpnSearchText:
……《アルマータ》に
復讐する手伝いをしてほしいの。

engChrName: If I hadn't said that, he...he...!
engSearchText: If I hadn't said that, he...he...!
jpnChrName: それは…………
jpnSearchText: それは…………

engChrName: *sob*
engSearchText: *sob*
jpnChrName: エイミーさん…… 気持ちは分かりますけど……
jpnSearchText:
エイミーさん……
気持ちは分かりますけど……

jpnChrName: ……ま、そうなるよな。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、そうなるよな。

jpnChrName: 私に出来る事なら何でもする。 依頼料だっていくらでも払うわ。
jpnSearchText:
私に出来る事なら何でもする。
依頼料だっていくらでも払うわ。

jpnChrName: 払うモンを払ってくれんなら 検討してやってもいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
払うモンを払ってくれんなら
検討してやってもいいぜ。

jpnChrName: ！　それじゃあ……！
jpnSearchText: ！　それじゃあ……！

engChrName: I'm...sorry you had to see all that. I'm okay now.
engSearchText: I'm...sorry you had to see all that. I'm okay now.
jpnChrName: ああ、マルクの想いを全部踏みにじるっつう訳だろ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、マルクの想いを全部踏みにじるっつう訳だろ？

engChrName: Thank you for delivering the letter to me and uncovering all of that. I'll be forever grateful to the two of you.
engSearchText:
Thank you for delivering the letter to me and
uncovering all of that. I'll be forever grateful to the
two of you.
jpnChrName: 酷い話だとは思うが、 ここまで首を突っ込んだ以上ケツは持たねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
酷い話だとは思うが、
ここまで首を突っ込んだ以上ケツは持たねえとな。

engChrName: Wish we had happier news to give you, but that's how it goes in this line of work sometimes.
engSearchText:
Wish we had happier news to give you, but that's how
it goes in this line of work sometimes.
jpnChrName: それは……どういう意味？
jpnSearchText: それは……どういう意味？

engChrName: Yes, I understand... Can I...ask you for one more thing?
engSearchText:
Yes, I understand... Can I...ask you for one
more thing?
jpnChrName: 奴は“表”で生きるアンタと一緒になる為に チームを抜けようとしてた。
jpnSearchText:
奴は“表”で生きるアンタと一緒になる為に
チームを抜けようとしてた。

engChrName: What is it?
engSearchText: What is it?
jpnChrName: きっと、アンタを“裏”に関わらせる事なく ２人で普通の幸せを手に入れたかったからだろ。
jpnSearchText:
きっと、アンタを“裏”に関わらせる事なく
２人で普通の幸せを手に入れたかったからだろ。

engChrName: Will you guys...help me get revenge on Almata?
engSearchText: Will you guys...help me get revenge on Almata?
jpnChrName: その為に命を賭けたアイツが、 アンタが手を汚して喜ぶと思ってんのか？
jpnSearchText:
その為に命を賭けたアイツが、
アンタが手を汚して喜ぶと思ってんのか？

engChrName: That's...
engSearchText: That's...

engChrName: Amy...I understand how you feel, but...
engSearchText: Amy...I understand how you feel, but...
jpnChrName: エイミーさんが自分の事を 許せない気持ちは分かります……
jpnSearchText:
エイミーさんが自分の事を
許せない気持ちは分かります……

engChrName: ...Can't say I didn't see this coming.
engSearchText: ...Can't say I didn't see this coming.
jpnChrName: でも、マルクさんが守りたかった貴女の事を、 大事にしてあげて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
でも、マルクさんが守りたかった貴女の事を、
大事にしてあげて下さい。

engChrName: I'll do what I can—whatever you ask. I'll give you as much money as you need! Just...please! It can't end like this!
engSearchText:
I'll do what I can—whatever you ask. I'll give you as
much money as you need! Just...please! It can't end
like this!
jpnChrName: 復讐をして気が晴れたとしても…… 失ったものは戻って来ませんから。
jpnSearchText:
復讐をして気が晴れたとしても……
失ったものは戻って来ませんから。

engChrName: If you're not just talkin' and are willin' to put your money where you mouth is, then sure, I'll consider it.
engSearchText:
If you're not just talkin' and are willin' to put your
money where you mouth is, then sure, I'll consider it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、相変わらずぬるい事を言いやがって。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、相変わらずぬるい事を言いやがって。

engChrName: You will? You'd do that for me?!
engSearchText: You will? You'd do that for me?!

engChrName: Course. Money buys you lotsa stuff from a spriggan. But you really think that's the best way to honor your boyfriend's memory?
engSearchText:
Course. Money buys you lotsa stuff from a spriggan.
But you really think that's the best way to honor your
boyfriend's memory?
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい……そうね。 せめて彼の気持ちを裏切っちゃいけないわ……
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい……そうね。
せめて彼の気持ちを裏切っちゃいけないわ……

engChrName: You might not wanna hear this, but now that you know as much as you do, you have a certain responsibility to carry out.
engSearchText:
You might not wanna hear this, but now that you
know as much as you do, you have a certain
responsibility to carry out.
jpnChrName: 差し出がましい事を 言っちまって悪かったな。
jpnSearchText:
差し出がましい事を
言っちまって悪かったな。

engChrName: I do? What are you talking about?
engSearchText: I do? What are you talking about?
jpnChrName: これ以上余計な口出しはしねえから、 後はアンタ自身で考えてみてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上余計な口出しはしねえから、
後はアンタ自身で考えてみてくれ。

engChrName: Mark loved you so much, he tried to quit his gang so he could live legit with you.
engSearchText:
Mark loved you so much, he tried to quit his gang so
he could live legit with you.
jpnChrName: ありがとう……私が短絡的だったわ。 これからちゃんと気持ちの整理をしてみる。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう……私が短絡的だったわ。
これからちゃんと気持ちの整理をしてみる。

engChrName: All he probably ever wanted was to lead a normal, happy life without dragging you into the underworld.
engSearchText:
All he probably ever wanted was to lead a normal,
happy life without dragging you into the underworld.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ……改めて失礼させてもらうわね。 ありがとう《裏解決屋》さん。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ……改めて失礼させてもらうわね。
ありがとう《裏解決屋》さん。

engChrName: He risked his life to make that happen and paid the price. Do you think going out and getting your hands dirty is going to bring any happiness?
engSearchText:
He risked his life to make that happen and paid
the price. Do you think going out and getting your
hands dirty is going to bring any happiness?
jpnChrName: （……ここはマルクの意志を尊重させてもらうか。）
jpnSearchText: （……ここはマルクの意志を尊重させてもらうか。）

jpnChrName: ああ、実は情報屋に話を通して 調べてもらったんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、実は情報屋に話を通して
調べてもらったんだけどな。

engChrName: I understand how you think you can't forgive yourself for what you said.
engSearchText:
I understand how you think you can't forgive yourself
for what you said.
jpnChrName: マルクは内密に 外国の旅行者の女と付き合っていたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
マルクは内密に
外国の旅行者の女と付き合っていたらしい。

engChrName: But Mark was trying to protect you, too. Try not to forget that.
engSearchText:
But Mark was trying to protect you, too. Try not to
forget that.

engChrName: Even if you somehow got your revenge, he's still gone. Nothing you do can bring him back. Believe me, I know...
engSearchText:
Even if you somehow got your revenge, he's
still gone. Nothing you do can bring him back.
Believe me, I know...
jpnChrName: それで、奴が機を見計らって駆け落ちしたのが 一か月前だったみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
それで、奴が機を見計らって駆け落ちしたのが
一か月前だったみてえだな。

engChrName: *sigh* There you go again, old man. Sometimes you're too damn soft for your own good.
engSearchText:
*sigh* There you go again, old man.
Sometimes you're too damn soft for your own good.
jpnChrName: 信じられねえってんなら、マルクのダチの サイモンに話を聞いてみるといいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
信じられねえってんなら、マルクのダチの
サイモンに話を聞いてみるといいぜ。

jpnChrName: サイモン……確かにマルクから 聞いた事がある名前だわ。
jpnSearchText:
サイモン……確かにマルクから
聞いた事がある名前だわ。

engChrName: I'm sorry. You're absolutely right. The last thing I want to do is disrespect his feelings.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry. You're absolutely right. The last thing I
want to do is disrespect his feelings.

engChrName: Eh, I might've been a little presumptuous with what I said, too. I could've worded that better.
engSearchText:
Eh, I might've been a little presumptuous with what I
said, too. I could've worded that better.
jpnChrName: 浮気、か……まさかとは思いつつも 私も考えた事はあったの。
jpnSearchText:
浮気、か……まさかとは思いつつも
私も考えた事はあったの。

engChrName: I'll keep my opinions to myself from here on. All I'll say is, you should really think carefully about how you want to proceed.
engSearchText:
I'll keep my opinions to myself from here on. All I'll
say is, you should really think carefully about how
you want to proceed.
jpnChrName: でも、実際に言われると……やっぱり駄目みたいね。
jpnSearchText: でも、実際に言われると……やっぱり駄目みたいね。

engChrName: Right... Thank you. That was really shortsighted of me to say that, so...I'm going to sit down and really process my feelings after this.
engSearchText:
Right... Thank you. That was really shortsighted of
me to say that, so...I'm going to sit down and really
process my feelings after this.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……………… ごめんなさい、泣いたりして……
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ………………
ごめんなさい、泣いたりして……

engChrName: Anyway, I think I'm going to leave now. Thank you again, both of you—and take care.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I think I'm going to leave now. Thank you
again, both of you—and take care.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですよ。 とても辛い事だと思いますから……
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫ですよ。
とても辛い事だと思いますから……

engChrName: (Probably best to respect Mark's wishes and keep it all a secret. Here goes.)
engSearchText:
(Probably best to respect Mark's wishes and keep it all
a secret. Here goes.)
jpnChrName: （心苦しいですけど……エイミーさんの為を   思えばやむを得ませんよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（心苦しいですけど……エイミーさんの為を
思えばやむを得ませんよね……）

engChrName: Well, we talked to an info broker we know and had them look into your boyfriend's case.
engSearchText:
Well, we talked to an info broker we know and had
them look into your boyfriend's case.
jpnChrName: （どうすればエイミーさんの為になるのか   難しいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（どうすればエイミーさんの為になるのか
難しいですね……）

engChrName: Turns out that he's been seeing a foreign chick who'd been traveling through the country this whole time on the down low.
engSearchText:
Turns out that he's been seeing a foreign chick who'd
been traveling through the country this whole time on
the down low.
jpnChrName: （真実を知りたがってるヤツに対して   身勝手な話だとは思うがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（真実を知りたがってるヤツに対して
身勝手な話だとは思うがな。）

engChrName: What?! Is that true?!
engSearchText: What?! Is that true?!
jpnChrName: 取り乱してごめんなさい……もう大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText: 取り乱してごめんなさい……もう大丈夫よ。

engChrName: There's more. The guy was biding his time until he could sneak off with his other lady into the night. Wanna guess when he finally did?
engSearchText:
There's more. The guy was biding his time until he
could sneak off with his other lady into the night.
Wanna guess when he finally did?
jpnChrName: あのね……こんな話を聞いた後に、 呆れられちゃうかもしれないけど。
jpnSearchText:
あのね……こんな話を聞いた後に、
呆れられちゃうかもしれないけど。

engChrName: A month ago. If you don't believe me, you can ask his friend Simon. He'll fill you in on what he knows.
engSearchText:
A month ago. If you don't believe me, you can ask his
friend Simon. He'll fill you in on what he knows.
jpnChrName: あのマルクが浮気だなんて…… やっぱりまだ信じられないの。
jpnSearchText:
あのマルクが浮気だなんて……
やっぱりまだ信じられないの。

engChrName: Simon...? I've heard him mention that name before.
engSearchText: Simon...? I've heard him mention that name before.
jpnChrName: きっと、私の前から消えないといけないような 事情があったんじゃないか、なんて……
jpnSearchText:
きっと、私の前から消えないといけないような
事情があったんじゃないか、なんて……

jpnChrName: 現実逃避なんてして見苦しいわよね。
jpnSearchText: 現実逃避なんてして見苦しいわよね。

engChrName: So he was cheating on me... I always doubted it, but part of me had wondered deep down if that was the case.
engSearchText:
So he was cheating on me... I always doubted it, but
part of me had wondered deep down if that was
the case.
jpnChrName: それでいいんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: それでいいんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Having it confirmed like this is...a lot.
engSearchText: Having it confirmed like this is...a lot.
jpnChrName: 本人から話を聞けてない以上、 俺達の調査も証拠不十分ではあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
本人から話を聞けてない以上、
俺達の調査も証拠不十分ではあるからな。

engChrName: *sniffle* *sniffle*... I'm sorry. I feel awful. I shouldn't be crying in front of you two.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* *sniffle*... I'm sorry. I feel awful. I shouldn't
be crying in front of you two.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとう。

engChrName: That's okay. I'm sure it's a difficult thing to process right now. You can cry if you need to.
engSearchText:
That's okay. I'm sure it's a difficult thing to process
right now. You can cry if you need to.
jpnChrName: さてと……それじゃあ失礼させてもらうわね。 色々とありがとう……裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……それじゃあ失礼させてもらうわね。
色々とありがとう……裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: (It's hard to watch her like this, but if it's for her own good, I guess it's the best choice we could have made...)
engSearchText:
(It's hard to watch her like this, but if it's for her own
good, I guess it's the best choice we could
have made...)
jpnChrName: クエスト【行方不明になった彼】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>行方不明になった彼<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: (It's so tough to know what the best thing to do for her in this situation is...)
engSearchText:
(It's so tough to know what the best thing to do for
her in this situation is...)
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: (Sure feels like a dick move pulling this on someone who came to us wanting to know the truth, if you ask me.)
engSearchText:
(Sure feels like a dick move pulling this on someone
who came to us wanting to know the truth, if you
ask me.)
jpnChrName: （『機知に富む劇場の案内人』……   謎解きにはそう書いてあったよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（『機知に富む劇場の案内人』……
謎解きにはそう書いてあったよな。）

engChrName: I'm...sorry you had to see all that. I'm okay now.
engSearchText: I'm...sorry you had to see all that. I'm okay now.
jpnChrName: （この《シネマ・エスプリ》の   案内人の事を指してると思うんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（この《シネマ・エスプリ》の
案内人の事を指してると思うんだが……）

engChrName: I know you're probably going to roll your eyes at what I'm about to say, but...
engSearchText:
I know you're probably going to roll your eyes at what
I'm about to say, but...
jpnChrName: ちょっといいか？ 俺達は謎解きゲームに参加してるモンなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっといいか？
俺達は謎解きゲームに参加してるモンなんだが。

engChrName: ...I still can't fully convince myself that Mark would go out and cheat on me.
engSearchText:
...I still can't fully convince myself that Mark would
go out and cheat on me.
jpnChrName: アンタが最後の鍵を持ってる 劇場の案内人で合ってるか？
jpnSearchText:
アンタが最後の鍵を持ってる
劇場の案内人で合ってるか？

engChrName: I can't stop thinking he MUST have had some sort of reason he had to disappear on me. It's the only thing that makes sense.
engSearchText:
I can't stop thinking he MUST have had some sort of
reason he had to disappear on me. It's the only thing
that makes sense.
jpnChrName: まさか私の下まで 辿り着く者がいるとは……！
jpnSearchText:
まさか私の下まで
辿り着く者がいるとは……！

engChrName: Haha... I feel embarrassed even saying that out loud. I must sound totally delusional right now, like I'm just trying to run away from the truth.
engSearchText:
Haha... I feel embarrassed even saying that out loud.
I must sound totally delusional right now, like I'm just
trying to run away from the truth.
jpnChrName: そうです、私はイーディス王国お抱えの とある劇団員の者です。
jpnSearchText:
そうです、私はイーディス王国お抱えの
とある劇団員の者です。

engChrName: Hey, nothin' wrong with a little healthy skepticism.
engSearchText: Hey, nothin' wrong with a little healthy skepticism.
jpnChrName: こうしてカギを集めに 来る者を待ち望んでいました。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてカギを集めに
来る者を待ち望んでいました。

engChrName: Can't exactly say our investigation's as complete as we'd like without being able to reach him and get his side of the story, either. I get it.
engSearchText:
Can't exactly say our investigation's as complete as
we'd like without being able to reach him and get his
side of the story, either. I get it.
jpnChrName: へぇ、待ち望んでたってのは新しいパターンだな。 アンタは他の連中とは違うのか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、待ち望んでたってのは新しいパターンだな。
アンタは他の連中とは違うのか。

engChrName: You're sweet to say that. Thank you.
engSearchText: You're sweet to say that. Thank you.
jpnChrName: ええ……現在は訳あって劇団にいますが、 私はかつて騎士団に籍を置いていました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……現在は訳あって劇団にいますが、
私はかつて騎士団に籍を置いていました。

engChrName: Anyway, I think I'm going to leave now. Thanks again, both of you. Take care.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I think I'm going to leave now.
Thanks again, both of you. Take care.
jpnChrName: イーディス王家への忠誠は今でも変わりません……
jpnSearchText: イーディス王家への忠誠は今でも変わりません……

engChrName: Quest A Lost Lover completed!
engSearchText: Quest A Lost Lover completed!
jpnChrName: そんな中、ある伯爵が姫の幽閉を企てているという 噂を聞いて敵に潜り込んだのです。
jpnSearchText:
そんな中、ある伯爵が姫の幽閉を企てているという
噂を聞いて敵に潜り込んだのです。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 私の力では止める事は出来ず…… こうしてカギを託せる方を探していました。
jpnSearchText:
私の力では止める事は出来ず……
こうしてカギを託せる方を探していました。

engChrName: (The clue we got mentions an 'ever-resourceful guide of the theater.')
engSearchText:
(The clue we got mentions an 'ever-resourceful guide
of the theater.')
jpnChrName: なるほど……なんというか ドラマがありますね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……なんというか
ドラマがありますね。

engChrName: (If I had to guess, it's probably talkin' about this guide who works at Esprit Cinema. One way to find out.)
engSearchText:
(If I had to guess, it's probably talkin' about this guide
who works at Esprit Cinema. One way to find out.)
jpnChrName: 密偵が混じっているなんて、 なんだかアツい展開です。
jpnSearchText:
密偵が混じっているなんて、
なんだかアツい展開です。

engChrName: Got a second? We're taking part in this riddle game that's being tested right now.
engSearchText:
Got a second? We're taking part in this riddle game
that's being tested right now.
jpnChrName: へぇ、ここで密偵が現れるとか ストーリーも凝ってんだな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、ここで密偵が現れるとか
ストーリーも凝ってんだな。

engChrName: You the 'ever-resourceful guide of the theater' that's got the last key we're looking for, by any chance?
engSearchText:
You the 'ever-resourceful guide of the theater' that's
got the last key we're looking for, by any chance?
jpnChrName: それでは、皆様には この最後の鍵を託したいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、皆様には
この最後の鍵を託したいと思います。

engChrName: Unbelievable! To think someone has reached the likes of me at long last!
engSearchText:
Unbelievable! To think someone has reached the likes
of me at long last!
jpnChrName: ヴァンは『最後の鍵』を手に入れた！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンは『最後の鍵』を手に入れた！

engChrName: Yes, what you say is true. I serve the Kingdom of Edith as a humble member of this theatrical company.
engSearchText:
Yes, what you say is true. I serve the Kingdom of
Edith as a humble member of this
theatrical company.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かに。
jpnSearchText: ああ、確かに。

engChrName: Long have I awaited the arrival of one who would come for my key, and it seems as though that time is finally upon me!
engSearchText:
Long have I awaited the arrival of one who would
come for my key, and it seems as though that time is
finally upon me!
jpnChrName: しかし、その口ぶりだとアンタは 真犯人の伯爵の正体も掴んでるんだよな？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、その口ぶりだとアンタは
真犯人の伯爵の正体も掴んでるんだよな？

engChrName: You've been waitin' for us, huh? That's a new one. That's not what your pals said. You different from them somehow?
engSearchText:
You've been waitin' for us, huh? That's a new one.
That's not what your pals said. You different from
them somehow?
jpnChrName: ええ、姫を攫い幽閉した真犯人── それはイオタ伯爵です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、姫を攫い幽閉した真犯人──
それはイオタ伯爵です。

engChrName: That I am. As it so happens, I was once part of the knights brigade.
engSearchText:
That I am. As it so happens, I was once part of the
knights brigade.
jpnChrName: 伯爵は領地の民を虐げていましてね。 王家がそれを見咎めて罰を与えたのです。
jpnSearchText:
伯爵は領地の民を虐げていましてね。
王家がそれを見咎めて罰を与えたのです。

engChrName: Circumstances have since seen me in the employ of this troupe. However, my loyalty to the Edith royal family remains as unwavering as ever.
engSearchText:
Circumstances have since seen me in the employ of
this troupe. However, my loyalty to the Edith
royal family remains as unwavering as ever.
jpnChrName: そこで伯爵が逆恨みをして 今回の犯行に及んだとみられます。
jpnSearchText:
そこで伯爵が逆恨みをして
今回の犯行に及んだとみられます。

engChrName: Indeed, 'pon catching wind of a plot by a certain count to imprison the princess, I saw fit to infiltrate the enemy's ranks.
engSearchText:
Indeed, 'pon catching wind of a plot by a certain
count to imprison the princess, I saw fit to
infiltrate the enemy's ranks.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……
jpnSearchText: なるほどな……

engChrName: I lack the means to stop the count's schemes. That is why I have sought someone to whom I could entrust my key—and at last, they have arrived!
engSearchText:
I lack the means to stop the count's schemes. That is
why I have sought someone to whom I could entrust
my key—and at last, they have arrived!
jpnChrName: しかし、イオタ伯爵邸の執事のイルハンもまた 私と志を共にする内通者──
jpnSearchText:
しかし、イオタ伯爵邸の執事のイルハンもまた
私と志を共にする内通者──

engChrName: Well, then... This story's getting a little dramatic.
engSearchText: Well, then... This story's getting a little dramatic.
jpnChrName: 彼に３つの鍵を渡せば、 姫を助け出してくれるはずです！
jpnSearchText:
彼に３つの鍵を渡せば、
姫を助け出してくれるはずです！

engChrName: Holy cow! There's a spy involved, too? That's awesome!
engSearchText:
Holy cow! There's a spy involved, too?
That's awesome!
jpnChrName: 皆様……どうか後の事は頼みましたよ！
jpnSearchText: 皆様……どうか後の事は頼みましたよ！

engChrName: Didn't expect there to be any espionage involved in this whole scavenger hunt. There's more to the plot of this thing than I expected.
engSearchText:
Didn't expect there to be any espionage involved in
this whole scavenger hunt. There's more to the plot of
this thing than I expected.
jpnChrName: はい、勿論です……！
jpnSearchText: はい、勿論です……！

engChrName: And with that, I shall now leave the last key in your capable hands.
engSearchText:
And with that, I shall now leave the last key in your
capable hands.
jpnChrName: なんて……なんだか お芝居の世界に引き込まれてしまいますね。
jpnSearchText:
なんて……なんだか
お芝居の世界に引き込まれてしまいますね。

engChrName: Obtained the last key.
engSearchText: Obtained the last key.
jpnChrName: ま、ここまで熱の入った演者を 揃えられちまうとな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ここまで熱の入った演者を
揃えられちまうとな。

engChrName: Thanks. You won't regret it.
engSearchText: Thanks. You won't regret it.
jpnChrName: 任せて下さいっ！ 託してもらった鍵を無駄にはしません！
jpnSearchText:
任せて下さいっ！
託してもらった鍵を無駄にはしません！

engChrName: From the way you're talkin', it sounds like you know who's behind all of this. Care to fill us in?
engSearchText:
From the way you're talkin', it sounds like you know
who's behind all of this. Care to fill us in?
jpnChrName: へっ、お前もノリノリじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: へっ、お前もノリノリじゃねえか。

engChrName: Certainly. The man who imprisoned our fair princess is none other than Count Iota.
engSearchText:
Certainly. The man who imprisoned our fair princess
is none other than Count Iota.
jpnChrName: えへへ……つい釣られちゃいました。
jpnSearchText: えへへ……つい釣られちゃいました。

engChrName: He is a vile man who oppressed the people of his dominion—thus the royal family saw fit to punish him for his misdeeds.
engSearchText:
He is a vile man who oppressed the people of his
dominion—thus the royal family saw fit to punish him
for his misdeeds.
jpnChrName: クク、オレたちに任せておきな。
jpnSearchText: クク、オレたちに任せておきな。

engChrName: As a result, the count came to harbor a profound grudge against them, which has led to today's tragic state of affairs.
engSearchText:
As a result, the count came to harbor a profound
grudge against them, which has led to today's tragic
state of affairs.
jpnChrName: 助けた姫に恩を着せて 一生遊んで暮らしてやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
助けた姫に恩を着せて
一生遊んで暮らしてやるからよ。

engChrName: Got'cha. I guess that'd do it.
engSearchText: Got'cha. I guess that'd do it.
jpnChrName: 悪ノリすんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: 悪ノリすんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: But fear not! Justice is on our side, for the count's own butler, Ilhan, is of the same mind as myself.
engSearchText:
But fear not! Justice is on our side, for the count's
own butler, Ilhan, is of the same mind as myself.
jpnChrName: さて……それじゃ次の目的地は 『イオタ伯爵邸』って事になるのか。
jpnSearchText:
さて……それじゃ次の目的地は
『イオタ伯爵邸』って事になるのか。

engChrName: Give unto him the three keys that you have assembled, and he shall be able to free the princess at long last!
engSearchText:
Give unto him the three keys that you have
assembled, and he shall be able to free the princess at
long last!
jpnChrName: イオタ……それに執事のイルハン…… どこかで聞いた気はするんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
イオタ……それに執事のイルハン……
どこかで聞いた気はするんだよな。

engChrName: Good luck! The fate of Her Royal Highness now rests within your hands! Please, do not let the kingdom down!
engSearchText:
Good luck! The fate of Her Royal Highness now rests
within your hands! Please, do not let the
kingdom down!
jpnChrName: 謎という訳ではなさそうですけど 場所を探す必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
謎という訳ではなさそうですけど
場所を探す必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: We won't! I swear to you!
engSearchText: We won't! I swear to you!
jpnChrName: 確か、あそこのお店の名前と オーナーの名前がそうだったような……？
jpnSearchText:
確か、あそこのお店の名前と
オーナーの名前がそうだったような……？

engChrName: ...Whoops. I got into the moment more than I expected there. That almost felt real.
engSearchText:
...Whoops. I got into the moment more than I
expected there. That almost felt real.
jpnChrName: 謎という訳ではなさそうですけど 場所を探す必要はありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
謎という訳ではなさそうですけど
場所を探す必要はありそうですね。

engChrName: Guess that's what happens when we're dealin' with an actor who goes method.
engSearchText:
Guess that's what happens when we're dealin' with an
actor who goes method.
jpnChrName: うーん……あそこのお店の名前と オーナーの名前がそうだったような……？
jpnSearchText:
うーん……あそこのお店の名前と
オーナーの名前がそうだったような……？

engChrName: Leave it to us! We'll get the keys to that butler if it's the last thing we do!
engSearchText:
Leave it to us! We'll get the keys to that butler if it's
the last thing we do!
jpnChrName: 謎って訳じゃなさそうだが、 場所を探す必要はあるな。
jpnSearchText:
謎って訳じゃなさそうだが、
場所を探す必要はあるな。

engChrName: Huh. Someone's gettin' pretty into this. Havin' fun, kiddo?
engSearchText:
Huh. Someone's gettin' pretty into this. Havin'
fun, kiddo?
jpnChrName: あそこの店の名前と オーナーの名前がそうだったような……
jpnSearchText:
あそこの店の名前と
オーナーの名前がそうだったような……

engChrName: Heehee! Yeah, I guess I got a little caught up in what was happening.
engSearchText:
Heehee! Yeah, I guess I got a little caught up in what
was happening.
jpnChrName: ああ、街をぶらつきながら 探してみるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、街をぶらつきながら
探してみるとするか。

engChrName: Oh, but don't you worry. We'll rescue your fair princess. I don't mind putting in the work.
engSearchText:
Oh, but don't you worry. We'll rescue your
fair princess. I don't mind putting in the work.
jpnChrName: よう、サリバン編集長。
jpnSearchText: よう、サリバン編集長。

engChrName: 'Cause once she's free, she can repay me with a healthy dose of happily ever afters for the rest of our days.
engSearchText:
'Cause once she's free, she can repay me with a
healthy dose of happily ever afters for the rest of
our days.
jpnChrName: ある依頼を受けててな。 ちょいとアンタに聞きたい事があるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ある依頼を受けててな。
ちょいとアンタに聞きたい事があるんだが。

engChrName: You just had to turn this into a cheap porno, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You just had to turn this into a cheap porno,
didn't you?
jpnChrName: 誰かと思えば 《アークライド解決事務所》ね。
jpnSearchText:
誰かと思えば
《アークライド解決事務所》ね。

engChrName: Anyway, looks like our next stop is this Count Iota's manor, wherever that might be.
engSearchText:
Anyway, looks like our next stop is this Count Iota's
manor, wherever that might be.
jpnChrName: 記者がタダでネタを出す訳がないでしょう。 まずはその依頼とやらを聞かせてもらえるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
記者がタダでネタを出す訳がないでしょう。
まずはその依頼とやらを聞かせてもらえるかしら？

engChrName: Iota and Ilhan... I've heard those names somewhere before...
engSearchText:
Iota and Ilhan... I've heard those names
somewhere before...
jpnChrName: ああ、アンタも知ってるっつう ２０年前のテロ事件に関係してる事だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アンタも知ってるっつう
２０年前のテロ事件に関係してる事だ。

engChrName: There might not be a riddle attached to this key, but it sounds like we'll have to go searching for one more place.
engSearchText:
There might not be a riddle attached to this key, but
it sounds like we'll have to go searching for one
more place.
jpnChrName: ……へぇ、よく調べが付いてるじゃない。 解決屋の名前も伊達じゃないって事ね。
jpnSearchText:
……へぇ、よく調べが付いてるじゃない。
解決屋の名前も伊達じゃないって事ね。

engChrName: Isn't there a café in town with the name 'Iota'?
engSearchText: Isn't there a café in town with the name 'Iota'?
jpnChrName: いいわ、私も協力してあげましょう。
jpnSearchText: いいわ、私も協力してあげましょう。

engChrName: There might not be a riddle this time, but it looks like we've got one more place to find.
engSearchText:
There might not be a riddle this time, but it looks like
we've got one more place to find.
jpnChrName: その代わり、その依頼の顛末を 私にも報告してちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
その代わり、その依頼の顛末を
私にも報告してちょうだい。

engChrName: Hmm... I feel like I've seen the name 'Iota' on a building in town before.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I feel like I've seen the name 'Iota' on a
building in town before.
jpnChrName: 記事にでもするつもりか？
jpnSearchText: 記事にでもするつもりか？

engChrName: There's no riddle this time, but guess we've gotta put on our thinking caps and hustle one last time.
engSearchText:
There's no riddle this time, but guess we've gotta put
on our thinking caps and hustle one last time.
jpnChrName: 世間に報道した方が良さそうな話だったらね。 そうでなければ胸に仕舞っておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
世間に報道した方が良さそうな話だったらね。
そうでなければ胸に仕舞っておくわ。

engChrName: Isn't there some place in town called 'Iota'?
engSearchText: Isn't there some place in town called 'Iota'?
jpnChrName: ハッ、それで構わねえよ。 それじゃ交渉成立だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それで構わねえよ。
それじゃ交渉成立だな。

engChrName: I'm sure we'll run into it if we walk around long enough. Let's roll.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll run into it if we walk around
long enough. Let's roll.
jpnChrName: まず、表沙汰にはされなかったあの事件を 私が今でも取材している事は事実よ。
jpnSearchText:
まず、表沙汰にはされなかったあの事件を
私が今でも取材している事は事実よ。

engChrName: Hey there, Chief.
engSearchText: Hey there, Chief.
jpnChrName: 遺族の為にも、そして反移民団体に プレッシャーをかけ続ける意味でもね。
jpnSearchText:
遺族の為にも、そして反移民団体に
プレッシャーをかけ続ける意味でもね。

engChrName: Got an assignment right now I was hopin' we could talk to you about if you got a minute.
engSearchText:
Got an assignment right now I was hopin' we could
talk to you about if you got a minute.
jpnChrName: だから勿論、ロデリック氏の 現在についても知っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
だから勿論、ロデリック氏の
現在についても知っているわ。

engChrName: Van Arkride. We meet again.
engSearchText: Van Arkride. We meet again.
jpnChrName: それは一体……？
jpnSearchText: それは一体……？

engChrName: You know any good reporter doesn't give up her scoops without a good reason. Tell me what brings you here and we'll take it from there.
engSearchText:
You know any good reporter doesn't give up her
scoops without a good reason. Tell me what brings
you here and we'll take it from there.
jpnChrName: それは一体……？
jpnSearchText: それは一体……？

engChrName: Oh, I think you'll be pretty interested in this one. It's gotta do with a terrorism case from a couple decades ago I'm told you know about. You see...
engSearchText:
Oh, I think you'll be pretty interested in this one.
It's gotta do with a terrorism case from a couple
decades ago I'm told you know about. You see...
jpnChrName: ハッ、勿体ぶってないで教えろよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、勿体ぶってないで教えろよ。

engChrName: I see someone's done their homework. Definitely earning your keep on this assignment of yours, I see.
engSearchText:
I see someone's done their homework.
Definitely earning your keep on this assignment of
yours, I see.
jpnChrName: 彼は、成人してから青年実業家になったのよ。 それも新進気鋭のね。
jpnSearchText:
彼は、成人してから青年実業家になったのよ。
それも新進気鋭のね。

engChrName: All right, I'll bite. I'll tell you what I know.
engSearchText: All right, I'll bite. I'll tell you what I know.
jpnChrName: 首都を中心に、商談を行うために飛び回ってるの。
jpnSearchText: 首都を中心に、商談を行うために飛び回ってるの。

engChrName: But in exchange, you have to promise to report back on how everything turns out once it's over. Deal?
engSearchText:
But in exchange, you have to promise to report back
on how everything turns out once it's over. Deal?
jpnChrName: あの事件の遺族というだけじゃなくて、 実業家として何度も取材させてもらってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
あの事件の遺族というだけじゃなくて、
実業家として何度も取材させてもらってるわ。

engChrName: Why? Thinkin' of turning this into an article or something?
engSearchText:
Why? Thinkin' of turning this into an article
or something?
jpnChrName: へぇ、そいつはすげえな。 血は争えねえってか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、そいつはすげえな。
血は争えねえってか。

engChrName: More or less. Certainly has the makings for a story worth bringing to light. If it turns out I'm wrong, no problem. I'll keep it to myself.
engSearchText:
More or less. Certainly has the makings for a story
worth bringing to light. If it turns out I'm wrong,
no problem. I'll keep it to myself.
jpnChrName: 彼の携帯端末に連絡すれば 会う時間を作ってくれるかもしれないわよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼の携帯端末に連絡すれば
会う時間を作ってくれるかもしれないわよ。

engChrName: Works for me. You got yourself a deal.
engSearchText: Works for me. You got yourself a deal.
jpnChrName: 今からかけてみる？
jpnSearchText: 今からかけてみる？

engChrName: So as it happens, I'm still investigating that case, even if it's never been made public.
engSearchText:
So as it happens, I'm still investigating that case, even
if it's never been made public.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼む。

engChrName: Partly it's to bring justice for the surviving family, but also to keep the pressure on anti-immigrant groups that would do such a thing.
engSearchText:
Partly it's to bring justice for the surviving family, but
also to keep the pressure on anti-immigrant groups
that would do such a thing.
jpnChrName: お世話になっております、 タイレル通信のサリバンですが……
jpnSearchText:
お世話になっております、
タイレル通信のサリバンですが……

engChrName: Suffice it to say, I'm well aware of what Roderick's up to these days.
engSearchText:
Suffice it to say, I'm well aware of what Roderick's up
to these days.
jpnChrName: アポが取れたわよ。
jpnSearchText: アポが取れたわよ。

engChrName: You are? What is he doing now?
engSearchText: You are? What is he doing now?
jpnChrName: ちょうど近くに来てるらしくて、 この後駅前のテラスで待っていてくれるって。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど近くに来てるらしくて、
この後駅前のテラスで待っていてくれるって。

engChrName: You are? What is he doing?
engSearchText: You are? What is he doing?
jpnChrName: お、そいつは丁度よかったな。
jpnSearchText: お、そいつは丁度よかったな。

engChrName: Good to know. Now quit beating around the bush and spit it out.
engSearchText:
Good to know. Now quit beating around the bush
and spit it out.
jpnChrName: でも、条件というか希望があるらしいの。
jpnSearchText: でも、条件というか希望があるらしいの。

engChrName: Once he grew up, Roderick became a young entrepreneur—and a promising one, at that.
engSearchText:
Once he grew up, Roderick became a young
entrepreneur—and a promising one, at that.
jpnChrName: 貴方達の依頼主──ロケットの持ち主を 連れて来てほしいんですって。
jpnSearchText:
貴方達の依頼主──ロケットの持ち主を
連れて来てほしいんですって。

engChrName: He travels around cutting business deals, but he keeps Edith as his home base.
engSearchText:
He travels around cutting business deals, but he keeps
Edith as his home base.
jpnChrName: ブルーノさんをですか……
jpnSearchText: ブルーノさんをですか……

engChrName: I've interviewed him on a number of occasions over the years. Not just as a survivor of that case, but also to discuss his business ventures.
engSearchText:
I've interviewed him on a number of occasions over
the years. Not just as a survivor of that case, but also
to discuss his business ventures.
jpnChrName: 当然といえば当然の要望ですけど。 本人が応じてくれるかどうかわかりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
当然といえば当然の要望ですけど。
本人が応じてくれるかどうかわかりませんね。

engChrName: Sounds like an impressive guy. Must've inherited his dad's ambition to make a difference.
engSearchText:
Sounds like an impressive guy. Must've inherited his
dad's ambition to make a difference.
jpnChrName: うーん……当然といえば当然の要望ですけど。
jpnSearchText: うーん……当然といえば当然の要望ですけど。

engChrName: I can try to call him on his mobile terminal and arrange a meeting for you, if you like.
engSearchText:
I can try to call him on his mobile terminal and
arrange a meeting for you, if you like.
jpnChrName: ブルーノさんが応じてくれるかどうかは 分かりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ブルーノさんが応じてくれるかどうかは
分かりませんね。

engChrName: I can't make any promises, but do you want me to try?
engSearchText: I can't make any promises, but do you want me to try?
jpnChrName: そう来るのも分かるが、 あの爺さんが応じるとは思えねえな。
jpnSearchText:
そう来るのも分かるが、
あの爺さんが応じるとは思えねえな。

engChrName: Sure. I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText: Sure. I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: まずは連絡をとって話をしてみるか。 中間報告も兼ねてな。
jpnSearchText:
まずは連絡をとって話をしてみるか。
中間報告も兼ねてな。

engChrName: Hi, Roderick. How are you? This is editor-in-chief Sullivan from the Tyrell Times. I wanted to ask...
engSearchText:
Hi, Roderick. How are you? This is editor-in-chief
Sullivan from the Tyrell Times. I wanted to ask...
jpnChrName: それじゃあ後は頑張ってちょうだい。 連絡、待ってるからね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ後は頑張ってちょうだい。
連絡、待ってるからね。

engChrName: You're all set!
engSearchText: You're all set!
jpnChrName: へいへいっと。
jpnSearchText: へいへいっと。

engChrName: Luckily for you, he just so happens to be nearby. He said he would wait for you later at the terrace over by the station.
engSearchText:
Luckily for you, he just so happens to be nearby.
He said he would wait for you later at the terrace over
by the station.
jpnChrName: それじゃ爺さんに連絡してみるか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ爺さんに連絡してみるか。

engChrName: Awesome. That worked out perfect, then.
engSearchText: Awesome. That worked out perfect, then.
jpnChrName: もしもし、《アークライド解決事務所》の モンなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
もしもし、《アークライド解決事務所》の
モンなんだが……

engChrName: There's more. There's something else he was hoping you two could do for him in return.
engSearchText:
There's more. There's something else he was hoping
you two could do for him in return.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、それじゃよろしくな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、それじゃよろしくな。

engChrName: He wants you to bring your client—the owner of the locket—with you when you meet him.
engSearchText:
He wants you to bring your client—the owner of the
locket—with you when you meet him.
jpnChrName: なんと言っていましたか？
jpnSearchText: なんと言っていましたか？

engChrName: He wants to meet Bruno?
engSearchText: He wants to meet Bruno?
jpnChrName: どうでしたか？
jpnSearchText: どうでしたか？

engChrName: I suppose that's a perfectly reasonable thing to ask... though I don't know if he'll agree to it. Hmm...
engSearchText:
I suppose that's a perfectly reasonable thing to ask...
though I don't know if he'll agree to it. Hmm...
jpnChrName: どうだったんだ？
jpnSearchText: どうだったんだ？

engChrName: Uh, I guess I can see why he'd wanna meet him.
engSearchText: Uh, I guess I can see why he'd wanna meet him.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、リバーサイドの橋の上で 落ち合う事になった。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、リバーサイドの橋の上で
落ち合う事になった。

engChrName: But I dunno if Bruno will be willing to do that...
engSearchText: But I dunno if Bruno will be willing to do that...
jpnChrName: 詳しい話は向こうでするとしよう。
jpnSearchText: 詳しい話は向こうでするとしよう。

engChrName: I get why he'd ask that, but I've got my doubts that grandpa's gonna play ball.
engSearchText:
I get why he'd ask that, but I've got my doubts that
grandpa's gonna play ball.
jpnChrName: なるほど、それでは向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、それでは向かいましょうか。

engChrName: We won't know for sure until we ask him. We'll bring it up when we give him our progress report.
engSearchText:
We won't know for sure until we ask him. We'll bring
it up when we give him our progress report.
jpnChrName: なるほど、それじゃ向かいましょうか！
jpnSearchText: なるほど、それじゃ向かいましょうか！

engChrName: Fingers crossed. Good luck, spriggan. Make sure to come talk to me once everything's over.
engSearchText:
Fingers crossed. Good luck, spriggan. Make sure to
come talk to me once everything's over.
jpnChrName: ふーん、それじゃ向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText: ふーん、それじゃ向かうとするか。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, I will. A deal's a deal.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah, I will. A deal's a deal.
jpnChrName: よう、俺達はある解決事務所のモンでな。
jpnSearchText: よう、俺達はある解決事務所のモンでな。

engChrName: All right, let's ring the guy up and get this show on the road.
engSearchText:
All right, let's ring the guy up and get this show on
the road.
jpnChrName: とある使用人に頼まれて、 ある人物の身辺調査をしてる所なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
とある使用人に頼まれて、
ある人物の身辺調査をしてる所なんだが……

engChrName: Hey, this is Van Arkride from Arkride Solutions. I wanted to ask...
engSearchText:
Hey, this is Van Arkride from Arkride Solutions.
I wanted to ask...
jpnChrName: ここ最近、お嬢様風の子供と不良風の青年が この店に来た事はなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近、お嬢様風の子供と不良風の青年が
この店に来た事はなかったか？

engChrName: ...Great. See you then.
engSearchText: ...Great. See you then.
jpnChrName: ああ！　それってあの二人の事ですよね。
jpnSearchText: ああ！　それってあの二人の事ですよね。

engChrName: What did he say?
engSearchText: What did he say?
jpnChrName: 不思議な組み合わせだったから よく憶えてますよ。
jpnSearchText:
不思議な組み合わせだったから
よく憶えてますよ。

engChrName: How did it go?
engSearchText: How did it go?
jpnChrName: その二人の様子や、どんな会話をしていたか 良ければ教えて頂けませんか？
jpnSearchText:
その二人の様子や、どんな会話をしていたか
良ければ教えて頂けませんか？

engChrName: How'd it go?
engSearchText: How'd it go?
jpnChrName: 様子っていうと、そうですねぇ……
jpnSearchText: 様子っていうと、そうですねぇ……

engChrName: Didn't say much. For now, we're just linking up at the Riverside bridge.
engSearchText:
Didn't say much. For now, we're just linking up at
the Riverside bridge.
jpnChrName: ちぐはぐな二人なのに、意外と仲のいい お友達同士っていう雰囲気でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
ちぐはぐな二人なのに、意外と仲のいい
お友達同士っていう雰囲気でしたね。

engChrName: We'll fill him in on everything once we meet him in person.
engSearchText:
We'll fill him in on everything once we meet him
in person.
jpnChrName: 不良っぽい彼が、女の子にタイレル地区を 色々と教えてあげたりしてましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
不良っぽい彼が、女の子にタイレル地区を
色々と教えてあげたりしてましたよ。

engChrName: Oh, okay. Well, I'm ready when you are.
engSearchText: Oh, okay. Well, I'm ready when you are.
jpnChrName: それと……女の子の方が父親との関係で 悩んでいたみたいでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
それと……女の子の方が父親との関係で
悩んでいたみたいでしてね。

engChrName: Okay! Sounds good to me. Let's go!
engSearchText: Okay! Sounds good to me. Let's go!
jpnChrName: 彼が親身になって 相談に乗ってあげていたりもしました。
jpnSearchText:
彼が親身になって
相談に乗ってあげていたりもしました。

engChrName: Fair enough. Let's move.
engSearchText: Fair enough. Let's move.
jpnChrName: 父親との関係ですか……
jpnSearchText: 父親との関係ですか……

engChrName: Hi there. I'm a private investigator working on a case with my assistants here.
engSearchText:
Hi there. I'm a private investigator working on a case
with my assistants here.
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルドさんの話から、 親子で疎遠になっている様子でしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルドさんの話から、
親子で疎遠になっている様子でしたよね。

engChrName: We're lookin' into a couple of people for one of our clients at the moment.
engSearchText:
We're lookin' into a couple of people for one of our
clients at the moment.
jpnChrName: バーゼリアお嬢様も それを気に病んでいたんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼリアお嬢様も
それを気に病んでいたんでしょうか。

engChrName: Have you had a rich-lookin' girl stop by your stall, by any chance? She would've had a young guy with her—somethin' of a delinquent.
engSearchText:
Have you had a rich-lookin' girl stop by your stall, by
any chance? She would've had a young guy with
her—somethin' of a delinquent.
jpnChrName: ちなみにその青年ってのはどんなやつだ？ 特徴か何かあれば助かるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにその青年ってのはどんなやつだ？
特徴か何かあれば助かるんだが。

engChrName: Oh, yes! I know exactly who you must be talking about!
engSearchText:
Oh, yes! I know exactly who you must be
talking about!
jpnChrName: うーん、特徴って聞かれると 困っちゃうんですけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、特徴って聞かれると
困っちゃうんですけどねぇ。

engChrName: They looked like the oddest pair together, so they stuck out like a sore thumb.
engSearchText:
They looked like the oddest pair together, so they
stuck out like a sore thumb.
jpnChrName: 不良っぽい見た目の割には そこまでスレてなさそうな人でしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
不良っぽい見た目の割には
そこまでスレてなさそうな人でしたよ。

engChrName: That's great! Could you tell us more about them? Do you remember what they were talking about? What was your impression of them?
engSearchText:
That's great! Could you tell us more about them?
Do you remember what they were talking about?
What was your impression of them?
jpnChrName: 確か、母親が旧市街で雑貨屋を やってるとかも言ってた気がします。
jpnSearchText:
確か、母親が旧市街で雑貨屋を
やってるとかも言ってた気がします。

engChrName: Hmm... Let me think...
engSearchText: Hmm... Let me think...
jpnChrName: 雑貨屋だと？ ははあ……まさかそう繋がるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
雑貨屋だと？
ははあ……まさかそう繋がるとはな。

engChrName: For two people who seemed about as different as you could get, they were getting along unusually well. Like they were pretty good friends.
engSearchText:
For two people who seemed about as different as you
could get, they were getting along unusually well.
Like they were pretty good friends.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、もしや青年の身元に 心当たりがあるのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様、もしや青年の身元に
心当たりがあるのでしょうか。

engChrName: The guy looked like a bit of a rough character, but he was telling her all kinds of things about the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
The guy looked like a bit of a rough character, but he
was telling her all kinds of things about the
Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: まあな……旧市街、雑貨屋、不良息子。 ここまで揃えばアイツしかいねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……旧市街、雑貨屋、不良息子。
ここまで揃えばアイツしかいねえだろ。

engChrName: As for the girl, she seemed pretty worried about her relationship with her dad.
engSearchText:
As for the girl, she seemed pretty worried about her
relationship with her dad.
jpnChrName: 《ニューベリー商店》の店長の息子、エディだ。
jpnSearchText: 《ニューベリー商店》の店長の息子、エディだ。

engChrName: He was being pretty sweet and trying to give her advice, from what I could hear.
engSearchText:
He was being pretty sweet and trying to give her
advice, from what I could hear.
jpnChrName: なるほど……！
jpnSearchText: なるほど……！

engChrName: That's interesting. So she was talking about her family.
engSearchText:
That's interesting. So she was talking about
her family.
jpnChrName: 確かに、息子さんが夜遊びしているとは 噂で聞いた事がありましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
確かに、息子さんが夜遊びしているとは
噂で聞いた事がありましたけど……

engChrName: Judging by what Rumsfeld told us, it definitely sounded like she and her father weren't all that close.
engSearchText:
Judging by what Rumsfeld told us, it definitely
sounded like she and her father weren't all that close.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、あいつとお嬢様の接点は何だったんだ？
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、あいつとお嬢様の接点は何だったんだ？

engChrName: Maybe that's been bothering her.
engSearchText: Maybe that's been bothering her.
jpnChrName: まだ裏に何かありそうだ…… もう少し情報収集する必要がありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
まだ裏に何かありそうだ……
もう少し情報収集する必要がありそうだな。

engChrName: Could you tell us a bit more about the guy? Anything that stuck out about him? Every little detail helps.
engSearchText:
Could you tell us a bit more about the guy?
Anything that stuck out about him? Every little
detail helps.
jpnChrName: それなら、あっちの《マクミランカフェ》に 行ってみたらいいんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
それなら、あっちの《マクミランカフェ》に
行ってみたらいいんじゃない？

engChrName: Hmm... He didn't seem all that remarkable to me, so it's hard to know what to say.
engSearchText:
Hmm... He didn't seem all that remarkable to me, so
it's hard to know what to say.
jpnChrName: あの二人がテラス席で長話してるのを 何度か見かけた事があるの。
jpnSearchText:
あの二人がテラス席で長話してるのを
何度か見かけた事があるの。

engChrName: But he did seem surprisingly naïve for a guy who otherwise looked like a troublemaker, I can tell you that much.
engSearchText:
But he did seem surprisingly naïve for a guy who
otherwise looked like a troublemaker, I can tell you
that much.
jpnChrName: 《マクミランカフェ》ですか…… 情報提供、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
《マクミランカフェ》ですか……
情報提供、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I think I also heard him mention that his mom runs a general store over in Old Town.
engSearchText:
I think I also heard him mention that his mom runs a
general store over in Old Town.
jpnChrName: よう、俺達はある解決事務所のモンでな。
jpnSearchText: よう、俺達はある解決事務所のモンでな。

engChrName: Did you say general store? Heh, of all the people it could've been, it had to be him, huh? Wild.
engSearchText:
Did you say general store? Heh, of all the people it
could've been, it had to be him, huh? Wild.
jpnChrName: とある使用人に頼まれて、 ある人物の身辺調査をしてる所なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
とある使用人に頼まれて、
ある人物の身辺調査をしてる所なんだが……

engChrName: What do you mean, Mr. Arkride? Is that to say you might know the identity of the young man in question?
engSearchText:
What do you mean, Mr. Arkride? Is that to say you
