might know the identity of the young man
in question?
jpnChrName: ここらへんでお嬢様風の子供と 不良風の青年を見かけなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
ここらへんでお嬢様風の子供と
不良風の青年を見かけなかったか？

engChrName: Yeah, you could say that. Think about it: Old Town, general store, deadbeat son. There's only one guy I can think of who ticks all the boxes.
engSearchText:
Yeah, you could say that. Think about it: Old Town,
general store, deadbeat son. There's only one guy I
can think of who ticks all the boxes.
jpnChrName: 何か知ってる事があれば 教えてもらいてえんだが。
jpnSearchText:
何か知ってる事があれば
教えてもらいてえんだが。

engChrName: I'm talkin' about Eddy, the son of the lady who runs Newberry General Store.
engSearchText:
I'm talkin' about Eddy, the son of the lady who runs
Newberry General Store.
jpnChrName: フフ……解決事務所って、 面白い名前の事務所ね……？
jpnSearchText:
フフ……解決事務所って、
面白い名前の事務所ね……？

engChrName: Oh, now I get it! You must be right!
engSearchText: Oh, now I get it! You must be right!
jpnChrName: もしかしてだけど、その界隈で噂になってる 《裏解決屋》（スプリガン）と何か関係あるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
もしかしてだけど、その界隈で噂になってる
《裏解決屋》（スプリガン）と何か関係あるのかしら？

engChrName: I've heard rumors before that he likes to go out partying at night.
engSearchText:
I've heard rumors before that he likes to go out
partying at night.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋？　一体何の話だか。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋？　一体何の話だか。

engChrName: We still don't know how the hell a guy like him wound up meeting such a rich girl, though.
engSearchText:
We still don't know how the hell a guy like him
wound up meeting such a rich girl, though.
jpnChrName: ともかく知ってる事があれば教えてくれ。 ここら辺で目撃情報があったんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく知ってる事があれば教えてくれ。
ここら辺で目撃情報があったんだがな。

engChrName: There's gotta be more to this story still. We need to find more info.
engSearchText:
There's gotta be more to this story still. We need to
find more info.
jpnChrName: フフフ、気を悪くしたならごめんなさいね……
jpnSearchText: フフフ、気を悪くしたならごめんなさいね……

engChrName: If you're looking for someone else to talk to, why don't you try McMillan Café?
engSearchText:
If you're looking for someone else to talk to, why
don't you try McMillan Café?
jpnChrName: 勿論知ってるわよ、最近よく隣の席に あの二人が座る事が多くて。
jpnSearchText:
勿論知ってるわよ、最近よく隣の席に
あの二人が座る事が多くて。

engChrName: I've seen the two of them talking out on the terrace before a handful of times. Someone there might know something.
engSearchText:
I've seen the two of them talking out on the terrace
before a handful of times. Someone there might
know something.
jpnChrName: しかも興味深い話をしていたから、 つい会話に耳を澄ませてしまっていたわ……
jpnSearchText:
しかも興味深い話をしていたから、
つい会話に耳を澄ませてしまっていたわ……

engChrName: I see. Thank you for the information. We'll be sure to look into it.
engSearchText:
I see. Thank you for the information. We'll be sure to
look into it.
jpnChrName: 興味深い話とは、 一体どのような内容でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
興味深い話とは、
一体どのような内容でしょうか？

engChrName: Hi there. I'm a private investigator workin' on a case with my assistants here.
engSearchText:
Hi there. I'm a private investigator workin' on a case
with my assistants here.
jpnChrName: それがね、女の子の方が“誘拐”について 彼に色々と質問していたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
それがね、女の子の方が“誘拐”について
彼に色々と質問していたのよ。

engChrName: We're lookin' into a couple of people for one of our clients at the moment.
engSearchText:
We're lookin' into a couple of people for one of our
clients at the moment.
jpnChrName: どんなケースの誘拐があるか、 犯行までの流れはどうなるのかってね……
jpnSearchText:
どんなケースの誘拐があるか、
犯行までの流れはどうなるのかってね……

engChrName: You see any young, rich girls hangin' out with a rough-around-the-edges guy around here recently?
engSearchText:
You see any young, rich girls hangin' out with a
rough-around-the-edges guy around here recently?
jpnChrName: それはもう、彼女の方は嬉々とした様子でね。 彼の方は真剣な表情で話していたわ。
jpnSearchText:
それはもう、彼女の方は嬉々とした様子でね。
彼の方は真剣な表情で話していたわ。

engChrName: Doesn't have to be a big lead or nothin'. Whatever you know, we'd appreciate if you shared it with us.
engSearchText:
Doesn't have to be a big lead or nothin'.
Whatever you know, we'd appreciate if you shared it
with us.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……専門家の私に聞いてくれれば、 もっと根掘り葉掘り教えてあげられたのに。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……専門家の私に聞いてくれれば、
もっと根掘り葉掘り教えてあげられたのに。

engChrName: Oooh! A private investigator, huh? That's a neat job you have.
engSearchText:
Oooh! A private investigator, huh? That's a neat job
you have.
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: You wouldn't happen to be that famous spriggan everyone likes to talk about in these parts, would you?
engSearchText:
You wouldn't happen to be that famous spriggan
everyone likes to talk about in these parts, would you?
jpnChrName: 独特な趣味をお持ちの方のようですね。
jpnSearchText: 独特な趣味をお持ちの方のようですね。

engChrName: Spriggan? Sorry, I've got no idea what you're talking about.
engSearchText:
Spriggan? Sorry, I've got no idea what you're
talking about.
jpnChrName: でも、誘拐について興味をもつなんて 事情がない限りおかしな話ですよね……
jpnSearchText:
でも、誘拐について興味をもつなんて
事情がない限りおかしな話ですよね……

engChrName: Not to be rude, but we're pressed for time. We know those two have been to this café and we're lookin' to find someone who can tell us more.
engSearchText:
Not to be rude, but we're pressed for time. We know
those two have been to this café and we're lookin' to
find someone who can tell us more.
jpnChrName: あっもしかして…… それが今回の事件に繋がるんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
あっもしかして……
それが今回の事件に繋がるんでしょうか？

engChrName: Heehee. Sorry if I offended you! Just not every day I get to talk to people like you.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Sorry if I offended you! Just not every day I
get to talk to people like you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、しかし誘拐について興味があるとは 随分と変わった趣味してやがんな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、しかし誘拐について興味があるとは
随分と変わった趣味してやがんな。

engChrName: Anyway, I definitely know who you're talking about. I've seen those two people sitting at that table over there a lot lately.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I definitely know who you're talking about.
I've seen those two people sitting at that table over
there a lot lately.
jpnChrName: だがこれで、いくらか全容が 見えて来たんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
だがこれで、いくらか全容が
見えて来たんじゃねえか？

engChrName: They get up to some pretty interesting conversations. I know it's rude, but I can't help but listen in on them, you know?
engSearchText:
They get up to some pretty interesting conversations.
I know it's rude, but I can't help but listen in on
them, you know?
jpnChrName: だな、まだ確証はねえが。
jpnSearchText: だな、まだ確証はねえが。

engChrName: May we ask what they've discussed in those conversations?
engSearchText:
May we ask what they've discussed in
those conversations?
jpnChrName: ……？　よく分からないけど 力になれたのなら嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
……？　よく分からないけど
力になれたのなら嬉しいわ。

engChrName: Well, earlier, the girl was asking him all sorts of things about kidnapping.
engSearchText:
Well, earlier, the girl was asking him all sorts of
things about kidnapping.
jpnChrName: ついでに言わせてもらうと、 彼の“バック”には気を付けた方がいいわよ。
jpnSearchText:
ついでに言わせてもらうと、
彼の“バック”には気を付けた方がいいわよ。

engChrName: Like what sort of cases have there been before, what goes into kidnapping someone, stuff like that.
engSearchText:
Like what sort of cases have there been before, what
goes into kidnapping someone, stuff like that.
jpnChrName: バックですか……？
jpnSearchText: バックですか……？

engChrName: He had this serious expression on his face, but she looked happy and excited for some reason.
engSearchText:
He had this serious expression on his face, but she
looked happy and excited for some reason.
jpnChrName: 二人の会話が聞こえて来てしまったのだけど……
jpnSearchText: 二人の会話が聞こえて来てしまったのだけど……

engChrName: *sigh* If only she'd thought to ask me. I'm an expert in that sort of thing. I could've told her everything she wanted to know and then some.
engSearchText:
*sigh* If only she'd thought to ask me. I'm an expert
in that sort of thing. I could've told her everything she
wanted to know and then some.
jpnChrName: どうやら彼は《ディザイア》に 所属しているらしいの。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら彼は《ディザイア》に
所属しているらしいの。

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnChrName: あれは私利私欲を満たすため、欲望のままに 盗み、喧嘩、恐喝を働く最低最悪の集団よ……
jpnSearchText:
あれは私利私欲を満たすため、欲望のままに
盗み、喧嘩、恐喝を働く最低最悪の集団よ……

engChrName: This woman appears to have some very... peculiar interests.
engSearchText:
This woman appears to have some very...
peculiar interests.
jpnChrName: それなのに、彼自身は《ディザイア》を 義賊みたいないい不良集団と勘違いしてるようでね。
jpnSearchText:
それなのに、彼自身は《ディザイア》を
義賊みたいないい不良集団と勘違いしてるようでね。

engChrName: That's so weird. Why would she wanna talk about kidnapping? She must've had some sort of reason...
engSearchText:
That's so weird. Why would she wanna talk
about kidnapping? She must've had some sort
of reason...
jpnChrName: 女の子の方もその認識で 納得してしまったようだったわ。
jpnSearchText:
女の子の方もその認識で
納得してしまったようだったわ。

engChrName: Wait! Could it have something to do with this case?
engSearchText: Wait! Could it have something to do with this case?
jpnChrName: 前に別件でエディから話を聞いた時も そんな感じはしていたが……
jpnSearchText:
前に別件でエディから話を聞いた時も
そんな感じはしていたが……

engChrName: Man, this girl we're after must have a weird idea of fun. Who goes around talking about kidnapping and shit in public, huh?
engSearchText:
Man, this girl we're after must have a weird idea
of fun. Who goes around talking about kidnapping
and shit in public, huh?
jpnChrName: エディが騙そうとしてたっつう訳じゃないのか？
jpnSearchText: エディが騙そうとしてたっつう訳じゃないのか？

engChrName: But hey, we definitely know what's going on here, don't you agree?
engSearchText:
But hey, we definitely know what's going on here,
don't you agree?
jpnChrName: ええ……色々な犯罪プロファイルを 読んできた私だから分かるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……色々な犯罪プロファイルを
読んできた私だから分かるわ。

engChrName: Yeah—although we still don't have enough proof yet to be sure.
engSearchText:
Yeah—although we still don't have enough proof yet
to be sure.
jpnChrName: 彼は本心から《ディザイア》を信じているみたいね。
jpnSearchText: 彼は本心から《ディザイア》を信じているみたいね。

engChrName: Err, I don't know what you guys are going on about, but it sounds like you were able to figure something out? Glad I was able to help.
engSearchText:
Err, I don't know what you guys are going on about,
but it sounds like you were able to figure
something out? Glad I was able to help.
jpnChrName: あの調子じゃ、チームに上手いこと 利用されてるだけかもしれないわ……
jpnSearchText:
あの調子じゃ、チームに上手いこと
利用されてるだけかもしれないわ……

engChrName: Oh! One more thing: that guy seems to run with a pretty tough crowd. You'd better be careful if you're going to keep investigating him.
engSearchText:
Oh! One more thing: that guy seems to run with a
pretty tough crowd. You'd better be careful if you're
going to keep investigating him.
jpnChrName: だから彼の“背後の組織”には 気を付けた方がいいわと言いたかったのよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから彼の“背後の組織”には
気を付けた方がいいわと言いたかったのよ。

engChrName: Huh? What sort of people are you talking about?
engSearchText: Huh? What sort of people are you talking about?
jpnChrName: ああ、まずエディ自身が《ディザイア》に 騙されてる可能性はあるかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、まずエディ自身が《ディザイア》に
騙されてる可能性はあるかもしれねえな。

engChrName: From what I overheard, he belongs to Desire.
engSearchText: From what I overheard, he belongs to Desire.
jpnChrName: つまり、まずエディ自身が《ディザイア》に 騙されてる可能性はあるかもしれねえ訳か。
jpnSearchText:
つまり、まずエディ自身が《ディザイア》に
騙されてる可能性はあるかもしれねえ訳か。

engChrName: They're a nasty gang. Fighting, stealing, blackmailing... You name it, they've done it and more.
engSearchText:
They're a nasty gang. Fighting, stealing,
blackmailing... You name it, they've done it
and more.
jpnChrName: なるほどな、ご忠告ありがとよ。 おかげで色々と情報が整理できそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな、ご忠告ありがとよ。
おかげで色々と情報が整理できそうだ。

engChrName: Those people aren't above doing anything. Whatever it takes to get what they want, they'll do it without blinking an eye.
engSearchText:
Those people aren't above doing anything.
Whatever it takes to get what they want, they'll do it
without blinking an eye.
jpnChrName: それでは、次はどちらへ参りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでは、次はどちらへ参りましょうか。

engChrName: I don't think that guy understands what he's gotten himself into. He seems to believe they have more honors and morals than they really do.
engSearchText:
I don't think that guy understands what he's gotten
himself into. He seems to believe they have more
honors and morals than they really do.
jpnChrName: だいぶ状況は掴めてきたが、 きちんとウラを取っておかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
だいぶ状況は掴めてきたが、
きちんとウラを取っておかねえとな。

engChrName: The girl didn't seem to know any better, either, and just went along with what he had to say.
engSearchText:
The girl didn't seem to know any better, either, and
just went along with what he had to say.
jpnChrName: エディ側の最近の様子を聞いておきてえ。 旧市街の《ニューベリー商店》へ行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
エディ側の最近の様子を聞いておきてえ。
旧市街の《ニューベリー商店》へ行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: We've talked to him before in the past. His name's Eddy, and that was more-or-less the impression he gave me, yeah.
engSearchText:
We've talked to him before in the past. His name's
Eddy, and that was more-or-less the impression he
gave me, yeah.
jpnChrName: あんたが依頼をくれた、 アイドルをやってるセイラだな。
jpnSearchText:
あんたが依頼をくれた、
アイドルをやってるセイラだな。

engChrName: It didn't sound like he was trying to pull the wool over her eyes or anything like that, then?
engSearchText:
It didn't sound like he was trying to pull the wool
over her eyes or anything like that, then?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ貴方が噂の……
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ貴方が噂の……

engChrName: Not at all. I've read a lot of criminal profiles, so trust me, I'd be able to recognize it if he was lying to her.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I've read a lot of criminal profiles, so trust
me, I'd be able to recognize it if he was lying to her.
jpnChrName: さっそく話を聞いていただけますか？
jpnSearchText: さっそく話を聞いていただけますか？

engChrName: He really does seem to think Desire's made up of good people.
engSearchText:
He really does seem to think Desire's made up of
good people.
jpnChrName: ああ、立ち話もなんだし 座って聞かせて貰おうか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、立ち話もなんだし
座って聞かせて貰おうか。

engChrName: That makes me think they might just be using him for all he's worth if his outlook toward them is that rosy.
engSearchText:
That makes me think they might just be using him
for all he's worth if his outlook toward them is
that rosy.
jpnChrName: 今夜これから、この辺りの路上で パフォーマンスをやる予定だったそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
今夜これから、この辺りの路上で
パフォーマンスをやる予定だったそうだな。

engChrName: That's what I wanted to warn you about. It's not him you need to be concerned about—it's the people he works with that could be a problem.
engSearchText:
That's what I wanted to warn you about. It's not him
you need to be concerned about—it's the people he
works with that could be a problem.
jpnChrName: だが約束の時間になっても相方が来ない、と。
jpnSearchText: だが約束の時間になっても相方が来ない、と。

engChrName: Right. It's entirely possible Eddy's being put up to something without realizing it.
engSearchText:
Right. It's entirely possible Eddy's being put up to
something without realizing it.
jpnChrName: はい、ルルアからは事前に 今日はバイトがあるって聞いてはいたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、ルルアからは事前に
今日はバイトがあるって聞いてはいたんですけど……

engChrName: Fair enough. Guess that means we can't rule out the possibility that Eddy's being played for a fool in this situation.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. Guess that means we can't rule out the
possibility that Eddy's being played for a fool in
this situation.
jpnChrName: 夕方過ぎには終わるということで、 直接この場所で落ち合う約束だったんです。
jpnSearchText:
夕方過ぎには終わるということで、
直接この場所で落ち合う約束だったんです。

engChrName: Thanks for the tip. You've given us a lot to work with.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the tip. You've given us a lot to
work with.
jpnChrName: ですが一時間経っても連絡すらなくて…… 彼女のアパートを訪ねたんです。
jpnSearchText:
ですが一時間経っても連絡すらなくて……
彼女のアパートを訪ねたんです。

engChrName: Now that we know all of that, where should we go next?
engSearchText:
Now that we know all of that, where should we
go next?
jpnChrName: そうだったのか。
jpnSearchText: そうだったのか。

engChrName: I think we've got a good handle of what's probably going on here. Now we just need to confirm our findings and go from there.
engSearchText:
I think we've got a good handle of what's probably
going on here. Now we just need to confirm our
findings and go from there.
jpnChrName: ええ、実はルルアから 部屋の鍵を預かっていまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、実はルルアから
部屋の鍵を預かっていまして。

engChrName: For now, we should figure out what's been going on with Eddy. Time to take a trip to Newberry in Old Town.
engSearchText:
For now, we should figure out what's been going on
with Eddy. Time to take a trip to Newberry in
Old Town.
jpnChrName: 返事がなかったので中に入ったんですが…… テーブルの上であるメモを見つけたんです。
jpnSearchText:
返事がなかったので中に入ったんですが……
テーブルの上であるメモを見つけたんです。

engChrName: You must be the idol that put in that request. Seyla, right? Nice to meet you.
engSearchText:
You must be the idol that put in that request.
Seyla, right? Nice to meet you.
jpnChrName: その内容が気になって…… 裏解決屋さんに捜索を頼もうと思ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
その内容が気になって……
裏解決屋さんに捜索を頼もうと思ったんです。

engChrName: Oh, wow! So the rumors really are true, huh?
engSearchText: Oh, wow! So the rumors really are true, huh?
jpnChrName: メモには何が書かれてあったんだ？
jpnSearchText: メモには何が書かれてあったんだ？

engChrName: If you're here, does that mean you're willing to hear me out?
engSearchText:
If you're here, does that mean you're willing to hear
me out?
jpnChrName: 私も知らない“クレマン”という人の名前と……
jpnSearchText: 私も知らない“クレマン”という人の名前と……

engChrName: Yeah. Probably best not to just stand around talkin' like this, though. Why don't we grab a seat and take it from there?
engSearchText:
Yeah. Probably best not to just stand around talkin'
like this, though. Why don't we grab a seat and take
it from there?
jpnChrName: その横に『バイト／１時間１０００ミラ』って。
jpnSearchText: その横に『バイト／１時間１０００ミラ』って。

engChrName: You mentioned that you were supposed to be putting on a street performance tonight.
engSearchText:
You mentioned that you were supposed to be putting
on a street performance tonight.
jpnChrName: １時間１０００ミラ…… ウチの基本料金と同じ額じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
１時間１０００ミラ……
ウチの基本料金と同じ額じゃねえか。

engChrName: But it sounds like your partner didn't show up when she was supposed to?
engSearchText:
But it sounds like your partner didn't show up when
she was supposed to?
jpnChrName: バイトにしては割がよすぎる。 ──そいつはいわゆる“闇バイト”かもな。
jpnSearchText:
バイトにしては割がよすぎる。
──そいつはいわゆる“闇バイト”かもな。

engChrName: Yes, that's right. Lulua did mention to me that she had work today.
engSearchText:
Yes, that's right. Lulua did mention to me that she
had work today.
jpnChrName: や、やっぱり…… 私もその可能性を疑っているんです。
jpnSearchText:
や、やっぱり……
私もその可能性を疑っているんです。

engChrName: But she said she would be done after sunset, so we planned to meet up here directly once she got off her job.
engSearchText:
But she said she would be done after sunset, so we
planned to meet up here directly once she got off
her job.
jpnChrName: （昼間解決した案件も、   闇バイト絡みだったが……）
jpnSearchText:
（昼間解決した案件も、
闇バイト絡みだったが……）

engChrName: It was getting later and later and she was nowhere to be seen. Once an hour passed and I still hadn't heard from her, I decided to visit her place.
engSearchText:
It was getting later and later and she was nowhere to
be seen. Once an hour passed and I still hadn't heard
from her, I decided to visit her place.
jpnChrName: （もしかすると、   この件とも繋がってるかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（もしかすると、
この件とも繋がってるかもな。）

engChrName: Makes sense to me. Sounds like a pretty reasonable thing to do.
engSearchText:
Makes sense to me. Sounds like a pretty reasonable
thing to do.
jpnChrName: （クレマン……   ここでも名前が出てきたか。）
jpnSearchText:
（クレマン……
ここでも名前が出てきたか。）

engChrName: Mm-hmm. When I got there, I knocked on the door but didn't get an answer.
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm. When I got there, I knocked on the door
but didn't get an answer.
jpnChrName: （ルルアも被害者の一人ってことで   間違いなさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ルルアも被害者の一人ってことで
間違いなさそうだな。）

engChrName: I have a key to her apartment that she lent me, so I used it to poke my head inside and found a note she left on the table.
engSearchText:
I have a key to her apartment that she lent me, so I
used it to poke my head inside and found a note she
left on the table.
jpnChrName: ルルアは……あの娘は田舎の出身で。
jpnSearchText: ルルアは……あの娘は田舎の出身で。

engChrName: Reading that note left me so concerned, so that's when I contacted you so you could hopefully look for her.
engSearchText:
Reading that note left me so concerned, so that's
when I contacted you so you could hopefully look
for her.
jpnChrName: 性格も真っすぐで、 他人をあまり疑わない所があるんです。
jpnSearchText:
性格も真っすぐで、
他人をあまり疑わない所があるんです。

engChrName: Makes sense. What was written on the note?
engSearchText: Makes sense. What was written on the note?
jpnChrName: だから本当に心配で……
jpnSearchText: だから本当に心配で……

engChrName: There were only two things scribbled down on it.
engSearchText: There were only two things scribbled down on it.
jpnChrName: ──事情は分かった。 案件的にもまさに裏解決屋向きだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──事情は分かった。
案件的にもまさに裏解決屋向きだろう。

engChrName: One was a name I didn't recognize, Clément—and then other thing was 'Part-time, 1,000 mira/hour.'
engSearchText:
One was a name I didn't recognize, Clément—and
then other thing was 'Part-time, 1,000 mira/hour.'
jpnChrName: 緊急性も高そうだしな。 さっそく引き受けさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
緊急性も高そうだしな。
さっそく引き受けさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: A thousand mira per hour? That's what we charge as our base rate at my agency.
engSearchText:
A thousand mira per hour? That's what we charge as
our base rate at my agency.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます……！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます……！

engChrName: That's pretty damn good for some side hustle. Some might say even too good. Practically screams somethin' not on the up-and-up, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
That's pretty damn good for some side hustle.
Some might say even too good. Practically screams
somethin' not on the up-and-up, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: それで、最近 ルルアに何か変わったことはなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
それで、最近
ルルアに何か変わったことはなかったか？

engChrName: You think so, too, huh? I figured that was a distinct possibility.
engSearchText:
You think so, too, huh? I figured that was a
distinct possibility.
jpnChrName: ……実は最近、身なりのいい老年の女性と 一緒にいる所を何度か見かけたことがありまして。
jpnSearchText:
……実は最近、身なりのいい老年の女性と
一緒にいる所を何度か見かけたことがありまして。

engChrName: (That case we solved this morning was another instance of someone getting caught up in sketchy part-time work.)
engSearchText:
(That case we solved this morning was another
instance of someone getting caught up in sketchy
part-time work.)
jpnChrName: ルルアに聞いたら、何でもボランティア活動の 一環で付き添っているということでした。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアに聞いたら、何でもボランティア活動の
一環で付き添っているということでした。

engChrName: (It's entirely possible this might be connected somehow.)
engSearchText:
(It's entirely possible this might be
connected somehow.)
jpnChrName: けどそもそも、それがおかしいと言いますか……
jpnSearchText: けどそもそも、それがおかしいと言いますか……

engChrName: (That name, Clément... He's got himself involved in all kinds of stuff, doesn't he?)
engSearchText:
(That name, Clément... He's got himself involved in
all kinds of stuff, doesn't he?)
jpnChrName: というのも、私たちは夢のステージのために 二人でお金を貯めているんです。
jpnSearchText:
というのも、私たちは夢のステージのために
二人でお金を貯めているんです。

engChrName: (Definitely a sign that Lulua is another victim of whatever he and his people are scheming.)
engSearchText:
(Definitely a sign that Lulua is another victim of
whatever he and his people are scheming.)
jpnChrName: ルルアがいくら人がいいとはいえ、 ボランティアをしている余裕はないと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアがいくら人がいいとはいえ、
ボランティアをしている余裕はないと思うんです。

engChrName: The thing about Lulua is, she comes from the countryside.
engSearchText:
The thing about Lulua is, she comes from
the countryside.
jpnChrName: そこで１時間１０００ミラのメモ、か。
jpnSearchText: そこで１時間１０００ミラのメモ、か。

engChrName: She's a really honest girl at heart and tends to take people at their word...for better and for worse.
engSearchText:
She's a really honest girl at heart and tends to take
people at their word...for better and for worse.
jpnChrName: クレマンってヤツから、対価として ミラを受け取っている可能性がありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
クレマンってヤツから、対価として
ミラを受け取っている可能性がありそうだな。

engChrName: That's why I'm really worried about her. I'm scared what she might've gotten herself into.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm really worried about her. I'm scared
what she might've gotten herself into.
jpnChrName: はい……私もそう思っています。
jpnSearchText: はい……私もそう思っています。

engChrName: I can understand why. At this point, you've given me everything I need to know. From what you've told me, this is definitely a job for a spriggan.
engSearchText:
I can understand why. At this point, you've given me
everything I need to know. From what you've told
me, this is definitely a job for a spriggan.
jpnChrName: ちなみにルルアが付き添っている方の 名前までは分からないのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにルルアが付き添っている方の
名前までは分からないのですが……

engChrName: Seein' as it's so urgent and all, I'll go ahead and get to work immediately.
engSearchText:
Seein' as it's so urgent and all, I'll go ahead and get to
work immediately.
jpnChrName: 先日、駅前の百貨店のブティック《ジャルダン》で 服を買ってもらったと言っていました。
jpnSearchText:
先日、駅前の百貨店のブティック《ジャルダン》で
服を買ってもらったと言っていました。

engChrName: Oh, thank you so much! I'm so glad you're able to help me!
engSearchText:
Oh, thank you so much! I'm so glad you're able to
help me!
jpnChrName: ルルアを探すための手がかりになるでしょうか。
jpnSearchText: ルルアを探すための手がかりになるでしょうか。

engChrName: Don't mention it. Tell me a little more about Lulua. Has she been acting strange in any particular way lately?
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. Tell me a little more about Lulua.
Has she been acting strange in any particular
way lately?
jpnChrName: ああ、とっかかりとしては十分な情報だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、とっかかりとしては十分な情報だ。

engChrName: Actually, yes, now that you ask. I've been seeing her spending time with an elderly woman who looks pretty well off.
engSearchText:
Actually, yes, now that you ask. I've been seeing her
spending time with an elderly woman who looks
pretty well off.
jpnChrName: 俺はすぐにでも駅前の ブティックに行って聞き込みしてみるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺はすぐにでも駅前の
ブティックに行って聞き込みしてみるぜ。

engChrName: When I asked her about it, she said she was escorting her as part of some volunteer work she's doing.
engSearchText:
When I asked her about it, she said she was escorting
her as part of some volunteer work she's doing.
jpnChrName: 約束の時間はとうに過ぎてるだろうが、 ルルアが遅れてやって来る可能性もあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
約束の時間はとうに過ぎてるだろうが、
ルルアが遅れてやって来る可能性もあるだろう。

engChrName: That was news to me, the fact she was doing anything like that. It felt really strange to me.
engSearchText:
That was news to me, the fact she was doing anything
like that. It felt really strange to me.
jpnChrName: あんたはここで待っていてくれ。
jpnSearchText: あんたはここで待っていてくれ。

engChrName: I mean, it's nice of her to want to help and all, but I know for a fact that she really shouldn't have the time to spare for that right now.
engSearchText:
I mean, it's nice of her to want to help and all, but I
know for a fact that she really shouldn't have the time
to spare for that right now.
jpnChrName: 分かりました……どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: 分かりました……どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: That's because we're both trying to save up our money so we can put on our dream concert. We're busy as it is just working on that.
engSearchText:
That's because we're both trying to save up our money
so we can put on our dream concert. We're busy as it
is just working on that.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはさっそく ブティック《ジャルダン》に向かうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはさっそく
ブティック《ジャルダン》に向かうのだった。

engChrName: Which is probably where that thousand mira per hour comes in.
engSearchText:
Which is probably where that thousand mira per hour
comes in.
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんたち。 またいらっしゃったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさんたち。
またいらっしゃったんですね。

engChrName: She could be earnin' that much from that Clément person as compensation for helping.
engSearchText:
She could be earnin' that much from that Clément
person as compensation for helping.
jpnChrName: タイレル通信に何か御用でも？
jpnSearchText: タイレル通信に何か御用でも？

engChrName: That was my hunch, too.
engSearchText: That was my hunch, too.
jpnChrName: いえ、実はマリエルさんに お聞きしたいことがありまして……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、実はマリエルさんに
お聞きしたいことがありまして……

engChrName: I don't know the name of the woman that Lulua's been looking after or else I'd be more than happy to tell you.
engSearchText:
I don't know the name of the woman that Lulua's
been looking after or else I'd be more than happy to
tell you.
jpnChrName: 例の４ｓｐｇ絡みでな、 他ならぬディンゴの事についてだ。
jpnSearchText:
例の４ｓｐｇ絡みでな、
他ならぬディンゴの事についてだ。

engChrName: But she did say the other day that the woman bought her clothes at Jardin Boutique in the department store by the station.
engSearchText:
But she did say the other day that the woman bought
her clothes at Jardin Boutique in the department store
by the station.

engChrName: Does that help you at all?
engSearchText: Does that help you at all?
jpnChrName: その、それはどういう？
jpnSearchText: その、それはどういう？

engChrName: Oh, yeah—that's a good jumping off point for me to start lookin' for her.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah—that's a good jumping off point for me to
start lookin' for her.
jpnChrName: えと、先ほどあるヒトから こんな話を聞きまして──
jpnSearchText:
えと、先ほどあるヒトから
こんな話を聞きまして──

engChrName: Once we're done talking, I'll make my way straight to that boutique and have a talk with whoever I find there.
engSearchText:
Once we're done talking, I'll make my way straight to
that boutique and have a talk with whoever I
find there.
jpnChrName: 『メルド』のカニング編集長……
jpnSearchText: 『メルド』のカニング編集長……

engChrName: As for you, I think you should stay here for the time being.
engSearchText:
As for you, I think you should stay here for the
time being.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんから名前は聞いてましたけど わたしもお会いした事はなかったですね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんから名前は聞いてましたけど
わたしもお会いした事はなかったですね。

engChrName: I know it's well past when you two were supposed to meet, but it's always possible that she could just be runnin' late and still show up.
engSearchText:
I know it's well past when you two were supposed to
meet, but it's always possible that she could just be
runnin' late and still show up.
jpnChrName: ………そして ディンゴさんのネタ帳、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
………そして
ディンゴさんのネタ帳、ですか。

engChrName: Right, that is true. Okay, I'll do that. Thanks again!
engSearchText: Right, that is true. Okay, I'll do that. Thanks again!
jpnChrName: ディンゴのヤツからそういった話を 聞いてたことは無かったか？
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴのヤツからそういった話を
聞いてたことは無かったか？

engChrName: Van hurried over to Jardin Boutique without delay to begin looking for Lulua.
engSearchText:
Van hurried over to Jardin Boutique without delay to
begin looking for Lulua.
jpnChrName: 直接的じゃなくても、気になることを 言ってたとかでもいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
直接的じゃなくても、気になることを
言ってたとかでもいいんだが。

engChrName: Oh! Hey, guys! Good to see you again.
engSearchText: Oh! Hey, guys! Good to see you again.
jpnChrName: いえ、実は……
jpnSearchText: いえ、実は……

engChrName: Need something with the paper?
engSearchText: Need something with the paper?
jpnChrName: そのネタ帳というの、 わたし前に見かけたことがあります。
jpnSearchText:
そのネタ帳というの、
わたし前に見かけたことがあります。

engChrName: Not this time. We came here to talk to you, Marielle.
engSearchText: Not this time. We came here to talk to you, Marielle.
jpnChrName: なにぃ！？
jpnSearchText: なにぃ！？

engChrName: I'll give it to you straight: we're working' on a 4SPG involving Dingo and need your help.
engSearchText:
I'll give it to you straight: we're working' on a 4SPG
involving Dingo and need your help.
jpnChrName: そ、それはどういう機会に？
jpnSearchText: そ、それはどういう機会に？

engChrName: What?! You are?!
engSearchText: What?! You are?!
jpnChrName: ……その、ご存じの通りわたし結構、 ディンゴさんの所に押しかけていまして。
jpnSearchText:
……その、ご存じの通りわたし結構、
ディンゴさんの所に押しかけていまして。

engChrName: What sort of request is it? Please, tell me!
engSearchText: What sort of request is it? Please, tell me!
jpnChrName: ある日のランチで、取材のコツを伺ってる時、 黒革の手帳にメモをしてた事があったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ある日のランチで、取材のコツを伺ってる時、
黒革の手帳にメモをしてた事があったんです。

engChrName: Uhh, to put it simply...
engSearchText: Uhh, to put it simply...
jpnChrName: 『何ですか、それ？』って聞いたら──
jpnSearchText: 『何ですか、それ？』って聞いたら──

engChrName: You talked to Meld's editor-in-chief, Mr. Cunning?
engSearchText: You talked to Meld's editor-in-chief, Mr. Cunning?
jpnChrName: 『ちょっとしたネタ帳だ』『ルポライターと 情報屋の両方に関わるような、な』って。
jpnSearchText:
『ちょっとしたネタ帳だ』『ルポライターと
情報屋の両方に関わるような、な』って。

engChrName: Dingo told me about him before, but I've never had the chance to meet him in person.
engSearchText:
Dingo told me about him before, but I've never had
the chance to meet him in person.
jpnChrName: ……間違いないみたいね。
jpnSearchText: ……間違いないみたいね。

engChrName: He said he wants you to find Dingo's notebook?
engSearchText: He said he wants you to find Dingo's notebook?
jpnChrName: ……間違いなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText: ……間違いなさそうですね。

engChrName: That's right. Do you remember Dingo ever talking to you about that thing, by any chance?
engSearchText:
That's right. Do you remember Dingo ever talking to
you about that thing, by any chance?
jpnChrName: うーん、間違いなさそうだね。
jpnSearchText: うーん、間違いなさそうだね。

engChrName: Doesn't have to be anything direct or explicit. Anything you happen to remember him sayin' will help.
engSearchText:
Doesn't have to be anything direct or explicit.
Anything you happen to remember him sayin'
will help.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも実在することは 明らかになったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも実在することは
明らかになったわけか。

engChrName: Actually, we didn't just talk about it before.
engSearchText: Actually, we didn't just talk about it before.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも実在することは 明らかみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも実在することは
明らかみたいだね。

engChrName: I've seen that notebook with my own eyes.
engSearchText: I've seen that notebook with my own eyes.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも実在することは 明らかのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも実在することは
明らかのようですね。

engChrName: Say what?!
engSearchText: Say what?!
jpnChrName: わたし、見せてってせがんだんですけど 流石に断られちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
わたし、見せてってせがんだんですけど
流石に断られちゃって……

engChrName: H-How did that happen?!
engSearchText: H-How did that happen?!
jpnChrName: むくれるわたしに、ディンゴさん、 ちょっと笑って頭をポンポンしたんです。
jpnSearchText:
むくれるわたしに、ディンゴさん、
ちょっと笑って頭をポンポンしたんです。

engChrName: Err, as I'm sure you all noticed, when he was alive, I tended to barge in on him while he was trying to work and stuff.
engSearchText:
Err, as I'm sure you all noticed, when he was alive, I
tended to barge in on him while he was trying to
work and stuff.
jpnChrName: 『まあ、いつか見せる機会はあるかもしれない』 『そうならないよう努めるつもりだがな』って……
jpnSearchText:
『まあ、いつか見せる機会はあるかもしれない』
『そうならないよう努めるつもりだがな』って……

engChrName: One day while we were having lunch, I was asking for advice on how to interview people and he was writing stuff in this black leather notebook.
engSearchText:
One day while we were having lunch, I was asking for
advice on how to interview people and he was writing
stuff in this black leather notebook.

engChrName: I asked him what it was since I was curious.
engSearchText: I asked him what it was since I was curious.
jpnChrName: 多分、その頃から覚悟をもって 動かれていたんですね……
jpnSearchText:
多分、その頃から覚悟をもって
動かれていたんですね……

engChrName: He told me it's where he jots his info down—both for his reporting work and info broker stuff.
engSearchText:
He told me it's where he jots his info down—both for
his reporting work and info broker stuff.

engChrName: That definitely sounds like what we're after.
engSearchText: That definitely sounds like what we're after.
jpnChrName: ディンゴがそんな風に言ってたってことは クレイユへの取材には持って行かなかった筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴがそんな風に言ってたってことは
クレイユへの取材には持って行かなかった筈だ。

engChrName: That certainly sounds like the right notebook.
engSearchText: That certainly sounds like the right notebook.
jpnChrName: あいつの自宅もＣＩＤが調べたようだが めぼしい資料は残していなかったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
あいつの自宅もＣＩＤが調べたようだが
めぼしい資料は残していなかったらしい。

engChrName: That certainly sounds like what we're looking for.
engSearchText: That certainly sounds like what we're looking for.
jpnChrName: 多分、他の誰かに預けているか、 何らかの場所に保管してるんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、他の誰かに預けているか、
何らかの場所に保管してるんだろう。

engChrName: At least now we know it's real.
engSearchText: At least now we know it's real.
jpnChrName: さっきも言ったが、他に何でもいい。
jpnSearchText: さっきも言ったが、他に何でもいい。

engChrName: At least now we can confirm that it's real.
engSearchText: At least now we can confirm that it's real.
jpnChrName: ディンゴがその手帳を預けてそうな、 もしくは知ってそうなヤツに心当たりはないか？
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴがその手帳を預けてそうな、
もしくは知ってそうなヤツに心当たりはないか？

engChrName: If nothing else, at least we can now confirm that it's real.
engSearchText:
If nothing else, at least we can now confirm that
it's real.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティみたいな情報屋関連じゃなく、 他の筋での知り合いだと踏んでるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティみたいな情報屋関連じゃなく、
他の筋での知り合いだと踏んでるんだが。

engChrName: I got a little whiny and tried to get him to show me his notes, but of course, he refused.
engSearchText:
I got a little whiny and tried to get him to show me
his notes, but of course, he refused.
jpnChrName: グス……そうですね。 その編集長さんの言葉を考えると……
jpnSearchText:
グス……そうですね。
その編集長さんの言葉を考えると……

engChrName: When I got huffy about it, he kind of laughed and patted me on the head. I still remember exactly what he said.
engSearchText:
When I got huffy about it, he kind of laughed and
patted me on the head. I still remember exactly what
he said.
jpnChrName: …………あ、ひょっとして。
jpnSearchText: …………あ、ひょっとして。

engChrName: 'Who knows? Maybe you'll get a peek at them one of these days. Although if I play my cards right, you shouldn't ever have to.'
engSearchText:
'Who knows? Maybe you'll get a peek at them one of
these days. Although if I play my cards right, you
shouldn't ever have to.'
jpnChrName: 心当たりがあるか？
jpnSearchText: 心当たりがあるか？

engChrName: Oh, wow...
engSearchText: Oh, wow...
jpnChrName: その…… 全然見当違いかもしれませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
その……
全然見当違いかもしれませんけど。

engChrName: He must've already been preparing for what might happen to him in that case...
engSearchText:
He must've already been preparing for what might
happen to him in that case...
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん、『メルド』のお仕事で 風俗系の取材もたまにしてたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん、『メルド』のお仕事で
風俗系の取材もたまにしてたみたいで……

jpnChrName: あ……そ、そうですよね。 （ゴシップ誌には付き物みたいですし。）
jpnSearchText:
あ……そ、そうですよね。
（ゴシップ誌には付き物みたいですし。）

engChrName: If that's the way he was talkin', then we can probably rule out him takin' the notebook with him to Creil.
engSearchText:
If that's the way he was talkin', then we can probably
rule out him takin' the notebook with him to Creil.
jpnChrName: ふーぞく系？
jpnSearchText: ふーぞく系？

engChrName: The CID also apparently swept through his place and couldn't find any real material of note that he left there, either.
engSearchText:
The CID also apparently swept through his place and
couldn't find any real material of note that he left
there, either.
jpnChrName: クク、オトナな記事ってことだ。 アンタにもハードルが高そうだが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、オトナな記事ってことだ。
アンタにもハードルが高そうだが。

engChrName: He had to've either given it to someone else to hang on to, or stashed it somewhere for safekeeping.
engSearchText:
He had to've either given it to someone else to hang
on to, or stashed it somewhere for safekeeping.
jpnChrName: うう……確かにそれでディンゴさんを 責めたこともありますけど……
jpnSearchText:
うう……確かにそれでディンゴさんを
責めたこともありますけど……

engChrName: Which brings me to my next question: can you think of anyone he would've left that notebook with, or anyone who might know where it would be?
engSearchText:
Which brings me to my next question: can you think
of anyone he would've left that notebook with,
or anyone who might know where it would be?
jpnChrName: え、えっちなのはいけないと思います！
jpnSearchText: <C8>え、えっちなのはいけないと思います！

engChrName: Again, it's okay if you don't know anything definitive. Any leads you might have would be great.
engSearchText:
Again, it's okay if you don't know anything definitive.
Any leads you might have would be great.
jpnChrName: まあ、世の需要がある限り、 伝えるのも記者の役割というものだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、世の需要がある限り、
伝えるのも記者の役割というものだ。

engChrName: And just to be clear, I don't mean other brokers like Bermotti. I'm talkin' about other sorts of acquaintances he had.
engSearchText:
And just to be clear, I don't mean other brokers
like Bermotti. I'm talkin' about other sorts of
acquaintances he had.
jpnChrName: マフィアによる悪質な違法風俗を潰す 手がかりなんかも手に入れられるしな。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアによる悪質な違法風俗を潰す
手がかりなんかも手に入れられるしな。

engChrName: Right, of course. Hmm... Let me think. Based on what Mr. Cunning told you...
engSearchText:
Right, of course. Hmm... Let me think. Based on
what Mr. Cunning told you...
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……
jpnSearchText: <C8>な、なるほど……

engChrName: Wait. Could he have...?
engSearchText: Wait. Could he have...?
jpnChrName: ……………ちなみにディンゴさんも そういう店を利用したりするんですか？
jpnSearchText:
……………ちなみにディンゴさんも
そういう店を利用したりするんですか？

engChrName: You think of something?
engSearchText: You think of something?
jpnChrName: ？　取材以外で訪れることはないが。
jpnSearchText: <C8>？　取材以外で訪れることはないが。

engChrName: Maybe. I could be completely wrong, but I can't rule it out, either.
engSearchText:
Maybe. I could be completely wrong, but I can't rule
it out, either.
jpnChrName: そもそも最近は別件で忙しくて 昔のツテを頼ることの方が多いしな……
jpnSearchText:
そもそも最近は別件で忙しくて
昔のツテを頼ることの方が多いしな……

engChrName: Basically, when Dingo was alive, he would sometimes cover...uh...the adult industry for Meld Magazine.
engSearchText:
Basically, when Dingo was alive, he would sometimes
cover...uh...the adult industry for Meld Magazine.
jpnChrName: ルポライターとしては 決して誉められないだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ルポライターとしては
決して誉められないだろうが。

engChrName: H-He did? That's...interesting. (I guess that comes with being a tabloid reporter.)
engSearchText:
H-He did? That's...interesting.
(I guess that comes with being a tabloid reporter.)
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか…… ……でもその方がわたしとしても……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですか……
……でもその方がわたしとしても……

engChrName: What's the adult industry? Doesn't every industry have adults in it?
engSearchText:
What's the adult industry? Doesn't every industry
have adults in it?
jpnChrName: その方が……？
jpnSearchText: <C8>その方が……？

engChrName: It's code for grownup stuff. Certainly more grown up than his wannabe protégé here, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
It's code for grownup stuff. Certainly more grown up
than his wannabe protégé here, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: な、なんでもありませんっ！ ──そうだ、その昔のツテって？
jpnSearchText:
な、なんでもありませんっ！
──そうだ、その昔のツテって？

engChrName: Grr! ANYWAY, one time I confronted him about it.
engSearchText: Grr! ANYWAY, one time I confronted him about it.
jpnChrName: ああ、幾つかの店を経営するやり手で とある地区に拠点を構えてるんだが──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、幾つかの店を経営するやり手で
とある地区に拠点を構えてるんだが──

engChrName: Do... Do you really have to cover such sexual stuff in your articles?!
engSearchText:
Do... Do you really have to cover such sexual stuff in
your articles?!
jpnChrName: ！　まさか女性ですか！？
jpnSearchText: <C8>！　まさか女性ですか！？

engChrName: If readers demand it, it's our job as reporters to give them what they want. Plain and simple.
engSearchText:
If readers demand it, it's our job as reporters to give
them what they want. Plain and simple.
jpnChrName: ……？　ああ、そうだが。
jpnSearchText: <C8>……？　ああ、そうだが。

engChrName: Plus it's a way to get information that can help shut down some of the nastier illegal places run by the mafia.
engSearchText:
Plus it's a way to get information that can help shut
down some of the nastier illegal places run by
the mafia.

engChrName: O-Oh, okay. I guess that makes sense.
engSearchText: O-Oh, okay. I guess that makes sense.
jpnChrName: しゃ、社会面の記事の参考にしたいので わたしにもその方を紹介してくださいっ……！
jpnSearchText:
しゃ、社会面の記事の参考にしたいので
わたしにもその方を紹介してくださいっ……！

engChrName: ...Say, out of curiosity, do you ever...visit those sorts of places yourself?
engSearchText:
...Say, out of curiosity, do you ever...visit those sorts
of places yourself?
jpnChrName: でもディンゴさん、わ（・）た（・）し（・）が（・）行（・）く（・）に（・）は（・） ま（・）だ（・）早（・）い（・）場（・）所（・）だって教えてくれなくて……
jpnSearchText:
でもディンゴさん、わ（・）た（・）し（・）が（・）行（・）く（・）に（・）は（・）
ま（・）だ（・）早（・）い（・）場（・）所（・）だって教えてくれなくて……

engChrName: Huh? Only when I need to for work.
engSearchText: Huh? Only when I need to for work.
jpnChrName: でも今になって考えると そのとある地区っていうのは──
jpnSearchText:
でも今になって考えると
そのとある地区っていうのは──

engChrName: Lately, I've been too busy to go to any places like that myself, so I've had to lean on one of my old contacts a lot to get what I need.
engSearchText:
Lately, I've been too busy to go to any places like that
myself, so I've had to lean on one of my old contacts a
lot to get what I need.
jpnChrName: 十中八九、間違いないんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: 十中八九、間違いないんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Not exactly ideal when my job is supposed to be to report on things I see myself, but it is what it is.
engSearchText:
Not exactly ideal when my job is supposed to be to
report on things I see myself, but it is what it is.
jpnChrName: ああ── それに誰のことか見当も付きそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
それに誰のことか見当も付きそうだ。

engChrName: F-Fair enough, I guess. You sure won't hear me complaining about you—
engSearchText:
F-Fair enough, I guess.
You sure won't hear me complaining about you—
jpnChrName: まさかディンゴの昔馴染みだったとは 知らなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
まさかディンゴの昔馴染みだったとは
知らなかったが。

engChrName: Complaining about what?
engSearchText: Complaining about what?
jpnChrName: えっと……（確かそういった 雰囲気のお店はありましたけど。）
jpnSearchText:
えっと……（確かそういった
雰囲気のお店はありましたけど。）

engChrName: Nothing! Nothing at all! ...Anyway, who's this contact you mentioned?
engSearchText:
Nothing! Nothing at all! ...Anyway, who's this
contact you mentioned?
jpnChrName: えと、とりあえず 黒芒街に向かうんですね？
jpnSearchText:
えと、とりあえず
黒芒街に向かうんですね？

engChrName: Her? She's a woman who operates underground— runs a handful of outlets. Pretty talented, all things considered.
engSearchText:
Her? She's a woman who operates underground—
runs a handful of outlets. Pretty talented, all
things considered.
jpnChrName: ああ、ダメ元で行ってみるぞ。 手がかりが拾えれば御の字だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ダメ元で行ってみるぞ。
手がかりが拾えれば御の字だ。

engChrName: 'She'?! Your contact is a WOMAN?!
engSearchText: 'She'?! Your contact is a WOMAN?!
jpnChrName: そのっ、皆さん──！
jpnSearchText: そのっ、皆さん──！

engChrName: Yeah? Why does that matter?
engSearchText: Yeah? Why does that matter?
jpnChrName: ここから先はわたしも ご一緒させてもらえないでしょうか！？
jpnSearchText:
ここから先はわたしも
ご一緒させてもらえないでしょうか！？

jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: You've got to introduce me to her! It'll... It'll help me write better news articles! Yeah!
engSearchText:
You've got to introduce me to her! It'll... It'll help me
write better news articles! Yeah!
jpnChrName: ですが黒芒街は少々、 危ない場所でもありますし……
jpnSearchText:
ですが黒芒街は少々、
危ない場所でもありますし……

engChrName: Unfortunately, Dingo said it was too soon for me to be going to a place like that, and that was that.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, Dingo said it was too soon for me to
be going to a place like that, and that was that.
jpnChrName: そ、それは前回のことで ちゃんと分かっています……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは前回のことで
ちゃんと分かっています……！

engChrName: Looking back on it, there's only one part of town he could've meant when he said she worked underground, huh?
engSearchText:
Looking back on it, there's only one part of town he
could've meant when he said she worked
underground, huh?
jpnChrName: でも、ディンゴさんが残した あの手帳を捜してるんだったら……
jpnSearchText:
でも、ディンゴさんが残した
あの手帳を捜してるんだったら……

engChrName: Yeah. I think that one goes without saying.
engSearchText: Yeah. I think that one goes without saying.
jpnChrName: わたしにとっても “無関係”じゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
わたしにとっても
“無関係”じゃありません。

engChrName: Not only that, I think I just might know the woman he's talkin' about.
engSearchText:
Not only that, I think I just might know the woman
he's talkin' about.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、いつかこいつを 見せる機会があるかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、いつかこいつを
見せる機会があるかもしれない。

engChrName: Never would've guessed those two had any history, but just goes to show it's a small world we live in.
engSearchText:
Never would've guessed those two had any history,
but just goes to show it's a small world we live in.
jpnChrName: そうならないよう努めるつもりだがな。
jpnSearchText: そうならないよう努めるつもりだがな。

engChrName: Uhh... (I certainly remember there being a business that fit the bill when we were down there.)
engSearchText:
Uhh...
(I certainly remember there being a business that fit
the bill when we were down there.)
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Does that mean we're going to the Blacklight District?
engSearchText:
Does that mean we're going to the
Blacklight District?
jpnChrName: ふう……有益な情報も 貰っちまったことだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……有益な情報も
貰っちまったことだしな。

engChrName: Yeah. Who knows if we'll turn anything up down there, but it's worth a shot.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Who knows if we'll turn anything up down
there, but it's worth a shot.
jpnChrName: ──危険な場所じゃ前に出ないこと、 それとお前さんにも手伝ってもらうぜ？
jpnSearchText:
──危険な場所じゃ前に出ないこと、
それとお前さんにも手伝ってもらうぜ？

engChrName: H-Hey, you guys?
engSearchText: H-Hey, you guys?
jpnChrName: ……！　はいっ、 よろしくお願いしますっ！
jpnSearchText:
……！　はいっ、
よろしくお願いしますっ！

engChrName: I want to go with you! Could I? Please?
engSearchText: I want to go with you! Could I? Please?
jpnChrName: マリエルが一時的に同行者となった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>マリエルが一時的に同行者となった。

engChrName: I don't know...
engSearchText: I don't know...
jpnChrName: （店内にカーチスらしいヤツはいないみてえだ。   ここは店長に話を聞いてみるかね……）
jpnSearchText:
（店内にカーチスらしいヤツはいないみてえだ。
ここは店長に話を聞いてみるかね……）

engChrName: Yeah, it gets kind of dangerous in the Blacklight District.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it gets kind of dangerous in the
Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: ちょっといいか？ カーチスっつうヤツについて聞きてえんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっといいか？
カーチスっつうヤツについて聞きてえんだが。

engChrName: Oh, I already know how dangerous it can be— believe me.
engSearchText:
Oh, I already know how dangerous it can be—
believe me.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達はカーチスの母親から 依頼を受けた旨を伝え……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達はカーチスの母親から
依頼を受けた旨を伝え……

engChrName: But we're talking about Dingo's notes here.
engSearchText: But we're talking about Dingo's notes here.
jpnChrName: カーチスの変化についてかいつまんで説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カーチスの変化についてかいつまんで説明した。

engChrName: What's inside them matters to me, too, you know.
engSearchText: What's inside them matters to me, too, you know.
jpnChrName: そうだったの……カーチス君も大変ね。
jpnSearchText: そうだったの……カーチス君も大変ね。

engChrName: Who knows? Maybe you'll get a peek at them one of these days.
engSearchText:
Who knows? Maybe you'll get a peek at them one of
these days.
jpnChrName: 常連客だから、受験勉強が上手くいくようにって 私もバイトの子も見守ってたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
常連客だから、受験勉強が上手くいくようにって
私もバイトの子も見守ってたんだけど……

engChrName: Although if I play my cards right, you shouldn't ever have to.
engSearchText:
Although if I play my cards right, you shouldn't ever
have to.
jpnChrName: 残念だけど、プライベートな事は何も知らないわ。 勿論そのタブレットについてもね。
jpnSearchText:
残念だけど、プライベートな事は何も知らないわ。
勿論そのタブレットについてもね。

engChrName: She does have a point. What do you think, Van?
engSearchText: She does have a point. What do you think, Van?
jpnChrName: そうでしたか…… ちなみにそのバイトの方というのは？
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたか……
ちなみにそのバイトの方というのは？

engChrName: ...All right. You can come. You did give us some valuable info, so it's only fair. But you gotta promise two things:
engSearchText:
...All right. You can come. You did give us some
valuable info, so it's only fair. But you gotta promise
two things:
jpnChrName: あっ、貴女もよくウチに来てくれる アラミスの子よね。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、貴女もよくウチに来てくれる
アラミスの子よね。

engChrName: One, you'll stay behind us down there. No running ahead. And two, you'll carry your own weight and help us out, too. Deal?
engSearchText:
One, you'll stay behind us down there. No
running ahead. And two, you'll carry your own weight
and help us out, too. Deal?
jpnChrName: それなら知ってるんじゃない？ アルベール君って言うんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
それなら知ってるんじゃない？
アルベール君って言うんだけど。

engChrName: Deal! Thanks, Van! I promise, you won't regret this!
engSearchText: Deal! Thanks, Van! I promise, you won't regret this!
jpnChrName: あっ、アルベール君の事でしたか……！ 確かにここで働いていますもんね。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、アルベール君の事でしたか……！
確かにここで働いていますもんね。

engChrName: Marielle has temporarily joined the group.
engSearchText: Marielle has temporarily joined the group.
jpnChrName: ええ、カーチス君におススメの参考書を教えたりして 二人とも仲が良さそうだったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、カーチス君におススメの参考書を教えたりして
二人とも仲が良さそうだったわ。

engChrName: (Hmm... I don't see anyone who looks like they could be Curtis. I'll hit up the manager and see what she has to say.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I don't see anyone who looks like they could
be Curtis. I'll hit up the manager and see what she
has to say.)
jpnChrName: アルベール君なら私よりも彼について 知ってる事があるんじゃないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
アルベール君なら私よりも彼について
知ってる事があるんじゃないかしら。

engChrName: Excuse me. Does the name Curtis ring a bell, by any chance?
engSearchText:
Excuse me. Does the name Curtis ring a bell, by
any chance?
jpnChrName: 問題はあの真面目メガネが どこにいるかっつう事だが……
jpnSearchText:
問題はあの真面目メガネが
どこにいるかっつう事だが……

engChrName: Van explained the request he and the others received from Curtis' mother.
engSearchText:
Van explained the request he and the others received
from Curtis' mother.
jpnChrName: それなら……今の時間なら学校か、 オーベル地区のどこかにいるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
それなら……今の時間なら学校か、
オーベル地区のどこかにいるかもしれません。

engChrName: They also explained his stark change in personality.
engSearchText: They also explained his stark change in personality.
jpnChrName: そういう事なら行ってみましょうか！
jpnSearchText: そういう事なら行ってみましょうか！

engChrName: Oh, wow... Poor Curtis. I had no idea he was going through all of that.
engSearchText:
Oh, wow... Poor Curtis. I had no idea he was going
through all of that.
jpnChrName: ああ、何か知ってるといいんだけどな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、何か知ってるといいんだけどな。

engChrName: He comes here a lot, so one of my workers and I made a point of looking after him and helping him with his studies.
engSearchText:
He comes here a lot, so one of my workers and I
made a point of looking after him and helping him
with his studies.
jpnChrName: いましたね……あの人が売人ですか。 いかにもって感じの雰囲気ですね。
jpnSearchText:
いましたね……あの人が売人ですか。
いかにもって感じの雰囲気ですね。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I couldn't tell you anything about his personal life, or those mints you mentioned. That's all news to me, too.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, I couldn't tell you anything about his
personal life, or those mints you mentioned. That's all
news to me, too.
jpnChrName: 客を装って声をかけてみるか。
jpnSearchText: 客を装って声をかけてみるか。

engChrName: That's okay. We appreciate you talking to us at all. If you don't mind me asking, could you tell us about the other worker?
engSearchText:
That's okay. We appreciate you talking to us at all.
If you don't mind me asking, could you tell us about
the other worker?
jpnChrName: 大所帯だと警戒されちまうから、 お前らは待っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
大所帯だと警戒されちまうから、
お前らは待っててくれ。

engChrName: Oh, I recognize you! You come here a lot, too. You're from Aramis, aren't you?
engSearchText:
Oh, I recognize you! You come here a lot, too.
You're from Aramis, aren't you?
jpnChrName: そうですね、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: そうですね、分かりました。

engChrName: His name is Albert. You probably know him, right?
engSearchText: His name is Albert. You probably know him, right?
jpnChrName: オイオイ、若者相手に商売をしてんだろ？ アンタが行って相手をしてくれんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ、若者相手に商売をしてんだろ？
アンタが行って相手をしてくれんのかよ。

engChrName: Yes, absolutely! I can't believe I forgot that this is where he works.
engSearchText:
Yes, absolutely! I can't believe I forgot that this is
where he works.
jpnChrName: お前な……隙あらば茶々入れやがって……
jpnSearchText: お前な……隙あらば茶々入れやがって……

engChrName: He sure does. He and Curtis seemed to get along really well. He would recommend reference books for Curtis to buy and whatnot.
engSearchText:
He sure does. He and Curtis seemed to get along
really well. He would recommend reference books for
Curtis to buy and whatnot.
jpnChrName: いやでも、どうなんだ？ 学生がターゲットとなると流石にな……
jpnSearchText:
いやでも、どうなんだ？
学生がターゲットとなると流石にな……

engChrName: Between the two of us, I imagine Albert would know more about him than I do.
engSearchText:
Between the two of us, I imagine Albert would know
more about him than I do.
jpnChrName: 気にし過ぎですよヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: 気にし過ぎですよヴァンさん。

engChrName: Fat load of good that'll do unless we can track the nerd down. Any ideas where he might be?
engSearchText:
Fat load of good that'll do unless we can track the
nerd down. Any ideas where he might be?
jpnChrName: 自信を持ってくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: 自信を持ってくださいっ！

engChrName: Hmm... At this hour, he's probably either on campus or somewhere around the Auber District.
engSearchText:
Hmm... At this hour, he's probably either on campus
or somewhere around the Auber District.
jpnChrName: いや……ここはお前が行って来い。
jpnSearchText: いや……ここはお前が行って来い。

engChrName: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go find him!
engSearchText: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go find him!
jpnChrName: ある程度は薬に興味がありそうな 不良じゃねえと通じねえだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ある程度は薬に興味がありそうな
不良じゃねえと通じねえだろうしな。

engChrName: That's exactly what we're gonna do. Fingers crossed he doesn't turn out to be a dead end.
engSearchText:
That's exactly what we're gonna do. Fingers crossed
he doesn't turn out to be a dead end.
jpnChrName: ハッ、まあ上手くやってやるから見ておけや。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、まあ上手くやってやるから見ておけや。

engChrName: There he is! That's gotta be the seller, right? He just looks like it.
engSearchText:
There he is! That's gotta be the seller, right? He just
looks like it.
jpnChrName: よう、アンタが噂の いいモンを売ってるっつー売人か？
jpnSearchText:
よう、アンタが噂の
いいモンを売ってるっつー売人か？

engChrName: Only one way to find out. I'll pose as a customer and try talking to him.
engSearchText:
Only one way to find out. I'll pose as a customer and
try talking to him.
jpnChrName: ……なんだお前？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだお前？

engChrName: You guys hang out here. If we approach him as group, he'll probably get spooked.
engSearchText:
You guys hang out here. If we approach him as group,
he'll probably get spooked.
jpnChrName: 仲のいいヤツから話を聞いたんだよ。 アンタがハイになれるタブレットを持ってるってな。
jpnSearchText:
仲のいいヤツから話を聞いたんだよ。
アンタがハイになれるタブレットを持ってるってな。

engChrName: Makes sense to me. Good luck, Van!
engSearchText: Makes sense to me. Good luck, Van!
jpnChrName: オレにも分けてもらえねえか？ ミラならいくらでも出すぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オレにも分けてもらえねえか？
ミラならいくらでも出すぜ。

engChrName: Whoa! Hold on a minute, chief. We're talking about a guy who deals to kids. He's not gonna wanna sell to an old fart like you.
engSearchText:
Whoa! Hold on a minute, chief. We're talking about
a guy who deals to kids. He's not gonna wanna sell to
an old fart like you.
jpnChrName: ああ……もしかして、 あのひょろっこいガキから聞いたのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……もしかして、
あのひょろっこいガキから聞いたのか？

engChrName: *sigh* You'll never miss an opportunity to remind me that I'm older than you, do you?
engSearchText:
*sigh* You'll never miss an opportunity to remind me
that I'm older than you, do you?
jpnChrName: あのタブレットは、聞いた事もねえ 製薬会社から回って来たモンでな。
jpnSearchText:
あのタブレットは、聞いた事もねえ
製薬会社から回って来たモンでな。

engChrName: But you might have a point. If his client base is students like Curtis, then I sure as hell am out.
engSearchText:
But you might have a point. If his client base is
students like Curtis, then I sure as hell am out.
jpnChrName: 会社がサツにパクられたのか、何なのか……
jpnSearchText: 会社がサツにパクられたのか、何なのか……

engChrName: Oh, Van, don't let Aaron get to you. You're still perfectly young!
engSearchText:
Oh, Van, don't let Aaron get to you. You're still
perfectly young!
jpnChrName: 一瞬だけ出回ったきりで廃版…… 少し前にあのガキに売ったのが最後だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
一瞬だけ出回ったきりで廃版……
少し前にあのガキに売ったのが最後だったんだ。

engChrName: Yeah, don't worry about it! You should be more confident!
engSearchText:
Yeah, don't worry about it! You should be
more confident!
jpnChrName: んだよ、シケてやがんな。
jpnSearchText: んだよ、シケてやがんな。

engChrName: Nah, I agree. I'm not the best man for the job. It oughta be someone who looks rebellious enough to enjoy taking drugs, or else our guy won't bite.
engSearchText:
Nah, I agree. I'm not the best man for the job.
It oughta be someone who looks rebellious enough to
enjoy taking drugs, or else our guy won't bite.
jpnChrName: まあな、もっと仕入れられりゃ儲かったんだが。
jpnSearchText: まあな、もっと仕入れられりゃ儲かったんだが。

engChrName: You're up, kid. Show this old man what a young punk like you can deliver.
engSearchText:
You're up, kid. Show this old man what a young punk
like you can deliver.
jpnChrName: とまあ、そう説明してやったのに あのガキはえらく執着してるみたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
とまあ、そう説明してやったのに
あのガキはえらく執着してるみたいでな。

engChrName: Hell yeah! I'll deliver, all right. Just watch and learn!
engSearchText: Hell yeah! I'll deliver, all right. Just watch and learn!
jpnChrName: いいから売ってくれって、 さっきも怒鳴り散らかしてきやがったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いいから売ってくれって、
さっきも怒鳴り散らかしてきやがったんだ。

engChrName: Yo, dude. Heard you could hook me up with some good shit. That true?
engSearchText:
Yo, dude. Heard you could hook me up with some
good shit. That true?
jpnChrName: ったく……これだから 中毒になったヤツは面倒なんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……これだから
中毒になったヤツは面倒なんだよなぁ。

engChrName: ...Hmm? Who the hell are you?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? Who the hell are you?
jpnChrName: （アタリだな……   少し前に例のガキが来てやがったのか。）
jpnSearchText:
（アタリだな……
少し前に例のガキが来てやがったのか。）

engChrName: A good friend of mine told me all about you. Said you've got some kickass mints that can get you high—emphasis on the 'kick.'
engSearchText:
A good friend of mine told me all about you.
Said you've got some kickass mints that can get you
high—emphasis on the 'kick.'
jpnChrName: そいつは大変だったな。 で、その後はどうしたんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
そいつは大変だったな。
で、その後はどうしたんだよ？

engChrName: Mind hooking me up with some? I'll pay you whatever you want if it's that good.
engSearchText:
Mind hooking me up with some? I'll pay you
whatever you want if it's that good.
jpnChrName: 他の商品を勧めてみたんだが あのタブレット以外は興味がないらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
他の商品を勧めてみたんだが
あのタブレット以外は興味がないらしくてな。

engChrName: Yeah, I know what you're talking about, man. That lanky ass schoolkid fill you in?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I know what you're talking about, man.
That lanky ass schoolkid fill you in?
jpnChrName: それなら黒芒街に行ってみろって 適当に追っ払ってやったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら黒芒街に行ってみろって
適当に追っ払ってやったぜ。

engChrName: I'll let you in on a secret: that stuff originally came straight from some pharmaceutical company.
engSearchText:
I'll let you in on a secret: that stuff originally came
straight from some pharmaceutical company.
jpnChrName: 丁寧に地下への行き方まで教えてやってな。
jpnSearchText: 丁寧に地下への行き方まで教えてやってな。

engChrName: I hadn't heard of 'em before, but I guess they got busted by the cops or something like that.
engSearchText:
I hadn't heard of 'em before, but I guess they got
busted by the cops or something like that.
jpnChrName: へえ、黒芒街ねえ……
jpnSearchText: へえ、黒芒街ねえ……

engChrName: They were out on the market for only a hot minute before they were taken off. I just sold the last of my stock to that kid a little while ago.
engSearchText:
They were out on the market for only a hot minute
before they were taken off. I just sold the last of my
stock to that kid a little while ago.
jpnChrName: （あそこなら本当にどっかで   売ってる可能性はありそうだけどな。）
jpnSearchText:
（あそこなら本当にどっかで
売ってる可能性はありそうだけどな。）

engChrName: You kidding me? All that talk and you've got nothing to deliver? Way to let a guy down.
engSearchText:
You kidding me? All that talk and you've got nothing
to deliver? Way to let a guy down.
jpnChrName: ……で、結局アンタも あのタブレット狙いなんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
……で、結局アンタも
あのタブレット狙いなんだったか。

engChrName: Hey, trust me—I'd love to have more so I could make even more money. It is what it is.
engSearchText:
Hey, trust me—I'd love to have more so I could make
even more money. It is what it is.
jpnChrName: 他のブツなら色々と取り揃えてあるぜ。 無料で１回試してみねえか？
jpnSearchText:
他のブツなら色々と取り揃えてあるぜ。
無料で１回試してみねえか？

engChrName: Seems like that kid's developed a real dependence on 'em, though.
engSearchText:
Seems like that kid's developed a real dependence on
'em, though.
jpnChrName: いいや、俺も遠慮しとくわ。 探してんのはあのタブレットだからな。
jpnSearchText:
いいや、俺も遠慮しとくわ。
探してんのはあのタブレットだからな。

engChrName: I tried telling him what I just told you, but he got all pissy with me. Told me to give him more before chucking what he had like a little baby.
engSearchText:
I tried telling him what I just told you, but he got all
pissy with me. Told me to give him more before
chucking what he had like a little baby.
jpnChrName: チッ、つまんねーの。
jpnSearchText: チッ、つまんねーの。

engChrName: Ugh. Stuff like that's why I freaking hate dealing with addicts like him. They've always gotta make everything hard.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Stuff like that's why I freaking hate dealing with
addicts like him. They've always gotta make
everything hard.
jpnChrName: なんか白けちまったし、 今日の所は別の場所で商売するかな。
jpnSearchText:
なんか白けちまったし、
今日の所は別の場所で商売するかな。

engChrName: (Bingo. So the kid really did just come through here.)
engSearchText: (Bingo. So the kid really did just come through here.)
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな、 色々と収穫があったみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほどな、
色々と収穫があったみてえだな。

engChrName: Sounds pretty shitty, yeah. What'd he do after he threw that temper tantrum?
engSearchText:
Sounds pretty shitty, yeah. What'd he do after he
threw that temper tantrum?
jpnChrName: はい、それにカーチスさんの 足取りが掴めましたね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、それにカーチスさんの
足取りが掴めましたね。

engChrName: I suggested some other stuff to try, but he wouldn't listen to me. All he wants are those mints, it seems.
engSearchText:
I suggested some other stuff to try, but he wouldn't
listen to me. All he wants are those mints, it seems.
jpnChrName: タブレットの出所についても 見当がついてきましたね。
jpnSearchText:
タブレットの出所についても
見当がついてきましたね。

engChrName: So I told him to try the Blacklight District just to finally get the kid out of my face.
engSearchText:
So I told him to try the Blacklight District just to
finally get the kid out of my face.
jpnChrName: ああ、製薬会社とか言ってたが 大方《Ａ》のペーパーカンパニーなんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、製薬会社とか言ってたが
大方《Ａ》のペーパーカンパニーなんだろ。

engChrName: Even told him how to get down there for good measure. Hopefully he'll leave me alone now.
engSearchText:
Even told him how to get down there for
good measure. Hopefully he'll leave me alone now.
jpnChrName: 後はカーチス本人から 話を聞けりゃ十分だな。
jpnSearchText:
後はカーチス本人から
話を聞けりゃ十分だな。

engChrName: The Blacklight District, huh? That's a good idea.
engSearchText: The Blacklight District, huh? That's a good idea.
jpnChrName: 今は黒芒街に行ってるみてえだし、 連れ戻しがてら聞いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
今は黒芒街に行ってるみてえだし、
連れ戻しがてら聞いてみるか。

engChrName: (I could definitely see someone down there hawking that stuff in some dark and dingy corner.)
engSearchText:
(I could definitely see someone down there hawking
that stuff in some dark and dingy corner.)
jpnChrName: 了解。
jpnSearchText: 了解。

engChrName: Is that all you were after, too? Just those mints?
engSearchText: Is that all you were after, too? Just those mints?
jpnChrName: 早速参りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: 早速参りましょうか。

engChrName: I've got plenty of other perfectly good stuff, you know. I'll even give you a free hit. You should try it.
engSearchText:
I've got plenty of other perfectly good stuff,
you know. I'll even give you a free hit. You should
try it.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街に長居するだけでも 子供にとっては危険だろうしね。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街に長居するだけでも
子供にとっては危険だろうしね。

engChrName: Nah, I'm good, man. I'm only interested in those mints, too.
engSearchText:
Nah, I'm good, man. I'm only interested in those
mints, too.
jpnChrName: うむ、ここで彼に追いつくとしよう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、ここで彼に追いつくとしよう。

engChrName: Great—thanks for nothing. What a waste of time this was.
engSearchText:
Great—thanks for nothing. What a waste of time
this was.
jpnChrName: （そういや、走り屋の連中から   レースの面子を集めるよう頼まれてたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや、走り屋の連中から
レースの面子を集めるよう頼まれてたな。）

engChrName: Think I'm gonna try selling somewhere else today. Scene here's deader than a stuffed pom.
engSearchText:
Think I'm gonna try selling somewhere else today.
Scene here's deader than a stuffed pom.
jpnChrName: （ジャックのやつも、そこそこ車好きだしな。   試しに声をかけてみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ジャックのやつも、そこそこ車好きだしな。
試しに声をかけてみるか。）

engChrName: ...Nice work. Sounds like you got a lot out of that dirtbag.
engSearchText:
...Nice work. Sounds like you got a lot out of
that dirtbag.
jpnChrName: ちょっといいか？ 実は走り屋の連中から依頼があってな。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっといいか？
実は走り屋の連中から依頼があってな。

engChrName: I'm just glad we have an idea of where Curtis might be now.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad we have an idea of where Curtis might
be now.
jpnChrName: レースの参加者を探してるんだが……
jpnSearchText: レースの参加者を探してるんだが……

engChrName: I bet we can guess where those mints came from, too.
engSearchText: I bet we can guess where those mints came from, too.
jpnChrName: レースの参加者だと……？ これまた楽しそうな依頼だな。
jpnSearchText:
レースの参加者だと……？
これまた楽しそうな依頼だな。

engChrName: Yeah. It was probably a dummy corporation set up by A.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It was probably a dummy corporation set up
by A.
jpnChrName: ヴァンもジャックも 興味ありそうな話じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンもジャックも
興味ありそうな話じゃない。

engChrName: Now all we need to do is find the kid and hear his side of the story.
engSearchText:
Now all we need to do is find the kid and hear his
side of the story.
jpnChrName: ……っつう訳なんだが、どうだ？ よければジャックにも参加してほしいんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
……っつう訳なんだが、どうだ？
よければジャックにも参加してほしいんだがな。

engChrName: Seein' as he's on his way to the Blacklight District, let's focus on draggin' him out first. We can question him after that.
engSearchText:
Seein' as he's on his way to the Blacklight District,
let's focus on draggin' him out first. We can question
him after that.
jpnChrName: 行ってきたら？ 最近ドライブし足りないって言ってたじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
行ってきたら？
最近ドライブし足りないって言ってたじゃない。

engChrName: Very well.
engSearchText: Very well.
jpnChrName: いやいや、首都に来るまでの道で 十分ドライブは満喫できたっての。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、首都に来るまでの道で
十分ドライブは満喫できたっての。

engChrName: Shall we be on our way, then?
engSearchText: Shall we be on our way, then?
jpnChrName: ……だがまあ、お前さんが面子を 集めてるとなりゃ面白くなりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……だがまあ、お前さんが面子を
集めてるとなりゃ面白くなりそうだ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me. A place like that's going to be dangerous for a kid like him before long.
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me. A place like that's going to be
dangerous for a kid like him before long.
jpnChrName: 勝負する機会ってのも中々ねえし、 参加してみてもいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
勝負する機会ってのも中々ねえし、
参加してみてもいいかもな。

engChrName: Let's track him and get him out of there.
engSearchText: Let's track him and get him out of there.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そう来ると思ったぜ。 それじゃ後で待ち合わせ場所に来てくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そう来ると思ったぜ。
それじゃ後で待ち合わせ場所に来てくれよ。

engChrName: (Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to scout some people.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to scout
some people.)
jpnChrName: おう。
jpnSearchText: おう。

engChrName: (I know Jack likes him some cars. I'll see if he's up for it.)
engSearchText:
(I know Jack likes him some cars. I'll see if he's up
for it.)
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: Hey, Jack. Got a sec? I'm doing a job for some street racers at the moment.
engSearchText:
Hey, Jack. Got a sec? I'm doing a job for some street
racers at the moment.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: They're looking for some racers to fill out their lineup for today.
engSearchText:
They're looking for some racers to fill out their
lineup for today.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Sounds like a pretty fun gig you've got there.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? Sounds like a pretty fun gig you've
got there.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: I can see how it'd catch both you boys' attention for sure.
engSearchText:
I can see how it'd catch both you boys' attention
for sure.
jpnChrName: あっ、ヴァンさん！ お待ちしてましたよー！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、ヴァンさん！
お待ちしてましたよー！

engChrName: Anyway, you can probably see where this is going. You in, Jack? We'd love to have you.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you can probably see where this is going.
You in, Jack? We'd love to have you.
jpnChrName: お前さんから依頼が来るとはな。
jpnSearchText: お前さんから依頼が来るとはな。

engChrName: You should go! You were just talking about how you haven't gotten to drive as much as you'd like lately.
engSearchText:
You should go! You were just talking about how you
haven't gotten to drive as much as you'd like lately.
jpnChrName: 生徒会メンバーが勢揃い…… 内容の予想はつきそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会メンバーが勢揃い……
内容の予想はつきそうだが。

engChrName: Oh, trust me, I got my fill on the drive all the way up to here. I'm plenty caught up now at this point.
engSearchText:
Oh, trust me, I got my fill on the drive all the way up
to here. I'm plenty caught up now at this point.
jpnChrName: うーん、その様子じゃ まだ見てもらってないみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、その様子じゃ
まだ見てもらってないみたいですね。

engChrName: That being said...knowing the type of people you can wrangle up, I'm sure it'll be one hell of a fun race.
engSearchText:
That being said...knowing the type of people you can
wrangle up, I'm sure it'll be one hell of a fun race.
jpnChrName: （なるほどな、掲示板を確認してみるか。）
jpnSearchText: （なるほどな、掲示板を確認してみるか。）

engChrName: I guess I'm in. Not often I get to race against other people these days.
engSearchText:
I guess I'm in. Not often I get to race against other
people these days.
jpnChrName: ふふ、説明させてもらうわね。 ──アルベール君。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、説明させてもらうわね。
──アルベール君。

engChrName: Nice. I knew I could count on you. See you at the meetup point later, then?
engSearchText:
Nice. I knew I could count on you. See you at the
meetup point later, then?
jpnChrName: 僕ですか！？
jpnSearchText: 僕ですか！？

engChrName: Sounds good.
engSearchText: Sounds good.
jpnChrName: えー、コホン……１ヶ月後の話だが。
jpnSearchText: えー、コホン……１ヶ月後の話だが。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: 来たる新年を祝って、僕らアラミス生は ささやかなイベントを開くことになったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
来たる新年を祝って、僕らアラミス生は
ささやかなイベントを開くことになったんだ。

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: オーベル地区に住む子供たちとの 地域交流会のようなものでな。
jpnSearchText:
オーベル地区に住む子供たちとの
地域交流会のようなものでな。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: 学校側としては“高校生の地域貢献”という 名目があるけれど。
jpnSearchText:
学校側としては“高校生の地域貢献”という
名目があるけれど。

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: 子供たちのメンタルケアも兼ねてるの。 非日常な出来事が続いたこともあるしね。
jpnSearchText:
子供たちのメンタルケアも兼ねてるの。
非日常な出来事が続いたこともあるしね。

engChrName: Hey, Van! We've been waiting for you.
engSearchText: Hey, Van! We've been waiting for you.
jpnChrName: そこで、子供たちに喜んでもらえそうな スイーツを配ることにしたんです！
jpnSearchText:
そこで、子供たちに喜んでもらえそうな
スイーツを配ることにしたんです！

engChrName: Never thought I'd answer a call from you.
engSearchText: Never thought I'd answer a call from you.
jpnChrName: 街で売ってる物から候補を見繕うことになりまして。
jpnSearchText: 街で売ってる物から候補を見繕うことになりまして。

engChrName: I see the whole Student Council's here. I think I can guess what you guys want from me.
engSearchText:
I see the whole Student Council's here. I think I can
guess what you guys want from me.
jpnChrName: で、４ｓｐｇを寄越したわけか。
jpnSearchText: で、４ｓｐｇを寄越したわけか。

engChrName: Oh! Can you come back after you've seen the request I sent?
engSearchText:
Oh! Can you come back after you've seen
the request I sent?
jpnChrName: アニエスに相談したら 『ぜひ解決事務所で対応したい』って言ってくれて。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスに相談したら
『ぜひ解決事務所で対応したい』って言ってくれて。

engChrName: (Fair enough, I guess. Better check the local bulletin board.)
engSearchText:
(Fair enough, I guess. Better check the local
bulletin board.)
jpnChrName: うふふ、４ｓｐｇって １回やってみたかったんですよー。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、４ｓｐｇって
１回やってみたかったんですよー。

engChrName: Let's get straight to business. Albert, you start.
engSearchText: Let's get straight to business. Albert, you start.
jpnChrName: すみません、私が勝手に……
jpnSearchText: すみません、私が勝手に……

engChrName: Me? Why do I have to go first?!
engSearchText: Me? Why do I have to go first?!
jpnChrName: もちろんタダとは言いません。
jpnSearchText: もちろんタダとは言いません。

engChrName: Ahem! ...Anyway, it's about our plans for next month.
engSearchText: Ahem! ...Anyway, it's about our plans for next month.
jpnChrName: 選んでもらった候補は ヴァンさんにも試食してもらいます。
jpnSearchText:
選んでもらった候補は
ヴァンさんにも試食してもらいます。

engChrName: We've decided to put on a small event as Aramis students to celebrate the upcoming new year.
engSearchText:
We've decided to put on a small event as Aramis
students to celebrate the upcoming new year.
jpnChrName: つまり、学校の予算（人のお金）でおいしいスイーツを食べられる！
jpnSearchText: つまり、学校の予算（人のお金）でおいしいスイーツを食べられる！

engChrName: We're planning on having a meetup with the children living in the Auber District.
engSearchText:
We're planning on having a meetup with the children
living in the Auber District.
jpnChrName: オデット、言い方……
jpnSearchText: オデット、言い方……

engChrName: Officially, the school is framing it as a way for us students to make a contribution to the area.
engSearchText:
Officially, the school is framing it as a way for us
students to make a contribution to the area.
jpnChrName: 間違ってはないが……
jpnSearchText: 間違ってはないが……

engChrName: But it's also intended to be therapeutic for the kids, too, seeing as things have been so unusual.
engSearchText:
But it's also intended to be therapeutic for the kids,
too, seeing as things have been so unusual.
jpnChrName: 俺への攻略法が あちこちに浸透してるのは度し難いが……
jpnSearchText:
俺への攻略法が
あちこちに浸透してるのは度し難いが……

engChrName: One thing we want to do is hand out treats for those kids to hopefully enjoy.
engSearchText:
One thing we want to do is hand out treats for those
kids to hopefully enjoy.
jpnChrName: 今は置いておこう。 実際、この時間なら手を貸しやすいしな。
jpnSearchText:
今は置いておこう。
実際、この時間なら手を貸しやすいしな。

engChrName: And what better way to decide than to round up what's for sale around town and try them out?
engSearchText:
And what better way to decide than to round up
what's for sale around town and try them out?
jpnChrName: 交流会で子供たちに配るお菓子を 決めなきゃいけないんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
交流会で子供たちに配るお菓子を
決めなきゃいけないんですけど……

engChrName: That's where we come in, huh?
engSearchText: That's where we come in, huh?
jpnChrName: ここはやっぱり！ スイーツ好きなヴァンさんの目利きを頼れたらなと！
jpnSearchText:
ここはやっぱり！
スイーツ好きなヴァンさんの目利きを頼れたらなと！

engChrName: Yep! When I asked Agnès for her thoughts, she insisted she wanted to handle it as a work assignment.
engSearchText:
Yep! When I asked Agnès for her thoughts, she
insisted she wanted to handle it as a work assignment.
jpnChrName: とは言ったものの、巡回が残っててな。
jpnSearchText: とは言ったものの、巡回が残っててな。

engChrName: Which is fine by me. I always wanted to post at least one 4SPG at some point, heehee.
engSearchText:
Which is fine by me. I always wanted to post at least
one 4SPG at some point, heehee.
jpnChrName: そこら辺が落ち着いた頃合いに 手を貸すってことでどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
そこら辺が落ち着いた頃合いに
手を貸すってことでどうだ？

engChrName: I'm sorry, Van. I couldn't resist offering...
engSearchText: I'm sorry, Van. I couldn't resist offering...
jpnChrName: もちろん、それで大丈夫です！ 連絡待ってますね～！
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、それで大丈夫です！
連絡待ってますね～！

engChrName: Of course, we don't expect you to help us for free.
engSearchText: Of course, we don't expect you to help us for free.
jpnChrName: うちのバイトの誼（よしみ）だ。 その依頼、引き受けるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
うちのバイトの誼（よしみ）だ。
その依頼、引き受けるぜ。

engChrName: You're more than welcome to sample any sweets you decide to bring back to us.
engSearchText:
You're more than welcome to sample any sweets you
decide to bring back to us.
jpnChrName: やった、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: やった、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Pretty great, right? You'll get to eat lots of delicious sweets, all on the school's mira!
engSearchText:
Pretty great, right? You'll get to eat lots of delicious
sweets, all on the school's mira!
jpnChrName: ま、どこまで力になれるか分からねぇが。
jpnSearchText: ま、どこまで力になれるか分からねぇが。

engChrName: Odette, you shouldn't put it like that.
engSearchText: Odette, you shouldn't put it like that.
jpnChrName: あら、スイーツへのこだわりと愛は人一倍でしょう？
jpnSearchText: あら、スイーツへのこだわりと愛は人一倍でしょう？

engChrName: I mean, where's the lie...?
engSearchText: I mean, where's the lie...?
jpnChrName: この子と一緒に回って、 良さそうなお菓子を見繕ってちょうだいな。
jpnSearchText:
この子と一緒に回って、
良さそうなお菓子を見繕ってちょうだいな。

engChrName: *sigh* As much as it pains me to admit, I guess there's no denying that my...weaknesses...are all but public knowledge at this point.
engSearchText:
*sigh* As much as it pains me to admit, I guess there's
no denying that my...weaknesses...are all but public
knowledge at this point.
jpnChrName: お前さんは行かなくていいのか？
jpnSearchText: お前さんは行かなくていいのか？

engChrName: Regardless, lucky for you kids, I do have some time to spare, so...
engSearchText:
Regardless, lucky for you kids, I do have some time to
spare, so...
jpnChrName: 行きたいのは山々ですけど、 レン先輩やアルベールとイベントの内容を固めたくて。
jpnSearchText:
行きたいのは山々ですけど、
レン先輩やアルベールとイベントの内容を固めたくて。

engChrName: We need to figure out what treats we're going to hand out to the kids when we have our meetup.
engSearchText:
We need to figure out what treats we're going to
hand out to the kids when we have our meetup.
jpnChrName: お菓子選びはアニエスにお任せします！
jpnSearchText: お菓子選びはアニエスにお任せします！

engChrName: And what better judge to help us figure that out than you and your big sweet tooth, Van!
engSearchText:
And what better judge to help us figure that out than
you and your big sweet tooth, Van!
jpnChrName: お前もそれでいいのか？
jpnSearchText: お前もそれでいいのか？

engChrName: Let me wrap up my patrol around town first. I've still got some spots I need to check out.
engSearchText:
Let me wrap up my patrol around town first. I've still
got some spots I need to check out.
jpnChrName: も、もちろんです！
jpnSearchText: も、もちろんです！

engChrName: Once I know everything's okay, I'll come back here and then we can get started. Sound good?
engSearchText:
Once I know everything's okay, I'll come back here
and then we can get started. Sound good?
jpnChrName: 巡回の一環にもなりますし。
jpnSearchText: 巡回の一環にもなりますし。

engChrName: Absolutely! Take your time. We'll be here waiting for you.
engSearchText:
Absolutely! Take your time. We'll be here waiting
for you.
jpnChrName: そういうことなら、 こっちのキリの良いところでまた声をかける。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことなら、
こっちのキリの良いところでまた声をかける。

engChrName: Agnès has been such a good assistant at work. I don't mind helping her friends out as a favor.
engSearchText:
Agnès has been such a good assistant at work. I don't
mind helping her friends out as a favor.
jpnChrName: 用事をパパッと終わらせてきますっ。
jpnSearchText: 用事をパパッと終わらせてきますっ。

engChrName: Wonderful! That's great to hear! Thank you so much, Van!
engSearchText:
Wonderful! That's great to hear! Thank you so
much, Van!
jpnChrName: ま、そう時間はかからねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そう時間はかからねぇだろ。

engChrName: I don't know how much help I'll really be, but I'll see what I can do.
engSearchText:
I don't know how much help I'll really be, but I'll see
what I can do.
jpnChrName: 手早く用事を済ませてまいります。
jpnSearchText: 手早く用事を済ませてまいります。

engChrName: Oh, hush. You know as well as the rest of us that your knowledge and passion for these things is practically unmatched.
engSearchText:
Oh, hush. You know as well as the rest of us that your
knowledge and passion for these things is
practically unmatched.
jpnChrName: そう時間はかからないと思うよ。
jpnSearchText: そう時間はかからないと思うよ。

engChrName: Just go around to different outlets and bring back some samples that look good to you. That's not too much to ask for a connoisseur like you, is it?
engSearchText:
Just go around to different outlets and bring back
some samples that look good to you. That's not too
much to ask for a connoisseur like you, is it?
jpnChrName: ちゃちゃっと用事を終わらせてくるわ。
jpnSearchText: ちゃちゃっと用事を終わらせてくるわ。

engChrName: You're one of the ones putting on that whole event. Shouldn't you tag along?
engSearchText:
You're one of the ones putting on that whole event.
