Shouldn't you tag along?
jpnChrName: フフ、そう時間はとらせぬゆえ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、そう時間はとらせぬゆえ。

engChrName: I'd love to, I really would, but I need to hammer out some other details with Renne and Albert here, so I'll have to stay behind.
engSearchText:
I'd love to, I really would, but I need to hammer out
some other details with Renne and Albert here, so I'll
have to stay behind.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、お待ちしてますね。
jpnSearchText: 分かりました、お待ちしてますね。

engChrName: I'll leave it up to Agnès to assist you in choosing. I know she won't steer us wrong!
engSearchText:
I'll leave it up to Agnès to assist you in choosing.
I know she won't steer us wrong!
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ、候補になりそうな店を回るか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ、候補になりそうな店を回るか。

engChrName: Well, I suppose that settles it. You okay pitchin' in, Agnès?
engSearchText:
Well, I suppose that settles it. You okay pitchin'
in, Agnès?
jpnChrName: タイレル地区なら２軒ほど思い当たる。 他だと──
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区なら２軒ほど思い当たる。
他だと──

engChrName: S-Sure, I don't mind! I'd be happy to join you.
engSearchText: S-Sure, I don't mind! I'd be happy to join you.
jpnChrName: 旧市街、駅前通り、オーベル地区に１軒ずつ ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街、駅前通り、オーベル地区に１軒ずつ
ってところか。

engChrName: Besides, we can use this time to keep patrolling around town.
engSearchText:
Besides, we can use this time to keep patrolling
around town.
jpnChrName: さすがヴァンさん！ これは期待できそう～。
jpnSearchText:
さすがヴァンさん！
これは期待できそう～。

engChrName: All right—I'll come fetch you again once we find a good stopping point on our end.
engSearchText:
All right—I'll come fetch you again once we find a
good stopping point on our end.
jpnChrName: ……よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ……よろしく頼む。

engChrName: I promise we'll make it quick! We'll get our errands done as fast as we can so you're not waiting long!
engSearchText:
I promise we'll make it quick! We'll get our errands
done as fast as we can so you're not waiting long!
jpnChrName: アニエスも気をつけてな。
jpnSearchText: アニエスも気をつけてな。

engChrName: Eh, I doubt it's gonna take that much time either way.
engSearchText:
Eh, I doubt it's gonna take that much time
either way.
jpnChrName: はい、いってきます。
jpnSearchText: はい、いってきます。

engChrName: We'll do our absolute best to finish our errands in a timely manner.
engSearchText:
We'll do our absolute best to finish our errands in a
timely manner.
jpnChrName: クエスト【新年祭スイーツの相談】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>新年祭スイーツの相談<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: I can't imagine they'll take that long anyway.
engSearchText: I can't imagine they'll take that long anyway.
jpnChrName: 同行者をアニエスに切り替えると クエスト【新年祭スイーツの相談】を開始できます。
jpnSearchText:
同行者をアニエスに切り替えると
クエスト【新年祭スイーツの相談】を開始できます。

engChrName: We'll be done with everything in a flash, don't worry.
engSearchText: We'll be done with everything in a flash, don't worry.
jpnChrName: （おっと、店を当たるなら 　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）
jpnSearchText:
（おっと、店を当たるなら
　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）

engChrName: We shouldn't be long at all.
engSearchText: We shouldn't be long at all.
jpnChrName: おお！　それならちょうど良いのがあるよ！
jpnSearchText: おお！　それならちょうど良いのがあるよ！

engChrName: Okay. I'll be waiting here in the meantime!
engSearchText: Okay. I'll be waiting here in the meantime!
jpnChrName: 記念祭を機に新しく “ミニチュロス”を売り始めたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭を機に新しく
“ミニチュロス”を売り始めたんだ。

engChrName: Now to figure out which shops we oughta visit. Let me think...
engSearchText:
Now to figure out which shops we oughta visit.
Let me think...
jpnChrName: ミニ、チュロス……だと？
jpnSearchText: ミニ、チュロス……だと？

engChrName: Off the top of my head, there are two spots in Tyrell we should hit up.
engSearchText:
Off the top of my head, there are two spots in Tyrell
we should hit up.
jpnChrName: チュロスって意外とボリュームあるでしょ？
jpnSearchText: チュロスって意外とボリュームあるでしょ？

engChrName: Beyond that, Old Town, Station Street, and Auber each have an outlet also worth visiting, so five places total.
engSearchText:
Beyond that, Old Town, Station Street, and Auber
each have an outlet also worth visiting, so five
places total.
jpnChrName: 大人は食べきれるけど、 子供はちょっと残しちゃったりするんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
大人は食べきれるけど、
子供はちょっと残しちゃったりするんだよね。

engChrName: Great! I knew you'd have no problem coming up with places to check! I can't wait to see what amazing stuff you bring back to us!
engSearchText:
Great! I knew you'd have no problem coming up with
places to check! I can't wait to see what amazing stuff
you bring back to us!
jpnChrName: ドーナツより固い、サクサクな食感！ 口に広がる香ばしい甘さ！
jpnSearchText:
ドーナツより固い、サクサクな食感！
口に広がる香ばしい甘さ！

engChrName: ...What she said. Good luck, I guess.
engSearchText: ...What she said. Good luck, I guess.
jpnChrName: このおいしさを、もっと手軽に味わってほしいんだ！
jpnSearchText: このおいしさを、もっと手軽に味わってほしいんだ！

engChrName: Stay safe out there, Agnès.
engSearchText: Stay safe out there, Agnès.
jpnChrName: 素晴らしい理念だ。
jpnSearchText: 素晴らしい理念だ。

engChrName: Thanks, Albert. See you guys soon!
engSearchText: Thanks, Albert. See you guys soon!
jpnChrName: でもたしかに、子供たちも喜んでくれそうです。
jpnSearchText: でもたしかに、子供たちも喜んでくれそうです。

engChrName: Quest For the Kids started!
engSearchText: Quest For the Kids started!
jpnChrName: 候補として、試食用にいくつか買っていきましょう。
jpnSearchText: 候補として、試食用にいくつか買っていきましょう。

engChrName: It is only possible to begin the For the Kids quest after making Agnès the accompanying character.
engSearchText:
It is only possible to begin the For the Kids quest
after making Agnès the accompanying character.
jpnChrName: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。
jpnSearchText: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。

engChrName: (Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit this place up.)
engSearchText:
(Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit
this place up.)
jpnChrName: 試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！ オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！
オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。

engChrName: Yeah, I've got just the thing for you!
engSearchText: Yeah, I've got just the thing for you!
jpnChrName: （おっと、店を当たるなら 　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）
jpnSearchText:
（おっと、店を当たるなら
　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）

engChrName: It's my latest item: mini churros! I'm debuting them here at the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
It's my latest item: mini churros! I'm debuting them
here at the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: 子供向け……という物ではありませんが。 月餅はいかがでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
子供向け……という物ではありませんが。
月餅はいかがでしょう。

engChrName: Mini churros? What makes yours so special?
engSearchText: Mini churros? What makes yours so special?
jpnChrName: 小ぶりで食べやすいですし、 甘い餡は子供たちも喜ぶかと。
jpnSearchText:
小ぶりで食べやすいですし、
甘い餡は子供たちも喜ぶかと。

engChrName: Everybody likes a good churro, right? They're tougher than donuts, crispier, and have that sweetness that just floods your mouth with every bite!
engSearchText:
Everybody likes a good churro, right? They're tougher
than donuts, crispier, and have that sweetness that
just floods your mouth with every bite!
jpnChrName: 東方の茶に合う、あの甘さがなんとも……
jpnSearchText: 東方の茶に合う、あの甘さがなんとも……

engChrName: Adults can eat 'em just fine, but a lot of kids can't finish them in one go.
engSearchText:
Adults can eat 'em just fine, but a lot of kids can't
finish them in one go.
jpnChrName: 贈答用にも買われるくらい人気らしいな？
jpnSearchText: 贈答用にも買われるくらい人気らしいな？

engChrName: I thought about what I could do to solve that problem and that's how my miniature ones were born!
engSearchText:
I thought about what I could do to solve that problem
and that's how my miniature ones were born!
jpnChrName: ええ、ありがたいことに。
jpnSearchText: ええ、ありがたいことに。

engChrName: After all, nobody should have to miss out on having a churro if they want one. Now they can have them in just the size they want!
engSearchText:
After all, nobody should have to miss out on having a
churro if they want one. Now they can have them in
just the size they want!
jpnChrName: 家族や親しい友人と共に、 月を愛でつつこの菓子を食べる──
jpnSearchText:
家族や親しい友人と共に、
月を愛でつつこの菓子を食べる──

engChrName: That's very noble of you, wantin' to spread the joy of churros however you can. I applaud your effort.
engSearchText:
That's very noble of you, wantin' to spread the joy of
churros however you can. I applaud your effort.
jpnChrName: 東方にはそんな風習もあります。 まぁ楽しみ方はそれぞれで良いのですが。
jpnSearchText:
東方にはそんな風習もあります。
まぁ楽しみ方はそれぞれで良いのですが。

engChrName: They, erm, do sound like they could be a hit with the kids, at least.
engSearchText:
They, erm, do sound like they could be a hit with the
kids, at least.
jpnChrName: なるほど、お菓子を食べながら 文化を学ぶきっかけに……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、お菓子を食べながら
文化を学ぶきっかけに……

engChrName: Let's pick some up and bring them back to the others to consider.
engSearchText:
Let's pick some up and bring them back to the others
to consider.
jpnChrName: ぜひ、試食用にいくつか買わせてください。
jpnSearchText: ぜひ、試食用にいくつか買わせてください。

engChrName: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
engSearchText: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
jpnChrName: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。
jpnSearchText: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。

engChrName: We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head back to Odette?
engSearchText:
We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head
back to Odette?
jpnChrName: 試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！ オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！
オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。

engChrName: (Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit this place up.)
engSearchText:
(Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit
this place up.)
jpnChrName: あっ、お帰りなさい！ ２人ともお疲れ様でした！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、お帰りなさい！
２人ともお疲れ様でした！

engChrName: Hmm... They're not really meant for kids, but would you consider offering them some mooncakes?
engSearchText:
Hmm... They're not really meant for kids, but would
you consider offering them some mooncakes?
jpnChrName: その様子だと、収穫は充分みたいね。
jpnSearchText: その様子だと、収穫は充分みたいね。

engChrName: They're pretty small and easy to eat. Plus I imagine they'd enjoy the red bean filling since it's sweet.
engSearchText:
They're pretty small and easy to eat. Plus I imagine
they'd enjoy the red bean filling since it's sweet.
jpnChrName: はい、お陰様で。 ヴァンさんも終始楽しそうな様子で……
jpnSearchText:
はい、お陰様で。
ヴァンさんも終始楽しそうな様子で……

engChrName: Mooncakes DO have this sublime sweetness to 'em that goes perfectly with Eastern tea.
engSearchText:
Mooncakes DO have this sublime sweetness to 'em
that goes perfectly with Eastern tea.
jpnChrName: フッ、仕事で甘いモンを食える喜びよ。 おまけに出費無しだ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、仕事で甘いモンを食える喜びよ。
おまけに出費無しだ。

engChrName: A lot of people even buy them as gifts, don't they?
engSearchText: A lot of people even buy them as gifts, don't they?
jpnChrName: くっ、お楽しみだったようだな。
jpnSearchText: くっ、お楽しみだったようだな。

engChrName: That's right! They certainly make for good business.
engSearchText: That's right! They certainly make for good business.
jpnChrName: はい、拗らせてるアルベールは置いといて。
jpnSearchText: はい、拗らせてるアルベールは置いといて。

engChrName: In fact, there's a custom in the East where people will get together with family and close friends and admire the moon as they eat them.
engSearchText:
In fact, there's a custom in the East where people will
get together with family and close friends and admire
the moon as they eat them.
jpnChrName: 買ってきてくれた試食を さっそく頂いてみましょー！
jpnSearchText:
買ってきてくれた試食を
さっそく頂いてみましょー！

engChrName: Not that there's any one wrong or right way to enjoy them, of course.
engSearchText:
Not that there's any one wrong or right way to enjoy
them, of course.
jpnChrName: 良かったらフェリちゃんも一緒に！
jpnSearchText: 良かったらフェリちゃんも一緒に！

engChrName: That's neat! So they could even serve as an opportunity for the kids to learn about another culture.
engSearchText:
That's neat! So they could even serve as an
opportunity for the kids to learn about
another culture.
jpnChrName: わぁ、ありがとうございますっ。
jpnSearchText: わぁ、ありがとうございますっ。

engChrName: We'd love to buy some so we can taste test them.
engSearchText: We'd love to buy some so we can taste test them.
jpnChrName: 良かったらアーロンさんも一緒に！
jpnSearchText: 良かったらアーロンさんも一緒に！

engChrName: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
engSearchText: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
jpnChrName: しゃあねぇな、付き合ってやんよ。
jpnSearchText: しゃあねぇな、付き合ってやんよ。

engChrName: We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head back to Odette?
engSearchText:
We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head
back to Odette?
jpnChrName: 良かったらリゼットさんも一緒に！
jpnSearchText: 良かったらリゼットさんも一緒に！

engChrName: Oh, great! You're back! Thanks for going to all that trouble.
engSearchText:
Oh, great! You're back! Thanks for going to all
that trouble.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ではお言葉に甘えて。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ではお言葉に甘えて。

engChrName: Judging from the bags you brought, it looks like you've brought quite a bit back for us to try.
engSearchText:
Judging from the bags you brought, it looks like
you've brought quite a bit back for us to try.
jpnChrName: 良かったらカトルくんも一緒に！
jpnSearchText: 良かったらカトルくんも一緒に！

engChrName: Mm-hmm! We had a lot of good luck. Van was on cloud nine the whole time.
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm! We had a lot of good luck. Van was on
cloud nine the whole time.
jpnChrName: いいの？ ……じゃあお言葉に甘えて。
jpnSearchText:
いいの？
……じゃあお言葉に甘えて。

engChrName: Why wouldn't I be? You tell me I get to indulge in some quality sweets on the job completely for free? COURSE I'm gonna be all about that.
engSearchText:
Why wouldn't I be? You tell me I get to indulge in
some quality sweets on the job completely for free?
COURSE I'm gonna be all about that.
jpnChrName: 良かったらジュディスさんも一緒に！
jpnSearchText: 良かったらジュディスさんも一緒に！

engChrName: Hmph. Well, I'm glad somebody had fun.
engSearchText: Hmph. Well, I'm glad somebody had fun.
jpnChrName: フフ、じゃあお言葉に甘えちゃおっかな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、じゃあお言葉に甘えちゃおっかな。

engChrName: Now, now, Albert. We're his clients! That's not how we should act.
engSearchText:
Now, now, Albert. We're his clients! That's not how
we should act.
jpnChrName: 良かったらオジサマも一緒に！
jpnSearchText: 良かったらオジサマも一緒に！

engChrName: Anyway, enough talking! Let's dig into those samples and see if they're up to snuff!
engSearchText:
Anyway, enough talking! Let's dig into those samples
and see if they're up to snuff!
jpnChrName: フフ、ではお言葉に甘えるとしよう。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ではお言葉に甘えるとしよう。

engChrName: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Feri!
engSearchText: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Feri!
jpnChrName: （店長に許可をもらって）テーブルに試食を広げると、 それぞれ思い思いにスイーツを口へ運んだ。
jpnSearchText:
（店長に許可をもらって）テーブルに試食を広げると、
それぞれ思い思いにスイーツを口へ運んだ。

engChrName: Really? I'd love to!
engSearchText: Really? I'd love to!
jpnChrName: ん～、どれもおいしいわねぇ。 贅沢な１０時のおやつ（モーニング・ティー）だわ。
jpnSearchText:
ん～、どれもおいしいわねぇ。
贅沢な１０時のおやつ（モーニング・ティー）だわ。

engChrName: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Aaron!
engSearchText: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Aaron!
jpnChrName: モグモグ……
jpnSearchText: モグモグ……

engChrName: Oh, sure. I guess I'll have some.
engSearchText: Oh, sure. I guess I'll have some.
jpnChrName: どれを採用するか悩ましいですね……
jpnSearchText: どれを採用するか悩ましいですね……

engChrName: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Risette!
engSearchText: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Risette!
jpnChrName: どうなんだ？　オデットの感想としては。
jpnSearchText: どうなんだ？　オデットの感想としては。

engChrName: It would be my pleasure.
engSearchText: It would be my pleasure.
jpnChrName: ん？　いぉっお、あっええ（ちょっと、待ってて）。
jpnSearchText: ん？　いぉっお、あっええ（ちょっと、待ってて）。

engChrName: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Quatre!
engSearchText: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Quatre!
jpnChrName: た、食べながら喋るんじゃない！ 仮にも良家の子女だろう。
jpnSearchText:
た、食べながら喋るんじゃない！
仮にも良家の子女だろう。

engChrName: Are you sure? A-All right, if you insist.
engSearchText: Are you sure? A-All right, if you insist.
jpnChrName: ふぅ～、舌が大満足。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ～、舌が大満足。

engChrName: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Judith!
engSearchText: You're more than welcome to have some, too, Judith!
jpnChrName: さすがヴァンさんの目利きというか！ お願いして正解でした！
jpnSearchText:
さすがヴァンさんの目利きというか！
お願いして正解でした！

engChrName: You don't have to tell me twice!
engSearchText: You don't have to tell me twice!
jpnChrName: 見た目や味が子供ウケするか？ ってポイントはどれも満点だし……
jpnSearchText:
見た目や味が子供ウケするか？
ってポイントはどれも満点だし……

engChrName: You're more than welcome to have some, too, mister!
engSearchText: You're more than welcome to have some, too, mister!
jpnChrName: １種類に絞らないで、 詰め合わせにしちゃっても良いかも！
jpnSearchText:
１種類に絞らないで、
詰め合わせにしちゃっても良いかも！

engChrName: Gladly, then.
engSearchText: Gladly, then.
jpnChrName: あっ、それなら組み合わせも 楽しめるようにしたいですね！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、それなら組み合わせも
楽しめるようにしたいですね！

engChrName: With the manager's permission, the group retrieved the samples from the bags and got to eating the ones that suited their fancy.
engSearchText:
With the manager's permission, the group retrieved
the samples from the bags and got to eating the ones
that suited their fancy.
jpnChrName: 中身が見えない袋で包装すれば、 くじ引きみたいなワクワク感も出るな。
jpnSearchText:
中身が見えない袋で包装すれば、
くじ引きみたいなワクワク感も出るな。

engChrName: Mmm! They're all fantastic. Any one of them would make for a perfect morning tea snack.
engSearchText:
Mmm! They're all fantastic. Any one of them would
make for a perfect morning tea snack.
jpnChrName: 楽しそうにしちゃってまぁ。 まだ来年の話っつうのに。
jpnSearchText:
楽しそうにしちゃってまぁ。
まだ来年の話っつうのに。

engChrName: *munch* *munch*
engSearchText: *munch* *munch*
jpnChrName: ふふ、イベントごとは準備も楽しいものでしょ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、イベントごとは準備も楽しいものでしょ。

engChrName: I know... It's so hard to choose which to go with.
engSearchText: I know... It's so hard to choose which to go with.
jpnChrName: オデットも提案した甲斐があったわね。
jpnSearchText: オデットも提案した甲斐があったわね。

engChrName: What do you think, Odette? Have any preferences?
engSearchText: What do you think, Odette? Have any preferences?
jpnChrName: はい！　何をどれだけ買うかは 改めて検討しないとですけど。
jpnSearchText:
はい！　何をどれだけ買うかは
改めて検討しないとですけど。

engChrName: Hmm? Fawrry, giff ee a hec. (Sorry, give me a sec.)
engSearchText:
Hmm? Fawrry, giff ee a hec.
(Sorry, give me a sec.)
jpnChrName: 予算との兼ね合いは、 我らが会計殿と相談して詰めたいかな。
jpnSearchText:
予算との兼ね合いは、
我らが会計殿と相談して詰めたいかな。

engChrName: Don't talk with your mouth full! You come from a decent family, don't you?
engSearchText:
Don't talk with your mouth full! You come from a
decent family, don't you?
jpnChrName: そうだな、参加者の人数も含めて 追々決めるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、参加者の人数も含めて
追々決めるとしよう。

engChrName: Ahh... That was like a spa day for my taste buds!
engSearchText: Ahh... That was like a spa day for my taste buds!
jpnChrName: そうだ、せっかくなのでヴァンさんも 交流会に参加しませんか？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、せっかくなのでヴァンさんも
交流会に参加しませんか？

engChrName: I was totally right to bring you in, Van! Your insight into these things is crazy good.
engSearchText:
I was totally right to bring you in, Van! Your insight
into these things is crazy good.
jpnChrName: 協力だけしてもらって『はい、終わり』というのも 寂しい気がしますし……
jpnSearchText:
協力だけしてもらって『はい、終わり』というのも
寂しい気がしますし……

engChrName: When it comes to both looks and taste, really, I think the kids will be completely happy with most any of them. So...
engSearchText:
When it comes to both looks and taste, really, I think
the kids will be completely happy with most any
of them. So...
jpnChrName: 妙に大人が混じってたら浮くだろ。 ＯＢとはいえ。
jpnSearchText:
妙に大人が混じってたら浮くだろ。
ＯＢとはいえ。

engChrName: ...why limit ourselves to just one kind of treat? Let's bring them a bunch!
engSearchText:
...why limit ourselves to just one kind of treat?
Let's bring them a bunch!
jpnChrName: 一応イベントの趣旨も『アラミス生による』 って物だしな……
jpnSearchText:
一応イベントの趣旨も『アラミス生による』
って物だしな……

engChrName: Oh, that's a great idea! Then they could enjoy mixing and matching different ones together.
engSearchText:
Oh, that's a great idea! Then they could enjoy mixing
and matching different ones together.
jpnChrName: それなら、着ぐるみを着ればいいじゃない。
jpnSearchText: それなら、着ぐるみを着ればいいじゃない。

engChrName: We could even pack them inside different bags so they won't know what they get until they open it— kind of like a lottery. That could be fun.
engSearchText:
We could even pack them inside different bags so
they won't know what they get until they open it—
kind of like a lottery. That could be fun.
jpnChrName: お前さんな……余計に悪目立ちするじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: お前さんな……余計に悪目立ちするじゃねぇか。

engChrName: You kids sound pretty pumped up about this already. New Year's is still a bit of a way's off, you know.
engSearchText:
You kids sound pretty pumped up about this already.
New Year's is still a bit of a way's off, you know.
jpnChrName: あたしは見たいけどな～。 子供たちに囲まれるヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
あたしは見たいけどな～。
子供たちに囲まれるヴァンさん。

engChrName: Naturally. Planning events is just as fun as putting on the actual events themselves.
engSearchText:
Naturally. Planning events is just as fun as putting on
the actual events themselves.
jpnChrName: アニエスも見たいよね？
jpnSearchText: アニエスも見たいよね？

engChrName: This was a fantastic idea, Odette. I'm glad you suggested it.
engSearchText:
This was a fantastic idea, Odette. I'm glad you
suggested it.
jpnChrName: えっ……はい、ちょっと見てみたいです。
jpnSearchText: えっ……はい、ちょっと見てみたいです。

engChrName: Thank you! We'll have to think carefully about which ones to actually buy and how much.
engSearchText:
Thank you! We'll have to think carefully about
which ones to actually buy and how much.
jpnChrName: ふふ、じゃあ決まりね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、じゃあ決まりね。

engChrName: And I guess we need to talk to the treasurer to make sure we budget things carefully.
engSearchText:
And I guess we need to talk to the treasurer to make
sure we budget things carefully.
jpnChrName: （いい気味のような、羨ましいような……）
jpnSearchText: （いい気味のような、羨ましいような……）

engChrName: True. Plus we should also work on figuring out how many people are going to be taking part in the event in the first place.
engSearchText:
True. Plus we should also work on figuring out how
many people are going to be taking part in the event
in the first place.
jpnChrName: 約束はできねぇぞ。
jpnSearchText: 約束はできねぇぞ。

engChrName: Actually, speaking of which, why don't you join us during the actual meetup, Van?
engSearchText:
Actually, speaking of which, why don't you join us
during the actual meetup, Van?
jpnChrName: ……だがまぁ、覚えておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……だがまぁ、覚えておくぜ。

engChrName: I'd feel terrible pushing you off to the side without an invitation after all your hard work.
engSearchText:
I'd feel terrible pushing you off to the side without an
invitation after all your hard work.
jpnChrName: それから一同で試食を平らげた後、 ヴァンたちは巡回を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
それから一同で試食を平らげた後、
ヴァンたちは巡回を再開したのだった。

engChrName: I dunno about that. I might've gone to Aramis, but you don't think a grown man like me's gonna stick out at somethin' like that?
engSearchText:
I dunno about that. I might've gone to Aramis, but
you don't think a grown man like me's gonna stick
out at somethin' like that?
jpnChrName: クエスト【新年祭スイーツの相談】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>新年祭スイーツの相談<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: E-Exactly! It's supposed to be put on by us students. Having him around will ruin that.
engSearchText:
E-Exactly! It's supposed to be put on by us students.
Having him around will ruin that.
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: I know what you could do! Let's put you in a big old costume and parade you in front of the kids!
engSearchText:
I know what you could do! Let's put you in a big old
costume and parade you in front of the kids!
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス四区　タイレル地区
jpnSearchText: 首都イーディス四区　タイレル地区

engChrName: I'm saying I DON'T want to stick out, you little gremlin.
engSearchText:
I'm saying I DON'T want to stick out, you
little gremlin.
jpnChrName: わあ、賑やかできれいな所ですね！
jpnSearchText: わあ、賑やかできれいな所ですね！

engChrName: Aww! I can just picture the kids swarming Van! That'd be so cute!
engSearchText:
Aww! I can just picture the kids swarming Van!
That'd be so cute!
jpnChrName: 人が多いのに、乱雑な感じがしません。 駅前通りとは雰囲気が全然違います！
jpnSearchText:
人が多いのに、乱雑な感じがしません。
駅前通りとは雰囲気が全然違います！

engChrName: Doesn't that sound like fun, Agnès? I'm not the only one who'd love to see that, am I?
engSearchText:
Doesn't that sound like fun, Agnès? I'm not the only
one who'd love to see that, am I?
jpnChrName: ここがタイレル地区だ。
jpnSearchText: ここがタイレル地区だ。

engChrName: Huh? Umm... Sure. That could be nice.
engSearchText: Huh? Umm... Sure. That could be nice.
jpnChrName: 名前の通り《タイレル通信》発祥の地でな。 他にもいくつかの出版社がある。
jpnSearchText:
名前の通り《タイレル通信》発祥の地でな。
他にもいくつかの出版社がある。

engChrName: Well, we have a majority. In the suit you go, Van.
engSearchText: Well, we have a majority. In the suit you go, Van.
jpnChrName: その関係で、若者が多く集まったり 新しい文化の発信地としても有名だな。
jpnSearchText:
その関係で、若者が多く集まったり
新しい文化の発信地としても有名だな。

engChrName: (Hrm... I don't know whether I should feel happy about this or jealous.)
engSearchText:
(Hrm... I don't know whether I should feel happy
about this or jealous.)
jpnChrName: 独特な雰囲気があるのも そういう文化的な背景が原因ですね。
jpnSearchText:
独特な雰囲気があるのも
そういう文化的な背景が原因ですね。

engChrName: Nope. I ain't promising jack—not even for the kids.
engSearchText: Nope. I ain't promising jack—not even for the kids.
jpnChrName: 私も学校の友人と何回か来たことがあって、 ここの本屋でバイトしている同級生もいます。
jpnSearchText:
私も学校の友人と何回か来たことがあって、
ここの本屋でバイトしている同級生もいます。

engChrName: But...I guess I'll keep all that in mind.
engSearchText: But...I guess I'll keep all that in mind.
jpnChrName: 本屋以外にも色々とある所だな。 俺もよく来るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
本屋以外にも色々とある所だな。
俺もよく来るぜ。

engChrName: Once the group finished eating the samples, Van and Agnès resumed their patrol.
engSearchText:
Once the group finished eating the samples, Van and
Agnès resumed their patrol.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここで話すより 実際に回ってみた方がいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここで話すより
実際に回ってみた方がいいだろ。

engChrName: Quest For the Kids completed!
engSearchText: Quest For the Kids completed!
jpnChrName: はい！
jpnSearchText: はい！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 今日は映画鑑賞か？ 何なら付き合うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
今日は映画鑑賞か？
何なら付き合うぜ？

engChrName: Fourth District, Tyrell
engSearchText: Fourth District, Tyrell
jpnChrName: 男二人ってのも花がねえがな。
jpnSearchText: 男二人ってのも花がねえがな。

engChrName: Wow! It's so busy here!
engSearchText: Wow! It's so busy here!
jpnChrName: ヴァンか…… いや、考え事がてら寄っただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンか……
いや、考え事がてら寄っただけだ。

engChrName: It's amazing everything's under control with so many people. It feels so different from Station Street!
engSearchText:
It's amazing everything's under control with so
many people. It feels so different from Station Street!
jpnChrName: 今回のサルバッド映画祭は 荒れそうだと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
今回のサルバッド映画祭は
荒れそうだと思ってな。

engChrName: That's Tyrell for you.
engSearchText: That's Tyrell for you.
jpnChrName: 中止になった映画祭の代わりに注目を浴び、 そして今度もまた脅迫状とは……
jpnSearchText:
中止になった映画祭の代わりに注目を浴び、
そして今度もまた脅迫状とは……

engChrName: As you might've guessed, this is where the Tyrell Times was founded. There're a handful of other publishers HQ'd here, too.
engSearchText:
As you might've guessed, this is where the Tyrell
Times was founded. There're a handful of other
publishers HQ'd here, too.
jpnChrName: まったく厄介な依頼を回してくれたもんだ。
jpnSearchText: まったく厄介な依頼を回してくれたもんだ。

engChrName: As a result, tons of young people like to hang out here. It's where you'll first find a lot of trends and subcultures takin' off.
engSearchText:
As a result, tons of young people like to hang
out here. It's where you'll first find a lot of trends and
subcultures takin' off.
jpnChrName: フッ、お前なら合っていると思ってな。
jpnSearchText: フッ、お前なら合っていると思ってな。

engChrName: This area has a fairly distinct vibe you won't find anywhere else in the city as a result, yes.
engSearchText:
This area has a fairly distinct vibe you won't find
anywhere else in the city as a result, yes.
jpnChrName: 安心しろ、仲介した以上サルバッドでの ４ｓｐｇもこっちが仕込んでおく。
jpnSearchText:
安心しろ、仲介した以上サルバッドでの
４ｓｐｇもこっちが仕込んでおく。

engChrName: I've come here a handful of times with my friends from school. One of them even works at the bookstore here.
engSearchText:
I've come here a handful of times with my friends
from school. One of them even works at the
bookstore here.
jpnChrName: そりゃどうも。
jpnSearchText: そりゃどうも。

engChrName: Plenty more to find here than just books, too. I find myself out here all the time.
engSearchText:
Plenty more to find here than just books, too. I find
myself out here all the time.
jpnChrName: にしても、あんな人気女優と知り合いとはね。 さすがはエリート記者ってとこか。
jpnSearchText:
にしても、あんな人気女優と知り合いとはね。
さすがはエリート記者ってとこか。

engChrName: Why don't we wander around here a little while? Nothin' beats seeing a place firsthand when you wanna get to know it.
engSearchText:
Why don't we wander around here a little while?
Nothin' beats seeing a place firsthand when you
wanna get to know it.
jpnChrName: ちょっとした縁で知り合っただけだ。 それほど深い付き合いでもないさ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとした縁で知り合っただけだ。
それほど深い付き合いでもないさ。

engChrName: Okay! Let's go!
engSearchText: Okay! Let's go!
jpnChrName: ただ、ニナ・フェンリィ ──彼女はなかなか大した人物だったろう？
jpnSearchText:
ただ、ニナ・フェンリィ
──彼女はなかなか大した人物だったろう？

engChrName: Gonna watch a movie? I'll tag along if you want.
engSearchText: Gonna watch a movie? I'll tag along if you want.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの若さでトップスターやってんだ、 見た目はもちろん演技も本物だろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの若さでトップスターやってんだ、
見た目はもちろん演技も本物だろ。

engChrName: Not that I'm the first choice for company for a ladykiller like you.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm the first choice for company for a
ladykiller like you.
jpnChrName: 人気や演技の話じゃない。 ……お前も気づいたんじゃないのか？
jpnSearchText:
人気や演技の話じゃない。
……お前も気づいたんじゃないのか？

engChrName: Oh, hey, Van. No, I just found myself passing by while thinking about some things.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey, Van. No, I just found myself passing by
while thinking about some things.
jpnChrName: 彼女は多分世間一般からのイメージより、 実際はずっとしたたかで強い意志を持っている。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は多分世間一般からのイメージより、
実際はずっとしたたかで強い意志を持っている。

engChrName: This film festival coming up in Tharbad is shaping up to be a messy one.
engSearchText:
This film festival coming up in Tharbad is shaping up
to be a messy one.
jpnChrName: ……まあな。
jpnSearchText: ……まあな。

engChrName: You're tellin' me. As if there wasn't enough attention on it after Messeldam's got canned, we've got those threatening notes to deal with.
engSearchText:
You're tellin' me. As if there wasn't enough attention
on it after Messeldam's got canned, we've got those
threatening notes to deal with.
jpnChrName: 彼女自身の生まれだとか 色々関係してそうだが──
jpnSearchText:
彼女自身の生まれだとか
色々関係してそうだが──

engChrName: You just had to give us a tough job, didn't you?
engSearchText: You just had to give us a tough job, didn't you?
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん、こんな所に！ ようやく見つけましたよ！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん、こんな所に！
ようやく見つけましたよ！

engChrName: Heh. So what if it is? I knew you could handle it, so that's why I referred you.
engSearchText:
Heh. So what if it is? I knew you could handle it, so
that's why I referred you.
jpnChrName: ……マリエルか。
jpnSearchText: ……マリエルか。

engChrName: It shouldn't all be so bad out there. I promise to hook you guys up with some decent 4SPGs for your trouble while you're there.
engSearchText:
It shouldn't all be so bad out there. I promise to hook
you guys up with some decent 4SPGs for your trouble
while you're there.
jpnChrName: つくづく好かれてるもんだな。
jpnSearchText: つくづく好かれてるもんだな。

engChrName: Thanks. I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText: Thanks. I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 貴方は裏解決屋の……！？ またディンゴさんと一緒だなんて……
jpnSearchText:
貴方は裏解決屋の……！？
またディンゴさんと一緒だなんて……

engChrName: I'm just impressed you know such a famous actress. I guess that comes with being such a hot-shot reporter, but still. How'd you two even meet?
engSearchText:
I'm just impressed you know such a famous actress.
I guess that comes with being such a hot-shot
reporter, but still. How'd you two even meet?
jpnChrName: ま、まさか二人は 何かただならぬ関係だったり………
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか二人は
何かただならぬ関係だったり………

engChrName: Nina and I happen to share a minor connection, that's all. I wouldn't say we're all that friendly or anything along those lines.
engSearchText:
Nina and I happen to share a minor connection,
that's all. I wouldn't say we're all that friendly or
anything along those lines.
jpnChrName: アホか……
jpnSearchText: アホか……

engChrName: She is quite an impressive person, though. I'll grant you that.
engSearchText:
She is quite an impressive person, though. I'll grant
you that.
jpnChrName: 失礼ですね！ ちょっと心配しただけで……
jpnSearchText:
失礼ですね！
ちょっと心配しただけで……

engChrName: Hell yeah, she is. Already on top of the movie world at her age. With those looks and the acting chops to back 'em up, she more than belongs.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, she is. Already on top of the movie world
at her age. With those looks and the acting chops to
back 'em up, she more than belongs.
jpnChrName: それよりディンゴさん、 そろそろ教えてください！
jpnSearchText:
それよりディンゴさん、
そろそろ教えてください！

engChrName: I'm not talking about any of that. I'm more talking about her personality.
engSearchText:
I'm not talking about any of that. I'm more talking
about her personality.
jpnChrName: この前から追っていたネタは 一体何ですか？
jpnSearchText:
この前から追っていたネタは
一体何ですか？

engChrName: She's an incredibly tenacious young woman with an equally strong will—more than people give her credit for. I'm sure you've noticed, too, right?
engSearchText:
She's an incredibly tenacious young woman with an
equally strong will—more than people give her
credit for. I'm sure you've noticed, too, right?
jpnChrName: お前には関係のない話だと 言ったはずだが……
jpnSearchText:
お前には関係のない話だと
言ったはずだが……

engChrName: ...Yeah. Guess you could say I have.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. Guess you could say I have.
jpnChrName: そもそも他誌の人間に 教える義理はないだろう？
jpnSearchText:
そもそも他誌の人間に
教える義理はないだろう？

engChrName: I'm sure a lot of that has to do with her whole background and how—
engSearchText:
I'm sure a lot of that has to do with her whole
background and how—
jpnChrName: さっきまで話し込んでいたようですが……
jpnSearchText: さっきまで話し込んでいたようですが……

engChrName: There you are, Dingo! I've been looking all over for you!
engSearchText:
There you are, Dingo! I've been looking all over
for you!
jpnChrName: まさかこの人になら良くて、 私には教えられないんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
まさかこの人になら良くて、
私には教えられないんですか！？

engChrName: *sigh* Hey, Marielle. What is it this time?
engSearchText: *sigh* Hey, Marielle. What is it this time?
jpnChrName: （なんでこっちに飛び火してんだ……）
jpnSearchText: （なんでこっちに飛び火してんだ……）

engChrName: Man, she really can't get enough of you, can she?
engSearchText: Man, she really can't get enough of you, can she?
jpnChrName: あ、映画館に来たってことは、 まさか映画祭に関連するネタなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、映画館に来たってことは、
まさか映画祭に関連するネタなんですか？

engChrName: You're that spriggan! What are you doing hanging out with Dingo again?
engSearchText:
You're that spriggan! What are you doing hanging
out with Dingo again?
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: W-Wait. A-Are you two, like...a thing?!
engSearchText: W-Wait. A-Are you two, like...a thing?!
jpnChrName: あー、そういやディンゴ、 見たい映画があるって話だったな？
jpnSearchText:
あー、そういやディンゴ、
見たい映画があるって話だったな？

engChrName: Does it LOOK like it? Some reporter you are.
engSearchText: Does it LOOK like it? Some reporter you are.
jpnChrName: 生憎俺はこれから用事があってな。 誘ってくれて悪いが一人で観てくれ。
jpnSearchText:
生憎俺はこれから用事があってな。
誘ってくれて悪いが一人で観てくれ。

engChrName: And what's that supposed to mean?! I just don't think you're a good enough man for Dingo, that's all!
engSearchText:
And what's that supposed to mean?! I just don't think
you're a good enough man for Dingo, that's all!
jpnChrName: 一人で見るのは寂しいと思うが、 ま、それはしょうがねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
一人で見るのは寂しいと思うが、
ま、それはしょうがねぇな。

engChrName: As for you, mister, fess up! What have you been pursuing all this time, huh?
engSearchText:
As for you, mister, fess up! What have you been
pursuing all this time, huh?
jpnChrName: そうなんですか！？
jpnSearchText: そうなんですか！？

engChrName: What could possibly be so big that it has so much of your attention?!
engSearchText:
What could possibly be so big that it has so much of
your attention?!
jpnChrName: だったらわたしがご一緒します！ ちょうど時間が空いていますし～。
jpnSearchText:
だったらわたしがご一緒します！
ちょうど時間が空いていますし～。

engChrName: I told you before, it doesn't concern you.
engSearchText: I told you before, it doesn't concern you.
jpnChrName: （おい、ヴァン……）
jpnSearchText: （おい、ヴァン……）

engChrName: Besides, why should I feel obligated to tell someone from a competitor what I'm working on?
engSearchText:
Besides, why should I feel obligated to tell someone
from a competitor what I'm working on?
jpnChrName: （たまには可愛い後輩に   サービスくらいしてもいいだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（たまには可愛い後輩に
サービスくらいしてもいいだろ。）

engChrName: You sure didn't seem to be having any trouble talking to him before I showed up!
engSearchText:
You sure didn't seem to be having any trouble talking
to him before I showed up!
jpnChrName: じゃあな、後は二人でごゆっくり～。
jpnSearchText: じゃあな、後は二人でごゆっくり～。

engChrName: Why can you tell him but not me? That's not fair! That's not fair at all!
engSearchText:
Why can you tell him but not me? That's not fair!
That's not fair at all!
jpnChrName: あっ、映画館の垂れ幕が……
jpnSearchText: あっ、映画館の垂れ幕が……

engChrName: (Ugh. For the love of Aidios, keep me outta this!)
engSearchText: (Ugh. For the love of Aidios, keep me outta this!)
jpnChrName: この前まで『ゴールデン・ブラッド』でしたが、 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』になっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
この前まで『ゴールデン・ブラッド』でしたが、
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』になっていますね。

engChrName: Wait a minute. If you're here in the theater, could it have something to do with the movie festival?
engSearchText:
Wait a minute. If you're here in the theater, could it
have something to do with the movie festival?
jpnChrName: この前まで『ゴールデン・ブラッド』だったが、 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』になったか。
jpnSearchText:
この前まで『ゴールデン・ブラッド』だったが、
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』になったか。

engChrName: Err...
engSearchText: Err...
jpnChrName: サルバッド映画祭の結果に 影響されたのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド映画祭の結果に
影響されたのでしょうか？

engChrName: Say, Dingo. Did you mention there was a movie you wanted to see?
engSearchText:
Say, Dingo. Did you mention there was a movie you
wanted to see?
jpnChrName: だろうな、今までの映画祭もそうだったが……
jpnSearchText: だろうな、今までの映画祭もそうだったが……

engChrName: Wish I could take you up on your invitation, but somethin' came up, so I gotta bail.
engSearchText:
Wish I could take you up on your invitation, but
somethin' came up, so I gotta bail.
jpnChrName: 最優秀賞（レオンドール）を受賞した作品の 観客動員数は跳ね上がるからな。
jpnSearchText:
最優秀賞（レオンドール）を受賞した作品の
観客動員数は跳ね上がるからな。

engChrName: Real sorry, man. I know it's not exactly the funnest thing, watchin' a movie by yourself. But I bet it'll still be good without me.
engSearchText:
Real sorry, man. I know it's not exactly the funnest
thing, watchin' a movie by yourself. But I bet it'll still
be good without me.
jpnChrName: 『ゴールデン・ブラッド』は元々大人気で 興行収入の上がり方も落ち着きつつあった。
jpnSearchText:
『ゴールデン・ブラッド』は元々大人気で
興行収入の上がり方も落ち着きつつあった。

engChrName: Oh, you're here to see something?
engSearchText: Oh, you're here to see something?
jpnChrName: 舵を切るにはいいタイミングだろうな。
jpnSearchText: 舵を切るにはいいタイミングだろうな。

engChrName: I'll join you! I'm completely free right now, so I'd be more than happy to spend some time with you, Dingo!
engSearchText:
I'll join you! I'm completely free right now, so I'd be
more than happy to spend some time with
you, Dingo!
jpnChrName: なるほど……確かに映画館に限らず そういった傾向はありますね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……確かに映画館に限らず
そういった傾向はありますね。

engChrName: (Damn it, Van! What the hell did you have to do that for?)
engSearchText:
(Damn it, Van! What the hell did you have to do
that for?)
jpnChrName: 最近はどこの雑誌もニナさんの インタビューや特集を載せていますし──
jpnSearchText:
最近はどこの雑誌もニナさんの
インタビューや特集を載せていますし──

engChrName: (Oh, quit whining. She's a sweetheart when you get down to it. Be a good mentor and show her a nice time.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, quit whining. She's a sweetheart when you get
down to it. Be a good mentor and show her a
nice time.)
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんと同じくらい メディア露出が多くなりましたよね。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさんと同じくらい
メディア露出が多くなりましたよね。

engChrName: Have fun, you two! I'll see you both later.
engSearchText: Have fun, you two! I'll see you both later.
jpnChrName: まあ、事務所としても 更に押し出すチャンスだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、事務所としても
更に押し出すチャンスだろうしな。

engChrName: Oh, it looks like the movie theater changed its banners.
engSearchText:
Oh, it looks like the movie theater changed
its banners.
jpnChrName: ジュディスは《バズレイダー》あたりのゴシップ誌に 好き勝手な噂を書かれてるみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスは《バズレイダー》あたりのゴシップ誌に
好き勝手な噂を書かれてるみたいだが。

engChrName: Hey, you're right. They were for Golden Blood before, but now they're showing Wolves' Requiem.
engSearchText:
Hey, you're right. They were for Golden Blood
before, but now they're showing Wolves' Requiem.
jpnChrName: 最優秀女優賞を取り逃して塞ぎこんでいる── 少し前にそんな見出しの雑誌を見かけましたね。
jpnSearchText:
最優秀女優賞を取り逃して塞ぎこんでいる──
少し前にそんな見出しの雑誌を見かけましたね。

engChrName: Guess so. They used to be for Golden Blood, but now it looks like they're advertising Wolves' Requiem.
engSearchText:
Guess so. They used to be for Golden Blood, but now
it looks like they're advertising Wolves' Requiem.
jpnChrName: うーん、そういうイメージの人では ないと思いますけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そういうイメージの人では
ないと思いますけど。

engChrName: Could that be as a result of the awards at the Tharbad Film Festival?
engSearchText:
Could that be as a result of the awards at the Tharbad
Film Festival?
jpnChrName: ハッ、あの女がそんなタマかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、あの女がそんなタマかよ。

engChrName: That's what I'd put my money on. It's been like that with other film festivals, too.
engSearchText:
That's what I'd put my money on. It's been like that
with other film festivals, too.
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんなら、むしろ 奮起していそうですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさんなら、むしろ
奮起していそうですしね。

engChrName: Whatever movie takes the top prize always sees a big jump in moviegoers.
engSearchText:
Whatever movie takes the top prize always sees a big
jump in moviegoers.
jpnChrName: もしくは恋人ができたなんて 書いてたとこもあったが。
jpnSearchText:
もしくは恋人ができたなんて
書いてたとこもあったが。

engChrName: Plus for as popular as Golden Blood has been, its box-office earnings were starting to taper off anyway.
engSearchText:
Plus for as popular as Golden Blood has been, its
box-office earnings were starting to taper off anyway.
jpnChrName: ええ！？　そうなんですか？
jpnSearchText: ええ！？　そうなんですか？

engChrName: So it makes sense they'd switch out the banners now to promote the latest hot thing.
engSearchText:
So it makes sense they'd switch out the banners now
to promote the latest hot thing.
jpnChrName: え！？　本当ですか？
jpnSearchText: え！？　本当ですか？

engChrName: That's true. I've been seeing all kinds of things leaning in that direction lately, not just movie theaters.
engSearchText:
That's true. I've been seeing all kinds of things
leaning in that direction lately, not just
movie theaters.
jpnChrName: だからゴシップだって言ったろ。
jpnSearchText: だからゴシップだって言ったろ。

engChrName: It feels like every magazine lately is publishing interviews and specials about Nina.
engSearchText:
It feels like every magazine lately is publishing
interviews and specials about Nina.
jpnChrName: 本当も嘘っぱちもどっちつかずも、 あいつらには同じ飯の種だからなあ。
jpnSearchText:
本当も嘘っぱちもどっちつかずも、
あいつらには同じ飯の種だからなあ。

engChrName: At this point, she must be getting as much media exposure as Judith.
engSearchText:
At this point, she must be getting as much media
exposure as Judith.
jpnChrName: 一々真に受けないこった、 アニエスなんかは興味津々だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
一々真に受けないこった、
アニエスなんかは興味津々だろうが。

engChrName: Part of that's probably her agency striking while the iron's hot and getting her out there, you gotta figure.
engSearchText:
Part of that's probably her agency striking while the
iron's hot and getting her out there, you gotta figure.
jpnChrName: あはは、それもそうですね── って別に興味津々じゃないですからっ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、それもそうですね──
って別に興味津々じゃないですからっ。

engChrName: Especially while Judith's got tabloids like Buzzraider going to town on her, writin' pretty much whatever they please.
engSearchText:
Especially while Judith's got tabloids like Buzzraider
going to town on her, writin' pretty much whatever
they please.
jpnChrName: ねえねえ、今月の《バズレイダー》、読んだ？
jpnSearchText: ねえねえ、今月の《バズレイダー》、読んだ？

engChrName: 'Whatever' indeed. I saw a headline recently that claimed she was brooding after she lost the award for Best Actress to Nina.
engSearchText:
'Whatever' indeed. I saw a headline recently that
claimed she was brooding after she lost the award for
Best Actress to Nina.
jpnChrName: 読んでないけど友達から聞いたよ、 まさかあのジュディス・ランスターがね～。
jpnSearchText:
読んでないけど友達から聞いたよ、
まさかあのジュディス・ランスターがね～。

engChrName: Really? I don't think she'd be like that, if you ask me.
engSearchText: Really? I don't think she'd be like that, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: 意外というか、よく考えたら そうでもないような？
jpnSearchText:
意外というか、よく考えたら
そうでもないような？

engChrName: As if she's the type of chick to stay in down in the dumps over something like that.
engSearchText:
As if she's the type of chick to stay in down in the
dumps over something like that.
jpnChrName: ハハッ、マジでそれ～。
jpnSearchText: ハハッ、マジでそれ～。

engChrName: Exactly. If anything, I imagine it would light a fire in her to work even harder.
engSearchText:
Exactly. If anything, I imagine it would light a fire in
her to work even harder.
jpnChrName: ジュディス・ランスターっていえば 相当有名な女優だよね？
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス・ランスターっていえば
相当有名な女優だよね？

engChrName: Hell, I've seen those rags claim she's even got herself a boyfriend these days.
engSearchText:
Hell, I've seen those rags claim she's even got herself
a boyfriend these days.
jpnChrName: ここ数日やけに名前を耳にするな。
jpnSearchText: ここ数日やけに名前を耳にするな。

engChrName: What? She does?!
engSearchText: What? She does?!
jpnChrName: ジュディスさん、何かあったんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさん、何かあったんでしょうか……

engChrName: Huh? Is that true?!
engSearchText: Huh? Is that true?!
jpnChrName: なんだ、あいつのことが気になるのか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、あいつのことが気になるのか？

engChrName: These're tabloids we're talkin' about here. What do you think?
engSearchText:
These're tabloids we're talkin' about here. What do
you think?
jpnChrName: はい、こうも噂されると流石に……
jpnSearchText: はい、こうも噂されると流石に……

engChrName: Doesn't matter if what they publish is real or total bullshit. Long as it makes them money, that's what counts.
engSearchText:
Doesn't matter if what they publish is real or
total bullshit. Long as it makes them money, that's
what counts.
jpnChrName: アニエスさん、あの人のファンなんだ？
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん、あの人のファンなんだ？

engChrName: So don't go takin' 'em at their word. Though I gotta say, a certain someone seems awful invested in the woman's love life.
engSearchText:
So don't go takin' 'em at their word. Though I gotta
say, a certain someone seems awful invested in the
woman's love life.
jpnChrName: ええと、応援させてもらっていますが それだけではないと言いますか……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、応援させてもらっていますが
それだけではないと言いますか……

engChrName: I-I'm not sure 'invested' is the right word for it. It's just a little surprising to hear that out of nowhere. But you're right. It's good to be cautious with those.
engSearchText:
I-I'm not sure 'invested' is the right word for it. It's
just a little surprising to hear that out of nowhere.
But you're right. It's good to be cautious with those.
jpnChrName: 確かにちょっと気になります…… 《バズレイダー》でしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
確かにちょっと気になります……
《バズレイダー》でしたよね？

engChrName: Hey, did you read this month's Buzzraider?
engSearchText: Hey, did you read this month's Buzzraider?
jpnChrName: どうでもいいが、 確か《バズレイダー》だったな？
jpnSearchText:
どうでもいいが、
確か《バズレイダー》だったな？

engChrName: I haven't yet, but my friend told me what they wrote about Judith Lanster!
engSearchText:
I haven't yet, but my friend told me what they wrote
about Judith Lanster!
jpnChrName: 《バズレイダー》でしたね？ 時々雑誌売り場で見かけますが。
jpnSearchText:
《バズレイダー》でしたね？
時々雑誌売り場で見かけますが。

engChrName: At first I was shocked by it. But the more I think about it, maybe it makes sense. You know what I mean?
engSearchText:
At first I was shocked by it. But the more I think
about it, maybe it makes sense. You know what
I mean?
jpnChrName: ディンゴがいる《メルド》とは ライバル関係にあるゴシップ誌だな。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴがいる《メルド》とは
ライバル関係にあるゴシップ誌だな。

engChrName: Yeah, totally! I hear you!
engSearchText: Yeah, totally! I hear you!
jpnChrName: バズレイダーの方はより胡散臭くて 眉唾で軽薄なイメージがあるが……
jpnSearchText:
バズレイダーの方はより胡散臭くて
眉唾で軽薄なイメージがあるが……

engChrName: Judith Lanster sure is famous, getting people to talk about her as much as they do.
engSearchText:
Judith Lanster sure is famous, getting people to talk
about her as much as they do.
jpnChrName: そいつらにジュディスが何かのネタを スッパ抜かれたってところか。
jpnSearchText:
そいつらにジュディスが何かのネタを
スッパ抜かれたってところか。

engChrName: I feel like I've been hearing her name come up an awful lot the past couple of days.
engSearchText:
I feel like I've been hearing her name come up an
awful lot the past couple of days.
jpnChrName: 気になるならそこの本屋で買ってみるか？ これも情報収集の一環だろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
気になるならそこの本屋で買ってみるか？
これも情報収集の一環だろうしな。

engChrName: I know. I wonder if something happened to her?
engSearchText: I know. I wonder if something happened to her?
jpnChrName: ゴシップ誌で情報収集……？
jpnSearchText: ゴシップ誌で情報収集……？

engChrName: What? Feeling a little concerned for her?
engSearchText: What? Feeling a little concerned for her?
jpnChrName: ゴシップ誌でも、案外バカにできねえぜ？ ま、九割くらいはゴミ情報なのは認めるが。
jpnSearchText:
ゴシップ誌でも、案外バカにできねえぜ？
ま、九割くらいはゴミ情報なのは認めるが。

engChrName: I suppose so. It's hard not to worry when people are speculating about her so much.
engSearchText:
I suppose so. It's hard not to worry when people are
speculating about her so much.
jpnChrName: そうですね、せめて何があったか くらいは知っておきたいです。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、せめて何があったか
くらいは知っておきたいです。

engChrName: Are you a fan of hers, Agnès?
engSearchText: Are you a fan of hers, Agnès?
jpnChrName: 決まりだな、あとで本屋に寄ってみるか。
jpnSearchText: 決まりだな、あとで本屋に寄ってみるか。

engChrName: I am, but that's not the only reason I'm concerned in this instance.
engSearchText:
I am, but that's not the only reason I'm concerned in
this instance.
jpnChrName: バズレイダーを買ったヴァンたちは、 一度本屋の外で記事を確認してみる事にした。
jpnSearchText:
バズレイダーを買ったヴァンたちは、
一度本屋の外で記事を確認してみる事にした。

engChrName: I do kinda wonder what's up... Buzzraider was the name of the magazine they were talking about, was it?
engSearchText:
I do kinda wonder what's up... Buzzraider was the
name of the magazine they were talking about, was it?
jpnChrName: 『ジュディス・ランスター、   《紅い流星》マクシムと熱愛疑惑！？』──か。
jpnSearchText:
『ジュディス・ランスター、
《紅い流星》マクシムと熱愛疑惑！？』──か。

engChrName: Buzzraider's what that magazine's called, yeah? The one those two were talking about? Not that I care one way or the other.
engSearchText:
Buzzraider's what that magazine's called, yeah?
The one those two were talking about? Not that I
care one way or the other.
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんとマクシムさんが……！？
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさんとマクシムさんが……！？

engChrName: Those two were discussing the contents of Buzzraider, yes? I've seen that magazine on newsstands from time to time.
engSearchText:
Those two were discussing the contents of
Buzzraider, yes? I've seen that magazine on
newsstands from time to time.
jpnChrName: マクシム・ルーガン…… Ｚ１のチャンピオンだったっけ。
jpnSearchText:
マクシム・ルーガン……
Ｚ１のチャンピオンだったっけ。

engChrName: Yeah. It's somethin' of a rival to Meld, the place that Dingo works for.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's somethin' of a rival to Meld, the place that
Dingo works for.
jpnChrName: 確か二人とも独身だったよね…… ここまで大騒ぎするほどのことなの？
jpnSearchText:
確か二人とも独身だったよね……
ここまで大騒ぎするほどのことなの？

engChrName: Buzzraider's got more of a dicier rep by comparison. Gotta take their stories with a couple grains of salt and then some.
engSearchText:
Buzzraider's got more of a dicier rep by comparison.
Gotta take their stories with a couple grains of salt
and then some.
jpnChrName: 一応どっちも人気あるからな。 それだけでも大騒ぎする理由には十分だが……
jpnSearchText:
一応どっちも人気あるからな。
それだけでも大騒ぎする理由には十分だが……

engChrName: But it's always possible those guys managed to actually dig up some sorta scoop about Judith—for better or worse.
engSearchText:
But it's always possible those guys managed to
actually dig up some sorta scoop about Judith—for
better or worse.
jpnChrName: 今回はその後に書かれてる内容が問題だな。
jpnSearchText: 今回はその後に書かれてる内容が問題だな。

engChrName: If you guys are that curious, we can always buy a copy at the bookstore. You can consider it another way to gather intel.
engSearchText:
If you guys are that curious, we can always buy a copy
at the bookstore. You can consider it another way to
gather intel.
jpnChrName: 『マクシム・ルーガンは各地に   “愛人”を作っており──』
jpnSearchText:
『マクシム・ルーガンは各地に
“愛人”を作っており──』

engChrName: You rely on even tabloids to gather your information? Is that really such a good idea?
engSearchText:
You rely on even tabloids to gather your information?
Is that really such a good idea?
jpnChrName: 『ドライブがてらマメに訪れている   との噂が巷で囁かれている。』
jpnSearchText:
『ドライブがてらマメに訪れている
との噂が巷で囁かれている。』

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. About ninety percent of what they publish is bullshit—but it ain't smart to write off rags like that altogether, either.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. About ninety percent of what
they publish is bullshit—but it ain't smart to write off
rags like that altogether, either.
jpnChrName: 『ジュディス・ランスターは彼に騙され、   愛人の一人にされたというのが本誌の推測だ。』
jpnSearchText:
『ジュディス・ランスターは彼に騙され、
愛人の一人にされたというのが本誌の推測だ。』

engChrName: I just want to know if something happened to her, at the very least. Hopefully Buzzraider can explain what.
engSearchText:
I just want to know if something happened to her, at
the very least. Hopefully Buzzraider can explain what.
jpnChrName: なるほど……これは確かに荒れそうだ。
jpnSearchText: なるほど……これは確かに荒れそうだ。

engChrName: Then let's go ahead and swing by the bookstore later to pick up a copy. Doesn't hurt to check it out.
engSearchText:
Then let's go ahead and swing by the bookstore later
to pick up a copy. Doesn't hurt to check it out.
jpnChrName: ところで…… “愛人”ってなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ところで……
“愛人”ってなんですか？

engChrName: Once the party bought their copy of Buzzraider, they proceeded to page through its contents outside of the bookstore.
engSearchText:
Once the party bought their copy of Buzzraider, they
proceeded to page through its contents outside of
the bookstore.
jpnChrName: ええと、フェリちゃんは 知らなくても大丈夫ですから。
jpnSearchText:
ええと、フェリちゃんは
知らなくても大丈夫ですから。

engChrName: Hmm... 'Judith Lanster and Maxim the Red Comet Madly in Love,' it says.
engSearchText:
Hmm... 'Judith Lanster and Maxim the Red Comet
Madly in Love,' it says.

engChrName: What? THOSE two?!
engSearchText: What? THOSE two?!
jpnChrName: しっかし……あんなスカシに 仮にもトップ女優が靡（なび）くかねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
しっかし……あんなスカシに
仮にもトップ女優が靡（なび）くかねぇ？

engChrName: Maxim, as in Maxim Lugan? He's the Z1 champion, yes?
engSearchText:
Maxim, as in Maxim Lugan? He's the Z1
champion, yes?
jpnChrName: それにしても、 随分と不確実なソースみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
随分と不確実なソースみたいですね。

engChrName: I do recall both of them being single, but is it really worth people getting so worked up about it?
engSearchText:
I do recall both of them being single, but is it really
worth people getting so worked up about it?
jpnChrName: そもそも信憑性って意味じゃ かなり怪しい記事ではあるな。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも信憑性って意味じゃ
かなり怪しい記事ではあるな。

engChrName: We're talkin' about two big celebrities possibly getting together here. That's reason enough to work people into a frenzy.
engSearchText:
We're talkin' about two big celebrities possibly
getting together here. That's reason enough to work
people into a frenzy.
jpnChrName: あるのは写真一枚だけで、後は全部 デタラメってこともあり得そうだ。
jpnSearchText:
あるのは写真一枚だけで、後は全部
デタラメってこともあり得そうだ。

engChrName: But I think it's safe to say it's what's actually in the article that's got people talking.
engSearchText:
But I think it's safe to say it's what's actually in the
article that's got people talking.
jpnChrName: つーかゴシップ誌なんて 大体そういうパターンだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
つーかゴシップ誌なんて
大体そういうパターンだろうしな。

engChrName: 'Maxim Lugan has lovers in countless places.'
engSearchText: 'Maxim Lugan has lovers in countless places.'
jpnChrName: あまり読んだことないけど、 そういうものなんだ……
jpnSearchText:
あまり読んだことないけど、
そういうものなんだ……

engChrName: 'Word on the street is that he pays visits to these women while taking his road trips.'
engSearchText:
'Word on the street is that he pays visits to these
women while taking his road trips.'
jpnChrName: ま、どっちにしろ惚れた腫れたは 当人同士の問題だろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、どっちにしろ惚れた腫れたは
当人同士の問題だろうがな。

engChrName: 'We at Buzzraider believe that Judith Lanster is one such mistress of his, tricked into becoming one after being fed lies by the racecar driver.'
engSearchText:
'We at Buzzraider believe that Judith Lanster is one
such mistress of his, tricked into becoming one after
being fed lies by the racecar driver.'
jpnChrName: 他人が口を挟むことじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: 他人が口を挟むことじゃねえ。

engChrName: Okay, now I see what all the fuss is about.
engSearchText: Okay, now I see what all the fuss is about.
jpnChrName: そう……ですね。
jpnSearchText: そう……ですね。

engChrName: Hey, guys? What's a 'mistress'?
engSearchText: Hey, guys? What's a 'mistress'?
jpnChrName: （しかしあの“グリムキャッツ”がねえ……   どうにも想像しにくいよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしあの“グリムキャッツ”がねえ……
どうにも想像しにくいよな。）

engChrName: Er, that's...nothing you should worry about, Feri.
engSearchText: Er, that's...nothing you should worry about, Feri.
jpnChrName: （チャンピオンの方の愛人を囲ってるってのは   いかにもあり得そうだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（チャンピオンの方の愛人を囲ってるってのは
いかにもあり得そうだが。）

engChrName: Uhh, all right...?
engSearchText: Uhh, all right...?
jpnChrName: （……それでも一車好きとしちゃあ   多少の夢は見せて欲しいもんだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（……それでも一車好きとしちゃあ
多少の夢は見せて欲しいもんだが。）

engChrName: I don't buy it. You think an actress that's as hot of a ticket as her is really gonna be wooed by a prick like him?
engSearchText:
I don't buy it. You think an actress that's as hot of a
ticket as her is really gonna be wooed by a prick
like him?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、どうかしましたか？

engChrName: The source for this article seems rather unreliable.
engSearchText: The source for this article seems rather unreliable.
jpnChrName: ……いや、なんでもねえ。 そろそろ行くか。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、なんでもねえ。
そろそろ行くか。

engChrName: Agreed. It's hard to take this article seriously with material like this.
engSearchText:
Agreed. It's hard to take this article seriously with
material like this.
jpnChrName: は、早く映画館の中へ！ 外にいると危険だ！
jpnSearchText:
は、早く映画館の中へ！
外にいると危険だ！

engChrName: All they've got to back their claims up is a single photo. The rest of it could absolutely be totally made up bullshit.
engSearchText:
All they've got to back their claims up is a
single photo. The rest of it could absolutely be totally
made up bullshit.
jpnChrName: あうっ！！
jpnSearchText: あうっ！！

engChrName: Which, to be fair, is pretty par for the course for magazines like that, so no surprise there.
engSearchText:
Which, to be fair, is pretty par for the course for
magazines like that, so no surprise there.
jpnChrName: うぅ……ママぁ………
jpnSearchText: うぅ……ママぁ………

engChrName: That's good to know. I can't say I'm otherwise in the habit of reading these sorts of publications often.
engSearchText:
That's good to know. I can't say I'm otherwise in the
habit of reading these sorts of publications often.
jpnChrName: 早く映画館の中に避難するんだ！ ここは僕がなんとかするから！
jpnSearchText:
早く映画館の中に避難するんだ！
ここは僕がなんとかするから！

engChrName: In any case, whether those two have gotten together or not is their business.
engSearchText:
In any case, whether those two have gotten together
or not is their business.
jpnChrName: う、うんッ！
jpnSearchText: う、うんッ！

engChrName: It's not our place to comment on.
engSearchText: It's not our place to comment on.
jpnChrName: こ、この先には行かせないからなっ！ イーディスの警察官を舐めるなよおっ……！
jpnSearchText:
こ、この先には行かせないからなっ！
イーディスの警察官を舐めるなよおっ……！

engChrName: Yeah. I suppose you're right...
engSearchText: Yeah. I suppose you're right...
jpnChrName: ひぃぃ！！　すみませんでしたああっ！
jpnSearchText: ひぃぃ！！　すみませんでしたああっ！

engChrName: (But if you ask me, I can't see someone like Grimcat hookin' up with the likes of him.)
engSearchText:
(But if you ask me, I can't see someone like Grimcat
hookin' up with the likes of him.)
jpnChrName: ハッ、よく持ち堪えた！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、よく持ち堪えた！

engChrName: (Though I wouldn't put it past her to have a whole harem of hot items hangin' around her.)
engSearchText:
(Though I wouldn't put it past her to have a whole
harem of hot items hangin' around her.)
jpnChrName: う、裏解決屋！？
jpnSearchText: う、裏解決屋！？

engChrName: (Sure would be nice if fancy cars really brought that sort of attention to a guy, I'll say that much.)
engSearchText:
(Sure would be nice if fancy cars really brought that
sort of attention to a guy, I'll say that much.)
jpnChrName: たまにはちゃんと警察やってんじゃねえか？ 最後の最後で情けねえのはご愛嬌だが。
jpnSearchText:
たまにはちゃんと警察やってんじゃねえか？
最後の最後で情けねえのはご愛嬌だが。

engChrName: Van? What's the matter?
engSearchText: Van? What's the matter?
jpnChrName: 後はわたしたちに任せてください！
jpnSearchText: 後はわたしたちに任せてください！

engChrName: Sorry. Got lost in my own thoughts for a sec. Let's get movin'.
engSearchText:
Sorry. Got lost in my own thoughts for a sec.
Let's get movin'.
jpnChrName: ネイト様は市民の安全を……！
jpnSearchText: ネイト様は市民の安全を……！

engChrName: Come on! You need to get inside the theater! It's too dangerous outside!
engSearchText:
Come on! You need to get inside the theater! It's too
dangerous outside!
jpnChrName: あ、ああ！　後は任せた！
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ！　後は任せた！

engChrName: Aaah!
engSearchText: Aaah!
jpnChrName: 一丁片付けるか！
jpnSearchText: 一丁片付けるか！

engChrName: *sniffle* Mommy...
engSearchText: *sniffle* Mommy...
jpnChrName: お、終わったのか……？
jpnSearchText: お、終わったのか……？

engChrName: Get in the movie theater! Hurry! I'll handle things here!
engSearchText:
Get in the movie theater! Hurry! I'll handle
things here!
jpnChrName: はい、殲滅完了しました。
jpnSearchText: はい、殲滅完了しました。

engChrName: O-Okay!
engSearchText: O-Okay!
jpnChrName: 既にこの近くには敵性反応はありません。
jpnSearchText: 既にこの近くには敵性反応はありません。

engChrName: This is as far as you go! You won't get past me! If you think you can push the Edith police around, you'll be sorry!
engSearchText:
This is as far as you go! You won't get past me! If you
think you can push the Edith police around, you'll
be sorry!
jpnChrName: ふう……助かったぁ～。 にしても、よくあんなものを倒せたな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……助かったぁ～。
にしても、よくあんなものを倒せたな。

engChrName: Eeek! I'm sorry! I'm SORRYYY!
engSearchText: Eeek! I'm sorry! I'm SORRYYY!
jpnChrName: ちゃんとした装備を持った警察隊でも 手こずりそうなヤツらだったのに。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんとした装備を持った警察隊でも
手こずりそうなヤツらだったのに。

engChrName: Don't sweat it, Detective. You did good holding out.
engSearchText: Don't sweat it, Detective. You did good holding out.
jpnChrName: それくらいじゃねぇと 裏解決屋は務まらねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
それくらいじゃねぇと
裏解決屋は務まらねえからな。

engChrName: What? Is that you, Van?!
engSearchText: What? Is that you, Van?!
jpnChrName: ずっと胡散臭い奴だと思っていたが、 まさかこんな……
jpnSearchText:
ずっと胡散臭い奴だと思っていたが、
まさかこんな……

engChrName: Guess you do know how to do your job after all. Pretty cute watching you quake in your boots so much, though.
engSearchText:
Guess you do know how to do your job after all.
Pretty cute watching you quake in your boots so
much, though.
jpnChrName: い、いや！　僕は騙されないぞ！ いくらなんでも状況に適応しすぎだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
い、いや！　僕は騙されないぞ！
いくらなんでも状況に適応しすぎだろ！？

engChrName: Don't worry! We'll take it from here!
engSearchText: Don't worry! We'll take it from here!
jpnChrName: はいはい、とにかくここの市民たちを ちゃんと安心させろよ、捜査官。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、とにかくここの市民たちを
ちゃんと安心させろよ、捜査官。

engChrName: If you would, keep the citizens safe in the meantime!
engSearchText: If you would, keep the citizens safe in the meantime!
jpnChrName: お前に言われるまでもないっての！
jpnSearchText: お前に言われるまでもないっての！

engChrName: Right, of course! Counting on you guys!
engSearchText: Right, of course! Counting on you guys!
jpnChrName: でも、その……お前たちも、 何をするつもりかは知らないが……
jpnSearchText:
でも、その……お前たちも、
何をするつもりかは知らないが……

engChrName: All right, gang. Time to clean house!
engSearchText: All right, gang. Time to clean house!
jpnChrName: 気を付けろよ……！
jpnSearchText: 気を付けろよ……！

engChrName: Is it... Is it over?
engSearchText: Is it... Is it over?
jpnChrName: ああ。
jpnSearchText: ああ。

engChrName: Yep! Enemy eliminated!
engSearchText: Yep! Enemy eliminated!
jpnChrName: よう、二人はメシか。 フルコースとは、いいモン食ってんじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
よう、二人はメシか。
フルコースとは、いいモン食ってんじゃねーか。

engChrName: I can confirm that there are no hostile elements within the vicinity.
engSearchText:
I can confirm that there are no hostile elements
within the vicinity.
jpnChrName: 仕事の報酬込みなんだよ。 ここの姐さんとは付き合いがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
仕事の報酬込みなんだよ。
ここの姐さんとは付き合いがあってな。

engChrName: *sigh* I owe you big time. How did you guys manage to take such nasty things down?
engSearchText:
*sigh* I owe you big time. How did you guys manage
to take such nasty things down?
jpnChrName: マウさん、黒月の若手幹部だけど それなりに話の分かる人だしね。
jpnSearchText:
マウさん、黒月の若手幹部だけど
それなりに話の分かる人だしね。

engChrName: They gave us cops a hard time and that was even with all of our gear.
engSearchText:
They gave us cops a hard time and that was even with
all of our gear.
jpnChrName: ジャックがしょっちゅう酔い潰されるのが 相棒としては懸念事項だけど。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックがしょっちゅう酔い潰されるのが
相棒としては懸念事項だけど。

engChrName: What can I say? When you're a spriggan, you just get the job done—otherwise you'll be out on your ass fast.
engSearchText:
What can I say? When you're a spriggan, you just get
the job done—otherwise you'll be out on your ass fast.
jpnChrName: う、うるせー、負けっぱなしじゃ 男のメンツってもんがだな……
jpnSearchText:
う、うるせー、負けっぱなしじゃ
男のメンツってもんがだな……

engChrName: I always thought you were some lowlife out to trick people. But maybe I was—
engSearchText:
I always thought you were some lowlife out to
trick people. But maybe I was—
jpnChrName: それで体よく値切られてるのは どこの誰だったっけ？　まったく……
jpnSearchText:
それで体よく値切られてるのは
どこの誰だったっけ？　まったく……

engChrName: What am I saying? You can't fool me! You must be pulling something here! How can you have such a perfect response to a crisis like this, huh?!
engSearchText:
What am I saying? You can't fool me! You must be
pulling something here! How can you have such a
perfect response to a crisis like this, huh?!
jpnChrName: どうせ賭けるなら、もっと マシな事に費やしなさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ賭けるなら、もっと
マシな事に費やしなさいよね。

engChrName: Don't you have better things to do with your time right now than yelling at me, Detective? Like maybe keepin' those civilians safe?
engSearchText:
Don't you have better things to do with your time
right now than yelling at me, Detective? Like maybe
keepin' those civilians safe?
jpnChrName: へえ？　マシってのは例えば どういう話なんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
へえ？　マシってのは例えば
どういう話なんだよ？

engChrName: Shut up! I don't need you telling me how to do my job, spriggan!
engSearchText:
Shut up! I don't need you telling me how to do my
job, spriggan!
jpnChrName: そうねえ、例えば──
jpnSearchText: そうねえ、例えば──

engChrName: Ugh... Anyway, I don't know what you guys are planning to do, but...but...
engSearchText:
Ugh... Anyway, I don't know what you guys are
planning to do, but...but...
jpnChrName: ２枚抜いて、合計が私より多かったら勝ち。
jpnSearchText: ２枚抜いて、合計が私より多かったら勝ち。

engChrName: Stay safe out there, all right?!
engSearchText: Stay safe out there, all right?!
jpnChrName: 今夜は歓楽街で遊んできていいよ。 ミラも持ってあげるから。
jpnSearchText:
今夜は歓楽街で遊んできていいよ。
ミラも持ってあげるから。

engChrName: Will do. You, too, pal.
engSearchText: Will do. You, too, pal.
jpnChrName: ククッ、乗ったぜ。 その報酬、忘れんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
ククッ、乗ったぜ。
その報酬、忘れんなよ？

engChrName: Grabbing a bite to eat, you two? Looks like you're livin' large if you're havin' a full course.
engSearchText:
Grabbing a bite to eat, you two? Looks like you're
livin' large if you're havin' a full course.
jpnChrName: 条件は不利だが、得るものはデカいってか。
jpnSearchText: 条件は不利だが、得るものはデカいってか。

engChrName: You could call it compensation for some work we did. I know the woman who runs this place. She and I go way back.
engSearchText:
You could call it compensation for some work we did.
I know the woman who runs this place. She and I go
way back.
jpnChrName: 心理戦が鍵になりそうだが──
jpnSearchText: 心理戦が鍵になりそうだが──

engChrName: For someone in Heiyue's upper management, Mau's a surprisingly understanding person.
engSearchText:
For someone in Heiyue's upper management, Mau's a
surprisingly understanding person.
jpnChrName: こいつかこいつ…… いや、左端が怪しいと見た。
jpnSearchText:
こいつかこいつ……
いや、左端が怪しいと見た。

engChrName: That said, it is a LITTLE concerning just how much Jack gets wasted when he's here.
engSearchText:
That said, it is a LITTLE concerning just how much
Jack gets wasted when he's here.
jpnChrName: わわわ～っ、それはちょっと……！
jpnSearchText: わわわ～っ、それはちょっと……！

engChrName: L-Lay off me! You don't expect a man's pride to take a hit when he's on a losing streak or what?!
engSearchText:
L-Lay off me! You don't expect a man's pride to take
a hit when he's on a losing streak or what?!
jpnChrName: チッ、左端じゃなかったか。 （だがハルの事だ、裏の裏をかいて──）
jpnSearchText:
チッ、左端じゃなかったか。
（だがハルの事だ、裏の裏をかいて──）

engChrName: Lay off you? Is that what you have to say to me after I stepped in and bargained on your behalf?
engSearchText:
Lay off you? Is that what you have to say to me after I
stepped in and bargained on your behalf?
jpnChrName: （ふっふ～ん、そう簡単に   いきますかってーの！）
jpnSearchText:
（ふっふ～ん、そう簡単に
いきますかってーの！）

engChrName: Look, if you're gonna make bets, you need to set your sights on more sensible stuff or else you always end up feeling miserable.
engSearchText:
Look, if you're gonna make bets, you need to set your
sights on more sensible stuff or else you always end up
feeling miserable.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、早速熱中してるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、早速熱中してるみてえだな。

engChrName: Sensible, huh? What do you mean by that?
engSearchText: Sensible, huh? What do you mean by that?
jpnChrName: 記念祭まで賭け事なんて…… ある意味、お二人らしいですね。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭まで賭け事なんて……
ある意味、お二人らしいですね。

engChrName: All right, I'll give you an example.
engSearchText: All right, I'll give you an example.
jpnChrName: 記念祭まで賭け事…… これはこれでお二人らしいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭まで賭け事……
これはこれでお二人らしいですっ！

engChrName: Let's say you pick two cards from my hand of five. If the sum of yours beats mine, you win.
engSearchText:
Let's say you pick two cards from my hand
of five. If the sum of yours beats mine,
you win.
jpnChrName: クク、ジャックが勝ったら 俺らも便乗させてもらおーぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ジャックが勝ったら
俺らも便乗させてもらおーぜ。

engChrName: And if you win, you can go out and enjoy the Entertainment District. I'll even give you cash to have some fun.
engSearchText:
And if you win, you can go out and enjoy the
Entertainment District. I'll even give you cash to have
some fun.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お二人も記念祭を 楽しまれているようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、お二人も記念祭を
楽しまれているようで何よりです。

engChrName: You're on! I'm going to hold you to what you just said, all right? No takebacks!
engSearchText:
You're on! I'm going to hold you to what you just
said, all right? No takebacks!
jpnChrName: 煌都のギャンブラーだっけ。 本当に好きみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
煌都のギャンブラーだっけ。
本当に好きみたいだね。

engChrName: The cards might be stacked against him, but he stands to gain a lot if he wins.
engSearchText:
The cards might be stacked against him, but he stands
to gain a lot if he wins.
jpnChrName: （そういえばギャンブラーを   題材にした映画があったっけ。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえばギャンブラーを
題材にした映画があったっけ。）

engChrName: Guess a lot of it ultimately comes down to mind games.
engSearchText:
Guess a lot of it ultimately comes down to
mind games.
jpnChrName: （あたしもオファーが来た時のために   参考にさせてもらおっと！）
jpnSearchText:
（あたしもオファーが来た時のために
参考にさせてもらおっと！）

engChrName: I think I'll go for this... No, the left edge looks real suspicious.
engSearchText:
I think I'll go for this... No, the left edge looks
real suspicious.
jpnChrName: フフ──平和的な解決が できたようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ──平和的な解決が
できたようで何よりだ。

engChrName: Whoa, whoa, whoa! What do you think you're doing?
engSearchText: Whoa, whoa, whoa! What do you think you're doing?
jpnChrName: いや～、記念祭は最高だよね～！ お祭りには微妙にトラウマもあるけどさ～！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、記念祭は最高だよね～！
お祭りには微妙にトラウマもあるけどさ～！

engChrName: Gah, guess I'm barking up the wrong tree. (But knowing her, she'll be two steps ahead of me, so I just gotta be three!)
engSearchText:
Gah, guess I'm barking up the wrong tree.
(But knowing her, she'll be two steps ahead of me, so
I just gotta be three!)

engChrName: (Heh! You're not gonna win that easily!)
engSearchText: (Heh! You're not gonna win that easily!)
jpnChrName: メンドーな演説の警備も終わったし 今日は一日遊びまくるぞ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
メンドーな演説の警備も終わったし
今日は一日遊びまくるぞ～っ！！

engChrName: Yeesh. Those two sure didn't take long to get all fired up.
engSearchText:
Yeesh. Those two sure didn't take long to get all
fired up.

engChrName: Even during the Revolution Festival, they're still gambling. I guess I shouldn't be all that shocked...
engSearchText:
Even during the Revolution Festival, they're
still gambling. I guess I shouldn't be all
that shocked...
jpnChrName: あ、映画のチケットも買ってあるんだよね～。 『ゴールデンブラッド完全版』、定番っしょ～？
jpnSearchText:
あ、映画のチケットも買ってあるんだよね～。
『ゴールデンブラッド完全版』、定番っしょ～？

engChrName: Even on the Revolution Festival, those two are still gambling. That's so like those two!
engSearchText:
Even on the Revolution Festival, those two are
still gambling. That's so like those two!

engChrName: Nice. If Jack wins, us guys will have to tag along on his big night out.
engSearchText:
Nice. If Jack wins, us guys will have to tag along on
his big night out.
jpnChrName: ……あ、あのさ…… なにか怒ってらっしゃる……？
jpnSearchText:
……あ、あのさ……
なにか怒ってらっしゃる……？

engChrName: I'm glad to see the two of them are enjoying themselves. That's what matters most on a day like today.
engSearchText:
I'm glad to see the two of them are
enjoying themselves. That's what matters most on a
day like today.
jpnChrName: ふう、ネイト………… 私たち、もう終わりにしよっか。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ネイト…………
私たち、もう終わりにしよっか。

engChrName: Those two are from Langport, right? They really do seem to love their gambling.
engSearchText:
Those two are from Langport, right? They really do
seem to love their gambling.
jpnChrName: ちょ、ええええええええ！？ ななななんでっ！？　どうしてだよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ええええええええ！？
ななななんでっ！？　どうしてだよ～っ！！

engChrName: (Oh, yeah. There's a gambling movie being shopped around, isn't there?)
engSearchText:
(Oh, yeah. There's a gambling movie being shopped
around, isn't there?)
jpnChrName: いやさ、あんな事があった上に この一ヶ月ろくに連絡も寄こさないし。
jpnSearchText:
いやさ、あんな事があった上に
この一ヶ月ろくに連絡も寄こさないし。

engChrName: (I'd better pay close attention to those two so when I get my offer to star in it, I'll be ready!)
engSearchText:
(I'd better pay close attention to those two so when I
get my offer to star in it, I'll be ready!)
jpnChrName: むしろ急に呼び出されて どうして私がハッピーだと思うわけ？
jpnSearchText:
むしろ急に呼び出されて
どうして私がハッピーだと思うわけ？

engChrName: I am glad to see it all worked out amicably in the end.
engSearchText: I am glad to see it all worked out amicably in the end.
jpnChrName: そそそそれはっ！　ここの所 仕事が忙しかったというか！
jpnSearchText:
そそそそれはっ！　ここの所
仕事が忙しかったというか！

engChrName: Man, Revolution Festival's the best day of the year! Don't you agree, babe? Sure, the festival can be a real pain in the neck, but I still love today!
engSearchText:
Man, Revolution Festival's the best day of the year!
Don't you agree, babe? Sure, the festival can be a real
pain in the neck, but I still love today!
jpnChrName: ふ～ん、この前婦警さんと 楽しそうに話してるのを見かけたけど？
jpnSearchText:
ふ～ん、この前婦警さんと
楽しそうに話してるのを見かけたけど？

jpnChrName: ままま待って待って！ それについては理由がぁぁ～！！
jpnSearchText:
ままま待って待って！
それについては理由がぁぁ～！！

engChrName: With that whole speech over, I don't have to think about work anymore. We can have fun together all day long, like Aidios intended!
engSearchText:
With that whole speech over, I don't have to think
about work anymore. We can have fun together all
day long, like Aidios intended!
jpnChrName: （う～ん、流石に同情の余地も……）
jpnSearchText: （う～ん、流石に同情の余地も……）

jpnChrName: （もしかしてこれが“修羅場”ですか……！？）
jpnSearchText: （もしかしてこれが“修羅場”ですか……！？）

engChrName: Oh, I also bought us some tickets for Golden Blood Director's Cut! Can't go wrong with that!
engSearchText:
Oh, I also bought us some tickets for Golden Blood
Director's Cut! Can't go wrong with that!
jpnChrName: （クカカ、女を怒らせるとコエーぞ？）
jpnSearchText: （クカカ、女を怒らせるとコエーぞ？）

jpnChrName: （ふふ……お邪魔しては悪そうですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ふふ……お邪魔しては悪そうですね。）

engChrName: Uh... Babe? Are you...mad about something?
engSearchText: Uh... Babe? Are you...mad about something?
jpnChrName: （ふーん、よく知らないけど   自業自得っぽいね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふーん、よく知らないけど
自業自得っぽいね。）

engChrName: *sigh* Nate...I think we should break up.
engSearchText: *sigh* Nate...I think we should break up.
jpnChrName: （確か映画祭にも来てた……   ま、逆に良く持った方なんじゃない？）
jpnSearchText:
（確か映画祭にも来てた……
ま、逆に良く持った方なんじゃない？）

engChrName: Huh?! Wh-Wh-What?! WHY?! How can you say that?!
engSearchText:
Huh?! Wh-Wh-What?! WHY?! How can you
say that?!
jpnChrName: （フフ、若人たちも大変だな。）
jpnSearchText: （フフ、若人たちも大変だな。）

engChrName: Why do you think? After everything that happened, I haven't heard from you in a whole month.
engSearchText:
Why do you think? After everything that happened, I
haven't heard from you in a whole month.
jpnChrName: （ま、今はそっとしておいてやるかね。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、今はそっとしておいてやるかね。）

engChrName: Do you really expect me to be happy after being treated like that just because you decided to suddenly drag me out there?
engSearchText:
Do you really expect me to be happy after being
treated like that just because you decided to suddenly
drag me out there?
jpnChrName: あ…… ヴァンさんたち、お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText:
あ……
ヴァンさんたち、お疲れ様です。

engChrName: B-Babe! I didn't mean to ignore you! I've just been swamped with work, that's all!
engSearchText:
B-Babe! I didn't mean to ignore you! I've just been
swamped with work, that's all!
jpnChrName: ふふ、３日ぶりかしら。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、３日ぶりかしら。

engChrName: Uh-huh. What about that policewoman you were talking to earlier? You sure seemed to be enjoying her company JUST FINE.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh. What about that policewoman you were
talking to earlier? You sure seemed to be enjoying her
company JUST FINE.
jpnChrName: アニエスと一緒に 記念祭を一回りしてるみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスと一緒に
記念祭を一回りしてるみたいね？

engChrName: Wait! I can explain! There's a perfectly reasonable explanation for that!
engSearchText:
Wait! I can explain! There's a perfectly reasonable
explanation for that!
jpnChrName: あはは、言ったように 交替しながらですけれど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、言ったように
交替しながらですけれど。

engChrName: (Erm, not to sound mean, I can't say I feel too sorry for him.)
engSearchText:
(Erm, not to sound mean, I can't say I feel too sorry
for him.)
jpnChrName: （むうっ……）
jpnSearchText: （むうっ……）

engChrName: (Is this what it means to be 'in the doghouse'?)
engSearchText: (Is this what it means to be 'in the doghouse'?)
jpnChrName: （どうどう。   聞いてた話でしょ。）
jpnSearchText:
（どうどう。
聞いてた話でしょ。）

engChrName: (Sucks to be him! Gehenna hath no fury like a woman scorned!)
engSearchText:
(Sucks to be him! Gehenna hath no fury like a
woman scorned!)
jpnChrName: まずはツーマンセルで 記念祭を一回りしてるみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
まずはツーマンセルで
記念祭を一回りしてるみたいね？

engChrName: (Heehee. I suppose now isn't a good time to talk to him.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. I suppose now isn't a good time to talk
to him.)
jpnChrName: お疲れ様でーす。
jpnSearchText: お疲れ様でーす。

engChrName: (Hmm... I don't really know what's going on between the two of them, but it seems to me like he probably brought it on himself.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I don't really know what's going on between
the two of them, but it seems to me like he probably
brought it on himself.)
jpnChrName: フン……まあ一応、 お疲れ様とは言っておく。
jpnSearchText:
フン……まあ一応、
お疲れ様とは言っておく。

engChrName: (I remember her. He dragged her to the Tharbad Film Festival, too. I'm impressed she's put up with him for as long as she has.)
engSearchText:
(I remember her. He dragged her to the Tharbad
Film Festival, too. I'm impressed she's put up with
him for as long as she has.)
jpnChrName: ま、そんな所だ。 お前さんたちは生徒会での見回りか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、そんな所だ。
お前さんたちは生徒会での見回りか？

engChrName: (Haha. It isn't easy to be young.)
engSearchText: (Haha. It isn't easy to be young.)
jpnChrName: はい、この日はアラミスの生徒も かなり街中に出ていますので。
jpnSearchText:
はい、この日はアラミスの生徒も
かなり街中に出ていますので。

engChrName: (Yeah, I think we should just leave those two alone and move on for now.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, I think we should just leave those two alone
and move on for now.)
jpnChrName: ええ、この日はアラミスの生徒も かなり街中に繰り出しているからね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この日はアラミスの生徒も
かなり街中に繰り出しているからね。

engChrName: Oh! Hello there. Good to see you!
engSearchText: Oh! Hello there. Good to see you!
jpnChrName: 羽目を外す子なんかいないか 一応目を光らせているってわけ。
jpnSearchText:
羽目を外す子なんかいないか
一応目を光らせているってわけ。

engChrName: Long time, no see. I guess it's been about three days?
engSearchText: Long time, no see. I guess it's been about three days?
jpnChrName: ま、“経験者”だろうし 言わずもがなかもしれないけれど❤
jpnSearchText:
ま、“経験者”だろうし
言わずもがなかもしれないけれど❤

engChrName: From what I gather, it seems like you and Agnès here have already gone around the festival. Is that right?
engSearchText:
From what I gather, it seems like you and Agnès here
have already gone around the festival. Is that right?
jpnChrName: まあ、な。
jpnSearchText: まあ、な。

engChrName: I told you, we all traded off! It wasn't just him and me the entire time.
engSearchText:
I told you, we all traded off! It wasn't just him and me
the entire time.
jpnChrName: そ、そういえば８年前の 生徒会メンバーって話だったか……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そういえば８年前の
生徒会メンバーって話だったか……

jpnChrName: そそ、言わば大先輩ってわけよ。
jpnSearchText: そそ、言わば大先輩ってわけよ。

engChrName: (See? That's exactly what we heard!)
engSearchText: (See? That's exactly what we heard!)
jpnChrName: ──ま、さっき手分けして一回りして ひと休憩してるんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
──ま、さっき手分けして一回りして
ひと休憩してるんですけど……

engChrName: I take it you're working as a two-man team as you make your way around the festival?
engSearchText:
I take it you're working as a two-man team as you
make your way around the festival?
jpnChrName: あたしからの“４ｓｐｇ”、 ちゃんと確認してくれました？
jpnSearchText:
あたしからの“４ｓｐｇ”、
ちゃんと確認してくれました？

engChrName: Nice to see you!
engSearchText: Nice to see you!
jpnChrName: ああ、お前さんから依頼が来るとはな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、お前さんから依頼が来るとはな。

engChrName: Hmph. Glad to see you're doing something worthwhile, I guess.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Glad to see you're doing something
worthwhile, I guess.
jpnChrName: 生徒会メンバーが勢揃い…… 内容の予想はつきそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会メンバーが勢揃い……
内容の予想はつきそうだが。

engChrName: We're just helpin' out how we can. You guys out on your own patrol as Student Council or somethin'?
engSearchText:
We're just helpin' out how we can. You guys out on
your own patrol as Student Council or somethin'?
jpnChrName: ──うーん、その様子じゃ、 まだ見つけてもらってないのかな？
jpnSearchText:
──うーん、その様子じゃ、
まだ見つけてもらってないのかな？

engChrName: Yeah. There are a lot of Aramis students around town today, so it's important for us to also be around.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There are a lot of Aramis students around town
today, so it's important for us to also be around.
jpnChrName: そ、そうですね……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうですね……

engChrName: We are. We have a lot of Aramis students around town today, so it's important for us to be out as well.
engSearchText:
We are. We have a lot of Aramis students around
town today, so it's important for us to be out as well.
jpnChrName: ふんッ……
jpnSearchText: ふんッ……

engChrName: Got to make sure nobody's having TOO much fun and causing any trouble out there, after all.
engSearchText:
Got to make sure nobody's having TOO much fun
and causing any trouble out there, after all.
jpnChrName: （ハン、ひょっとして……）
jpnSearchText: （ハン、ひょっとして……）

engChrName: Not that I need to explain it to you, of all people. I'm sure you were in my shoes back in the day. ❤
engSearchText:
Not that I need to explain it to you, of all people.
I'm sure you were in my shoes back in the day. ❤
