jpnChrName: （ふふ、この子はこの子で   なかなか見所があるのよねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、この子はこの子で
なかなか見所があるのよねぇ。）

engChrName: Pretty much, yeah.
engSearchText: Pretty much, yeah.
jpnChrName: ──ま、こっちの人手は足りてるから ゆっくり回ってきていいわよ、アニエス。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、こっちの人手は足りてるから
ゆっくり回ってきていいわよ、アニエス。

engChrName: Oh, right. I forgot you were on Student Council eight years ago. Could've fooled me.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. I forgot you were on Student Council eight
years ago. Could've fooled me.
jpnChrName: そうそう、せっかくの機会なんだし 所長さんとお祭りを楽しんできてね～❤
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、せっかくの機会なんだし
所長さんとお祭りを楽しんできてね～❤

engChrName: Yep! He and the others gave us some big shoes to fill.
engSearchText: Yep! He and the others gave us some big shoes to fill.
jpnChrName: も、もう２人とも……！ ちゃんと後で合流しますから！
jpnSearchText:
も、もう２人とも……！
ちゃんと後で合流しますから！

engChrName: Anyway, we're all just taking a short break after breaking off to do our whole patrol.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we're all just taking a short break after
breaking off to do our whole patrol.
jpnChrName: そ、そうですよ、 あくまでバイトの一環ですって！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですよ、
あくまでバイトの一環ですって！

engChrName: Did you happen to see the 4SPG I left you?
engSearchText: Did you happen to see the 4SPG I left you?
jpnChrName: （やれやれ……）
jpnSearchText: （やれやれ……）

engChrName: Sure did. Never thought I'd answer a call from you.
engSearchText: Sure did. Never thought I'd answer a call from you.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、一区切りは付いているので 私もいつでもお付き合いできます。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、一区切りは付いているので
私もいつでもお付き合いできます。

engChrName: Seein' as you're all together, I think I can guess what you guys want from me.
engSearchText:
Seein' as you're all together, I think I can guess what
you guys want from me.
jpnChrName: 交替する時は遠慮なく言ってくださいね？
jpnSearchText: 交替する時は遠慮なく言ってくださいね？

engChrName: Hmm... Hey, Van, you haven't read my post yet, have you?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Hey, Van, you haven't read my post
yet, have you?
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ。

engChrName: Oh, that's right...
engSearchText: Oh, that's right...
jpnChrName: それまではアニエスさんも のんびりしててくださいねっ。
jpnSearchText:
それまではアニエスさんも
のんびりしててくださいねっ。

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ま、それまでは適当にダベってな。
jpnSearchText: ま、それまでは適当にダベってな。

engChrName: (Heh. Are you telling me this guy's...?)
engSearchText: (Heh. Are you telling me this guy's...?)
jpnChrName: それまではアニエス様も ごゆっくりなさってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
それまではアニエス様も
ごゆっくりなさってくださいね。

engChrName: (Maybe. He might act standoffish, but he's got good potential in him. Trust me.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe. He might act standoffish, but he's got good
potential in him. Trust me.)
jpnChrName: それまではアニエスさんも どうかゆっくりしててよ。
jpnSearchText:
それまではアニエスさんも
どうかゆっくりしててよ。

engChrName: Well, we're holding things down just fine, so feel free to take your time checking things out and come back later, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Well, we're holding things down just fine, so feel free
to take your time checking things out and come back
later, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ま、それまでは貴女も せいぜいノンビリしてなさい。
jpnSearchText:
ま、それまでは貴女も
せいぜいノンビリしてなさい。

engChrName: Yeah! Days like this don't come around often! Better make the most of this quality time with your boss and enjoy the festival together! ❤
engSearchText:
Yeah! Days like this don't come around often!
Better make the most of this quality time with your
boss and enjoy the festival together! ❤
jpnChrName: フフ、その時まで ゆるりと過ごしておくとよい。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、その時まで
ゆるりと過ごしておくとよい。

engChrName: Augh, you two...! I promise I'll be back later, okay?
engSearchText: Augh, you two...! I promise I'll be back later, okay?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんたち！ アニエスも無事だったのね！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさんたち！
アニエスも無事だったのね！？

engChrName: I-I trust you! I know you're...you're only going out with him for work! It's okay!
engSearchText:
I-I trust you! I know you're...you're only going out
with him for work! It's okay!
jpnChrName: アシェンさん……すみません。 ご心配をおかけしました。
jpnSearchText:
アシェンさん……すみません。
ご心配をおかけしました。

engChrName: (*sigh* Kid's got negative chill, I swear.)
engSearchText: (*sigh* Kid's got negative chill, I swear.)
jpnChrName: お嬢さんも無事、 家族と合流できて何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんも無事、
家族と合流できて何よりだ。

engChrName: I'm at a good stopping point right now, so whenever you need me, feel free to come fetch me.
engSearchText:
I'm at a good stopping point right now, so whenever
you need me, feel free to come fetch me.
jpnChrName: どうやら動ける黒月の手勢は 一通りまとめられたみてーだな？
jpnSearchText:
どうやら動ける黒月の手勢は
一通りまとめられたみてーだな？

engChrName: Just say the word and I'll be happy to join.
engSearchText: Just say the word and I'll be happy to join.
jpnChrName: ええ、そこまで多くはありませんが 今も有意義に動いてもらっています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そこまで多くはありませんが
今も有意義に動いてもらっています。

engChrName: Sounds good to me. Thanks, Agnès.
engSearchText: Sounds good to me. Thanks, Agnès.
jpnChrName: “かの家”の皆さんも殆どが この状況では停まっていますしね。
jpnSearchText:
“かの家”の皆さんも殆どが
この状況では停まっていますしね。

engChrName: In the meantime, you should relax! Enjoy yourself, okay?
engSearchText:
In the meantime, you should relax! Enjoy
yourself, okay?
jpnChrName: かの家……ひょっとして。
jpnSearchText: かの家……ひょっとして。

engChrName: Until then, just sit tight and chat or whatever.
engSearchText: Until then, just sit tight and chat or whatever.
jpnChrName: 古都で密かに手勢を送り込んだ 有力家の者たちか。
jpnSearchText:
古都で密かに手勢を送り込んだ
有力家の者たちか。

engChrName: In the meantime, please, feel free to relax, Ms. Claudel. I insist.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, please, feel free to relax,
Ms. Claudel. I insist.
jpnChrName: ええ、同じ黒月の仲間ですが 最近では行き違いも多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、同じ黒月の仲間ですが
最近では行き違いも多くてね。

engChrName: Until then, feel free to relax. We've got this under control.
engSearchText:
Until then, feel free to relax. We've got this
under control.
jpnChrName: だがこの状況では些細な事だろう。 ──マウ女史もよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText:
だがこの状況では些細な事だろう。
──マウ女史もよろしく頼むよ。

engChrName: In the meantime, I want to see you doing nothing but relaxing. Got it?
engSearchText:
In the meantime, I want to see you doing nothing
but relaxing. Got it?
jpnChrName: 勿体ないお言葉…… 誠心誠意、尽くさせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
勿体ないお言葉……
誠心誠意、尽くさせて頂きます。

engChrName: Until then, feel free to enjoy yourself. You have earned it.
engSearchText:
Until then, feel free to enjoy yourself. You have
earned it.
jpnChrName: （あの姐さんはたしか、   ルウ家とはまた別の家なんだよな？）
jpnSearchText:
（あの姐さんはたしか、
ルウ家とはまた別の家なんだよな？）

engChrName: Everyone! I'm so glad to see you! Are you okay, Agnès?!
engSearchText:
Everyone! I'm so glad to see you! Are you
okay, Agnès?!
jpnChrName: （ああ、まあ中道派だから   ルウ家との関係も元々悪くねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、まあ中道派だから
ルウ家との関係も元々悪くねぇ。）

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Ashen. You must've been so worried...
engSearchText: I'm so sorry, Ashen. You must've been so worried...
jpnChrName: （問題は例の家だが……   ま、動けねえなら放置でいいだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（問題は例の家だが……
ま、動けねえなら放置でいいだろ。）

engChrName: I'm just glad to see you're doing okay and back with your family. Now I can breathe easier.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad to see you're doing okay and back with
your family. Now I can breathe easier.
jpnChrName: ──此度の作戦、《黒月》としても 間接的にだが可能な限り力になろう。
jpnSearchText:
──此度の作戦、《黒月》としても
間接的にだが可能な限り力になろう。

engChrName: Looks like you guys have rounded up everyone in the organization you can put to work.
engSearchText:
Looks like you guys have rounded up everyone in the
organization you can put to work.
jpnChrName: 既に首都南部で、動ける市民の 避難誘導などは完了しつつある。
jpnSearchText:
既に首都南部で、動ける市民の
避難誘導などは完了しつつある。

engChrName: Indeed. We don't have that many people to offer, but you can be sure that I'll put them to good use...
engSearchText:
Indeed. We don't have that many people to offer, but
you can be sure that I'll put them to good use...
jpnChrName: ただ、異変への技術的対処とあっては 我らの得意分野も十全には発揮できまい。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、異変への技術的対処とあっては
我らの得意分野も十全には発揮できまい。

engChrName: ...especially now that most members of a certain family have ceased operating given the current situation.
engSearchText:
...especially now that most members of a certain
family have ceased operating given the
current situation.
jpnChrName: でも貴方たちだけに解決を 丸投げするつもりはないから……！
jpnSearchText:
でも貴方たちだけに解決を
丸投げするつもりはないから……！

engChrName: Wait? Are you talking about...?
engSearchText: Wait? Are you talking about...?
jpnChrName: 必要なことがあれば言って頂戴！ 最大限のバックアップをさせてもらうわ！
jpnSearchText:
必要なことがあれば言って頂戴！
最大限のバックアップをさせてもらうわ！

engChrName: You must mean the faction who sent their goons out to Oración in secret.
engSearchText:
You must mean the faction who sent their goons out
to Oración in secret.
jpnChrName: アシェンさん、ファン大人も……
jpnSearchText: アシェンさん、ファン大人も……

engChrName: Correct. They might belong to the same organization, but lately, we haven't seen eye to eye with them very much.
engSearchText:
Correct. They might belong to the same
organization, but lately, we haven't seen eye to eye
with them very much.
jpnChrName: うーん、少し気後れしちゃうけど さすがに心強いわね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、少し気後れしちゃうけど
さすがに心強いわね。

engChrName: But all of that pales in comparison to what's happening right now. We deeply appreciate your assistance in this matter, Ms. Mau.
engSearchText:
But all of that pales in comparison to what's
happening right now. We deeply appreciate your
assistance in this matter, Ms. Mau.
jpnChrName: フフ、《銀》殿もそうですが改めて 直接お手伝いができるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、《銀》殿もそうですが改めて
直接お手伝いができるかもしれません。

engChrName: Think nothing of it. I'll do my utmost to help however I can.
engSearchText:
Think nothing of it. I'll do my utmost to
help however I can.
jpnChrName: “手”が必要なら遠慮なく申しつけを。 ──勝手にお貸しするかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
“手”が必要なら遠慮なく申しつけを。
──勝手にお貸しするかもしれませんが。

engChrName: (Remind me. That chick doesn't run with the Lus, right? She's with a different family?)
engSearchText:
(Remind me. That chick doesn't run with the
Lus, right? She's with a different family?)
jpnChrName: だからアンタのそれは 後が恐いんだっての……！
jpnSearchText:
だからアンタのそれは
後が恐いんだっての……！

engChrName: (Right. They're more a neutral family in pretty decent standing with the Lus.)
engSearchText:
(Right. They're more a neutral family in pretty decent
standing with the Lus.)
jpnChrName: うーん、そうねぇ。 貸しが何倍にも膨れ上がりそうな。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そうねぇ。
貸しが何倍にも膨れ上がりそうな。

engChrName: (It's the other family that's a big concern. But if they're in no position to act, then we can probably ignore them for now.)
engSearchText:
(It's the other family that's a big concern. But if
they're in no position to act, then we can probably
ignore them for now.)
jpnChrName: ま、こういうヤツだから諦めろや。
jpnSearchText: ま、こういうヤツだから諦めろや。

engChrName: ...Heiyue will offer whatever support it can in this operation, albeit in an indirect capacity.
engSearchText:
...Heiyue will offer whatever support it can in this
operation, albeit in an indirect capacity.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… ツァオも程々にしておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
ツァオも程々にしておきなさい。

engChrName: At this stage, our efforts in the southern part of the city to evacuate those who can flee are nearing completion.
engSearchText:
At this stage, our efforts in the southern part of the
city to evacuate those who can flee are
nearing completion.
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: However, when it comes to the technological side of dealing with the anomaly, that, unfortunately, is not our organization's forte.
engSearchText:
However, when it comes to the technological side of
dealing with the anomaly, that, unfortunately, is not
our organization's forte.
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Don't worry! That doesn't mean we plan to hang you guys out to dry and leave you to fend completely for yourselves!
engSearchText:
Don't worry! That doesn't mean we plan to hang you
guys out to dry and leave you to fend completely
for yourselves!
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: If you guys need anything, just ask! We'll absolutely do whatever we can to back you guys up!
engSearchText:
If you guys need anything, just ask! We'll absolutely
do whatever we can to back you guys up!
jpnChrName: （ヘッ、やっぱ夜の映画館ってのも   オツなもんだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ヘッ、やっぱ夜の映画館ってのも
オツなもんだな。）

engChrName: Ashen, Fan...
engSearchText: Ashen, Fan...
jpnChrName: （『ソバーキュリアス』   主演ニケ・マルソー……）
jpnSearchText:
（『ソバーキュリアス』
主演ニケ・マルソー……）

engChrName: I'm not exactly the biggest fan of calling in favors with you guys, but in a time like this, your help is definitely appreciated.
engSearchText:
I'm not exactly the biggest fan of calling in favors
with you guys, but in a time like this, your help is
definitely appreciated.
jpnChrName: （そういやこの女優は……   “あいつ”の昔馴染みだったか。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういやこの女優は……
“あいつ”の昔馴染みだったか。）

engChrName: Be that as it may, keep in mind that we also have Yin on our side as well. She may be able to lend you all her aid more directly.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, keep in mind that we also have Yin
on our side as well. She may be able to lend you all
her aid more directly.
jpnChrName: （『天国のこちら側』   ってヤツも気にはなるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（『天国のこちら側』
ってヤツも気にはなるが……）

engChrName: If you find yourself a little short on help, as it were, please, don't hesitate to ask. In fact, we may even loan her out to you regardless.
engSearchText:
If you find yourself a little short on help, as it were,
please, don't hesitate to ask. In fact, we may even loan
her out to you regardless.
jpnChrName: （さて、どちらを観るか──）
jpnSearchText: （さて、どちらを観るか──）

engChrName: Great. Just what I need, a guy like you lookin' for excuses to have us owe you one. I appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Great. Just what I need, a guy like you lookin' for
excuses to have us owe you one. I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: （それとも今夜は止めておくか？）
jpnSearchText: （それとも今夜は止めておくか？）

engChrName: I hear you. Favors like that can have a way of snowballing.
engSearchText:
I hear you. Favors like that can have a way
of snowballing.
jpnChrName: ４匹の動物たちを象ったモニュメントだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>４匹の動物たちを象ったモニュメントだ。

engChrName: Forget it, man. He's gonna do what he's gonna do. I wouldn't fight it.
engSearchText:
Forget it, man. He's gonna do what he's gonna do.
I wouldn't fight it.
jpnChrName: 映画館を出ますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>映画館を出ますか？
